tika-s0104t:4: Yo desetvāna saddhammaṃ, gambhīraṃ duddasaṃ varaṃ;
tika-s0104t:9: Saṃvaṇṇanā yā ca tassā, vaṇṇanā sādhuvaṇṇitā. 3.
tika-s0104t:14: Saṅkhepattā ca sotūhi, sammā ñātuṃ sudukkarā;
tika-s0104t:25_3: paṭhamaṃ tāva ratanattayapaṇāmaṃ kātuṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādimāha. Ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhe
tika-s0104t:25_4: ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṃ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā. Tathā hi vaṇṇayanti –
tika-s0104t:26_0: “Saṃvaṇṇanārambhe satthari paṇāmakaraṇaṃ dhammassa svākkhātabhāvena satthari pasādajananatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:26_1: satthu ca avitathadesanabhāvappakāsanena dhamme pasādajananatthaṃ. Tadubhayappasādā
tika-s0104t:27_0: Atha vā “ratanattayapaṇāmavacanaṃ attano ratanattayappasādassa viññāpanatthaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0104t:27_1: pana viññūnaṃ cittārādhanatthaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya gāhaṇatthaṃ, taṃ sabbasampattinipphādanattha”nti.
tika-s0104t:27_2: Atha vā “saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayavandanā saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa pabhavanissayavisuddhipaṭivedanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:27_3: taṃ pana dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthaṃ, taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya
tika-s0104t:27_5: pubbakiccabhāvato, paṇḍitehi samācaritabhāvato, āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato
tika-s0104t:27_6: ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā”ti. Atha vā “catugambhīrabhāvayuttaṃ dhammavinayaṃ
tika-s0104t:27_7: saṃvaṇṇetukāmassa mahāsamuddaṃ ogāhantassa viya paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatassāpi mahantaṃ
tika-s0104t:27_9: tato ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā”ti. Atha vā “asattharipi satthābhinivesassa
tika-s0104t:27_10: lokassa yathābhūtaṃ satthari eva sammāsambuddhe satthusambhāvanatthaṃ, asatthari
tika-s0104t:27_12: attano dahatī’ti ca vuttadosapariharaṇatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ paṇāmakiriyā”ti. Atha
tika-s0104t:27_14: paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ, saddhammassa ca paṇāmavidhānena paccekabuddhabhāvādhigamāya
tika-s0104t:27_15: paccekabuddhayānaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ, saṅghassa ca paṇāmavidhānena
tika-s0104t:27_17: paṇāmakiriyā”ti. Atha vā “maṅgalādikāni satthāni anantarāyāni, ciraṭṭhitikāni, bahumatāni
tika-s0104t:27_18: ca bhavantīti evaṃladdhikānaṃ cittaparitosanatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ paṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:27_20: saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ paṇāmakiriyā. Sotujanānuggahameva hi padhānaṃ katvā ācariyehi saṃvaṇṇanārambhe
tika-s0104t:27_21: thutipaṇāmaparidīpakāni vākyāni nikkhipīyanti, itarathā vināpi taṃ nikkhepaṃ kāyamanopaṇāmeneva
tika-s0104t:27_22: yathādhippetappayojanasiddhito kimetena ganthagāravakaraṇenā”ti ca evamādinā. Mayaṃ
tika-s0104t:27_23: pana idhādhippetameva payojanaṃ dassayissāma, tasmā saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:27_24: yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṃ. Idameva ca
tika-s0104t:27_25: payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “iti me pasannamatino …pe… tassānubhāvenā”ti.
tika-s0104t:27_27: ratanattayapūjāya paññāpāṭavabhāvato, tāya ca paññāpāṭavaṃ rāgādimalavidhamanato. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0104t:28_0: “Yasmiṃ mahānāma samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0104t:28_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0104t:28_2: cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:29: Tasmā ratanattayapūjāya vikkhālitamalāya paññāya pāṭavasiddhi. Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya paññāpadaṭṭhānasamādhihetuttā paññāpāṭavaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0104t:30_0: “Ujugatacitto kho pana mahānāma ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ,
tika-s0104t:30_1: labhati dhammopasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati,
tika-s0104t:30_2: passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedayati, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti.
tika-s0104t:31_0: Samādhissa ca paññāya padaṭṭhānabhāvo “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vuttoyeva.
tika-s0104t:31_1: Tato evaṃ paṭubhūtāya paññāya khedamabhibhuyya paṭiññātaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samāpayissati.
tika-s0104t:31_2: Tena vuttaṃ “ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇañhi…pe… paññāpāṭavabhāvato”ti. Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya
tika-s0104t:33: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ bala”nti. ;
tika-s0104t:34_1: āyu…pe… veditabba”nti. Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya paṭibhānāparihānāvahattā anantarāyena
tika-s0104t:34_2: parisamāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Aparihānāvahā hi ratanattayapūjā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0104t:35_0: “Sattime bhikkhave, aparihānīyā dhammā, katame satta? Satthugāravatā, dhammagāravatā,
tika-s0104t:35_1: saṅghagāravatā, sikkhāgāravatā, samādhigāravatā, kalyāṇamittatā, sovacassatā”ti tato
tika-s0104t:35_3: veditabba”nti. Atha vā pasādavatthūsu pūjāya puññātisayabhāvato anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ
tika-s0104t:35_4: veditabbaṃ. Puññātisayā hi pasādavatthūsu pūjā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0104t:39: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:43_0: Upāyesu ca paṭipannassa hotveva kāriyaniṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “pasādavatthūsu…pe… veditabba”nti.
tika-s0104t:44_0: Evaṃ pana sapayojanaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmaṃ kattukāmo buddharatanamūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ
tika-s0104t:44_1: paṭhamaṃ tassa paṇāmaṃ kātumāha – “karuṇāsītalahadayaṃ…pe… gativimutta”nti. Buddharatanamūlakāni
tika-s0104t:44_2: hi dhammasaṅgharatanāni, tesu ca dhammaratanamūlakaṃ saṅgharatanaṃ, tathābhāvo ca
tika-s0104t:44_3: “puṇṇacando viya bhagavā, candakiraṇanikaro viya tena desito dhammo, candakiraṇasamuppāditapīṇito
tika-s0104t:44_4: loko viya saṅgho”ti evamādīhi aṭṭhakathāyamāgataupamāhi vibhāvetabbo. Atha vā sabbasattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:44_5: aggoti katvā paṭhamaṃ buddho, tappabhavato, tadupadesitato ca tadanantaraṃ dhammo,
tika-s0104t:44_6: tassa dhammassa sādhāraṇato, tadāsevanato ca tadanantaraṃ saṅgho vutto. “Sabbasattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:44_7: vā hite viniyojakoti katvā paṭhamaṃ buddho, sabbasattahitattā tadanantaraṃ dhammo,
tika-s0104t:44_8: hitādhigamāya paṭipanno adhigatahito cāti katvā tadanantaraṃ saṅgho vutto”ti aṭṭhakathāgatanayena
tika-s0104t:45_1: thomanāpubbaṅgamataṃ dasseti. Thomanāpubbaṅgamena hi paṇāmena satthu guṇātisayayogo,
tika-s0104t:45_2: tato cassa anuttaravandanīyabhāvo, tena ca attano paṇāmassa khettaṅgatabhāvo, tena
tika-s0104t:45_3: cassa khettaṅgatassa paṇāmassa yathādhippetanipphattihetubhāvo dassitoti. Thomanāpubbaṅgamatañca
tika-s0104t:45_4: dassento yassā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, sā suttantadesanā karuṇāpaññāppadhānāyeva,
tika-s0104t:45_5: na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā viya paññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva
tika-s0104t:45_6: thomanamārabhati. Esā hi ācariyassa pakati, yadidaṃ ārambhānurūpathomanā. Teneva
tika-s0104t:45_7: ca vinayadesanāya saṃvaṇṇanārambhe “yo kappakoṭīhipi…pe… mahākāruṇikassa tassā”ti
tika-s0104t:45_10: pākatikasattenāpi asotabbārahaṃ suṇanto, apucchitabbārahaṃ pucchanto, avattabbārahañca
tika-s0104t:45_11: vadanto sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesīti karuṇāppadhānā. Tathā hi ukkaṃsapariyantagatahirottappopi
tika-s0104t:45_14: taṃtaṃsikkhāpadapaññatti kāraṇāpekkhāya ca verañjādīsu sārīrikaṃ khedamanubhosi.
tika-s0104t:45_15: Tasmā kiñcāpi bhūmantarapaccayākārasamayantarakathānaṃ viya vinayapaññattiyāpi samuṭṭhāpikā
tika-s0104t:45_16: paññā anaññasādhāraṇatāya atisayakiccavatī, karuṇāya kiccaṃ pana tatopi adhikanti
tika-s0104t:45_17: vinayadesanāya karuṇāppadhānatā vuttā. Karuṇābyāpārādhikatāya hi desanāya karuṇāpadhānatā,
tika-s0104t:45_19: paññāya tattha sātisayappavattito. Suttantadesanā pana karuṇāpaññāppadhānā tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:45_21: ca mahākaruṇāya tattha sātisayappavattito. Suttantadesanāya hi mahākaruṇāya samāpattibahulo
tika-s0104t:45_22: vineyyasantāne tadajjhāsayānulomena gambhīramatthapadaṃ patiṭṭhapesi. Tasmā ārambhānurūpaṃ
tika-s0104t:45_23: karuṇāpaññāppadhānameva thomanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ, ayamettha samudāyattho.
tika-s0104t:46_0: Ayaṃ pana avayavattho – kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati paccayavekallakaraṇena
tika-s0104t:46_1: apanetīti attho. Dukkhitesu vā kiriyati pasāriyatīti karuṇā. Atha vā kiṇātīti karuṇā,
tika-s0104t:46_2: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhati, paradukkhaṃ vā vināsetīti attho. Paradukkhe
tika-s0104t:46_3: sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0104t:46_4: rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya
tika-s0104t:46_5: kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibandhatīti, sabbattha saddasatthānusārena padanipphatti
tika-s0104t:46_6: veditabbā. Uṇhābhitattehi sevīyatīti sītaṃ, uṇhābhisamanaṃ. Taṃ lāti gaṇhātīti sītalaṃ,
tika-s0104t:46_7: “cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmī”ti ettha uro “hadaya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:46_8: “vakkaṃ hadaya”nti ettha hadayavatthu, “hadayā hadayaṃ maññe aññāya tacchatī”ti ettha
tika-s0104t:46_9: cittaṃ, idhāpi cittameva abbhantaraṭṭhena hadayaṃ. Attano sabhāvaṃ vā haratīti hadayaṃ,
tika-s0104t:46_10: ra-kārassa da-kāraṃ katvāti neruttikā. Karuṇāya sītalaṃ hadayamassāti karuṇāsītalahadayo,
tika-s0104t:47_3: avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇāva visesena bhagavato cittassa cittapassaddhi viya sītibhāvanimittanti
tika-s0104t:47_4: tassāyeva cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttā. Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā
tika-s0104t:47_5: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi sabbattha niravasesattho upadisīyati, padhānasahacaraṇāvinābhāvādinayehipi
tika-s0104t:47_9: hadayasītalattahetubhāvena vuttā. Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ paresaṃ hitopasaṃhārasukhādiaparihānijjhānasabhāvatāya
tika-s0104t:47_11: kāraṇanti karuṇāya eva hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttā. Karuṇānidānā hi sabbepi buddhaguṇā.
tika-s0104t:47_15: na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti. Tīsu cettha vikappesu paṭhame vikappe
tika-s0104t:47_16: avisesabhūtā buddhabhūmigatā, dutiye tatheva mahākaruṇābhāvūpagatā, tatiye paṭhamābhinīhārato
tika-s0104t:47_17: paṭṭhāya tīsupi avatthāsu pavattā bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:48_0: Pajānātīti paññā, yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Paññapetīti vā paññā,
tika-s0104t:48_1: taṃ tadatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karotīti attho. Sāyeva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena
tika-s0104t:48_2: pajjototi paññāpajjoto. Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkenapi nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu
tika-s0104t:48_3: ekapajjotā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “cattārome bhikkhave, pajjotā. Katame cattāro?
tika-s0104t:48_4: Candapajjoto, sūriyapajjoto, aggipajjoto, paññāpajjoto, ime kho bhikkhave, cattāro
tika-s0104t:48_5: pajjotā. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave, imesaṃ catunnaṃ pajjotānaṃ yadidaṃ paññāpajjoto”ti.
tika-s0104t:48_6: Tena vihato visesena samugghāṭitoti paññāpajjotavihato, visesatā cettha upari āvi
tika-s0104t:48_7: bhavissati. Muyhanti tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho, avijjā.
tika-s0104t:48_8: Sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanato andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti mohatamo. Satipi
tika-s0104t:48_10: yuttāti sadisakappanā. Paññāpajjotavihato mohatamo yassāti paññāpajjotavihatamohatamo,
tika-s0104t:49_0: Nanu ca sabbesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ paññāpajjotena avijjandhakārahatatā sambhavati, atha
tika-s0104t:49_1: kasmā aññasādhāraṇāvisesaguṇena bhagavato thomanā vuttāti? Savāsanappahānena anaññasādhāraṇavisesatāsambhavato.
tika-s0104t:49_2: Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ paññāpajjotahatāvijjandhakārattepi sati saddhādhimuttehi
tika-s0104t:49_3: viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakapaccekabuddhehi sammāsambuddhānaṃ savāsanappahānena kilesappahānassa
tika-s0104t:49_4: viseso vijjatevāti. Atha vā paropadesamantarena attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa
tika-s0104t:49_5: nipphāditattā (nibbattitattā ma. ni. ṭī. 1.1), tattha ca sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa
tika-s0104t:49_6: samadhigatattā, parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena sammadeva tassa pavattitattā,
tika-s0104t:49_7: bhagavāyeva visesato paññāpajjotavihatamohatamabhāvena thometabboti. Imasmiñca atthavikappe
tika-s0104t:49_9: desanāpaññā ca sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā saṅgahitā. Na tu purimasmiṃ atthavikappe
tika-s0104t:50_3: thomanā veditabbā. Imasmiṃ pana atthavikappe mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:50_5: savāsanappahānameva hi kilesānaṃ ñeyyāvaraṇappahānanti, parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa
tika-s0104t:50_6: kāraṇabhāvato phalūpacārena anāvaraṇañāṇameva mohatamavidhamananti vuccati. Anāvaraṇañāṇanti
tika-s0104t:50_7: ca sabbaññutaññāṇameva, yena dhammadesanāpaccavekkhaṇāni karoti. Tadidañhi ñāṇadvayaṃ
tika-s0104t:50_10: pana aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvidhā katvā chaḷāsādhāraṇañāṇabhede vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:51_0: Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanāya
tika-s0104t:51_1: gayhati, na pana sātisayaṃ niravasesakilesappahānanti? Vuccate – tappahānavacaneneva
tika-s0104t:51_3: gayhati. Na hi so saṃkileso atthi, yo niravasesāvijjāsamugghātanena na pahīyatīti.
tika-s0104t:51_4: Atha vā sakalakusaladhammuppattiyā, saṃsāranivattiyā ca vijjā viya niravasesākusaladhammuppattiyā,
tika-s0104t:51_5: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjāyeva padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacaneneva sakalasaṃkilesasamugghātavacanasiddhito
tika-s0104t:51_6: soyeveko gayhatīti. Atha vā sakalasaṃkilesadhammānaṃ muddhabhūtattā avijjāya taṃ
tika-s0104t:54_0: Sanarāmaralokagarunti ettha pana paṭhamapakatiyā avibhāgena sattopi naroti vuccati,
tika-s0104t:54_1: idha pana dutiyapakatiyā manujapurisoyeva, itarathā lokasaddassa avattabbatā siyā.
tika-s0104t:54_2: “Yathā hi paṭhamapakatibhūto satto itarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena pure uccaṭṭhāne
tika-s0104t:54_3: seti pavattatīti purisoti vuccati, evaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ netīti naroti. Puttabhātubhūtopi
tika-s0104t:54_4: hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ pituṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, pageva bhattubhūto itarāsa”nti
tika-s0104t:54_5: nāvāvimānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ekasesappakappanena puthuvacanantaviggahena vā narā,
tika-s0104t:54_6: maraṇaṃ maro, so natthi yesanti amarā, saha narehi, amarehi cāti sanarāmaro.Garati
tika-s0104t:54_7: uggacchati uggato pākaṭo bhavatīti garu, garasaddo hi uggame. Apica pāsāṇacchattaṃ
tika-s0104t:58_0: Idha pana sabbalokācariye tathāgate. Keci pana “garu, gurūti ca dvidhā gahetvā bhāriyavācakatte
tika-s0104t:58_1: garusaddo, ācariyavācakatte tu gurusaddo”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Pāḷivisaye
tika-s0104t:58_2: hi sabbesampi yathāvuttānamatthānaṃ vācakatte garusaddoyevicchitabbo akārassa ākārabhāvena
tika-s0104t:58_3: “gārava”nti taddhitantapadassa savuddhikassa dassanato. Sakkatabhāsāvisaye pana gurusaddoyevicchitabbo
tika-s0104t:58_4: ukārassa vuddhibhāvena aññathā taddhitantapadassa dassanatoti. Sanarāmaro ca so loko
tika-s0104t:58_5: cāti sanarāmaraloko, tassa garūti tathā, taṃ sanarāmaralokagaruṃ. “Sanaramarūlokagaru”ntipi
tika-s0104t:58_6: paṭhanti, tadapi ariyāgāthattā vuttilakkhaṇato, atthato ca yuttameva. Atthato hi
tika-s0104t:58_7: dīghāyukāpi samānā yathāparicchedaṃ maraṇasabhāvattā marūti devā vuccanti. Etena
tika-s0104t:58_8: devamanussānaṃ viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato
tika-s0104t:58_9: upakārakataṃ dasseti. Nanu cettha devamanussā padhānabhūtā, atha kasmā tesaṃ appadhānatā
tika-s0104t:58_10: niddisīyatīti? Atthato padhānatāya gahetabbattā. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamoti
tika-s0104t:58_11: saddakkamānusārena padhānāpadhānabhāvo na codetabbo. Edisesu hi samāsapadesu padhānampi
tika-s0104t:58_12: appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā taṃ “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti, tasmā sabbattha atthatova
tika-s0104t:58_13: adhippāyo gavesitabbo, na byañjanamattena. Yathāhu porāṇā –
tika-s0104t:63_0: Kāmañcettha sattasaṅkhārabhājanavasena tividho loko, garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā
tika-s0104t:63_1: garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokavasena attho gahetabbo. So hi lokīyanti
tika-s0104t:63_2: ettha puññāpuññāni, tabbipāko cāti loko, dassanatthe ca lokasaddamicchanti saddavidū.
tika-s0104t:63_3: Amaraggahaṇena cettha upapattidevā adhippetā. Aparo nayo – samūhattho ettha lokasaddo
tika-s0104t:63_4: samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti katvā. Saha narehīti sanarā, teyeva amarāti
tika-s0104t:63_5: sanarāmarā, tesaṃ loko tathā, purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Amarasaddena cettha upapattidevā
tika-s0104t:63_6: viya visuddhidevāpi saṅgayhanti. Tepi hi paramatthato maraṇābhāvato amarā. Imasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:63_7: pana atthavikappe narāmarānameva gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
tika-s0104t:63_10: ca sabbasattuttamo bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamamanaññasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:63_11: gāravaṭṭhānanti. Kāmañca itthīnampi tathāupakārattā bhagavā garuyeva, padhānabhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:63_12: pana lokaṃ dassetuṃ purisaliṅgena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Neruttikā pana avisesanicchitaṭṭhāne
tika-s0104t:63_13: tathā niddiṭṭhamicchanti yathā “narā nāgā ca gandhabbā, abhivādetvāna pakkamu”nti. Tathā cāhu –
tika-s0104t:69_0: Idha pana vattamānāyaṃ aññāsamasambhavato. Tattha ca uttamapurisavasenattho gahetabbo
tika-s0104t:69_1: “ahaṃ vandāmī”ti. Namanathutiyatthesu ca vandasaddamicchanti ācariyā, tena ca sugatapadaṃ,
tika-s0104t:69_2: nāthapadaṃ vā ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ. Sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato. Gamanañcettha
tika-s0104t:69_4: dubbidhaṃ. Bhagavato hi vineyyajanopasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato
tika-s0104t:69_7: ñāṇagamanaṃ abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhi, tāva niravajjatāya sobhanamevāti.
tika-s0104t:69_8: Atha vā “sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā
tika-s0104t:69_9: gato avagatoti sugato. Yo hi gatyattho, so buddhayattho. Yo ca buddhayattho, so gatyatthoti.
tika-s0104t:69_10: Tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammatamāpādento sammā
tika-s0104t:69_11: gato atītoti sugato. Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti
tika-s0104t:69_12: sugato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti
tika-s0104t:69_13: sugato, ayañcattho ‘sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti
tika-s0104t:70_0: Aparo nayo – sundaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ, nibbānameva vā gato adhigatoti sugato. Bhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:70_1: tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva vācaṃ vineyyānaṃ sammā gadatīti vā
tika-s0104t:70_2: sugato, da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā, taṃ sugataṃ. Puññāpuññakammehi upapajjanavasena
tika-s0104t:70_3: gantabbāti gatiyo, upapattibhavavisesā. Tā pana nirayādibhedena pañcavidhā, sakalassāpi
tika-s0104t:70_5: tāhi visaṃyutto hutvā muttoti gativimutto. Uddhamuddhabhavagāmino hi devā taṃtaṃkammavipākadānakālānurūpena
tika-s0104t:70_6: tato tato bhavato muttāpi muttamattāva, na pana visaññogavasena muttā, gatipariyāpannā
tika-s0104t:70_7: ca taṃtaṃbhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggena anivattitattā, na tathā bhagavā. Bhagavā
tika-s0104t:70_8: pana yathāvuttappakārena visaṃyutto hutvā muttoti. Tasmā anena bhagavato katthacipi
tika-s0104t:70_9: gatiyā apariyāpannataṃ dasseti. Yato ca bhagavā “devātidevo”ti vuccati. Tenevāha –
tika-s0104t:73: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:74_2: parimuttoti. Atha vā kāmaṃ saupādisesāyapi nibbānadhātuyā tāhi gatīhi vimutto, esā
tika-s0104t:75_0: Ettha pana attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena dvīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā
tika-s0104t:75_1: katā hoti. Tesu anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamo, saha vāsanāya kilesānamaccantappahānaṃ, anupādisesanibbānappatti
tika-s0104t:75_2: ca attahitasampatti nāma, lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa pana sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanāpayogato
tika-s0104t:75_3: devadattādīsupi viruddhasattesu niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā, vinītabbasattānaṃ ñāṇaparipākakālāgamanañca
tika-s0104t:75_4: āsayato parahitapaṭipatti nāma. Sā pana āsayapayogato duvidhā, parahitapaṭipatti
tika-s0104t:75_5: tividhā ca attahitasampatti imāya gāthāya yathārahaṃ pakāsitā hoti. “Karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti
tika-s0104t:75_6: hi etena āsayato parahitapaṭipatti, sammā gadanatthena sugatasaddena payogato parahitapaṭipatti.
tika-s0104t:75_8: tividhāpi attahitasampatti, avasiṭṭhaṭṭhena pana tena, “sanarāmaralokagaru”nti ca
tika-s0104t:75_9: etena sabbāpi attahitasampatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca pakāsitā hoti.
tika-s0104t:76_0: Atha vā hetuphalasattūpakāravasena tīhākārehi thomanā katā. Tattha hetu nāma mahākaruṇāsamāyogo,
tika-s0104t:76_2: ca pakāsitaṃ. Phalaṃ pana ñāṇappahānaānubhāvarūpakāyasampadāvasena catubbidhaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0104t:76_3: sabbaññutañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ, tammūlakāni ca dasabalādiñāṇāni ñāṇasampadā,
tika-s0104t:76_6: attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā. Tāsu ñāṇappahānasampadā dutiyapadena, saccapaṭivedhatthena
tika-s0104t:76_7: ca sugatasaddena pakāsitā, ānubhāvasampadā tatiyapadena, rūpakāyasampadā sobhanakāyagamanatthena
tika-s0104t:76_8: sugatasaddena lakkhaṇānubyañjanapāripūriyā vinā tadabhāvato. Yathāvuttā duvidhāpi
tika-s0104t:76_9: parahitapaṭipatti sattūpakārasampadā, sā pana sammā gadanatthena sugatasaddena pakāsitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:77_0: Apica imāya gāthāya sammāsambodhi tammūla – tappaṭipattiyādayo aneke buddhaguṇā ācariyena
tika-s0104t:77_1: pakāsitā honti. Esā hi ācariyānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ yena kenaci pakārena atthantaraviññāpanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:77_2: Kathaṃ? “Karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti hi etena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti. Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso
tika-s0104t:77_3: hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena pāramiyo
tika-s0104t:77_4: pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhimadhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ. “Paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti
tika-s0104t:77_5: etena sammāsambodhiṃ dasseti. Sabbaññutañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi aggamaggañāṇaṃ, aggamaggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca
tika-s0104t:77_6: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ “sammāsambodhī”ti vuccati. Sammā gamanatthena sugatasaddena sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0104t:77_8: karuṇāpaññāpariggahitāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā pakāsanato, itarehi sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0104t:77_10: padhānaṃ, tadaññamappadhānaṃ. Tesu ca padhānena payojanena parahitapaṭipattiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0104t:77_11: itarena attahitasampattiṃ, tadubhayena ca attahitapaṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu
tika-s0104t:77_12: bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ pakāseti. Tena ca anuttaraṃ dakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ, uttamañca
tika-s0104t:77_13: vandanīyabhāvaṃ, attano ca vandanāya khettaṅgatabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0104t:78_3: ca nirupakkilesamupagamanaṃ dasseti, paññāggahaṇena apagamanaṃ. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:78_4: lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā karuṇāya, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:78_5: lokasamaññāya anatidhāvanaṃ. Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ atidhāvitvā
tika-s0104t:78_6: sattādiparāmasanaṃ hoti. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena mahākaruṇāsamāpattivihāraṃ dasseti,
tika-s0104t:78_7: paññāggahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ, catusaccañāṇaṃ, catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:78_9: cha abhiññā, aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni, dasa balāni, cuddasa buddhaguṇā, soḷasa
tika-s0104t:78_10: ñāṇacariyā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, catucattārīsa ñāṇavatthūni, sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnīti
tika-s0104t:78_11: evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:78_12: caraṇasampattiṃ, paññāggahaṇena vijjāsampattiṃ. Karuṇāggahaṇena attādhipatitā, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:78_13: dhammādhipatitā. Karuṇāggahaṇena lokanāthabhāvo, paññāggahaṇena attanāthabhāvo. Tathā
tika-s0104t:78_14: karuṇāggahaṇena pubbakārībhāvo, paññāggahaṇena kataññutā. Karuṇāggahaṇena aparantapatā,
tika-s0104t:78_15: paññāggahaṇena anattantapatā. Karuṇāggahaṇena vā buddhakaradhammasiddhi, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:78_16: buddhabhāvasiddhi. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena parasantāraṇaṃ, paññāggahaṇena attasantāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:78_17: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena sabbasattesu anuggahacittatā, paññāggahaṇena sabbadhammesu
tika-s0104t:78_18: virattacittatā dassitā hoti sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi tannidānabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:78_19: paññā pariyosānaṃ tato uttari karaṇīyābhāvato. Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā
tika-s0104t:78_20: dassitā honti. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito
tika-s0104t:78_21: hoti. Karuṇānidānañhi sīlaṃ tato pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito, sā ca jhānattayasampayoginīti,
tika-s0104t:78_22: paññāvacanena paññākkhandho. Sīlañca sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhe, paññā
tika-s0104t:78_23: pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato
tika-s0104t:78_24: dassitattā. Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo, yadidaṃ nayaggāhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:78_25: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ. Tenevāha –
tika-s0104t:83_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenāpi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati bhagavatā anuyuttena
tika-s0104t:83_1: “no hetaṃ bhante”ti paṭikkhipitvā “api ca me bhante dhammanvayo vidito”ti sampasādanīyasutte vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:84_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavato thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni
tika-s0104t:84_3: yaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ, saha pubbabhāgapaṭipattidhammena vā ariyamaggabhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:84_4: dhammaṃ bhāvetvā ceva yaṃ phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ, pariyattidhammapaṭipattidhammehi
tika-s0104t:84_5: vā saha phalanibbānabhūtaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikatvā ca sammāsambodhisaṅkhātaṃ buddhabhāvamupagato,
tika-s0104t:85_0: Tattha buddhasaddassa tāva “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho. Bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:85_1: niddesanayena attho veditabbo. Atha vā aggamaggañāṇādhigamena savāsanāya sammohaniddāya
tika-s0104t:85_3: ca buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena. Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa
tika-s0104t:85_5: avagamanatthavasena kattuniddesova labbhati, tasmā buddhavāti buddhotipi vattabbo.
tika-s0104t:85_6: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
tika-s0104t:85_7: Evañca katvā kammavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā, atthato
tika-s0104t:86: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto, balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
tika-s0104t:87_0: Apisaddo sambhāvane, tena evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā īdisaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā,
tika-s0104t:87_1: sacchikatvā ca buddhabhāvamupagato, kā nāma kathā aññesaṃ sāvakādibhāvamupagamaneti
tika-s0104t:87_2: dhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti. Buddhabhāvanti sammāsambodhiṃ. Yena hi nimittabhūtena
tika-s0104t:87_4: bhagavati “buddho”ti nāmaṃ, tadārammaṇañca ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tamevidha “bhāvo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:87_5: Bhavanti buddhisaddā etenāti hi bhāvo. Tathā hi vadanti –
tika-s0104t:88: “Yena yena nimittena, buddhi saddo ca vattate;
tika-s0104t:90_0: Bhāvetvāti uppādetvā, vaḍḍhetvā vā. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Ceva-saddo ca-saddo
tika-s0104t:90_1: ca tadubhayattha samuccaye. Tena hi saddadvayena na kevalaṃ bhagavā dhammassa bhāvanāmattena
tika-s0104t:90_2: buddhabhāvamupagato, nāpi sacchikiriyāmattena, atha kho tadubhayenevāti samuccinoti.
tika-s0104t:90_3: Upagatoti patto, adhigatoti attho. Etassa “buddhabhāva”nti padena sambandho. Vītamalanti
tika-s0104t:90_4: ettha virahavasena eti pavattatīti vīto, malato vīto, vītaṃ vā malaṃ yassāti vītamalo,
tika-s0104t:90_5: taṃ vītamalaṃ. “Gatamala”ntipi pāṭho dissati, evaṃ sati saupasaggo viya anupasaggopi
tika-s0104t:90_6: gatasaddo virahatthavācako veditabbo dhātūnamanekatthattā. Gacchati apagacchatīti
tika-s0104t:90_7: hi gato, dhammo. Gataṃ vā malaṃ, purimanayena samāso. Anuttaranti uttaravirahitaṃ.
tika-s0104t:90_8: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyato, saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-s0104t:90_9: navavidho lokuttaradhammo. Tappakāsanattā, sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyassa ca labbhamānattā
tika-s0104t:90_10: pariyattidhammopi idha saṅgahito. Tathā hi “abhidhammanayasamuddaṃ adhigacchi, tīṇi
tika-s0104t:90_11: piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā sacchikatvā”ti
tika-s0104t:90_12: ca vuttattā bhāvanāsacchikiriyāyogyatāya buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi pāramitāhi saha
tika-s0104t:90_13: pubbabhāgaadhisīlasikkhādayopi idha saṅgahitāti veditabbā. Tāpi hi vigatapaṭipakkhatāya
tika-s0104t:90_14: vītamalā, anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttarā ca. Kathaṃ pana tā bhāvetvā, sacchikatvā ca
tika-s0104t:90_18: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesaṃ bhāvanāsacchikiriyāhi kammādīsu
tika-s0104t:90_20: bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pesetvā anuttaraṃ
tika-s0104t:91_0: Imāya pana gāthāya vijjāvimuttisampadādīhi anekehi guṇehi yathārahaṃ saddhammaṃ thometi.
tika-s0104t:91_1: Kathaṃ? Ettha hi “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena
tika-s0104t:91_2: vimuttisampadāya. Tathā paṭhamena jhānasampadāya, dutiyena vimokkhasampadāya. Paṭhamena
tika-s0104t:91_3: vā samādhisampadāya, dutiyena samāpattisampadāya. Atha vā paṭhamena khayañāṇabhāvena,
tika-s0104t:91_4: dutiyena anuppādañāṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā vijjūpamatāya, dutiyena vajirūpamatāya.
tika-s0104t:91_5: Paṭhamena vā virāgasampattiyā, dutiyena nirodhasampattiyā. Tathā paṭhamena niyyānabhāvena,
tika-s0104t:91_6: dutiyena nissaraṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā hetubhāvena, dutiyena asaṅkhatabhāvena. Paṭhamena
tika-s0104t:91_7: vā dassanabhāvena, dutiyena vivekabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā adhipatibhāvena, dutiyena
tika-s0104t:91_8: amatabhāvena dhammaṃ thometi. Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti
tika-s0104t:91_9: etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena sandiṭṭhikatāya. Tathā
tika-s0104t:91_10: paṭhamena akālikatāya, dutiyena ehipassikatāya. Paṭhamena vā opaneyyikatāya, dutiyena
tika-s0104t:91_11: paccattaṃveditabbatāya. Paṭhamena vā saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhehi sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhehi,
tika-s0104t:91_12: dutiyena saha asaṅkhatadhātuyā asekkhehi dhammaṃ thometi.
tika-s0104t:92_0: “Vītamala”nti iminā pana saṃkilesābhāvadīpanena visuddhatāya dhammaṃ thometi, “anuttara”nti
tika-s0104t:92_1: etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena paripuṇṇatāya. Paṭhamena vā pahānasampadāya,
tika-s0104t:92_2: dutiyena sabhāvasampadāya. Paṭhamena vā bhāvanāphalayogyatāya. Bhāvanāguṇena hi so
tika-s0104t:92_3: saṃkilesamalasamugghātako, tasmānena bhāvanākiriyāya phalamāha. Dutiyena sacchikiriyāphalayogyatāya.
tika-s0104t:93_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbasaddhammaguṇehi saddhammassāpi thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ
tika-s0104t:93_1: katvā idāni ariyasaṅghassāpi thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ karonto “sugatassa orasāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:93_2: Tattha sugatassāti sambandhaniddeso, “puttāna”nti etena sambajjhitabbo. Urasi bhavā,
tika-s0104t:93_3: jātā, saṃvuddhā vā orasā, attajo khettajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidhesu puttesu
tika-s0104t:93_4: attajā, taṃsarikkhatāya pana ariyapuggalā “orasā”ti vuccanti. Yathā hi manussānaṃ
tika-s0104t:93_5: orasaputtā attajātatāya pitusantakassa dāyajjassa visesabhāgino honti, evametepi
tika-s0104t:93_6: saddhammasavanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa dhammaratanassa
tika-s0104t:93_7: ca dāyajjassa visesabhāginoti. Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṃ
tika-s0104t:93_8: okkamamānā, okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato ure vāyāmajanitābhijātatāya sadisakappanamantarena
tika-s0104t:93_9: nippariyāyeneva “orasā”ti vattabbatamarahanti. Tathā hi te bhagavatā āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādiolokanena,
tika-s0104t:93_10: vajjānucintanena ca hadaye katvā vajjato nivāretvā anavajje patiṭṭhāpentena sīlādidhammasarīraposanena
tika-s0104t:93_11: saṃvaḍḍhāpitā. Yathāha bhagavā itivuttake “ahamasmi bhikkhave brāhmaṇo…pe… tassa
tika-s0104t:93_12: me tumhe puttā orasā mukhato jātā”tiādi. Nanu sāvakadesitāpi desanā ariyabhāvāvahāti?
tika-s0104t:93_13: Saccaṃ, sā pana tammūlikattā, lakkhaṇādivisesābhāvato ca “bhagavato dhammadesanā”
tika-s0104t:93_14: icceva saṅkhyaṃ gatā, tasmā bhagavato orasaputtabhāvoyeva tesaṃ vattabboti, etena
tika-s0104t:93_15: catubbidhesu puttesu ariyasaṅghassa attajaputtabhāvaṃ dasseti. Attano kulaṃ punenti
tika-s0104t:93_16: sodhenti, mātāpitūnaṃ vā hadayaṃ pūrentīti puttā, attajādayo. Ariyā pana dhammatantivisodhanena,
tika-s0104t:93_17: dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā cittārādhanena ca tappaṭibhāgatāya bhagavato puttā nāma,
tika-s0104t:94_0: Saṃkilesanimittaṃ hutvā guṇaṃ māreti vibādhatīti māro, devaputtamāro. Sināti pare
tika-s0104t:94_1: bandhati etāyāti senā, mārassa senā tathā, mārañca mārasenañca mathenti vilothentīti
tika-s0104t:94_3: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Mārasaddasannidhānena vā senāsaddena mārasenā gahetabbā, gāthābandhavasena
tika-s0104t:94_4: cettha rasso. “Mārasenamaddanāna”ntipi katthaci pāṭho, so ayuttova ariyājātikattā
tika-s0104t:94_5: imissā gāthāya. Nanu ca ariyasāvakānaṃ maggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāyakaraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:94_6: devaputtamāro vā mārasenā vā na apasādeti, atha kasmā evaṃ vuttanti? Apasādetabbabhāvakāraṇassa
tika-s0104t:94_7: vimathitattā. Tesañhi apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe saṃkilese vimathite tepi vimathitā
tika-s0104t:94_8: nāma hontīti. Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassāpi guṇamāraṇe
tika-s0104t:94_9: sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo idha “mārasenā”ti vuccati yathāha bhagavā –
tika-s0104t:95: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
tika-s0104t:96: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
tika-s0104t:97: Pañcamaṃ thinamiddhaṃ te, chaṭṭhā bhīrū pavuccati;
tika-s0104t:98: Sattamī vicikicchā te, makkho thambho te aṭṭhamo.
tika-s0104t:104: Na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukha”nti. ;
tika-s0104t:105_0: Sā ca tehi ariyasāvakehi diyaḍḍhasahassabhedā, anantabhedā vā kilesavāhinī satidhammavicayavīriyasamathādiguṇapaharaṇīhi
tika-s0104t:105_1: odhiso mathitā, viddhaṃsitā, vihatā ca, tasmā “mārasenamathanā”ti vuccanti. Vilothanañcettha
tika-s0104t:105_2: viddhaṃsanaṃ, vihananaṃ vā. Apica khandhābhisaṅkhāramaccudevaputtamārānaṃ tesaṃ sahāyabhāvūpagamanatāya
tika-s0104t:105_3: senāsaṅkhātassa kilesamārassa ca mathanato “mārasenamathanā”tipi attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0104t:105_4: Evañca sati pañcamāranimmathanabhāvena attho paripuṇṇo hoti. Ariyasāvakāpi hi samudayappahānapariññāvasena
tika-s0104t:105_5: khandhamāraṃ, sahāyavekallakaraṇena sabbathā, appavattikaraṇena ca abhisaṅkhāramāraṃ,
tika-s0104t:105_7: sabbaso appavattikaraṇena kilesamāraṃ mathentīti, iminā pana tesaṃ orasaputtabhāve
tika-s0104t:105_8: kāraṇaṃ, tīsu puttesu ca anujātataṃ dasseti. Mārasenamathanatāya hi te bhagavato
tika-s0104t:106_0: Aṭṭhannanti gaṇanaparicchedo, tenasatipi tesaṃ taṃtaṃbhedena anekasatasahassasaṅkhyābhede
tika-s0104t:106_2: dasseti. Pi-saddo, api-saddo vā padalīḷādinā kāraṇena aṭṭhāne payutto, so “ariyasaṅgha”nti
tika-s0104t:106_3: ettha yojetabbo, tena na kevalaṃ buddhadhammeyeva, atha kho ariyasaṅghampīti sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0104t:106_4: Yadipi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci natthi avayavaṃ upādāya samudāyassa vattabbattā,
tika-s0104t:106_6: samūha”nti, etena “ariyasaṅgha”nti ettha na yena kenaci saṇṭhānādinā, kāyasāmaggiyā
tika-s0104t:106_7: vā samudāyabhāvo, api tu maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvenevāti viseseti. Avayavameva sampiṇḍetvā
tika-s0104t:106_8: ūhitabbo vitakketabbo, saṃūhanitabbo vā saṅghaṭitabboti samūho, soyeva samoho vacanasiliṭṭhatādinā.
tika-s0104t:106_9: Dvidhāpi hi pāṭho yujjati. Ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato
tika-s0104t:106_10: ariyā niruttinayena. Atha vā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato upagantabbato,
tika-s0104t:106_11: upagatānañca tadatthasiddhito ariyā, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhato, samaggaṃ vā kammaṃ
tika-s0104t:106_12: samudāyavasena samupagatoti saṅgho, ariyānaṃ saṅgho, ariyo ca so saṅgho ca yathāvuttanayenāti
tika-s0104t:106_13: vā ariyasaṅgho, taṃ ariyasaṅghaṃ. Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo
tika-s0104t:106_14: saṅgharatanādhīnoti ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ idheva “sirasā vande”ti
tika-s0104t:106_15: vuttaṃ. Avassañcāyamattho sampaṭicchitabbo vinayaṭṭhakathādīsupi tathā vuttattā.
tika-s0104t:106_16: Keci pana purimagāthāsupi taṃ padamānetvā yojenti, tadayuttameva ratanattayassa asādhāraṇaguṇappakāsanaṭṭhānattā,
tika-s0104t:107_0: Imāya pana gāthāya ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadā pahānasampadādayo aneke guṇā dassitā
tika-s0104t:107_1: honti. Kathaṃ? “Sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti hi etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ
tika-s0104t:107_4: “Ariyasaṅgha”nti etena sabhāvasampadaṃ sabbasaṅghānaṃ aggabhāvadīpanato. Atha vā
tika-s0104t:107_9: hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā. “Mārasenamathanāna’nti etena abhinīhārasampadāsiddhaṃ
tika-s0104t:107_10: pubbabhāgasammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti. Katābhinīhārā hi sammāpaṭipannā māraṃ, mārasenaṃ
tika-s0104t:107_11: vā abhivijinanti. “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena viddhastavipakkhe sekkhāsekkhadhamme
tika-s0104t:107_14: sāvakānaṃ sabbaguṇassa ādi, sapubbabhāgapaṭipadā sekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo majjhe,
tika-s0104t:108_0: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā
tika-s0104t:108_1: idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ yathādhippetapayojane pariṇāmento “iti me”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0104t:108_2: iti-saddo nidassane. Tena gāthāttayena yathāvuttanayaṃ nidasseti. Meti attānaṃ karaṇavacanena
tika-s0104t:108_3: kattubhāvena niddisati. Tassa “yaṃ puññaṃ mayā laddha”nti pāṭhasesena sambandho,
tika-s0104t:108_4: sampadānaniddeso vā eso, “atthī”ti pāṭhaseso, sāminiddeso vā “yaṃ mama puññaṃ vandanāmaya”nti.
tika-s0104t:108_5: Pasīdīyate pasannā, tādisā mati paññā, cittaṃ vā yassāti pasannamati, aññapadaliṅgappadhānattā
tika-s0104t:108_6: imassa samāsapadassa “pasannamatino”ti vuttaṃ. Ratiṃ nayati, janeti, vahatīti vā
tika-s0104t:108_7: ratanaṃ, sattavidhaṃ, dasavidhaṃ vā ratanaṃ, tamiva imānīti neruttikā. Sadisakappanamaññatra
tika-s0104t:108_8: pana yathāvuttavacanattheneva buddhādīnaṃ ratanabhāvo yujjati. Tesañhi “itipi so
tika-s0104t:108_9: bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjantassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ
tika-s0104t:109_0: “Yasmiṃ mahānāma samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0104t:109_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na moha…pe… ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0104t:109_2: cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha. Ujugatacitto kho pana mahānāma ariyasāvako labhati
tika-s0104t:109_3: atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pamuditassa pīti jāyatī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:113_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā sātisayato buddhādīsuyeva labbhantīti. Vitthāro
tika-s0104t:113_1: ratanasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ gahetabbo. Ayamattho pana nibbacanatthavasena na vutto, atha
tika-s0104t:113_2: kenāti ce? Loke ratanasammatassa vatthuno garukātabbatādiatthavasenāti saddavidū.
tika-s0104t:113_3: Sādhūnañca ramanato, saṃsāraṇṇavā ca taraṇato, sugatinibbānañca nayanato ratanaṃ
tika-s0104t:113_5: vā ratanāni. Tiṇṇaṃ samūho, tīṇi vā samāhaṭāni, tayo vā avayavā assāti tayaṃ, ratanānameva
tika-s0104t:113_6: tayaṃ, nāññesanti ratanattayaṃ. Avayavavinimuttassa pana samudāyassa abhāvato tīṇi
tika-s0104t:113_7: eva ratanāni tathā vuccanti, na samudāyamattaṃ, samudāyāpekkhāya pana ekavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:113_8: kataṃ. Vandīyate vandanā, sāva vandanāmayaṃ yathā “dānamayaṃ sīlamaya”nti. Vandanā
tika-s0104t:113_9: cettha kāyavācācittehi tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā, thomanā vā. Apica tassā cetanāya
tika-s0104t:113_11: vandanāmayaṃ yathā “sovaṇṇamayaṃ rūpiyamaya”nti, atthato pana yathāvuttacetanāva.
tika-s0104t:113_12: Ratanattaye, ratanattayassa vā vandanāmayaṃ ratanattayavandanāmayaṃ. Pujjabhavaphalanibbattanato
tika-s0104t:113_13: puññaṃ niruttinayena, attano kārakaṃ, santānaṃ vā punāti visodhetīti puññaṃ, sakammakattā
tika-s0104t:113_14: dhātussa kāritavasena atthavivaraṇaṃ labbhati, saddanipphatti pana suddhavasenevāti saddavidū.
tika-s0104t:114_0: Taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti
tika-s0104t:114_1: antarāyo, diṭṭhadhammikādianattho. Paṇāmapayojane vuttavidhinā suṭṭhu vihato viddhasto
tika-s0104t:114_3: tesaṃ antarāyānamanuppattikaraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Hutvāti pubbakālakiriyā, tassa “atthaṃ
tika-s0104t:114_4: pakāsayissāmī”ti etena sambandho. Tassāti yaṃ-saddena uddiṭṭhassa vandanāmayapuññassa.
tika-s0104t:117_0: Vuttesu hi atthesu idha sattiyaṃ vattati. Anu punappunaṃ taṃsamaṅgiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti
tika-s0104t:117_1: hi anubhāvo, soyeva ānubhāvoti udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, atthato pana yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
tika-s0104t:117_2: purimakammassa balānuppadānavasasaṅkhātā vandanāmayapuññassa sattiyeva, sā ca suvihatantarāyatāya
tika-s0104t:118_0: Ettha pana “pasannamatino”ti etena attano pasādasampattiṃ dasseti. “Ratanattayavandanāmaya”nti
tika-s0104t:118_1: etena ratanattayassa khettabhāvasampattiṃ, tato ca tassa puññassa attano pasādasampattiyā,
tika-s0104t:118_2: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyāti dvīhi aṅgehi atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ
tika-s0104t:118_3: vihanane samatthataṃ dīpeti. Caturaṅgasampattiyā dānacetanā viya hi dvayaṅgasampattiyā
tika-s0104t:119_0: Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakārakaraṇe payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā dhammadesanāya
tika-s0104t:119_1: atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo, tadapi saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammabhāvena dassetvā guṇābhitthavanavisesena
tika-s0104t:119_2: abhitthavetuṃ “dīghassā”tiādimāha. Ayañhi ācariyassa pakati, yadidaṃ taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu
tika-s0104t:119_3: ādito tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammassa visesaguṇakittanena thomanā. Tathā hi tesu
tika-s0104t:122_0: Thomanā katā. Tattha dīghassāti dīghanāmakassa. Dīghasuttaṅkitassāti dīghehi abhiāyatavacanappabandhavantehi
tika-s0104t:122_1: suttehi lakkhitassa, anena “dīgho”ti ayaṃ imassa āgamassa atthānugatā samaññāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:122_2: Nanu ca suttāniyeva āgamo, kathaṃ so tehi aṅkīyatīti? Saccametaṃ paramatthato, paññattito
tika-s0104t:122_3: pana suttāni upādāya āgamabhāvassa paññattattā avayavehi suttehi avayavībhūto āgamo
tika-s0104t:122_4: aṅkīyati. Yatheva hi atthabyañjanasamudāye “sutta”nti vohāro, evaṃ suttasamudāye
tika-s0104t:122_6: ettha, etena, etasmāti vā āgamo, uttamaṭṭhena, patthanīyaṭṭhena ca so varoti āgamavaro.
tika-s0104t:122_8: varotipi āgamavaro, tassa. Buddhānamanubuddhā buddhānubuddhā, buddhānaṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ
tika-s0104t:122_9: anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā, tehi atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena, guṇasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena
tika-s0104t:122_10: ca saṃvaṇṇitoti tathā. Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca, tehi saṃvaṇṇito yathāvuttanayenāti
tika-s0104t:122_11: tathā, tassa. Sammāsambuddheneva hi tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanākkamo bhāsito,
tika-s0104t:122_12: tato paraṃ saṅgāyanādivasena sāvakehīti ācariyā vadanti. Vuttañca majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0104t:122_13: upālisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ “veyyākaraṇassāti vitthāretvā atthadīpakassa. Bhagavatā hi abyākataṃ
tika-s0104t:122_14: tantipadaṃ nāma natthi, sabbesaṃyeva attho kathito”ti. Saddhāvahaguṇassāti buddhādīsu
tika-s0104t:122_15: pasādāvahaguṇassa. Nanu ca sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ tepiṭakaṃ saddhāvahaguṇameva, atha
tika-s0104t:122_16: kasmā ayamaññasādhāraṇaguṇena thomitoti? Sātisayato imassa tagguṇasampannattā. Ayañhi
tika-s0104t:122_17: āgamo brahmajālādīsu sīladiṭṭhādīnaṃ anavasesaniddesādivasena, mahāpadānādīsu purimabuddhānampi
tika-s0104t:122_19: anuttariyasuttādīsu visesato buddhaguṇavibhāvanena ratanattaye sātisayaṃ saddhaṃ āvahatīti.
tika-s0104t:123_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammassa abhitthavanampi katvā idāni saṃvaṇṇanāya sampati vakkhamānāya
tika-s0104t:123_1: āgamanavisuddhiṃ dassetuṃ “atthappakāsanattha”ntiādimāha. Imāya hi gāthāya saṅgītittayamāruḷhadīghāgamaṭṭhakathātova
tika-s0104t:123_2: sīhaḷabhāsāmattaṃ vinā ayaṃ vakkhamānasaṃvaṇṇanā āgatā, nāññato, tadeva kāraṇaṃ katvā
tika-s0104t:123_3: vattabbā, nāññanti attano saṃvaṇṇanāya āgamanavisuddhiṃ dasseti. Aparo nayo – paramanipuṇagambhīraṃ
tika-s0104t:123_4: buddhavisayamāgamavaraṃ attano baleneva vaṇṇayissāmīti aññehi vattumpi asakkuṇeyyattā
tika-s0104t:123_6: nissāyeva tassa atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāmīti attano saṃvaṇṇanānissayaṃ dasseti. Tattha “atthappakāsanattha”nti
tika-s0104t:123_7: pāṭhattho, sabhāvattho, ñeyyattho, pāṭhānurūpattho, tadanurūpattho, sāvasesattho,
tika-s0104t:123_8: nivarasesattho, nītattho, neyyatthotiādinā anekappakārassa atthassa pakāsanatthāya,
tika-s0104t:123_9: pakāsanāya vā. Gāthābandhasampattiyā dvibhāvo. Attho kathīyati etāyāti atthakathā,
tika-s0104t:123_10: sāyeva aṭṭhakathā ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā yathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho”ti, ayañca
tika-s0104t:123_11: sasaññogavidhi ariyājātibhāvato. Akkharacintakāpi hi “tathānaṃṭṭha yuga”nti lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:126_0: Āditotiādimhi paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ. Chaḷabhiññatāya paramena cittavasībhāvena samannāgatattā,
tika-s0104t:126_1: jhānādīsu pañcavasitā sabbhāvato ca vasino, therā mahākassapādayo, tesaṃ satehi pañcahi.
tika-s0104t:126_2: Yā saṅgītāti yā aṭṭhakathā atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayametassa attho, ayametassa
tika-s0104t:126_3: attho”ti saṅgahetvā vuttā. Anusaṅgītā ca pacchāpīti na kevalaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītiyameva,
tika-s0104t:126_4: atha kho pacchā dutiyatatiyasaṅgītīsupi. Na ca pañcahi vasisatehi ādito saṅgītāyeva,
tika-s0104t:126_5: api tu yasattherādīhi anusaṅgītā cāti saha samuccayena attho veditabbo. Samuccayadvayañhi
tika-s0104t:127_0: Atha porāṇaṭṭhakathāya vijjamānāya kimetāya adhunā puna katāya saṃvaṇṇanāyāti punaruttiyā,
tika-s0104t:127_1: niratthakatāya ca dosaṃ samanussaritvā taṃ pariharanto “sīhaḷadīpa”ntiādimāha. Taṃ
tika-s0104t:127_2: pariharaṇeneva hi imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dasseti. Tattha sīhaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti
tika-s0104t:127_3: sīhaḷo la-kārassa ḷa-kāraṃ katvā yathā “garuḷo”ti. Tasmiṃ vaṃse ādipuriso sīhakumāro,
tika-s0104t:127_4: tabbaṃsajātā pana tambapaṇṇidīpe khattiyā, sabbepi ca janā taddhitavasena, sadisavohārena
tika-s0104t:127_5: vā sīhaḷā, tesaṃ nivāsadīpopi taddhitavasena, ṭhānīnāmena vā “sīhaḷo”ti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:127_6: Jalamajjhe dippati, dvidhā vā āpo ettha sandatīti dipo, soyeva dīpo, bhedāpekkhāya
tika-s0104t:127_7: tesaṃ dīpoti tathā. Panasaddo arucisaṃsūcane, tena kāmañca sā saṅgītittayamāruḷhā,
tika-s0104t:127_8: tathāpi puna evaṃbhūtāti aruciyabhāvaṃ saṃsūceti. Tadatthasambandhatāya pana purimagāthāya
tika-s0104t:127_9: “kāmañca saṅgītā anusaṅgītā cā”ti sānuggahatthayojanā sambhavati. Aññatthāpi hi tathā
tika-s0104t:127_10: dissatīti. Ābhatāti jambudīpato ānītā. Athāti saṅgītikālato pacchā, evaṃ sati ābhatapadena
tika-s0104t:127_11: sambandho. Athāti vā mahāmahindattherenābhatakālato pacchā, evaṃ sati ṭhapitapadena
tika-s0104t:127_12: sambandho. Sā hi dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa
tika-s0104t:127_13: atthasaṃvaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṃ āropitattā tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāyeva, tato
tika-s0104t:127_14: pacchā ca mahāmahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpamābhatā, pacchā pana tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi
tika-s0104t:127_16: pana pacchimasambandhameva duddasattā pakāseti. Tathā “dīpavāsīnamatthāyā”ti idampi
tika-s0104t:127_17: “ṭhapitā”ti ca “apanetvā āropento”ti ca etehi padehi sambajjhitabbaṃ. Ekapadampi
tika-s0104t:127_18: hi āvuttiyādinayehi anekatthasambandhamupagacchati. Purimasambandhena cettha sīhaḷadīpavāsīnamatthāya
tika-s0104t:127_20: ṭhapanapayojanaṃ dasseti. Pacchimasambandhena pana imāya saṃvaṇṇanāya jambudīpavāsīnaṃ,
tika-s0104t:127_22: ca payojananti. Mahāissariyattā mahindoti rājakumārakāle nāmaṃ, pacchā pana guṇamahantatāya
tika-s0104t:127_23: mahāmahindoti vuccati. Sīhaḷabhāsā nāma anekakkharehi ekatthassāpi voharaṇato paresaṃ
tika-s0104t:127_24: voharituṃ atidukkarā kañcukasadisā sīhaḷānaṃ samudāciṇṇā bhāsā.
tika-s0104t:128_0: Evaṃ hotu porāṇaṭṭhakathāya, adhunā kariyamānā pana aṭṭhakathā kathaṃ karīyatīti
tika-s0104t:128_1: anuyoge sati imissā aṭṭhakathāya karaṇappakāraṃ dassetumāha “apanetvānā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-s0104t:128_2: tato mūlaṭṭhakathāto sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā potthake anāropitabhāvena niraṅkaritvāti
tika-s0104t:128_3: sambandho, etena ayaṃ vakkhamānā aṭṭhakathā saṅgītittayamāropitāya mūlaṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0104t:128_4: sīhaḷabhāsāpanayanamattamaññatra atthato saṃsandati ceva sameti ca yathā “gaṅgodakena
tika-s0104t:128_6: visesanāni. Sabhāvaniruttibhāvena hi paṇḍitānaṃ manaṃ ramayatīti manoramā. Tanoti
tika-s0104t:128_7: atthametāya, tanīyati vā atthavasena vivarīyati, vaṭṭato vā satte tāreti, nānātthavisayaṃ
tika-s0104t:128_8: vā kaṅkhaṃ taranti etāyāti tanti, pāḷi. Tassā nayasaṅkhātāya gatiyā chaviṃ chāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:131: Vuttaṃ pāḷigatibhāsaṃ potthake likhanavasena āropentoti attho, iminā saddadosābhāvamāha.
tika-s0104t:132_0: Samayaṃ avilomentoti siddhantamavirodhento, iminā pana atthadosābhāvamāha. Aviruddhattā
tika-s0104t:132_1: eva hi te theravādāpi idha pakāsayissanti. Kesaṃ pana samayanti āha “therāna”ntiādi,
tika-s0104t:132_2: etena rāhulācariyādīnaṃ jetavanavāsīabhayagirivāsīnikāyānaṃ samayaṃ nivatteti. Thirehi
tika-s0104t:132_3: sīlasutajhānavimuttisaṅkhātehi guṇehi samannāgatāti therā. Yathāha “cattārome bhikkhave
tika-s0104t:132_4: therakaraṇā dhammā. Katame cattāro? Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlavā hotī”tiādi. Apica
tika-s0104t:132_5: saccadhammādīhi thirakaraṇehi samannāgatattā therā. Yathāha dhammarājā dhammapade –
tika-s0104t:133: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
tika-s0104t:135_0: Tesaṃ. Mahākassapattherādīhi āgatā ācariyaparamparā theravaṃso, tappariyāpannā hutvā
tika-s0104t:135_1: āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato taṃ pakārena dīpenti,
tika-s0104t:135_2: tasmiṃ vā padīpasadisāti theravaṃsapadipā. Vividhena ākārena nicchīyatīti vinicchayo,
tika-s0104t:135_3: gaṇṭhiṭṭhānesu khīlamaddanākārena pavattā vimaticchedanīkathā, suṭṭhu nipuṇo saṇho
tika-s0104t:135_4: vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā. Atha vā vinicchinotīti vinicchayo, yathāvuttavisayaṃ
tika-s0104t:135_5: ñāṇaṃ, suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā. Mahāmeghavane
tika-s0104t:135_6: ṭhito vihāro mahāvihāro, yo satthu mahābodhinā virocati, tasmiṃ vasanasīlā mahāvihāravāsino,
tika-s0104t:135_7: tādisānaṃ samayaṃ avilomentoti attho, etena mahākassapāditheraparamparāgato, tatoyeva
tika-s0104t:135_8: aviparito saṇhasukhumo vinicchayoti mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ samayassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena dasseti.
tika-s0104t:136: Hitvā punappunabhatamatthanti ekattha vutampi puna aññattha ābhatamatthaṃ punaruttibhāvato, ganthagarukabhāvato ca cajitvā tassa āgamavarassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmīti attho.
tika-s0104t:137_0: Evaṃ karaṇappakārampi dassetvā “dīpavāsīnamatthāyā”ti vuttappayojanato aññampi saṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0104t:137_1: payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “sujanassa cā”tiādimāha. Tattha sujanassa cāti ca-saddo samuccayattho,
tika-s0104t:137_2: tena na kevalaṃ jambudīpavāsīnameva atthāya, atha kho sādhujanatosanatthañcāti samuccinoti.
tika-s0104t:137_3: Teneva ca tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi atthāyāti ayamattho siddho hoti uggahaṇādisukaratāya
tika-s0104t:137_4: tesampi bahūpakārattā. Ciraṭṭhitatthañcāti etthāpi ca-saddo na kevalaṃ tadubhayatthameva,
tika-s0104t:137_5: api tu tividhassāpi sāsanadhammassa, pariyattidhammassa vā pañcavassasahassaparimāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:137_6: cirakālaṃ ṭhitatthañcāti samuccayatthameva dasseti. Pariyattidhammassa hi ṭhitiyā
tika-s0104t:137_7: paṭipattidhammapaṭivedhadhammānampi ṭhiti hoti tasseva tesaṃ mūlabhāvato. Pariyattidhammo
tika-s0104t:137_8: pana sunikkhittena padabyañjanena, tadatthena ca ciraṃ sammā patiṭṭhāti, saṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0104t:137_9: ca padabyañjanaṃ aviparītaṃ sunikkhittaṃ, tadatthopi aviparīto sunikkhitto hoti,
tika-s0104t:137_10: tasmā saṃvaṇṇanāya aviparītassa padabyañjanassa, tadatthassa ca sunikkhittassa upāyabhāvamupādāya
tika-s0104t:138: “Dveme bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame dve? Sunikkhittañca padabyañjanaṃ, attho ca sunīto, ime kho…pe… saṃvattantī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:139_0: Evaṃ payojanampi dassetvā vakkhamānāya saṃvaṇṇanāya mahattapariccāgena ganthagarukabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:139_1: pariharitumāha “sīlakathā”tiādi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “na taṃ vicarayissāmī”ti. Aparo
tika-s0104t:139_2: nayo – yadaṭṭhakathaṃ kattukāmo, tadekadesabhāvena visuddhimaggo gahetabboti kathikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:139_3: upadesaṃ karonto tattha vicāritadhamme uddesavasena dassetumāha “sīlakathā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:139_4: Tattha sīlakathāti cārittavārittādivasena sīlavitthārakathā. Dhutadhammāti piṇḍapātikaṅgādayo
tika-s0104t:139_5: terasa kilesadhunanakadhammā. Kammaṭṭhānānīti bhāvanāsaṅkhātassa yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānattā
tika-s0104t:139_6: kammaṭṭhānanāmāni dhammajātāni. Tāni pana pāḷiyamāgatāni aṭṭhatiṃ seva na gahetabbāni,
tika-s0104t:139_7: atha kho aṭṭhakathāyamāgatānipi dveti ñāpetuṃ “sabbānipī”ti vuttaṃ. Cari yāvidhānasahitoti
tika-s0104t:139_8: rāgacaritādīnaṃ sabhāvādividhānena saha pavatto, idaṃ pana “jhānasamāpattivitthāro”ti
tika-s0104t:139_9: imassa visesanaṃ. Ettha ca rūpāvacarajjhānāni jhānaṃ, arūpāvacarajjhānāni samāpatti.
tika-s0104t:139_10: Tadubhayampi vā paṭiladdhamattaṃ jhānaṃ, samāpajjanavasībhāvappattaṃ samāpatti. Apica
tika-s0104t:139_11: tadapi ubhayaṃ jhānameva, phalasamāpattinirodhasamāpattiyo pana samāpatti, tāsaṃ vitthāroti attho.
tika-s0104t:140_0: Lokiyalokuttarabhedānaṃ channampi abhiññānaṃ gahaṇatthaṃ “sabbā ca abhiññāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:140_1: Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā bhedena paññāya saṅkalayitvā sampiṇḍetvā,
tika-s0104t:140_2: gaṇetvā vā vinicchayanaṃ paññāsaṅkalanavinicchayo. Ariyānīti buddhādīhi ariyehi paṭivijjhitabbattā,
tika-s0104t:140_3: ariyabhāvasādhakattā vā ariyāni uttarapadalopena. Avitathabhāvena vā araṇīyattā,
tika-s0104t:141_1: tassa desanā tathā, paṭiccasamuppādakathāti attho. Sā pana nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkararahitatāya
tika-s0104t:141_2: suṭṭhu parisuddhā, ghanavinibbhogassa ca sudukkaratāya nipuṇā, ekattādinayasahitā
tika-s0104t:141_3: ca tattha vicāritāti āha “suparisuddhanipuṇanayā”ti. Padattayampi hetaṃ paccayākāradesanāya
tika-s0104t:141_4: visesanaṃ. Paṭisambhidādīsu āgatanayaṃ avissajjitvāva vicāritattā avimutto tantimaggo
tika-s0104t:141_5: yassāti avimuttatanti maggā. Maggoti cettha pāḷisaṅkhāto upāyo taṃtadatthānaṃ avabodhassa,
tika-s0104t:141_6: saccapaṭivedhassa vā upāyabhāvato. Pabandho vā dīghabhāvena pakatimaggasadisattā,
tika-s0104t:142_0: Iti pana sabbanti ettha iti-saddo parisamāpane yathāuddiṭṭhauddesassa pariniṭṭhitattā,
tika-s0104t:142_1: ettakaṃ sabbanti attho. Panāti vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ visuṃ atthābhāvato. Padatthasaṃkiṇṇassa,
tika-s0104t:142_2: vattabbassa ca avuttassa avasesassa abhāvato suviññeyyabhāvena suparisuddhaṃ, “sabba”nti
tika-s0104t:142_3: iminā sambandho, bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ vā etaṃ “vutta”nti iminā sambajjhanato. Bhiyyoti
tika-s0104t:142_4: atirekaṃ, ativitthāranti attho, etena padatthamattameva vicārayissāmīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:142_5: Etaṃ sabbaṃ idha aṭṭhakathāya na vicārayissāmi punaruttibhāvato, ganthagarukabhāvato
tika-s0104t:142_6: cāti adhippāyo. Vicarayissāmīti ca gāthābhāvato na vuddhibhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:143_0: Evampi esa visuddhimaggo āgamānamatthaṃ na pakāseyya, atha sabbopeso idha vicāritabboyevāti
tika-s0104t:143_1: codanāya tathā avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhāretvā taṃ pariharanto “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:143_2: Tattha majjheti khuddakato aññesaṃ catunnampi āgamānaṃ abbhantare. Hi-saddo kāraṇe,
tika-s0104t:143_3: tena yathāvuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ joteti. Tatthāti tesu catūsu āgamesu. Yathābhāsitanti bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:143_4: yaṃ yaṃ desitaṃ, desitānurūpaṃ vā. Api ca saṃvaṇṇakehi saṃvaṇṇanāvasena yaṃ yaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:143_5: bhāsitānurūpantipi attho. Iccevāti ettha iti-saddena yathāvuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ nidasseti,
tika-s0104t:143_6: imināva kāraṇena, idameva vā kāraṇaṃ manasi sannidhāyāti attho. Katoti etthāpi “visuddhimaggo
tika-s0104t:143_7: esā”ti padaṃ kammabhāvena sambajjhati āvuttiyādinayenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tampīti taṃ
tika-s0104t:143_8: visuddhimaggampi ñāṇena gahetvāna. Etāyāti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā nāma etāya aṭṭhakathāya.
tika-s0104t:143_9: Ettha ca “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhattabhāvadīpanena visesato catunnampi āgamānaṃ
tika-s0104t:143_10: sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggo, na sumaṅgalavilāsinīādayo viya asādhāraṇaṭṭhakathāti
tika-s0104t:143_11: dasseti. Avisesato pana vinayābhidhammānampi yathārahaṃ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā hotiyeva,
tika-s0104t:143_12: tehi sammissatāya ca tadavasesassa khuddakāgamassa visesato sādhāraṇā samānāpi taṃ
tika-s0104t:147_0: Evaṃ yathāvuttena vividhena nayena paṇāmādikaṃ pakaraṇārambhavidhānaṃ katvā idāni
tika-s0104t:147_2: hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva vaggasuttavasena vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha dīghāgamo nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:147_3: Tattha tatthāti “dīghassa āgamavarassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti yadidaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:147_4: vacane. “Yassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti paṭiññātaṃ, so dīghāgamo nāma vaggasuttavasena
tika-s0104t:147_5: evaṃ veditabbo, evaṃ vibhāgoti vā attho. Atha vā tatthāti “dīghāgamanissita”nti yaṃ
tika-s0104t:147_6: vuttaṃ, etasmiṃ vacane. Yo dīghāgamo vutto, so dīghāgamo nāma vaggasuttavasena. Evaṃ
tika-s0104t:147_7: vibhajitabbo, edisoti vā attho. “Dīghassā”tiādinā hi vuttaṃ dūravacanaṃ taṃ-saddena
tika-s0104t:147_8: paṭiniddisati viya “dīghāgamanissita”nti vuttaṃ āsannavacanampi taṃ-saddena paṭiniddisati
tika-s0104t:147_9: attano buddhiyaṃ parammukhaṃ viya parivattamānaṃ hutvā pavattanato. Edisesu hi ṭhānesu
tika-s0104t:147_10: attano buddhiyaṃ sammukhaṃ vā parammukhaṃ vā parivattamānaṃ yathā tathā vā paṭiniddisituṃ
tika-s0104t:147_11: vaṭṭati saddamattapaṭiniddesena atthassāvirodhanato. Vaggasuttādīnaṃ nibbacanaṃ parato
tika-s0104t:147_12: āvi bhavissati. Tayo vaggā yassāti tivaggo. Catuttiṃsa suttāni ettha saṅgayhanti,
tika-s0104t:147_13: tesaṃ vā saṅgaho gaṇanā etthāti catuttiṃsasuttasaṅgaho.
tika-s0104t:148_0: Attano saṃvaṇṇanāya paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkameneva pavattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:148_1: “tassa…pe… nidānamādī”ti vuttaṃ. Ādibhāvo hettha saṅgītikkameneva veditabbo. Kasmā
tika-s0104t:148_2: pana catūsu āgamesu dīghāgamo paṭhamaṃ saṅgīto, tattha ca sīlakkhandhavaggo paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0104t:148_3: nikkhitto, tasmiñca brahmajālasuttaṃ, tatthāpi nidānanti? Nāyamanuyogo katthacipi
tika-s0104t:148_4: na pavattati sabbattheva vacanakkamamattaṃ paṭicca anuyuñjitabbato. Apica saddhāvahaguṇattā
tika-s0104t:148_5: dīghāgamova paṭhamaṃ saṅgīto. Saddhā hi kusaladhammānaṃ bījaṃ. Yathāha “saddhā bījaṃ
tika-s0104t:148_6: tapo vuṭṭhī”ti. Saddhāvahaguṇatā cassa heṭṭhā dassitāyeva. Kiñca bhiyyo – katipayasuttasaṅgahatāya
tika-s0104t:148_7: ceva appaparimāṇatāya ca uggahaṇadhāraṇādisukhato paṭhamaṃ saṅgīto. Tathā hesa catuttiṃsasuttasaṅgaho,
tika-s0104t:148_8: catusaṭṭhibhāṇavāraparimāṇo ca. Sīlakathābāhullato pana sīlakkhandhavaggo paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0104t:148_9: nikkhitto. Sīlañhi sāsanassa ādi sīlapatiṭṭhānattā sabbaguṇānaṃ. Tenevāha “tasmā
tika-s0104t:148_10: tiha tvaṃ bhikkhu ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ?
tika-s0104t:148_13: brahmajālasuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhittanti veditabbaṃ. Tepiṭake hi buddhavacane brahmajālasadisaṃ
tika-s0104t:148_14: diṭṭhigatāni niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā vibhattasuttaṃ natthi. Nidānaṃ pana paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:148_15: mahākassapattherena puṭṭhena āyasmatā ānandena desakālādinidassanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0104t:148_17: niyameti, paṭhamasaṅgītikāleti pana kālanti, ayamattho upari āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0104t:150_1: yassaṃ vā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkamena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmattā taṃ vibhāvento
tika-s0104t:150_2: tassā tantiyā āruḷhāyapi idha vacane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:150_3: Ettha hi kiñcāpi…pe… māruḷhāti etena nanu sā saṅgītikkhandhake tantimāruḷhā, kasmā
tika-s0104t:150_4: idha puna vuttā, yadi ca vuttā assa niratthakatā, ganthagarutā ca siyāti codanālesaṃ
tika-s0104t:150_5: dasseti. “Nidāna…pe… veditabbā”ti pana etena nidānakosallatthabhāvato yathāvuttadosatā
tika-s0104t:150_6: na siyāti visesakāraṇadassanena pariharati. “Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā”ti ettha
tika-s0104t:150_7: ca-saddo īdisesu ṭhānesu vattabbasampiṇḍanattho. Tena hi paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:150_8: nidānañca ādi, esā ca paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma evaṃ veditabbāti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0104t:150_9: Upaññāsattho vā ca-saddo, upaññāsoti ca vākyārambho vuccati. Esā hi ganthakārānaṃ
tika-s0104t:150_10: pakati, yadidaṃ kiñci vatvā puna aparaṃ vattumārabhantānaṃ ca-saddapayogo. Yaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:150_11: vajirabuddhittherena vuttaṃ “ettha ca-saddo atirekattho, tena aññāpi atthīti dīpetī”ti
tika-s0104t:150_12: (vajira ṭī. bāhiranidānakathāvaṇṇanā), tadayuttameva. Na hettha ca-saddena tadattho
tika-s0104t:150_13: viññāyati. Yadi cettha tadatthadassanatthameva ca-kāro adhippeto siyā, evaṃ sati
tika-s0104t:150_14: so na kattabboyeva paṭhamasaddeneva aññāsaṃ dutiyādisaṅgītīnampi atthibhāvassa dassitattā.
tika-s0104t:150_15: Dutiyādimupādāya hi paṭhamasaddapayogo dīghādimupādāya rassādisaddapayogo viya. Yathāpaccayaṃ
tika-s0104t:150_16: tattha tattha desitattā, paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ saṅgahetvā
tika-s0104t:150_17: gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti, etena taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ, taṃtaṃsuttānañca ādipariyosānesu,
tika-s0104t:150_18: antarantarā ca sambandhavasena ṭhapitaṃ saṅgītikārakavacanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Mahāvisayattā,
tika-s0104t:150_19: pūjitattā ca mahatī saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti, paṭhamā mahāsaṅgīti paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti.
tika-s0104t:150_20: Kiñcāpīti anuggahattho, tena pāḷiyampi sā saṅgītimāruḷhāvāti anuggahaṃ karoti, evampi
tika-s0104t:150_21: tatthāruḷhamattena idha sotūnaṃ nidānakosallaṃ na hotīti pana-saddena aruciyatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:150_22: dasseti. Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:151_0: Idāni taṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “dhammacakkapavattanañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:151_2: “buddho bodheyya”nti paṭiññāya anulomanato vineyyānaṃ maggaphaluppattihetubhūtā kiriyāva
tika-s0104t:151_3: nippariyāyena buddhakiccaṃ nāmāti taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “dhammacakkappavattanañhi…pe…
tika-s0104t:151_4: vinayanā”ti vuttaṃ. Dhammacakkappavattanato pana pubbabhāge bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ suṇantānampi
tika-s0104t:151_5: vāsanābhāgiyameva jātaṃ, na sekkhabhāgiyaṃ, na nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ tapussabhallikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:151_6: saraṇadānaṃ viya. Esā hi dhammatā, tasmā tameva mariyādabhāvena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:151_7: Saddhindriyādi dhammoyeva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ. Atha vā cakkanti
tika-s0104t:151_8: āṇā, dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ. Dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi
tika-s0104t:152: “Dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ. Cakkañca pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena pavattetīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammacariyāya pavattetīti dhammacakka”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:153_0: Tassa pavattanaṃ tathā. Pavattananti ca pavattayamānaṃ, pavattitanti paccuppannātītavasena
tika-s0104t:153_1: dvidhā attho. Yaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “dhammacakkapavattanasuttantaṃ desento
tika-s0104t:153_2: dhammacakkaṃ pavatteti nāma, aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa maggaphalādhigatato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0104t:153_3: pavattitaṃ nāmā”ti. Idha pana paccuppannavaseneva attho yutto. Yāvāti paricchedatthe
tika-s0104t:153_4: nipāto, subhaddassa nāma paribbājakassa vinayanaṃ antoparicchedaṃ katvāti abhividhivasena
tika-s0104t:153_5: attho veditabbo. Tañhi bhagavā parinibbānamañce nipannoyeva vinesīti. Kataṃ pariniṭṭhāpitaṃ
tika-s0104t:153_6: buddhakiccaṃ yenāti tathā, tasmiṃ. Katabuddhakicce bhagavati lokanāthe parinibbuteti
tika-s0104t:153_7: sambandho, etena buddhakattabbassa kiccassa kassacipi asesitabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tatoyeva
tika-s0104t:153_8: hi bhagavā parinibbutoti. Nanu ca sāvakehi vinītāpi vineyyā bhagavatāyeva vinītā
tika-s0104t:153_9: nāma. Tathā hi sāvakabhāsitaṃ suttaṃ “buddhabhāsita”nti vuccati. Sāvakavineyyā ca
tika-s0104t:153_10: na tāva vinītā, tasmā “katabuddhakicce”ti na vattabbanti? Nāyaṃ doso tesaṃ vinayanupāyassa
tika-s0104t:154_0: “Na tāvāhaṃ pāpima parinibbāyissāmi, yāva me bhikkhū na sāvakā bhavissanti viyattā
tika-s0104t:154_1: vinītā visāradā bahussutā dhammadharā…pe… uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ saha dhammena suniggahitaṃ
tika-s0104t:155_1: gāhassa micchābhāvadassanatthaṃ, loke jātasaṃvaddhādibhāvadassanatthañca. Tathā hi
tika-s0104t:155_3: karontīti. Kusinārāyanti evaṃ nāmake nagare. Tañhi nagaraṃ kusahatthaṃ purisaṃ dassanaṭṭhāne
tika-s0104t:155_4: māpitattā “kusināra”nti vuccati, samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti
tika-s0104t:155_5: tassa nagarassa upavattanabhūte mallarājūnaṃ sālavane. Tañhi sālavanaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitukāmā
tika-s0104t:155_6: uyyānato upacca vattanti gacchanti etenāti upavattanaṃ. Yathā hi anurādhapurassa
tika-s0104t:155_7: dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ thūpārāmo, evaṃ taṃ uyyānaṃ kusinārāya dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:155_8: hoti. Yathā ca thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā
tika-s0104t:155_9: uttarena nivattati, evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā,
tika-s0104t:155_10: tasmā taṃ “upavattana”nti vuccati. Apare pana “taṃ sālavanamupagantvā mittasuhajje
tika-s0104t:155_11: apaloketvā nivattanato upavattananti pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ kirā”ti vadanti. Yamakasālānamantareti
tika-s0104t:155_12: yamakasālānaṃ vemajjhe. Tattha kira bhagavato paññattassa parinibbānamañcassa sīsabhāge
tika-s0104t:155_13: ekā sālapanti hoti, pādabhāge ekā. Tatrāpi eko taruṇasālo sīsabhāgassa āsanno hoti,
tika-s0104t:155_14: eko pādabhāgassa. Tasmā “yamakasālānamantare”ti vuttaṃ. Apica “yamakasālā nāma mūlakkhandhaviṭapapattehi
tika-s0104t:155_15: aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbetvā ṭhitasālā”tipi mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mā iti cando vuccati
tika-s0104t:155_16: tassa gatiyā divasassa minitabbato, tadā sabbakalāpāripūriyā puṇṇo eva māti puṇṇamā.
tika-s0104t:155_17: Saddavidū pana “mo sivo candimā cevā”ti vuttaṃ sakkatabhāsānayaṃ gahetvā okārantampi
tika-s0104t:155_18: candimavācaka ma-saddamicchanti. Visākhāya yutto puṇṇamā yatthāti visākhāpuṇṇamo,
tika-s0104t:155_19: soyeva divaso tathā, tasmiṃ. Paccūsati timiraṃ vināsetīti paccūso, pati-pubbo usa-saddo
tika-s0104t:155_20: rujāyanti hi neruttikā, soyeva samayoti rattiyā pacchimayāmapariyāpanno kālaviseso
tika-s0104t:155_21: vuccati, tasmiṃ. Visākhāpuṇṇamadivase īdise rattiyā pacchimasamayeti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:156_0: Upādīyate kammakilesehīti upādi, vipākakkhandhā, kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. So pana upādi
tika-s0104t:156_2: sesito, tasmā natthi etissā upādisaṅkhāto seso, upādissa vā sesoti katvā “anupādisesā”ti
tika-s0104t:156_3: vuccati. Nibbānadhātūti cettha nibbutimattaṃ adhippetaṃ, nibbānañca taṃ sabhāvadhāraṇato
tika-s0104t:156_4: dhātu cāti katvā. Nibbutiyā hi kāraṇapariyāyena asaṅkhatadhātu tathā vuccati. Itthambhūtalakkhaṇe
tika-s0104t:156_5: cāyaṃ karaṇaniddeso. Anupādisesatāsaṅkhātaṃ imaṃ pakāraṃ bhūtassa pattassa parinibbutassa
tika-s0104t:156_6: bhagavato lakkhaṇe nibbānadhātusaṅkhāte atthe tatiyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nanu ca “anupādisesāyā”ti
tika-s0104t:156_7: nibbānadhātuyāva visesanaṃ hoti, na parinibbutassa bhagavato, atha kasmā taṃ bhagavā
tika-s0104t:156_8: pattoti vuttoti? Nibbānadhātuyā sahacaraṇato. Taṃsahacaraṇena hi bhagavāpi anupādisesabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:156_9: pattoti vuccati. Atha vā anupādisesabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ imaṃ pakāraṃ pattāya nibbānadhātuyā
tika-s0104t:156_10: lakkhaṇe sañjānanakiriyāya tatiyātipi vattuṃ yujjati. Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāti
tika-s0104t:156_11: ca anupādisesanibbānadhātu hutvāti attho. “Ūnapañcabandhanena pattenā”ti. Ettha hi
tika-s0104t:156_12: ūnapañcabandhanapatto hutvāti atthaṃ vadanti. Apica nibbānadhātuyā anupādisesāya
tika-s0104t:156_13: anupādisesā hutvā bhūtāyātipi yujjati. Vuttañhi udānaṭṭhakathāya nandasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:156_15: kesehi upalakkhitāti attho”ti esanayo īdisesu. Dhātubhājanadivaseti jeṭṭhamāsassa
tika-s0104t:156_16: sukkapakkhapañcamīdivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tañca na “sannipatitāna”nti etassa visesanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:156_17: “ussāhaṃ janesī”ti etassa pana visesanaṃ “dhātubhājanadivase bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesī”ti
tika-s0104t:156_19: purimataradivasesupi bhikkhū sannipatitāti. Atha vā “sannipatitāna”nti idaṃ kāyasāmaggivasena
tika-s0104t:156_20: sannipatanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ, na samāgamanamattena. Tasmā “dhātubhājanadivase”ti
tika-s0104t:156_21: idaṃ “sannipatitāna”nti etassa visesanaṃ sambhavati, idañca bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti
tika-s0104t:156_22: ettha “bhikkhūna”nti etenapi sambajjhanīyaṃ. Saṅghassa thero saṅghatthero. So pana
tika-s0104t:156_23: saṅgho kiṃ parimāṇoti āha “sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassāna”nti. Saṅghasaddena hi aviññāyamānassa
tika-s0104t:156_24: parimāṇassa viññāpanatthamevetaṃ puna vuttaṃ. Saddavidū pana vadanti –
tika-s0104t:159_0: Tasmā nāmamattabhūtassa saṅghattherassa visesanatthamevetaṃ puna vuttanti, niccasāpekkhatāya
tika-s0104t:159_1: ca edisesu samāso yathā “devadattassa garukula”nti. Niccasāpekkhatā cettha saṅghasaddassa
tika-s0104t:159_2: bhikkhusatasahassasaddaṃ sāpekkhattepi aññapadantarābhāvena vākye viya apekkhitabbatthassa
tika-s0104t:159_3: gamakattā. “Sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassāna”nti hi etassa saṅghasadde avayavībhāvena
tika-s0104t:159_5: ca gaṇapāmokkhabhikkhūyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadā hi sannipatitā bhikkhū ettakāti
tika-s0104t:159_6: gaṇanapathamatikkantā. Tathā hi veḷuvagāme vedanāvikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya “nacireneva
tika-s0104t:159_7: bhagavā parinibbāyissatī”ti sutvā tato tato āgatesu bhikkhūsu ekabhikkhupi pakkanto
tika-s0104t:162_0: Āyasmā mahākassapo anussaranto maññamāno cintayanto hutvā ussāhaṃ janesi, anussaranto
tika-s0104t:162_1: maññamāno cintayanto āyasmā mahākassapo ussāhaṃ janesīti vā sambandho. Mahantehi
tika-s0104t:162_2: sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatattā mahanto kassapoti mahākassapo. Apica “mahākassapo”ti
tika-s0104t:162_3: uruvelakassapo nadīkassapo gayākassapo kumārakassapoti ime khuddānukhuddake there
tika-s0104t:162_4: upādāya vuccati. Kasmā panāyasmā mahākassapo ussāhaṃ janesīti anuyoge sati taṃ kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:162_5: vibhāvento āha “sattāhaparinibbute”tiādi. Satta ahāni samāhaṭāni sattāhaṃ. Sattāhaṃ
tika-s0104t:162_6: parinibbutassa assāti tathā yathā “acirapakkanto, māsajāto”ti, antatthaaññapadasamāsoyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:162_7: tasmiṃ. Bhagavato parinibbānadivasato paṭṭhāya sattāhe vītivatteti vuttaṃ hoti, etassa
tika-s0104t:162_9: Tattha subhaddoti tassa nāmamattaṃ, vuḍḍhakāle pana pabbajitattā “vuḍḍhapabbajitenā”ti
tika-s0104t:162_10: vuttaṃ, etena subhaddaparibbājakādīhi taṃ visesaṃ karoti. “Alaṃ āvuso”tiādinā tena
tika-s0104t:162_11: vuttavacanaṃ nidasseti. So hi sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati āyasmatā mahākassapattherena
tika-s0104t:162_12: saddhiṃ pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamaggapaṭipannesu pañcamattesu bhikkhusatesu avītarāge
tika-s0104t:162_13: bhikkhū antarāmagge diṭṭhaājīvakassa santikā bhagavato parinibbānaṃ sutvā pattacīvarāni
tika-s0104t:162_14: chaḍḍetvā bāhā paggayhaṃ nānappakāraṃ paridevante disvā evamāha.
tika-s0104t:163_0: Kasmā pana so evamāhāti? Bhagavati āghātena. Ayaṃ kireso khandhake āgate ātumāvatthusmiṃ
tika-s0104t:163_1: nahāpitapubbako vuḍḍhapabbajito bhagavati kusinārato nikkhamitvā aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi
tika-s0104t:163_2: saddhiṃ ātumaṃ gacchante “bhagavā āgacchatī”ti sutvā “āgatakāleyāgudānaṃ karissāmī”ti
tika-s0104t:163_3: sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhite dve putte etadavoca “bhagavā kira tātā ātumaṃ āgacchati mahatā
tika-s0104t:163_4: bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi, gacchatha tumhe tātā, khurabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-s0104t:163_5: ādāya nāḷiyā vā pasibbakena vā anugharakaṃ āhiṇḍatha, loṇampi telampi taṇḍulampi
tika-s0104t:163_6: khādanīyampi saṃharatha, bhagavato āgatassa yāgudānaṃ karissāmī”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu.
tika-s0104t:163_7: Atha bhagavati ātumaṃ āgantvā bhusāgārakaṃ paviṭṭhe subhaddo sāyanhasamayaṃ gāmadvāraṃ
tika-s0104t:163_8: gantvā manusse āmantetvā “hatthakammamattaṃ me dethā”ti hatthakammaṃ yācitvā “kiṃ
tika-s0104t:163_9: bhante karomā”ti vutte “idañcidañca gaṇhathā”ti sabbūpakaraṇāni gāhāpetvā vihāre
tika-s0104t:163_10: uddhanāni kāretvā ekaṃ kāḷakaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā tādisameva pārupitvā “idaṃ karotha,
tika-s0104t:163_11: idaṃ karothā”ti sabbarattiṃ vicārento satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā bhojjayāguñca madhugoḷakañca
tika-s0104t:163_12: paṭiyādāpesi. Bhojjayāgu nāma bhuñjitvā pātabbayāgu, tattha sappimadhuphāṇitamacchamaṃsapupphaphalarasādi
tika-s0104t:163_13: yaṃ kiñci khādanīyaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ pavisati. Kīḷitukāmānaṃ sīsamakkhanayoggā
tika-s0104t:164_0: Atha bhagavā kālasseva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto piṇḍāya carituṃ
tika-s0104t:164_1: ātumābhimukho pāyāsi. Atha tassa ārocesuṃ “bhagavā piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pavisati, tayā kassa
tika-s0104t:164_2: yāgu paṭiyāditā”ti. So yathānivatthapāruteheva tehi kāḷakakāsāvehi ekena hatthena
tika-s0104t:164_3: dabbiñca kaṭacchuñca gahetvā brahmā viya dakkhiṇaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā
tika-s0104t:164_4: vanditvā “paṭiggaṇhātu me bhante bhagavā yāgu”nti āha. Tato “jānantāpi tathāgatā
tika-s0104t:164_5: pucchantī”ti khandhake āgatanayena bhagavā pucchitvā ca sutvā ca taṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ
tika-s0104t:164_7: dve sikkhāpadāni paññapetvā “anekakappakoṭiyo bhikkhave bhojanaṃ pariyesanteheva
tika-s0104t:164_8: vītināmitā, idaṃ pana tumhākaṃ akappiyaṃ, adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ imaṃ paribhuñjitvā
tika-s0104t:164_9: anekāni attabhāvasahassāni apāyesveva nibbattissanti, apetha mā gaṇhathā”ti vatvā
tika-s0104t:164_10: bhikkhācārābhimukho agamāsi, ekabhikkhunāpi na kiñci gahitaṃ. Subhaddo anattamano
tika-s0104t:164_11: hutvā “ayaṃ sabbaṃ jānāmī”ti āhiṇḍati, sace na gahetukāmo pesetvā ārocetabbaṃ assa,
tika-s0104t:164_12: pakkāhāro nāma sabbaciraṃ tiṭṭhanto sattāhamattaṃ tiṭṭheyya, idañca mama yāvajīvaṃ
tika-s0104t:164_13: pariyattaṃ assa, sabbaṃ tena nāsitaṃ, ahitakāmo ayaṃ mayha”nti bhagavati āghātaṃ
tika-s0104t:164_14: bandhitvā dasabale dharamāne kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ayaṃ uccā
tika-s0104t:164_15: kulā pabbajito mahāpuriso, sace kiñci dharantassa vakkhāmi, mamaṃyeva santajjessatī”ti.
tika-s0104t:165_0: Svāyaṃ ajja mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ gacchanto “parinibbuto bhagavā”ti sutvā laddhassāso
tika-s0104t:165_1: viya haṭṭhatuṭṭho evamāha. Thero pana taṃ sutvā hadaye pahāraṃ viya, matthake patitasukkhāsaniṃ
tika-s0104t:165_2: viya (sukkhāsani viya dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.232) maññi, dhammasaṃvego cassa uppajji “sattāhamattaparinibbuto
tika-s0104t:165_3: bhagavā, ajjāpissa suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ dharatiyeva, dukkhena bhagavatā ārādhitasāsane
tika-s0104t:165_4: nāma evaṃ lahuṃ mahantaṃ pāpaṃ kasaṭaṃ kaṇṭako uppanno, alaṃ kho panesa pāpo vaḍḍhamāno
tika-s0104t:165_5: aññepi evarūpe sahāye labhitvā sāsanaṃ osakkāpetu”nti.
tika-s0104t:166_0: Tato thero cintesi “sace kho panāhaṃ imaṃ mahallakaṃ idheva pilotikaṃ nivāsetvā chārikāya
tika-s0104t:166_1: okirāpetvā nīharāpessāmi, manussā ‘samaṇassa gotamassa sarīre dharamāneyeva sāvakā
tika-s0104t:166_2: vivadantī’ti amhākaṃ dosaṃ dassessanti, adhivāsemi tāva. Bhagavatā hi desitadhammo
tika-s0104t:166_3: asaṅgahitapuppharāsisadiso, tattha yathā vātena pahaṭapupphāni yato vā tato vā gacchanti,
tika-s0104t:166_4: evameva evarūpānaṃ vasena gacchante gacchante kāle vinaye ekaṃ dve sikkhāpadāni nassissanti,
tika-s0104t:166_5: sutte eko dve pañhāvārā nassissanti, abhidhamme ekaṃ dve bhūmantarāni nassissanti,
tika-s0104t:166_6: evaṃ anukkamena mūle naṭṭhe pisācasadisā bhavissāma, tasmā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ karissāmi,
tika-s0104t:166_7: evaṃ sati daḷhasuttena saṅgahitapupphāni viya ayaṃ dhammavinayo niccalo bhavissati.
tika-s0104t:166_8: Etadatthañhi bhagavā mayhaṃ tīṇi gāvutāni paccuggamanaṃ akāsi, tīhi ovādehi upasampadaṃ
tika-s0104t:166_9: akāsi, kāyato cīvaraparivattanaṃ akāsi, ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā candopamapaṭipadaṃ kathento
tika-s0104t:166_10: maññeva sakkhiṃ katvā kathesi, tikkhattuṃ sakalasāsanaratanaṃ paṭicchāpesi, mādise
tika-s0104t:166_11: bhikkhumhi tiṭṭhamāne ayaṃ pāpo sāsane vaḍḍhiṃ mā alattha, yāva adhammo na dippati,
tika-s0104t:166_12: dhammo na paṭibāhiyyati, avinayo na dippati, vinayo na paṭibāhiyyati, adhammavādino
tika-s0104t:166_13: na balavanto honti, dhammavādino na dubbalā honti, avinayavādino na balavanto honti,
tika-s0104t:166_14: vinayavādino na dubbalā honti, tāva dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmi, tato bhikkhū
tika-s0104t:166_15: attano attano pahonakaṃ gahetvā kappiyākappiye kathessanti, athāyaṃ pāpo sayameva
tika-s0104t:166_16: niggahaṃ pāpuṇissati, puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkhissati, sāsanaṃ iddhañceva phīttañca
tika-s0104t:166_17: bhavissatī”ti cintetvā so “evaṃ nāma mayhaṃ cittaṃ uppanna”nti kassacipi anārocetvā
tika-s0104t:166_18: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ samassāsetvā atha pacchā dhātubhājanadivase dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:166_19: bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesi. Tena vuttaṃ “āyasmā mahākassapo sattāhaparinibbute…pe…
tika-s0104t:167_0: Tattha alanti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ, na yuttanti attho. Āvusoti paridevante bhikkhū ālapati.
tika-s0104t:167_1: Mā socitthāti citte uppannabalavasokena mā sokamakattha. Mā paridevitthāti vācāya
tika-s0104t:167_2: mā vilāpamakattha. “Paridevanaṃ vilāpo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Asocanādīnaṃ kāraṇamāha “sumuttā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:167_3: Tena mahāsamaṇenāti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ, smāvacanassa vā nābyappadeso. “Upaddutā”ti
tika-s0104t:167_4: pade pana kattari tatiyāvasena sambandho. Ubhayāpekkhañhetaṃ padaṃ. Upaddutā ca homāti
tika-s0104t:167_5: taṃkālāpekkhavattamānavacanaṃ, “tadā”ti seso. Atītatthe vā vattamānavacanaṃ, ahumhāti
tika-s0104t:167_6: attho. Anussaranto dhammasaṃvegavaseneva, na pana kodhādivasena. Dhammasabhāvacintāvasena
tika-s0104t:170_0: Aññaṃ ussāhajananakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “īdisassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha īdisassa ca saṅghasannipātassāti
tika-s0104t:170_2: vadati. “Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjatī”tiādināpi aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Tiṭṭhati ettha
tika-s0104t:170_3: phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, hetu. Khoti avadhāraṇe. Panāti vacanālaṅkāre,
tika-s0104t:170_4: etaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjateva, no na vijjatīti attho. Kiṃ pana tanti āha “yaṃ pāpabhikkhū”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:170_5: Yanti nipātamattaṃ, kāraṇaniddeso vā, yena ṭhānena antaradhāpeyyuṃ, tadetaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:170_6: vijjatiyevāti. Pāpena lāmakena icchāvacarena samannāgatā bhikkhū pāpabhikkhū. Atīto
tika-s0104t:170_7: satthā ettha, etassāti vā atītasatthukaṃ yathā “bahukattuko”ti. Padhānaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:170_8: pāvacanaṃ. Pā-saddo cettha nipāto “pā eva vutyassā”tiādīsu viya. Upasaggapadaṃ vā
tika-s0104t:170_9: etaṃ, dīghaṃ katvā pana tathā vuttaṃ yathā “pāvadatī”tipi vadanti. Pakkhanti alajjipakkhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:170_10: “Yāva cā”tiādinā saṅgītiyā sāsanaciraṭṭhitikabhāve kāraṇaṃ, sādhakañca dasseti. “Tasmā”ti
tika-s0104t:171_0: Tattha yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhatīti yattakaṃ kālaṃ dhammo ca vinayo ca lajjipuggalesu
tika-s0104t:171_1: tiṭṭhati. Parinibbānamañcake nipannena bhagavatā mahāparinibbānasutte vuttaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:171_2: “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Hi-saddo āgamavasena daḷhijotako. Desito paññattoti dhammopi
tika-s0104t:171_3: desito ceva paññatto ca. Suttābhidhammasaṅgahitassa hi dhammassa atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ
tika-s0104t:171_4: desanā, tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ vineyyasantāne ṭhapanaṃ paññāpanaṃ. Vinayopi desito
tika-s0104t:171_5: ceva paññatto ca. Vinayatantisaṅgahitassa hi atthassa atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā,
tika-s0104t:171_6: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṃ paññāpanaṃ, tasmā kammadvayampi kiriyādvayena
tika-s0104t:172_0: Soti so dhammo ca vinayo ca. Mamaccayenāti mama accayakāle. “Bhummatthe karaṇaniddeso”ti
tika-s0104t:172_1: hi akkharacintakā vadanti. Hetvatthe vā karaṇavacanaṃ, mama accayahetu tumhākaṃ satthā
tika-s0104t:172_2: nāma bhavissatīti attho. Vuttañhi mahāparinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ “mayi parinibbute
tika-s0104t:172_3: tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessatī”ti. Lakkhaṇavacanañhettha hetvatthasādhakaṃ yathā
tika-s0104t:172_4: “nette ujuṃ gate satī”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – mayā vo ṭhiteneva “idaṃ lahukaṃ, idaṃ
tika-s0104t:172_5: garukaṃ, idaṃ satekicchaṃ, idaṃ atekicchaṃ, idaṃ lokavajjaṃ, idaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
tika-s0104t:172_6: ayaṃ āpatti puggalassa santike vuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ gaṇassa, ayaṃ saṅghassa santike vuṭṭhātī”ti
tika-s0104t:172_8: ubhatovibhaṅgo mahāvinayo nāma desito, taṃ sakalampi vinayapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute
tika-s0104t:172_9: tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati “idaṃ vo kattabbaṃ, idaṃ vo na kattabba”nti kattabbākattabbassa
tika-s0104t:172_10: vibhāgena anusāsanato. Ṭhiteneva ca mayā “ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā,
tika-s0104t:172_11: cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
tika-s0104t:172_12: maggo”ti tena tena vineyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpena pakārena ime sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme
tika-s0104t:172_13: vibhajitvā vibhajitvā suttantapiṭakaṃ desitaṃ, taṃ sakalampi suttantapiṭakaṃ mayi
tika-s0104t:172_14: parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati taṃtaṃcariyānurūpaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā
tika-s0104t:172_15: anusāsanato, ṭhiteneva ca mayā “ime pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo,
tika-s0104t:172_16: cattāri saccāni, bāvīsatindriyāni, nava hetū, cattāro āhārā, satta phassā, satta
tika-s0104t:172_17: vedanā, satta saññā, satta cetanā, satta cittāni. Tatrāpi ettakā dhammā kāmāvacarā,
tika-s0104t:172_18: ettakā rūpāvacarā, ettakā arūpāvacarā, ettakā pariyāpannā, ettakā apariyāpannā, ettakā
tika-s0104t:172_19: lokiyā, ettakā lokuttarā”ti ime dhamme vibhajitvā vibhajitvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desitaṃ,
