tika-s0104t:172_20: taṃ sakalampi abhidhammapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati
tika-s0104t:172_21: khandhādivibhāgena ñāyamānaṃ catusaccasambodhāvahattā. Iti sabbampetaṃ abhisambodhito
tika-s0104t:172_22: yāva parinibbānā pañcacattālīsa vassāni bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ “tīṇi piṭakāni, pañca nikāyā,
tika-s0104t:172_23: navaṅgāni, caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti evaṃ mahappabhedaṃ hoti. Imāni caturāsīti
tika-s0104t:172_24: dhammakkhandhasahassāni tiṭṭhanti, ahaṃ ekova parinibbāyissāmi, ahañca panidāni ekova
tika-s0104t:172_25: ovadāmi anusāsāmi, mayi parinibbute imāni caturāsīti buddhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti
tika-s0104t:173_0: Sāsananti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhavasena tividhampi sāsanaṃ, nippariyāyato pana
tika-s0104t:173_1: sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā. Addhānaṃ gamitumalanti addhaniyaṃ, addhānagāmi addhānakkhamanti
tika-s0104t:173_2: attho. Ciraṃ ṭhiti etassāti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yena pakārena idaṃ
tika-s0104t:173_3: sāsanaṃ addhaniyaṃ, tatoyeva ca ciraṭṭhitikaṃ bhaveyya, tena pakārena dhammañca vinayañca
tika-s0104t:174_0: Idāni sammāsambuddhena attano kataṃ anuggahavisesaṃ samanussaritvā cintanākārampi
tika-s0104t:174_2: etehi sambandho. Yanti yasmā, kiriyāparāmasanaṃ vā etaṃ, tena “anuggahito, pasaṃsito”ti
tika-s0104t:174_3: ettha anuggahaṇaṃ, pasaṃsanañca parāmasati. “Dhāressasī”tiādikaṃ pana vacanaṃ bhagavā
tika-s0104t:174_4: aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle mahākassapattherena paññattasaṅghāṭiyaṃ nisinno taṃ saṅghāṭiṃ
tika-s0104t:174_5: padumapupphavaṇṇena pāṇinā antantena parāmasanto āha. Vuttañhetaṃ kassapasaṃyutte
tika-s0104t:175_0: “Atha kho āvuso bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami, atha
tika-s0104t:175_1: khvāhaṃ āvuso paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ catugguṇaṃ paññapetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocaṃ
tika-s0104t:175_2: ‘idha bhante bhagavā nisīdatu, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā’ti. Nisīdi
tika-s0104t:175_3: kho āvuso bhagavā paññatte āsane, nisajja kho maṃ āvuso bhagavā etadavoca ‘mudukā
tika-s0104t:175_4: kho tyāyaṃ kassapa paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭī’ti. Paṭiggaṇhātu me bhante bhagavā paṭapilotikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:175_5: saṅghāṭiṃ anukampaṃ upādāyāti. Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapa sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni
tika-s0104t:175_6: nibbasanānīti. Dhāressāmahaṃ bhante bhagavato sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānīti. So
tika-s0104t:175_7: khvāhaṃ āvuso paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ bhagavato pādāsiṃ, ahaṃ pana bhagavato sāṇāni
tika-s0104t:176_0: Tattha mudukā kho tyāyanti mudukā kho te ayaṃ. Kasmā pana bhagavā evamāhāti? Therena
tika-s0104t:176_1: saha cīvaraṃ parivattetukāmatāya. Kasmā parivattetukāmo jātoti? Theraṃ attano ṭhāne
tika-s0104t:176_2: ṭhapetukāmatāya. Kiṃ sāriputtamoggallānā natthīti? Atthi, evaṃ panassa ahosi “ime
tika-s0104t:176_3: na ciraṃ ṭhassanti, ‘kassapo pana vīsavassasatāyuko, so mayi parinibbute sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:176_4: vasitvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ katvā mama sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālaṃ pavattanakaṃ
tika-s0104t:176_5: karissatī”ti attano naṃ ṭhāne ṭhapesi, evaṃ bhikkhū kassapassa sussusitabbaṃ maññissantī”ti
tika-s0104t:176_6: tasmā evamāha. Thero pana yasmā cīvarassa vā pattassa vā vaṇṇe kathite “imaṃ tumhe
tika-s0104t:176_7: gaṇhathā”ti vacanaṃ cārittameva, tasmā “paṭiggaṇhātu me bhante bhagavā”ti āha.
tika-s0104t:177_0: Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapāti kassapa tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni paṃsukūlāni
tika-s0104t:177_1: pārupituṃ sakkhissasīti vadati. Tañca kho na kāyabalaṃ sandhāya, paṭipattipūraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:177_2: pana sandhāya evamāha. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – ahaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ
tika-s0104t:177_3: pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ susānaṃ pavisitvā tumbamattehi pāṇakehi samparikiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:177_4: te pāṇake vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṃse ṭhatvā aggahesiṃ, tassa me imaṃ cīvaraṃ gahitadivase
tika-s0104t:177_5: dasasahassacakkavāḷe mahāpathavī mahāviravaṃ viravamānā kampittha, ākāsaṃ taṭataṭāyi,
tika-s0104t:177_6: cakkavāḷe devatā sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu, imaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhantena bhikkhunā jātipaṃsukūlikena
tika-s0104t:177_7: jātiāraññikena jātiekāsanikena jātisapadānacārikena bhavituṃ vaṭṭati, tvaṃ imassa
tika-s0104t:177_8: cīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasīti. Theropi attanā pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ
tika-s0104t:177_9: dhāreti, so taṃ atakkayitvā “ahametaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūressāmī”ti ussāhena sugatacīvarassa
tika-s0104t:177_10: anucchavikaṃ kātukāmo “dhāressāmahaṃ bhante”ti āha. Paṭipajjinti paṭipannosiṃ. Evaṃ
tika-s0104t:177_11: pana cīvaraparivattanaṃ katvā therena pārupitacīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi, satthu cīvaraṃ
tika-s0104t:177_12: thero. Tasmiṃ samaye mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā unnadantī kampittha.
tika-s0104t:178_0: Sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti matakaḷevaraṃ pariveṭhetvā chaḍḍitāni tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā
tika-s0104t:178_1: gahitāni sāṇavākamayāni paṃsukūlacīvarāni. Nibbasanānīti niṭṭhitavasanakiccāni, paribhogajiṇṇānīti
tika-s0104t:178_2: attho. Ettha ca kiñcāpi ekameva taṃ cīvaraṃ, anekāvayavattā pana bahuvacanaṃ katanti
tika-s0104t:178_3: majjhimagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti
tika-s0104t:178_4: atthassa viññāyamānattā, viññāyamānatthassa ca saddassa payoge kāmācārattā “attanā”ti
tika-s0104t:178_5: na vuttaṃ. “Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapa sāṇāni paṃsukūlānī”ti hi vuttattā “attanāva
tika-s0104t:178_6: sādhāraṇaparibhogenā”ti viññāyati, nāññena. Na hi kevalaṃ saddatoyeva sabbattha atthanicchayo,
tika-s0104t:178_7: atthapakaraṇādināpi yebhuyyena atthassa niyamitattā. Ācariyadhammapālattherena panettha
tika-s0104t:178_8: evaṃ vuttaṃ “cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha ‘attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenā’ti idha
tika-s0104t:178_9: vuttaṃ attanā – saddamānetvā ‘cīvare attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenā’ti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:179: Yassa yena hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhampi ca tassa taṃ;
tika-s0104t:181_0: Atha vā bhagavatā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena bhagavatā anuggahitoti yojanīyaṃ. Ekassāpi
tika-s0104t:181_2: sādhāraṇo, tādiso paribhogoti sādhāraṇaparibhogo, tena. Sādhāraṇaparibhogena ca samasamaṭṭhapanena
tika-s0104t:183_0: “Ahaṃ bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ
tika-s0104t:183_1: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi, kassapopi bhikkhave
tika-s0104t:183_2: yāvade ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ
tika-s0104t:183_3: vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādinā –
tika-s0104t:184_1: bhagavatā vuttaṃ kassapasaṃyutte āgataṃ pāḷimimaṃ peyyālamukhena, ādiggahaṇena ca
tika-s0104t:185_0: Tattha yāvadeti yāvadeva, yattakaṃ kālaṃ ākaṅkhāmi, tattakaṃ kālaṃ viharāmīti attho.
tika-s0104t:185_1: Tatoyeva hi majjhimagaṇṭhipade, cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca “yāvadeti yāvadevāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti
tika-s0104t:185_2: likhitaṃ. Saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyampi “yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmī”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0104t:185_3: Tathā hi tattha līnatthapakāsaniyaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena “yāvadevāti iminā samānatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:185_4: ‘yāvade’ti idaṃ pada”nti vuttaṃ. Potthakesu pana katthaci “yāvadevā”ti ayameva pāṭho
tika-s0104t:185_5: dissati. Api ca yāvadeti yattakaṃ samāpattivihāraṃ viharituṃ ākaṅkhāmi, tattakaṃ
tika-s0104t:185_6: samāpattivihāraṃ viharāmīti samāpattiṭṭhāne, yattakaṃ abhiññāvohāraṃ voharituṃ ākaṅkhāmi,
tika-s0104t:185_7: tattakaṃ abhiññāvohāraṃ voharāmīti abhiññāṭhāne ca saha pāṭhasesena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:185_9: abhiññāvohāre vā ākaṅkhanto vihārāmi ceva voharāmi ca, tathā kassapopīti attho”ti
tika-s0104t:185_10: vuttaṃ. Apare pana “yāvadeti ‘yaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ākaṅkhāmi, taṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja
tika-s0104t:185_11: vihārāmī’tiādinā samāpattiṭṭhāne, iddhividhābhiññāṭhāne ca ajjhāharitassa ta-saddassa
tika-s0104t:185_12: kammavasena ‘yaṃ dibbasotaṃ ākaṅkhāmi, tena dibbasotena sadde suṇāmī’tiādinā sesābhiññāṭhāne
tika-s0104t:185_13: karaṇavasena yojanā vattabbā”ti vadanti. Vivicceva kāmehīti ettha eva-saddo niyamattho,
tika-s0104t:185_14: ubhayattha yojetabbo. Yamettha vattabbaṃ, tadupari āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0104t:186_1: samāpajjitabbattā evaṃsaññitā nirodhasamāpattiyā saha aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Chaḷabhiññā
tika-s0104t:186_2: nāma āsavakkhayañāṇena saha pañcābhiññāyo. Katthaci potthake cettha ādisaddo dissati.
tika-s0104t:186_3: So anadhippeto yathāvuttāya pāḷiyā gahetabbassa atthassa anavasesattā. Manussesu,
tika-s0104t:186_4: manussānaṃ vā uttaribhūtānaṃ, uttarīnaṃ vā manussānaṃ jhāyīnañceva ariyānañca dhammoti
tika-s0104t:186_5: uttarimanussadhammo, manussadhammā vā uttarīti uttarimanussadhammo. Dasa kusalakammapathā
tika-s0104t:186_6: cettha vinā bhāvanāmanasikārena pakatiyāva manussehi nibbattetabbato, manussattabhāvāvahanato
tika-s0104t:186_7: ca manussadhammo nāma, tato uttari pana jhānādi uttarimanussadhammoti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:186_8: Samasamaṭṭhapanenāti “ahaṃ yattakaṃ kālaṃ, yattake vā samāpattivihāre, yattakā abhiññāyo
tika-s0104t:186_9: ca vaḷañjemi, tathā kassapopī”ti evaṃ samasamaṃ katvā ṭhapanena. Anekaṭṭhānesu ṭhapanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:186_10: kassacipi uttarimanussadhammassa asesabhāvena ekantasamaṭṭhapanaṃ vā sandhāya “samasamaṭṭhapanenā”ti
tika-s0104t:186_12: Na hi āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavā viya devasikaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā
tika-s0104t:186_13: samāpattiyo samāpajjati, yamakapāṭihāriyādivasena ca abhiññāyo vaḷañjetīti. Ettha
tika-s0104t:186_14: ca uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenā”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi –
tika-s0104t:187: “Ovada kassapa bhikkhū, karohi kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ, ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ, tvaṃ vā. Ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ, tvaṃ vā”ti –
tika-s0104t:189_0: Tathāti rūpūpasaṃhāro yathā anuggahito, tathā pasaṃsitoti. Ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvāti
tika-s0104t:189_1: bhagavatā attanoyeva pāṇiṃ ākāse cāletvā kulesu alaggacittatāya ceva karaṇabhūtāya
tika-s0104t:189_2: pasaṃsitoti sambandho. Alaggacittatāyāti vā ādhāre bhummaṃ, ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā kulūpakassa
tika-s0104t:189_3: bhikkhuno alaggacittatāya kulesu alagganacittena bhavituṃ yuttatāya ceva maññeva
tika-s0104t:190_0: “Atha kho bhagavā ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesi seyyathāpi bhikkhave, ayaṃ ākāse pāṇi na sajjati
tika-s0104t:190_1: na gayhati na bajjhati, evameva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kulāni upasaṅkamato
tika-s0104t:190_2: kulesu cittaṃ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati ‘labhantu lābhakāmā, puññakāmā karontu
tika-s0104t:190_3: puññānī’ti. Yathā sakena lābhena attamano hoti sumano, evaṃ paresaṃ lābhena attamano
tika-s0104t:190_4: hoti sumano. Evarūpo kho bhikkhave bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṃ. Kassapassa
tika-s0104t:190_5: bhikkhave kulāni upasaṅkamato kulesu cittaṃ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati ‘labhantu
tika-s0104t:190_6: lābhakāmā, puññakāmā karontu puññānī’ti. Yathā sakena lābhena attamano hoti sumano,
tika-s0104t:190_7: evaṃ paresaṃ lābhena attamano hoti sumano”ti.
tika-s0104t:191_0: Tattha ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesīti nīle gaganantare yamakavijjukaṃ sañcālayamāno viya heṭṭhābhāge,
tika-s0104t:191_1: uparibhāge, ubhato ca passesu pāṇiṃ sañcālesi, idañca pana tepiṭake buddhavacane
tika-s0104t:191_2: asambhinnapadaṃ nāma. Attamanoti sakamano, na domanassena pacchinditvā gahitamano.
tika-s0104t:191_3: Sumanoti tuṭṭhamano, idāni yo hīnādhimuttiko micchāpaṭipanno evaṃ vadeyya “sammāsambuddho
tika-s0104t:191_4: ‘alaggacittatāya ākāse cālitapāṇūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamathā’ti vadanto aṭṭhāne ṭhapeti,
tika-s0104t:191_5: asayhabhāraṃ āropeti, yaṃ na sakkā kātuṃ, taṃ kārehī”ti, tassa vādapathaṃ pacchinditvā
tika-s0104t:191_6: “sakkā ca kho evaṃ kātuṃ, atthi evarūpo bhikkhū”ti āyasmantaṃ mahākassapattherameva
tika-s0104t:192: Aññampi pasaṃsanamāha “candopamapaṭipadāya cā”ti, candapaṭibhāgāya paṭipadāya ca karaṇabhūtāya pasaṃsito, tassaṃ vā ādhārabhūtāya maññeva sakkhiṃ katvā pasaṃsitoti attho. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:193_0: “Candūpamā bhikkhave kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā
tika-s0104t:193_1: kulesu appagabbhā. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso jarudapānaṃ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṃ
tika-s0104t:193_2: vā nadīviduggaṃ vā apakasseva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ, evameva kho bhikkhave candūpamā
tika-s0104t:193_3: kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā.
tika-s0104t:193_4: Kassapo bhikkhave candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati apakasseva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ
tika-s0104t:194_0: Tattha candūpamāti candasadisā hutvā. Kiṃ parimaṇḍalatāya sadisāti? No, apica kho
tika-s0104t:194_1: yathā cando gaganatalaṃ pakkhandamāno na kenaci saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā sinehaṃ vā ālayaṃ
tika-s0104t:194_2: vā nikantiṃ vā patthanaṃ vā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vā karoti, na ca na hoti mahājanassa piyo
tika-s0104t:194_3: manāpo, tumhepi evaṃ kenaci saddhiṃ santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena bahujanassa piyā manāpā
tika-s0104t:194_4: candūpamā hutvā khattiyakulādīni cattāri kulāni upasaṅkamathāti attho. Apica yathā
tika-s0104t:194_5: cando andhakāraṃ vidhamati, ālokaṃ pharati, evaṃ kilesandhakāravidhamanena, ñāṇālokapharaṇena
tika-s0104t:194_6: ca candūpamā hutvāti evamādīhipi nayehi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:195_0: Apakasseva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittanti teneva santhavādīnamakaraṇena kāyañca cittañca
tika-s0104t:195_1: apakassitvā, akaḍḍhitvā apanetvāti attho. Niccanavakāti niccaṃ navikāva, āgantukasadisā
tika-s0104t:195_2: eva hutvāti attho. Āgantuko hi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagehaṃ pavisitvā sace naṃ gharasāmikā
tika-s0104t:195_3: disvā “amhākaṃ puttabhātaropi vippavāsagatā evaṃ vicariṃsū”ti anukampamānā nisīdāpetvā
tika-s0104t:195_4: bhojenti, bhuttamattoyeva “tumhākaṃ bhājanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti uṭṭhāya pakkamati, na tehi
tika-s0104t:195_5: saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā karoti, kiccakaraṇīyāni vā saṃvidahati, evaṃ tumhepi paṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0104t:195_6: sampattagharaṃ pavisitvā yaṃ iriyāpathesu pasannā manussā denti, taṃ gahetvā pacchinnasanthavā
tika-s0104t:195_7: tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīye abyāvaṭā hutvā nikkhamathāti dīpeti. Appagabbhāti na pagabbhā,
tika-s0104t:195_8: aṭṭhaṭṭhānena kāyapāgabbhiyena, catuṭṭhānena vacīpāgabbhiyena, anekaṭṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena
tika-s0104t:196_0: Jarudapānanti jiṇṇakūpaṃ. Pabbatavisamanti pabbate visamaṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ. Nadīvidugganti
tika-s0104t:196_1: nadiyā viduggaṃ chinnataṭaṭṭhānaṃ. Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – jarudapānādayo
tika-s0104t:196_2: viya hi cattāri kulāni, olokanapuriso viya bhikkhu, yathā pana anapakaṭṭhakāyacitto
tika-s0104t:196_3: tāni olokento puriso tattha patati, evaṃ arakkhitehi kāyādīhi kulāni upasaṅkamanto
tika-s0104t:196_4: bhikkhu kulesu bajjhati, tato nānappakāraṃ sīlapādabhañjanādikaṃ anatthaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0104t:196_5: Yathā pana apakaṭṭhakāyacitto puriso tattha na patati, evaṃ rakkhiteneva kāyena,
tika-s0104t:196_6: rakkhitāya vācāya, rakkhitehi cittehi, sūpaṭṭhitāya satiyā apakaṭṭhakāyacitto hutvā
tika-s0104t:196_7: kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu na bajjhati, athassa sīlasaddhāsamādhipaññāsaṅkhātāni
tika-s0104t:196_8: pādahatthakucchisīsāni na bhañjanti, rāgakaṇṭakādayo na vijjhanti, sukhito yenakāmaṃ
tika-s0104t:196_9: agatapubbaṃ nibbānadisaṃ gacchati, evarūpo ayaṃ mahākassapoti hīnādhimuttikassa micchāpaṭipannassa
tika-s0104t:196_10: vādapathapacchindanatthaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ eva sakkhiṃ katvā dassento “kassapo
tika-s0104t:196_12: karaṇabhūtāya pasaṃsito, tassaṃ vā ādhārabhūtāya maññeva sakkhiṃ katvā pasaṃsitoti,
tika-s0104t:196_13: evaṃ sati ceva-saddo, ca-saddo ca na payujjitabbo dvinnaṃ padānaṃ tulyādhikaraṇattā,
tika-s0104t:196_14: ayameva attho pāṭho ca yuttataro viya dissati parinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ “ākāse pāṇiṃ
tika-s0104t:196_15: cāletvā candūpamaṃ paṭipadaṃ kathento maṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā kathesī”ti vuttattāti.
tika-s0104t:197_0: Tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati, aññatra dhammavinayasaṅgāyanāti adhippāyo. Tattha
tika-s0104t:197_1: tassāti yaṃ-saddassa kāraṇanidassane “tasmā”ti ajjhāharitvā tassa meti attho, kiriyāparāmasane
tika-s0104t:197_2: pana tassa anuggahaṇassa, pasaṃsanassa cāti. Potthakesupi katthaci “tassa me”ti pāṭho
tika-s0104t:197_3: dissati, evaṃ sati kiriyāparāmasane “tassā”ti aparaṃ padamajjhāharitabbaṃ. Natthi
tika-s0104t:197_4: iṇaṃ yassāti aṇaṇo, tassa bhāvo āṇaṇyaṃ. Dhammavinayasaṅgāyanaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kiṃ
tika-s0104t:197_5: nāma tassa iṇavirahitattaṃ bhavissati, na bhavissati evāti attho. “Nanu maṃ bhagavā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:197_6: vuttamevatthaṃ upamāvasena vibhāveti. Sakakavacaissariyānuppadānenāti ettha kavaco
tika-s0104t:197_7: nāma uracchado, yena uro chādīyate, tassa ca cīvaranidassanena gahaṇaṃ, issariyassa
tika-s0104t:197_10: samāso. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sattusaṅghanimmaddanena attano kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:197_11: sakakavacaissariyānuppadānena kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ rājā viya bhagavāpi
tika-s0104t:197_12: maṃ dīghadassī “saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako me ayaṃ bhavissatī”ti mantvā sāsanapaccatthikagaṇanimmaddanena
tika-s0104t:197_14: anuggahesi nanu, imāya ca uḷārāya pasaṃsāya pasaṃsi nanūti. Iti cintayantoti ettha
tika-s0104t:197_15: itisaddena “antaradhāpeyyuṃ, saṅgāyeyyaṃ, kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissatī”ti vacanapubbaṅgamaṃ,
tika-s0104t:198_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ saṅgītikkhandhakapāḷiyā sādhento āha “yathāhā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-s0104t:198_1: yathāhāti kiṃ āha, mayā vuttassa atthassa sādhakaṃ kiṃ āhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā vā
tika-s0104t:198_2: yena pakārena mayā vuttaṃ, tathā tena pakārena pāḷiyampi āhāti attho. Yathā vā yaṃ
tika-s0104t:198_3: vacanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āha, tathā tena vacanena mayā vuttavacanaṃ saṃsandati ceva sameti
tika-s0104t:198_4: ca yathā taṃ gaṅgodakena yamunodakantipi vattabbo pāḷiyā sādhanatthaṃ udāharitabhāvassa
tika-s0104t:198_5: paccakkhato viññāyamānattā, viññāyamānatthassa ca saddassa payoge kāmācārattā. Adhippāyavibhāvanatthā
tika-s0104t:198_6: hi atthayojanā. Yathā vā yena pakārena dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ
tika-s0104t:198_7: janesi, tathā tena pakārena pāḷiyampi āhāti attho. Evamīdisesu.
tika-s0104t:199_0: Ekamidāhanti ettha idanti nipātamattaṃ. Ekaṃ samayanti ca bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:199_1: ekasmiṃ samayeti attho. Pāvāyāti pāvānagarato, tattha piṇḍāya caritvā “kusināraṃ
tika-s0104t:199_2: gamissāmī”ti addhānamaggappaṭipannoti vuttaṃ hoti. Addhānamaggoti ca dīghamaggo vuccati,
tika-s0104t:199_3: dīghapariyāyo hettha addhānasaddo. Mahatāti guṇamahattenapi saṅkhyāmahattenapi mahatā.
tika-s0104t:199_6: sādhanatthaṃ āhatā “atha kho”tiādikā pāḷi yathāvuttamatthaṃ na sādheti. Na hettha
tika-s0104t:199_7: ussāhajananappakāro āgatoti codanaṃ pariharitumāha “sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato
tika-s0104t:199_8: veditabba”nti. Evampesā codanā tadavatthāyevāti vuttaṃ “tato paraṃ āhā”tiādi. Apica
tika-s0104t:199_9: yathāvuttatthasādhikā pāḷi mahatarāti ganthagarutāpariharaṇatthaṃ majjhe peyyālamukhena
tika-s0104t:199_10: ādiantameva pāḷiṃ dassento “sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabba”nti āha. Tena
tika-s0104t:199_11: hi “atha khvāhaṃ āvuso maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdī”ti vuttapāḷito
tika-s0104t:199_12: paṭṭhāya “yaṃ na icchissāma, na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttapāḷipariyosānaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:200_0: “Tato para”ntiādinā pana tadavasesaṃ “handa mayaṃ āvuso”tiādikaṃ ussāhajananappakāradassanapāḷiṃ.
tika-s0104t:200_1: Tasmā tato paraṃ āhāti ettha subhaddakaṇḍato paraṃ ussāhajananappakāradassanavacanamāhāti
tika-s0104t:200_2: attho veditabbo. Mahāgaṇṭhipadepi hi soyevattho vutto. Ācariyasāriputtattherenāpi
tika-s0104t:200_3: tatheva adhippeto. Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “tato paranti tato bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananato
tika-s0104t:200_4: parato”ti vuttaṃ, tadetaṃ vicāretabbaṃ heṭṭhā ussāhajananappakārassa pāḷiyaṃ avuttattā.
tika-s0104t:200_5: Ayameva hi ussāhajananappakāro yadidaṃ “handa mayaṃ āvuso dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
tika-s0104t:200_6: pure adhammo dippatī”tiādi. Yadi pana subhaddakaṇḍameva ussāhajananahetubhūtassa
tika-s0104t:200_7: subhaddena vuttavacanassa pakāsanattā ussāhajanananti vadeyya, natthevettha vicāretabbatāti.
tika-s0104t:200_8: Pure adhammo dippatīti ettha adhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathapaṭipakkhabhūto adhammo.
tika-s0104t:200_10: sambhavati, “adhammavādino balavanto honti, dhammavādino dubbalā hontī”ti vuttattā
tika-s0104t:200_11: sīlavipattiādihetuko pāpicchatādidosagaṇo adhammotipi vadanti. Pure dippatīti api
tika-s0104t:200_12: nāma dippati. Saṃsayatthe hi pure-saddo. Atha vā yāva adhammo dhammaṃ paṭibāhituṃ
tika-s0104t:200_13: samattho hoti, tato puretaramevāti attho. Āsanne hi anadhippete ayaṃ pure-saddo.
tika-s0104t:200_14: Dippatīti dippissati, pure-saddayogena hi anāgatatthe ayaṃ vattamānapayogo yathā
tika-s0104t:204: Lacchāyamapi kiṃ vutte, vattamānā bhavissatī”ti ca.
tika-s0104t:205_0: Keci panettha evaṃ vaṇṇayanti – pureti pacchā anāgate, yathā addhānaṃ gacchantassa
tika-s0104t:205_1: gantabbamaggo “pure”ti vuccati, tathā idhāpi maggagamananayena anāgatakālo “pure”ti
tika-s0104t:205_2: vuccatīti. Evaṃ sati taṃkālāpekkhāya cettha vattamānapayogo sambhavati. Dhammo paṭibāhiyyatīti
tika-s0104t:205_3: etthāpi pure-saddena yojetvā vuttanayena attho veditabbo, tathā dhammopi adhammaviparītavasena,
tika-s0104t:205_4: ito parampi eseva nayo. Avinayoti pahānavinayasaṃvaravinayānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūto avinayo.
tika-s0104t:205_5: Vinayavādino dubbalā hontīti evaṃ iti-saddena pāṭho, so “tato paraṃ āhā”ti ettha
tika-s0104t:206_0: Tena hīti uyyojanatthe nipāto. Uccinane uyyojentā hi mahākassapattheraṃ evamāhaṃsu
tika-s0104t:206_1: “bhikkhū uccinatū”ti, saṅgītiyā anurūpe bhikkhū uccinitvā upadhāretvā gaṇhātūti attho.
tika-s0104t:206_3: satipi āgamādhigamasambhave saha paṭisambhidāhi pana tevijjādiguṇayuttānaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiyā
tika-s0104t:206_4: ukkaṃsagatattā saṅgītiyā bahūpakārataṃ dasseti. Sakalaṃ suttageyyādikaṃ navaṅgaṃ
tika-s0104t:206_5: ettha, etassāti vā sakalanavaṅgaṃ, satthu bhagavato sāsanaṃ satthusāsanaṃ sāsīyati
tika-s0104t:206_6: etenāti katvā, tadeva satthusāsananti sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanaṃ. Nava vā suttageyyādīni
tika-s0104t:206_7: aṅgāni ettha, etassāti vā navaṅgaṃ, tameva satthusāsanaṃ, tañca sakalameva, na ekadesanti
tika-s0104t:206_8: tathā. Atthakāmena pariyāpuṇitabbā sikkhitabbā, diṭṭhadhammikādipurisatthaṃ vā nipphādetuṃ
tika-s0104t:206_9: pariyattā samatthāti pariyatti, tīṇi piṭakāni, sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanasaṅkhātā
tika-s0104t:206_10: pariyatti, taṃ dhārentīti tathā, tādiseti attho. Puthujjana…pe… sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavabhikkhūti ettha –
tika-s0104t:209_0: Vuttesu kalyāṇaputhujjanāva adhippetā saddantarasannidhānenapi atthavisesassa viññātabbattā.
tika-s0104t:209_1: Samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena sukkhā lūkhā asiniddhā vipassanā etesanti sukkhavipassakā,
tika-s0104t:209_2: teyeva khīṇāsavāti tathā. “Bhikkhū”ti pana sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0104t:212_0: Tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhareti ettha tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ samāhāro tipiṭakaṃ,
tika-s0104t:212_1: taṃsaṅkhātaṃ navaṅgādivasena anekabhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ pariyattippabhedaṃ dhārentīti
tika-s0104t:212_2: tathā, tādise. Anu anu taṃ samaṅginaṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti anubhāvo, soyeva ānubhāvo,
tika-s0104t:212_3: pabhāvo, mahanto ānubhāvo yesaṃ te mahānubhāvā. “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave”ti bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:212_4: vuttavacanamupādāya pavattattā “etadagga”nti padaṃ anukaraṇajanāmaṃ nāma yathā “yevāpanaka”nti,
tika-s0104t:212_5: tabbasena vuttaṭṭhānantaramidha etadaggaṃ, tamāropiteti attho. Etadaggaṃ eso bhikkhu
tika-s0104t:212_6: aggoti vā āropitepi vaṭṭati. Tadanāropitāpi avasesaguṇasampannattā uccinitā tattha
tika-s0104t:212_7: santīti dassetuṃ “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṃ. Tisso vijjā tevijjā, tā ādi yesaṃ chaḷabhiññādīnanti
tika-s0104t:212_8: tevijjādayo, te bhedā anekappakārā yesanti tevijjādibhedā. Atha vā tisso vijjā assa
tika-s0104t:212_9: khīṇāsavassāti tevijjo, so ādi yesaṃ chaḷabhiññādīnanti tevijjādayo, teyeva bhedā
tika-s0104t:212_11: vuttaṃ hoti. Ye sandhāya vuttanti ye bhikkhū sandhāya idaṃ “atha kho”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:212_12: saṅgītikkhandhake vuttaṃ. Iminā kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ avisesatova vuttaṃ, tathāpi visesena
tika-s0104t:212_13: yathāvuttakhīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva sandhāya vuttanti pāḷiyā saṃsandanaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t:213_0: Nanu ca sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidharā khīṇāsavā anekasatā, anekasahassā
tika-s0104t:213_1: ca, kasmā thero ekenūnamakāsīti codanaṃ uddharitvā visesakāraṇadassanena taṃ pariharituṃ
tika-s0104t:213_2: “kissa panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kissāti kasmā. Pakkhantarajotako pana-saddo. Okāsakaraṇatthanti
tika-s0104t:213_3: okāsakaraṇanimittaṃ okāsakaraṇahetu. Attha-saddo hi “chaṇatthañca nagarato nikkhamitvā
tika-s0104t:213_4: missakapabbataṃ abhiruhatū”tiādīsu viya kāraṇavacano, “kissa hetū”tiādīsu viya ca
tika-s0104t:213_5: hetvatthe paccattavacanaṃ. Tathā hi vaṇṇayanti “chaṇatthanti chaṇanimittaṃ chaṇahetūti
tika-s0104t:213_6: attho”ti. Evañca sati pucchāsabhāgatāvissajjanāya hoti, esa nayo īdisesu.
tika-s0104t:214_0: Kasmā panassa okāsamakāsīti āha “tenā”tiādi. Hi-saddo kāraṇatthe. “So hāyasmā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:214_1: “sahāpi vināpi na sakkā”ti vuttavacane paccekaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Keci pana “tamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:214_4: hi nipātāti, evamīdisesu. Sikkhatīti sekkho, sikkhanaṃ vā sikkhā, sāyeva tassa sīlanti
tika-s0104t:214_5: sekkho. So hi apariyositasikkhattā, tadadhimuttattā ca ekantena sikkhanasīlo, na
tika-s0104t:214_6: asekkho viya pariniṭṭhitasikkho tattha paṭippassaddhussāho, nāpi vissaṭṭhasikkho
tika-s0104t:214_7: pacurajano viya tattha anadhimutto, kitavasena viya ca taddhitavasenidha tappakatiyattho
tika-s0104t:214_8: gayhati yathā “kāruṇiko”ti. Atha vā ariyāya jātiyā tīsupi sikkhāsu jāto, tattha vā
tika-s0104t:214_9: bhavoti sekkho. Apica ikkhati etāyāti ikkhā, maggaphalasammādiṭṭhi, saha ikkhāyāti
tika-s0104t:214_10: sekkho. Uparimaggattayakiccassa apariyositattā saha karaṇīyenāti sakaraṇīyo. Assāti
tika-s0104t:214_11: anena, “appaccakkhaṃ nāmā”ti etena sambandho. Assāti vā “natthī”ti ettha kiriyāpaṭiggahakavacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:214_12: Paguṇappavattibhāvato appaccakkhaṃ nāma natthi. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “asammukhā
tika-s0104t:214_13: paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ” dve sahassāni bhikkhuto”ti vuttampi bhagavato
tika-s0104t:214_14: santike paṭiggahitameva nāmāti katvā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi sāvakabhāsitampi suttaṃ “buddhabhāsita”nti vuccatīti.
tika-s0104t:215_0: “Yathāhā”tiādinā āyasmatā ānandena vuttagāthameva sādhakabhāvena dasseti. Ayañhi
tika-s0104t:215_1: gāthā gopakamoggallānena nāma brāhmaṇena “buddhasāsane tvaṃ bahussutoti pākaṭo, kittakā
tika-s0104t:215_2: dhammā te satthārā bhāsitā, tayā ca dhāritā”ti pucchitena tassa paṭivacanaṃ dentena
tika-s0104t:215_3: āyasmatā ānandeneva gopakamoggallānasutte, attano guṇadassanavasena vā theragāthāyampi
tika-s0104t:215_4: bhāsitā. Tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – buddhato satthu santikā dvāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni
tika-s0104t:215_5: ahaṃ gaṇhiṃ adhigaṇhiṃ, dve dhammakkhandhasahassāni bhikkhuto dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:215_6: bhikkhūnaṃ santikā gaṇhiṃ. Ye dhammā me jivhāgge, hadaye vā pavattino paguṇā vācuggatā,
tika-s0104t:215_7: te dhammā tadubhayaṃ sampiṇḍetvā caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti. Keci pana
tika-s0104t:215_8: “yemeti ettha ‘ye ime’ti padacchedaṃ katvā ye ime dhammā buddhassa, bhikkhūnañca
tika-s0104t:215_9: pavattino pavattitā, tesu dhammesu buddhato dvāsīti sahassāni ahaṃ gaṇhiṃ, dve sahassāni
tika-s0104t:215_10: bhikkhuto gaṇhiṃ, evaṃ caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti sambandhaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0104t:215_11: ayañca sambandho “ettakāyeva dhammakkhandhā”ti sanniṭṭhānassa aviññāyamānattā kecivādo nāma kato.
tika-s0104t:216_0: “Sahāpi na sakkā”ti vattabbahetuto “vināpi na sakkā”ti vattabbahetuyeva balavataro
tika-s0104t:216_1: saṅgītiyā bahukārattā. Tasmā tattha codanaṃ dassetvā pariharituṃ “yadi eva”ntiādi
tika-s0104t:216_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha yadi evanti evaṃ vinā yadi na sakkā, tathā satīti attho. Sekkhopi
tika-s0104t:216_3: samānoti sekkhapuggalo samānopi. Māna-saddo hettha lakkhaṇe. Bahukārattāti bahūpakārattā.
tika-s0104t:216_4: Upakāravacano hi kāra-saddo “appakampi kataṃ kāraṃ, puññaṃ hoti mahapphala”ntiādīsu
tika-s0104t:216_5: viya. Assāti bhaveyya. Atha-saddo pucchāyaṃ. Pañhe “atha tvaṃ kena vaṇṇenā”ti hi
tika-s0104t:216_6: payogamudāharanti. “Evaṃ sante”ti pana attho vattabbo. Parūpavādavivajjanatoti yathāvuttakāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:216_7: ajānantānaṃ paresaṃ āropitaupavādato vivajjitukāmattā. Taṃ vivarati “thero hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:216_8: Ativiya vissatthoti atirekaṃ vissāsiko. Kena viññāyatīti āha “tathā hī”tiādi. Daḷhīkaraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:216_9: vā etaṃ vacanaṃ. “Vuttañhi, tathā hi iccete daḷhīkaraṇatthe”ti hi vadanti saddavidū.
tika-s0104t:216_10: Nanti ānandattheraṃ. “Ovadatī”ti iminā sambandho. Ānandattherassa yebhuyyena navakāya
tika-s0104t:216_11: parisāya vibbhamane mahākassapatthero “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti āha. Tathā
tika-s0104t:216_12: hi parinibbute bhagavati mahākassapatthero bhagavato parinibbāne sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-s0104t:216_13: majjhe nisīditvā dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ pañcasate bhikkhū uccinitvā “rājagahe
tika-s0104t:216_14: āvuso vassaṃ vasantā dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyissāma, tumhe pure vassūpanāyikāya attano
tika-s0104t:216_15: attano palibodhaṃ pacchinditvā rājagahe sannipatathā”ti vatvā attanā rājagahaṃ gato.
tika-s0104t:217_0: Ānandattheropi bhagavato pattacīvaramādāya mahājanaṃ saññāpento sāvatthiṃ gantvā
tika-s0104t:217_1: tato nikkhamma rājagahaṃ gacchanto dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ cārikaṃ cari. Tasmiṃ samaye ānandattherassa
tika-s0104t:217_2: tiṃsamattā saddhivihārikā yebhuyyena kumārakā ekavassikaduvassikabhikkhū ceva anupasampannā
tika-s0104t:217_3: ca vibbhamiṃsu. Kasmā panete pabbajitā, kasmā ca vibbhamiṃsūti? Tesaṃ kira mātāpitaro
tika-s0104t:217_4: cintesuṃ “ānandatthero satthuvissāsiko aṭṭha vare yācitvā upaṭṭhahati, icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:217_5: satthāraṃ gahetvā gantuṃ sakkoti, amhākaṃ dārake etassa santike pabbajeyyāma, evaṃ
tika-s0104t:217_6: so satthāraṃ gahetvā āgamissati, tasmiṃ āgate mayaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ kātuṃ labhissāmā”ti.
tika-s0104t:217_7: Iminā tāva kāraṇena nesaṃ ñātakā te pabbājesuṃ, satthari pana parinibbute tesaṃ sā
tika-s0104t:217_8: patthanā upacchinnā, atha ne ekadivaseneva uppabbājesuṃ. Atha ānandattheraṃ dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ
tika-s0104t:217_9: cārikaṃ caritvā rājagahamāgataṃ disvā mahākassapatthero evamāhāti. Vuttañhetaṃ kassapasaṃyutte –
tika-s0104t:218_0: “Atha kiñcarahi tvaṃ āvuso ānanda imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi
tika-s0104t:218_1: bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carasi, sassaghātaṃ maññe
tika-s0104t:218_2: carasi, kulūpaghātaṃ maññe carasi, olujjati kho te āvuso ānanda parisā, palujjanti
tika-s0104t:218_3: kho te āvuso navappāyā, na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti.
tika-s0104t:219_0: Api me bhante kassapa sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni, atha ca pana mayaṃ ajjāpi āyasmato
tika-s0104t:219_1: mahākassapassa kumārakavādā na muccāmāti. Tathā hi pana tvaṃ āvuso ānanda imehi navehi
tika-s0104t:219_2: bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0104t:219_3: cārikaṃ carasi, sassaghātaṃ maññe carasi, kulūpaghātaṃ maññe carasi, olujjati kho
tika-s0104t:219_4: te āvuso ānanda parisā, palujjanti kho te āvuso navappāyā, na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti.
tika-s0104t:220_0: Tattha sassaghātaṃ maññe carasīti sassaṃ ghātento viya āhiṇḍasi. Kulūpaghātaṃ maññe
tika-s0104t:220_1: carasīti kulāni upaghātento viya āhiṇḍasi. Olujjatīti palujjati bhijjati. Palujjanti
tika-s0104t:220_2: kho te āvuso navappāyāti āvuso ānanda ete tuyhaṃ pāyena yebhuyyena navakā ekavassikaduvassikadaharā
tika-s0104t:220_3: ceva sāmaṇerā ca palujjanti. Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano
tika-s0104t:220_4: pamāṇaṃ na vata jānātīti theraṃ tajjento āha. Kumārakavādā na muccāmāti kumārakavādato
tika-s0104t:220_5: na muccāma. Tathā hi pana tvanti idamassa evaṃ vattabbatāya kāraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:220_6: Ayañhettha adhippāyo – yasmā tvaṃ imehi navehi indriyasaṃvaravirahitehi bhojane amattaññūhi
tika-s0104t:220_7: saddhiṃ vicarasi, tasmā kumārakehi saddhiṃ vicaranto “kumārako”ti vattabbataṃ arahasīti.
tika-s0104t:221_0: Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ettha vā-saddo padapūraṇe. Vā-saddo hi upamānasamuccayasaṃsayavissaggavikappapadapūraṇādīsu
tika-s0104t:221_1: bahūsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hesa “paṇḍito vāpi tena so”tiādīsu upamāne dissati,
tika-s0104t:221_2: sadisabhāveti attho. “Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantī”tiādīsu samuccaye. “Ke vā ime
tika-s0104t:221_3: kassa vā”tiādīsu saṃsaye. “Ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:221_4: vavassagge. “Ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā”tiādīsupi vikappe. “Na vāhaṃ
tika-s0104t:221_5: paṇṇaṃ bhuñjāmi, na hetaṃ mayha bhojana”ntiādīsu padapūraṇe. Idhāpi padapūraṇe daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:221_6: Teneva ca ācariyadhammapālattherena vā-saddassa atthuddhāraṃ karontena vuttaṃ “na
tika-s0104t:221_7: vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”tiādīsu padapūraṇe”ti. Saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyampi idameva
tika-s0104t:221_8: vuttaṃ “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ na vata jānāsīti
tika-s0104t:221_9: theraṃ tajjento āhā”ti. Etthāpi “vatā”ti vacanasiliṭṭhatāya vuttaṃ. “Na vāya”nti
tika-s0104t:221_10: etassa vā “na ve aya”nti padacchedaṃ katvā ve-saddassatthaṃ dassentena “vatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:221_11: Tathā hi ve-saddassa ekaṃsatthabhāve tadeva pāḷiṃ payogaṃ katvā udāharanti neruttikā.
tika-s0104t:221_12: Vajirabuddhitthero pana evaṃ vadati “na vāyanti ettha ca vāti vibhāsā, aññāsipi na
tika-s0104t:221_13: aññāsipī”ti, taṃ tassa matimattaṃ saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāya tathā avuttattā. Idamekaṃ parūpavādasambhavakāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:222_0: Aññampi kāraṇamāha “sakyakulappasuto cāyasmā”ti. Sākiyakule jāto, sākiyakulabhāvena
tika-s0104t:222_1: vā pākaṭo ca āyasmā ānando. Tattha…pe… upavadeyyunti sambandho. Aññampi kāraṇaṃ vadati
tika-s0104t:222_2: “tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapituputto”ti. Bhātāti cettha kaniṭṭhabhātā cūḷapituputtabhāvena,
tika-s0104t:224: Amitā pālitā cāti, ime pañca imā duve”ti.
tika-s0104t:225: Vuttesu hi sabbakaniṭṭhassa amitodanasakkassa putto āyasmā ānando. Vuttañhi manorathapūraṇiyaṃ –
tika-s0104t:226_0: “Kappasatasahassaṃ pana dānaṃ dadamāno amhākaṃ bodhisattena saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā
tika-s0104t:226_1: tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe nibbatti, athassa sabbe ñātake ānandite pamodite
tika-s0104t:228_0: “Aññe pana vadanti – nāyasmā ānando bhagavatā sahajāto, vayasā ca cūḷapituputtatāya
tika-s0104t:228_1: ca bhagavato kaniṭṭhabhātāyeva. Tathā hi manorathapūraṇiyaṃ ekanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ sahajātagaṇane so na vuto”ti.
tika-s0104t:229_0: Yaṃ vuccati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ vissatthādibhāve sati. Ativissatthasakyakulappasutatathāgatabhātubhāvatoti
tika-s0104t:229_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe hi katthaci hetvattho sampajjati. Tathā hi ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-s0104t:230: “Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchantīti sabbā tā gāviyo kuṭilameva gacchanti, kasmā? Nette jimhagate sati nette kuṭilaṃ gate sati, nettassa kuṭilaṃ gatattāti attho”ti.
tika-s0104t:231_0: Udānaṭṭhakathāyampi “iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti suttapadavaṇṇanāyaṃ “hetuatthatā
tika-s0104t:231_1: bhummavacanassa kāraṇassa bhāvena tadavinābhāvī phalassa bhāvo lakkhīyatīti veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0104t:231_2: Tatthāti vā nimittabhūte vissatthādimhīti attho, tasmiṃ uccinanetipi vadanti. Chandāgamanaṃ
tika-s0104t:231_3: viyāti ettha chandā āgamanaṃ viyāti padacchedo. Chandāti ca hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:231_4: chandena āgamanaṃ pavattanaṃ viyāti attho, chandena akattabbakaraṇamivāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:231_5: hoti, chandaṃ vā āgacchati sampayogavasenāti chandāgamanaṃ, tathā pavatto apāyagamanīyo
tika-s0104t:231_6: akusalacittuppādo. Atha vā ananurūpaṃ gamanaṃ agamanaṃ. Chandena agamanaṃ chandāgamanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:231_7: chandena sinehena ananurūpaṃ gamanaṃ pavattanaṃ viya akattabbakaraṇaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:231_8: hoti. Asekkhabhūtā paṭisambhidā, taṃpattāti tathā, asekkhā ca te paṭisambhidāppattā
tika-s0104t:231_9: cāti vā tathā, tādise. Sekkhapaṭisambhidāppattanti etthāpi esa nayo. Parivajjentoti
tika-s0104t:231_10: hetvatthe antasaddo, parivajjanahetūti attho. Anumatiyāti anuññāya, yācanāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:232_0: “Kiñcāpi sekkho”ti idaṃ asekkhānaṃyeva uccinitattā vuttaṃ, na sekkhānaṃ agatigamanasambhavena.
tika-s0104t:232_1: Paṭhamamaggeneva hi cattāri agatigamanāni pahīyanti, tasmā kiñcāpi sekkho, tathāpi
tika-s0104t:232_2: thero āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ uccinatūti sambandho. Na pana kiñcāpi sekkho, tathāpi abhabbo
tika-s0104t:232_3: agatiṃ gantunti. “Abhabbo”tiādinā pana dhammasaṅgītiyā tassa arahabhāvaṃ dassento
tika-s0104t:232_4: vijjamānaguṇe katheti, tena saṅgītiyā dhammavinayavinicchaye sampatte chandādivasena
tika-s0104t:232_5: aññathā akathetvā yathābhūtameva kathessatīti dasseti. Na gantabbā, ananurūpā vā
tika-s0104t:232_6: gatīti agati, taṃ. Pariyattoti adhigato uggahito.
tika-s0104t:233: “Eva”ntiādinā sanniṭṭhānagaṇanaṃ dasseti. Uccinitenāti uccinitvā gahitena. Apica evaṃ…pe… uccinīti nigamanaṃ, “tenāyasmatā”tiādi pana sanniṭṭhānagaṇanadassanantipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:234_0: Evaṃ saṅgāyakavicinanappakāraṃ dassetvā aññampi saṅgāyanatthaṃ desavicinanādippakāraṃ
tika-s0104t:234_1: dassento “atha kho”tiādimāha. Tattha etadahosīti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi. Nu-saddena
tika-s0104t:234_2: hi parivitakkanaṃ dasseti. Rājagahanti “rājagahasāmantaṃ gahetvā vutta”nti gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-s0104t:234_3: vadanti. Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ, so viyāti gocaro, bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0104t:234_4: caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ, mahanto so assa, etthāti vā mahāgocaraṃ. Aṭṭhārasannaṃ mahāvihārānampi
tika-s0104t:235_0: Thāvarakammanti ciraṭṭhāyikammaṃ. Visabhāgapuggalo subhaddasadiso. Ukkoṭeyyāti nivāreyya.
tika-s0104t:235_1: Iti-saddo idamatthe, iminā manasikārena hetubhūtena etadahosīti attho. Garubhāvajananatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:235_2: ñattidutiyena kammena saṅghaṃ sāvesi, na apalokanañattikammamattenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:236_0: Kadā panāyaṃ katāti āha “ayaṃ panā”tiādi. Evaṃ katabhāvo ca imāya gaṇanāya viññāyatīti
tika-s0104t:236_1: dasseti “bhagavā hī”tiādinā. Athāti anantaratthe nipāto, parinibbānantaramevāti attho.
tika-s0104t:236_2: Sattāhanti hi parinibbānadivasampi saṅgaṇhitvā vuttaṃ. Assāti bhagavato, “sarīra”nti
tika-s0104t:236_3: iminā sambandho. Saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā aniccatāpaṭisaññuttāni gītāni gāyitvā
tika-s0104t:236_4: pūjāvasena kīḷanato sundaraṃ kīḷanadivasā sādhukīḷanadivasā nāma, saparahitasādhanaṭṭhena
tika-s0104t:236_5: vā sādhūti vuttānaṃ sappurisānaṃ saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā kīḷanadivasātipi
tika-s0104t:236_6: yujjati. Imasmiñca purimasattāhe ekadeseneva sādhukīḷanamakaṃsu. Visesato pana dhātupūjādivasesuyeva.
tika-s0104t:237_0: “Ito purimesu hi dvīsu sattāhesu te bhikkhū saṅghassa ṭhānanisajjokāsaṃ karontā khādanīyaṃ
tika-s0104t:237_1: bhojanīyaṃ saṃvidahantā sādhukīḷikāya okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu, tato nesaṃ ahosi ‘imaṃ
tika-s0104t:237_2: sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷitaṃ kīḷissāma, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ amhākaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:237_3: ñatvā kocideva āgantvā dhātuyo gaṇheyya, tasmā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā kīḷissāmā’ti, tena te evamakaṃsū”ti.
tika-s0104t:238_0: Tathāpi te dhātupūjāyapi katattā dhātupūjādivasā nāma. Imeyeva visesena bhagavati
tika-s0104t:238_1: kattabbassa aññassa abhāvato ekadesena katampi sādhukīḷanaṃ upādāya “sādhukīḷanadivasā”ti
tika-s0104t:238_2: pākaṭā jātāti āha “evaṃ sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷanadivasā nāma ahesu”nti.
tika-s0104t:239_0: Citakāyāti vīsasataratanuccāya candanadārucitakāya, padhānakiccavaseneva ca sattāhaṃ
tika-s0104t:239_1: citakāyaṃ agginā jhāyīti vuttaṃ. Na hi accantasaṃyogavasena nirantaraṃ sattāhameva
tika-s0104t:239_2: agginā jhāyi tattha pacchimadivaseyeva jhāyitattā, tasmā sattāhasminti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:239_3: Purimapacchimānañhi dvinnaṃ sattāhānamantare sattāhe yattha katthacipi divase jhāyamāne
tika-s0104t:240: “Tena kho pana samayena cattāro mallapāmokkhā sīsaṃ nhātā ahatāni vatthāni nivatthā ‘mayaṃ bhagavato citakaṃ āḷimpessāmā’ti na sakkonti āḷimpetu”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:241_0: Sattipañjaraṃ katvāti sattikhaggādihatthehi purisehi mallarājūnaṃ bhagavato dhātuārakkhakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:241_1: upalakkhaṇavasenāha. Sattihatthā purisā hi sattiyo yathā “kuntā pacarantī”ti, tāhi
tika-s0104t:241_2: samantato rakkhāpanavasena pañjarapaṭibhāgattā sattipañjaraṃ. Sandhāgāraṃ nāma rājūnaṃ
tika-s0104t:241_3: ekā mahāsālā. Uyyogakālādīsu hi rājāno tattha ṭhatvā “ettakā purato gacchantu, ettakā
tika-s0104t:241_4: pacchato, ettakā ubhohi passehi, ettakā hatthīsu abhiruhantu, ettakā assesu, ettakā
tika-s0104t:241_5: rathesū”ti evaṃ sandhiṃ karonti mariyādaṃ bandhanti, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ “sandhāgāra”nti
tika-s0104t:241_6: vuccati. Apica uyyogaṭṭhānato āgantvāpi yāva gehesu allagomayaparibhaṇḍādīni karonti,
tika-s0104t:241_7: tāva dve tīṇi divasāni rājāno tattha santhambhanti vissamanti parissayaṃ vinodentītipi
tika-s0104t:241_8: sandhāgāraṃ, rājūnaṃ vā saha atthānusāsanaṃ agārantipi sandhāgāraṃ ha-kārassa dha-kāraṃ,
tika-s0104t:241_9: anusarāgamañca katvā, yasmā vā rājāno tattha sannipatitvā “imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t:241_10: imasmiṃ kāle vapitu”nti evamādinā nayena gharāvāsakiccāni sammantayanti, tasmā chinnavicchinnaṃ
tika-s0104t:241_11: gharāvāsaṃ tattha sandhārentītipi sandhāgāraṃ. Visākhapuṇṇamito paṭṭhāya yāva visākhamāsassa
tika-s0104t:241_12: amāvāsī, tāva soḷasa divasā sīhaḷavohāravasena gahitattā, jeṭṭhamūlamāsassa sukkapakkhe
tika-s0104t:241_13: ca pañca divasāti āha “iti ekavīsati divasā gatā”ti. Tattha carimadivaseyeva dhātuyo
tika-s0104t:241_14: bhājayiṃsu, tasmiṃyeva ca divase ayaṃ kammavācā katā. Tena vuttaṃ “jeṭṭhamūlasukkapakkhapañcamiya”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:241_15: Tattha jeṭṭhanakkhattaṃ vā mūlanakkhattaṃ vā tassa māsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ candena yuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:241_16: tasmā so māso “jeṭṭhamūlamāso”ti vuccati. Anācāranti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ anācāraṃ.
tika-s0104t:242_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, maṅgalasuttaṭṭhakathāyañca “sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu,
tika-s0104t:242_1: sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesu vītivattesū”ti vuttanti? Sattasu dhātupūjādivasesu gahitesu
tika-s0104t:242_2: tadavinābhāvato majjhe citakāya jhāyanasattāhampi gahitamevāti katvā visuṃ na vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:242_3: viya dissati. Yadi evaṃ kasmā “aḍḍhamāso atikkanto, diyaḍḍhamāso seso”ti ca vuttanti?
tika-s0104t:242_4: Nāyaṃ doso. Appakañhi ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hoti, tasmā appakena adhikopi
tika-s0104t:242_5: samudāyo anadhiko viya hotīti katvā aḍḍhamāsato adhikepi pañcadivase “aḍḍhamāso atikkanto”ti
tika-s0104t:242_6: vuttaṃ dvāsītikhandhakavattānaṃ katthaci “asīti khandhakavattānī”ti vacanaṃ viya,
tika-s0104t:242_7: tathā appakena ūnopi samudāyo anūno viya hotīti katvā diyaḍḍhamāsato ūnepi pañcadivase
tika-s0104t:242_8: “diyaḍḍhamāso seso”ti vuttaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ chamāsato ūnepi aḍḍhamāse
tika-s0104t:242_9: “chamāsaṃ sajjhāyo kātabbo”ti vacanaṃ viya, aññathā aṭṭhakathānaṃ aññamaññavirodho
tika-s0104t:242_10: siyā. Apica dīghabhāṇakānaṃ matena tiṇṇaṃ sattāhānaṃ vasena “ekavīsati divasā gatā”ti
tika-s0104t:242_11: idha vuttaṃ. Vinayasuttanipātakhuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāsu pana khuddakabhāṇakānaṃ matena
tika-s0104t:242_12: ekameva jhāyanadivasaṃ katvā tadavasesānaṃ dvinnaṃ sattāhānaṃ vasena “aḍḍhamāso atikkanto,
tika-s0104t:242_13: diyaḍḍhamāso seso”ti ca vuttaṃ. Paṭhamabuddhavacanādīsu viya taṃ taṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matena
tika-s0104t:242_14: aṭṭhakathāsupi vacanabhedo hotīti gahetabbaṃ. Evampettha vadanti – parinibbānadivasato
tika-s0104t:242_15: paṭṭhāya ādimhi cattāro sādhukīḷanadivasāyeva, tato paraṃ tayo sādhukīḷanadivasā
tika-s0104t:242_16: ceva citakajhāyanadivasā ca, tato paraṃ eko citakajhāyanadivasoyeva, tato paraṃ tayo
tika-s0104t:242_17: citakajhāyanadivasā ceva dhātupūjādivasā ca, tato paraṃ cattāro dhātupūjādivasāyeva,
tika-s0104t:242_18: iti taṃ taṃ kiccānurūpagaṇanavasena tīṇi sattāhāni paripūrenti, agahitaggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:242_19: pana aḍḍhamāsova hoti. “Ekavīsati divasā gatā”ti idha vuttavacanañca taṃ taṃ kiccānurūpagaṇaneneva.
tika-s0104t:242_20: Evañhi catūsupi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttavacanaṃ sametīti vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Vajirabuddhittherena
tika-s0104t:242_21: pana vuttaṃ “aḍḍhamāso atikkantoti ettha eko divaso naṭṭho, so pāṭipadadivaso, kolāhaladivaso
tika-s0104t:242_22: nāma so, tasmā idha na gahito”ti, taṃ na sundaraṃ parinibbānasuttantapāḷiyaṃ pāṭipadadivasatoyeva
tika-s0104t:242_23: paṭṭhāya sattāhassa vuttattā, aṭṭhakathāyañca parinibbānadivasena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:242_24: sattāhānaṃ gaṇitattā. Tathā hi parinibbānadivasena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ sattāhānaṃ gaṇaneneva
tika-s0104t:243_0: Cattālīsa divasāti jeṭṭhamūlasukkapakkhachaṭṭhadivasato yāva āsaḷhī puṇṇamī, tāva
tika-s0104t:243_1: gaṇetvā vuttaṃ. Etthantareti cattālīsadivasabbhantare. Rogo eva rogapalibodho. Ācariyupajjhāyesu
tika-s0104t:243_3: atthaṃ, kammaṃ vā paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṃ na detīti palibodho ra-kārassa
tika-s0104t:243_4: la-kāraṃ katvā. Taṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ karotūti saṅgāhakena chinditabbaṃ
tika-s0104t:243_5: taṃ sabbaṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā dhammavinayasaṅgāyanasaṅkhātaṃ tadeva karaṇīyaṃ karotu.
tika-s0104t:244_0: Aññepi mahātherāti anuruddhattherādayo. Sokasallasamappitanti sokasaṅkhātena sallena
tika-s0104t:244_3: abhinibbattetīti jano. Kilese janeti, ajani, janissatīti vā jano, mahanto jano tathā,
tika-s0104t:244_4: taṃ. Āgatāgatanti āgatamāgataṃ yathā “ekeko”ti. Ettha siyā – “thero attano pañcasatāya
tika-s0104t:244_5: parisāya parivutto rājagahaṃ gato, aññepi mahātherā attano attano parivāre gahetvā
tika-s0104t:244_6: sokasallasamappitaṃ mahājanaṃ assāsetukāmā taṃ taṃ disaṃ pakkantā”ti idha vuttavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:244_8: gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato, anuruddhattheropi upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato”ti
tika-s0104t:244_9: vuttavacanañca aññamaññaṃ viruddhaṃ hoti. Idha hi mahākassapattherādayo attano attano
tika-s0104t:244_10: parivārabhikkhūhiyeva saddhiṃ taṃ taṃ disaṃ gatāti attho āpajjati, tattha pana mahākassapattheraanuruddhattherāyeva
tika-s0104t:244_11: paccekamupaḍḍhasaṅghena saddhiṃ ekekaṃ maggaṃ gatāti? Vuccate – tadubhayampi hi vacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:244_12: na virujjhati atthato saṃsandanattā. Idha hi niravasesena therānaṃ paccekagamanavacanameva
tika-s0104t:244_13: tattha nayavasena dasseti, idha attano attano parisāya gamanavacanañca tattha upaḍḍhasaṅghena
tika-s0104t:244_14: saddhiṃ gamanavacanena. Upaḍḍhasaṅghoti hi sakasakaparisābhūto bhikkhugaṇo gayhati
tika-s0104t:244_15: upaḍḍhasaddassa asamepi bhāge pavattattā. Yadi hi sannipatite saṅghe upaḍḍhasaṅghena
tika-s0104t:244_16: saddhinti atthaṃ gaṇheyya, tadā saṅghassa gaṇanapathamatītattā na yujjateva, yadi
tika-s0104t:244_17: ca saṅgāyanatthaṃ uccinitānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ majjhe upaḍḍhasaṅghena saddhinti
tika-s0104t:244_18: atthaṃ gaṇheyya, evampi tesaṃ gaṇapāmokkhānaṃyeva uccinitattā na yujjateva. Paccekagaṇino
tika-s0104t:244_19: hete. Vuttañhi “sattasatasahassāni, tesu pāmokkhabhikkhavo”ti, iti atthato saṃsandanattā
tika-s0104t:244_20: tadetaṃ ubhayampi vacanaṃ aññamaññaṃ na virujjhatīti. Taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ matenevaṃ vuttantipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:245_1: sugatacīvarañca gaṇhitvāti attho. Soyeva hi patto bhagavatā sadā paribhutto. Vuttañhi
tika-s0104t:245_3: tasseva paribhuttabhāvaṃ dīpetukāmena pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā sunivatthanivāsano
tika-s0104t:245_5: nagaraṃ pavisitvā piṇḍāya caranto”ti gandhamālādayo nesaṃ hattheti gandhamālādihatthā.
tika-s0104t:246_0: Tatrāti tissaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ. Sudanti nipātamattaṃ. Aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttāyāti “sabbe
tika-s0104t:246_1: saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā aniccasabhāvapaṭisaññuttāya. Dhammena yuttā, dhammassa vā
tika-s0104t:246_2: patirūpāti dhammī, tādisāya. Saññāpetvāti suṭṭhu jānāpetvā, samassāsetvāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:246_4: vanditvā”ti vuttaṃ. “Vanditvā”ti ca “vivaritvā”ti ettha pubbakālakiriyā. Tathā hi
tika-s0104t:246_6: gandhakuṭiṃ vanditvā gandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivarīti veditabba”nti milātā mālā, sāyeva
tika-s0104t:246_7: kacavaraṃ, milātaṃ vā mālāsaṅkhātaṃ kacavaraṃ tathā. Atiharitvāti paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhānamabhimukhaṃ
tika-s0104t:246_8: haritvā. Yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvāti paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ anatikkamitvā yathāṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-s0104t:246_9: ṭhapetvā. Bhagavato ṭhitakāle karaṇīyaṃ vattaṃ sabbamakāsīti senāsane kattabbavattaṃ
tika-s0104t:246_10: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kurumāno cāti taṃ sabbaṃ vattaṃ karonto ca. Lakkhaṇe hi ayaṃ māna-saddo.
tika-s0104t:246_11: Nhānakoṭṭhakassa sammajjanañca tasmiṃ udakassa upaṭṭhāpanañca, tāni ādīni yesaṃ dhammadesanāovādādīnanti
tika-s0104t:246_12: tathā, tesaṃ kālesūti attho. Sīhassa migarājassa seyyā sīhaseyyā, taddhitavasena,
tika-s0104t:246_13: sadisavohārena vā bhagavato seyyāpi “sīhaseyyā”ti vuccati. Tejussadairiyāpathattā
tika-s0104t:246_14: uttamaseyyā vā, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ
tika-s0104t:246_15: kappesi pāde pādaṃ accādhāya sato sampajāno”ti, taṃ. Kappanakālo karaṇakālo nanūti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:247_0: “Yathā ta”ntiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya āvi karoti. Tattha yathā aññopi bhagavato…pe…
tika-s0104t:247_1: patiṭṭhitapemo ceva akhīṇāsavo ca anekesu…pe… upakārasañjanitacittamaddavo ca akāsi,
tika-s0104t:247_2: evaṃ āyasmāpi ānando bhagavato guṇa…pe… maddavo ca hutvā akāsīti yojanā. Nti nipātamattaṃ.
tika-s0104t:247_3: Apica etena tathākaraṇahetuṃ dasseti, yathā aññepi yathāvuttasabhāvā akaṃsu, tathā
tika-s0104t:247_4: āyasmāpi ānando bhagavato…pe… patiṭṭhitapemattā ceva akhīṇāsavattā ca anekesu…pe…
tika-s0104t:247_5: upakārasañjanitacittamaddavattā cāti hetuatthassa labbhamānattā. Hetugabbhāni hi
tika-s0104t:247_6: etāni padāni tadatthasseva tathākaraṇahetubhāvato. Dhanapāladamana, suvaṇṇakakkaṭa,
tika-s0104t:247_7: cūḷahaṃsa -mahāhaṃsajātakādīhi cettha vibhāvetabbo. Guṇānaṃ gaṇo, soyeva amatanipphādakarasasadisatāya
tika-s0104t:247_8: amataraso. Taṃ jānanapakatitāyāti patiṭṭhitapade hetu. Upakāra…pe… maddavoti upakārapubbabhāvena
tika-s0104t:247_9: sammājanitacittamuduko. Evampi so iminā kāraṇena adhivāsesīti dassento “tamena”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:247_10: Tattha tamenanti taṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ. Eta-saddo hi padālaṅkāramattaṃ. Ayañhi saddapakati,
tika-s0104t:247_11: yadidaṃ dvīsu sabbanāmesu pubbapadasseva atthapadatā. Saṃvejesīti “nanu bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:247_12: paṭikacceva akkhātaṃ ‘sabbeheva piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo’tiādinā saṃvegaṃ
tika-s0104t:247_13: janesī”ti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati “bhante…pe… assāsessathāti
tika-s0104t:247_14: paṭhamaṃ vatvā”ti saha pāṭhasesena yojanā assa. Yathārutato pana ādyatthena iti-saddena
tika-s0104t:247_15: “evamādinā saṃvejesī”ti yojanāpi yujjateva. Yena kenaci hi vacanena saṃvegaṃ janesi,
tika-s0104t:247_16: taṃ sabbampi saṃvejanassa karaṇaṃ sambhavatīti. Santhambhitvāti paridevanādivirahena
tika-s0104t:247_18: Pittasemhavātavasena hi tisso dhātuyo idha bhesajjakaraṇayogyatāya adhippetā, yā
tika-s0104t:247_19: “dosā, malā”ti ca loke vuccanti, pathavī āpo tejo vāyo ākāsoti ca bhedena paccekaṃ
tika-s0104t:252_0: Samassāsetunti santappetuṃ. Devatāya saṃvejitadivasato, jetavanavihāraṃ paviṭṭhadivasato
tika-s0104t:252_1: vā dutiyadivase. Viriccati etenāti virecanaṃ, osadhaparibhāvitaṃ khīrameva virecanaṃ
tika-s0104t:252_2: tathā. Yaṃ sandhāyāti yaṃ bhesajjapānaṃ sandhāya. Aṅgapaccaṅgena sobhatīti subho,
tika-s0104t:252_3: manuno apaccaṃ mānavo, na-kārassa pana ṇa-kāre kate māṇavo. Manūti hi paṭhamakappikakāle
tika-s0104t:252_4: manussānaṃ mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhito puriso, yo sāsane “mahāsammatarājā”ti vutto. So hi
tika-s0104t:252_5: sakalalokassa hitaṃ manabhi jānātīti manūti vuccati. Evampettha vadanti “dantaja
tika-s0104t:252_6: na-kārasahito mānavasaddo sabbasattasādhāraṇavacano, muddhaja ṇa-kārasahito pana
tika-s0104t:252_8: muddhaja ṇa-kārasahitasseva māṇavasaddassa attho vaṇṇito. Taṭṭīkāyampi “yaṃ apaccaṃ
tika-s0104t:252_9: kucchitaṃ mūḷhaṃ vā, tattha loke māṇavavohāro, yebhuyyena ca sattā daharakāle mūḷhadhātukā
tika-s0104t:252_10: hontīti tassevattho pakāsito”ti vadanti ācariyā. Aññattha ca vīsativassabbhantaro
tika-s0104t:252_11: yuvā māṇavo, idha pana tabbohārena mahallakopi. Vuttañhi cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:252_12: “māṇavoti pana taṃ taruṇakāle vohariṃsu, so mahallakakālepi teneva vohārena voharīyatī”ti,
tika-s0104t:252_13: subhanāmakena laddhamāṇavavohārenāti attho. So pana “satthā parinibbuto, ānandatthero
tika-s0104t:252_14: kirassa pattacīvaramādāya āgato, mahājano taṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamatī”ti sutvā “vihāraṃ
tika-s0104t:252_15: kho pana gantvā mahājanamajjhe na sakkā sukhena paṭisanthāraṃ vā kātuṃ, dhammakathaṃ
tika-s0104t:252_16: vā sotuṃ, gehamāgataṃyeva naṃ disvā sukhena paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmi, ekā ca me kaṅkhā
tika-s0104t:252_17: atthi, tampi naṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā ekaṃ māṇavakaṃ pesesi, taṃ sandhāyāha “pahitaṃ
tika-s0104t:252_18: māṇavaka”nti khuddake cettha kapaccayo. Etadavocāti etaṃ “akālo”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ ānandatthero avoca.
tika-s0104t:253_0: Akāloti ajja gantuṃ ayuttakālo. Kasmāti ce “atthi me”tiādimāha. Bhesajjamattāti appakaṃ
tika-s0104t:253_1: bhesajjaṃ. Appattho hettha mattāsaddo “mattā sukhapariccāgā”tiādīsu viya. Pītāti
tika-s0104t:253_2: pivitā. Svepīti ettha “api-saddo apekkho mantā nuññāyā”ti vajirabuddhittherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:253_3: Ayaṃ pana tassādhippāyo – “appeva nāmā”ti saṃsayamatte vutte anuññātabhāvo na siddho,
tika-s0104t:253_4: tasmā taṃ sādhanatthaṃ “apī”ti vuttaṃ, tena imamatthaṃ dīpeti “appeva nāma sve mayaṃ
tika-s0104t:253_5: upasaṅkameyyāma, upasaṅkamituṃ paṭibalā samānā upasaṅkamissāma cā”ti.
tika-s0104t:254_1: jātattā cetakoti evaṃ laddhanāmena therena. Pacchāsamaṇenāti pacchānugatena samaṇena.
tika-s0104t:254_2: Sahatthe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Subhena māṇavena puṭṭhoti “yesu dhammesu bhavaṃ gotamo
tika-s0104t:254_3: imaṃ lokaṃ patiṭṭhapesi, te tassa accayena naṭṭhā nu kho, dharanti nu kho, sace dharanti,
tika-s0104t:254_4: bhavaṃ (natthi dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.448) ānando jānissati, handa naṃ pucchāmī”ti evaṃ
tika-s0104t:254_5: cintetvā “yesaṃ so bhavaṃ gotamo dhammānaṃ vaṇṇavādī ahosi, yattha ca imaṃ janataṃ
tika-s0104t:254_6: samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesi, katamesānaṃ kho bho ānanda dhammānaṃ so bhavaṃ
tika-s0104t:254_7: gotamo vaṇṇavādī ahosī”tiādinā puṭṭho, athassa thero tīṇi piṭakāni sīlakkhandhādīhi
tika-s0104t:254_8: tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā dassento “tiṇṇaṃ kho māṇava khandhānaṃ so bhagavā vaṇṇavādī”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:254_9: idha sīlakkhandhavagge dasamaṃ suttamabhāsi, taṃ sandhāyāha “imasmiṃ…pe… mabhāsī”ti.
tika-s0104t:255_0: Khaṇḍanti chinnaṃ. Phullanti bhinnaṃ, sevālāhichattakādivikassanaṃ vā, tesaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:255_1: sammā pākatikakaraṇaṃ, abhinavapaṭikaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Upakaṭṭhāyāti āsannāya.
tika-s0104t:255_2: Vassaṃ upanenti upagacchanti etthāti vassūpanāyikā, vassūpagatakālo, tāya. Saṅgītipāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:255_3: sāmaññena vuttampi vacanaṃ evaṃ gateyeva sandhāya vuttanti saṃsandetuṃ sādhetuṃ vā āha “evañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:256_0: Rājagahaṃ parivāretvāti bahinagare ṭhitabhāvena vuttaṃ. Chaḍḍitapatitauklāpāti chaḍḍitā
tika-s0104t:256_1: ca patitā ca uklāpā ca. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhagavato parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantehi
tika-s0104t:256_2: bhikkhūhi chaḍḍitā vissaṭṭhā, tatoyeva ca upacikādīhi khāditattā ito cito ca patitā,
tika-s0104t:256_3: sammajjanābhāvena ākiṇṇakacavarattā uklāpā cāti. Tadevatthaṃ “bhagavato hī”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:256_4: vibhāveti. Avakuthi pūtibhāvamagamāsīti uklāpo tha-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā, ujjhiṭṭho
tika-s0104t:256_5: vā kalāposamūhoti uklāpo, vaṇṇasaṅgamanavasenevaṃ vuttaṃ yathā “upakleso, sneho”
tika-s0104t:256_6: – iccādi, tena yuttāti tathā. Paricchedavasena veṇīyanti dissantīti pariveṇā. Kurumānāti
tika-s0104t:256_7: kattukāmā. Senāsanavattānaṃ paññattattā, senāsanakkhandhake ca senāsanapaṭibaddhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:256_8: bahūnampi vacanānaṃ vuttattā senāsanapaṭisaṅkharaṇampi tassa pūjāyeva nāmāti āha
tika-s0104t:256_9: “bhagavato vacanapūjanattha”nti. Paṭhamaṃ māsanti vassānassa paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ. Accantasaṃyoge
tika-s0104t:257_0: Yanti katikavattakaraṇaṃ. Edisesu hi ṭhānesu yaṃ-saddo taṃ-saddānapekkho teneva atthassa
tika-s0104t:257_1: paripuṇṇattā. Yaṃ vā katikavattaṃ sandhāya “atha kho”tiādi vuttaṃ, tadeva mayāpi
tika-s0104t:257_2: vuttanti attho. Esa nayo īdisesu bhagavatā…pe… vaṇṇitanti senāsanavattaṃ paññapentena
tika-s0104t:257_3: senāsanakkhandhake ca senāsanapaṭibaddhavacanaṃ kathentena vaṇṇitaṃ. Saṅgāyissāmāti
tika-s0104t:257_4: ettha iti-saddassa “vuttaṃ ahosī”ti ca ubhayattha sambandho, ekassa vā iti-saddassa lopo.
tika-s0104t:258_0: Dutiyadivaseti evaṃ cintitadivasato dutiyadivase, so ca kho vassūpanāyikadivasato
tika-s0104t:258_1: dutiyadivasova. Therā hi āsaḷhipuṇṇamito pāṭipadadivaseyeva sannipatitvā vassamupagantvā
tika-s0104t:258_2: evaṃ cintesunti. Rājadvāreti rājagehadvāre. Hatthakammanti hatthakiriyaṃ, hatthakammassa
tika-s0104t:258_3: karaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭivedesunti jānāpesuṃ. Visaṭṭhāti nirāsaṅkacittā. Āṇāyeva
tika-s0104t:258_4: appaṭihatavuttiyā pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti āṇācakkaṃ. Tathā dhammoyeva cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ,
tika-s0104t:258_5: taṃ panidha desanāñāṇapaṭivedhañāṇavasena duvidhampi yujjati tadubhayeneva saṅgītiyā
tika-s0104t:258_6: pavattanato. “Dhammacakkanti cetaṃ desanāñāṇassāpi nāmaṃ, paṭivedhañāṇassāpī”ti hi
tika-s0104t:258_7: aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Sannisajjaṭṭhānanti sannipatitvā nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ. Satta paṇṇāni
tika-s0104t:258_8: yassāti sattapaṇṇī, yo “chattapaṇṇo, visamacchado” tipi vuccati, tassa jātaguhadvāreti attho.
tika-s0104t:259_0: Vissakammunāti sakkassa devānamindassa kammākammavidhāyakaṃ devaputtaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0104t:259_1: Suvibhattabhittithambhasopānanti ettha suvibhattapadassa dvandato pubbe suyyamānattā
tika-s0104t:259_2: sabbehi dvandapadehi sambandho, tathā “nānāvidha…pe… vicitta”ntiādīsupi. Rājabhavanavibhūtinti
tika-s0104t:259_3: rājabhavanasampattiṃ, rājabhavanasobhaṃ vā. Avahasantamivāti avahāsaṃ kurumānaṃ viya.
tika-s0104t:259_5: pāṭho. Ekasmiṃyeva pānīyatitthe nipatantā pakkhino viya sabbesampi janānaṃ cakkhūni
tika-s0104t:259_6: maṇḍapeyeva nipatantīti vuttaṃ “ekanipāta…pe… vihaṅgāna”nti. Nayanavihaṅgānanti nayanasaṅkhātavihaṅgānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:259_7: Lokarāmaṇeyyakamiva sampiṇḍitanti yadi loke vijjamānaṃ rāmaṇeyyakaṃ sabbameva ānetvā
tika-s0104t:259_8: ekattha sampiṇḍitaṃ siyā, taṃ viyāti vuttaṃ hoti, yaṃ yaṃ vā loke ramitumarahati,
tika-s0104t:259_9: taṃ sabbaṃ sampiṇḍitamivātipi attho. Daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍanti pheggurahitaṃ sāraṃ viya,
tika-s0104t:259_10: kasaṭavinimuttaṃ pasannaṃ viya ca daṭṭhumaraharūpesu sārabhūtaṃ, pasannabhūtañca.
tika-s0104t:259_11: Apica daṭṭhabbo dassanīyo sārabhūto visiṭṭhataro maṇḍo maṇḍanaṃ alaṅkāro etassāti
tika-s0104t:259_12: daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍo, taṃ. Maṇḍaṃ sūriyarasmiṃ pāti nivāreti, sabbesaṃ vā janānaṃ maṇḍaṃ
tika-s0104t:259_13: pasannaṃ pāti rakkhati, maṇḍanamalaṅkāraṃ vā pāti pivati alaṅkarituṃ yuttabhāvenāti maṇḍapo, taṃ.
tika-s0104t:260_0: Kusumadāmāni ca tāni olambakāni ceti kusumadāmolambakāni. Visesanassa cettha paranipāto
tika-s0104t:260_1: yathā “agyāhito”ti. Vividhāniyeva kusumadāmolambakāni tathā, tāni viniggalantaṃ visesena
tika-s0104t:260_2: vamentaṃ nikkhāmentamiva cāru sobhanaṃ vitānaṃ etthāti tathā. Kuṭṭena gahito samaṃ
tika-s0104t:260_3: katoti kuṭṭimo, koṭṭimo vā, tādisoyeva maṇīti maṇikoṭṭimo, nānāratanehi vicitto maṇikoṭṭimo,
tika-s0104t:260_4: tassa talaṃ tathā. Atha vā maṇiyo koṭṭetvā katatalattā maṇikoṭṭena nipphattanti maṇikoṭṭimaṃ,
tika-s0104t:260_5: tameva talaṃ, nānāratanavicittaṃ maṇikoṭṭimatalaṃ tathā. Tamiva ca nānāpupphūpahāravicittaṃ
tika-s0104t:260_6: supariniṭṭhitabhūmikammanti sambandho. Pupphapūjā pupphūpahāro. Ettha hi nānāratanavicittaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:260_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanti maṇḍapaṃ. Brahmavimānasadisanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, yathā brahmavimānaṃ
tika-s0104t:260_9: sobhati, tathā alaṅkaritvāti attho. Visesena mānetabbanti vimānaṃ. Saddavidū pana
tika-s0104t:260_10: “vihe ākāse māyanti gacchanti devā yenāti vimāna”nti vadanti. Visesena vā sucaritakammunā
tika-s0104t:260_11: mīyati nimmīyatīti vimānaṃ, vīti vā sakuṇo vuccati, taṃ saṇṭhānena mīyati nimmīyatīti
tika-s0104t:260_13: sobhātisayayogena ca visesato mānanīyatāya vimāna”nti vuttaṃ. Natthi agghametesanti
tika-s0104t:260_14: anagghāni, aparimāṇagghāni agghitumasakkuṇeyyānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Patirūpaṃ, paccekaṃ
tika-s0104t:260_15: vā attharitabbānīti paccattharaṇāni, tesaṃ satāni tathā. Uttarābhimukhanti uttaradisābhimukhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:260_16: Dhammopi satthāyeva satthukiccanipphādanatoti vuttaṃ “buddhassa bhagavato āsanārahaṃ
tika-s0104t:260_17: dhammāsanaṃ paññapetvā”ti. Yathāha “yo kho…pe… mamaccayena satthā”tiādi, tathāgatappaveditadhammadesakassa
tika-s0104t:260_18: vā satthukiccāvahattā tathārūpe āsane nisīditumarahatīti dassetumpi evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:260_19: Āsanārahanti nisīdanārahaṃ. Dhammāsananti dhammadesakāsanaṃ, dhammaṃ vā kathetuṃ
tika-s0104t:260_20: yuttāsanaṃ. Dantakhacitanti dantehi khacitaṃ, hatthidantehi katanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:260_21: “Danto nāma hatthidanto vuccatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Etthāti etasmiṃ dhammāsane. Mama kiccanti
tika-s0104t:261_0: Idāni āyasmato ānandassa asekkhabhūmisamāpajjanaṃ dassento “tasmiñca panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:261_1: Tattha tasmiñca pana divasaeti tathā raññā ārocāpitadivase, sāvaṇamāsassa kāḷapakkhacatutthadivaseti
tika-s0104t:261_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Anatthajananato visasaṅkāsatāya kileso visaṃ, tassa khīṇāsavabhāvato
tika-s0104t:261_3: aññathābhāvasaṅkhātā satti gandho. Tathā hi so bhagavato parinibbānādīsu vilāpādimakāsi.
tika-s0104t:261_5: “visagandho”ti vuccati. Tathā hi so “visaṃ haratīti visattikā, visamūlāti visattikā,
tika-s0104t:261_6: visaphalāti visattikā, visaparibhogāti visattikā”tiādinā vuttoti. Apica visagandhonāma
tika-s0104t:261_7: virūpo maṃsādigandho, taṃsadisatāya pana kileso. “Vissasaddo hi virūpe”ti abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃvuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:261_8: Addhāti ekaṃsato. Saṃveganti dhammasaṃvegaṃ. “Ohitabhārāna”nti hi yebhuyyena, padhānena
tika-s0104t:261_9: ca vuttaṃ. Edisesu pana ṭhānesu tadaññesampi dhammasaṃvegoyeva adhippeto. Tathā hi
tika-s0104t:261_10: “saṃvego nāma sahottappaṃ ñāṇaṃ, so tassā bhagavato dassane uppajjī”ti rajjumālāvimānavaṇṇanāyaṃvuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:261_11: sā ca tadā aviññātasāsanā anāgataphalāti. Itarathā hi cittutrāsavasena dosoyeva saṃvegoti
tika-s0104t:261_12: āpajjati, evañca sati so tassa asekkhabhūmisamāpajjanassa ekaṃsakāraṇaṃ na siyā.
tika-s0104t:261_13: Evamabhūto ca so idha na vattabboyevāti alamatipapañcena. Tenāti tasmā sve saṅghasannipātassa
tika-s0104t:261_14: vattamānattā, sekkhasakaraṇīyattā vā. Te na yuttanti tava na yuttaṃ, tayā vā sannipātaṃ
tika-s0104t:262_0: Metanti mama etaṃ gamanaṃ. Yvāhanti yo ahaṃ, yanti vā kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, tena “gaccheyya”nti
tika-s0104t:262_1: ettha gamanakiriyaṃ parāmasati, kiriyāparāmasanassa ca yaṃ taṃ-saddassa ayaṃ pakati,
tika-s0104t:262_2: yadidaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgena, ekavacanena ca yogyatā tathāyeva tattha tattha dassanato.
tika-s0104t:262_3: Kiriyāya hi sabhāvato napuṃsakattamekattañca icchanti saddavidū. Āvajjesīti upanāmesi.
tika-s0104t:262_4: Muttāti muccitā. Appattañcāti agatañca, bimbohane na tāva ṭhapitanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:262_5: Etasmiṃ antareti etthantare, iminā padadvayena dassitakālānaṃ vemajjhakkhaṇe, tathādassitakāladvayassa
tika-s0104t:263: “Kāraṇe ceva citte ca, khaṇasmiṃ vivarepi ca;
tika-s0104t:265_0: Hi vuttaṃ. Anupādāyāti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā, yehi vā kilesehi
tika-s0104t:265_1: muccati, tesaṃ lesamattampi aggahetvā. Āsavehīti bhavato ā bhavaggaṃ, dhammato ca
tika-s0104t:265_2: ā gotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato āsavasaññitehi kilesehi. Upalakkhaṇavacanamattañcetaṃ.
tika-s0104t:265_3: Tadekaṭṭhatāya hi sabbehipi kilesehi sabbehipi pāpadhammehi cittaṃ vimuccatiyeva.
tika-s0104t:265_4: Cittaṃ vimuccīti cittaṃ arahattamaggakkhaṇe āsavehi vimuccamānaṃ hutvā arahattaphalakkhaṇe
tika-s0104t:265_5: vimucci. Tadatthaṃ vivarati “ayañhī”tiādinā. Caṅkamenāti caṅkamanakiriyāya. Visesanti
tika-s0104t:265_6: attanā laddhamaggaphalato visesamaggaphalaṃ. Vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṃ kataṃ upacitaṃ
tika-s0104t:265_7: puññaṃ yenāti katapuñño, arahattādhigamāya katādhikāroti attho. Padhānamanuyuñjāti
tika-s0104t:265_8: vīriyamanuyuñjāhi, arahattasamāpattiyā anuyogaṃ karohīti vuttaṃ hoti. Hohisīti bhavissasi.
tika-s0104t:265_9: Kathādosoti kathāya doso vitathabhāvo. Accāraddhanti ativiya āraddhaṃ. Uddhaccāyāti
tika-s0104t:265_10: uddhatabhāvāya. Handāti vossaggavacanaṃ. Tena hi adhunāyeva yojemi, na panāhaṃ papañcaṃ
tika-s0104t:265_11: karomīti vossaggaṃ karoti. Vīriyasamataṃ yojemīti caṅkamanavīriyassa adhimattattā
tika-s0104t:265_12: tassa hāpanavasena samādhinā samatāpādanena vīriyassa samataṃ samabhāvaṃ yojemi,
tika-s0104t:265_13: vīriyena vā samathasaṅkhātaṃ samādhiṃ yojemītipi attho. Dvidhāpi hi pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0104t:265_14: Vissamissāmīti assasissāmi. Idāni tassa visesato pasaṃsanārahabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tenā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:265_16: Parinibbutopi so ākāseyeva parinibbāyi. Tasmā therassa kilesaparinibbānaṃ, khandhaparinibbānañca
tika-s0104t:266_0: Dutiyadivaseti therena arahattapattadivasato dutiyadivase. Pañcamiyanti tithīpekkhāya
tika-s0104t:266_1: vuttaṃ, “dutiyadivase”ti iminā tulyādhikaraṇaṃ. Bhinnaliṅgampi hi tulyatthapadaṃ
tika-s0104t:266_2: dissati yathā “guṇo pamāṇaṃ, vīsati cittāni” iccādi. Kāḷapakkhassāti sāvaṇamāsakāḷapakkhassa.
tika-s0104t:266_3: Paṭhamañhi māsaṃ khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇamakaṃsu, paṭhamamāsabhāvo ca majjhimappadesavohārena.
tika-s0104t:266_4: Tattha hi purimapuṇṇamito yāva aparā puṇṇamī, tāva eko māsoti voharanti. Tato tīṇi
tika-s0104t:266_5: divasāni rājā maṇḍapamakāsi, tato dutiyadivase thero arahattaṃ sacchākāsi, tatiyadivase
tika-s0104t:266_6: pana sannipatitvā therā saṅgītimakaṃsu, tasmā āsaḷhimāsakāḷapakkhapāṭipadato yāva
tika-s0104t:266_7: sāvaṇamāsakāḷapakkhapañcamī, tāva pañcadivasādhiko ekamāso hoti. Samānoti uppajjamāno.
tika-s0104t:266_8: Haṭṭhatuṭṭhacittoti ativiya somanassacitto, pāmojjena vā haṭṭhacitto pītiyā tuṭṭhacitto.
tika-s0104t:266_9: Ekaṃsanti ekasmiṃ aṃse, vāmaṃseti attho. Tathā hi vaṅgīsasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:267_0: “Ekaṃsaṃ cīvaranti ettha puna saṇṭhāpanavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ, ekaṃsanti ca vāmaṃsaṃ
tika-s0104t:267_1: pārupitvā ṭhitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yato yathā vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti, tathā
tika-s0104t:268_0: Bandha…pe… viyāti vaṇṭato pavuttasuparipakkatālaphalamiva. Paṇḍu…pe… viyāti sitapītapabhāyuttapaṇḍuromajakambale
tika-s0104t:268_1: ṭhapito jātimā maṇi viya, jātivacanena cettha kuttimaṃ nivatteti. Samuggatapuṇṇacando
tika-s0104t:268_2: viyāti juṇhapakkhapannarasuposathe samuggato soḷasakalāparipuṇṇo cando viya. Bālā…pe…
tika-s0104t:268_4: viya. “Piñjarasaddo hi hemavaṇṇapariyāyo”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vutto. Pariyodātenāti
tika-s0104t:268_5: pabhassarena. Sappabhenāti vaṇṇappabhāya, sīlappabhāya ca samannāgatena. Sassirikenāti
tika-s0104t:268_6: sarīrasobhaggādisaṅkhātāya siriyā ativiya sirimatā. Mukhavarenāti yathāvuttasobhāsamalaṅkatattā
tika-s0104t:268_7: uttamamukhena. Kāmaṃ “ahamasmi arahattaṃ patto”ti nārocesi, tathārūpāya pana uttamalīḷāya
tika-s0104t:268_8: gamanato passantā sabbepi tamatthaṃ jānanti, tasmā ārocento viya hotīti āha “attano
tika-s0104t:269_0: Kimatthaṃ panāyaṃ evamārocayamāno viya agamāsīti? Vuccate – so hi “attupanāyikaṃ
tika-s0104t:269_1: akatvā aññabyākaraṇaṃ bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇita”nti manasi karitvā “sekkhatāya dhammavinayasaṅgītiyā
tika-s0104t:269_2: gahetumayuttampi bahussutattā gaṇhissāmā”ti nisinnānaṃ therānaṃ arahattappattivijānanena
tika-s0104t:269_3: somanassuppādanatthaṃ, “appamatto hohī”ti bhagavatā dinnaovādassa ca saphalatādīpanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:269_4: evamārocayamāno viya agamāsīti. Āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosi samasamaṭṭhapanādinā
tika-s0104t:269_5: yathāvuttakāraṇena satthukappattā. Dhareyyāti vijjamāno bhaveyya. “Sobhati vata te
tika-s0104t:269_6: āvuso ānanda arahattasamadhigamatā”tiādinā sādhukāramadāsi. Ayamidha dīghabhāṇakānaṃ
tika-s0104t:269_7: vādo. Khuddakabhāṇakesu ca suttanipātakhuddakapāṭhabhāṇakānaṃ vādotipi yujjati tadaṭṭhakathāsupi tathā vuttattā.
tika-s0104t:270_0: Majjhimaṃ nikāyaṃ bhaṇanti sīlenāti majjhimabhāṇakā, tappaguṇā ācariyā. Yathāvuḍḍhanti
tika-s0104t:270_1: vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiṃ, tadanatikkamitvā vā. Tatthāti tasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe. Ānandassa etamāsananti
tika-s0104t:270_2: sambandho. Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ evaṃkathanasamaye. Thero cintesi “kuhiṃ gato”ti
tika-s0104t:270_3: pucchantānaṃ attānaṃ dassente ativiya pākaṭabhāvena bhavissamānattā, ayampi majjhimabhāṇakesveva
tika-s0104t:270_4: ekaccānaṃ vādo, tasmā itipi eke vadantīti sambandho. Ākāsena āgantvā attano āsaneyeva
tika-s0104t:270_5: attānaṃ dassesītipi tesameva ekacce vadanti. Pulliṅgavisaye hi “eke”ti vutte sabbattha
tika-s0104t:270_6: “ekacce”ti attho veditabbo. Tīsupi cettha vādesu tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ tena tenākārena
tika-s0104t:270_7: āgatamattaṃ ṭhapetvā visuṃ visuṃ vacane aññaṃ visesakāraṇaṃ natthi. Sattamāsaṃ katāya
tika-s0104t:270_8: hi dhammavinayasaṅgītiyā kadāci pakatiyāva, kadāci pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā, kadāci
tika-s0104t:270_9: ākāsena āgatattā taṃ tadāgamanamupādāya tathā tathā vadanti. Apica saṅgītiyā ādidivaseyeva
tika-s0104t:270_10: paṭhamaṃ pakatiyā āgantvā tato paraṃ ākāsamabbhuggantvā parisaṃ pattakāle tato otaritvā
tika-s0104t:270_11: bhikkhupantiṃ apīḷento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā āsane attānaṃ dassesītipi vadanti. Yathā
tika-s0104t:270_12: vā tathā vā āgacchatu, āgamanākāramattaṃ na pamāṇaṃ, āgantvā gatakāle āyasmato mahākassapassa
tika-s0104t:270_13: sādhukāradānameva pamāṇaṃ satthārā dātabbasādhukāradāneneva arahattappattiyā aññesampi
tika-s0104t:270_14: ñāpitattā, bhagavati dharamāne paṭiggahetabbāya ca pasaṃsāya therassa paṭiggahitattā.
tika-s0104t:270_15: Tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “yathā vā”tiādimāha. Sabbatthāpīti sabbesupi tīsu vādesu.
tika-s0104t:271_0: Bhikkhū āmantesīti bhikkhū ālapīti ayamettha attho, aññatra pana ñāpanepi dissati
tika-s0104t:271_1: yathā “āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave”ti pakkosanepi dissati
tika-s0104t:271_2: yathā “ehi tvaṃ bhikkhu mama vacanena sāriputtaṃ āmantehī”ti ālapanepi dissati yathā
tika-s0104t:271_3: “tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘bhikkhavo’ti”, idhāpi ālapaneti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-s0104t:271_4: vuttaṃ. Ālapanamattassa pana abhāvato “kiṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyāmā”tiādinā vuttena viññāpiyamānatthantarena
tika-s0104t:271_5: ca sahacaraṇato ñāpaneva vaṭṭati, tasmā āmantesīti paṭivedesi viññāpesīti attho vattabbo.
tika-s0104t:271_6: “Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘bhikkhavo’ti, ‘bhaddante’ti te bhikkhū bhagavato
tika-s0104t:271_7: paccassosu”ntiādīsu hi ālapanamattameva dissati, na viññāpiyamānatthantaraṃ, taṃ
tika-s0104t:271_8: pana “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave”tiādinā paccekameva āraddhaṃ. Tasmā tādisesveva ālapane
tika-s0104t:271_9: vaṭṭatīti no takko. Saddavidū pana vadanti “āmantayitvā devindo, vissakammaṃ mahiddhika’ntiādīsu
tika-s0104t:271_10: viya mantasaddo guttabhāsane. Tasmā ‘āmantesī’ti etassa sammantayīti attho”ti. “Āvuso”tiādi
tika-s0104t:271_11: āmantanākāradīpanaṃ. Dhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ vāti ettha vā-saddo vikappane, tena “kimekaṃ
tika-s0104t:271_12: tesu paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyāmā”ti dasseti. Kasmā āyūti āha “vinaye ṭhite”tiādi. “Yasmā,
tika-s0104t:271_13: tasmā”ti ca ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ. Tasmāti tāya āyusarikkhatāya. Dhuranti jeṭṭhakaṃ.
tika-s0104t:271_14: No nappahotīti pahotiyeva. Dvipaṭisedho hi saha atisayena pakatyatthadīpako.
tika-s0104t:272_0: Etadagganti eso aggo. Liṅgavipallāsena hi ayaṃ niddeso. Yadidanti ca yo ayaṃ, yadidaṃ
tika-s0104t:272_1: khandhapañcakanti vā yojetabbaṃ. Evañhi sati “etadagga”nti yathārutaliṅgameva. “Yadida”nti
tika-s0104t:272_2: padassa ca ayaṃ sabhāvo, yā tassa tassa atthassa vattabbassa liṅgānurūpena “yo aya”nti
tika-s0104t:272_3: vā “yā aya”nti vā “yaṃ ida”nti vā yojetabbatā tathāyevassa tattha tattha dassitattā.
tika-s0104t:273_0: Attanāva attānaṃ sammannīti sayameva attānaṃ sammataṃ akāsi. “Attanā”ti hi idaṃ tatiyāvisesanaṃ
tika-s0104t:273_1: bhavati, tañca parehi sammannanaṃ nivatteti, “attanā”ti vā ayaṃ vibhatyantapatirūpako
tika-s0104t:273_2: abyayasaddo. Keci pana “liṅgatthe tatiyā abhihitakattubhāvato”ti vadanti. Tadayuttameva
tika-s0104t:273_3: “thero”ti kattuno vijjamānattā. Vissajjanatthāya attanāva attānaṃ sammannīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:274_0: Bījaniṃ gahetvāti ettha bījanīgahaṇaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ dhammatāti veditabbaṃ. Tāya
tika-s0104t:274_1: hi dhammakathikānaṃ parisāya hatthakukkuccamukhavikārādi paṭicchādīyati. Bhagavā
tika-s0104t:274_2: ca dhammakathikānaṃ dhammatādassanatthameva vicitrabījaniṃ gaṇhāti. Aññathā hi sabbassapi
tika-s0104t:274_4: paṭicchādetabbaṃ na siyā. “Paṭhamaṃ āvuso upāli pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”nti kasmā
tika-s0104t:274_5: vuttaṃ, nanu tassa saṅgītiyā purimakāle paṭhamabhāvo na yuttoti? No na yutto bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:274_6: paññattānukkamena, pātimokkhuddesānukkamena ca paṭhamabhāvassa siddhattā. Yebhuyyena
tika-s0104t:274_7: hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavato dharamānakāle ṭhitānukkameneva saṅgītāni, visesato vinayābhidhammapiṭakānīti
tika-s0104t:274_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kismiṃ vatthusminti, methunadhammeti ca nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ. “Kattha
tika-s0104t:274_9: paññatta”ntiādinā dassitena saha tadavasiṭṭhampi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “vatthumpi pucchī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:275_0: Saṅgītikārakavacanasammissaṃ vā nu kho, suddhaṃ vā buddhavacananti āsaṅkāpariharaṇatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:275_1: yathāsaṅgītasseva pamāṇabhāvaṃ dassanatthañca pucchaṃ samuddharitvā vissajjento “kiṃ
tika-s0104t:275_2: panetthā”tiādimāha. Ettha paṭhamapārājiketi etissaṃ tathāsaṅgītāya paṭhamapārājikapāḷiyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:275_3: Tenevāha “na hi tathāgatā ekabyañjanampi niratthakaṃ vadantī”ti. Apanetabbanti atirekabhāvena
tika-s0104t:275_4: niratthakatāya, vitathabhāvena vā ayuttatāya chaḍḍetabbavacanaṃ. Pakkhipitabbanti
tika-s0104t:275_5: asampuṇṇatāya upanetabbavacanaṃ. Kasmāti āha “na hī”tiādi. Sāvakānaṃ pana devatānaṃ
tika-s0104t:275_6: vā bhāsiteti bhagavato pucchāthomanādivasena bhāsitaṃ sandhāyāha. Sabbatthāpīti bhagavato
tika-s0104t:275_7: sāvakānaṃ devatānañca bhāsitepi. Taṃ pana pakkhipanaṃ sambandhavacanamattasseva,
tika-s0104t:275_8: na sabhāvāyuttiyā atthassāti dasseti “kiṃ pana ta”ntiādinā sambandhavacanamattanti
tika-s0104t:275_9: pubbāparasambandhavacanameva. Idaṃ paṭhamapārājikanti vavatthapetvā ṭhapesuṃ imināva
tika-s0104t:275_11: “tena…pe… viharatī”ti. Sajjhāyārambhakāleyeva pathavī akampitthāti vadanti, tadidaṃ
tika-s0104t:275_12: pana pathavīkampanaṃ therānaṃ dhammasajjhāyānubhāvenāti ñāpetuṃ “sādhukāraṃ dadamānā
tika-s0104t:275_13: viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Udakapariyantanti pathavīsandhārakaudakapariyantaṃ. Tasmiñhi caliteyeva
tika-s0104t:275_14: sāpi calati, etena ca padesapathavīkampanaṃ nivatteti.
tika-s0104t:276_0: Kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ gaṇanā natthi, saṅgītimāropitāni pana ettakānevāti dīpetuṃ “pañcasattati
tika-s0104t:276_1: sikkhāpadānī”ti vuttaṃ “purimanayenevā”ti etena sādhukāraṃ dadamānā viyāti atthamāha.
tika-s0104t:276_2: Na kevalaṃ sikkhāpadakaṇḍavibhaṅganiyameneva, atha kho pamāṇaniyamenāpīti dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:278: Gāthā cekā mato gantho, gantho bāttiṃsatakkharo.
tika-s0104t:281_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhakkharasahassaparimāṇo pāṭho vuccati. Bhaṇitabbo vāro yassāti hi bhāṇavāro,
tika-s0104t:281_1: ekena sajjhāyanamaggena kathetabbavāroti attho. Khandhakanti mahāvaggacūḷavaggaṃ.
tika-s0104t:281_2: Khandhānaṃ samūhato, pakāsanato vā khandhakoti hi vuccati, khandhāti cettha pabbajjūpasampadādivinayakammasaṅkhātā,
tika-s0104t:281_3: cārittavārittasikkhāpadasaṅkhātā ca paññattiyo adhippetā. Pabbajjādīni hi bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:281_4: paññattattā paññattiyoti vuccanti. Paññattiyañca khandhasaddo dissati “dārukkhandho,
tika-s0104t:281_5: aggikkhandho, udakakkhandho”tiādīsu viya. Apica bhāgarāsaṭṭhatāpi yujjatiyeva tāsaṃ
tika-s0104t:281_6: paññattīnaṃ bhāgato, rāsito ca vibhattattā, taṃ pana vinayapiṭakaṃ bhāṇakehi rakkhitaṃ
tika-s0104t:281_7: gopitaṃ saṅgahāruḷhanayeneva cirakālaṃ anassamānaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahissatīti āyasmantaṃ
tika-s0104t:281_8: upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ “āvuso imaṃ tuyhaṃ nissitake vācehī”ti.
tika-s0104t:282_0: Dhammaṃ saṅgāyitukāmoti suttantābhidhammasaṅgītiṃ kattukāmo “dhammo ca vinayo ca
tika-s0104t:282_1: desito paññatto”tiādīsu viya pārisesanayena dhammasaddassa suttantābhidhammesveva
tika-s0104t:283_0: Saṅghaṃ ñāpesīti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Kataraṃ āvuso piṭakanti
tika-s0104t:283_1: vinayāvasesesu dvīsu piṭakesu kataraṃ piṭakaṃ. Vinayābhidhammānampi khuddakasaṅgītipariyāpannattā
tika-s0104t:283_2: tamantarena vuttaṃ “suttantapiṭake catasso saṅgītiyo”ti. Saṅgītiyoti ca saṅgāyanakāle
tika-s0104t:283_3: dīghādivasena visuṃ visuṃ niyametvā saṅgayhamānattā nikāyāva vuccanti. Tenāha “dīghasaṅgīti”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:283_4: Suttāneva sampiṇḍetvā vaggakaraṇavasena tayo vaggā, nāññānīti dassetuṃ “catuttiṃsa
tika-s0104t:283_5: suttāni tayo vaggā”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā catuttisaṃ suttāni tayo vaggā honti, suttāni
tika-s0104t:283_6: vā catuttiṃsa, tesaṃ vaggakaraṇavasena tayo vaggā, tesu tīsu vaggesūti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:283_7: “Brahmajālasuttaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyāmā”ti vutte kasmāti codanāsambhavato
tika-s0104t:283_9: tividhassāpi sīlassa pakāsanattā tena alaṅkataṃ vibhūsitaṃ tathā nānāvidhe micchājīvabhūte
tika-s0104t:283_12: tividhena vatthunā vimhāpanāti attho. Lapanāti vihāraṃ āgate manusse disvā “kimatthāya
tika-s0104t:283_13: bhonto āgatā, kiṃ bhikkhū nimantetuṃ. Yadi evaṃ gacchatha, ahaṃ pacchato bhikkhū
tika-s0104t:283_14: gahetvā āgacchāmī”ti evamādinā bhāsanā. Ādisaddena pupphadānādayo, nemittikatādayo
tika-s0104t:283_15: ca saṅgaṇhāti. Apicettha micchājīvasaddena kuhanalapanāhi sesaṃ anesanaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t:283_16: Ādisaddena pana tadavasesaṃ mahicchatādikaṃ dussilyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo
tika-s0104t:283_17: eva paliveṭhanaṭṭhena jālasarikkhatāya jālaṃ, tassa viniveṭhanaṃ apaliveṭhakaraṇaṃ tathā.
tika-s0104t:284_0: Antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti ettha antarāsaddo vivare “apicāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:284_1: bhikkhave tapodādvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu viya. Tasmā rājagahassa
tika-s0104t:284_2: ca nāḷandassa ca vivareti attho daṭṭhabbo. Antarāsaddena pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:284_3: kataṃ. Īdisesu ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva
tika-s0104t:284_4: antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti, so dutiyapadenapi yojetabbo hoti. Ayojiyamāne hi upayogavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:284_5: na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarāsaddayogena upayogavacanassa icchitattā.
tika-s0104t:284_6: Tattha rañño kīḷanatthaṃ paṭibhānacittavicitraagāramakaṃsu, taṃ “rājāgāraka”nti vuccati,
tika-s0104t:284_7: tasmiṃ. Ambalaṭṭhikāti rañño uyyānaṃ. Tassa kira dvārasamīpe taruṇo ambarukkho atthi,
tika-s0104t:284_8: taṃ “ambalaṭṭhikā”ti vadanti, tassa samīpe pavattattā uyyānampi “ambalaṭṭhikā” tveva
tika-s0104t:284_9: saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ yathā “varuṇanagara”nti, tasmā ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ nāma uyyāne rājāgāraketi
tika-s0104t:284_10: attho. Aviññāyamānassa hi viññāpanatthaṃ etaṃ ādhāradvayaṃ vuttaṃ rājāgārametassāti
tika-s0104t:284_11: vā rājāgārakaṃ, uyyānaṃ, rājāgāravati ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ nāma uyyāneti attho. Bhinnaliṅgampi
tika-s0104t:284_12: hi visesanapadamatthī”ti keci vadanti, evaṃ sati rājāgāraṃ ādhāro na siyā. “Rājāgāraketi
tika-s0104t:284_13: evaṃnāmake uyyāne abhiramanārahaṃ kira rājāgārampi. Tattha, yassa vasenetaṃ evaṃ
tika-s0104t:284_14: nāmaṃ labhatī”ti vajirabuddhitthero. Evaṃ sati “ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti āsannataruṇambarukkhena
tika-s0104t:284_15: visesetvā “rājāgārake”ti uyyānameva nāmavasena vuttanti attho āpajjati, tathā ca
tika-s0104t:284_16: vuttadosova siyā. Suppiyañca paribbājakanti suppiyaṃ nāma sañcayassa antevāsiṃ channaparibbājakañca.
tika-s0104t:284_17: Brahmadattañca māṇavanti ettha taruṇo “māṇavo”ti vutto “ambaṭṭho māṇavo, aṅgako māṇavo”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:284_18: viya, tasmā brahmadattaṃ nāma taruṇapurisañca ārabbhāti attho. Vaṇṇāvaṇṇeti pasaṃsāya
tika-s0104t:284_19: ceva garahāya ca. Atha vā guṇo vaṇṇo, aguṇo avaṇṇo, tesaṃ bhāsanaṃ uttarapadalopena
tika-s0104t:285_0: “Tato para”ntiādimhi ayaṃ vacanakkamo – sāmaññaphalaṃ panāvuso ānanda kattha bhāsitanti?
tika-s0104t:285_1: Rājagahe bhante jīvakambavaneti. Kena saddhinti? Ajātasattunā vedehiputtena saddhinti.
tika-s0104t:285_2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sāmaññaphalassa nidānampi pucchi,
tika-s0104t:285_3: puggalampi pucchīti. Ettha hi “kaṃ ārabbhā”ti avatvā “kena saddhi”nti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:285_4: Kasmāti ce? Na bhagavatā eva etaṃ suttaṃ bhāsitaṃ, raññāpi “yathā nu kho imāni puthusippāyatanānī”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:285_5: kiñci kiñci vuttamatthi, tasmā evameva vattabbanti. Imināva nayena sabbattha “kaṃ
tika-s0104t:285_6: ārabbhā”ti vā “kena saddhi”nti vā yathārahaṃ vatvā saṅgītimakāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tantinti
