tika-s0104t:285_7: suttavaggasamudāyavasena vavatthitaṃ pāḷiṃ. Evañca katvā “tivaggasaṅgahaṃ catuttiṃsasuttapaṭimaṇḍita”nti
tika-s0104t:285_8: vacanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti. Pariharathāti uggahaṇavācanādivasena dhāretha. Tato anantaraṃ
tika-s0104t:286_0: “Dhammasaṅgaho cā”tiādinā samāso. Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇitaṃ porāṇakehīti attho. Etena “mahādhammahadayena,
tika-s0104t:286_1: mahādhātukathāya vā saddhiṃ sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ vitaṇḍavādimataṃ
tika-s0104t:286_2: paṭikkhipitvā “kathāvatthunāva saddhi”nti vuttaṃ samānavādimataṃ dasseti. Saṇhañāṇassa,
tika-s0104t:287_1: yebhuyyena ca dhammaniddesabhūte tādise abhidhammapiṭakeva saṅgaṇhituṃ yuttaṃ, na
tika-s0104t:287_2: pana dīghanikāyādippakāre suttantapiṭake, nāpi paññattiniddesabhūte vinayapiṭaketi
tika-s0104t:287_3: dīghabhāṇakā jātakādīnaṃ abhidhammapiṭake saṅgahaṃ vadanti. Cariyāpiṭakabuddhavaṃsānañcettha
tika-s0104t:287_5: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana aṭṭhuppattivasena desitānaṃ jātakādīnaṃ yathānulomadesanābhāvato
tika-s0104t:287_6: tādise suttantapiṭake saṅgaho yutto, na pana sabhāvadhammaniddesabhūte yathādhammasāsane
tika-s0104t:287_7: abhidhammapiṭake, nāpi paññattiniddesabhūte yathāparādhasāsane vinayapiṭaketi jātakādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:288_1: tattha vavatthāpitesu dhammavinayesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ ekavidhādibhedaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:288_5: parinibbāyanassa ca vivare. Tadetaṃ pañcacattālīsa vassānīti kālavasena niyameti.
tika-s0104t:288_6: Paccavekkhantena vāti udānādivasena pavattadhammaṃ sandhāyāha. Yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:288_7: sabbaṃ tanti sambandho. Kiṃ panetanti āha “vimuttirasamevā”ti, na tadaññarasanti
tika-s0104t:288_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Vimuccitthāti vimutti, rasitabbaṃ assādetabbanti rasaṃ, vimuttisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0104t:288_9: rasametassāti vimuttirasaṃ, arahattaphalassādanti attho. Ayaṃ ācariyasāriputtattherassa
tika-s0104t:288_10: mati. Ācariyadhammapālatthero pana taṃ kecivādaṃ katvā imamatthamāha “vimuccati vimuccitthāti
tika-s0104t:288_11: vimutti, yathārahaṃ maggo phalañca. Rasanti guṇo, sampattikiccaṃ vā, vuttanayena
tika-s0104t:288_12: samāso. Vimuttānisaṃsaṃ, vimuttisampattikaṃ vā maggaphalanipphādanato, vimuttikiccaṃ
tika-s0104t:288_14: attharaso nāma cattāri sāmaññaphalāni, dhammaraso nāma cattāro maggā, vimuttiraso
tika-s0104t:289_0: Kiñcāpi avisesena sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ kilesavinayanena vinayo, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0104t:289_1: paṭipajjamāne apāyapatanādito dhāraṇena dhammo ca hoti, tathāpi idhādhippeteyeva
tika-s0104t:289_3: Avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhammo khandhādivasena sabhāvadhammadesanābāhullato. Atha
tika-s0104t:289_4: vā yadipi vinayo ca dhammoyeva pariyattiyādibhāvato, tathāpi vinayasaddasannidhāne
tika-s0104t:289_5: bhinnādhikaraṇabhāvena payutto dhammasaddo vinayatanti viparītaṃ tantimeva dīpeti
tika-s0104t:289_7: vuttaṃ. Yena vinaya…pe… dhammo, teneva tesaṃ tathābhāvaṃ saṅgītikkhandhake āhāti attho.
tika-s0104t:290_0: “Anekajātisaṃsāra”nti ayaṃ gāthā bhagavatā attano sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ arahattappattiṃ
tika-s0104t:290_1: paccavekkhantena ekūnavīsatimassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa anantaraṃ bhāsitā, tasmā “paṭhamabuddhavacana”nti
tika-s0104t:290_2: vuttā. Idaṃ kira sabbabuddhehi avijahitaṃ udānaṃ. Ayamassa saṅkhepattho – ahaṃ imassa
tika-s0104t:290_3: attabhāvasaṅkhātassa gehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena taṃ daṭṭhuṃ
tika-s0104t:290_4: sakkā, tassa bodhiñāṇassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ
tika-s0104t:290_5: anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ anibbisaṃ anibbisanto taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto
tika-s0104t:290_6: alabhantoyeva sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ. Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā
tika-s0104t:290_7: punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā, na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati, tasmā taṃ gavesanto
tika-s0104t:290_8: sandhāvissanti attho. Idāni bho attabhāvasaṅkhātassa gehassa kāraka taṇhāvaḍḍhaki
tika-s0104t:290_9: tvaṃ mayā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena diṭṭho asi. Puna imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0104t:290_10: mama gehaṃ na kāhasi na karissasi. Tava sabbā avasesakilesa phāsukā mayā bhaggā bhañjitā.
tika-s0104t:290_11: Imassa tayā katassa attabhāvasaṅkhātassa gehassa kūṭaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-s0104t:290_12: visaṅkhataṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ. Idāni mama cittaṃ visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0104t:290_13: gataṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ. Ahañca taṇhānaṃ khaya saṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaṃ, arahattaphalaṃ
tika-s0104t:290_14: vā ajjhagā adhigato pattosmīti. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana visaṅkhāragataṃ cittameva taṇhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:290_15: khayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaṃ, arahattaphalaṃ vā ajjhagā adhigatanti attho vutto.
tika-s0104t:291_1: bhavissantī”ti keci. Punappunanti abhiṇhatthe nipāto. Pātabbā rakkhitabbāti phāsu
tika-s0104t:291_2: pa-kārassa pha-kāraṃ katvā, phusitabbāti vā phāsu, sāyeva phāsukā. Ajjhagāti ca “ajjataniyamāttamiṃ
tika-s0104t:291_3: vā aṃ vā”ti vadanti. Yadi pana cittameva kattā, tadā parokkhāyeva. Antojappanavasena
tika-s0104t:291_4: kira bhagavā “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti gāthādvayamāha, tasmā esā manasā pavattitadhammānamādi.
tika-s0104t:291_5: “Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”ti ayaṃ pana vācāya pavattitadhammānanti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:292_0: Kecīti khandhakabhāṇakā. Paṭhamaṃ vutto pana dhammapadabhāṇakānaṃ vādo. Yadā…pe…
tika-s0104t:292_1: dhammāti ettha nidassanattho, ādyattho ca iti-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho. Nidassanena hi
tika-s0104t:292_2: mariyādavacanena vinā padatthavipallāsakārināva attho paripuṇṇo na hoti. Tattha ādyatthameva
tika-s0104t:292_3: iti-saddaṃ gahetvā iti-saddo ādiattho, “tena ātāpino…pe… sahetudhamma’ntiādigāthāttayaṃ
tika-s0104t:292_4: saṅgaṇhātī”ti ācariyasāriputtattherena vuttaṃ. Khandhaketi mahāvagge. Udānagāthanti
tika-s0104t:292_5: jātiyā ekavacanaṃ, tatthāpi vā paṭhamagāthameva gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:293_0: Ettha ca khandhakabhāṇakā evaṃ vadanti “dhammapadabhāṇakānaṃ gāthā manasāva desitattā
tika-s0104t:293_1: tadā mahato janassa upakārāya nāhosi, amhākaṃ pana gāthā vacībhedaṃ katvā desitattā
tika-s0104t:293_2: tadā suṇantānaṃ devabrahmānaṃ upakārāya ahosi, tasmā idameva paṭhamabuddhavacana”nti.
tika-s0104t:293_3: Dhammapadabhāṇakā pana “desanāya janassa upakārānupakārabhāvo paṭhamabhāve lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:293_4: na hoti, bhagavatā manasā paṭhamaṃ desitattā idameva paṭhamabuddhavacana”nti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:293_5: Tasmā ubhayampi ubhayathā yujjatīti veditabbaṃ. Nanu ca yadi “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti
tika-s0104t:293_6: gāthā manasāva desitā, atha kasmā dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāra’nti imaṃ
tika-s0104t:293_7: dhammadesanaṃ satthā bodhirukkhamūle nisinno udānavasena udānetvā aparabhāge ānandattherena
tika-s0104t:293_8: puṭṭho kathesī”ti vuttanti? Atthavasena tathāyeva gahetabbattā. Tatthāpi hi manasā
tika-s0104t:293_9: udānetvāti atthoyeva gahetabbo. Desanā viya hi udānampi manasā udānaṃ, vacasā udānanti
tika-s0104t:293_10: dvidhā viññāyati. Yadi cāyaṃ vacasā udānaṃ siyā, udānapāḷiyamāruḷhā bhaveyya, tasmā
tika-s0104t:293_11: udānapāḷiyamanāruḷhabhāvoyeva vacasā anudānetvā manasā udānabhāve kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:293_13: uppannā”ti etena pana sambajjhitabbaṃ. Visākhapuṇṇamāyameva hi bhagavā paccūsasamaye
tika-s0104t:293_14: sabbaññutaṃ patto. Lokiyasamaye pana evampi sambajjhanaṃ bhavati, tathāpi nesa sāsanasamayoti
tika-s0104t:293_15: na gahetabbaṃ. Somanassameva somanassamayaṃ yathā “dānamayaṃ, sīlamaya”nti, taṃsampayuttañāṇenāti
tika-s0104t:293_16: attho. Somanassena vā sahajātādisattiyā pakataṃ, tādisena ñāṇenātipi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t:294_0: Handāti codanatthe nipāto. Iṅgha sampādethāti hi codeti. Āmantayāmīti paṭivedayāmi,
tika-s0104t:294_1: bodhemīti attho. Voti pana “āmantayāmī”ti etassa kammapadaṃ. “Āmantanatthe dutiyāyeva,
tika-s0104t:294_2: na catutthī”ti hi vatvā tamevudāharanti akkharacintakā. Vayadhammāti aniccalakkhaṇamukhena
tika-s0104t:294_3: saṅkhārānaṃ dukkhānattalakkhaṇampi vibhāveti “yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ dukkhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:294_4: tadanattā”ti vacanato. Lakkhaṇattayavibhāvananayeneva ca tadārammaṇaṃ vipassanaṃ
tika-s0104t:294_6: aviparītaṃ nibbānagāminipaṭipadaṃ pakāsetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idāni tattha sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:294_8: appamādena sampādethāti attho. Apica “vayadhammā saṅkhārā”ti etena saṅkhepena saṃvejetvā
tika-s0104t:294_9: “appamādena sampādethā”ti saṅkhepeneva niravasesaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti. Appamādapadañhi
tika-s0104t:294_10: sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ sāsanaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhati, sikkhattayasaṅgahitāya
tika-s0104t:294_11: kevalaparipuṇṇāya sāsanasaṅkhātāya sammāpaṭipattiyā appamādena sampādethāti attho.
tika-s0104t:294_12: Ubhinnamantareti dvinnaṃ vacanānamantarāḷe vemajjhe. Ettha hi kālavatā kālopi nidassito
tika-s0104t:295_0: Suttantapiṭakanti ettha suttameva suttantaṃ yathā “kammantaṃ, vananta”nti. Saṅgītañca
tika-s0104t:295_2: Keci pana ‘subhasuttaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītiyamasaṅgīta’nti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. Paṭhamasaṅgītito
tika-s0104t:295_3: puretarameva hi āyasmatā ānandattherena jetavane viharantena subhassa māṇavassa bhāsita”nti
tika-s0104t:295_4: ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ. Subhasuttaṃ pana “evaṃ me suttaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā
tika-s0104t:295_5: ānando sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme aciraparinibbute bhagavatī”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:295_6: āgataṃ. Tattha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādivacanaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ āyasmatā ānandatthereneva
tika-s0104t:295_7: vattuṃ yuttarūpaṃ na hoti. Na hi ānandatthero sayameva subhasuttaṃ desetvā “evaṃ
tika-s0104t:295_8: me suta”ntiādīni vadati. Evaṃ pana vattabbaṃ siyā “ekamidāhaṃ bhante samayaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:295_9: viharāmi jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”tiādi. Tasmā dutiyatatiyasaṅgītikārakehi
tika-s0104t:295_10: “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā subhasuttaṃ saṅgītimāropitaṃ viya dissati. Athācariyadhammapālattherassa
tika-s0104t:295_12: tantiṃ ṭhapetukāmehi mahākassapattherādīhi aññesu suttesu āgatanayeneva ‘evaṃ me
tika-s0104t:295_13: suta’ntiādinā tanti ṭhapitā”ti. Evaṃ sati yujjeyya. Atha vā āyasmā ānando subhasuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:295_14: sayaṃ desentopi sāmaññaphalādīsu bhagavatā desitanayeneva desesīti bhagavato sammukhā
tika-s0104t:295_15: laddhanaye ṭhatvā desitattā bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ attani adahanto “evaṃ me suta”ntiādimāhāti
tika-s0104t:295_17: puna saṅgītañcāti atthavasena ninnānākaraṇameva. Samodhānetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ nāma
tika-s0104t:295_18: veditabbaṃ, sutta…pe… abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāma veditabbanti yojanā.
tika-s0104t:296_1: dve vibhaṅgā. Mahāvaggacūḷavaggesu āgatā dvāvīsati khandhakā. Paccekaṃ soḷasahi vārehi
tika-s0104t:296_2: upalakkhitattā soḷasa parivārāti vuttaṃ. Parivārapāḷiyañhi mahāvibhaṅge soḷasa vārā,
tika-s0104t:296_3: bhikkhunīvibhaṅge soḷasa vārā cāti bāttiṃsa vārā āgatā. Potthakesu pana katthaci
tika-s0104t:296_4: “parivārā”ti ettakameva dissati, bahūsu pana potthakesu vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-s0104t:296_5: “soḷasa parivārā”ti evameva dissamānattā ayampi pāṭho na sakkā paṭibāhitunti tassevattho
tika-s0104t:296_6: vutto. “Itī”ti yathāvuttaṃ buddhavacanaṃ nidassetvā “ida”nti taṃ parāmasati. Iti-saddo
tika-s0104t:296_7: vā idamatthe, idanti vacanasiliṭṭhatāmattaṃ, iti idanti vā pariyāyadvayaṃ idamattheyeva
tika-s0104t:296_8: vattati “idānetarahi vijjatī”tiādīsu viya. Esa nayo īdisesu. Brahmajālādīni catuttiṃsa
tika-s0104t:296_9: suttāni saṅgayhanti ettha, etena vā, tesaṃ vā saṅgaho gaṇanā etassāti brahmajālādicatuttiṃsasuttasaṅgaho.
tika-s0104t:296_10: Evamitaresupi. Heṭṭhā vuttesu dīghabhāṇakamajjhimabhāṇakānaṃ vādesu majjhimabhāṇakānaññeva
tika-s0104t:296_11: vādassa yuttatarattā khuddakapāṭhādayopi suttantapiṭakeyeva saṅgahetvā dassento “khuddaka…pe…
tika-s0104t:296_12: suttantapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti āha. Tattha “suṇātha bhāvitattānaṃ, gāthā atthūpanāyikāti
tika-s0104t:297_0: Evaṃ sarūpato piṭakattayaṃ niyametvā idāni nibbacanaṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:297_1: Tatthāti tesu tibbidhesu piṭakesu. Vividhavisesanayattāti vividhanayattā, visesanayattā
tika-s0104t:297_2: ca. Vinayanatoti vinayanabhāvato, bhāvappadhānaniddesoyaṃ, bhāvalopo vā, itarathā
tika-s0104t:297_3: dabbameva padhānaṃ siyā, tathā ca sati vinayanatāguṇasamaṅginā vinayadabbeneva hetubhūtena
tika-s0104t:297_4: vinayoti akkhāto, na pana vinayanatāguṇenāti anadhippetatthappasaṅgo bhaveyya. Ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:297_5: nayo edisesu. Vinīyate vā vinayanaṃ, tatoti attho. Ayaṃ vinayoti atthapaññattibhūto
tika-s0104t:297_6: saññīsaṅkhāto ayaṃ tanti vinayo. Vinayoti akkhātoti saddapaññattibhūto saññāsaṅkhāto
tika-s0104t:297_7: vinayo nāmāti kathito. Atthapaññattiyā hi nāmapaññattivibhāvanaṃ nibbacananti.
tika-s0104t:298_0: Idāni imissā gāthāya atthaṃ vibhāvento āha “vividhā hī”tiādi. “Vividhā ettha nayā,
tika-s0104t:298_1: tasmā vividhanayattā vinayoti akkhāto”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Vividhattaṃ sarūpato dasseti
tika-s0104t:298_4: pavatto ācāro ajjhācāro, vītikkamo, kāye, vācāya ca pavatto so, tassa nisedhanaṃ
tika-s0104t:298_5: tathā, tena tathānisedhanameva pariyāyena kāyavācāvinayanaṃ nāmāti dasseti. “Tasmā”ti
tika-s0104t:298_6: vatvā tassānekadhā parāmasanamāha “vividhanayattā”tiādi. Yathāvuttā ca gāthā īdisassa
tika-s0104t:298_7: nibbacanassa pakāsanatthaṃ vuttāti dassetuṃ “tenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāti vividhanayattādihetunā
tika-s0104t:298_8: karaṇabhūtenāti vadanti. Apica “vividhā hī”tiādivākyassa yathāvuttassa guṇaṃ dassento
tika-s0104t:298_9: “tenā”tiādimāhātipi sambandhaṃ vadanti. Evaṃ sati tenāti vividhanayattādinā hetubhūtenāti
tika-s0104t:298_10: attho. Atha vā yathāvuttavacanameva sandhāya porāṇehi ayaṃ gāthā vuttāti saṃsandetuṃ
tika-s0104t:298_11: “tenā”tiādi vuttantipi vadanti, dutiyanaye viya “tenā”ti padassa attho. Etanti gāthāvacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:298_12: Etassāti vinayasaddassa, “vacanatthā”ti padena sambandho. “Vacanassa attho”ti hi
tika-s0104t:298_13: sambandhe vuttepi tassa vacanasāmaññato visesaṃ dassetuṃ “etassā”ti puna vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:298_14: Neruttikā pana samāsataddhitesu siddhesu sāmaññattā, nāmasaddattā ca edisesu saddantarena
tika-s0104t:299_1: yojetabbaṃ. Tamatthaṃ vivarati “tañhī”tiādinā. Attatthaparatthādibhede attheti yo
tika-s0104t:299_2: taṃ suttaṃ sajjhāyati, suṇāti, vāceti, cinteti, deseti ca, suttena saṅgahito sīlādiattho
tika-s0104t:299_3: tassapi hoti, tena parassa sādhetabbato parassapīti tadubhayaṃ taṃ suttaṃ sūceti
tika-s0104t:299_4: dīpeti, tathā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe lokiyalokuttaratthe cāti evamādibhede
tika-s0104t:299_5: atthe ādi-saddena saṅgaṇhāti. Atthasaddo cāyaṃ hitapariyāyo, na bhāsitatthavacano.
tika-s0104t:299_6: Yadi siyā, suttaṃ attanopi bhāsitatthaṃ sūceti, parassapīti ayamanadhippetattho vutto
tika-s0104t:299_7: siyā. Suttena hi yo attho pakāsito, so tasseva pakāsakassa suttassa hoti, tasmā na
tika-s0104t:299_8: tena parattho sūcito, tena sūcetabbassa paratthassa nivattetabbassa abhāvā attatthaggahaṇañca
tika-s0104t:299_9: na kattabbaṃ. Attatthaparatthavinimuttassa bhāsitatthassa abhāvā ādiggahaṇañca na
tika-s0104t:299_10: kattabbaṃ, tasmā yathāvuttassa hitapariyāyassa atthassa sutte asambhavato suttādhārassa
tika-s0104t:300_0: Atha vā suttaṃ anapekkhitvā ye attatthādayo atthappabhedā “na ha’ññadattha’tthi pasaṃsalābhā”ti
tika-s0104t:300_1: etassa padassa niddese vuttā “attattho, parattho, ubhayattho, diṭṭhadhammiko attho,
tika-s0104t:300_2: samparāyiko attho, uttāno attho, gambhīro attho, gūḷho attho, paṭicchanno attho,
tika-s0104t:300_3: neyyo attho, nīto attho, anavajjo attho, nikkileso attho, vodāno attho, paramattho”ti,
tika-s0104t:300_4: te atthappabhede sūcetīti attho gahetabbo. Kiñcāpi hi suttanirapekkhaṃ attatthādayo
tika-s0104t:300_5: vuttā suttatthabhāvena aniddiṭṭhattā, tesu pana ekopi atthappabhedo suttena dīpetabbataṃ
tika-s0104t:300_6: nātivattatīti. Imasmiñca atthavikappe atthasaddo bhāsitatthapariyāyopi hoti. Ettha
tika-s0104t:300_7: hi purimakā pañca atthappabhedā hitapariyāyā, tato pare cha bhāsitatthappabhedā,
tika-s0104t:300_8: pacchimakā cattāro ubhayasabhāvā. Tattha suviññeyyatāya vibhāvena anagādhabhāvo uttāno.
tika-s0104t:300_9: Duradhigamatāya vibhāvena agādhabhāvo gambhīro. Avivaṭo gūḷho. Mūludakādayo viya
tika-s0104t:300_10: paṃsunā akkharasannivesādinā tirohito paṭicchanno. Niddhāretvā ñāpetabbo neyyo. Yathārutavasena
tika-s0104t:300_11: veditabbo nīto. Anavajjanikkilesavodānā pariyāyavasena vuttā, kusalavipākakiriyādhammavasena
tika-s0104t:300_12: vā yathākkamaṃ yojetabbā. Paramattho nibbānaṃ, dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvo eva vā.
tika-s0104t:301_0: Atha vā “attanā ca appiccho hotī”ti attatthaṃ, “appicchakathañca paresaṃ kattā hotī”ti
tika-s0104t:301_1: paratthaṃ sūceti. Evaṃ “attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, parañca pāṇātipātā
tika-s0104t:301_2: veramaṇiyā samādapetī”tiādisuttāni yojetabbāni. Apare pana “yathāsabhāvaṃ bhāsitaṃ
tika-s0104t:301_3: attatthaṃ, pūraṇakassapādīnamaññatitthiyānaṃ samayabhūtaṃ paratthaṃ sūceti, suttena
tika-s0104t:301_4: vā saṅgahitaṃ attatthaṃ, suttānulomabhūtaṃ paratthaṃ, suttantanayabhūtaṃ vā attatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:301_5: vinayābhidhammanayabhūtaṃ paratthaṃ sūcetī”tipi vadanti. Vinayābhidhammehi ca visesetvā
tika-s0104t:301_6: suttasaddassa attho vattabbo, tasmā veneyyajjhāsayavasappavattāya desanāya sātisayaṃ
tika-s0104t:301_7: attahitaparahitādīni pakāsitāni honti tappadhānabhāvato, na pana āṇādhammasabhāva-vasappavattāyāti
tika-s0104t:301_8: idameva “atthānaṃ sūcanato sutta”nti vuttaṃ. Sūca-saddassa cettha rasso. “Evañca
tika-s0104t:301_9: katvā ‘ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpanna’nti ca sakavāde pañca
tika-s0104t:301_10: suttasatānī’ti ca evamādīsu suttasaddo upacaritoti gahetabbo”ti ācariyasāriputtattherena
tika-s0104t:301_11: vuttaṃ. Aññe pana yathāvuttasadiseneva nibbacanena suttasaddassa vinayābhidhammānampi vācakattaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0104t:302_0: Sutte ca āṇādhammasabhāvo veneyyajjhāsayamanuvattati, na vinayābhidhammesu viya veneyyajjhāsayo
tika-s0104t:302_3: idampi veneyyānaṃ hitasampādane suttantadesanāya tapparabhāvameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:302_5: vuttattā”ti. Etena ca hetunā nanu vinayābhidhammāpi suvuttā, atha kasmā idameva evaṃ
tika-s0104t:303_1: vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā sassaṃ nāma vapanaropanādikkhaṇeyeva phalaṃ na pasavati,
tika-s0104t:303_2: anupubbajagganādivasena kālantareneva pasavati, tathā idampi savanadhāraṇādikkhaṇeyeva
tika-s0104t:303_3: atthe na pasavati, anupubbasikkhādivasena kālantareneva pasavatīti. Pasavatīti ca
tika-s0104t:303_4: phalati, abhinipphādetīti attho. Abhinipphādanameva hi phalanaṃ. Upāyasamaṅgīnaññeva
tika-s0104t:303_5: atthābhinipphattiṃ dassento “dhenu viya khīra”nti āha. Ayamettha adhippāyo – yathā
tika-s0104t:303_6: dhenu nāma kāle jātavacchā thanaṃ gahetvā duhataṃ upāyavantānameva khīraṃ paggharāpeti,
tika-s0104t:303_7: na akāle ajātavacchā. Kālepi vā visāṇādikaṃ gahetvā duhataṃ anupāyavantānaṃ, tathā
tika-s0104t:303_8: idampi nissaraṇādinā savanadhāraṇādīni kurutaṃ upāyavantānameva sīlādiatthe paggharāpeti,
tika-s0104t:303_9: na alagaddūpamāya savanadhāraṇādīni kurutaṃ anupāyavantānanti. Yadipi “sūdatī”ti
tika-s0104t:303_10: etassa gharati siñcatīti attho, tathāpi sakammikadhātuttā paggharāpetīti kāritavasena
tika-s0104t:303_11: attho vutto yathā “taratī”ti etassa nipātetīti attho”ti. “Suttāṇā”ti etassa atthamāha
tika-s0104t:304_0: Suttasabhāganti suttasadisaṃ. Tabbhāvaṃ dasseti “yathā hī”tiādinā. Tacchakānaṃ suttanti
tika-s0104t:304_1: vaḍḍhakīnaṃ kāḷasuttaṃ. Pamāṇaṃ hoti tadanusārena tacchanato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
tika-s0104t:304_2: yathā kāḷasuttaṃ pasāretvā saññāṇe kate gahetabbaṃ, vissajjetabbañca paññāyati, tasmā
tika-s0104t:304_3: taṃ tacchakānaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ vivādesu uppannesu sutte ānītamatte “idaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:304_4: idaṃ vissajjetabba”nti pākaṭattā vivādo vūpasammati, tasmā etaṃ viññūnaṃ pamāṇanti.
tika-s0104t:304_5: Idāni aññathāpi suttasabhāgataṃ vibhāvento “yathā cā”tiādimāha. Suttenāti pupphāvutena
tika-s0104t:304_6: yena kenaci thirasuttena. Saṅgahitānīti suṭṭhu, samaṃ vā gahitāni, āvutānīti attho.
tika-s0104t:304_7: Na vikiriyantīti ito cito ca vippakiṇṇābhāvamāha, na viddhaṃsīyantīti chejjabhejjābhāvaṃ.
tika-s0104t:304_8: Ayametthādhippāyo – yathā thirasuttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni vātena na vikiriyanti
tika-s0104t:304_9: na viddhaṃsīyanti, evaṃ suttena saṅgahitā atthā micchāvādena na vikiriyanti na viddhaṃsīyantīti.
tika-s0104t:304_11: āṇādhammasabhāvehi vinayābhidhammehi visesetvā imasseva suttasabhāgatā vuttā. “Tenā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:304_12: vuttanayānusārena sambandho ceva attho ca yathārahaṃ vattabbo. Ettha ca “suttantapiṭaka”nti
tika-s0104t:304_13: heṭṭhā vuttepi antasaddassa avacanaṃ tassa visuṃ atthābhāvadassanatthaṃ tabbhāvavuttito.
tika-s0104t:304_14: Sahayogassa hi saddassa avacanena sesatā tassa tulyādhikaraṇataṃ, anatthakataṃ vā ñāpeti.
tika-s0104t:305_0: Yanti esa nipāto kāraṇe, yenāti attho. Ettha abhidhamme vuḍḍhimanto dhammā yena vuttā,
tika-s0104t:305_1: tena abhidhammo nāma akkhātoti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Abhi-saddassa atthavasenāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:305_4: vuḍḍhiyaṃ āgato”ti. Abhiññātāti aḍḍhacandādinā kenaci saññāṇena ñātā, paññātā pākaṭāti
tika-s0104t:305_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Aḍḍhacandādibhāvo hi rattiyā upalakkhaṇavasena paññāṇaṃ hoti “yasmā
tika-s0104t:305_6: aḍḍho, tasmā aṭṭhamī. Yasmā ūno, tasmā cātuddasī. Yasmā puṇṇo, tasmā pannarasī”ti.
tika-s0104t:305_7: Abhilakkhitāti etthāpi ayamevattho veditabbo, idaṃ pana mūlapaṇṇāsake bhayabheravasutte
tika-s0104t:305_9: Yajjevaṃ lakkhitasaddasseva lakkhaṇatthadīpanato abhi-saddo anatthakova siyāti? Nevaṃ
tika-s0104t:305_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ tassāpi tadatthajotanato. Vācakasaddasannidhāne hi upasagganipātā tadatthajotakamattāti
tika-s0104t:305_11: lakkhitasaddena vācakabhāvena pakāsitassa lakkhaṇatthasseva jotakabhāvena pakāsanato
tika-s0104t:305_12: abhi-saddopi lakkhaṇe pavattatīti vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rājābhirājāti parehi rājūhi
tika-s0104t:305_13: pūjitumaraho rājā. Pūjiteti pūjārahe. Idaṃ pana suttanipāte selasutte.
tika-s0104t:306_4: cetanā akusalo, na pāṇasaṅkhātajīvitindriyassa upacchedasaṅkhāto atipāto. Tathā “adinnassa
tika-s0104t:306_5: parasantakassa ādānasaṅkhātā viññatti abyākato dhammo, taṃviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā
tika-s0104t:306_6: akusalo dhammo”ti evamādināpi aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhammeti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:306_7: Abhivinayeti ettha pana “jātarūparajataṃ na paṭiggahetabba”nti vadanto vinaye vineti
tika-s0104t:306_8: nāma. Ettha ca “evaṃ paṭiggaṇhato pācittiyaṃ, evaṃ pana dukkaṭa”nti vadanto abhivinaye
tika-s0104t:306_9: vineti nāmāti vadanti. Tasmā jātarūparajataṃ parasantakaṃ theyyacittena gaṇhantassa
tika-s0104t:306_11: pācittiyaṃ, attano atthāya gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, kevalaṃ lolatāya gaṇhantassa
tika-s0104t:306_13: vinayepi paṭibalo vinetunti attho daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ pana paricchinnataṃ sarūpato saṅkhepeneva
tika-s0104t:307_0: Abhikkantenāti ettha kantiyā adhikattaṃ abhi-saddo dīpetīti vuttaṃ “adhike”ti. Nanu
tika-s0104t:307_1: ca “abhikkamantī”ti ettha abhi-saddo kamanakiriyāya vuḍḍhibhāvaṃ atirekattaṃ dīpeti,
tika-s0104t:307_3: ettha kantiyā adhikattaṃ visiṭṭhabhāvaṃ dīpetīti idaṃ tāva yuttaṃ kiriyāvisesakattā
tika-s0104t:307_4: upasaggassa. “Pādayo kiriyāyoge upasaggā”ti hi saddasatthe vuttaṃ. “Abhirājā, abhivinaye”ti
tika-s0104t:307_5: pana pūjitaparicchinnesu rājavinayesu abhi-saddo vattatīti kathametaṃ yujjeyya. Na
tika-s0104t:307_6: hi asatvavācī saddo satvavācako sambhavatīti? Natthi atra doso pūjanaparicchedanakiriyānampi
tika-s0104t:307_7: dīpanato, tāhi ca kiriyāhi yuttesu rājavinayesupi pavattattā. Abhipūjito rājāti hi
tika-s0104t:307_8: atthena kiriyākārakasambandhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā kammasādhanabhūtaṃ rājadabbaṃ abhi-saddo
tika-s0104t:307_9: padhānato vadati, pūjanakiriyaṃ pana appadhānato. Tathā abhiparicchinno vinayoti
tika-s0104t:307_10: atthena kiriyākārakasambandhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā kammasādhanabhūtaṃ vinayadabbaṃ abhi-saddo
tika-s0104t:307_11: padhānato vadati, paricchindanakiriyaṃ pana appadhānato. Tasmā atimālādīsu ati-saddo
tika-s0104t:307_12: viya abhi-saddo ettha saha sādhanena kiriyaṃ vadatīti abhirājaabhivinayasaddā sopasaggāva
tika-s0104t:307_13: siddhā. Evaṃ abhidhammasaddepi abhisaddo saha sādhanena vuḍḍhiyādikiriyaṃ vadatīti
tika-s0104t:308_0: Hotu abhi-saddo yathāvuttesu atthesu, tappayogena pana dhammasaddena dīpitā vuḍḍhimantādayo
tika-s0104t:308_1: dhammā ettha vuttā na bhaveyyuṃ, kathaṃ ayamattho yujjeyyāti anuyoge sati taṃ pariharanto
tika-s0104t:308_2: “ettha cā”tiādimāha. Tattha etthāti etasmiṃ abhidhamme. Upanyāse ca-saddo. Bhāvetīti
tika-s0104t:308_3: cittassa vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ, pharitvāti ārammaṇassa vaḍḍhanaṃ, tasmā tāhi bhāvanāpharaṇavuḍḍhīhi
tika-s0104t:308_4: vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttāti attho. Ārammaṇādīhīti ārammaṇasampayuttakammadvārapaṭipadādīhi.
tika-s0104t:308_5: Ekantato lokuttaradhammānaññeva pūjārahattā “sekkhā dhammā”tiādinā teyeva pūjitāti
tika-s0104t:308_6: dassitā. “Pūjārahā”ti etena kattādisādhanaṃ, atītādikālaṃ, sakkuṇeyyatthaṃ vā nivatteti.
tika-s0104t:308_7: Pūjitabbāyeva hi dhammā kālavisesaniyamarahitā pūjārahā ettha vuttāti adhippāyo dassito.
tika-s0104t:308_9: mahaggatā dhammā adhikā, tatopi uttaravirahato anuttarā dhammāti dasseti “mahaggatā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:309_0: Yaṃ panetthāti etesu vinayādīsu tīsu aññamaññavisiṭṭhesu yaṃ avisiṭṭhaṃ samānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:309_1: taṃ piṭakanti attho. Vinayādayo hi tayo saddā aññamaññāsādhāraṇattā visiṭṭhā nāma,
tika-s0104t:309_2: piṭakasaddo pana tehi tīhipi sādhāraṇattā “avisiṭṭho”ti vuccati. Pariyattibbhājanatthatoti
tika-s0104t:309_3: pariyāpuṇitabbatthapatiṭṭhānatthehi karaṇabhūtehi, visesanabhūtehi vā. Apica pariyattibbhājanatthato
tika-s0104t:309_4: pariyattibhājanatthanti āhūti attho daṭṭhabbo. Paccattatthe hi to-saddo iti-saddena
tika-s0104t:309_5: niddisitabbattā. Itinā niddisitabbehito – saddamicchanti neruttikā yathā “aniccato
tika-s0104t:309_6: dukkhato anattato vipassantī”ti etena pariyāpuṇitabbato, taṃtadatthānaṃ bhājanato
tika-s0104t:309_7: ca piṭakaṃ nāmāti dasseti. Anipphannapāṭipadikapadañhetaṃ. Saddavidū pana “piṭa saddasaṅghāṭesū”ti
tika-s0104t:309_8: vatvā idha vuttameva payogamudāharanti, tasmā tesaṃ matena piṭīyati saddīyati pariyāpuṇīyatīti
tika-s0104t:309_9: piṭakaṃ, piṭīyati vā saṅghāṭīyati taṃtadattho etthāti piṭakanti nibbacanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:310_0: Mā piṭakasampadānenāti kālāmasutte, sāḷhasutte ca āgataṃ pāḷimāha. Tadaṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-s0104t:310_1: “amhākaṃ piṭakatantiyā saddhiṃ sametīti mā gaṇhitthā”ti attho vutto. Ācariyasāriputtattherena
tika-s0104t:310_2: pana “pāḷisampadānavasena mā gaṇhathā”ti vuttaṃ. Kudālapiṭakamādāyāti kudālañca piṭakañca
tika-s0104t:310_3: ādāya. Ku vuccati pathavī, tassā dālanato vidālanato ayomayaupakaraṇaviseso kudālaṃ
tika-s0104t:310_4: nāma. Tesaṃ tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ bhājanabhāvato tālapaṇṇavettalatādīhi kato bhājanaviseso
tika-s0104t:310_5: piṭakaṃ nāma. Idaṃ pana mūlapaṇṇāsake kakacūpamasutte.
tika-s0104t:311_0: “Tena…pe… ñeyyā”ti gāthāpadaṃ ulliṅgetvā “tenā”tiādinā vivarati. Sabbādīhi sabbanāmehi
tika-s0104t:311_1: vuttassa vā liṅgamādiyate, vuccamānassa vā, idha pana vatticchāya vuttassevāti katvā
tika-s0104t:311_2: “vinayo ca so piṭakañcā”ti vuttaṃ. “Yathāvutteneva nayenā”ti iminā “evaṃ duvidhatthena…pe…
tika-s0104t:311_3: katvā”ti ca “pariyattibhāvato, tassa tassa atthassa bhājanato cā”ti ca vuttaṃ sabbamatidisati.
tika-s0104t:311_4: Tayopīti ettha apisaddo, pi-saddo vā avayavasampiṇḍanattho. “Apī”ti avatvā “pī”ti
tika-s0104t:311_5: vadanto hi api-saddo viya pi-saddopi visuṃ nipāto atthīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:312_0: Kathetabbānaṃ atthānaṃ desakāyattena āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā.
tika-s0104t:312_2: Kathetabbassa saṃvarāsaṃvarādino atthassa kathanaṃ vacanapaṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ kathā,
tika-s0104t:312_3: idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – desitāraṃ bhagavantamapekkhitvā desanā, sāsitabbapuggalavasena
tika-s0104t:312_4: sāsanaṃ, kathetabbassa atthassa vasena kathāti evamimesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbanti.
tika-s0104t:312_5: Ettha ca kiñcāpi desanādayo desetabbādinirapekkhā na honti, āṇādayo pana visesato
tika-s0104t:312_6: desakādiadhīnāti taṃ taṃ visesayogavasena desanādīnaṃ bhedo vutto. Yathā hi āṇāvidhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:312_7: visesato āṇārahādhīnaṃ tattha kosallayogato, evaṃ vohāraparamatthavidhānāni ca vidhāyakādhīnānīti
tika-s0104t:312_8: āṇādividhino desakāyattatā vuttā. Aparādhajjhāsayānurūpaṃ viya ca dhammānurūpampi
tika-s0104t:312_9: sāsanaṃ visesato, tathā vinetabbapuggalāpekkhanti sāsitabbapuggalavasena sāsanaṃ
tika-s0104t:312_10: vuttaṃ. Saṃvarāsaṃvaranāmarūpānaṃ viya ca vinibbeṭhetabbāya diṭṭhiyā kathanaṃ sati
tika-s0104t:312_11: vācāvatthusmiṃ, nāsatīti visesato tadadhīnaṃ, tasmā kathetabbassa atthassa vasena
tika-s0104t:317_0: Padattayampetaṃ samodhānetvā tāsaṃ bhedoti katvā bhedasaddo visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbo
tika-s0104t:317_1: dvandapadato paraṃ suyyamānattā “desanābhedaṃ, sāsanabhedaṃ, kathābhedañca yathārahaṃ
tika-s0104t:317_2: paridīpaye”ti. Bhedanti ca nānattaṃ, visesaṃ vā. Tesu piṭakesu. Sikkhā ca pahānañca
tika-s0104t:318_0: Dutiyagāthāya pariyattibhedaṃ pariyāpuṇanassa pakāraṃ, visesañca vibhāvaye. Yahiṃ
tika-s0104t:318_1: vinayādike piṭake. Yaṃ sampattiṃ, vipattiñca yathā bhikkhu pāpuṇāti, tathā tampi
tika-s0104t:318_2: sabbaṃ tahiṃ vibhāvayeti sambandho. Atha vā yaṃ pariyattibhedaṃ sampattiṃ, vipattiñca
tika-s0104t:318_3: yahiṃ yathā bhikkhu pāpuṇāti, tathā tampi sabbaṃ tahiṃ vibhāvayeti yojetabbaṃ. Yathāti
tika-s0104t:318_5: suppaṭipattiduppaṭipattīti etehi pakārehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Santesupi ca aññesu tathā
tika-s0104t:319_0: Tatrāti tāsu gāthāsu. Ayanti adhunā vakkhamānā kathā. Paridīpanāti samantato pakāsanā,
tika-s0104t:319_1: kiñcimattampi asesetvā vibhajanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vibhāvanāti evaṃ paridīpanāyapi sati
tika-s0104t:319_2: gūḷhaṃ paṭicchannamakatvā sotūnaṃ suviññeyyabhāvena āvibhāvanā. Saṅkhepena paridīpanā,
tika-s0104t:319_3: vitthārena vibhāvanātipi vadanti. Apica etaṃ padadvayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttānurūpato kathitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:319_4: atthato pana ekameva. Tasmā paridīpanā paṭhamagāthāya, vibhāvanā dutiyagāthāyāti
tika-s0104t:319_5: yojetabbaṃ. Ca-saddena ubhayatthaṃ aññamaññaṃ samucceti. Kasmā, vuccantīti āha “ettha
tika-s0104t:319_6: hī”tiādi. Hīti kāraṇe nipāto “akkharavipattiyaṃ hī”tiādīsu viya. Yasmā, kasmāti vā
tika-s0104t:319_7: attho. Āṇaṃ paṇetuṃ [ṭhapetuṃ ] arahatīti āṇāraho, sammāsambuddhattā, mahākāruṇikatāya
tika-s0104t:319_8: ca aviparītahitopadesakabhāvena pamāṇavacanattā āṇārahena bhagavatāti attho. Vohāraparamatthadhammānampi
tika-s0104t:319_9: tattha sabbhāvato “āṇābāhullato”ti vuttaṃ, tena yebhuyyanayaṃ dasseti. Ito paresupi
tika-s0104t:319_10: eseva nayo. Visesena sattānaṃ manaṃ avaharatīti vohāro, paññatti, tasmiṃ kusalo, tena.
tika-s0104t:320_0: Pacuro bahulo aparādho doso vītikkamo yesaṃ te pacurāparādhā, seyyasakattherādayo.
tika-s0104t:320_1: Yathāparādhanti dosānurūpaṃ. “Anekajjhāsayā”tiādīsu āsayova ajjhāsayo, so atthato
tika-s0104t:320_2: diṭṭhi, ñāṇañca, pabhedato pana catubbidho hoti. Vuttañca –
tika-s0104t:323_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā
tika-s0104t:323_1: imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā. Yathāha “dvayanissito kho panāyaṃ kaccāna loko yebhuyyena
tika-s0104t:323_2: atthitañca natthitañcā”ti, atthitāti hi sassataggāho adhippeto, natthitāti ucchedaggāho.
tika-s0104t:323_3: Ayaṃ tāva vaṭṭanissitānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ āsayo. Vivaṭṭanissitānaṃ pana suddhasattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:323_4: anulomikā khanti, yathābhūtañāṇanti duvidho āsayo. Tattha ca anulomikā khanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:323_5: Yathābhūtañāṇaṃ pana kammasakatāñāṇaṃ. Catubbidho peso āsayanti sattā ettha nivasanti,
tika-s0104t:323_6: cittaṃ vā āgamma seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya. Yathā migo gocarāya gantvāpi paccāgantvā
tika-s0104t:323_7: tattheva vanagahane sayatīti taṃ tassa “āsayo”ti vuccati, tathā cittaṃ aññathāpi
tika-s0104t:323_8: pavattitvā yattha paccāgamma seti, tassa so “āsayo”ti. Kāmarāgādayo satta anusayā.
tika-s0104t:323_9: Mūsikavisaṃ viya kāraṇalābhe uppajjamānārahā anāgatā, atītā, paccuppannā ca taṃsabhāvattā
tika-s0104t:323_10: tathā vuccanti. Na hi dhammānaṃ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedoti. Cariyāti rāgacariyādikā
tika-s0104t:323_11: cha mūlacariyā, antarabhedena anekavidhā, saṃsaggavasena pana tesaṭṭhi honti. Atha
tika-s0104t:323_12: vā cariyāti sucaritaduccaritavasena duvidhaṃ caritaṃ. Tañhi vibhaṅge caritaniddese niddiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:324_0: “Adhimutti nāma ‘ajjeva pabbajissāmi, ajjeva arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmī’tiādinā tanninnabhāvena
tika-s0104t:324_1: pavattamānaṃ sanniṭṭhāna”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana
tika-s0104t:324_2: “adhimutti nāma sattānaṃ pubbacariyavasena abhiruci, sā duvidhā hīnapaṇītabhedenā’ti
tika-s0104t:324_3: vuttaṃ. Tathā hi yāya hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikeyeva satte sevanti, paṇītādhimuttikā
tika-s0104t:324_4: paṇītādhimuttikeyeva. Sace hi ācariyupajjhāyā sīlavanto na honti, saddhivihārikā
tika-s0104t:324_5: sīlavanto, te attano ācariyupajjhāyepi na upasaṅkamanti, attanā sadise sāruppabhikkhūyeva
tika-s0104t:324_6: upasaṅkamanti. Sace ācariyupajjhāyā sāruppabhikkhū, itare asāruppā, tepi na ācariyupajjhāye
tika-s0104t:324_7: upasaṅkamanti, attanā sadise asāruppabhikkhūyeva upasaṅkamanti. Dhātusaṃyuttavasena
tika-s0104t:324_8: cesa attho dīpetabbo. Evamayaṃ hīnādhimuttikādīnaṃ aññamañño pasevanādiniyamitā abhiruci
tika-s0104t:324_9: ajjhāsayadhātu “adhimuttī”ti veditabbā. Anekā ajjhāsayādayo te yesaṃ atthi, anekā
tika-s0104t:324_10: vā ajjhāsayādayo yesanti tathā yathā “bahukattuko, bahunadiko”ti. Yathānulomanti
tika-s0104t:324_11: ajjhāsayādīnaṃ anulomaṃ anatikkamma, ye ye vā ajjhāsayādayo anulomā, tehi tehīti
tika-s0104t:324_12: attho. Āsayādīnaṃ anulomassa vā anurūpantipi vadanti. Ghanavinibbhogābhāvato diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena
tika-s0104t:324_13: “ahaṃ mama santaka”nti evaṃ pavattasaññino. Yathādhammanti “natthettha attā, attaniyaṃ
tika-s0104t:324_14: vā, kevalaṃ dhammamattameveta”nti evamādinā dhammasabhāvānurūpanti attho.
tika-s0104t:325_0: Saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro, kāyavācāhi avītikkamo. Mahanto saṃvaro asaṃvaro. Vuḍḍhiattho
tika-s0104t:325_1: hi ayaṃ a-kāro yathā “asekkhā dhammā”ti taṃyogatāya ca khuddako saṃvaro pārisesādinayena
tika-s0104t:325_2: saṃvaro, tasmā khuddako, mahanto ca saṃvaroti attho. Tenāha “saṃvarā saṃvaro”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:325_3: Diṭṭhiviniveṭhanāti diṭṭhiyā vimocanaṃ, atthato pana tassa ujuvipaccanikā sammādiṭṭhiādayo
tika-s0104t:325_4: dhammā. Tathā cāha “dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhipaṭipakkhabhūtā”ti. Nāmassa, rūpassa, nāmarūpassa
tika-s0104t:325_5: ca paricchindanaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedo, so pana “rāgādipaṭipakkhabhūto”ti vacanato
tika-s0104t:326_0: “Tīsupī”tiādinā aparaḍḍhaṃ vivarati. Tīsupi tāsaṃ vacanasambhavato “visesenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:326_1: Tadetaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Tatra “yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā
tika-s0104t:326_4: Nāmarūpaparicchedassa adhipaññāpadaṭṭhānato, adhipaññāya ca atthāya tadavasesanāmarūpadhammakathanato
tika-s0104t:327_0: Kilesānanti saṃklesadhammānaṃ, kammakilesānaṃ vā, ubhayāpekkhañcetaṃ “yo kāyavacīdvārehi
tika-s0104t:327_1: kilesānaṃ vītikkamo, tassa pahānaṃ, tassa paṭipakkhattā”ti ca. “Vītikkamo”ti ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:327_2: “paṭipakkha”nti bhāvayoge sambandho, “sīlassā”ti pana bhāvapaccaye. Evaṃ sabbattha.
tika-s0104t:327_3: Anusayavasena santāne anuvattantā kilesā kāraṇalābhe pariyuṭṭhitāpi sīlabhedabhayavasena
tika-s0104t:327_4: vītikkamituṃ na labhantīti āha “vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassā”ti. Okāsādānavasena
tika-s0104t:327_5: kilesānaṃ citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ, tassa pahānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:327_6: cittasantāne uppattivasena kilesānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānassa pahānanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Kilesāna”nti
tika-s0104t:327_7: hi adhikāro, taṃ pana pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ cittasamādahanavasena bhavatīti āha “pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkhattā
tika-s0104t:327_8: samādhissā”ti. Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayanakā anurūpakāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahā
tika-s0104t:327_9: thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo satta kilesā anusayā, tesaṃ pahānaṃ, te pana sabbaso ariyamaggapaññāya
tika-s0104t:328_0: Dīpālokena viya tamassa dānādipuññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena tassa
tika-s0104t:328_1: tassa akusalassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ. Idha pana adhisīlasikkhāya vuttaṭṭhānattā
tika-s0104t:328_2: tena tena susīlyaṅgena tassa tassa dussīlyaṅgassa pahānaṃ “tadaṅgappahāna”nti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:328_3: Upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattinivāraṇena ghaṭappahārena viya jalatale sevālassa
tika-s0104t:328_4: tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:328_5: Catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃ taṃ maggavato santāne samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa
tika-s0104t:328_7: caritaṃ, saṃkilesehi vā dūsitaṃ caritaṃ duccaritaṃ. Tadeva yattha uppannaṃ, taṃ santānaṃ
tika-s0104t:328_8: sammā kilisati vibādhati, upatāpeti cāti saṃkileso, tassa pahānaṃ. Kāyavacīduccaritavasena
tika-s0104t:328_9: pavattasaṃkilesassa tadaṅgavasena pahānaṃ vuttaṃ sīlassa duccaritapaṭipakkhattā.
tika-s0104t:328_10: Sikkhattayānusārena hi attho veditabbo. Tasatīti taṇhā, sāva vuttanayena saṃkileso,
tika-s0104t:328_11: tassa vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṃ vuttaṃ samādhissa kāmacchandapaṭipakkhattā. Diṭṭhiyeva
tika-s0104t:328_12: yathāvuttanayena saṃkileso, tassa samucchedavasena pahānaṃ vuttaṃ paññāya attādivinimuttasabhāva dhammappakāsanato.
tika-s0104t:329_0: Ekamekasmiñcetthāti etesu tīsu piṭakesu ekamekasmiṃ piṭake, ca-saddo vākyārambhe,
tika-s0104t:329_1: pakkhantare vā. Pi-saddo, api-saddo vā avayavasampiṇḍane, tena na kevalaṃ catubbidhasseva
tika-s0104t:329_2: gambhīrabhāvo, atha kho paccekaṃ tadavayavānampīti sampiṇḍanaṃ karoti. Esa nayo īdisesu.
tika-s0104t:329_3: Idāni te sarūpato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tantīti pāḷi. Sā hi ukkaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:329_4: sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato, sabhāvaniruttibhāvato, buddhādīhi bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:330_0: Idha pana vinayagaṇṭhipadakārādīnaṃ saddavādīnaṃ matena pubbe vavatthāpitā paramatthasaddappabandhabhūtā
tika-s0104t:330_1: tanti dhammo nāma. Iti-saddo hi nāmatthe, “dhammo”ti vā vuccati. Tassāyevāti tassā
tika-s0104t:330_2: yathāvuttāya eva tantiyā attho. Manasā vavatthāpitāyāti uggahaṇa-dhāraṇādivasappavattena
tika-s0104t:330_3: manasā pubbe vavatthāpitāya yathāvuttāya paramatthasaddappabandhabhūtāya tassā tantiyā.
tika-s0104t:330_5: tantiyeva. Apica yathāvuttatanti saṅkhātasaddasamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo desanā. Tantiyā,
tika-s0104t:330_6: tantiatthassa cāti yathāvuttāya duvidhāyapi tantiyā, tadatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodhoti
tika-s0104t:330_7: attho veditabbo. Te hi bhagavatā vuccamānassa atthassa, vohārassa ca dīpako saddoyeva
tika-s0104t:330_8: tanti nāmāti vadanti. Tesaṃ pana vāde dhammassāpi saddasabhāvattā dhammadesanānaṃ
tika-s0104t:330_9: ko visesoti ce? Tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ bodhakabhāvena ñāto, uggahaṇādivasena ca pubbe
tika-s0104t:330_10: vavatthāpito paramatthasaddappabandho dhammo, pacchā paresaṃ avabodhanatthaṃ pavattito
tika-s0104t:330_11: taṃ tadatthappakāsako saddo desanāti ayamimesaṃ visesoti. Atha vā yathāvuttasaddasamuṭṭhāpako
tika-s0104t:330_12: cittuppādo desanā desīyati samuṭṭhāpīyati saddo etenāti katvā musāvādādayo viya tatthāpi
tika-s0104t:330_13: hi musāvādādisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādādisaddehi voharīyatīti. Kiñcāpi akkharāvalibhūto
tika-s0104t:330_15: viya tassāyeva atthoti paramatthasaddoyeva atthassa ñāpakabhāvena vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:330_16: “Tassā tantiyā desanā”ti ca sadisavohārena vuttaṃ yathā “uppannā ca kusalādhammā
tika-s0104t:331_1: atthassa anurūpavācakabhāvena paramatthasaddesu ekantena bhagavatā manasā vavatthāpitā
tika-s0104t:331_2: nāmapaññattipabandhabhūtā tanti dhammo nāma, “dhammo”ti vā vuccati. Tassāyevāti tassā
tika-s0104t:331_3: nāmapaññattibhūtāya tantiyā eva attho. Manasā vavatthāpitāyāti sammutiparamatthabhedassa
tika-s0104t:331_4: atthassānurūpavācakabhāvena paramatthasaddesu bhagavatā manasā vavatthāpitāya nāmapaṇṇattipabandhabhūtāya
tika-s0104t:331_5: tassā tantiyā. Desanāti paresaṃ pabodhanena atisajjanā vācāya pakāsanā vacībhedabhūtā
tika-s0104t:331_6: paramatthasaddappabandhasaṅkhātā tanti. Tantiyā, tantiatthassa cāti yathāvuttāya
tika-s0104t:331_7: dubbidhāyapi tantiyā, tadatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodhoti attho. Te hi evaṃ vadanti
tika-s0104t:331_8: – sabhāvatthassa, sabhāvavohārassa ca anurūpavaseneva bhagavatā manasā vavatthāpitā
tika-s0104t:331_9: paṇṇatti idha “tantī”ti vuccati. Yadi ca saddavādīnaṃ matena saddoyeva idha tanti
tika-s0104t:331_10: nāma siyā. Tantiyā, desanāya ca nānattena bhavitabbaṃ, manasā vavatthāpitāya ca tantiyā
tika-s0104t:331_11: vacībhedakaraṇamattaṃ ṭhapetvā desanāya nānattaṃ natthi. Tathā hi desanaṃ dassentena
tika-s0104t:331_12: manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanāti vacībhedakaraṇamattaṃ vinā tantiyā saha desanāya
tika-s0104t:331_13: anaññatā vuttā. Tathā ca upari “desanāti paññattī”ti vuttattā desanāya anaññabhāvena
tika-s0104t:332_0: Apica yadi tantiyā aññāyeva desanā siyā, “tantiyā ca tantiatthassa ca desanāya ca
tika-s0104t:332_1: yathābhūtāvabodho”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Evaṃ pana avatvā “tantiyā ca tantiatthassa ca
tika-s0104t:332_2: yathābhūtāvabodho”ti vuttattā tantiyā, desanāya ca anaññabhāvo dassito hoti. Evañca
tika-s0104t:332_3: katvā upari “desanā nāma paññattī”ti dassentena desanāya anaññabhāvato tantiyā paṇṇattibhāvo
tika-s0104t:332_4: kathito hotīti. Tadubhayampi pana paramatthato saddoyeva paramatthavinimuttāya sammutiyā
tika-s0104t:332_5: abhāvā, imameva ca nayaṃ gahetvā keci ācariyā “dhammo ca desanā ca paramatthato saddo
tika-s0104t:332_6: evā”ti voharanti, tepi anupavajjāyeva. Yathā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhivipākā “parittārammaṇā”ti
tika-s0104t:332_7: vuccanti, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi kāmāvacarapaṭisandhivipākā “nibbattitaparamatthavisayāyevā”ti
tika-s0104t:332_9: ārammaṇaṃ gahetvāpi samuppajjanato. Paramatthadhammamūlakattā panassa parikappassa
tika-s0104t:332_10: paramatthavisayatā sakkā paññapetuṃ, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbanti ca. Evampi paṇṇattivādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:332_11: mataṃ hotu, saddavādīnaṃ matepi dhammadesanānaṃ nānattaṃ vuttanayeneva ācariyadhammapālattherā
tika-s0104t:333: “Saddo dhammo desanā ca, iccāhu apare garū;
tika-s0104t:334: Dhammo paṇṇatti saddo tu, desanā vāti cāpare”ti.
tika-s0104t:335_0: Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhāti ettha tantiattho, tantidesanā, tantiatthapaṭivedho
tika-s0104t:335_1: cāti ime tayo tantivisayā hontīti vinayapiṭakādīnaṃ atthadesanāpaṭivedhādhārabhāvo
tika-s0104t:335_2: yutto, piṭakāni pana tantiyevāti tesaṃ dhammādhārabhāvo kathaṃ yujjeyyāti? Tantisamudāyassa
tika-s0104t:335_3: avayavatantiyā ādhārabhāvato. Samudāyo hi avayavassa parikappanāmattasiddhena ādhārabhāvena
tika-s0104t:335_4: vuccati yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti. Ettha ca dhammādīnaṃ dukkhogāhabhāvato tehi dhammādīhi
tika-s0104t:335_5: vinayādayo gambhīrāti vinayādīnampi catubbidho gambhīrabhāvo vuttoyeva, tasmā dhammādayo
tika-s0104t:335_6: eva dukkhogāhattā gambhīrā, na vinayādayoti na codetabbametaṃ samukhena, visayavisayīmukhena
tika-s0104t:335_7: ca vinayādīnaññeva gambhīrabhāvassa vuttattā. Dhammo hi vinayādayo eva abhinnattā.
tika-s0104t:335_8: Tesaṃ visayo attho vācakabhūtānaṃ tesameva vāccabhāvato, visayino desanāpaṭivedhā
tika-s0104t:335_9: dhammatthavisayabhāvatoti. Tattha paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato dhammatthānaṃ, desanāñāṇassa
tika-s0104t:335_10: dukkarabhāvato desanāya ca dukkhogāhabhāvo veditabbo, paṭivedhassa pana uppādetuṃ
tika-s0104t:335_11: asakkuṇeyyattā, tabbisayañāṇuppattiyā ca dukkarabhāvato dukkhogāhatā veditabbā. Dhammatthadesanānaṃ
tika-s0104t:335_12: gambhīrabhāvato tabbisayo paṭivedhopi gambhīro yathā taṃ gambhīrassa udakassa pamāṇaggahaṇe
tika-s0104t:335_13: dīghena pamāṇena bhavitabbaṃ, evaṃsampadamidanti vajirabuddhitthero. Piṭakāvayavānaṃ
tika-s0104t:335_14: dhammādīnaṃ vuccamāno gambhīrabhāvo taṃsamudāyassa piṭakassāpi vuttoyeva, tasmā tathā
tika-s0104t:335_15: na codetabbantipi vadanti, vicāretabbametaṃ sabbesampi tesaṃ piṭakāvayavāsambhavato.
tika-s0104t:335_16: Mahāsamuddo dukkhogāho, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho viya cāti sambandho. Atthavasā hi vibhattivacanaliṅgapariṇāmoti.
tika-s0104t:335_17: Dukkhena ogayhanti, dukkho vā ogāho anto pavisanametesūti dukkhogāhā. Na labhitabboti
tika-s0104t:335_18: alabbhanīyo, soyeva alabbhaneyyo, labhīyate vā labbhanaṃ, taṃ nārahatīti alabbhaneyyo.
tika-s0104t:335_19: Patiṭṭhahanti ettha okāseti patiṭṭho, patiṭṭhahanaṃ vā patiṭṭho, alabbhaneyyo so
tika-s0104t:335_20: yesu te alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā. Ekadesena ogāhantehipi mandabuddhīhi patiṭṭhā laddhuṃ
tika-s0104t:335_21: na sakkāyevāti dassetuṃ etaṃ puna vuttaṃ. “Eva”ntiādi nigamanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:336_0: Idāni hetuhetuphalādīnampi vasena gambhīrabhāvaṃ dassento “aparo nayo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:336_1: Tattha hetūti paccayo. So ca attano phalaṃ dahati vidahatīti dhammo da-kārassa dha-kāraṃ
tika-s0104t:336_2: katvā. Dhammasaddassa cettha hetupariyāyatā kathaṃ viññāyatīti āha “vuttañheta”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:336_3: Vuttaṃ paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge. Nanu ca “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena
tika-s0104t:336_4: dhammassa hetubhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti? “Dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti etassa samāsapadassa
tika-s0104t:336_5: avayavapadatthaṃ dassentena “hetumhi ñāṇa”nti vuttattā. “Dhamme paṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti
tika-s0104t:336_6: ettha hi “dhamme”ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena “hetumhī”ti vuttaṃ, “paṭisambhidā”ti
tika-s0104t:336_7: etassa atthaṃ dassentena “ñāṇa”nti. Tasmā hetudhammasaddā ekatthā, ñāṇapaṭisambhidā
tika-s0104t:336_8: saddā cāti imamatthaṃ vadantena sādhito dhammassa hetubhāvoti. Tathā “hetuphale ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:336_9: atthapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena sādhito atthassa hetuphalabhāvoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:336_10: Hetuno phalaṃ hetuphalaṃ, tañca hetuanusārena arīyati adhigamīyatīti atthoti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:337_0: Desanāti paññattīti ettha saddavādīnaṃ vāde atthabyañjanakā aviparītābhilāpadhammaniruttibhūtā
tika-s0104t:337_1: paramatthasaddappabandhasaṅkhātā tanti “desanā”ti vuccati, desanā nāmāti vā attho.
tika-s0104t:337_2: Desīyati attho etāyāti hi desanā. Pakārena ñāpīyati attho etāya, pakārato vā ñāpetīti
tika-s0104t:337_3: paññatti. Tameva sarūpato dassetuṃ “yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:337_4: Yathādhammanti ettha pana dhammasaddo hetuṃ, hetuphalañca sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sabhāvavācako
tika-s0104t:337_5: hesa dhammasaddo, na pariyattihetuādivācako, tasmā yo yo avijjāsaṅkhārādidhammo,
tika-s0104t:337_6: tasmiṃ tasminti attho. Tesaṃ tesaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārādidhammānaṃ anurūpaṃ vā yathādhammaṃ.
tika-s0104t:337_7: Desanāpi hi paṭivedho viya aviparītasavisayavibhāvanato dhammānurūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0104t:337_8: tatoyeva ca aviparītābhilāpoti vuccati. Dhammābhilāpoti hi atthabyañjanako aviparītābhilāpo
tika-s0104t:337_9: dhammaniruttibhūto tantisaṅkhāto paramatthasaddappabandho. So hi abhilappati uccārīyatīti
tika-s0104t:337_10: abhilāpo, dhammo aviparīto sabhāvabhūto abhilāpo dhammābhilāpoti vuccati, etena “tatra
tika-s0104t:337_11: dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti ettha vuttaṃ dhammaniruttiṃ dasseti
tika-s0104t:337_12: saddasabhāvattā desanāya. Tathā hi niruttipaṭisambhidāya parittārammaṇādibhāvo paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:337_13: vutto. Tadaṭṭhakathāya ca “taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”tiādinā tassā
tika-s0104t:337_14: saddārammaṇatā dassitā. “Imassa atthassa ayaṃ saddo vācako”ti hi vacanavacanatthe
tika-s0104t:337_15: vavatthapetvā taṃ taṃ vacanatthavibhāvanavasena pavattito saddo “desanā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:337_16: “Adhippāyo”ti etena “desanāti paññattī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ dhammaniruttābhilāpaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:337_17: vuttaṃ, na tato vinimuttaṃ paññattiṃ sandhāyāti dasseti anekadhā atthasambhave attanā
tika-s0104t:337_18: adhippetatthasseva vuttattāti ayaṃ saddavādīnaṃ vādato vinicchayo.
tika-s0104t:338_0: Paññattivādīnaṃ vāde pana sammutiparamatthabhedassa atthassānurūpavācakabhāvena paramatthasaddesu
tika-s0104t:338_1: bhagavatā manasā vavatthāpitā tantisaṅkhātā nāmapaññatti desanā nāma, “desanā”ti
tika-s0104t:338_2: vā vuccatīti attho. Tadeva mūlakāraṇabhūtassa saddassa dassanavasena kāraṇūpacārena
tika-s0104t:338_3: dassetuṃ “yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi hi “dhammābhilāpo”ti
tika-s0104t:338_4: ettha abhilappati uccārīyatīti abhilāpoti saddo vuccati, na paṇṇatti, tathāpi sadde
tika-s0104t:338_5: vuccamāne tadanurūpaṃ vohāraṃ gahetvā tena vohārena dīpitassa atthassa jānanato sadde
tika-s0104t:338_6: kathite tadanurūpā paṇṇattipi kāraṇūpacārena kathitāyeva hoti. Apica “dhammābhilāpoti
tika-s0104t:338_7: attho”ti avatvā “dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo”ti vuttattā desanā nāma saddo na hotīti
tika-s0104t:338_8: dīpitameva. Tena hi adhippāyamattameva mūlakāraṇasaddavasena kathitaṃ, na idha gahetabbo
tika-s0104t:338_9: “desanā”ti etassa atthoti ayaṃ paññattivādīnaṃ vādato vinicchayo. Atthantaramāha
tika-s0104t:338_10: “anuloma…pe… kathana”nti, etena heṭṭhā vuttaṃ desanāsamuṭṭhāpakaṃ cittuppādaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:338_11: Kathīyati attho etenāti hi kathanaṃ. Ādisaddena nītaneyyādikā pāḷigatiyo, ekattādinandiyāvattādikā
tika-s0104t:339_0: Sayameva paṭivijjhati, etena vā paṭivijjhantīti paṭivedho, ñāṇaṃ. Tadeva abhisameti,
tika-s0104t:339_1: etena vā abhisamentīti abhisamayotipi vuccati. Idāni taṃ paṭivedhaṃ abhisamayappabhedato,
tika-s0104t:339_2: abhisamayākārato, ārammaṇato, sabhāvato ca pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “so cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0104t:339_3: hi lokiyalokuttaroti pabhedato, visayato, asammohatoti ākārato, dhammesu, atthesu,
tika-s0104t:339_4: paññattīsūti ārammaṇato, atthānurūpaṃ, dhammānurūpaṃ, paññattipathānurūpanti sabhāvato
tika-s0104t:339_5: ca pākaṭaṃ karoti. Tattha visayato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho nāma avijjādidhammārammaṇo,
tika-s0104t:339_6: saṅkhārādiatthārammaṇo, tadubhayapaññāpanārammaṇo ca lokiyo abhisamayo. Asammohato
tika-s0104t:339_7: atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho nāma nibbānārammaṇo maggasampayutto yathāvuttadhammatthapaññattīsu
tika-s0104t:339_8: sammohaviddhaṃsano lokuttaro abhisamayo. Tathā hi “ayaṃ hetu, idamassa phalaṃ, ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:339_9: tadubhayānurūpo vohāro”ti evaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena lokiyañāṇaṃ visayato paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0104t:339_10: lokuttarañāṇaṃ pana tesu hetuhetuphalādīsu sammohassañāṇena samucchinnattā asammohato
tika-s0104t:339_11: paṭivijjhati. Lokuttaro pana paṭivedho visayato nibbānassa, asammohato ca itarassātipi vadanti eke.
tika-s0104t:340_0: Atthānurūpaṃ dhammesūti “avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā, saṅkhāre uppādeti
tika-s0104t:340_1: avijjā”ti evaṃ kāriyānurūpaṃ kāraṇesūti attho. Atha vā “puññābhisaṅkhāraapuññābhisaṅkhāraāneñjābhisaṅkhāresu
tika-s0104t:340_2: tīsu apuññābhisaṅkhārassa avijjā sampayuttapaccayo, itaresaṃ yathānurūpa”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:340_3: kāriyānurūpaṃ kāraṇesu paṭivedhotipi attho. Dhammānurūpaṃ atthesūti “avijjāpaccayā
tika-s0104t:340_4: saṅkhārā”tiādinā kāraṇānurūpaṃ kāriyesu. Chabbidhāya paññattiyā patho paññattipatho,
tika-s0104t:340_5: tassa anurūpaṃ tathā, paññattiyā vuccamānadhammānurūpaṃ paññattīsu avabodhoti attho.
tika-s0104t:340_6: Abhisamayato aññampi paṭivedhatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tesa”ntiādimāha. Paṭivijjhīyatīti paṭivedhoti
tika-s0104t:340_7: hi taṃtaṃrūpādidhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvo vuccati. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:341_0: Yathāvuttehi dhammādīhi piṭakānaṃ gambhīrabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “idānī”tiādimāha. Dhammajātanti
tika-s0104t:341_1: kāraṇappabhedo, kāraṇameva vā. Atthajātanti kāriyappabhedo, kāriyameva vā. Yā cāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:341_2: desanāti sambandho. Tadatthavijānanavasena abhimukho hoti. Yo cetthāti yo etāsu taṃ
tika-s0104t:341_3: taṃ piṭakāgatāsu dhammatthadesanāsu paṭivedho, yo ca etesu piṭakesu tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:341_4: aviparītasabhāvoti attho. Sambharitabbato kusalameva sambhāro, so sammā anupacito
tika-s0104t:341_5: yehi te anupacitakusalasambhārā, tatova duppaññehi, nippaññehīti attho. Na hi paññavato,
tika-s0104t:341_6: paññāya vā duṭṭhubhāvo dūsitabhāvo ca sambhavatīti nippaññattāyeva duppaññā yathā
tika-s0104t:341_7: “dussīlo”ti. Ettha ca avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ dhammatthānaṃ duppaṭivijjhatāya dukkhogāhatā,
tika-s0104t:341_8: tesaṃ paññāpanassa dukkarabhāvato taṃdesanāya, abhisamayasaṅkhātassa paṭivedhassa
tika-s0104t:341_10: dubbiññeyyatāya dukkhogāhatā veditabbā. Evampīti pi-saddo pubbe vuttaṃ pakārantaraṃ
tika-s0104t:341_11: sampiṇḍeti. Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya anūnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paridīpitatthabhāvaṃ dassento “ettāvatā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:341_12: “Siddhe hi satyārambho atthantaraviññāpanāya vā hoti, niyamāya vā”ti iminā punārambhavacanena
tika-s0104t:341_13: anūnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paridīpitatthabhāvaṃ dasseti. Ettāvatāti paricchedatthe nipāto,
tika-s0104t:341_14: ettakena vacanakkamenāti attho. Etaṃ vā parimāṇaṃ yassāti ettāvaṃ, tena, etaparimāṇavatā
tika-s0104t:341_15: saddatthakkamenāti attho. “Sadde hi vutte tadatthopi vuttoyeva nāmā”ti vadanti. Vutto
tika-s0104t:342_0: Etthāti etissā gāthāya. Evaṃ attho, vinicchayoti vā seso. Tīsu piṭakesūti ettha “ekekasmi”nti
tika-s0104t:342_1: adhikārato, pakaraṇato vā veditabbaṃ. “Ekamekasmiñcetthā”ti hi heṭṭhā vuttaṃ. Atha
tika-s0104t:342_2: vā vatticchānupubbikattā saddapaṭipattiyā niddhāraṇamidha avattukāmena ādhāroyeva
tika-s0104t:342_3: vutto. Na cettha codetabbaṃ “tīsuyeva piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo siyā”ti
tika-s0104t:342_4: samudāyavasena vuttassāpi vākyassa avayavādhippāyasambhavato. Dissati hi avayavavākyanipphatti
tika-s0104t:342_5: “brāhmaṇādayo bhuñjantū”tiādīsu, tasmā alamatipapañcena. Yathā attho na virujjhati,
tika-s0104t:342_6: tathāyeva gahetabboti. Evaṃ sabbattha. Pariyattibhedoti pariyāpuṇanaṃ pariyatti.
tika-s0104t:342_7: Pariyāpuṇanavācako hettha pariyattisaddo, na pana pāḷipariyāyo, tasmā pariyāpuṇanappakāroti
tika-s0104t:342_8: attho. Atha vā tīhi pakārehi pariyāpuṇitabbā pāḷiyo eva “pariyattī”ti vuccanti. Tathā
tika-s0104t:342_9: ceva abhidhammaṭṭhakathāya sīhaḷagaṇṭhipade vuttanti vadanti. Evampi hi alagaddūpamāpariyāpuṇanayogato
tika-s0104t:342_10: “alagaddūpamā pariyattī”ti pāḷipi sakkā vattuṃ. Evañca katvā “duggahitā upārambhādihetu
tika-s0104t:342_11: pariyāpuṭā alagaddūpamā”ti parato niddesavacanampi upapannaṃ hoti. Tattha hi pāḷiyeva
tika-s0104t:343_0: Alagaddo alagaddaggahaṇaṃ upamā etissāti alagaddūpamā. Alagaddassa gahaṇañhettha
tika-s0104t:343_1: alagaddasaddena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Āpūpikoti ettha āpūpa-saddena āpūpakhādanaṃ
tika-s0104t:343_2: viya, veṇikoti ettha vīṇāsaddena vīṇāvādanaggahaṇaṃ viya ca. Alagaddaggahaṇena hi
tika-s0104t:343_3: pariyatti upamīyati, na alagaddena. “Alagaddaggahaṇūpamā”ti vā vattabbe majjhepadalopaṃ
tika-s0104t:343_4: katvā “alagaddūpamā”ti vuttaṃ “oṭṭhamukho”tiādīsu viya. Alagaddoti ca āsīviso vuccati.
tika-s0104t:343_5: Gadoti hi visassa nāmaṃ, tañca tassa alaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ atthi, tasmā alaṃ pariyatto
tika-s0104t:343_6: paripuṇṇo gado assāti alagaddo anunāsikalopaṃ, da-kārāgamañca katvā, alaṃ vā jīvitaharaṇe
tika-s0104t:343_7: samattho gado yassāti alagaddo vuttanayena. Vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ attho payojanametissāti
tika-s0104t:343_8: nissaraṇatthā. Bhaṇḍāgāre niyutto bhaṇḍāgāriko, rājaratanānupālako, so viyāti tathā,
tika-s0104t:343_9: dhammaratanānupālako khīṇāsavo. Aññamatthamanapekkhitvā bhaṇḍāgārikasseva sato pariyatti
tika-s0104t:344_0: Duggahitāti duṭṭhu gahitā. Tadeva sarūpato niyametuṃ “upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā”ti
tika-s0104t:344_1: āha, upārambhaitivādappamokkhādihetu uggahitāti attho. Lābhasakkārādihetu pariyāpuṇanampi
tika-s0104t:345_0: “Yo buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā ‘evaṃ cīvarādīni vā labhissāmi, catuparisamajjhe vā maṃ
tika-s0104t:345_1: jānissantī’ti lābhasakkārahetu pariyāpuṇāti, tassa sā pariyatti alagaddapariyatti
tika-s0104t:345_2: nāma. Evaṃ pariyāpuṇanato hi buddhavacanaṃ apariyāpuṇitvā niddokkamanaṃ varatara”nti.
tika-s0104t:346_0: Nanu ca alagaddaggahaṇūpamā pariyatti “alagaddūpamā”ti vuccati, evañca sati suggahitāpi
tika-s0104t:346_1: pariyatti “alagaddūpamā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati tatthāpi alagaddaggahaṇassa upamābhāvena
tika-s0104t:347_1: caramāno, so passeyya mahantaṃ alagaddaṃ, tamenaṃ ajapadena daṇḍena suniggahitaṃ
tika-s0104t:347_2: niggaṇheyya, ajapadena daṇḍena suniggahitaṃ niggahitvā gīvāya suggahitaṃ gaṇheyya.
tika-s0104t:347_3: Kiñcāpi so bhikkhave, alagaddo tassa purisassa hatthaṃ vā bāhaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ
tika-s0104t:347_4: bhogehi paliveṭheyya. Atha kho so neva tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ
tika-s0104t:347_5: vā dukkhaṃ. Taṃ kissa hetu, suggahitattā bhikkhave, alagaddassa. Evameva kho bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:347_6: idhekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ geyya”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:348_0: Tasmā idha duggahitā eva pariyatti alagaddūpamāti ayaṃ viseso kuto viññāyati, yena
tika-s0104t:348_1: duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā “alagaddūpamā”ti vuccatīti? Saccametaṃ, idaṃ
tika-s0104t:348_2: pana pārisesañāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi nissaraṇatthabhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:348_3: visuṃ gahitattā pārisesato alagaddassa duggahaṇūpamāyeva pariyatti “alagaddūpamā”ti
tika-s0104t:348_4: viññāyati. Alagaddassa suggahaṇūpamā hi pariyatti nissaraṇatthā vā hoti, bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti
tika-s0104t:348_5: vā. Tasmā suvuttametaṃ “duggahitā…pe… pariyattī”ti. Idāni tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā sādhento
tika-s0104t:348_6: “yaṃ sandhāyā”tiādimāha. Tattha yanti yaṃ pariyattiduggahaṇaṃ. Majjhimanikāye mūlapaṇṇāsake
tika-s0104t:349_0: Alagaddatthikoti āsīvisena, āsīvisaṃ vā atthiko, alagaddaṃ gavesati pariyesati sīlenāti
tika-s0104t:349_1: alagaddagavesī. Alagaddapariyesanaṃ caramānoti āsīvisapariyesanatthaṃ caramāno. Tadatthe
tika-s0104t:349_2: hetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ, upayogavacanaṃ vā, alagaddapariyesanaṭṭhānaṃ vā caramāno.
tika-s0104t:349_3: Alagaddaṃ pariyesanti etthāti hi alagaddapariyesanaṃ. Tamenanti taṃ alagaddaṃ. Bhogeti
tika-s0104t:349_4: sarīre. “Bhogo tu phaṇino tanū”ti hi vuttaṃ. Bhujīyati kuṭilaṃ karīyatīti bhogo.
tika-s0104t:349_5: Tassāti purisassa. Hatthe vā bāhāya vāti sambandho. Maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya yāva agganakhā
tika-s0104t:349_6: hattho. Saddhiṃ aggabāhāya avasesā bāhā, katthaci pana kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva agganakhā
tika-s0104t:349_7: “hattho”ti vuttaṃ bāhāya visuṃ anāgatattā. Vuttalakkhaṇaṃ hatthañca bāhañca ṭhapetvā
tika-s0104t:349_8: avasesaṃ sarīraṃ aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ. Tatonidānanti tannidānaṃ, taṃkāraṇāti attho. Taṃ
tika-s0104t:349_9: hatthādīsu ḍaṃsanaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ etassāti “tannidāna”nti hi vattabbe “tatonidāna”nti
tika-s0104t:349_10: purimapade paccattatthe nissakkavacanaṃ katvā, tassa ca lopamakatvā niddeso, hetvatthe
tika-s0104t:349_11: ca paccattavacanaṃ. Kāraṇatthe nipātapadametantipi vadanti. Apica “tatonidāna”nti
tika-s0104t:349_12: etaṃ “maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkha”nti ettha vuttanayena visesanaṃ. Taṃ kissa
tika-s0104t:349_13: hetūti yaṃ vuttaṃ hatthādīsu ḍaṃsanaṃ, tannidānañca maraṇādiupagamanaṃ, taṃ kissa
tika-s0104t:349_14: hetu kena kāraṇenāti ce? Tassa purisassa alagaddassa duggahitattā.
tika-s0104t:350_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Moghapurisāti guṇasārarahitatāya tucchapurisā. Dhammanti pāḷidhammaṃ.
tika-s0104t:350_1: Pariyāpuṇantīti uggaṇhanti, sajjhāyanti ceva vācuggataṃ karontā dhārenti cāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:350_2: hoti. “Dhamma”nti sāmaññato vuttameva sarūpena dasseti “sutta”ntiādinā. Na hi suttādinavaṅgato
tika-s0104t:350_3: añño dhammo nāma atthi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tesaṃ dhammāna”nti. Atthanti cettha sambandhīniddeso
tika-s0104t:350_4: eso, atthanti ca yathābhūtaṃ bhāsitatthaṃ, payojanatthañca sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena
tika-s0104t:350_5: vā vuttaṃ. Yañhi padaṃ sutisāmaññena anekadhā atthaṃ dīpeti, taṃ sāmaññaniddesena,
tika-s0104t:350_6: ekasesanayena vāti sabbattha veditabbaṃ. Na upaparikkhantīti na pariggaṇhanti na
tika-s0104t:350_7: vicārenti. Ikkhasaddassa hi dassanaṅkesu idha dassanameva attho, tassa ca pariggaṇhanacakkhulocanesu
tika-s0104t:350_8: pariggaṇhanameva, tañca vicāraṇā pariyādānavasena dubbidhesu vicāraṇāyeva, sā ca
tika-s0104t:350_9: vīmaṃsāyeva, na vicāro, vīmaṃsā ca nāmesā bhāsitatthavīmaṃsā, payojanatthavīmaṃsā
tika-s0104t:350_10: cāti idha dubbidhāva adhippetā, tāsu “imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, imasmiṃ samādhi,
tika-s0104t:350_11: imasmiṃ paññā, mayañca taṃ pūressāmā”ti evaṃ bhāsitatthavīmaṃsañceva “sīlaṃ samādhissa
tika-s0104t:350_12: kāraṇaṃ, samādhi vipassanāyā”tiādinā payojanatthavīmaṃsañca na karontīti attho. Anupaparikkhatanti
tika-s0104t:350_13: anupaparikkhantānaṃ tesaṃ moghapurisānaṃ. Na nijjhānakkhamantīti nijjhānaṃ nissesena
tika-s0104t:350_14: pekkhanaṃ paññaṃ na khamanti. Jhe-saddo hi idha pekkhaneyeva, na cintanajhāpanesu,
tika-s0104t:350_15: tañca ñāṇapekkhanameva, na cakkhupekkhanaṃ, ārammaṇūpanijjhānameva vā, na lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:350_16: tasmā paññāya disvā rocetvā gahetabbā na hontīti adhippāyo veditabbo. Nissesena jhāyate
tika-s0104t:350_17: pekkhateti hi nijjhānaṃ. Sandhivasena anusvāralopo nijjhānakkhamantīti, “nijjhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:350_18: khamantī”tipi pāṭho, tena imamatthaṃ dīpeti “tesaṃ paññāya atthassa anupaparikkhanato
tika-s0104t:350_19: te dhammā na upaṭṭhahanti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ, samādhi, vipassanā, maggo, vaṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0104t:350_20: vivaṭṭhaṃ kathitanti evaṃ jānituṃ na sakkā hontī”ti.
tika-s0104t:351_0: Upārambhānisaṃsā cevāti paresaṃ vāde dosāropanānisaṃsā ca hutvā. Bhuso ārambhanañhi
tika-s0104t:351_1: paresaṃ vāde dosāropanaṃ upārambho, pariyattiṃ nissāya paravambhananti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:351_2: Tathā hesa “paravajjānupanayanalakkhaṇo”ti vutto. Iti vādappamokkhānisaṃsā cāti iti
tika-s0104t:351_3: evaṃ etāya pariyattiyā vādappamokkhānisaṃsā attano upari parehi āropitassa vādassa
tika-s0104t:351_4: niggahassa attato, sakavādato vā pamokkhapayojanā ca hutvā. Iti saddo idamatthe,
tika-s0104t:351_5: tena “pariyāpuṇantī”ti ettha pariyāpuṇanaṃ parāmasati. Vadanti niggaṇhanti etenāti
tika-s0104t:351_6: vādo, doso, pamuccanaṃ, pamuccāpanaṃ vā pamokkho, attano upari āropitassa pamokkho
tika-s0104t:351_7: ānisaṃso yesaṃ tathā. Āropitavādo hi “vādo”ti vutto yathā “devena datto datto”ti.
tika-s0104t:351_8: Vādoti vā upavādonindā yathāvuttanayeneva samāso. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – parehi sakavāde
tika-s0104t:351_9: dose āropite, nindāya vā āropitāya taṃ dosaṃ, nindaṃ vā evañca evañca mocessāmāti
tika-s0104t:351_10: iminā ca kāraṇena pariyāpuṇantīti. Atha vā so so vādo iti vādo iti-saddassa saha
tika-s0104t:351_11: vicchāya ta-saddatthe pavattattā. Itivādasa pamokkho yathāvuttanayena, so ānisaṃso
tika-s0104t:351_12: yesaṃ tathā, taṃ taṃ vādapamocanānisaṃsā hutvāti attho. Yassa catthāyāti yassa ca
tika-s0104t:351_13: sīlādipūraṇassa, maggaphalanibbānabhūtassa vā anupādāvimokkhassa atthāya. Abhedepi
tika-s0104t:351_14: bhedavohāro eso yathā “paṭimāya sarīra”nti, bhedyabhedakaṃ vā etaṃ yathā “kathinassatthāya
tika-s0104t:351_15: ābhataṃ dussa”nti. “Tañcassa attha”nti hi vuttaṃ. Ca-saddo avadhāraṇe, tena tadatthāya
tika-s0104t:351_16: eva pariyāpuṇanaṃ sambhavati, nāññatthāyāti vinicchinoti. Dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti
tika-s0104t:351_17: hi jātiācāravasena duvidhāpi kulaputtā ñāyena dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti attho. Tañcassa
tika-s0104t:351_18: atthaṃ nānubhontīti assa dhammassa sīlādipūraṇasaṅkhātaṃ, maggaphalanibbānabhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:351_19: vā anupādāvimokkhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ ete duggahitagāhino nānubhonti na vindantiyeva.
tika-s0104t:352_0: Aparo nayo – yassa upārambhassa, itivādappamokkhassa vā atthāya ye moghapurisā dhammaṃ
tika-s0104t:352_1: pariyāpuṇanti, te parehi “ayamattho na hotī”ti vutte duggahitattāyeva “tadatthova
tika-s0104t:352_2: hotī”ti paṭipādanakkhamā na honti, tasmā parassa vāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ attano
tika-s0104t:352_3: vādaṃ pamocetuñca asakkontāpi taṃ atthaṃ nānubhonti ca na vindantiyevāti evampettha
tika-s0104t:352_4: attho daṭṭhabbo. Idhāpi hi ca-saddo avadhāraṇatthova. “Tesa”ntiādīsu tesaṃ te dhammā
tika-s0104t:352_6: saṃvattantīti attho. Duggahitāti hi hetugabbhavacanaṃ. Tenāha “duggahitattā bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:352_7: dhammāna”nti. Ettha ca kāraṇe phalavohāravasena “te dhammā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī’ti
tika-s0104t:352_8: vuttaṃ yathā “ghatamāyu, dadhi bala”nti. Tathā hi kiñcāpi na te dhammā ahitāya dukkhāya
tika-s0104t:352_9: saṃvattanti, tathāpi vuttanayena pariyāpuṇantānaṃ sajjhāyanakāle, vivādakāle ca tammūlakānaṃ
tika-s0104t:352_10: upārambhādīnaṃ anekesaṃ akusalānaṃ uppattisambhavato “te…pe… saṃvattantī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:352_11: Taṃ kissa hetūti ettha nti yathāvuttassatthassa ananubhavanaṃ, tesañca dhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:352_12: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanaṃ parāmasati. Kissāti sāmivacanaṃ hetvatthe, tathā hetūti paccattavacanañca.
tika-s0104t:353_0: Yā panāti ettha kiriyā pāḷivasena vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Tattha kiriyāpakkhe
tika-s0104t:353_1: yā suggahitāti abhedepi bhedavohāro “cārikaṃ pakkamati, cārikaṃ caramāno”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:353_2: viya. Tadevatthaṃ vivarati “sīlakkhandhādī”tiādinā, ādisaddena cettha samādhivipassanādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:353_3: saṅgaho. Yo hi buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā, samādhino
tika-s0104t:353_4: āgataṭṭhāne samādhiṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā, vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā,
tika-s0104t:353_5: maggaphalānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne “maggaṃ bhāvessāmi, phalaṃ sacchikarissāmī”ti uggaṇhāti,
tika-s0104t:353_6: tasseva sā pariyatti nissaraṇatthā nāma hoti. Yanti yaṃ pariyattisuggahaṇaṃ. Vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:353_7: alagaddasutte. Dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantīti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne sīlādīni
tika-s0104t:353_8: pūrentānampi arahattaṃ patvā parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desetvā dhammadesanāya pasannehi
tika-s0104t:353_9: upanīte cattāro paccaye paribhuñjantānampi paresaṃ vāde sahadhammena upārambhaṃ āropentānampi
tika-s0104t:353_10: sakavādato parehi āropitadosaṃ pariharantānampi dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantīti
tika-s0104t:353_11: attho. Tathā hi na kevalaṃ suggahitapariyattiṃ nissāya maggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyādīniyeva,
tika-s0104t:353_12: api tu paravādaniggahasakavādapatiṭṭhāpanānipi ijjhanti. Tathā ca vuttaṃ parinibbānasuttā
tika-s0104t:353_13: dīsu “uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desessantī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:354_0: Yaṃ panāti etthāpi vuttanayena duvidhena attho. Dukkhaparijānena pariññātakkhandho.
tika-s0104t:354_2: ca arahattaphalassetaṃ nāma. Satipi hi cattunnaṃ maggānaṃ, catunnañca phalānaṃ avinassanabhāve
tika-s0104t:354_3: sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ sakasakanāmapariccāgena uparūpari nāmantarappattito tesaṃ maggaphalāti
tika-s0104t:354_4: “akuppāmi”ti na vuccanti. Arahā pana sabbadāpi arahāyeva nāmāti tasseva phalaṃ puggalanāmavasena
tika-s0104t:354_5: “akuppa”nti vuttaṃ, iminā ca imamatthaṃ dasseti “khīṇāsavasseva pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti
tika-s0104t:354_6: nāmā”ti. Tassa hi apariññātaṃ, appahīnaṃ abhāvitaṃ, asacchikataṃ vā natthi, tasmā
tika-s0104t:354_7: so buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇantopi tantidhārako paveṇīpālako vaṃsānurakkhakova hutvā
tika-s0104t:354_8: pariyāpuṇāti, tenevāha “paveṇīpālanatthāyā”tiādi. Paveṇī cettha dhammasantati dhammassa
tika-s0104t:354_9: avicchedena pavatti. Buddhassa bhagavato vaṃsoti ca yathāvuttapaveṇīyeva.
tika-s0104t:355_0: Nanu ca yadi paveṇīpālanatthāya buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti,
tika-s0104t:355_1: atha kasmā “khīṇāsavo”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. Ekaccassa hi puthujjanassāpi ayaṃ nayo
tika-s0104t:355_2: labbhati. Tathā hi ekacco puthujjano bhikkhu chātakabhayādinā ganthadhuresu ekasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:355_3: ṭhāne vasitumasakkontesu sayaṃ bhikkhācārena atikilamamāno “atimadhuraṃ buddhavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:355_4: mā nassatu, tantiṃ dhāressāmi, vaṃsaṃ ṭhapessāmi, paveṇiṃ pālessāmī”ti pariyāpuṇāti.
tika-s0104t:355_5: Tasmā tassāpi pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāma kasmā na hotīti? Vuccate – evaṃ
tika-s0104t:355_6: santepi hi puthujjanassa pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāma na hoti. Kiñcāpi hi
tika-s0104t:355_7: puthujjano “paveṇiṃ pālessāmī”ti ajjhāsayena pariyāpuṇāti, attano pana bhavakantārato
tika-s0104t:355_8: avitiṇṇattā tassa sā pariyatti nissaraṇatthāyeva nāma hoti, tasmā puthujjanassa pariyatti
tika-s0104t:355_9: alagaddupamā vā hoti, nissaraṇatthā vā. Sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ nissaraṇatthāva. Khīṇāsavānaṃ
tika-s0104t:355_10: bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattiyevāti veditabbaṃ. Khīṇāsavo hi bhaṇḍāgārika sadisattā “bhaṇḍāgāriko”ti
tika-s0104t:355_11: vuccati. Yathā hi bhaṇḍāgāriko alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā pasādhanakāle tadupiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:355_12: alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ rañño upanāmetvā taṃ alaṅkaroti, evaṃ khīṇāsavopi dhammaratanabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-s0104t:355_13: sampaṭicchitvā mokkhādhigamāya bhabbarūpe sahetuke satte passitvā tadanurūpaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
tika-s0104t:356_0: Evaṃ tisso pariyattiyo vibhajitvā idāni tīsupi piṭakesu yathārahaṃ sampattivipattiyo
tika-s0104t:356_1: niddhāretvā vibhajanto “vinaye panā”tiādimāha. “Sīlasampadaṃ nissāya tisso vijjā
tika-s0104t:356_2: pāpuṇātī”tiādīsu yasmā sīlaṃ visujjhamānaṃ satisampajaññabalena, kammassakatāñāṇabalena
tika-s0104t:356_3: ca saṃkilesamalato visujjhati, pāripūriñca gacchati, tasmā sīlasampadā sijjhamānā
tika-s0104t:356_4: upanissayasampattibhāvena satibalaṃ, ñāṇabalañca paccupaṭṭhapetīti tassā vijjattayūpanissayatā
tika-s0104t:356_5: veditabbā sabhāgahetusampādanato. Satibalena hi pubbenivāsavijjāsiddhi. Sampajaññabalena
tika-s0104t:356_8: tatiyavijjāsiddhi. Puretarasiddhānaṃ samādhipaññānaṃ pāripūriṃ vinā sīlassa āsavakkhayañāṇūpanissayatā
tika-s0104t:356_10: samādhisampadā chaḷabhiññatāya upanissayo. “Yogā ve jāyate bhūrī”ti vacanato pubbayogena
tika-s0104t:356_12: upanissayo. Ettha ca “sīlasampadaṃ nissāyā”ti vuttattā yassa samādhivijambhanabhūtā
tika-s0104t:356_13: anavasesā cha abhiññā na ijjhanti, tassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena na samādhisampadā
tika-s0104t:356_14: atthīti satipi vijjānaṃ abhiññekadesabhāve sīlasampadāsamudāgatā eva tisso vijjā
tika-s0104t:356_15: gahitā, yathā ca paññāsampadāsamudāgatā catasso paṭisambhidā upanissayasampannassa
tika-s0104t:356_16: maggeneva ijjhanti maggakkhaṇeyeva tāsaṃ paṭiladdhattā. Evaṃ sīlasampadāsamudāgatā
tika-s0104t:356_17: tisso vijjā, samādhisampadāsamudāgatā ca cha abhiññā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva
tika-s0104t:356_18: ijjhantīti maggādhigameneva tāsaṃ adhigamo veditabbo. Paccekabuddhānaṃ, sammāsambuddhānañca
tika-s0104t:357_0: Tāsaṃyeva ca tattha pabhedavacanatoti ettha “tāsaṃyevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ pāpuṇitabbānaṃ
tika-s0104t:357_1: chaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidānaṃ vinaye pabhedavacanābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Verañjakaṇḍe
tika-s0104t:357_2: hi tisso vijjāva vibhattāti. Casaddena samuccinanañca tāsaṃ ettha ekadesavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:357_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ abhiññāpaṭisambhidānampi ekadesānaṃ tattha vuttattā. Dutiye “tāsaṃyevā”ti
tika-s0104t:357_4: avadhāraṇaṃ catasso paṭisambhidā apekkhitvā kataṃ, na tisso vijjā. Tā hi chasu abhiññāsu
tika-s0104t:357_5: antogadhattā sutte vibhattāyevāti. Ca-saddena ca paṭisambhidānamekadesavacanaṃ samuccinoti.
tika-s0104t:357_6: Tatiye “tāsañcā”ti ca-saddena sesānampi tattha atthibhāvaṃ dīpeti. Abhidhamme hi
tika-s0104t:357_7: tisso vijjā, cha abhiññā, catasso ca paṭisambhidā vuttāyeva. Paṭisambhidānaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:357_8: aññattha pabhedavacanābhāvaṃ, tattheva ca sammā vibhattabhāvaṃ dīpetukāmo heṭṭhā
tika-s0104t:357_10: pana tisso vijjā, cha abhiññā, catasso ca paṭisambhidā aññe ca sammappadhānādayo
tika-s0104t:357_11: guṇavisesā vibhattā. Kiñcāpi vibhattā, visesato pana paññājātikattā catassova paṭisambhidā
tika-s0104t:357_12: pāpuṇātīti dassanatthaṃ ‘tāsañca tatthevā’ti avadhāraṇavipallāso kato”ti vajirabuddhitthero.
tika-s0104t:358_0: Sukho samphasso etesanti sukhasamphassāni, anuññātāniyeva tādisāni attharaṇapāvuraṇādīni,
tika-s0104t:358_1: tesaṃ phassasāmaññato sukho vā samphasso tathā, anuññāto so yesanti anuññātasukhasamphassāni,
tika-s0104t:358_2: tādisāni attharaṇapāvuraṇādīni tesaṃ phassena samānatāya. Upādinnakaphasso itthiphasso,
tika-s0104t:358_3: methunadhammoyeva. Vuttaṃ ariṭṭhena nāma gaddhabādhipubbena bhikkhunā. So hi bahussuto
tika-s0104t:358_5: āṇāvītikkamantarāyikaṃ na jānāti, sesantarāyikeyeva jānāti, tasmā so rahogato evaṃ
tika-s0104t:358_6: cintesi “ime agārikā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi
tika-s0104t:358_7: honti, bhikkhūpi manāpikāni cakkhuviññeyyāni rūpāni passanti …pe… kāyaviññeyye phoṭṭhabbe
tika-s0104t:358_8: phusanti, mudukāni attharaṇapāvuraṇāni paribhuñjanti, etaṃ sabbampi vaṭṭati, kasmā
tika-s0104t:358_9: itthīnaṃyeva rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā na vaṭṭanti, etepi vaṭṭantiyevā”ti anavajjena
tika-s0104t:358_11: nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thullavākehi saddhiṃ atisukhumasuttaṃ ghaṭento
tika-s0104t:358_12: viya, sāsapena saddhiṃ sineruno sadisataṃ upasaṃharanto viya ca pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ
tika-s0104t:358_13: uppādetvā “kiṃ bhagavatā mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya mahatā ussāhena paṭhamapārājikaṃ
tika-s0104t:358_14: paññattaṃ, natthi ettha doso”ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanto vesārajjañāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:358_15: paṭibāhanto ariyamagge khāṇukaṇṭakādīni pakkhipanto “methunadhamme doso natthī”ti
tika-s0104t:359_0: Anatikkamanatthena antarāye niyuttā, antarāyaṃ vā phalaṃ arahanti, antarāyassa vā
tika-s0104t:359_1: karaṇasīlāti antarāyikā, saggamokkhānaṃ antarāyakarāti vuttaṃ hoti. Te ca kammakilesavipākaupavādaāṇāvītikkamavasena
tika-s0104t:359_2: pañcavidhā. Vitthāro ariṭṭhasikkhāpadavaṇṇanādīsu gahetabbo. Ayaṃ panettha padatthasambandho
tika-s0104t:359_3: – ye ime dhammā antarāyikā iti bhagavatā vuttā desitā ceva paññattā ca, te dhamme
tika-s0104t:359_4: paṭisevato paṭisevantassa yathā yena pakārena te dhammā antarāyāya saggamokkhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:359_5: antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ nālaṃ samatthā na honti, tathā tena pakārena ahaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ
tika-s0104t:359_6: dhammaṃ ājānāmīti. Tato dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇātīti tato anavajjasaññibhāvahetuto vītikkamitvā
tika-s0104t:361_0: “Cattārome bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro? Attahitāya
tika-s0104t:361_1: paṭipanno no parahitāya, parahitāya paṭipanno no attahitāya, nevattahitāya paṭipanno
tika-s0104t:361_2: no parahitāya, attahitāya ceva paṭipanno parahitāya ca…pe… ime kho bhikkhave…pe… lokasmi”nti –
tika-s0104t:362: Evamādinā puggaladesanāpaṭisaññuttasuttantapāḷiṃ nidasseti. Adhippāyanti “ayaṃ puggaladesanāvohāravasena, na paramatthato”ti evaṃ bhagavato adhippāyaṃ. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0104t:369_0: Na hi lokasammutiṃ buddhā bhagavanto vijahanti, lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyā lokābhilāpe
tika-s0104t:369_2: evamādīhipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ kathetī”ti evaṃ adhippāyamajānanto.
tika-s0104t:369_3: Ayamattho upari āvi bhavissati. Duggahitaṃ gaṇhātīti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ
tika-s0104t:369_4: desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”ntiādinā duggahitaṃ
tika-s0104t:369_5: katvā gaṇhāti, viparītaṃ gaṇhātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Duggahitanti hi bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso
tika-s0104t:369_7: pakati, yadidaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgena niddisitabbattā, bhāvappaṭṭhānatā, sakammākammakiriyānuyogaṃ
tika-s0104t:369_8: paccattopayogavacanatā ca. Tena vuttaṃ “duggahitaṃ katvā”ti. Yanti duggahitagāhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:369_9: Majjhimanikāye mūlapaṇṇāsake mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasutte tathāvādīnaṃ sādhināmakaṃ kevaṭṭaputtaṃ
tika-s0104t:369_10: bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhagavatā vuttaṃ. Attanā duggahitena dhammenāti pāṭhaseso, micchāsabhāvenāti
tika-s0104t:369_11: attho. Atha vā duggahaṇaṃ duggahitaṃ, attanāti ca sāmiatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, vibhattiyantapatirūpakaṃ
tika-s0104t:369_12: vā abyayapadaṃ, tasmā attano duggahaṇena viparītagāhenāti attho. Abbhācikkhatīti
tika-s0104t:369_13: abbhakkhānaṃ karoti. Attano kusalamūlāni khananto attānaṃ khanati nāma. Tatoti duggahitabhāvahetuto.
tika-s0104t:370_1: dānaṃ hoti, sayameva cittaṃ attano ārammaṇaṃ hoti, sabbampi cittaṃ sabhāvadhammārammaṇameva
tika-s0104t:370_2: hotī”ti ca evamādinā atikkamitvā pavattayamāno. Cintetumasakkuṇeyyāni, anaraharūpāni
tika-s0104t:370_3: vā acinteyyāni nāma, tāni dassento “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Tattha acinteyyānīti tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:370_4: sabhāvadassanaṃ. Na cintetabbānīti tattha kattabbakiccadassanaṃ. “Yānī”tiādi tassa
tika-s0104t:370_5: hetudassanaṃ. Yāni cintento ummādassa cittakkhepassa, vighātassa vihesassa ca bhāgī
tika-s0104t:370_6: assa, acinteyyāni imāni cattāri na cintetabbāni, imāni vā cattāri acinteyyāni nāma
tika-s0104t:370_7: na cintetabbāni, yāni vā…pe… assa, tasmā na cintetabbāni acintetabbabhūtāni imāni
tika-s0104t:370_8: cattāri acinteyyāni nāmāti yojanā. Iti-saddena pana –
tika-s0104t:371_0: “Katamāni cattāri? Buddhānaṃ bhikkhave buddhavisayo acinteyyo na cintetabbo, yaṃ
tika-s0104t:371_1: cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assa. Jhāyissa bhikkhave jhānavisayo acinteyyo…pe…
tika-s0104t:371_2: kammavipāko bhikkhave acinteyyo…pe… lokacintā bhikkhave acinteyyā…pe… imāni…pe… assā”ti –
tika-s0104t:372_0: Caturaṅguttare vuttaṃ acinteyyasuttaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ acinteyyabhāvadīpakaṃ pāḷiṃ
tika-s0104t:372_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Kāmaṃ acinteyyāni cha asādhāraṇañāṇādīni, tāni pana anussarantassa kusaluppattihetubhāvato
tika-s0104t:372_2: cintetabbāni, imāni pana evaṃ na honti aphalabhāvato, tasmā na cintetabbāni. “Dussīlya…pe…
tika-s0104t:372_3: pabheda”nti iminā vipattiṃ sarūpato dasseti. “Kathaṃ? Piṭakavasenā”tiādivacanasambajjhanena
tika-s0104t:372_5: vacanaṃ byākulaṃ. Sotūnañca atthaviññāpakaṃ na hoti, pubbāparaññūnameva ca tathāvicāritavacanaṃ visayo. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:376_1: Gāthāya pana yassa nikāyassa suttagaṇanato catuttiṃseva suttantā. Vaggasaṅgahavasena
tika-s0104t:376_2: tayo vaggā assa saṅgahassāti tivaggo saṅgaho. Paṭhamo esa nikāyo dīghanikāyoti anulomiko
tika-s0104t:376_3: apaccanīko, atthānulomanato atthānulomanāmiko vā, anvatthanāmoti attho. Tattha “tivaggo
tika-s0104t:376_4: saṅgaho”ti etaṃ “yassā”ti antarikepi samāsoyeva hoti, na vākyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ “navaṃ
tika-s0104t:376_5: pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhenā”ti ettha “navaṃcīvaralābhenā”ti padaṃ viya. Tathā hi
tika-s0104t:376_6: aṭṭhakathācariyā vaṇṇayanti “alabbhīti labho, labho eva lābho. Kiṃ alabbhi? Cīvaraṃ.
tika-s0104t:376_7: Kīdisaṃ? Navaṃ, iti ‘navacīvaralābhenā’ti vattabbe anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā ‘navaṃcīvaralābhenā’ti
tika-s0104t:376_8: vuttaṃ, paṭiladdhanavacīvarenāti attho. Majjhe ṭhitapadadvaye panāti nipāto. Bhikkhunāti
tika-s0104t:376_9: yena laddhaṃ, tassa nidassana”nti. Idhāpi saddato, atthato ca vākye yuttiyāabhāvato
tika-s0104t:376_10: samāsoyeva sambhavati. “Tivaggo”ti padañhi “saṅgaho”ti ettha yadi karaṇaṃ, evaṃ sati
tika-s0104t:376_11: karaṇavacanantameva siyā. Yadi ca padadvayametaṃ tulyādhikaraṇaṃ, tathā ca sati napuṃsakaliṅgameva
tika-s0104t:376_13: aññatthāsambandho na sambhavati, tattha ca tādisena vākyena sambajjhanaṃ na yuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:376_14: tasmā samānepi padantarantarike saddatthāvirodhabhāvoyeva samāsatākāraṇanti samāso
tika-s0104t:376_15: eva yutto. Tayo vaggā assa saṅgahassāti hi tivaggosaṅgaho akārassa okārādesaṃ, okārāgamaṃ
tika-s0104t:376_16: vā katvā yathā “sattāhaparinibbuto, acirapakkanto, māsajāto”tiādi, assa saṅgahassāti
tika-s0104t:376_17: ca saṅgahitassa assa nikāyassāti attho. Apare pana “tayo vaggā yassāti katvā ‘saṅgaho’ti
tika-s0104t:376_18: padena tulyādhikaraṇameva sambhavati, saṅgahoti ca gaṇanā. Ṭīkācariyehi pana ‘tayo
tika-s0104t:376_19: vaggā assa saṅgahassā’ti padadvayassa tulyādhikaraṇatāyeva dassitā”ti vadanti, tadayuttameva
tika-s0104t:377_0: Atthānulomikattaṃ vibhāvetumāha “kasmā”tiādi. Guṇopacārena, taddhitavasena vā dīgha-saddena
tika-s0104t:377_1: dīghappamāṇāni suttāniyeva gahitāni, nikāyasaddo ca ruḷhivasena samūhanivāsatthesu
tika-s0104t:377_3: tadatthesu tassa saṅketasiddhataṃ ñāpento “nāha”ntiādimāha. Ekanikāyampīti ekasamūhampi.
tika-s0104t:377_4: Evaṃ cittanti evaṃ vicittaṃ. Yathayidanti yathā ime tiracchānagatā pāṇā. Poṇikā,
tika-s0104t:377_5: cikkhallikā ca khattiyā, tesaṃ nivāso “poṇikanikāyo cikkhallikanikāyo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:377_6: Etthāti nikāyasaddassa samūhanivāsānaṃ vācakabhāve. Sādhakānīti adhippetassatthassa
tika-s0104t:377_7: sādhanato udāharaṇāni vuccanti. “Samānītānī”ti pāṭhasesena cetassa sambandho, sakkhīni
tika-s0104t:377_8: vā yathāvuttanayena sādhakāni. Yañhi niddhāretvā adhippetatthaṃ sādhenti, taṃ “sakkhī”ti
tika-s0104t:377_9: vadanti. Tathā hi manorathapūraṇiyaṃ vuttaṃ “pañcagarujātakaṃ pana sakkhibhāvatthāya
tika-s0104t:377_10: āharitvā kathetabba”nti sāsanatoti sāsanapayogato, sāsane vā. Lokatoti lokiyapayogato,
tika-s0104t:377_11: loke vā. Idaṃ pana piṭakattaye na vijjati, tasmā evaṃ vuttanti vadanti. Ettha ca
tika-s0104t:377_12: paṭhamamudāharaṇaṃ sāsanato sādhakavacanaṃ, dutiyaṃ lokatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:378_0: Mūlapariyāya vaggādivasena pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni. Aḍḍhena dutiyaṃ diyaḍḍhaṃ, tadeva
tika-s0104t:378_1: sataṃ, ekasataṃ, paññāsa ca suttānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yatthāti yasmiṃ nikāye. Pañcadasavaggapariggahoti
tika-s0104t:379_0: Saṃyujjanti etthāti saṃyuttaṃ, kesaṃ saṃyuttaṃ? Suttavaggānaṃ. Yathā hi byañjanasamudāye
tika-s0104t:379_1: padaṃ, padasamudāye ca vākyaṃ, vākyasamudāye suttaṃ, suttasamudāye vaggoti samaññā,
