tika-s0104t:379_2: evaṃ vaggasamudāye saṃyuttasamaññā. Devatāya pucchitena kathitasuttavaggādīnaṃ saṃyuttattā
tika-s0104t:379_4: satta suttasatāni cā”ti pāṭhe suttantānaṃ satta sahassāni, satta suttasatāni cāti
tika-s0104t:379_5: yojetabbaṃ. “Satta suttasahassāni, satta suttasatāni cā”tipi pāṭho. Saṃyuttasaṅgahoti
tika-s0104t:380: Ekekehi aṅgehi uparūpari uttaro adhiko etthāti aṅguttaroti āha “ekekaaṅgātirekavasenā”tiādi. Tattha hi ekekato paṭṭhāya yāva ekādasa aṅgāni kathitāni. Aṅganti ca dhammakoṭṭhāso.
tika-s0104t:381_0: Pubbeti suttantapiṭakaniddese. Vuttameva pakārantarena saṅkhipitvā avisesetvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:381_1: “ṭhapetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Sakalaṃ vinayapiṭaka”ntiādinā vuttameva hi iminā pakārantarena
tika-s0104t:381_2: saṅkhipitvā dasseti. Apica yathāvuttato avasiṭṭhaṃ yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā dinnanaye
tika-s0104t:381_3: ṭhatvā desitaṃ, bhagavatā ca anumoditaṃ nettipeṭakopadesādikaṃ, taṃ sabbampi ettheva
tika-s0104t:381_4: pariyāpannanti anavasesapariyādānavasena dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Siddhepi
tika-s0104t:381_5: hi sati ārambho atthantaraviññāpanāya vā hoti, niyamāya vāti. Ettha ca yathā “dīghappamāṇāna”ntiādi
tika-s0104t:381_7: dīghappamāṇānampi tadantogadhatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena ca viññāyati “na sabbattha
tika-s0104t:381_9: pana katthaci tabbohāratā”ti. Tadaññanti tehi catūhi nikāyehi aññaṃ, avasesanti attho.
tika-s0104t:382_0: Navappabhedanti ettha kathaṃ panetaṃ navappabhedaṃ hoti. Tathā hi navahi aṅgehi vavatthitehi
tika-s0104t:382_1: aññamaññasaṅkararahitehi bhavitabbaṃ, tathā ca sati asuttasabhāvāneva geyyaṅgādīni
tika-s0104t:382_2: siyuṃ, atha suttasabhāvāneva geyyaṅgādīni, evaṃ sati suttanti visuṃ suttaṅgameva
tika-s0104t:382_3: na siyā, evaṃ sante aṭṭhaṅgaṃ sāsananti āpajjati. Apica “sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:382_4: niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇa”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Suttañca nāma sagāthakaṃ
tika-s0104t:382_5: vā siyā, niggāthakaṃ vā, tasmā aṅgadvayeneva tadubhayaṃ saṅgahitanti tadubhayavinimuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:382_6: suttaṃ udānādivisesasaññārahitaṃ natthi, yaṃ suttaṅgaṃ siyā, athāpi kathañci visuṃ
tika-s0104t:382_7: suttaṅgaṃ siyā, maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:382_8: viya. Geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya. Tathā ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu
tika-s0104t:387_0: Sabbassāpi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi. Tathā hi “ettakaṃ tassa
tika-s0104t:387_1: bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ, sāvatthiyā suttavibhaṅge, sakavāde pañca
tika-s0104t:387_2: suttasatānī”tiādi vacanato vinayābhidhammapariyatti visesesupi suttavohāro dissati.
tika-s0104t:387_3: Teneva ca āyasmā mahākaccāyano nettiyaṃ āha “navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhī”ti tattha
tika-s0104t:387_4: hi suttādivasena navaṅgassa sāsanassa pariyeṭṭhi pariyesanā atthavicāraṇā “navavidha
tika-s0104t:387_5: suttantapariyeṭṭhī”ti vuttā. Tadekadesesu pana pare geyyādayo sanimittā visesavidhayo
tika-s0104t:387_6: tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā. Tathā hi geyyassa sagāthakattaṃ tabbhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-s0104t:387_7: Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ “geyya”nti vadanti, gāthāvirahe pana
tika-s0104t:387_8: sati pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Pucchāvissajjanañhi
tika-s0104t:387_9: “byākaraṇa”nti vuccati, byākaraṇameva veyyākaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ
tika-s0104t:387_10: katvā vissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati geyyādisaññānaṃ
tika-s0104t:387_11: anokāsabhāvato. Saokāsavidhito hi anokāsavidhi balavā. Apica “gāthāvirahe satī”ti
tika-s0104t:387_12: visesitattā. Yathādhippetassa hi atthassa anadhippetato byavacchedakaṃ visesanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:387_13: Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalagāthābandhesu, sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāpaṭisaññuttesu,
tika-s0104t:387_15: yathākkamaṃ gāthāudānaitivuttaka abbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā. Ettha hi satipi saññāntaranimittayoge
tika-s0104t:387_16: anokāsasaññānaṃ balavabhāveneva gāthādisaññā patiṭṭhitā, tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve
tika-s0104t:387_17: bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā patiṭṭhitā, satipi
tika-s0104t:387_18: pañhāvissajjanabhāve, sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā
tika-s0104t:387_19: patiṭṭhitā, evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā
tika-s0104t:387_20: patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo, yaṃ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:387_21: taṃ suttaṅgameva visesasaññāparihārena sāmaññasaññāya pavattanato. Nanu ca evaṃ santepi
tika-s0104t:387_22: sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti tadubhayavinimuttassa
tika-s0104t:387_23: suttassa abhāvato visuṃ suttaṅgameva na siyāti codanā tadavatthā evāti? Na tadavatthā
tika-s0104t:387_24: sodhitattā. Sodhitañhi pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittanti.
tika-s0104t:388_0: Yañca vuttaṃ “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, tampi na,
tika-s0104t:388_1: niruḷhattā. Niruḷho hi maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttabhāvo. Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo
tika-s0104t:388_2: viya gāthābhāvena saññitāni, atha kho suttabhāveneva. Teneva hi akathāyaṃ “suttanāmaka”nti
tika-s0104t:388_3: nāmaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Yañca pana vuttaṃ “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā”ti, tampi
tika-s0104t:388_4: natthi. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā sahatāññena, tasmā. Sahabhāvo hi nāma attato aññena hoti.
tika-s0104t:388_5: Saha gāthāhīti ca sagāthakaṃ, na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttapadeso
tika-s0104t:388_6: atthi, yo “saha gāthāhī”ti vucceyya, nanu ca gāthāsamudāyo tadekadesāhi gāthāhi añño
tika-s0104t:388_7: hoti, yassa vasena “saha gāthāhī”ti sakkā vattunti? Taṃ na. Na hi avayavavinimutto
tika-s0104t:388_8: samudāyo nāma koci atthi, yo tadekadesehi saha bhaveyya. Katthaci pana “dīghasuttaṅkitassā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:388_9: samudāyekadesānaṃ vibhāgavacanaṃ vohāramattaṃ pati pariyāyavacanameva, ayañca nippariyāyena
tika-s0104t:388_11: geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā”ti, tampi na, aññato. Aññāyeva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā.
tika-s0104t:388_12: Tādisāyeva hi kāraṇānurūpena tattha desitā, ato na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti.
tika-s0104t:389: Idāni etāni navaṅgāni vibhajitvā dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Niddeso nāma suttanipāte –
tika-s0104t:391: Addhā pītimano hoti, laddhā macco yadicchatī”tiādinā. ; –
tika-s0104t:402_0: Āgatassa khaggavisāṇasuttassa ca atthavibhāgavasena satthukappena āyasmatā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherena
tika-s0104t:402_1: kato niddeso, yo “mahāniddeso, cūḷaniddeso”ti vuccati. Evamidha niddesassa suttaṅgasaṅgaho
tika-s0104t:402_2: bhadantabuddhadhosācariyena dassito, tathā aññatthāpi vinayaṭṭhakathādīsu, ācariyadhammapālattherenāpi
tika-s0104t:402_3: nettippakaraṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Apare pana niddesassa gāthāveyyākaraṇaṅgesu dvīsu saṅgahaṃ
tika-s0104t:403_0: “So panesa vinayapiṭakaṃ…pe… abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpanno,
tika-s0104t:403_2: suttaṃ…pe… vedallanti navasu satthusāsanaṅgesu yathāsambhavaṃ gāthaṅgaveyyākaraṇaṅgadvayasaṅgahito”ti.
tika-s0104t:404_0: Ettha tāva katthaci pucchāvissajjanasabbhāvato niddesekadesassa veyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho
tika-s0104t:404_1: yujjatu, agāthābhāvato gāthaṅgasaṅgaho kathaṃ yujjeyyāti vīmaṃsitabbametaṃ. Dhammāpadādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:404_2: viya hi kevalaṃ gāthābandhabhāvo gāthaṅgassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Dhammapadādīsu hi
tika-s0104t:404_3: kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu gāthāsamaññā patiṭṭhitā, niddese ca na koci kevalo gāthābandappadeso
tika-s0104t:404_4: upalabbhati. Sammāsambuddhena bhāsitānaṃyeva hi aṭṭhakavaggādisaṅgahitānaṃ gāthānaṃ
tika-s0104t:404_5: niddesamattaṃ dhammasenāpatinā kataṃ. Atthavibhajanatthaṃ ānītāpi hi tā aṭṭhakavaggādisaṅgahitā
tika-s0104t:404_6: niddisitabbā mūlagāthāyo suttanipātapariyāpannattā aññāyevāti na niddesasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-s0104t:404_7: gacchanti ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu āgatāpi taṃ vohāramalabhamānā jātakādipariyāpannā gāthāyo
tika-s0104t:404_8: viya, tasmā kāraṇantaramettha gavesitabbaṃ, yuttataraṃ vā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:405_0: Nālakasuttaṃ nāma dhammacakkappavattita divasato sattame divase nālakattherassa “moneyyaṃ
tika-s0104t:405_1: te upaññissa”ntiādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ moneyya paṭipadāparidīpakaṃ suttaṃ. Tuvaṭṭakasuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:405_2: nāma mahāsamayasuttantadesanāya sannipatitesu devesu “kā nu kho arahattappattiyā
tika-s0104t:405_3: paṭipattī”ti uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ nimmitabuddhena
tika-s0104t:405_4: attānaṃ pucchāpetvā “mūlaṃ papañcasaṅkhāyā”tiādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ. Evamidha
tika-s0104t:405_5: suttanipāte āgatānaṃ maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho dassito, tattheva āgatānaṃ
tika-s0104t:405_6: asuttanāmikānaṃ suddhikagāthānaṃ gāthaṅgasaṅgahañca dassayissati, evaṃ sati suttanipātaṭṭhakathārambhe –
tika-s0104t:408_0: Sakalassāpi suttanipātassa geyyaveyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho kasmā coditoti? Nāyaṃ virodho.
tika-s0104t:408_1: Kevalañhi tattha codakena sagāthakattaṃ, katthaci pucchāvissajjanattañca gahetvā
tika-s0104t:408_2: codanāmattaṃ kataṃ, aññathā suttanipāte niggāthakassa suttasseva abhāvato veyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho
tika-s0104t:408_3: na codetabbo siyā, tasmā codakassa vacanametaṃ appamāṇanti idha, aññāsu ca vinayaṭṭhakathādīsu
tika-s0104t:408_4: vuttanayeneva tassa suttaṅgagāthaṅgasaṅgaho dassitoti. Suttanti cuṇṇiyasuttaṃ. Visesenāti
tika-s0104t:408_5: rāsibhāvena ṭhitaṃ sandhāyāha. Sagāthāvaggo geyyanti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:409_0: “Aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ nāma paṭisambhidādī”ti tīsupi kira gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:409_1: Apare pana paṭisambhidāmaggassa geyyaveyyākaraṇaṅgadvayasaṅgahaṃ vadanti. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0104t:409_3: etthāpi geyyaṅgasaṅgahitabhāvo vuttanayena vīmaṃsitabbo. No suttanāmikāti asuttanāmikā
tika-s0104t:409_4: saṅgītikāle suttasamaññāya apaññātā. “Suddhikagāthā nāma vatthugāthā”ti tīsupi kira
tika-s0104t:409_5: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ, vatthugāthāti ca pārāyanavaggassa nidānamāropentena āyasmatā
tika-s0104t:409_6: ānandattherena saṅgītikāle vuttā chappaññāsa gāthāyo, nālakasuttassa nidānamāropentena
tika-s0104t:409_7: teneva tadā vuttā vīsatimattā gāthāyo ca vuccanti. Suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “parinibbute
tika-s0104t:409_8: bhagavati saṅgītiṃ karontenāyasmatā mahākassapena tameva moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puṭṭho
tika-s0104t:409_9: āyasmā ānando yena, yadā ca samādapito nālakatthero bhagavantaṃ pucchi, taṃ sabbaṃ
tika-s0104t:409_10: pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetukāmo ‘ānandajāte’tiādikā vīsati vatthugāthāyo vatvā vissajjesi,
tika-s0104t:409_11: taṃ sabbampi ‘nālakasutta”nti vuccatī”ti āgatattā nālakasuttassa vatthugāthāyo nālakasuttaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0104t:409_12: gahitāti pārāyanavaggassa vatthugāthāyo idha suddhikagāthāti gahetabbaṃ. Tattheva
tika-s0104t:409_13: ca pārāyanavagge ajitamāṇavakādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ pucchāgāthā, bhagavato
tika-s0104t:409_14: vissajjanagāthā ca pāḷiyaṃ suttanāmena avatvā ‘ajitamāṇavakapucchā, tissametteyyamāṇavakapucchā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:409_15: āgatattā, cuṇṇiyaganthe hi asammissattā ca “no suttanāmikā suddhikagāthā nāmā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t:410_1: dasseti kimidaṃ udānaṃ nāma? Pītivegasamuṭṭhāpito udāhāro. Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu
tika-s0104t:410_2: mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā gacchati, taṃ “avasesako”ti vuccati. Yañca
tika-s0104t:410_3: jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā gacchati, taṃ “mahogho’ti vuccati,
tika-s0104t:410_4: evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ antohadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t:410_5: so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi vacīdvārena nikkhanto paṭiggāhakanirapekkho
tika-s0104t:410_6: udāhāraviseso “udāna”nti vuccati “uda mode kīḷāyañcā”ti hi akkharacintakā vadanti,
tika-s0104t:410_7: idañca yebhuyyena vuttaṃ dhammasaṃvegavasena uditassāpi “sace bhāyatha dukkhassā”tiādiudānassa
tika-s0104t:410_8: udānapāḷiyaṃ āgatattā, tathā“gāthāpaṭisaṃyuttā”ti idampi yebhuyyeneva “atthi bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:410_9: tadāyatanaṃ, yattha neva pathavī, na āpo”tiādikassa cuṇṇiyavākyavasena uditassāpi
tika-s0104t:410_10: tattha āgatattā. Nanu ca udānaṃ nāma pītisomanassasamuṭṭāpito, dhammasaṃvegasamuṭṭhāpito
tika-s0104t:410_11: vā dhammapaṭiggāhakanirapekkho gāthābandhavasena, cuṇṇiyavākyavasena ca pavatto udāhāro,
tika-s0104t:410_12: tathā ceva sabbattha āgataṃ, idha kasmā “bhikkhave”ti āmantanaṃ vuttanti? Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0104t:410_13: saññāpanatthaṃ eva, na paṭiggāhakakaraṇatthaṃ. Nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttañhi bhagavā dhammaṃ
tika-s0104t:410_14: desetvā nibbānaguṇānussaraṇena uppannapītisomanassena udānaṃ udānento “ayaṃ nibbānadhammo
tika-s0104t:410_15: kathamapaccayo upalabbhatī”ti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetoparivitakkamaññāya tesaṃ tamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:410_16: ñāpetukāmena “tadāyatana”nti vuttaṃ, na pana ekantato te paṭiggāhake katvāti veditabbanti.
tika-s0104t:411: Tayidaṃ sabbaññubuddhabhāsitaṃ paccekabuddhabhāsitaṃ sāvakabhāsitanti tibbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha paccekabuddhabhāsitaṃ –
tika-s0104t:422_0: Therīgāthāsu ca āgataṃ. Aññānipi sakkādīhi devehi bhāsitāni “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:422_1: kassape suppatiṭṭhita”ntiādīni. Soṇadaṇḍabrāhmaṇādīhi manussehi ca bhāsitāni “namo
tika-s0104t:422_2: tassa bhagavato”tiādīni tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāni udānāni santi eva, tāni sabbānipi
tika-s0104t:422_3: idha na adhippetāni. Yaṃ pana sammāsambuddhena sāmaṃ āhaccabhāsitaṃ jinavacanabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0104t:422_4: tadeva dhammasaṅgāhakehi “udāna”nti saṅgītaṃ, tadeva ca sandhāya bhagavatā pariyattidhammaṃ
tika-s0104t:422_5: navadhā vibhajitvā uddisantena “udāna”nti vuttaṃ. Yā pana “anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādikā
tika-s0104t:422_6: gāthā bhagavatā bodhimūle udānavasena pavattitā, anekasatasahassānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:422_7: udānabhūtā ca, tā aparabhāge dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa bhagavatā desitattā dhammasaṅgāhakehi
tika-s0104t:422_8: udānapāḷiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ anāropetvā dhammapade saṅgahitā, yañca “aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño
tika-s0104t:422_9: aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño”ti udānavacanaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuyā devamanussānaṃ pavedanasamatthanigghosavipphāraṃ
tika-s0104t:422_10: bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, tadapi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ sabbesaṃ eva bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattipaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ
tika-s0104t:422_11: “ārādhayiṃsu vata maṃ bhikkhū ekaṃ samaya”ntiādivacanaṃ viya dhammacakkappavattanasuttantadesanāpariyosāne
tika-s0104t:422_12: attanāpi adhigatadhammekadesassa yathādesitassa ariyamaggassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ sāvakesu
tika-s0104t:422_13: therena adhigatattā attano parissamassa saphalabhāvapaccavekkhaṇahetutaṃ pītisomanassajanitaṃ
tika-s0104t:422_14: udāhāramattaṃ, na pana “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”tiādivacanaṃ viya pavattiyā,
tika-s0104t:422_15: nivattiyā vā pakāsananti dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ na saṅgītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:422_16: Udānapāḷiyaṃ pana aṭṭhasu vaggesu dasa dasa katvā asītiyeva suttantā saṅgītā. Tathā
tika-s0104t:424_0: Idha pana “dveasīti suttantā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ udānapāḷiyā na sameti, tasmā “asīti suttantā”ti
tika-s0104t:424_1: pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ. Apica na kevalaṃ idheva, atha kho aññāsupi vinayābhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-s0104t:424_2: tathāyeva vuttattā “appakaṃ pana ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotī”ti pariyāyena
tika-s0104t:424_3: anekaṃsena vuttaṃ siyā. Yathā vā tathā vā anumānena gaṇanameva hi tattha tattha ūnādhikasaṅkhyā,
tika-s0104t:424_4: itarathā tāyeva na siyuntipi vadanti, pacchā pamādalekhavacanaṃ vā etaṃ.
tika-s0104t:425_1: vuttamarahatāti me sutaṃ. Ekadhammaṃ bhikkhave, pajahatha, ahaṃ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāya.
tika-s0104t:425_2: Katamaṃ ekadhammaṃ? Lobhaṃ bhikkhave, ekadhammaṃ pajahatha, ahaṃ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā”ti
tika-s0104t:425_4: Tathā hi itivuttakapāḷiyameva udānagāthāhi dvādasuttarasatasuttāni gaṇetvā saṅgītāni,
tika-s0104t:425_5: tadaṭṭhakathāyampi tathāyeva vuttaṃ. Tasmā “dvādasuttarasatasuttantā” icceva pāṭhena
tika-s0104t:425_6: bhavitabbaṃ, yathāvuttanayena vā anekaṃsato vuttantipi vattuṃ sakkā, tathāpi īdise
tika-s0104t:425_7: ṭhāne pamāṇaṃ dassentena yāthāvatova niyametvā dassetabbanti “dasuttarasatasuttantā”ti
tika-s0104t:425_8: idaṃ pacchā pamādalekhamevāti gahetabbanti vadanti. Iti evaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ itivuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:425_9: Itivuttanti saṅgītaṃ itivuttakaṃ. Ruḷhināmaṃ vā etaṃ yathā “yevāpanakaṃ, natumhākavaggo”ti,
tika-s0104t:425_10: vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā, vuttamarahatāti me sutanti nidānavacanena saṅgītaṃ yathāvuttasuttasamūhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:426_0: Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ purāvutthaṃ bhagavato pubbacaritaṃ kāyati katheti pakāseti etenāti jātakaṃ,
tika-s0104t:426_1: taṃ pana imānīti dassetuṃ “apaṇṇakajātakādīnī”tiādimāha. Tattha “paññāsādhikāni pañcajātakasatānī”ti
tika-s0104t:426_2: idaṃ appakaṃ pana ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti katvā anekaṃsena, vohārasukhatāmattena
tika-s0104t:426_3: ca vuttaṃ. Ekaṃsato hi sattacattālīsādhikāniyeva yathāvuttagaṇanato tīhi ūnattā.
tika-s0104t:426_4: Tathā hi ekanipāte paññāsasataṃ, dukanipāte sataṃ, tikanipāte paññāsa, tathā catukkanipāte,
tika-s0104t:426_5: pañcakanipāte pañcavīsa, chakkanipāte vīsa, sattanipāte ekavīsa, aṭṭhanipāte dasa,
tika-s0104t:426_6: navanipāte dvādasa, dasanipāte soḷasa, ekādasanipāte nava, dvādasanipāte dasa, tathā
tika-s0104t:426_7: terasanipāte, pakiṇṇakanipāte terasa, vīsatinipāte cuddasa, tiṃsanipāte dasa, cattālīsanipāte
tika-s0104t:426_8: pañca, paṇṇāsanipāte tīṇi, saṭṭhinipāte dve, tathā sattatinipāte, asītinipāte pañca,
tika-s0104t:426_9: mahānipāte dasāti sattacattālīsādhikāneva pañca jātakasatāni saṅgītānīti.
tika-s0104t:427: Abbhuto dhammo sabhāvo vutto yatthāti abbhutadhammaṃ, taṃ panidanti āha “cattārome”tiādi. Ādisaddena cettha –
tika-s0104t:428_0: “Cattārome bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande. Katame cattāro? Sace bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:428_1: bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti. Tatra
tika-s0104t:428_2: ce ānando, dhammaṃ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti, atittāva bhikkhave bhikkhuparisā
tika-s0104t:428_3: hoti, atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati. Sace bhikkhave, bhikkhunīparisā…pe… upāsakaparisā…pe…
tika-s0104t:428_4: upāsikā – parisā…pe… tuṇhī bhavati. Ime kho bhikkhave…pe… ānande”ti –
tika-s0104t:429: Evamādinayappavattaṃ tattha tattha bhāsitaṃ sabbampi acchariyabbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ suttantaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t:430_0: Cūḷavedallādīsu visākhena nāma upāsakena puṭṭhāya dhammadinnāya nāma bhikkhuniyā
tika-s0104t:430_1: bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ cūḷavedallaṃ nāma. Mahākoṭṭhikattherena pucchitena āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
tika-s0104t:430_2: bhāsitaṃ mahāvedallaṃ nāma. Sammādiṭṭhisuttampi bhikkhūhi puṭṭhena teneva bhāsitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:430_3: etāni majjhimanikāyapariyāpannāni. Sakkapañhaṃ pana sakkena puṭṭho bhagavā abhāsi,
tika-s0104t:430_4: taṃ dīghanikāyapariyāpannaṃ. Mahāpuṇṇamasuttaṃ pana tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇamāya
tika-s0104t:430_5: rattiyā aññatarena bhikkhunā puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ majjhimanikāyapariyāpannaṃ.
tika-s0104t:430_6: Evamādayo sabbepi tattha tatthāgatā vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitasuttantā
tika-s0104t:430_7: “vedalla”nti veditabbaṃ. Vedanti ñāṇaṃ. Tuṭṭhinti yathābhāsitadhammadesanaṃ viditvā
tika-s0104t:430_8: “sādhu ayye sādhāvuso”tiādinā abbhanumodanavasappavattaṃ pītisomanassaṃ. Laddhā laddhāti
tika-s0104t:430_9: labhitvā labhitvā, punappunaṃ labhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti, etena vedasaddo ñāṇe, somanasse
tika-s0104t:430_10: ca ekasesanayena, sāmaññaniddesena vā pavattati, vedamhi nissitaṃ tassa labhāpanavasenāti
tika-s0104t:431_0: Evaṃ aṅgavasena sakalampi buddhavacanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni dhammakkhandhavasena vibhajitukāmo
tika-s0104t:431_2: gāthā vuttatthāva. Evaṃ paridīpitadhammakkhandhavasenāti gopakamoggallānena nāma
tika-s0104t:431_3: brāhmaṇena puṭṭhena gopakamoggallānasutte attano guṇappakāsanatthaṃ vā theragāthāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:431_4: āyasmatā ānandattherena samantato dīpitadhammakkhandhavasena iminā evaṃ tena aparidīpitāpi
tika-s0104t:431_5: dhammakkhandhā santīti pakāseti, tasmā kathāvatthuppakaraṇa mādhuriyasuttādīnaṃ vimānavatthādīsu
tika-s0104t:431_6: kesañci gāthānañca vasena caturāsītisahassatopi dhammakkhandhānaṃ adhikatā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:432_0: Ettha ca subhasuttaṃ, gopakamoggallānasuttañca parinibbute bhagavati ānandattherena
tika-s0104t:432_1: bhāsitattā caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassesu antogadhaṃ hoti, na hotīti? Paṭisambhidāgaṇṭhipade
tika-s0104t:432_2: tāva idaṃ vuttaṃ “sayaṃ vuttadhammakkhandhānampi bhikkhuto gahiteyeva saṅgahetvā
tika-s0104t:432_3: evamāhāti daṭṭhabba”nti, bhagavatā pana dinnanaye ṭhatvā bhāsitattā “sayaṃ vuttampi
tika-s0104t:432_4: cetaṃ suttadvayaṃ bhagavato gahiteyeva saṅgahetvā vutta”nti evampi vattuṃ yuttataraṃ
tika-s0104t:432_5: viya dissati. Bhagavatā hi dinnanaye ṭhatvā sāvakā dhammaṃ desenti, teneva sāvakabhāsitampi
tika-s0104t:432_6: kathāvatthādikaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ nāma jātaṃ, tatoyeva ca attanā bhāsitampi subhasuttādikaṃ
tika-s0104t:432_7: saṅgītimāropentena āyasmatā ānandattherena “evaṃ me suta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:433_0: Ekānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ satipaṭṭhānādi. Satipaṭṭhānasuttañhi “ekāyano ayaṃ bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:433_1: maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādinā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne ārabhitvā tesaṃyeva vibhāgadassanavasena
tika-s0104t:434: “Kati chinde kati jahe, kati cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-s0104t:437: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-s0104t:440: Tikadukabhājanaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ nikkhepakaṇḍaaṭṭhakathākaṇḍavasena gahetabbaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ kusalattikamātikāpadassa vibhajanavasena nikkhepakaṇḍe vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:441_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā? Tīṇi kusalamūlāni…pe… ime dhammā kusalā. Katame dhammā akusalā?
tika-s0104t:441_1: Tīṇi akusalamūlāni…pe… ime dhammā akusalā. Katame dhammā abyākatā”? Kusalākusalānaṃ
tika-s0104t:442: Ayameko dhammakkhandho. Esa nayo sesattikadukapadavibhajanesupi. Yadapi aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:443_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā? Catūsu bhūmīsu kusalaṃ. Ime dhammā kusalā. Katame dhammā akusalā?
tika-s0104t:443_1: Dvādasa akusalacittuppādā. Ime dhammā akusalā. Katame dhammā abyākatā? Catūsu bhūmīsu
tika-s0104t:443_2: vipāko tīsu bhūmīsu kiriyābyākataṃ rūpañca nibbānañca. Ime dhammā abyākatā”ti,
tika-s0104t:444_0: Ayaṃ kusalattikamātikāpadassa vibhajanavasena pavatto eko dhammakkhandho. Esa nayo
tika-s0104t:444_1: sesesupi. Cittavārabhājanaṃ pana cittuppādakaṇḍa vasena gahetabbaṃ. Yañhi tattha
tika-s0104t:445_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ
tika-s0104t:445_1: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hotī”ti,
tika-s0104t:446_0: Ayameko dhammakkhandho. Evaṃ sesacittavāravibhajanesu. Eko dhammakkhandhoti (ekameko
tika-s0104t:446_1: dhammakkhandho chaḷa aṭṭha.) ca ekeko dhammakkhandhoti attho. “Ekamekaṃ tikadukabhājanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:446_2: ekamekaṃ cittavārabhājana”nti ca vacanato hi “ekeko”ti avuttepi ayamattho sāmatthiyato viññāyamānova hoti.
tika-s0104t:447_0: Vatthu nāma sudinnakaṇḍādi. Mātikā nāma “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:447_1: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ajjhācāre paññattaṃ uddesa sikkhāpadaṃ. Padabhājaniyanti tassa tassa
tika-s0104t:447_2: sikkhāpadassa “yo panāti yo yādiso”tiādi nayappavattaṃ padavibhajanaṃ. Antarāpattīti
tika-s0104t:447_3: “paṭilātaṃ ukkhipati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evamādinā sikkhāpadantaresu paññattā āpatti.
tika-s0104t:447_4: Āpattīti taṃtaṃsikkhāpadānurūpaṃ vutto tikacchedamutto āpattivāro. Anāpattīti “anāpatti
tika-s0104t:447_5: ajānantassa asādiyantassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassā”tiādi nayappavatto
tika-s0104t:447_7: dasāhātikkante vematiko…pe… dasāhātikkante anatikkantasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti
tika-s0104t:447_8: evamādinayappavatto tikapācittiya-tika-dukkaṭādibhedo tikaparicchedo. Tatthāti tesu vatthumātikādīsu.
tika-s0104t:448_0: Evaṃ anekanayasamalaṅkataṃ saṅgītippakāraṃ dassetvā “ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo…pe…
tika-s0104t:448_1: imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti buddhavacanaṃ dhammavinayādibhedena vavatthapetvā
tika-s0104t:448_3: saṅgītiyā imassa dīghāgamassa dhammabhāvo, majjhimabuddhavacanādibhāvo ca vavatthāpitoti
tika-s0104t:448_5: idamārabhati, soyeva padhānavasena dassito”ti ācariyehi ayaṃ sambandho vutto. Aparo
tika-s0104t:448_6: nayo – heṭṭhā vuttesu ekavidhādibhedabhinnesu pakāresu dhammavinayādibhāvo saṅgītikārake
tika-s0104t:448_7: heva saṅgītikāle vavatthāpito, na pacchā kappanamattasiddhoti dassento “evameta”ntiādimāhātipi
tika-s0104t:448_8: vattabbo. Na kevalaṃ yathāvuttappakārameva vavatthāpetvā saṅgītaṃ, atha kho aññampīti
tika-s0104t:448_9: dasseti “na kevalañcā”tiādinā. Udānasaṅgaho nāma paṭhamapārājikādīsu āgatānaṃ vinītavatthuādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:449: “Makkaṭī vajjiputtā ca, gihī naggo ca titthiyā;
tika-s0104t:450: Dārikuppalavaṇṇā ca, byañjanehi pare duve”ti. ādikā ; –
tika-s0104t:451_0: Gāthāyo. Vuccamānassa hi vuttassa vā atthassa vippakiṇṇabhāvena pavattituṃ adatvā
tika-s0104t:451_1: uddhaṃ dānaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ udānaṃ, saṅgahavacananti attho. Sīlakkhandhavaggamūlapariyāyavaggādivasena
tika-s0104t:451_2: vaggasaṅgaho. Vaggoti hi dhammasaṅgāhakeheva katā suttasamudāyassa samaññā. Uttarimanussapeyyālanīlapeyyālādivasena
tika-s0104t:451_3: peyyālasaṅgaho. Pātuṃ rakkhituṃ, vitthārituṃ vā alanti hi peyyālaṃ, saṅkhipitvā dassanavacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:451_5: nipāto. Devatāsaṃyuttādivasena saṃyuttasaṅgaho. Vaggasamudāye eva dhammasaṅgāhakehi
tika-s0104t:451_6: katā saṃyuttasamaññā. Mūlapaṇṇāsakādivasena paṇṇāsasaṅgaho, paññāsa paññāsa suttāni
tika-s0104t:451_7: gaṇetvā saṅgahoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ādisaddena tassaṃ tassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ dissamānaṃ saṅgītikārakavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:451_8: saṅgaṇhāti. Udānasaṅgaha…pe… paṇṇāsasaṅgahādīhi anekavidhaṃ tathā. Sattahi māsehīti
tika-s0104t:451_9: kiriyāpavagge tatiyā “ekāheneva bārāṇasiṃ pāyāsi. Navahi māsehi vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpesī”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:452_1: cassā”tiādi. Assa buddhavacanassa saṅgītipariyosāne sañjātappamodā viya, sādhukāraṃ
tika-s0104t:452_2: dadamānā viya ca saṅkampi…pe… pāturahesunti sambandho. Viyāti hi ubhayattha yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:452_3: Pavattane, pavattanāya vā samatthaṃ pavattanasamatthaṃ. Udakapariyantanti pathavīsandhārakaudakapariyosānaṃ
tika-s0104t:452_4: katvā, saha tena udakena, taṃ vā udakaṃ āhaccāti vuttaṃ hoti, tena ekadesakampanaṃ
tika-s0104t:452_5: nivāreti. Saṅkampīti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gacchantī suṭṭhu kampi. Sampakampīti uddhamadho
tika-s0104t:452_6: ca gacchantī sammā pakārena kampi. Sampavedhīti catūsu disāsu gacchantī suṭṭhu bhiyyo
tika-s0104t:452_7: pavedhi. Evaṃ etena padattayena chappakāraṃ pathavīcalanaṃ dasseti. Atha vā puratthimato,
tika-s0104t:452_8: pacchimato ca unnamanaonamanavasena saṅkampi. Uttarato, dakkhiṇato ca unnamanaonamanavasena
tika-s0104t:452_9: sampakampi. Majjhimato, pariyantato ca unnamanaonamanavasena sampavedhi. Evampi chappakāraṃ
tika-s0104t:452_10: pathavīcalanaṃ dasseti, yaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ –-
tika-s0104t:453_0: “Puratthimato unnamati pacchimato onamati, pacchimato unnamati puratthimato onamati,
tika-s0104t:453_1: uttarato unnamati dakkhiṇato onamati, dakkhiṇato unnamati uttarato onamati, majjhimato
tika-s0104t:453_2: unnamati pariyantato onamati, pariyantato unnamati majjhimato onamatīti evaṃ chappakāraṃ…pe… akampitthā”ti.
tika-s0104t:454_0: Accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttāni acchariyāni, pupphavassacelukkhepādīni aññāyapi sā samaññāya
tika-s0104t:454_1: pākaṭāti dassento āha “yā loke”tiādi. Yā paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti dhammasaṅgāhakehi mahākassapādīhi
tika-s0104t:454_2: pañcahi satehi yena katā saṅgītā, tena pañca satāni etissāti “pañcasatā”ti ca thereheva
tika-s0104t:454_3: katattā therā mahākassapādayo etissā, therehi vā katāti “therikā”ti ca loke pavuccati,
tika-s0104t:455_0: Evaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti dassetvā yadatthaṃ sā idha dassitā, idāni taṃ nidānaṃ nigamanavasena
tika-s0104t:455_2: ādibhūtassa dīghanikāyassa. Khuddakapariyāpanno hi vinayo paṭhamaṃ saṅgīto. Tathā
tika-s0104t:455_3: hi vuttaṃ “suttanta piṭake”ti. Tenāti tathāvuttattā, iminā yathāvuttapaṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:455_4: tathāvacanameva sandhāya mayā heṭṭhā evaṃ vuttanti pubbāparasambandhaṃ, yathāvuttavitthāravacanassa vā guṇaṃ dassetīti.
tika-s0104t:456_4: katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā bāhiranidānavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0104t:460_1: sādhāraṇato bāhiranidānaṃ dassetvā idāni abbhantaranidānaṃ saṃvaṇṇento atthādhigamassa
tika-s0104t:460_3: padavibhāgena sādhetabbattā paṭhamaṃ tāva padavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha eva”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:460_4: Padavibhāgena hi “idaṃ nāma etaṃ pada”nti vijānanena taṃtaṃpadānurūpaṃ liṅgavibhatti
tika-s0104t:460_5: vacana kālapayogādikaṃ sammāpatiṭṭhāpanato yathāvuttassa padassa sunikkhittatā hoti,
tika-s0104t:460_6: tāya ca atthassa samadhigamiyatā. Yathāha “sunikkhittassa bhikkhave – padabyañjanassa
tika-s0104t:460_7: atthopi sunayohotī”tiādi. Apica sambandhato, padato, padavibhāgato, padatthato anuyogato,
tika-s0104t:460_8: parihārato cāti chahākārehi atthavaṇṇanā kātabbā. Tattha sambandho nāma desanāsambandho,
tika-s0104t:460_9: yaṃ lokiyā “ummugghāto”tipi vadanti, so pana pāḷiyā nidānapāḷivasena, nidānapāḷiyā
tika-s0104t:460_10: ca saṅgītivasena veditabbo. Paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassentena hi nidānapāḷiyā sambandho
tika-s0104t:460_11: dassito, tasmā padādivaseneva saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karonto “eva”ntiādimāha. Ettha ca “evanti
tika-s0104t:460_12: nipātapadantiādinā padato, padavibhāgato ca saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karoti padānaṃ tabbisesānañca
tika-s0104t:460_13: dassitattā. Padavibhāgoti hi padānaṃ visesoyeva adhippeto, na padaviggaho. Padāni
tika-s0104t:460_14: ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgo. Atha vā padavibhāgo ca padaviggaho ca padavibhāgoti
tika-s0104t:460_15: ekasesavasena padapadaviggahāpi padavibhāgasaddena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Padaviggahato
tika-s0104t:460_16: pana “bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho”tiādinā upari saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissati, tathā padatthānuyogaparihārehipi.
tika-s0104t:460_17: Evanti ettha luttaniddiṭṭhaiti-saddo ādiattho antarāsadda ca saddādīnampi saṅgahitattā,
tika-s0104t:460_18: nayaggahaṇena vā te gahitā. Tenāha “metiādīni nāmapadānī”ti. Itarathā hi antarāsaddaṃ
tika-s0104t:460_19: ca saddādīnampi nipātabhāvo vattabbo siyā. Metiādīnīti ettha pana ādi-saddena yāva
tika-s0104t:460_20: paṭisaddo, tāva tadavasiṭṭhāyeva saddā saṅgahitā. Paṭīti upasaggapadaṃ patisaddassa kāriyabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:461: Idāni atthuddhārakkamena padatthato saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karonto “atthato panā”tiādimāha. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne sotūnaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayakosallatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāppakārā vattabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t:462: Ekanāḷikā kathā ca, caturassā tathāpi ca;
tika-s0104t:464_0: Tattha pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanaṃ ekāya nāḷiyā minitasadisattā, ekekaṃ
tika-s0104t:464_1: vā padaṃ nāḷaṃ mūlaṃ, ekamekaṃ padaṃ vā nāḷikā atthaniggamanamaggo etissāti katvā
tika-s0104t:464_2: ekanāḷikā nāma. Paṭipakkhaṃ dassetvā, paṭipakkhassa ca upamaṃ dassetvā, sapakkhaṃ
tika-s0104t:464_3: dassetvā, sapakkhassa ca upamaṃ dassetvā, kathanaṃ catūhi bhāgehi vuttattā, cattāro
tika-s0104t:464_4: vā rassā sallakkhaṇūpāyā etissāti katvā caturassā nāma, visabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānaṃ
tika-s0104t:464_5: gantvā puna sabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānagamanaṃ nisīdāpetvā patiṭṭhāpetvā āvattanayuttattā,
tika-s0104t:464_6: niyamato vā nisinnassa āraddhassa vatto saṃvatto etissāti katvā nisinnavattikā nāma,
tika-s0104t:464_7: yathāraddhassa atthassa visuṃ visuṃ pariyosānāpi niyuttāti vuttaṃ hoti, sodāharaṇā
tika-s0104t:464_8: pana kathā aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāya taṭṭīkāyaṃ ekādasanipāte gopālakasuttavaṇṇanāto gahetabbā.
tika-s0104t:466: Iti atthakkame vidvā, tidhā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ vade.
tika-s0104t:467_0: Tattha pakatiādivicāraṇā bhedakathā yathā “bujjhatīti buddho”tiādi. Sarūpavicāraṇā
tika-s0104t:467_1: tatvakathā yathā “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako”tiādi. Vevacanavicāraṇā
tika-s0104t:469: Parihāro ca sabbattha, pañcadhā vaṇṇanaṃ vade.
tika-s0104t:470_0: Tattha payojanaṃ nāma desanāphalaṃ, taṃ pana sutamayañāṇādi. Piṇḍattho nāma vippakiṇṇassa
tika-s0104t:470_1: atthassa suvijānanatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā kathanaṃ. Anusandhi nāma pucchānusandhādi. Codanā
tika-s0104t:470_2: nāma yathāvuttassa vacanassa virodhikathanaṃ. Parihāro nāma tassa avirodhikathanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:473_1: padaṃ, saddatthādhippāyatthādi padattho. Anekadhā nibbacanaṃ padaviggaho. Cālanā
tika-s0104t:476_1: anekadhā padassa attho. Bhāvoti adhippāyo. Anuvādavidhayoti paṭhamavacanaṃ vidhi,
tika-s0104t:476_2: tadāvikaraṇavasena pacchā vacanaṃ anuvādo, visesanavisesyānaṃ vā vidhānuvāda samaññā.
tika-s0104t:476_3: Virodhoti atthanicchayanatthaṃ codanā. Parihāroti tassā sodhanā. Nigamananti anusandhiyā anurūpaṃ appanā.
tika-s0104t:479: Codanā sodhanā ceti, aṭṭhadhā vaṇṇanaṃ vade.
tika-s0104t:480: Tattha sambandho nāma pubbāparasambandho, yo “anusandhī”ti vuccati. Sesā vuttatthāva, evamādinā tattha tatthāgate saṃvaṇṇanāppakāre ñatvā sabbattha yathārahaṃ vicetabbāti.
tika-s0104t:481_0: Evamanekatthappabhedatā payogatova ñātabbāti tabbasena taṃ samatthetuṃ “tathā hesā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:481_1: vuttaṃ. Atha vā ayaṃ saddo imassatthassa vācakoti saṅketavavatthitāyeva saddā taṃ
tika-s0104t:481_2: tadatthassa vācakā, saṅketo ca nāma payogavasena siddhoti dassetumpi idaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0104t:483: Evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti. ;
tika-s0104t:484_0: Ettha evaṃ-saddena upamākārasseva vuttattā ākāratthoyeva evaṃ-saddo siyāti? Na, visesasabbhāvato.
tika-s0104t:484_1: “Evaṃ byā kho”tiādīsu hi ākāramattavācakoyeva ākāratthoti adhippeto, na pana ākāravisesavācako.
tika-s0104t:484_2: Ettha hi kiñcāpi puppharāsisadisato manussūpapatti sappurisūpanissaya saddhammasavana
tika-s0104t:484_4: mālāguṇasadisiyo bahukā puññakiriyā maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena sattena kattabbāti
tika-s0104t:484_5: atthassa jotitattā puppharāsimālāguṇāva upamā nāma upamīyati etāyāti katvā, tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:484_6: upamākāro ca yathāsaddena aniyamato jotito, tasmā “evaṃ-saddo niyamato upamākāranigamanattho”ti
tika-s0104t:484_7: vattuṃ yuttaṃ, tathāpi so upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamāva hoti nissayabhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:484_9: āgato”ti. Atha vā upamīyanaṃ sadisīkaraṇanti katvā puppharāsimālāguṇehi sadisabhāvasaṅkhāto
tika-s0104t:484_10: upamākāroyeva upamā nāma. “Saddhammattaṃ siyopamā”ti hi vuttaṃ, tasmā ākāramattavācakova
tika-s0104t:484_11: ākārattho evaṃ-saddo. Upamāsaṅkhātaākāravisesavācako pana upamātthoyevāti vuttaṃ “upamāyaṃ āgato”ti.
tika-s0104t:485_0: Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya
tika-s0104t:485_1: ākappasampattiyā upadisanākāropi atthato upadesoyevāti āha “evaṃ…pe… upadese”ti.
tika-s0104t:485_2: Evametanti ettha pana bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha
tika-s0104t:485_3: saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ pakārehi haṃsanaṃ udaggatākaraṇaṃ sampahaṃsanaṃ. Tattha sampahaṃsanākāropi
tika-s0104t:485_4: atthato sampahaṃsanamevāti vuttaṃ “sampahaṃsaneti. Evameva panāyanti ettha ca dosavibhāvanena
tika-s0104t:485_5: gārayhavacanaṃ garahaṇaṃ, tadākāropi atthato garahaṇaṃ nāma, tasmā “garahaṇe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:485_7: viññāyati, yathā cettha evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ
tika-s0104t:485_8: sannidhānatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jotakamattā hi nipātāti. Evamevāti ca adhunā bhāsitākāreneva.
tika-s0104t:485_9: Ayaṃ vasalaguṇayogato vasalī kāḷakaṇṇī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā ṭhāne bhāsatīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:485_10: Evaṃ bhanteti sādhu bhante, suṭṭhu bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ
tika-s0104t:485_11: savanamanasikāre sanniyojitehi bhikkhūhi tattha attano ṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanameva
tika-s0104t:485_12: vacanasampaṭiggaho, tadākāropi atthato vacanasampaṭiggahoyeva nāma, tenāha “vacanasampaṭiggahe”ti.
tika-s0104t:486_0: Evaṃ byā khoti evaṃ viya kho. Evaṃ khoti hi imesaṃ padānamantare viyasaddassa byāpadesoti
tika-s0104t:486_1: neruttikā “va-kārassa, ba-kāraṃ, ya-kārasaṃyogañca katvā dīghavasena padasiddhī”tipi
tika-s0104t:486_2: vadanti. Ākāreti ākāramatte. Appābādhanti visabhāgavedanābhāvaṃ. Appātaṅkanti kicchajīvitakararogābhāvaṃ.
tika-s0104t:486_3: Lahuṭṭhānanti niggelaññatāya lahutāyuttaṃ uṭṭhānaṃ. Balanti kāyabalaṃ. Phāsuvihāranti
tika-s0104t:486_4: catūsu iriyāpathesu sukhavihāraṃ. Vitthāro dasama subhasuttaṭṭhakathāya meva āvi
tika-s0104t:486_5: bhavissati. Evañca vadehīti yathāhaṃ vadāmi, evampi samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehi. “Sādhu
tika-s0104t:486_6: kira bhava”ntiādikaṃ idāni vattabbavacanaṃ, so ca vadanākāro idha evaṃ-saddena nidassīyatīti
tika-s0104t:486_7: vuttaṃ “nidassane”ti. Kālāmāti kālāmagottasambandhe jane ālapati. “Ime…pe… vā”ti
tika-s0104t:486_8: yaṃ mayā vuttaṃ, taṃ kiṃ maññathāti attho. Samattāti paripūritā. Samādinnāti samādiyitā.
tika-s0104t:486_9: Saṃvattanti vā no vā saṃvattanti ettha vacanadvaye kathaṃ vo tumhākaṃ mati hotīti
tika-s0104t:486_10: yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ noti evameva amhākaṃ mati ettha hoti, amhākamettha mati hoti yevātipi
tika-s0104t:486_11: attho. Ettha ca tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:486_12: anumatiggahaṇavasena “saṃvattanti no vā, kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pucchāya katāya
tika-s0104t:486_13: “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-saddena vibhāvitaṃ, so
tika-s0104t:486_14: ca tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno atthato avadhāraṇamevāti
tika-s0104t:486_15: vuttaṃ “avadhāraṇe”ti. Ākāratthamaññatra sabbattha vuttanayena codanā, sodhanā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:487_0: Ādisaddena cettha idamatthapucchāparimāṇādiatthānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi “evaṃgatāni,
tika-s0104t:487_1: evaṃvidho, evamākāro”ti ca ādīsu idamatthe, gatavidhākārasaddā pana pakārapariyāyā.
tika-s0104t:487_2: Gatavidhayuttākārasadde hi lokiyā pakāratthe vadanti. “Evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā
tika-s0104t:487_3: kappitakesamassū āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalābharaṇā odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā
tika-s0104t:487_4: samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti, seyyathāpi tvaṃ etarahi sācariyakoti? No hidaṃ bho gotamā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:487_5: pucchāyaṃ. “Evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, evamāyupariyanto”ti ca ādīsu parimāṇe. Etthāpi “sunhātā
tika-s0104t:487_6: suvilittā”tiādivacanaṃ pucchā, lahuparivattaṃ, āyūnaṃ pamāṇañca parimāṇaṃ, tadākāropi
tika-s0104t:487_7: atthato pucchā ca parimāṇañca nāma, tasmā etesu pucchattho, parimāṇattho ca evaṃsaddo
tika-s0104t:487_8: veditabboti. Idha pana so katamesu bhavati, sabbattha vā, aniyamato padese vāti codanāya
tika-s0104t:488_0: Nanu ekasmiṃyeva atthe siyā, kasmā tīsupīti ca, hotu tibbidhesu atthesu, kena kimatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:488_1: dīpetīti ca anuyogaṃ pariharanto “tatthā”tiādimāha. Tatthāti tesu tīsu atthesu. Ekattanānattaabyāpāraevaṃdhammatāsaṅkhātā,
tika-s0104t:488_3: nānāvidhā nayā nānānayā, pāḷigatiyo vā nayā, tā ca paññattianupaññatti ādivasena,
tika-s0104t:488_6: tikapaṭṭhānādivasena ca piṭakattayānurūpaṃ nānāppakārāti nānānayā. Tehi nipuṇaṃ saṇhaṃ
tika-s0104t:488_7: sukhumaṃ tathā. Āsayova ajjhāsayo, te ca sassatādibhedena, tattha ca apparajakkhatādivasena
tika-s0104t:488_8: anekā, attajjhāsayādayo eva vā samuṭṭhānamuppattihetu etassāti tathā, upanetabbābhāvato
tika-s0104t:488_9: atthabyañjane hi sampannaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ tathā. Apica saṅkāsanapakāsanavivaraṇavibhajanauttānīkaraṇapaññattivasena
tika-s0104t:488_11: ca sampannaṃ samannāgataṃ tathā. Atha vā viññūnaṃ hadayaṅgamato, savane atittijananato,
tika-s0104t:489_1: vadanti. Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi, ye haritabbā bodhimūleyeva
tika-s0104t:489_2: savāsanasakalasaṃkilesānaṃ pahīnattā. Puthujjanānampi ca vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate
tika-s0104t:489_3: citte hatapaṭipakkhe satiyeva iddhividhaṃ pavattati, tasmā puthujjanesu pavattavohārenapi
tika-s0104t:489_4: na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ, sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatāva
tika-s0104t:489_5: kilesā paṭipakkhā saṃsārapaṅkanimuggassa sattanikāyassa samuddharitukāmato, tasmā
tika-s0104t:489_6: tesaṃ veneyyagatakilesasaṅkhātānaṃ paṭipakkhānaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyanti vuttaṃ assa,
tika-s0104t:490_0: Atha vā bhagavato sāsanassa paṭipakkhā titthiyā, tesaṃ titthiyabhūtānaṃ paṭipakkhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:490_1: haraṇato pāṭihāriyantipi yujjati. Kāmañcettha titthiyā haritabbā nāssu, tesaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:490_3: tīhipi pāṭihāriyehi te haritā apanītā nāma honti. Paṭīti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti
tika-s0104t:490_4: etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0104t:490_5: tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpaklese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
tika-s0104t:490_6: paṭihāriyaṃ, tadeva dīghavasena, sakatthavuttipaccayavasena vā pāṭihāriyaṃ, attano
tika-s0104t:490_7: vā upaklesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā tadaññesaṃ haraṇaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-s0104t:490_8: vuttanayena. Iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo hi vigatūpaklesena, katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:490_9: puna pavattetabbā, hatesu ca attano upaklesesu parasattānaṃ upaklesaharaṇāni ca hontīti
tika-s0104t:491_0: Apica yathāvuttehi nibbacanehi iddhiādesanānusāsanīsaṅkhāto samudāyo paṭihāriyaṃ
tika-s0104t:491_1: nāma. Ekekaṃ pana tasmiṃ bhavaṃ “pāṭihāriya”nti vuccati visesatthajotakapaccayantarena
tika-s0104t:491_2: saddaracanāvisesasambhavato, paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ, maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0104t:491_3: tattha jātaṃ, tasmiṃ vā nimittabhūte, tato vā āgatanti pāṭihāriyaṃ. Vicitrā hi taddhitavutti.
tika-s0104t:491_4: Tassa pana iddhiādesanānusāsanībhedena, visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāya
tika-s0104t:491_5: labbhamānattā “vividhapāṭihāriyanti vuttaṃ. Bhagavā hi kadāci iddhivasenāpi desanaṃ
tika-s0104t:491_6: karoti nimmitabuddhena saha pucchāvissajjanādīsu, kadāci ādesanāvasenāpi āmagandhabrāhmaṇassa
tika-s0104t:491_7: dhammadesanādīsu, yebhuyyena pana anusāsaniyā. Anusāsanīpāṭihāriyañhi buddhānaṃ satataṃ
tika-s0104t:491_8: dhammadesanā. Iti taṃtaṃdesanākārena anekavidhapāṭihāriyatā desanāya labbhati. Ayamattho
tika-s0104t:491_9: upari ekādasamassa kevaṭṭasuttassa vaṇṇanāya āvi bhavissati. Atha vā tassa vividhassāpi
tika-s0104t:491_10: pāṭihāriyassa bhagavato desanāya saṃsūcanato “vividhapāṭihāriya”nti vuttaṃ, anekavidhapāṭihāriyadassananti attho.
tika-s0104t:492_0: Dhammaniruttiyāva bhagavati dhammaṃ desente sabbesaṃ suṇantānaṃ nānābhāsitānaṃ taṃtaṃbhāsānurūpato
tika-s0104t:492_1: desanā sotapathamāgacchatīti āha “sabba…pe… māgacchanta”nti. Sotameva sotapatho,
tika-s0104t:492_2: savanaṃ vā sotaṃ, tassa patho tathā, sotadvāranti attho. Sabbākārenāti yathādesitākārena.
tika-s0104t:492_3: Ko samattho viññātuṃ, asamatthoyeva, tasmāti pāṭhaseso. Panāti ekaṃsatthe, tena saddhāsatidhitivīriyādibalasaṅkhātena
tika-s0104t:492_4: sabbathāmena ekaṃseneva sotukāmatāsaṅkhātakusalacchandassa jananaṃ dasseti. Janetvāpīti
tika-s0104t:492_5: ettha pi-saddo, api-saddo vā sambhāvanattho “buddhopi buddhabhāvaṃ bhāvetvā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:492_6: viya, tena “sabbathāmena ekaṃseneva sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi nāma ekenākārena sutaṃ,
tika-s0104t:492_7: kimaṅgaṃ pana aññathā”ti tathāsute dhamme sambhāvanaṃ karoti. Keci pana “edisesu
tika-s0104t:492_8: garahattho”ti vadanti, tadayuttameva garahatthassa avijjamānattā, vijjamānatthasseva
tika-s0104t:492_9: ca upasagganipātānaṃ jotakattā. “Nānānayanipuṇa”ntiādinā hi sabbappakārena sotumasakkuṇeyyabhāvena
tika-s0104t:492_10: dhammassa idha sambhāvanameva karoti, tasmā “api dibbesu kāmesu, ratiṃ so nādhigacchatī”tiādīsuyeva
tika-s0104t:492_11: garahatthasambhavesu garahattho veditabboti. Api-saddo ca īdisesu ṭhānesu nipātoyeva,
tika-s0104t:492_12: na upasaggo. Tathā hi “api-saddo ca nipātapakkhiko kātabbo, yattha kiriyāvācakato
tika-s0104t:492_13: pubbo na hotī”ti akkharacintakā vadanti. Mayāpīti ettha pana na kevalaṃ mayāva, atha
tika-s0104t:493_0: Sāmaṃ bhavatīti sayambhū, anācariyako. Na mayaṃ idaṃ sacchikatanti ettha pana “na
tika-s0104t:493_1: attano ñāṇeneva attanā sacchikata”nti pakaraṇato attho viññāyati. Sāmaññavacanassāpi
tika-s0104t:493_3: visesatthaggahaṇaṃ sambhavati. Evaṃ sabbattha. Parimocentoti “puna caparaṃ bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:493_4: idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī”ti
tika-s0104t:493_5: vuttadosato parimocāpanahetu. Hetvatthe hi anta-saddo “asambudhaṃ buddhanisevita”ntiādīsu
tika-s0104t:493_6: viya. Imassa suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāppakāravicāraṇena attano ñāṇassa paccakkhataṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:493_7: “idāni vattabba”nti vuttaṃ. Esā hi saṃvaṇṇanākārānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhamme
tika-s0104t:493_8: sabbattha “ayamimassa attho, evamidha saṃvaṇṇayissāmī”ti puretarameva saṃvaṇṇanāppakāravicāraṇā.
tika-s0104t:494_0: Etadaggapadassattho vuttova. “Bahussutāna”ntiādīsu pana aññepi therā bahussutā, satimanto,
tika-s0104t:494_1: gatimanto, dhitimanto, upaṭṭhākā ca atthi, ayaṃ panāyasmā buddhavacanaṃ gaṇhanto
tika-s0104t:494_2: dasabalassa sāsane bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattiyaṃ ṭhatvā gaṇhi, tasmā bahussutānaṃ aggo
tika-s0104t:494_3: nāma jāto. Imassa ca therassa buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā dhāraṇasati aññehi therehi
tika-s0104t:494_4: balavatarā ahosi, tasmā satimantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Ayamevāyasmā ekapade ṭhatvā
tika-s0104t:494_5: saṭṭhipadasahassāni gaṇhanto satthārā kathitaniyāmena sabbapadāni jānāti, tasmā gatimantānaṃ
tika-s0104t:494_6: aggo nāma jāto. Tasseva cāyasmato buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanavīriyaṃ, sajjhāyanavīriyañca
tika-s0104t:494_7: aññehi asadisaṃ ahosi, tasmā dhitimantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Tathāgataṃ upaṭṭhahanto
tika-s0104t:494_8: cesa na aññesaṃ upaṭṭhākabhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhahanākārena upaṭṭhahati. Aññepi hi tathāgataṃ
tika-s0104t:494_9: upaṭṭhahiṃsu, na ca pana buddhānaṃ manaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhahituṃ sakkonti, ayaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:494_10: thero upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya āraddhavīriyo hutvā tathāgatassa manaṃ
tika-s0104t:494_11: gahetvā upaṭṭhahi, tasmā upaṭṭhākānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Atthakusaloti bhāsitatthe,
tika-s0104t:494_12: payojanatthe ca cheko. Dhammoti pāḷidhammo, nānāvidho vā hetu. Byañjananti akkharaṃ
tika-s0104t:494_13: atthassa byañjanato. Padena hi byañjitopi attho akkharamūlakattā padassa “akkharena
tika-s0104t:494_14: byañjito”ti vuccati. Atthassa viyañjanato vā vākyampi idha byañjanaṃ nāma. Vākyena
tika-s0104t:494_15: hi attho paripuṇṇaṃ byañjīyati, yato “byañjanehi vivaratī”ti āyasmatā mahākaccāyanattherena
tika-s0104t:494_16: vuttaṃ. Niruttīti nibbacanaṃ, pañcavidhā vā niruttinayā. Tesampi hi saddaracanāvisesena
tika-s0104t:494_17: atthādhigamahetuto idha gahaṇaṃ yujjati. Pubbāparaṃ nāma pubbāparānusandhi, suttassa
tika-s0104t:494_18: vā pubbabhāgena aparabhāgassa saṃsandanaṃ. Bhagavatā ca pañcavidhaetadaggaṭṭhānena
tika-s0104t:494_19: dhammasenāpatinā ca pañcavidhakosallena pasaṭṭhabhāvānurūpanti sambandho. Dhāraṇabalanti
tika-s0104t:494_20: dhāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ balaṃ, dhāraṇe vā balaṃ, ubhayatthāpi dhāretuṃ sāmatthiyanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:494_21: hoti. Dassento hutvā, dassanahetūtipi attho. Tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikanti
tika-s0104t:494_22: avadhāraṇaphalamāha. Na aññathā daṭṭhabbanti pana nivattetabbatthaṃ. Na aññathāti
tika-s0104t:494_23: ca bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathā, na pana bhagavatā desitākārato. Acinteyyānubhāvā
tika-s0104t:494_24: hi bhagavato desanā, evañca katvā “sabbappakārena ko samattho viññātu”nti heṭṭhā
tika-s0104t:494_25: vuttavacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti, itarathā bhagavatā desitākāreneva sotuṃ samatthattā
tika-s0104t:494_26: tadetaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā. Yathāvuttena pana atthena dhāraṇabaladassanañca na virujjhati
tika-s0104t:494_27: sutākārāvirujjhanavasena dhāraṇassa adhippetattā, aññathā bhagavatā desitākāreneva
tika-s0104t:494_28: dhārituṃ samatthanato heṭṭhā vuttavacanena virujjheyya. Na hettha dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ
tika-s0104t:494_29: atthantaratāparihāro yutto tesaṃ dvinnampi atthānaṃ sutabhāvadīpanena ekavisayattā,
tika-s0104t:494_30: itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe pacchimatthavasena samattho,
tika-s0104t:495_0: “Yo paro na hoti, so attā”ti vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya santatiyā pavattanako
tika-s0104t:495_1: tividhopi me-saddo, tasmā kiñcāpi niyakajjhattasantativasena ekasmiṃ yevatthe me-saddo
tika-s0104t:495_3: vuttaṃ “tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti, tīsu vibhattiyatthesu attanā saññuttavibhattito
tika-s0104t:495_4: dissatīti attho. Gāthābhigītanti gāthāya abhigītaṃ abhimukhaṃ gāyitaṃ. Abhojaneyyanti
tika-s0104t:495_5: bhojanaṃ kātumanaraharūpaṃ. Abhigītapadassa kattupekkhattā mayāti attho. Evaṃ sesesupi
tika-s0104t:495_7: “mayā suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
tika-s0104t:496_0: Kiñcāpi upasaggo kiriyaṃ viseseti, jotakamattabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ sutasaddoyeva
tika-s0104t:496_1: taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa sutasaddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:496_2: na virujjhatīti āha “saupasaggo ca anupasaggo cā”ti. Assāti sutasaddassa. Upasaggavasenapi
tika-s0104t:496_4: attho”ti. Tathā anupasaggopi dhātusaddo saupasaggo viya visesatthavācakoti āha “vissutadhammassāti
tika-s0104t:496_5: attho”ti. Evamīdisesu. Sotaviññeyyanti sotadvāranissitena viññāṇena viññātabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:496_6: sasambhārakathā vā esā, sotadvārena viññātabbanti attho. Sotadvārānusāraviññātadharoti
tika-s0104t:496_7: sotadvārānusārena manoviññāṇena viññātadhammadharo. Na hi sotadvāranissitaviññāṇamattena
tika-s0104t:496_8: dhammo viññāyati, atha kho tadanusāramanoviññāṇeneva, sutadharoti ca tathā viññātadhammadharo
tika-s0104t:496_9: vutto, tasmā tadatthoyeva sambhavatīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Kammabhāvasādhanāni sutasadde
tika-s0104t:496_11: upapannatā, anupapannatā ca viññāyati, tasmā sutasaddasseva vasena ayamattho “upapanno,
tika-s0104t:496_12: anupapanno”ti vā na viññātabboti codanāya pubbāparapadasambandhavasena etadatthassa
tika-s0104t:496_13: upapannataṃ dassetuṃ “me-saddassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mayāti atthe satīti kattutthe
tika-s0104t:496_14: karaṇaniddesavasena mayāti atthe vattabbe sati, yadā me-saddassa kattuvasena karaṇaniddeso,
tika-s0104t:496_15: tadāti vuttaṃ hoti. Mamāti atthe satīti sambandhīyatthe sāminiddesavasena mamāti
tika-s0104t:496_16: atthe vattabbe sati, yadā sambandhavasena sāmi niddeso, tadāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:497_0: Evaṃ saddato ñātabbamatthaṃ viññāpetvā idāni tehi dassetabbamatthaṃ nidassento “evametesū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:497_1: Sutasaddasannidhāne payuttena evaṃ-saddena savanakiriyājotakeneva bhavitabbaṃ vijjamānatthassa
tika-s0104t:497_3: Savanāya eva hi ākāro, nidassanaṃ, avadhāraṇampi, tasmā yathāvutto evaṃ-saddassa
tika-s0104t:497_4: tividhopi attho savanakiriyājotakabhāvena idhādhippetoti. Ādi-saddena cettha sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:497_5: sotadvārikaviññāṇānaṃ, tadabhinipātānañca manodvārika viññāṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:497_6: yato sotadvārānusāraviññātatthe idha sutasaddoti vutto. Avadhāraṇaphalattā saddapayogassa
tika-s0104t:497_7: sabbampi vākyaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ, tasmā “suta”nti etassa sutamevāti ayamattho
tika-s0104t:497_8: labbhatīti āha “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti. Etena hi vacanena avadhāraṇena nirākataṃ
tika-s0104t:497_9: dasseti. Yathā pana yaṃ sutaṃ sutamevāti niyametabbaṃ, tathā ca taṃ sutaṃ sammā sutaṃ
tika-s0104t:497_11: Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadati, tasmā “suta”nti etassa asutaṃ
tika-s0104t:497_12: na hotīti ayamattho labbhatīti sandhāya “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti vuttaṃ, iminā
tika-s0104t:497_14: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – na idaṃ mayā attano ñāṇena diṭṭhaṃ, na ca sayambhuñāṇena sacchikataṃ,
tika-s0104t:497_15: atha kho sutaṃ, tañca kho sutaṃ sammadevāti. Tadeva sammā sutabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha “anūnā…pe…
tika-s0104t:500_0: Apica avadhāraṇatthe evaṃ-sadde ayamatthayojanā karīyatīti tadapekkhassa sutasaddassa
tika-s0104t:500_2: “anū…pe… dassana”nti iminā. Savana-saddo cettha bhāvasaddena yogato kammasādhano
tika-s0104t:500_3: veditabbo “suyyatī”ti. Anūnādhikatāya bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato aviparītaṃ, aviparītassa
tika-s0104t:500_4: vā suttassa gahaṇaṃ, tassa nidassanaṃ tathā, iti savanahetu suṇantapuggalasavanavisesavasena ayaṃ yojanā katā.
tika-s0104t:501_0: Evaṃ padattayassa ekena pakārena atthayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni pakārantarenāpi taṃ
tika-s0104t:501_1: dassetuṃ “tathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tassāti yā bhagavato sammukhā dhammassavanākārena
tika-s0104t:501_2: pavattā manodvārikaviññāṇavīthi, tassā. Sā hi nānāppakārena ārammaṇe pavattituṃ samatthā,
tika-s0104t:501_3: na sotadvārika viññāṇavīthi ekārammaṇeyeva pavattanato, tathā ceva vuttaṃ “sotadvārānusārenā”ti.
tika-s0104t:501_4: Tena hi sotadvārikaviññāṇavīthi nivattati. Nānappakārenāti vakkhamānena anekavihitena
tika-s0104t:501_5: byañjanatthaggahaṇākārasaṅkhātena nānāvidhena ākārena, etena imissā yojanāya ākārattho
tika-s0104t:501_6: evaṃ-saddo gahitoti dasseti. Pavattibhāvappakāsananti pavattiyā atthibhāvappakāsanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:501_7: Yasmiṃ pakāre vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi nānappakārena pavattā, tadeva ārammaṇaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:501_8: “dhammappakāsana”nti vuttaṃ, na pana sutasaddassa dhammatthaṃ, tena vuttaṃ “ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:501_9: dhammo suto”ti. Tassā hi viññāṇavīthiyā ārammaṇameva “ayaṃ dhammo suto”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:501_10: Tañca niyamiyamānaṃ yathāvuttāya viññāṇavīthiyā ārammaṇabhūtaṃ suttameva. Ayañhetthātiādi
tika-s0104t:501_11: vuttassevatthassa pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ. Tappākaṭīkaraṇattho hettha hi-saddo. Viññāṇavīthiyā
tika-s0104t:501_12: karaṇabhūtāya mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ kataṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti ce?
tika-s0104t:501_13: Ayaṃ dhammo sutoti. Ayaṃ panetthādhippāyo – ākāratthe evaṃ-sadde “ekenākārenā”ti
tika-s0104t:501_14: yo ākāro vutto, so atthato sotadvārānusāraviññāṇavīthiyā nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattibhāvoyeva,
tika-s0104t:501_15: tena ca tadārammaṇabhūtassa dhammasseva savanaṃ kataṃ, na aññanti. Evaṃ savanakiriyāya
tika-s0104t:502_0: Aññampi yojanamāha “tathā”tiādinā. Nidassanatthaṃ evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā nidassanena
tika-s0104t:502_1: ca nidassitabbassāvinābhāvato “evanti nidassitabbappakāsana”nti vuttaṃ. Iminā hi
tika-s0104t:502_2: tadavinābhāvato evaṃsaddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti dasseti, sutasaddassa
tika-s0104t:502_5: hi paṇṇattiyā idha puggalo nāma, savanakiriyā pana tassa kiccaṃ nāma. Na hi puggalavohārarahite
tika-s0104t:502_6: dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhati vohāravisayattā tassā kiriyāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:502_8: mayā. Sutanti savanakiriyāsaṅkhātena puggalakiccena yojitaṃ, imissā pana yojanāya
tika-s0104t:502_9: puggalabyāpāravisayassa puggalassa, puggalabyāpārassa ca nidassanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:503_0: Ākāratthameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathāpi atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:503_2: nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattiyā. Nānappakāraṃ atthabyañjanassa gahaṇaṃ, nānappakārassa
tika-s0104t:503_3: vā atthabyañjanassa gahaṇaṃ tathā, tatoyeva sā “ākārapaññattī”ti vuttāti tadevatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:503_4: samattheti “evanti hī”tiādinā. Ākārapaññattīti ca upādāpaññattiyeva, dhammānaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:503_6: vuttā visayaniddesoti uppattiṭṭhānaniddeso. Sotabbabhūto hi dhammo savanakiriyākattubhūtassa
tika-s0104t:503_7: puggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānaṃ kiriyāya kattukammaṭṭhattā tabbasena
tika-s0104t:503_8: ca tadādhārassāpi dabbassa ādhārabhāvassa icchitattā, idha pana kiriyāya kattupavattiṭṭhānabhāvo
tika-s0104t:503_9: icchitoti kammameva ādhāravasena vuttaṃ, tenāha “kattu visayaggahaṇasanniṭṭhāna”nti,
tika-s0104t:503_10: ārammaṇameva vā visayo. Ārammaṇañhi tadārammaṇikassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ. Evampi hi attho
tika-s0104t:503_11: suviññeyyataro hoti. Yathāvuttavacane piṇḍatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ettāvatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:503_12: Ettāvatā ettakena yathāvuttatthena padattayena, kataṃ hotīti sambandho. Nānākārappavattenāti
tika-s0104t:503_14: cittappabandhena. Gahaṇasadde cetaṃ karaṇaṃ. Cittasantānavinimuttassa kassaci kattu
tika-s0104t:503_16: aññamiva taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā abhedepi bhedavohārena “cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino”ti
tika-s0104t:503_17: vuttaṃ. Vohāravisayo hi saddo nekantaparamatthikoti (kārakarūpasiddhiyaṃ yo kāreti
tika-s0104t:503_18: sahetusuttaṃ passitabbaṃ) savanakiriyāvisayopi sotabbadhammo savanakiriyāvasena pavattacittasantānassa
tika-s0104t:503_19: idha paramatthato kattubhāvato tassa visayoyevāti vuttaṃ “kattu visayaggahaṇasanniṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0104t:504_0: Apica savanavasena cittappavattiyā eva savanakiriyābhāvato taṃvasena tadaññanāmarūpadhammasamudāyabhūtassa
tika-s0104t:504_1: taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – purimanaye
tika-s0104t:504_2: savanakiriyā, takkattā ca paramatthato tathāpavattacittasantānameva, tasmā kiriyāvisayopi
tika-s0104t:504_3: “kattu visayo”ti vutto. Pacchimanaye pana tathāpavattacittasantānaṃ kiriyā, tadaññadhammasamudāyo
tika-s0104t:504_4: pana kattā, tasmā kāmaṃ ekantato kiriyāvisayoyevesa dhammo, tathāpi kiriyāvasena
tika-s0104t:504_5: “tabbantakattu visayo”ti vuttoti. Taṃsamaṅginoti tena cittasantānena samaṅgino. Kattūti
tika-s0104t:504_6: kattārassa. Visayoti ārammaṇavasena pavattiṭṭhānaṃ, ārammaṇameva vā. Sutākārassa
tika-s0104t:505_0: Aparo nayo – yassa…pe… ākārapaññattīti ākāratthena evaṃ-saddena yojanaṃ katvā tadeva
tika-s0104t:505_1: avadhāraṇatthampi gahetvā imasmiṃyeva naye yojetuṃ “gahaṇaṃ kataṃ” icceva avatvā
tika-s0104t:505_2: “gahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ kata”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avadhāraṇena hi sanniṭṭhānamidhādhippetaṃ,
tika-s0104t:505_3: tasmā “ettāvatā”tiādinā avadhāraṇatthampi evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā ayameva yojanā katāti
tika-s0104t:505_4: dassetīti veditabbaṃ, imissā pana yojanāya gahaṇākāragāhakatabbisayavisesanidassanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:506_0: Aññampi yojanamāha “atha vā”tiādinā. Pubbe attanā sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-s0104t:506_1: atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa nidassanassa, avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanasabhāvo
tika-s0104t:506_3: “puggalakiccaniddeso”ti vuttaṃ attanā sutānañhi atthabyañjanānaṃ puna upadhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:506_4: ākārādittayaṃ, tañca evaṃ-saddassa attho. So pana yaṃ dhammappabandhaṃ upādāya puggalapaññatti
tika-s0104t:506_5: pavattā, tassa byāpārabhūtaṃ kiccameva, tasmā evaṃ-saddena puggalakiccaṃ niddisīyatīti.
tika-s0104t:506_6: Kāmaṃ savanakiriyā puggalabyāpāropi avisesena, tathāpi visesato viññāṇabyāpārovāti
tika-s0104t:506_7: vuttaṃ “viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti. Tathā hi puggalavādīnampi savanakiriyā viññāṇanirapekkhā
tika-s0104t:506_8: natthi savanādīnaṃ visesato viññāṇabyāpārabhāvena icchitattā. Meti saddappavattiyā
tika-s0104t:506_9: ekanteneva sattavisayattā, viññāṇakiccassa ca sattaviññāṇānamabhedakaraṇavasena tattheva
tika-s0104t:506_11: Ettha hi savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅgināti evaṃ-saddena niddiṭṭhaṃ puggalakiccaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:506_12: vuttaṃ, taṃ pana puggalassa savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅgībhāvena puggalakiccaṃ nāmāti
tika-s0104t:506_15: laddhasavanakiccavohārenāti ca sutasaddena niddiṭṭhaṃ viññāṇakiccaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:506_16: Savanameva kiccaṃ yassāti tathā. Savanakiccanti vohāro savanakiccavohāro, laddho
tika-s0104t:506_17: so yenāti tathā. Laddhasavanakiccavohārena viññāṇasaṅkhātena vasena sāmatthiyenāti
tika-s0104t:506_18: attho. Ayaṃ pana sambandho – savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena mayā laddhasavanakiccavohārena
tika-s0104t:507_1: tasmā te tathārūpapaññatti upādānabhūtapuggalabyāpārabhāveneva dassento āha “evanti
tika-s0104t:507_2: puggalakiccaniddeso. Sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti. Na hi paramatthatoyeva niyamiyamāne
tika-s0104t:507_3: sati puggalakiccaviññāṇakiccavasena ayaṃ vibhāgo labbhatīti. Imissā pana yojanāya
tika-s0104t:508_0: Sabbassāpi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā, sabbāsañca
tika-s0104t:508_1: paññattīnaṃ vijjamānādivasena chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tāsu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:508_2: paññattīnaṃ sarūpaṃ niddhāretvā dassento “evanti cā”tiādimāha. Tattha “eva”nti ca
tika-s0104t:508_3: “me”ti ca vuccamānassa atthassa ākārādibhūtassa dhammānaṃ asallakkhaṇabhāvato avijjamānapaññattibhāvoti
tika-s0104t:508_5: ca bhūtatthauttamatthavasenāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo māyāmarīciādayo viya
tika-s0104t:508_6: abhūtattho, anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti, so rūpasaddādisabhāvo,
tika-s0104t:508_7: ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvo vā attho “saccikaṭṭho, paramattho”ti ca vuccati, “evaṃ
tika-s0104t:508_8: me”ti padānaṃ pana attho abhūtattā, anuttamattā ca na tathā vuccati, tasmā bhūtatthauttamatthasaṅkhātena
tika-s0104t:508_9: saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena visesanabhūtena avijjamānapaññattiyevāti. Etena ca visesanena
tika-s0104t:508_10: bālajanehi “atthī”ti parikappitaṃ paññattimattaṃ nivatteti. Tadevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti,
tika-s0104t:508_11: hetunā vā sādheti “kiñhettha ta”ntiādinā. Yaṃ dhammajātaṃ, atthajātaṃ vā “eva”nti
tika-s0104t:508_12: vā “me”ti vā niddesaṃ labhetha, taṃ ettha rūpaphassādidhammasamudāye, “evaṃ me”ti
tika-s0104t:508_13: padānaṃ vā atthe. Paramatthato na atthīti yojanā. Rūpaphassādibhāvena niddiṭṭho paramatthato
tika-s0104t:508_14: ettha attheva, “evaṃ me”ti pana niddiṭṭho natthīti adhippāyo. Sutanti pana saddāyatanaṃ
tika-s0104t:508_16: “Yañhī”tiādi tappākaṭīkaraṇaṃ, hetudassanaṃ vā. Yaṃ taṃ saddāyatanaṃ sotena sotadvārena,
tika-s0104t:508_17: tannissitaviññāṇena vā upaladdhaṃ adhigamitabbanti attho. Tena hi saddāyatanamidha
tika-s0104t:509_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathānayena paññattisarūpaṃ niddhāretvā idāni aṭṭhakathāmuttakenāpi nayena
tika-s0104t:509_1: vuttesu chasu paññattibhedesu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ sarūpaṃ niddhārento “tathā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:509_2: Upādāpaññatti ādayo hi porāṇaṭṭhakathāto muttā saṅgahakāreneva ācariyena vuttā. Vitthāro
tika-s0104t:509_3: abhidhammaṭṭhakathāya gahetabbo. Taṃ tanti taṃ taṃ dhammajātaṃ, sotapathamāgate dhamme
tika-s0104t:509_4: upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākāranidassanāvadhāraṇassa paccāmasanavasena evanti ca sasantatipariyāpanne
tika-s0104t:509_5: khandhe upādāya meti ca vattabbattāti attho. Rūpavedanādibhedehi dhamme upādāya nissāya
tika-s0104t:509_6: kāraṇaṃ katvā paññatti upādāpaññatti yathā “tāni tāni aṅgāni upādāya ratho gehaṃ,
tika-s0104t:509_7: te te rūparasādayo upādāya ghaṭo paṭo, candimasūriyaparivattādayo upādāya kālo disā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:509_8: Paññapetabbaṭṭhena cesā paññatti nāma, na paññāpanaṭṭhena. Yā pana tassa atthassa
tika-s0104t:509_9: paññāpanā, ayaṃ avijjamānapaññattiyeva. Diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbatoti diṭṭhamutaviññāte
tika-s0104t:509_10: upanidhāya upatthambhaṃ katvā apekkhitvā vattabbattā. Diṭṭhādisabhāvavirahite saddāyatane
tika-s0104t:509_11: vattamānopi hi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko viya paṭhamādīni diṭṭhamutaviññāte
tika-s0104t:509_12: apekkhitvā pavatto “upanidhāpaññatī”ti vuccate. Sā panesā anekavidhā tadaññapekkhūpanidhā
tika-s0104t:509_15: paṭhamādīnaṃ diṭṭhādīnaṃ aññamaññamapekkhitvā vuttattā tadaññapekkhūpanidhāpaññatti nāma.
tika-s0104t:510_0: Evaṃ paññattiyāpi atthādhigamanīyatāsaṅkhātaṃ dassetabbatthaṃ dassetvā idāni saddasāmatthiyena
tika-s0104t:510_1: dīpetabbamatthaṃ niddhāretvā dīpento “ettha cā”tiādimāha. Etthāti etasmiṃ vacanattaye.
tika-s0104t:510_2: Ca-saddo upanyāso atthantaraṃ ārabhitukāmena yojitattā. “Suta”nti vutte asutaṃ na
tika-s0104t:510_3: hotīti pakāsitoyamattho, tasmā tathā suta-saddena pakāsitā attanā paṭividdhasuttassa
tika-s0104t:510_4: pakāravisesā “eva”nti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti tena evaṃ-saddena asammoho dīpito nāma,
tika-s0104t:510_5: tenāha “evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpetī”ti. Asammohanti ca yathāsute sutte asammohaṃ.
tika-s0104t:510_6: Tadeva yuttiyā, byatirekena ca samatthehi “na hī”tiādinā vakkhamānañca suttaṃ nānappakāraṃ
tika-s0104t:510_7: duppaṭividdhañca. Evaṃ nānappakāre duppaṭividdhe sutte kathaṃ sammūḷho nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho
tika-s0104t:510_8: bhavissati. Imāya yuttiyā, iminā ca byatirekena therassa tattha asammūḷhabhāvasaṅkhāto
tika-s0104t:510_9: dīpetabbo attho viññāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evamīdisesu yathārahaṃ. Bhagavato sammukhā
tika-s0104t:510_10: sutākārassa yāthāvato upari therena dassiyamānattā “suttassa asammosaṃ dīpetī”ti
tika-s0104t:510_11: vuttaṃ. Kālantarenāti sutakālato aparena kālena. Yassa…pe… paṭijānāti, therassa pana
tika-s0104t:510_12: suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya anassamānaṃ asammuṭṭhaṃ tiṭṭhati, tasmā so
tika-s0104t:510_13: evaṃ paṭijānātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ dīpitena pana atthena kiṃ pakāsitanti āha “iccassā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:510_14: Tattha iccassāti iti assa, tasmā asammohassa, asammosassa ca dīpitattā assa therassapaññāsiddhītiādinā
tika-s0104t:510_16: paññāya siddhi sahajātādisattiyā sijjhanato. Sammohapaṭipakkhena vā paññāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0104t:510_17: dhammajātena. Savanakālasambhūtāya hi paññāya taduttarikālapaññāsiddhi upanissayādikoṭiyā
tika-s0104t:511_0: Evaṃ pakāsitena pana atthena kiṃ vibhāvitanti āha “tatthā”tiādi. Tatthāti tesu dubbidhesu
tika-s0104t:511_1: dhammesu. Byañjanānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro nātigambhīro, yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha
tika-s0104t:511_2: karaṇīyaṃ, tasmā tattha satiyā byāpāro adhiko, paññā pana guṇībhūtāti vuttaṃ “paññāpubbaṅgamāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:511_3: Paññāya pubbaṅgamā paññāpubbaṅgamāti hi nibbacanaṃ, pubbaṅgamatā cettha padhānabhāvo
tika-s0104t:511_4: “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”tiādīsu viya. Apica yathā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādayo pubbaṅgamā
tika-s0104t:511_5: samānāpi tadārammaṇassa avijānanato appadhānabhūtā, evaṃ pubbaṅgamāyapi appadhānatte
tika-s0104t:511_6: sati paññāpubbaṅgamā etissāti nibbacanampi yujjati. Pubbaṅgamatā cettha purecāribhāvo.
tika-s0104t:511_7: Iti sahajātapubbaṅgamo purejātapubbaṅgamoti duvidhopi pubbaṅgamo idha sambhavati,
tika-s0104t:511_8: yathā cettha, evaṃ sati “pubbaṅgamāyā”ti etthāpi yathāsambhavamesa nayo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:511_10: Tattha atthabyañjanasampannassāti atthabyañjanena paripuṇṇassa, saṅkāsanādīhi vā
tika-s0104t:511_11: chahi atthapadehi, akkharādīhi ca chahi byañjanapadehi samannāgatassa, atthabyañjanasaṅkhātena
tika-s0104t:511_12: vā rasena sādurasassa. Pariyattidhammoyeva navalokuttararatanasannidhānato sattavidhassa,
tika-s0104t:511_13: dasavidhassa vā ratanassa sannidhāno koso viyāti dhammakoso, tathā dhammabhaṇḍāgāro,
tika-s0104t:511_14: tattha niyuttoti dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko. Atha vā nānārājabhaṇḍarakkhako bhaṇḍāgāriko
tika-s0104t:511_15: viyāti bhaṇḍāgāriko, dhammassa anurakkhako bhaṇḍāgārikoti tameva sadisatākāraṇadassanena
tika-s0104t:513: Ānando nāma nāmena, dhammārakkho tavaṃ mune”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:514_0: Aññathāpi dīpetabbamatthaṃ dīpeti “aparo nayo”tiādinā, evaṃ saddena vuccamānānaṃ
tika-s0104t:514_2: yoniso manasikārassa dīpanaṃ yuttanti vuttaṃ “yoni…pe… dīpetī”ti. “Ayoniso”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:514_3: byatirekena ñāpakahetudassanaṃ. Tattha katthaci hi-saddo dissati, so kāraṇe, kasmāti
tika-s0104t:514_4: attho, iminā vacaneneva yoniso manasikaroto nānappakārapaṭivedhasambhavato aggi viya
tika-s0104t:514_5: dhūmena kāriyena kāraṇabhūto so viññāyatīti tadanvayampi atthāpattiyā dasseti. Esa
tika-s0104t:514_6: nayo sabbattha yathārahaṃ. “Brahmajālaṃ āvuso kattha bhāsita”ntiādi pucchāvasena
tika-s0104t:514_7: adhunā pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa “suta”nti padena vuccamānaṃ bhagavato
tika-s0104t:514_8: sammukhā savanaṃ samādhānamantarena na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ “avikkhepaṃ dīpetī”ti.
tika-s0104t:514_11: Kiṃ iminā pakāsitanti āha “yoniso manasikārena cetthā”tiādi. Etthāti etasmiṃ dhammadvaye.
tika-s0104t:514_12: “Na hi vikkhittacitto”tiādinā kāraṇabhūtena avikkhepena, sappurisūpanissayena ca
tika-s0104t:514_13: phalabhūtassa saddhammassavanassa siddhiyā eva samatthanaṃ vuttaṃ, avikkhepena pana
tika-s0104t:514_14: sappurisūpanissayassa siddhiyā samatthanaṃ na vuttaṃ. Kasmāti ce? Vikkhittacittānaṃ
tika-s0104t:514_15: sappurise payirupāsanābhāvassa atthato siddhattā. Atthavaseneva hi so pākaṭoti na vutto.
tika-s0104t:515_0: Etthāha – yathā yoniso manasikārena phalabhūtena attasammāpaṇidhipubbekatapuññatānaṃ
tika-s0104t:515_1: kāraṇabhūtānaṃ siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato, evaṃ avikkhepena phalabhūtena saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ
tika-s0104t:515_2: kāraṇabhūtānaṃ siddhi vattabbā siyā assutavato, sappurisūpanissayavirahitassa ca
tika-s0104t:515_3: tadabhāvato. Evaṃ santepi “na hi vikkhittacitto”tiādisamatthanavacanena avikkhepena,
tika-s0104t:515_4: sappurisūpanissayena ca kāraṇabhūtena saddhammassavanasseva phalabhūtassa siddhi
tika-s0104t:515_5: vuttā, kasmā panevaṃ vuttāti? Vuccate – adhippāyantarasambhavato hi tathā siddhi
tika-s0104t:515_6: vuttā. Ayaṃ panetthādhippāyo – saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa
tika-s0104t:515_7: kāraṇaṃ bāhirakāraṇattā, avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa
tika-s0104t:515_8: ekantakāraṇaṃ ajjhattikakāraṇattā, tasmā ekantakāraṇe honte kimatthiyā anekantakāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:515_9: pati phalabhāvaparikappanāti tathāyevetassa siddhi vuttāti. Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ phalena
tika-s0104t:515_10: kāraṇassa siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa, dutiyaṃ kāraṇena
tika-s0104t:515_11: phalassa siddhidassanaṃ ekantavassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhipavattiyā.
tika-s0104t:516_0: “Aparo nayo”tiādinā aññathāpi dīpetabbatthamāha, yasmā na hotīti sambandho. Evanti…pe…
tika-s0104t:516_1: nānākāraniddesoti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ, so ca ākāroti sotadvārānusāraviññāṇavīthisaṅkhātassa
tika-s0104t:516_2: cittasantānassa nānākārena ārammaṇe pavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇasaṅkhāto so
tika-s0104t:516_4: Evaṃ bhaddakoti niravasesaparahitapāripūribhāvakāraṇattā evaṃ yathāvuttena nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:516_5: sundaro seṭṭho, samāsapadaṃ vā etaṃ evaṃ īdiso bhaddo yassāti katvā. Na paṇihito
tika-s0104t:516_6: appaṇihito, sammā appaṇi hito attā yassāti tathā, tassa. Pacchimacakkadvayasampattinti
tika-s0104t:516_8: pavattanaṭṭhena cakkabhāvo. Caranti vā etena sattā sampattibhavaṃ, sampattibhavesūti
tika-s0104t:516_9: vā cakkaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ
tika-s0104t:516_10: devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattatī”tiādi pacchimabhāvo cettha desanākkamavaseneva.
tika-s0104t:516_12: Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Tasmāti purimakāraṇaṃ purimassevāti idha kāraṇamāha “na hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:517_0: Tena kiṃ pakāsitanti āha “iccassā”tiādi. Iti imāya catucakkasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya.
tika-s0104t:517_1: Assa therassa. Pacchimacakkadvayasiddhiyāti pacchimacakkadvayassa atthibhāvena siddhiyā.
tika-s0104t:517_3: yathābhūtañāṇassa cāti duvidhassāpi āsayassa asuddhihetubhūtānaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvena
tika-s0104t:517_4: suddhi. Tadeva hi dvayaṃ vivaṭṭanissitānaṃ suddhasattānaṃ āsayo. Sammāpaṇihitatto
tika-s0104t:517_5: hi pubbe ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso
tika-s0104t:517_6: naṃ tato kare”ti, “katapuññosi tvaṃ ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo”ti
tika-s0104t:517_7: ca. Keci pana “kattukamyatāchando āsayo”ti vadanti, tadayuttameva “tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā
tika-s0104t:517_8: adhigamabyattisiddhī”ti vacanena virodhato. Evampi maggañāṇasaṅkhātassa āsayassa
tika-s0104t:517_9: suddhi na yuttā tāya adhigamabyattisiddhiyā avattabbatoti? No na yutto purimassa
tika-s0104t:517_10: maggassa, pacchimānaṃ maggānaṃ, phalānañca kāraṇabhāvato. Payogasuddhīti yonisomanasikārapubbaṅgamassa
tika-s0104t:517_11: dhammassavanapayogassa visadabhāvena suddhi, sabbassa vā kāyavacīpayogassa niddosabhāvena
tika-s0104t:517_12: suddhi. Patirūpadesavāsī, hi sappurisasevī ca yathāvuttavisuddhapayogo hoti. Tathāvisuddhena
tika-s0104t:517_14: avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hoti, tathābhūto ca thero, tena viññāyati purimacakkadvayasiddhiyā
tika-s0104t:517_15: therassa payogasuddhi siddhāvāti. Tena kiṃ vibhāvitanti āha “tāya cā”tiādi. Adhigamabyattisiddhīti
tika-s0104t:517_16: paṭivedhasaṅkhāte adhigame chekabhāvasiddhi. Adhigametabbato hi paṭivijjhitabbato
tika-s0104t:517_17: paṭivedho “adhigamo”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vutto, āgamoti ca pariyatti āgacchanti attatthaparatthādayo
tika-s0104t:517_18: etena, ābhuso vā gamitabbo ñātabboti katvā.
tika-s0104t:518_0: Tena kimanubhāvitanti āha “itī”tiādi. Itīti evaṃ vuttanayena, tasmā siddhattāti vā
tika-s0104t:518_1: kāraṇaniddeso. Vacananti nidānavacanaṃ lokato, dhammato ca siddhāya upamāya tamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:518_2: ñāpetuṃ “aruṇuggaṃ viyā”tiādimāha. “Upamāya midhekacce, atthaṃ jānanti paṇḍitā”ti
tika-s0104t:518_3: hi vuttaṃ. Aruṇoti sūriyassa udayato pubbabhāge uṭṭhitaraṃsi, tassa uggaṃ uggamanaṃ
tika-s0104t:518_4: udayato udayantassa udayāvāsamuggacchato sūriyassa pubbaṅgamaṃ purecaraṃ bhavituṃ
tika-s0104t:518_5: arahati viyāti sambandho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – āgamādhigamabyattiyā īdisassa therassa
tika-s0104t:518_6: vuttanidānavacanaṃ bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitumarahati, nidānabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:519_0: Idāni aparampi pubbe vuttassa asammohāsammosasaṅkhātassa dīpetabbassatthassa dīpakehi
tika-s0104t:519_1: evaṃ-sadda suta-saddehi pakāsetabbamatthaṃ pakāsento “aparo nayo”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0104t:519_3: saddehi pubbe dīpitaṃ asammohāsammosasaṅkhātaṃ dīpetabbatthamāha asammohena nānappakārapaṭivedhassa,
tika-s0104t:519_4: asammosena ca sotabbappabhedapaṭivedhassa sijjhanato. “Attano”tiādīhi pana pakāsetabbatthaṃ.
tika-s0104t:519_8: sotabbappabheda-paṭivedhasaṅkhātassa ca dīpetabbatthassa dīpakattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:519_9: Santassa vijjamānassa bhāvo sabbhāvo, atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāhi sampattiyā sabbhāvo
tika-s0104t:519_11: sambhavo tathā. Evaṃ itaratthāpi. “Sotabbappabhedapaṭivedhadīpakenā”ti etena pana
tika-s0104t:519_12: ayaṃ suta-saddo evaṃ-saddasannidhānato, vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva vuttepi
tika-s0104t:519_13: sotabbadhammavisesaṃ āmasatīti dasseti. Ettha ca sotabbadhammasaṅkhātāya pāḷiyā nidassetabbānaṃ
tika-s0104t:519_14: bhāsitatthapayojanatthānaṃ, tīsu ca ñāṇesu pavattañāṇassa nānappakārabhāvato tabbhāvapaṭivedhadīpakena
tika-s0104t:519_16: pana atthādhigamahetuto, taṃvasena ca tadavasesahetuppabhedassa gahitattā, niruttibhāvato
tika-s0104t:520_0: Evaṃ asammohāsammosasaṅkhātassa dīpetabbassatthassa dīpakehi evaṃ-sadda suta-saddehi
tika-s0104t:520_2: dīpakehipi tehi pakāsetabbamatthaṃ pakāsento “evanti cā”tiādimāha. Tattha hi “evanti…pe…
tika-s0104t:520_3: bhāsamāno, sutanti idaṃ…pe… bhāsamāno”ti ca iminā tehi saddehi pubbe dīpitaṃ yonisomanasikārāvikkhepasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0104t:520_4: dīpetabbatthamāha, “ete mayā”tiādīhi pana pakāsetabbatthaṃ savanayogadīpakanti ca
tika-s0104t:520_5: avikkhepavasena savanayogassa sijjhanato tadeva sandhāyāha. Tathā hi ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-s0104t:520_7: te avikkhepadīpakena sutasaddena yojetvā”ti. Manodiṭṭhīhi pariyattidhammānaṃ anupekkhanasuppaṭivedhā
tika-s0104t:520_8: visesato manasikārapaṭibaddhā, tasmā taddīpakavacaneneva ete mayā dhammā manasānupekkhitā
tika-s0104t:520_9: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti imamatthaṃ pakāsetīti vuttaṃ “evanti ca…pe… dīpetī”ti tattha
tika-s0104t:520_10: dhammāti pariyattidhammā. Manasānupekkhitāti “idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, idha samādhi,
tika-s0104t:520_11: idha paññā, ettakāva ettha anusandhayo”tiādibhedena manasā anupekkhitā. Diṭṭhiyā
tika-s0104t:520_12: suppaṭividdhāti nijjhānakkhantisaṅkhātāya, ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha
tika-s0104t:520_13: vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā suṭṭhu vavatthāpetvā paṭividdhā.
tika-s0104t:521_1: tasmā taddīpakavacaneneva bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitāti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:521_2: pakāsetīti vuttaṃ “sutanti idaṃ…pe… dīpetī”ti. Tattha sutāti sotadvārānusārena viññātā.
tika-s0104t:521_3: Dhātāti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya manasi suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena
tika-s0104t:521_4: upadhāritā. Vacasā paricitāti paguṇatāsampādanena vācāya paricitā sajjhāyitā. Idāni
tika-s0104t:521_6: “tadubhayenapī”tiādimāha. Tattha tadubhayenāti purimanaye, pacchimanaye ca yathāvuttassa
tika-s0104t:521_7: pakāsetabbassatthassa pakāsakena tena dubbidhena saddena. Atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ
tika-s0104t:521_8: dīpentoti ādarajananassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tadeva kāraṇaṃ byatirekena vivarati, yuttiyā
tika-s0104t:521_9: vā daḷhaṃ karoti “atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhī”tiādinā. Asuṇantoti cettha lakkhaṇe,
tika-s0104t:521_10: hetumhi vā anta-saddo. Mahatā hitāti mahantato hitasmā. Paribāhiroti sabbato bhāgena bāhiro.
tika-s0104t:522_1: me sutanti iminā”tiādimāha. Pubbe visuṃ visuṃ atthe yojitāyeva ete saddā idha ekassevānubhāvatthassa
tika-s0104t:522_2: anubhāvakabhāvena gahitāti ñāpetuṃ “sakalenā”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmañca me-saddo imasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:522_3: ṭhāne pubbena yojito, tadapekkhānaṃ pana evaṃ-sadda suta-saddānaṃ sahacaraṇato, avinābhāvato
tika-s0104t:522_4: ca tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathāgatappaveditanti tathāgatena pakārato viditaṃ,
tika-s0104t:522_5: bhāsitaṃ vā. Attano adahantoti attani “mameda”nti aṭṭhapento. Bhummatthe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:522_6: Asappurisabhūminti asappurisavisayaṃ, so ca atthato apakataññutāsaṅkhātā “idhekacco
tika-s0104t:522_7: pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī”ti evaṃ
tika-s0104t:522_8: mahācoradīpakena bhagavatā vuttā anariyavohārāvatthā, tathā cāha “tathāgata…pe… adahanto”ti.
tika-s0104t:522_9: Hutvāti cettha seso. Tathā sāvakattaṃ paṭijānantoti sappurisabhūmiokkamanasarūpakathanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:522_10: Nanu ca ānandattherassa “mametaṃ vacana”nti adhimānassa, mahākassapattherādīnañca
tika-s0104t:522_11: tadāsaṅkāya abhāvato asappurisabhūmisamatikkamādivacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyāti? Nayidamevaṃ
tika-s0104t:522_12: “evaṃ me suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho anubhāvitoti atthasseva dassanato. Tena
tika-s0104t:522_13: hi anubhāvetabbamatthaṃyeva tathā dasseti, na pana ānandattherassa adhimānassa, mahākassapattherādīnañca
tika-s0104t:522_14: tadāsaṅkāya sambhavanti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. Keci pana “devatānaṃ parivitakkāpekkhaṃ
tika-s0104t:522_15: tathāvacanaṃ, tasmā edisī codanā anavakāsā”ti vadanti. Tasmiṃ kira samaye ekaccānaṃ
tika-s0104t:522_16: devatānaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bhagavā ca parinibbuto, ayañcāyasmā ānando
tika-s0104t:522_17: desanākusalo, idāni dhammaṃ deseti, sakyakulappasuto tathāgatassa bhātā, cūḷapituputto
tika-s0104t:522_18: ca, kiṃ nu kho so sayaṃ sacchikataṃ dhammaṃ deseti, udāhu bhagavatoyeva vacanaṃ yathāsuta”nti,
tika-s0104t:522_20: anubhāvitoti. Sāyeva yathāvuttā anariyavohārāvatthā asaddhammo, tadavatthānokkamanasaṅkhātā
tika-s0104t:522_21: ca sāvakattapaṭijānanā saddhammo. Evaṃ sati pariyāyantarena purimatthameva dassetīti
tika-s0104t:522_22: gahetabbaṃ. Apica kuhanalapanādivasena pavatto akusalarāsi asaddhammo, tabbirahitabhāvo
tika-s0104t:522_23: ca saddhammo. “Kevala”ntiādināpi vuttassevatthassa pariyāyantarena dassanaṃ, yathāvuttāya
tika-s0104t:522_24: anariyavohārāvatthāya parimoceti. Sāvakattaṃ paṭijānanena satthāraṃ apadisatīti attho.
tika-s0104t:522_25: Apica satthukappādikiriyato attānaṃ parimoceti takkiriyāsaṅkāya sambhavato. “Satthu
tika-s0104t:522_26: bhagavatoyeva vacanaṃ mayāsuta”nti satthāraṃ apadisatīti atthantaramanubhāvanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:522_28: nidasseti. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthesu yathārahaṃ satte netīti netti, dhammoyeva
tika-s0104t:522_29: netti tathā. Vuttanayena cettha ubhayathā adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:523_1: desanāvasena pavattitabhāvaṃ. Purimavacanaṃ vivarantoti bhagavatā desitavasena purimataraṃ
tika-s0104t:523_2: saṃvijjamānaṃ bhagavatā vacanameva uttāniṃ karonto, idaṃ vacananti sambandho. Catūhi
tika-s0104t:523_4: Sammāsambuddhabhāvasaṅkhāte uttamaṭṭhāne ṭhitassa, usabhassa idanti vā atthena āsabhasaṅkhāte
tika-s0104t:523_5: akampanasabhāvabhūte ṭhāne ṭhitassa. “Evameva kho bhikkhave, yadā tathāgato loke
tika-s0104t:523_6: uppajjati…pe… so dhammaṃ desetī”tiādinā sīhopamasuttādīsu āgatena anekanayena sīhanādanadino.
tika-s0104t:523_7: Sabbasattesu, sabbasattānaṃ vā uttamassa. Na cettha niddhāraṇalakkhaṇābhāvato niddhāraṇavasena
tika-s0104t:523_8: samāso. Sabbattha hi sakkataganthesu, sāsanaganthesu ca evameva vuttaṃ. Dhammena
tika-s0104t:523_9: sattānamissarassa. Dhammasseva issarassa taduppādanavasenātipi vadanti. Sesapadadvayaṃ
tika-s0104t:523_10: tassevatthassa pariyāyantaradīpanaṃ. Dhammena lokassa padīpamiva bhūtassa, taduppādakabhāvena
tika-s0104t:523_12: hi vuttaṃ. Dhammena lokapaṭisaraṇabhūtassa, dhammasaṅkhātena vā paṭisaraṇena sampannassa.
tika-s0104t:523_13: “Yaṃnūnāhaṃ…pe… tameva dhammaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā upanissāya vihareyya”nti
tika-s0104t:523_14: hi vuttaṃ. Saddhindriyādisaddhammasaṅkhātassa varacakkassa pavattino, saddhammānametassa
tika-s0104t:523_15: vā āṇācakkavarassa pavattino sammāsambuddhassa tassa bhagavato idaṃ vacanaṃ sammukhāva
tika-s0104t:523_16: mayā paṭiggahitanti yojetabbaṃ. Byañjaneti padasamudāyabhūte vākye. Kaṅkhā vā vimati
tika-s0104t:523_17: vāti ettha daḷhataraṃ niviṭṭhā vicikicchā kaṅkhā. Nātisaṃsappanaṃ matibhedamattaṃ
tika-s0104t:523_18: vimati. Sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayāti tathā akattabbabhāvakāraṇavacanaṃ. Attanā
tika-s0104t:523_19: uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimavacanaṃ vivarantoti pana assaddhiyavināsanassa,
tika-s0104t:524_0: “Evaṃ me suta”nti evaṃ vadanto gotamagottassa sammāsambuddhassa sāvako, gotamagottasambandho
tika-s0104t:524_1: vā sāvako āyasmā ānando bhagavatā bhāsitabhāvassa, sammukhā paṭiggahitabhāvassa ca
tika-s0104t:524_2: sūcanato, tathāsūcaneneva ca khalitadunniruttādigahaṇadosābhāvassa sijjhanato sāsane
