tika-s0104t:524_3: assaddhaṃ vināsayati, saddhaṃ vaḍḍhetīti attho. Ettha ca pañcamādayo tisso atthayojanā
tika-s0104t:524_4: ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā dassitā, tato parā tisso ākāratthameva
tika-s0104t:524_5: evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā vibhāvitā, pacchimā pana tisso yathākkamaṃ ākāratthaṃ, nidassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:524_6: avadhāraṇatthañca evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā yojitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Honti cettha –
tika-s0104t:529_0: Eka-saddo pana aññaseṭṭhāsahāyasaṅkhyādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa “sassato attā ca loko
tika-s0104t:529_1: ca, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati, “cetaso
tika-s0104t:529_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhyāyaṃ, idhāpi saṅkhyāyamevāti
tika-s0104t:529_4: dassento āha “ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso”ti ekoyevesa samayo, na dve vā tayo
tika-s0104t:529_5: vāti ūnādhikābhāvena gaṇanassa paricchedaniddeso ekanti ayaṃ saddoti attho, tena
tika-s0104t:529_6: kassa paricchindananti anuyoge sati “samaya”nti vuttanti dassento āha “samayanti
tika-s0104t:529_7: paricchinnaniddeso”ti. Evaṃ paricchedaparicchinnavasena vuttepi “ayaṃ nāma samayo”ti
tika-s0104t:529_8: sarūpato aniyamitattā aniyamitavacanamevāti dasseti “ekaṃ…pe…. dīpana”nti iminā.
tika-s0104t:530_0: Idāni samayasaddassa anekatthavuttitaṃ atthuddhāravasena dassetvā idhādhippetamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:530_1: niyamento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Tatthāti tasmiṃ “ekaṃ samaya”nti padadvaye, samabhiniviṭṭho
tika-s0104t:530_2: samaya saddoti sambandho. Na pana dissatīti tesvekasmiṃyeva atthe idha pavattanato.
tika-s0104t:530_3: Samavāyeti paccayasāmaggiyaṃ, kāraṇasamavāyeti attho. Khaṇeti okāse. Hetudiṭṭhīsūti
tika-s0104t:530_4: hetumhi ceva laddhiyañca. Assāti samayasaddassa. Kālañca samayañca upādāyāti ettha
tika-s0104t:530_5: kālo nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttakālo. Samayo nāma tasseva paccayasāmaggī, atthato
tika-s0104t:530_6: pana tadanurūpasarīrabalañceva tappaccayaparissayābhāvo ca. Upādānaṃ nāma ñāṇena
tika-s0104t:530_7: tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ, tasmā yathāvuttaṃ kālañca samayañca paññāya gahetvā upadhāretvāti
tika-s0104t:530_8: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace amhākaṃ sve gamanassa yuttakālo bhavissati, kāye balamattā
tika-s0104t:530_9: ca pharissati, gamanapaccayā ca añño aphāsuvihāro na bhavissati, athetaṃ kālañca
tika-s0104t:530_10: gamanakāraṇasamavāyasaṅkhātaṃ samayañca upadhāretvā appeva nāma svepi āgaccheyyāmāti.
tika-s0104t:530_11: Khaṇoti okāso. Tathāgatuppādādiko hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso tappaccayapaṭilābhahetuttā.
tika-s0104t:530_12: Khaṇo eva ca samayo. Yo “khaṇo”ti ca “samayo”ti ca vuccati, so ekovāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:530_13: Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānaṃ uṇhasamayo. Vassānassa paṭhamo māso pariḷāhasamayo. Mahāsamayoti
tika-s0104t:530_14: mahāsamūho. Samāso vā esa, byāso vā. Pavuṭṭhaṃ vanaṃ pavanaṃ, tasmiṃ, kapilavatthusāmante
tika-s0104t:530_15: mahāvanasaṅkhāte vanasaṇḍeti attho. Samayopi khoti ettha samayoti sikkhāpadapūraṇassa
tika-s0104t:530_16: hetu. Bhaddālīti tassa bhikkhussa nāmaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tayā bhaddāli paṭivijjhitabbayuttakaṃ
tika-s0104t:530_17: ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthi, tampi te na paṭividdhaṃ na sallakkhitanti. Kiṃ taṃ kāraṇanti
tika-s0104t:531_0: “Uggahamāno”tiādīsu mānoti tassa paribbājakassa pakatināmaṃ, kiñci kiñci pana sippaṃ
tika-s0104t:531_1: uggahetuṃ samatthatāya “uggahamāno”ti naṃ sañjānanti, tasmā “uggahamāno”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:531_2: Samaṇamuṇḍikassa putto samaṇamuṇḍikāputto. So kira devadattassa upaṭṭhāko. Samayaṃ
tika-s0104t:531_3: diṭṭhiṃ pakārena vadanti etthāti samayappavādako, tasmiṃ, diṭṭhippavādaketi attho.
tika-s0104t:531_4: Tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne caṅkītārukkhapokkharasātippabhūtayo brāhmaṇā, nigaṇṭhācelakaparibbājakādayo
tika-s0104t:531_5: ca pabbajitā sannipatitvā attano attano samayaṃ pakārena vadanti kathenti dīpenti,
tika-s0104t:531_6: tasmā so ārāmo “samayappavādako”ti vuccati. Sveva tindukācīrasaṅkhātāya timbarūsakarukkhapantiyā
tika-s0104t:531_7: parikkhittattā “tindukācīro”ti vuccati. Ekā sālā etthāti ekasālako. Yasmā panettha
tika-s0104t:531_8: paṭhamaṃ ekā sālā ahosi, pacchā pana mahāpuññaṃ poṭṭhapādaparibbājakaṃ nissāya bahū
tika-s0104t:531_9: sālā katā, tasmā tameva paṭhamaṃ kataṃ ekaṃ sālaṃ upādāya laddhapubbanāmavasena “ekasālako”ti
tika-s0104t:531_10: vuccati. Mallikāya nāma pasenadirañño deviyā uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasacchanno
tika-s0104t:531_11: ārāmo, tena vuttaṃ “mallikāya ārāme”ti. Paṭivasatīti tasmiṃ phāsutāya vasati.
tika-s0104t:532_0: Diṭṭhe dhammeti paccakkhe attabhāve. Atthoti vuḍḍhi. Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato
tika-s0104t:532_1: sammā pāpuṇitabbato samparāyo, paraloko, tattha niyutto samparāyiko, paralokattho.
tika-s0104t:532_3: kāraṇassa nipphannattā paṭiladdho nāma hotīti taṃ atthadvayamekato katvā “atthābhisamayā”ti
tika-s0104t:532_4: vuttaṃ. Dhiyā paññāya taṃtadatthe rāti gaṇhāti, dhī vā paññā etassatthīti dhīro.
tika-s0104t:532_5: Paṇḍā vuccati paññā. Sā hi sukhumesupi atthesu paḍati gacchati, dukkhādīnaṃ vā pīḷanādiākāraṃ
tika-s0104t:532_6: jānātīti paṇḍā. Tāya ito gatoti paṇḍito. Atha vā itā sañjātā paṇḍā etassa, paḍati
tika-s0104t:532_7: vā ñāṇagatiyā gacchatīti paṇḍito. Sammā mānābhisamayāti mānassa sammā pahānena. Sammāti
tika-s0104t:532_8: cettha aggamaggañāṇena samucchedappahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Antanti avasānaṃ. Pīḷanaṃ taṃsamaṅgino
tika-s0104t:532_9: hiṃsanaṃ avipphāritākaraṇaṃ. Tadeva attho tathā ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā. Samecca
tika-s0104t:532_10: paccayehi katabhāvo saṅkhataṭṭho. Dukkhadukkhatādivasena santāpanaṃ paridahanaṃ santāpaṭṭho.
tika-s0104t:532_11: Jarāya, maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbo vipariṇāmaṭṭho. Abhisametabbo paṭivijjhitabbo
tika-s0104t:532_12: abhisamayaṭṭho, pīḷanādīniyeva. Tāni hi abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvamupanetvā “abhisamayaṭṭho”ti
tika-s0104t:532_13: vuttāni. Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa attho gocaro abhisamayaṭṭhoti tāniyeva tabbisaya-bhāvūpagamana-sāmaññato
tika-s0104t:532_14: ekattena vuttāni. Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā tassa tassa atthassa vācako
tika-s0104t:532_15: samayasaddo evāti samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayo vutto.
tika-s0104t:533_0: Tesu pana atthesu ayaṃ vacanattho – sahakārīkāraṇavasena sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti
tika-s0104t:533_1: samayo, samavāyo. Sameti samāgacchati maggabrahmacariyamettha tadādhārapuggalavasenāti
tika-s0104t:533_2: samayo, khaṇo. Samenti ettha, etena vā saṃgacchanti dhammā, sattā vā sahajātādīhi,
tika-s0104t:533_3: uppādādīhi cāti samayo, kālo. Dhammappavattimattatāya hi atthato abhūtopi kālo dhammappavattiyā
tika-s0104t:533_4: adhikaraṇaṃ, karaṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyati. Samaṃ, sammā
tika-s0104t:533_5: vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho yathā “samudāyo”ti. Avayavānaṃ
tika-s0104t:533_6: sahāvaṭṭhānameva hi samūho, na pana avayavavinimutto samūho nāma koci paramatthato
tika-s0104t:533_7: atthi. Paccayantarasamāgame eti phalaṃ uppajjati, pavattati vā etasmāti samayo, hetu
tika-s0104t:533_8: yathā “samudayo”ti. So hi paccayantarasamāgamaneneva attano phalaṃ uppādaṭṭhitisamaṅgībhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:533_9: karoti. Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho hutvā eti attano visaye pavattati, daḷhaggaṇabhāvato
tika-s0104t:533_10: vā taṃsaññuttā sattā ayanti etena yathābhinivesaṃ pavattantīti samayo, diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena
tika-s0104t:533_11: hi sattā ativiya bajjhanti. Samiti saṅgati samodhānaṃ samayo, paṭilābho. Samassa
tika-s0104t:533_12: nirodhassa yānaṃ pāpuṇanaṃ, sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo appavatti samayo, pahānaṃ. Abhimukhaṃ
tika-s0104t:533_13: ñāṇena sammā etabbo abhigantabboti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo. Abhimukhabhāvena
tika-s0104t:533_14: taṃ taṃ sabhāvaṃ sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho.
tika-s0104t:534_0: Nanu ca atthamattaṃ yathādhippetaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantīti na ekena saddena aneke
tika-s0104t:534_1: atthā abhidhīyanti, atha kasmā idha samayasaddassa anekadhā attho vuttoti? Saccametaṃ
tika-s0104t:534_2: saddavisese apekkhite saddavisese hi apekkhite na ekena saddena anekatthābhidhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:534_3: sambhavati. Na hi yo kālādiattho samaya-saddo, soyeva samūhādiatthaṃ vadati. Ettha
tika-s0104t:534_4: pana tesaṃ tesamatthānaṃ samayasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññamupādāya anekatthatā samaya-saddassa
tika-s0104t:534_5: vuttāti. Evaṃ sabbattha atthuddhāre. Hoti cettha –
tika-s0104t:536: Atthaṃ vade na hi saddo, eko nekatthako siyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:537_0: Samavāyādiatthānaṃ idha asambhavato, kālasseva ca apadisitabbattā “idha panassa kālo
tika-s0104t:537_1: attho”ti vuttaṃ. Desadesakādīnaṃ viya hi kālassa nidānabhāvena adhippetattā sopi
tika-s0104t:537_2: idha apadisīyati. ‘Iminā kīdisaṃ kālaṃ dīpetīti āha “tenā”tiādi. Tenāti kālatthena
tika-s0104t:537_3: samaya-saddena. Aḍḍhamāso pakkhavasena vutto, pubbaṇhādiko divasabhāgavasena, paṭhamayāmādiko
tika-s0104t:537_4: pahāravasena. Ādi-saddena khaṇalayādayo saṅgahitā, aniyamitavasena ekaṃ kālaṃ dīpetīti attho.
tika-s0104t:538_0: Kasmā panettha aniyamitavasena kālo niddiṭṭho, na utusaṃvaccharādinā niyamitavasenāti
tika-s0104t:538_1: āha “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi. Kiñcāpi paññāya viditaṃ suvavatthāpitaṃ, tathāpīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:538_2: Vacasā dhāretuṃ vā sayaṃ uddisituṃ vā parena uddisāpetuṃ vā na sakkā nānappakārabhāvato
tika-s0104t:538_3: bahu ca vattabbaṃ hoti yāva kālappabhedo, tāva vattabbattā. “Ekaṃ samaya”nti vutte
tika-s0104t:538_4: pana na so kālappabhedo atthi, yo etthānantogadho siyāti dasseti “ekeneva padena
tika-s0104t:538_5: tamatthaṃ samodhānetvā”ti iminā. Evaṃ lokiyasammatakālavasena samayatthaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0104t:538_6: idāni sāsane pākaṭakālavasena samayatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ye vā ime”tiādi vuttaṃ. Apica
tika-s0104t:538_7: utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamaṃ akatvā samayasaddassa vacane ayampi guṇo laddhoyevāti
tika-s0104t:538_8: dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha. Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhati tassā visesaparihāravisayattā.
tika-s0104t:538_9: Tattha ye ime samayāti sambandho. Bhagavato mātukucchiokkamanakālo cettha gabbhokkantisamayo.
tika-s0104t:538_10: Cattāri nimittāni passitvā saṃvejanakālo saṃvegasamayo. Chabbassāni sambodhisamadhigamāya
tika-s0104t:538_11: cariyakālo dukkarakārikasamayo. Devasikaṃ jhānaphalasamāpattīhi vītināmanakālo diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasamayo,
tika-s0104t:538_12: visesato pana sattasattāhāni jhānasamāpattivaḷañjanakālo. Pañcacattālīsavassāni taṃtaṃdhammadesanākālo
tika-s0104t:538_14: pākaṭā. “Ekaṃ samaya”nti vutte tadaññepi samayā santīti atthāpattito tesu samayesu
tika-s0104t:538_15: idha desanāsamayasaṅkhāto samayaviseso “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttoti dīpetīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:539_0: Yathāvuttappabhedesuyeva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “yo
tika-s0104t:539_1: cāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hi ñāṇakiccasamayo, attahitapaṭipattisamayo ca abhisambodhisamayoyeva.
tika-s0104t:539_3: desanāsamayo, tasmā tesu vuttappabhedesu samayesu ekadesova pakārantarena dassitoti
tika-s0104t:539_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Sannipatitānaṃ vo bhikkhave dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī kathā vā ariyo vā
tika-s0104t:539_7: samayaṃ sandhāya “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttaṃ atthato abhedattā.
tika-s0104t:540_0: Aññattha viya bhummavacanena ca karaṇavacanena ca niddesamakatvā idha upayogavacanena
tika-s0104t:540_1: niddesapayojanaṃ niddhāretukāmo parammukhena codanaṃ samuṭṭhapeti “kasmā panetthā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:540_2: Etthāti “ekaṃ samaya”nti imasmiṃ pade, karaṇavacanena niddeso kato yathāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:540_3: Bhavanti etthāti bhummaṃ, okāso, tattha pavattaṃ vacanaṃ vibhatti bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:540_4: Karoti kiriyamabhinipphādebhi etenāti karaṇaṃ, kiriyānipphattikāraṇaṃ. Upayujjitabbo
tika-s0104t:540_5: kiriyāyāti upayogo, kammaṃ, tattha vacanaṃ tathā. “Tatthā”tiādinā yathāvuttacodanaṃ
tika-s0104t:540_6: pariharati. Tatthāti tesu abhidhammatadaññasuttapadavinayesu. Tathāti bhummavacanakaraṇavacanehi
tika-s0104t:540_8: sambhavatoti attho. Idhāti idhasmiṃ suttapade. Aññathāti upayogavacanena. Atthasambhavatoti
tika-s0104t:541_0: “Tattha hī”tiādi tabbivaraṇaṃ. Itoti “ekaṃ samaya”nti suttapadato. Adhikaraṇatthoti
tika-s0104t:541_1: ādhārattho. Bhavanaṃ bhāvo, kiriyā, kiriyāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇaṃ bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:541_2: tadevattho tathā. Kena samayatthena idaṃ atthadvayaṃ sambhavatīti anuyoge sati tadatthadvayasambhavānurūpena
tika-s0104t:541_3: samayatthena, taṃ daḷhaṃ karonto “adhikaraṇañhī”tiādimāha. Padatthatoyeva hi yathāvuttamatthadvayaṃ
tika-s0104t:541_4: siddhaṃ, vibhatti pana jotakamattā. Tattha kālasaṅkhāto, kālasaddassa vā attho yassāti
tika-s0104t:541_5: kālattho. Samūhasaṅkhāto, ‘samūhasaddassa vā attho yassāti samūhattho, ko so? Samayo.
tika-s0104t:541_6: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kālattho, samūhattho ca samayo tattha abhidhamme vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:541_7: adhikaraṇaṃ ādhāroti, yasmiṃ kāle, dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ
tika-s0104t:541_8: hoti, tasmiṃyeva kāle, dhammapuñje vā phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho. Nanu
tika-s0104t:541_9: cāyaṃ upādāpaññattimatto kālo, vohāramatto ca samūho, so kathaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ siyā
tika-s0104t:541_10: tattha vuttadhammānanti? Nāyaṃ doso. Yathā hi kālo sayaṃ paramatthato avijjamānopi
tika-s0104t:541_11: sabhāvadhammaparicchinnattā ādhārabhāvena paññāto, sabhāvadhammaparicchinno ca taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:541_12: tato pubbe, parato ca abhāvato “pubbaṇhejāto, sāyanhe āgacchatī”tiādīsu, samūho ca
tika-s0104t:541_13: avayavavinimutto visuṃ avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddhattā avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena
tika-s0104t:541_14: paññāpīyati “rukkhe sākhā, yavarāsiyaṃ pattasambhūto”tiādīsu, evamidhāpi sabhāvadhammaparicchinnattā,
tika-s0104t:541_15: kappanāmattasiddhattā ca tadubhayaṃ tattha vuttadhammānaṃ adhikaraṇabhāvena paññāpīyatīti.
tika-s0104t:542_1: khaṇo nāma aṭṭhakkhaṇavinimutto navamo buddhuppādakkhaṇo, yāni vā panetāni “cattārimāni
tika-s0104t:542_2: bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī”ti ettha
tika-s0104t:542_3: patirūpadesavāso sappurisūpanissayo attasammāpaṇīdhi pubbekatapuññatāti cattāri cakkāni
tika-s0104t:542_4: vuttāni, tāni ekajjhaṃ katvā okāsaṭṭhena “khaṇo”ti veditabbāni. Tāni hi kusaluppattiyā
tika-s0104t:542_5: okāsabhūtāni. Samavāyo nāma “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:542_7: Cakkhurūpādīnañhi cakkhuviññāṇādi sādhāraṇaphalaṃ. Hetu nāma yonisomanasikārādijanakahetu.
tika-s0104t:542_8: Yathāvuttassa khaṇasaṅkhātassa, samavāyasaṅkhātassa, hetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa
tika-s0104t:542_9: sattāsaṅkhātena bhāvena tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ sattāsaṅkhāto bhāvo lakkhīyati
tika-s0104t:542_10: viññāyatīti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā “gāvīsu duyhamānāsu gato, duddhāsu āgato”ti
tika-s0104t:542_11: ettha dohanakiriyāya gamanakiriyā lakkhīyati, evamidhāpi yathāvuttassa samayassa
tika-s0104t:542_12: sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā, phassādīnaṃ bhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyatīti. Nanu
tika-s0104t:542_13: cettha sattākiriyā avijjamānāva, kathaṃ tāya lakkhīyatīti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi “yasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:542_14: samaye”ti ca vutte satīti ayamattho viññāyamāno evahoti aññakiriyāsambandhābhāve
tika-s0104t:542_15: padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvato, tasmā atthato gamyamānāya tāya sattākiriyāya lakkhīyatīti.
tika-s0104t:542_16: Ayañhi tattha attho – yasmiṃ yathāvutte khaṇe, paccayasamavāye, hetumhi vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ
tika-s0104t:542_17: kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe, paccayasamavāye, hetumhi vā sati
tika-s0104t:542_18: phassādayopi hontīti. Ayaṃ pana attho abhidhammeyeva nidassanavasena vutto, yathārahamesa
tika-s0104t:542_19: nayo aññesupi suttapadesūti. Tasmāti adhikaraṇatthassa, bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthassa
tika-s0104t:542_20: ca sambhavato. Tadatthajotanatthanti tadubhayatthassa samayasaddatthabhāvena vijjamānasseva
tika-s0104t:542_21: bhummavacanavasena dīpanatthaṃ. Vibhattiyo hi padīpo viya vatthuno vijjamānasseva
tika-s0104t:543_0: Hetuattho, karaṇattho ca sambhavatīti “annena vasati, vijjāya vasatī”tiādīsu viya
tika-s0104t:543_1: hetuattho, “pharasunā chindati, kudālena khaṇatī”tiādīsu viya karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
tika-s0104t:543_2: Kathaṃ pana sambhavatīti āha “yo hi so”tiādi. Vinaye āgatasikkhāpadapaññattiyācanavatthuvasena
tika-s0104t:543_3: theraṃ mariyādaṃ katvā “sāriputtādīhipi duviññeyyo”ti vuttaṃ. Tena samayena hetubhūtena
tika-s0104t:543_4: karaṇabhūtenāti ettha pana taṃtaṃvatthuvītikkamova sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetu ceva
tika-s0104t:543_5: karaṇañca. Tathā hi yadā bhagavā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā paṭhamameva tesaṃ tesaṃ tattha
tika-s0104t:543_6: tattha sikkhāpadapaññattihetubhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ vītikkamaṃ apekkhamāno viharati, tadā
tika-s0104t:543_7: taṃ taṃ vītikkamaṃ apekkhitvā tadatthaṃ vasatīti siddho vatthuvītikkamassa sikkhāpadapaññattihetubhāvo
tika-s0104t:543_9: hetubhāvo viya. Sikkhāpadapaññattikāle pana teneva pubbasiddhena vītikkamena sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-s0104t:543_10: paññapeti, tasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sādhakatamattā karaṇabhāvopi vītikkamasseva
tika-s0104t:543_11: siddho “asinā chindatī”tiādīsu asinā chindanakiriyaṃ sādhetītiādinā kāraṇena asiādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:543_12: karaṇabhāvo viya. Evaṃ santepi vītikkamaṃ apekkhamāno teneva saddhiṃ tannissitampi
tika-s0104t:543_13: kālaṃ apekkhitvā viharatīti kālassāpi idha hetubhāvo vutto, sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento
tika-s0104t:543_14: ca taṃ taṃ vītikkamakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti vītikkamanissayassa
tika-s0104t:543_15: kālassāpi karaṇabhāvo vutto, tasmā iminā pariyāyena kālassāpi hetubhāvo, karaṇabhāvo
tika-s0104t:543_16: ca labbhatīti vuttaṃ “tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenā”ti, nippariyāyena pana
tika-s0104t:543_17: vītikkamoyeva hetubhūto, karaṇabhūto ca. So hi vītikkamakkhaṇe hetu hutvā pacchā
tika-s0104t:543_18: sikkhāpadapaññāpanakkhaṇe karaṇampi hotīti. Sikkhāpadāni paññāpayantoti vītikkamaṃ
tika-s0104t:543_19: pucchitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthuṃ taṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā,
tika-s0104t:543_20: vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuotiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena karaṇabhūtena
tika-s0104t:543_22: viya sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetubhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ vatthuvītikkamasamayaṃ apekkhamāno tena
tika-s0104t:543_23: samayena hetubhūtena bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsīti attho.
tika-s0104t:544_1: karaṇabhāvassa, hetubhāvassa ca samatthanavacanaṃ, tasmā tadanurūpaṃ “tenasamayena
tika-s0104t:544_2: karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtenā”ti evaṃ vattabbepi paṭhamaṃ “hetubhūtenā”ti uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:544_3: tattha hetubhāvassa sātisayamadhippetattā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. “Bhagavā hi verañjāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:544_5: apekkhamāno tena samayena hetubhūtena vihāsī”ti tīsupi kira gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:544_6: “Kiṃ panettha yutticintāya, ācariyassa idha kamavacanicchā natthīti evametaṃ gahetabbaṃ
tika-s0104t:544_7: – aññāsupi hi aṭṭhakathāsu ayameva anukkamo vutto, na ca tāsu ‘tena samayena verañjāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:544_8: viharatī’ti vinayapāḷipade hetuatthasseva sātisayaṃ adhippetabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vutto
tika-s0104t:544_9: avisayattā, sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto hetubhūtena, karaṇabhūtena ca samayena vihāsi,
tika-s0104t:544_10: sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno hetubhūtena samayena vihāsīti evamettha yathālābhaṃ
tika-s0104t:544_11: sambandhabhāvato evaṃ vutto”tipi vadanti. Tasmāti yathāvuttassa duvidhassāpi atthassa
tika-s0104t:544_12: sambhavato. Tadatthajotanatthanti vuttanayena karaṇavacanena tadubhayatthassa jotanatthaṃ.
tika-s0104t:544_13: Tatthāti tasmiṃ vinaye. Ettha ca sikkhāpadapaññattiyā eva vītikkamasamayassa sādhakatamattā
tika-s0104t:544_14: tassa karaṇabhāve “sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto”ti ajjhāharitapadena sambandho, hetubhāve
tika-s0104t:544_15: pana tadapekkhanamattattā “viharatī”ti padenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathāyeva hi vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:544_16: “tena samayena hetubhūtena, karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto, sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
tika-s0104t:544_17: apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsī”ti. Karaṇañhi kiriyatthaṃ, na hetu viya
tika-s0104t:544_18: kiriyākāraṇaṃ. Hetu pana kiriyākāraṇaṃ, na karaṇaṃ viya kiriyatthoti.
tika-s0104t:545_1: dabbaguṇakiriyāhi saṃyogo accantasaṃyogo, nirantarameva tehi saṃyuttabhāvoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:545_2: hoti. Soyevattho tathā. Evaṃjātiketi evaṃsabhāve. Kathaṃ sambhavatīti āha “yañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:545_3: Accantamevāti ārabbhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ, tāva ekaṃsameva, nirantaramevāti
tika-s0104t:545_4: attho. Karuṇāvihārenāti parahitapaṭipattisaṅkhātena karuṇāvihārena. Tathā hi karuṇānidānattā
tika-s0104t:545_5: desanāya idha parahitapaṭipatti “karuṇāvihāro”ti vuttā, na pana karuṇāsamāpattivihāro.
tika-s0104t:545_6: Na hi desanākāle desetabbadhammavisayassa desanāñāṇassa sattavisayāya mahākaruṇāya
tika-s0104t:545_7: sahuppatti sambhavati bhinnavisayattā, tasmā karuṇāya pavatto vihāroti katvā parahitapaṭipattivihāro
tika-s0104t:545_9: vuttanayena upayogavibhattiyā tadatthassa jotanatthaṃ upayoganiddeso kato yathā “māsaṃ
tika-s0104t:545_10: sajjhāyati, divasaṃ bhuñjatī”ti. Tenāti yena kāraṇena abhidhamme, ito aññesu ca suttapadesu
tika-s0104t:545_11: bhummavacanassa adhikaraṇattho, bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho ca, vinaye karaṇavacanassa
tika-s0104t:545_12: hetuattho, karaṇattho ca idha upayogavacanassa accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati, tenāti
tika-s0104t:545_13: attho. Etanti yathā vuttassatthassa saṅgahagāthāpadaṃ aññatrāti abhidhamme ito aññesu
tika-s0104t:545_14: suttapadesu, vinaye ca. Samayoti samayasaddo. Saddeyeva hi vibhattiparā bhavatiatthe
tika-s0104t:546_0: Evaṃ attano matiṃ dassetvā idāni porāṇācariyamatiṃ dassetuṃ “porāṇā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:546_1: Porāṇāti ca purimā aṭṭhakathācariyā. “Tasmiṃ samaye”ti vā…pe… “ekaṃ samaya”nti vā
tika-s0104t:546_2: esa bhedoti sambandho. Abhilāpamattabhedoti vacanamattena bhedo viseso, na pana atthena,
tika-s0104t:546_3: tenāha “sabbattha bhummamevattho”ti, sabbesupi atthato ādhāro eva atthoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:546_4: hoti. Iminā ca vacanena suttavinayesu vibhattivipariṇāmo kato, bhummatthe vā upayogakaraṇavibhattiyo
tika-s0104t:547_0: Bhāriyaṭṭhena garu. Tadevatthaṃ saṅketato samattheti “garuṃ hī”tiādinā saṅketavisayo
tika-s0104t:547_1: hi saddo taṃvavatthitoyeva cesa atthabodhakoti. Garunti garukātabbaṃ janaṃ. “Loke”ti
tika-s0104t:547_2: iminā na kevalaṃ sāsaneyeva, lokepi garukātabbaṭṭhena bhagavāti saṅketasiddhīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:547_3: Yadi garukātabbaṭṭhena bhagavā, atha ayameva sātisayaṃ bhagavā nāmāti dassento “ayañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:547_6: pajāya accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamaṃ
tika-s0104t:547_7: gāravaṭṭhānanti. Na kevalaṃ lokeyeva, atha kho sāsanepīti dasseti “porāṇehī”tiādinā,
tika-s0104t:547_8: porāṇehīti ca aṭṭhakathācariyehīti attho. Seṭṭhavācakavacanampi seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato
tika-s0104t:547_9: seṭṭhamevāti vuttaṃ “bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭha”nti. Vuccati attho, etenāti hi vacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:547_10: saddo. Atha vā vuccatīti vacanaṃ, attho, tasmā yo “bhagavā”ti vacanena vacanīyo attho,
tika-s0104t:547_11: so seṭṭhoti attho. Bhagavāti vacanamuttamanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Gāravayuttoti garubhāvayutto
tika-s0104t:547_12: garuguṇayogattā, sātisayaṃ vā garukaraṇārahatāya gāravayutto, gāravārahoti attho.
tika-s0104t:547_13: Yena kāraṇattayena so tathāgato garu bhāriyaṭṭhena, tena “bhagavā”ti vuccatīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:547_14: Garutākāraṇadassanañhetaṃ padattayaṃ. “Sippādisikkhāpakāpi garūyeva nāma honti, na
tika-s0104t:547_15: ca gāravayuttā, ayaṃ pana tādiso na hoti, tasmā garūti katvā ‘gāravayutto’ti vutta”nti
tika-s0104t:547_16: keci. Evaṃ sati tadetaṃ visesanapadamattaṃ, purimapadadvayameva kāraṇadassanaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t:548: Apicāti atthantaravikappatthe nipāto, aparo nayoti attho. Tattha –
tika-s0104t:553_3: āha “bhāgyavā”ti. Tathā anekabhedabhinnakilesasatasahassāni, saṅkhepato vā pañcamāre
tika-s0104t:553_5: Loke ca bhaga-saddo issariyadhammayasasirīkāmapayattesu chasu dhammesu pavattati,
tika-s0104t:553_6: te ca bhagasaṅkhātā dhammā assa santīti bhagavāti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yutto bhagehi
tika-s0104t:553_7: cā”ti vuttaṃ. Kusalādīhi anekabhedehi sabbadhamme vibhaji vibhajitvā vivaritvā desesīti
tika-s0104t:553_9: kāyacittaupadhiviveke, suññatānimittāppaṇihitavimokkhe, aññe ca lokiyalokuttare uttarimanussadhamme
tika-s0104t:553_10: bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti “bhattavā”ti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vuttanti dasseti “bhattavā”ti
tika-s0104t:553_11: iminā. Tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanamanena vantaṃ vamitanti “bhavesu vantagamano”ti
tika-s0104t:553_12: vattabbe bhavasaddato bha-kāraṃ gamanasaddato ga-kāraṃ vantasaddato va-kāraṃ ādāya,
tika-s0104t:553_13: tassa ca dīghaṃ katvā vaṇṇavipariyāyena “bhagavā”ti vuttanti dassetuṃ “vantagamano
tika-s0104t:553_14: bhavesū”ti vuttaṃ. “Yato bhāgyavā, tato bhagavā”tiādinā paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Assa
tika-s0104t:553_15: padassāti “bhagavā”ti padassa. Vitthāratthoti vitthārabhūto attho. “So cā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:553_16: ganthamahattaṃ pariharati. Vuttoyeva, na pana idha pana vattabbo visuddhimaggassa
tika-s0104t:554_0: Apica bhage vani, vamīti vā bhagavā. So hi bhage sīlādiguṇe vani bhaji sevi, te vā
tika-s0104t:554_1: bhagasaṅkhāte sīlādiguṇe vineyyasantānesu “kathaṃ nu kho uppajjeyyu”nti vani yāci
tika-s0104t:554_2: patthayi, evaṃ bhage vanīti bhagavā, bhage vā siriṃ, issariyaṃ, yasañca vami kheḷapiṇḍaṃ
tika-s0104t:554_3: viya chaḍḍayi. Tathā hi bhagavā hatthagataṃ cakkavattisiriṃ, catudīpissariyaṃ, cakkavattisampattisannissayañca
tika-s0104t:554_4: sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasaṃ anapekkho chaḍḍayi. Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi
tika-s0104t:554_5: samaṃ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā ākārassa rassaṃ katvā, sineruyugandharādigatā
tika-s0104t:554_6: bhājanalokasobhā. Tā bhagā vami tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahi, evaṃ bhage
tika-s0104t:554_7: vamīti bhagavāti evamādīhi tattha tatthāgatanayehi cassa attho vattabbo, amhehi pana
tika-s0104t:555_0: Evametesaṃ avayavatthaṃ dassetvā idāni samudāyatthaṃ dassento purimapadattayassa
tika-s0104t:555_1: samudāyatthena vuttāvasesena tesamatthānaṃ paṭiyogitāya tenāpi saha dassetuṃ “ettāvatā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:555_2: Ettāvatāti etassa “evaṃ me suta”nti vacanena “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā” tivacanenāti
tika-s0104t:555_3: imehi sambandho. Etthāti etasmiṃ nidānavacane. Yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ desentoti ettha
tika-s0104t:555_4: anta-saddo hetuattho. Tathādesitattā hi paccakkhaṃ karoti nāma. Esa nayo aparatthāpi.
tika-s0104t:555_5: “Yo kho ānanda, mayā dhammo ca…pe… satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo
tika-s0104t:555_6: vijjatevāti katvā “dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karotī”ti vuttaṃ. Dhammakāyanti hi bhagavato
tika-s0104t:555_7: sambandhībhūtaṃ dhammasaṅkhātaṃ kāyanti attho. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “dhammakāyoti bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:555_8: tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Taṃ pana kimatthiyanti āha “tenā”tiādi. Tenāti ca
tika-s0104t:555_9: tādisena paccakkhakaraṇenāti attho. Idaṃ adhunā vakkhamānasuttaṃ pāvacanaṃ pakaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0104t:555_10: uttamaṃ buddhassa bhagavato vacanaṃ nāma. Tasmā tumhākaṃ atikkantasatthukaṃ atītasatthukabhāvo
tika-s0104t:555_11: na hotīti attho. Bhāvappadhāno hi ayaṃ niddeso, bhāvalopo vā, itarathā pāvacanameva
tika-s0104t:555_12: anatikkantasatthukaṃ, satthuadassanena pana ukkaṇṭhitassa janassa atikkantasatthukabhāvoti
tika-s0104t:555_13: attho āpajjeyya, evañca sati “ayaṃ vo satthāti satthuadassanena ukkaṇṭhitaṃ janaṃ
tika-s0104t:555_14: samassāsetī” tivacanena saha virodho bhaveyyāti vadanti. Idaṃ pāvacanaṃ satthukiccanipphādanena
tika-s0104t:555_15: na atītasatthukanti pana attho. Satthūti kammatthe chaṭṭhī, samāsapadaṃ vā etaṃ satthuadassanenāti.
tika-s0104t:555_16: Ukkaṇṭhanaṃ ukkaṇṭho, kicchajīvitā. “Kaṭha kicchajīvane”ti hi vadanti. Tamito pattoti
tika-s0104t:555_17: ukkaṇṭhito, anabhiratiyā vā pīḷito vikkhittacitto hutvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā uddhaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ
tika-s0104t:555_18: katvā ito cito ca olokento āhiṇḍati, viharati cāti ukkaṇṭhito niruttinayena, taṃ
tika-s0104t:555_19: ukkaṇṭhitaṃ. Saddasāmatthiyādhigatamatto cesa, vohārato pana anabhiratiyā pīḷitanti
tika-s0104t:555_20: attho. Esa nayo sabbattha. Samassāsetīti assāsaṃ janeti.
tika-s0104t:556_0: Tasmiṃ samayeti imassa suttassa saṅgītisamaye. Kāmaṃ vijjamānepi bhagavati evaṃ vattumarahati,
tika-s0104t:556_1: idha pana avijjamāneyeva tasmiṃ evaṃ vadati, tasmā sandhāyabhāsitavasena tadatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:556_3: khandhaparinibbānaṃ. Tenāti tathāsādhanena. Evaṃvidhassāti evaṃpakārassa, evaṃsabhāvassātipi
tika-s0104t:556_4: attho. Nāma-saddo garahāyaṃ nipāto “atthi nāma ānanda theraṃ bhikkhuṃ vihesiyamānaṃ
tika-s0104t:556_5: ajjhupekkhissathā”tiādīsu viya, tena ediso api bhagavā parinibbuto, kā nāma kathā
tika-s0104t:556_6: aññesanti garahatthaṃ joteti. Ariyadhammassāti ariyānaṃ dhammassa, ariyabhūtassa
tika-s0104t:556_7: vā dhammassa. Dasavidhassa kāyabalassa, ñāṇabalassa ca vasena dasabaladharo. Vajirassa
tika-s0104t:556_8: nāma maṇivisesassa saṅghāto samūho ekagghano, tena samāno kāyo yassāti tathā. Idaṃ
tika-s0104t:556_9: vuttaṃ hoti – yathā vajirasaṅghāto nāma na aññena maṇinā vā pāsāṇena vā bhejjo, api
tika-s0104t:556_10: tu soyeva aññaṃ maṇiṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā bhindati. Teneva vuttaṃ “vajirassa natthi koci
tika-s0104t:556_11: abhejjo maṇi vā pāsāṇo vā”ti, evaṃ bhagavāpi kenaci abhejjasarīro. Na hi bhagavato
tika-s0104t:556_12: rūpakāye kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ sakkāti. Nāmasaddassa garahājotakattā pi-saddo sampiṇḍanajotako
tika-s0104t:556_13: “na kevalaṃ bhagavāyeva, atha kho aññepī”ti. Ettha ca evaṃguṇasamannāgatattā aparinibbutasabhāvena
tika-s0104t:556_14: bhavituṃ yuttopi esa parinibbuto evāti pakaraṇānurūpamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “eva”ntiādi
tika-s0104t:556_15: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Āsā patthanā kena janetabbā, na janetabbā evāti attho. “Ahaṃ
tika-s0104t:556_16: ciraṃ jīviṃ, ciraṃ jīvāmi, ciraṃ jīvissāmi, sukhaṃ jīviṃ, sukhaṃ jīvāmi, sukhaṃ jīvissāmī”ti
tika-s0104t:556_17: majjanavasena uppanno māno jīvitamado nāma, tena matto pamatto tathā. Saṃvejetīti
tika-s0104t:556_18: saṃvegaṃ janeti, tatoyeva assa janassa saddhamme ussāhaṃ janeti. Saṃvejanañhi ussāhahetu
tika-s0104t:557_0: Desanāsampattiṃ niddisati vakkhamānassa sakalasuttassa “eva”nti nidassanato. Sāvakasampattinti
tika-s0104t:557_1: suṇantapuggalasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāppattena pañcasu ṭhānesu bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:557_2: etadagge ṭhapitena, pañcasu ca kosallesu āyasmatā dhammasenāpatinā pasaṃsitena mayā
tika-s0104t:557_3: mahāsāvakena sutaṃ, tañca kho sayameva sutaṃ na anussutaṃ, na ca paramparābhatanti
tika-s0104t:557_4: atthassa dīpanato. Kālasampattiṃ niddisati bhagavātisadasannidhāne payuttassa samayasaddassa
tika-s0104t:560_1: sakarājasammate vassādisamūhe jāto buddhuppādakhaṇasaṅkhāto dinasamūho andhassa pabbatārohanamiva
tika-s0104t:560_2: kadāci pavattanaṭṭhena, accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttaṭṭhena ca mahacchariyaṃ hoti. Kimiva
tika-s0104t:560_3: jātanti ce? Hutavahasaṅkhātassa pāvakassa majjhe sammā uditamadhumantaṃ aravindasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0104t:561_0: Evaṃ padachakkassa padānukkamena nānappakārato atthavaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni “antarā
tika-s0104t:561_1: ca rājagaha”ntiādīnaṃ padānamatthavaṇṇanaṃ karonto “antarā cā”tiādimāha. Antarā ca
tika-s0104t:561_2: rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti ettha samabhiniviṭṭho antarā-saddo dissati sāmaññavacanīyatthamapekkhitvā
tika-s0104t:561_3: pakaraṇādisāmatthiyādigatatthamantarenāti attho. Evaṃ panassa nānatthabhāvo payogato
tika-s0104t:561_4: avagamīyatīti dasseti “tadantara”ntiādinā. Tattha tadantaranti taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Mañca
tika-s0104t:561_5: tañca mantenti, kimantaraṃ kiṃ kāraṇanti attho. Vijjantarikāyāti vijjuniccharaṇakkhaṇe.
tika-s0104t:561_6: Dhovantī itthī addasāti sambandho. Antaratoti hadaye. Kopāti cittakālussiyakaraṇato
tika-s0104t:561_7: cittapakopā rāgādayo. Antarā vosānanti ārambhanipphattīnaṃ vemajjhe pariyosānaṃ āpādi.
tika-s0104t:561_8: Apicāti tathāpi, evaṃ pabhavasampannepīti attho. Dvinnaṃ mahānirayānanti lohakumbhīniraye
tika-s0104t:561_9: sandhāyāha. Antarikāyāti antarena. Rājagahanagaraṃ kira āvijjhitvā mahāpetaloko.
tika-s0104t:561_10: Tattha dvinnaṃ mahālohakumbhīnirayānaṃ antarena ayaṃ tapodā nadī āgacchati, tasmā
tika-s0104t:561_11: sā kuthitā sandatīti. Svāyamidha vivare pavattati tadaññesamasambhavato. Ettha ca
tika-s0104t:561_12: “tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya, etesaṃ antarā kappā, gaṇanāto asaṅkhiyā, antarantarā kathaṃ
tika-s0104t:561_13: opātetī”tiādīsu viya kāraṇavemajjhesu vattamānā antarāsaddāyeva udāharitabbā siyuṃ,
tika-s0104t:561_14: na pana cittakhaṇavivaresu vattamānā antarikaantarasaddā. Antarāsaddassa hi ayamatthuddhāroti.
tika-s0104t:561_15: Ayaṃ panetthādhippāyo siyā – yesu atthesu antarikasaddo, antarasaddo ca pavattati,
tika-s0104t:561_16: tesu antarāsaddopīti samānatthattā antarāsaddatthe vattamāno antarikasaddo, antarasaddo,
tika-s0104t:561_17: ca udāhaṭoti. Atha vā antarāsaddoyeva “yassantarato”ti ettha gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:566_0: Hi ayaṃ udāne bhaddiyasutte gāthā. Soyeva ika-saddena sakatthapavattena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
tika-s0104t:566_1: “antarikāyā”ti ca vutto, tasmā udāharaṇodāharitabbānamettha virodhābhāvo veditabboti.
tika-s0104t:566_2: Kimatthaṃ atthavisesaniyamo katoti āha “tasmā”tiādi. Nanu cettha upayogavacanameva,
tika-s0104t:566_3: atha kasmā sambandhīyattho vutto, sambandhīyatthe vā kasmā upayogavacanaṃ katanti
tika-s0104t:566_4: anuyogasambhavato taṃ pariharituṃ “antarāsaddena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ, tena sambandhīyatthe
tika-s0104t:566_5: sāmivacanappasaṅge saddantarayogena laddhamidaṃ upayogavacananti dasseti, na kevalaṃ
tika-s0104t:566_6: sāsaneva, lokepi evamevidaṃ laddhanti dassento “īdisesu cā”tiādimāha. Visesayogatādassanamukhena
tika-s0104t:566_7: hi ayamatthopi dassito. Ekenapi antarā-saddena yuttattā dve upayogavacanāni kātabbāni.
tika-s0104t:566_8: Dvīhi pana yoge kā kathāti atthassa sijjhanato. Akkharaṃ cintenti liṅgavibhattiyādīhīti
tika-s0104t:566_9: akkharacintakā, saddavidū. Akkhara-saddena cettha tammūlakāni padādīnipi gahetabbāni.
tika-s0104t:566_10: Yadipi saddato ekameva yujjanti, atthato pana so dvikkhattuṃ yojetabbo ekassāpi padassa
tika-s0104t:566_11: āvuttiyādinayena anekadhā sampajjanatoti dasseti “dutiyapadenapī”tiādinā. Ko pana
tika-s0104t:566_12: doso ayojiteti āha “ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti. Dutiyapadaṃ na pāpuṇātīti
tika-s0104t:566_13: attho saddantarayogavasā saddeyeva sāmivacanappasaṅge upayogavibhattiyā icchitattā.
tika-s0104t:567_0: Addhāna-saddo dīghapariyāyoti āha “dīghamagga”nti. Kittāvatā pana so dīgho nāma tadatthabhūtoti
tika-s0104t:567_3: Aḍḍhayojanampi addhānamaggo, pageva taduttari. Aḍḍhameva yojanassa aḍḍhayojanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:567_4: dvigāvutamattaṃ. Idha pana catugāvutappamāṇaṃ yojanameva, tasmā “addhānamaggapaṭipanno”ti vadatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:568_0: Mahantasaddo uttamattho, bahvattho ca idhādhippetoti āha “mahatā”tiādi. Guṇamahattenāti
tika-s0104t:568_2: samattheti “so hī”tiādinā. So bhikkhusaṅghoti idha āgato tadā parivārabhūto bhikkhusaṅgho.
tika-s0104t:568_3: Mahāti uttamo. Vākyepi hi tamicchanti payogavasā. Appicchatāti nillobhatā saddo cettha
tika-s0104t:568_4: sāvaseso, attho pana niravaseso. Na hi “appalobhatāti abhitthavitumarahatī”ti aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-s0104t:568_5: vuttaṃ. Majjhimāgamaṭīkākāro pana ācariyadhammapālatthero evamāha “appasaddassa parittapariyāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:568_6: manasi katvā ‘byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ viyā’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Appasaddo panettha
tika-s0104t:568_8: mahāti gaṇanāyapi bahu ahosi, “bhikkhusaṅgho”ti padāvatthikantavacanavasena saṃvaṇṇetabbapadassa
tika-s0104t:568_9: chedanamiva hotīti tadaparāmasitvā “tena bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti puna vākyāvatthikantavacanavasena
tika-s0104t:568_10: saṃvaṇṇetabbapadena sadisīkaraṇaṃ. Esā hi saṃvaṇṇanakānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ vibhattiyānapekkhāvasena
tika-s0104t:568_11: yathārahaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbapadatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā puna tattha vijjamānavibhattivasena
tika-s0104t:568_12: parivattetvā nikkhipananti. Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatattā saṅghoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento
tika-s0104t:568_13: āha “diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghātena samaṇagaṇenā”ti. Ettha pana “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā
tika-s0104t:568_14: niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato
tika-s0104t:568_15: viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā. “Yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni
tika-s0104t:568_16: akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpesu
tika-s0104t:568_17: sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttānañca sīlānaṃ sāmaññena saṅghāto saṅghaṭito
tika-s0104t:568_18: sametoti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghāto, samaṇagaṇo, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:568_19: hoti. “Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghāṭasaṅkhātenā” tipi pāṭho. Tathā saṅkhātena katitenāti
tika-s0104t:568_20: attho. Tathā hi diṭṭhisīlādīnaṃ niyatasabhāvattā sotāpannāpi aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena
tika-s0104t:568_21: saṃhatā, pageva sakadāgāmiādayo, tathā ca vuttaṃ “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti, “aṭṭhānametaṃ
tika-s0104t:568_22: bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañciccapāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-s0104t:568_23: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti ca ādi. Ariyapuggalassa hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano
tika-s0104t:568_24: guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatatāyeva, “tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati, tathārūpesu
tika-s0104t:568_25: sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti vacanato pana puthujjanānampi diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena
tika-s0104t:568_26: saṃhatabhāvo labbhatiyeva. Saddhiṃ-saddo ekatoti atthe nipāto. Pañca…pe… mattānīti
tika-s0104t:568_27: pañca-saddena mattasaddaṃ saṅkhipitvā bāhiratthasamāso vutto. Etesanti bhikkhusatānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:568_28: Puna pañca mattā pamāṇāti byāso, nikāralopo cettha napuṃsakaliṅgattā.
tika-s0104t:569_0: Suppiyoti tassa nāmameva, na guṇādi. Na kevalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ bhagavāyeva,
tika-s0104t:569_1: atha kho suppiyopi paribbājako brahmadattena māṇavena saddhinti puggalaṃ sampiṇḍeti,
tika-s0104t:569_2: tañca kho maggapaṭipannasabhāgatāya eva, na sīlācārādisabhāgatāyāti vuttaṃ “pi-kāro”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:569_4: vuttaṃ, na pana sarabyañjanādisandhibhāvaṃ, tenāha “byañjanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vutto”ti,
tika-s0104t:569_5: etena padapūraṇamattanti dasseti. Apica avadhāraṇatthopi kho-saddo yutto “assosi
tika-s0104t:569_6: kho verañjo brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu viya, tena addhānamaggapaṭipanno ahosiyeva, nāssa maggapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0104t:569_7: koci antarāyo ahosīti ayamattho dīpito hoti. Sañjayassāti rājagahavāsino sañjayanāmassa
tika-s0104t:569_8: paribbājakassa, yassa santike paṭhamaṃ upatissakolitāpi pabbajiṃsu channaparibbājakova,
tika-s0104t:569_9: na acelakaparibbājako. “Yadā, tadā”ti ca etena samakālameva addhānamaggapaṭipannataṃ
tika-s0104t:569_10: dasseti. Atītakālattho pāḷiyaṃ hotisaddo yogavibhāgena, taṃkālāpekkhāya vā evaṃ vuttaṃ, tadā hotīti attho.
tika-s0104t:570_1: avacaratīti vuttaṃ hoti, tenevāha “samīpacāro santikāvacaro sisso”ti. Coditā devadūtehīti
tika-s0104t:570_2: daharakumāro jarājiṇṇasatto gilāno kammakāraṇā, kammakāraṇikā vā matasattoti imehi
tika-s0104t:570_3: pañcahi devadūtehi coditā ovaditā saṃvegaṃ uppāditā samānāpi. Te hi devā viya dūtā,
tika-s0104t:570_4: visuddhidevānaṃ vā dūtāti devadūtā. Hīnakāyūpagāti apāyakāyamupagatā. Narasaṅkhātā
tika-s0104t:570_5: te māṇavāti sambandho. Sāmaññavasena cettha satto “māṇavo”ti vutto, itare pana visesavasena.
tika-s0104t:570_6: Pakaraṇādhigato hesa atthuddhāroti. Katakammehīti katacorakammehi. Taruṇoti soḷasavassato
tika-s0104t:570_7: paṭṭhāya pattavīsativasso, udānaṭṭhakathāyañhi “sattā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva
tika-s0104t:570_8: pañcadasavassakā, tāva ‘kumārakā, bālā’ti ca vuccanti. Tato paraṃ vīsativassāni ‘yuvāno”’ti
tika-s0104t:570_9: vuttaṃ. Taruṇo, māṇavo, yuvāti ca atthato ekaṃ, lokiyā pana “dvādasavassato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0104t:571_0: Tesu vā dvīsu janesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Yo vā “ekaṃ samaya”nti pubbe adhigato
tika-s0104t:571_1: kālo, tassa paṭiniddeso tatrāti yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā antarā rājagahañca nāḷandañca
tika-s0104t:571_2: addhānamaggapaṭipanno, tasmiṃyeva samaye suppiyopi taṃ addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno avaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:571_3: bhāsati, brahmadatto ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti. Nipātamattanti ettha mattasaddena visesatthābhāvato
tika-s0104t:571_4: padapūraṇattaṃ dasseti. Madhupiṇḍikapariyāyoti madhupiṇḍikadesanā nāma iti naṃ suttantaṃ
tika-s0104t:571_5: dhārehi, rājaññāti pāyāsirājaññanāmakaṃ rājānamālapati. Pariyāyati parivattatīti
tika-s0104t:571_6: pariyāyo, vāro. Pariyāyeti desetabbamatthaṃ paṭipādetīti pariyāyo, desanā. Pariyāyati
tika-s0104t:571_7: attano phalaṃ paṭiggahetvā pavattatīti pariyāyo, kāraṇaṃ. Anekasaddeneva anekavidhenāti
tika-s0104t:571_8: attho viññāyati adhippāyamattenāti āha “anekavidhenā”ti. Kāraṇañcettha kāraṇapatirūpakameva,
tika-s0104t:571_9: na ekaṃsakāraṇaṃ avaṇṇakāraṇassa abhūtattā, tasmā kāraṇenāti kāraṇapatirūpakenāti
tika-s0104t:571_10: attho. Tathā hi vakkhati “akāraṇameva ‘kāraṇa’nti vatvā”ti. Jātivasenidaṃ bahvatthe
tika-s0104t:572_1: vuttaṃ, dosavirahitassapi asadisaguṇasamannāgatassāpīti attho. Buddhassa bhagavato
tika-s0104t:572_3: kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ dasseti. Tasmāti hi etaṃ “arasarūpo…pe… apagabbho”ti imehi padehi
tika-s0104t:572_5: sāmaggīraso samaṇassa gotamassa natthi, tasmā so sāmaggīrasasaṅkhātena rasena asampannasabhāvo,
tika-s0104t:572_6: tena sāmaggīrasasaṅkhātena paribhogena asamannāgato. Tassa akattabbatāvādo, ucchijjitabbatāvādo
tika-s0104t:572_7: ca, taṃ sabbaṃ gūthaṃ viya maṇḍanajātiyo puriso jegucchī. Tassa vināsako sova tadakaraṇato
tika-s0104t:572_8: vinetabbo. Tadakaraṇena vayovuḍḍhe tāpeti tadācāravirahitatāya vā kapaṇapuriso. Tadakaraṇena
tika-s0104t:572_9: devalokagabbhato apagato, tadakaraṇato vā so hīnagabbho cāti evaṃ tadeva abhivādanādiakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:572_10: arasarūpatādīnaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Natthi…pe… viseso”ti etassa pana
tika-s0104t:572_11: “sundarikāya nāma paribbājikāya maraṇānavabodho, saṃsārassa ādikoṭiyā apaññāyanapaṭiññā,
tika-s0104t:572_14: paṭivedhena tattha tattha tathā tathā dhammadesanā, katthaci paresaṃ paṭipucchākathanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:572_15: mahāmoggallānādīhi ārocitanayeneva byākaraṇa”nti evamādīni, “samaṇo…pe… na aggapuggalo”ti
tika-s0104t:572_16: etesaṃ pana “sabbadhammānaṃ kameneva anavabodho, lokantassa ajānanaṃ, attanā icchitatapacārābhāvo”ti
tika-s0104t:572_17: evamādīni. Jhānavimokkhādi heṭṭhā vuttanayena uttarimanussadhammo. Ariyaṃ visuddhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:572_18: uttamaṃ vā ñāṇasaṅkhātaṃ dassanaṃ, alaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ ariyañāṇadassanaṃ
tika-s0104t:572_19: ettha, etassāti vā alamariyañāṇadassano. Sveva viseso tathā. Ariyañāṇadassanameva
tika-s0104t:572_20: vā visesaṃ vuttanayena alaṃ pariyattaṃ yassa, yasminti vā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso,
tika-s0104t:572_21: uttarimanussadhammova. Takkapariyāhatanti kappanāmattena samantato āharitaṃ, vitakkena
tika-s0104t:572_22: vā parighaṭitaṃ. Vīmaṃsānucaritanti vīmaṃsanāya punappunaṃ parimajjitaṃ. Sayampaṭibhānanti
tika-s0104t:572_23: sayameva attano vibhūtaṃ, tādisaṃ dhammanti sambandho. Akāraṇanti ayuttaṃ anupapattiṃ.
tika-s0104t:572_24: Kāraṇapade cetaṃ visesanaṃ. Na hi arasarūpatādayo dosā bhagavati saṃvijjanti, dhammasaṅghesu
tika-s0104t:572_25: ca durakkhātaduppaṭipannādayo akāraṇanti vā yuttikāraṇarahitaṃ attanā paṭiññāmattaṃ.
tika-s0104t:572_26: Pakatikammapadañcetaṃ. Imasmiñca atthe kāraṇaṃ vatvāti ettha kāraṇaṃ ivāti iva-saddattho
tika-s0104t:572_27: rūpakanayena yojetabbo patirūpakakāraṇassa adhippetattā. Tathā tathāti jātivuḍḍhānamanabhivādanādinā
tika-s0104t:572_28: tena tena ākārena. Vaṇṇasaddassa guṇapasaṃsāsu pavattanato yathākkamaṃ “avaṇṇaṃ dosaṃ ninda”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:573_0: Durakkhātoti duṭṭhumākkhāto, tathā duppaṭivedito. Vaṭṭato niyyātīti niyyānaṃ, tadeva
tika-s0104t:573_1: niyyāniko, tato vā niyyānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, tattha niyuttoti niyyāniko. Vaṭṭato vā niyyātīti
tika-s0104t:573_2: niyyāniko ya-kārassa ka-kāraṃ, ī-kārassa ca rassaṃ katvā. “Anīya-saddo hi bahulā
tika-s0104t:573_3: kattuabhidhāyako”ti saddavidū vadanti, na niyyāniko tathā. Saṃsāradukkhassa anupasamasaṃvattaniko
tika-s0104t:573_6: Kasmā panettha “avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti ca vattamānakālaniddeso kato,
tika-s0104t:573_7: nanu saṅgītikālato so avaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ bhāsanakālo atītoti? Saccametaṃ, “addhānamaggapaṭipanno
tika-s0104t:573_8: hotī”ti ettha hoti-saddo viya atītakālatthattā pana bhāsati-saddassa evaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0104t:573_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā yasmiṃ kāle tehi avaṇṇo vaṇṇo ca bhāsīyati, tamapekkhitvā evaṃ
tika-s0104t:573_10: vuttaṃ, evañca katvā “tatrā”ti padassa kālapaṭiniddesavikappanaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttampi supapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:574_1: Aparāmasitabbaṃ ariyūpavādakammaṃ, tathā anakkamitabbaṃ. Svāyanti so ācariyo. Asidhāranti
tika-s0104t:574_2: asinā tikhiṇabhāgaṃ. Kakacadanta pantiyanti khandhakakacassa dantasaṅkhātāya visamapantiyā.
tika-s0104t:574_3: Hatthena vā pādena vā yena kenaci vā aṅgapaccaṅgena paharitvā kīḷamāno viya. Akkhikaṇṇakosasaṅkhātaṭṭhānavasena
tika-s0104t:574_4: tīhi pakārehi bhinno mado yassāti pabhinnamado, taṃ. Avaṇṇaṃ bhāsamānoti avaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:574_5: bhāsanahetu. Hetuattho hi ayaṃ māna-saddo. Na ayo vuḍḍhi anayo. Soyeva byasanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:574_6: atirekabyasananti attho, taṃ pāpuṇissati ekantamahāsāvajjattā ratanattayopavādassa. Tenevāha –
tika-s0104t:579_0: “Amhākaṃ ācariyo”tiādinā brahmadattassa saṃveguppattiṃ, attano ācariye ca kāruññappavattiṃ
tika-s0104t:579_1: dassetvā kiñcāpi antevāsinā ācariyassa anukūlena bhavitabbaṃ, ayaṃ pana paṇḍitajātikattā
tika-s0104t:579_2: na īdisesu ṭhānesu tamanuvattatīti idānissa kammassakatāñāṇappavattiṃ dassento “ācariye
tika-s0104t:579_3: kho panā”tiādimāha. Halāhalanti taṅkhaṇaññeva māraṇakaṃ visaṃ. Hanatīti hi halo na-kārassa
tika-s0104t:579_4: la-kāraṃ katvā, halānampi viseso halo halāhalo majjhedīghavasena, etena ca aññe aṭṭhavidhe
tika-s0104t:582: Dārado vacchanābho ca, visabhedā ime navā”ti.
tika-s0104t:583_0: Kharodakanti caṇḍasotodakaṃ. “Khārodaka”ntipi pāṭho, atiloṇatāya tittodakanti attho.
tika-s0104t:583_1: Narakapapātanti corapapātaṃ. Māṇavakāti attānameva ovadituṃ ālapati “samayopi kho
tika-s0104t:583_2: te bhaddāli appaṭividdhoahosī”tiādīsu viya. “Kammassakā”ti kammameva attasantakabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:583_3: vatvā tadeva vivarati “attano kammānurūpameva gatiṃ gacchantī”tiādinā. Yonisoti upāyena
tika-s0104t:583_4: ñāyena. Ummujjitvāti ācariyo viya ayoniso ariyūpavāde animmujjanto yoniso ariyūpavādato
tika-s0104t:583_5: ummujjitvā, uddhaṃ hutvāti attho. Maddamānoti maddanto bhindanto. Ekaṃsakāraṇameva
tika-s0104t:583_6: idha kāraṇanti dassetukāmena “sammā”ti vuttaṃ. “Yathā ta”ntiādinā tassa samāraddhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:583_7: dasseti, nti ca nipātamattaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā añño paṇḍitasabhāvo jāti ācāravasena
tika-s0104t:583_8: kulaputto anekapariyāyena tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitumārabhati, tathā ayampi
tika-s0104t:583_9: āraddho, tañca kho api nāmāyamācariyo ettakenāpi ratanattayāvaṇṇabhāsato orameyyāti.
tika-s0104t:584_1: vā. Vārijaṃ kamalaṃ na paharāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā dūratova upasiṅghāmīti attho. Athāti
tika-s0104t:584_2: evaṃ santepi. Gandhatthenoti gandhacoro. Saññūḷhāti ganthitā bandhitā. Gahapatīti
tika-s0104t:584_3: upāligahapatiṃ nāṭaputtassa ālapanaṃ. Ettha ca vaṇṇitabbo “ayamīdiso”ti pakāsetabboti
tika-s0104t:584_4: vaṇṇo, saṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇṇīyati asaṅkarato vavatthāpīyatīti vaṇṇo, jāti. Vaṇṇeti vikāramāpajjamānaṃ
tika-s0104t:584_5: hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti vaṇṇo, rūpāyatanaṃ. Vaṇṇīyati phalametena yathāsabhāvato
tika-s0104t:584_6: vibhāvīyatīti vaṇṇo, kāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇīyati appamahantādivasena pamīyatīti vaṇṇo, pamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:584_7: Vaṇṇīyati pasaṃsīyatīti vaṇṇo, guṇo. Vaṇṇanaṃ guṇasaṃkittanaṃ vaṇṇo, pasaṃsā. Evaṃ
tika-s0104t:584_8: tattha tattha vaṇṇasaddassuppatti veditabbā. Ādisaddena jātarūpapuḷinakkharādayo
tika-s0104t:584_9: saṅgaṇhāti. “Idha guṇopi pasaṃsāpī”ti vuttameva samattheti “ayaṃ kirā”tiādinā. Kirāti
tika-s0104t:584_10: cettha anussavanatthe, padapūraṇamatte vā. Guṇūpasañhitanti guṇopasaññutaṃ. “Guṇūpasañhitaṃ
tika-s0104t:584_11: pasaṃsa”nti pana vadanto pasaṃsāya eva guṇabhāsanaṃ siddhaṃ tassā tadavinābhāvato,
tika-s0104t:585_0: Kathaṃ bhāsatīti āha “tatthā”tiādi. Eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo. Kenaṭṭhena
tika-s0104t:585_1: ekapuggalo? Asadisaṭṭhena, guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena, asamasamaṭṭhena ca. So hi paṭhamābhinīhārakāle
tika-s0104t:585_2: dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ paṭipāṭiyā āvajjanaṃ ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhārasambharaṇaguṇehi
tika-s0104t:585_3: ceva buddhaguṇehi ca sesamahājanena asadiso. Ye cassa guṇā, tepi aññasattānaṃ guṇehi
tika-s0104t:585_4: visiṭṭhā, purimakā ca sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi asamā, tehi pana ayameveko rūpakāyanāmakāyehi
tika-s0104t:585_5: samo. Loketi sattaloke. “Uppajjamāno uppajjatī”ti pana idaṃ ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva
tika-s0104t:585_6: uppādakiriyāya vattamānakālikattā. Uppajjamāno bahujanahitāya uppajjati, na aññena
tika-s0104t:585_7: kāraṇenāti evaṃ panettha attho veditabbo. Lakkhaṇe hesa māna-saddo, evarūpañcettha
tika-s0104t:585_8: lakkhaṇaṃ na sakkā aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṃ. Apica uppajjamāno nāma, uppajjati
tika-s0104t:585_9: nāma, uppanno nāmāti ayamettha bhedo veditabbo. Esa hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0104t:585_10: yāva anāgāmiphalaṃ, tāva uppajjamāno nāma, arahattamaggakkhaṇe uppajjati nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe
tika-s0104t:585_11: uppanno nāma. Buddhānañhi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni uppajjanti,
tika-s0104t:585_12: saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññuguṇarāsi āgatova nāma hoti, tasmā nibbattasabbakiccattā
tika-s0104t:585_13: arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāma, tadanibbattattā tadaññakkhaṇe yathārahaṃ “uppajjamāno
tika-s0104t:585_14: uppajjati” cceva vuccati. Imasmimpi sutte arahattaphalakkhaṇaṃyeva sandhāya “uppajjatī”ti
tika-s0104t:585_15: vuttaṃ. Atītakālikassāpi vattamānapayogassa katthaci diṭṭhattā uppanno hotīti ayañhettha
tika-s0104t:585_16: attho. Evaṃ sati “uppajjamāno”ti cettha māna-saddo sāmatthiyattho. Yāvatā sāmatthiyena
tika-s0104t:585_17: mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave uppatti icchitabbā, tāvatā sāmatthiyena bodhisambhārabhūtena
tika-s0104t:585_18: paripuṇṇena samannāgato hutvāti attho. Tathāsāmatthiyayogena hi uppajjamāno nāmāti.
tika-s0104t:585_19: Sabbasattehi asamo, asamehi purimabuddheheva samo majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇa nikkhaṃ viya
tika-s0104t:585_20: nibbisiṭṭho, “ekapuggalo”ti cetassa visesanaṃ. Ālayasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ samugghāteti
tika-s0104t:586_0: Pahontenāti sakkontena. “Pañcanikāye”ti vatvāpi anekāvayavattā tesaṃ na ettakena
tika-s0104t:586_2: vuttaṃ. Atitthenāti anotaraṇaṭṭhānena. Na vattabbo aparimāṇavaṇṇattā buddhādīnaṃ,
tika-s0104t:586_3: niravasesānañca tesaṃ idha pakāsanena pāḷisaṃvaṇṇanāya eva sampajjanato, cittasampahaṃsanakammaṭṭhānasampajjanavasena
tika-s0104t:586_4: ca saphalattā. Thāmo veditabbo sabbathāmena pakāsitattā. Kiṃ pana so tathā ogāhetvā
tika-s0104t:586_5: bhāsatīti āha. “Brahmadatto panā”tiādi. Anukkamena punappunaṃ vā savanaṃ anussavo,
tika-s0104t:586_7: Tattha “sundaramidaṃ kāraṇa”nti evaṃ sayameva kāraṇaparivitakkanaṃ ākāraparivitakko.
tika-s0104t:586_8: Attano diṭṭhiyā nijjhāyitvā khamanaṃ ruccanaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantīti aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-s0104t:586_9: vuttaṃ, tehiyeva sambandhitenāti attho. Matta-saddo hettha visesanivattiattho, tena
tika-s0104t:586_10: yathāvuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ nivatteti. Attano thāmenāti attano ñāṇabaleneva, na pana buddhādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:586_11: guṇānurūpanti adhippāyo. Asaṅkhyeyyāparimeyyappabhedā hi buddhādīnaṃ guṇā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0104t:592_0: Iti-saddo nidassanattho vuttappakāraṃ nidasseti. Ha-kāro nipātamattanti āha “evaṃ
tika-s0104t:592_1: te”ti. Aññamaññassā”ti idaṃ ruḷhipadaṃ “eko ekāyā”ti padaṃ viyāti dassento “aññoaññassā”ti
tika-s0104t:592_2: ruḷhipadeneva vivarati. “Ujumevā”ti sāvadhāraṇasamāsataṃ vatvā tena nivattetabbatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:592_3: āha “īsakampi apariharitvā”ti, thokatarampi avirajjhitvāti attho. Kathanti āha “ācariyena
tika-s0104t:592_5: vuttattā anekavārameva te evaṃ bhāsantīti veditabbanti dassetuṃ “puna itaro avaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:592_6: itaro vaṇṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Tena hi visaddassa vividhatthataṃ samattheti. Sāraphalaketi
tika-s0104t:592_7: sāradāruphalake, uttamaphalake vā. Visarukkhaāṇinti visadārumayapaṭāṇiṃ. Iriyāpathānubandhanena
tika-s0104t:593_0: Sīsānulokinoti sīsena anulokino, sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā maggānukkamena olokayamānāti attho.
tika-s0104t:593_1: Tasmiṃ kāleti yamhi saṃvacchare, utumhi, māse, pakkhe vā bhagavā taṃ addhānamaggaṃ
tika-s0104t:593_2: paṭipanno, tasmiṃ kāle. Tena hi aniyamato saṃvaccharautumāsaḍḍhamāsāva niddisitā
tika-s0104t:593_3: “taṃ divasa”nti divasassa visuṃ niddiṭṭhattā, muhuttādīnañca divasapariyāpannato.
tika-s0104t:593_4: “Taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno”ti cettha ādhāravacanametaṃ. Teneva hi kiriyāvicchedadassanavasena
tika-s0104t:593_5: “rājagahe piṇḍāya caratī”ti saha pubbakālakiriyāhi vattamānaniddeso kato, itarathā
tika-s0104t:593_6: tasmiṃ kāle rājagahe piṇḍāya carati, taṃ addhānamaggañca paṭipannoti anadhippetattho
tika-s0104t:593_7: āpajjeyya. Na hi asamānavisayā kiriyā ekādhārā sambhavanti, yā cettha adhippetā addhānapaṭipajjanakiriyā,
tika-s0104t:593_8: sā ca aniyamitā na yuttāti. Rājagahaparivattakesūti rājagahaṃ parivattetvā ṭhitesu.
tika-s0104t:593_9: “Aññatarasmi”nti iminā tesu bhagavato anibaddhavāsaṃ dasseti. Soti evaṃ rājagahe
tika-s0104t:593_10: vasamāno so bhagavā. Piṇḍāya caraṇenapi hi tattha paṭibaddhabhāvavacanato sannivāsattameva
tika-s0104t:593_11: dasseti. Yadi pana “piṇḍāya caramāno so bhagavā”ti paccāmaseyya, yathāvuttova anadhippetattho
tika-s0104t:593_12: āpajjeyyāti. Taṃ divasanti yaṃ divasaṃ addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno, taṃ divasa. Taṃ addhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:593_13: paṭipannoti ettha accantasaṃyogavacanametaṃ. Bhattabhuñjanato pacchā pacchābhattaṃ,
tika-s0104t:593_14: tasmiṃ pacchābhattasamaye. Piṇḍapātapaṭikkantoti yattha piṇḍapātatthāya caritvā bhuñjanti,
tika-s0104t:593_15: tato apakkanto. Taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipannoti “nāḷandāyaṃ veneyyānaṃ vividhahitasukhanipphattiṃ
tika-s0104t:593_18: taṃ yathāvuttaṃ dīghamaggaṃ paṭipanno, idaṃ pana kāraṇaṃ pakaraṇatova pākaṭanti na
tika-s0104t:593_19: vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā “kasmā pana bhagavā taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno”ti codanā visodhitā hoti.
tika-s0104t:594_0: Idāni itarampi codanaṃ visodhituṃ “suppiyopī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ kāle, taṃ divasaṃ
tika-s0104t:594_1: anubandhoti ca vuttanayena sambandho. Pāto asitabboti pātarāso, so bhutto yenāti
tika-s0104t:594_2: bhuttapātarāso. Iccevāti evameva manasi sannidhāya, na pana “bhagavantaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghañca
tika-s0104t:594_3: piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhissāmī”ti. Tena vuttaṃ “bhagavato taṃ maggaṃ paṭipannabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:594_4: ajānantovā”ti, tathā ajānanto eva hutvā anubandhoti attho. Na hi so bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhumeva
tika-s0104t:594_5: icchati, tenāha “sace pana jāneyya, nānubandheyyā”ti. Ettāvatā “kasmā ca suppiyo
tika-s0104t:594_6: anubandho”ti codanā visodhitā hoti. “So”tiādinā aparampi codanaṃ visodheti. Kadāci
tika-s0104t:594_8: kadāci buddhasiriyā, idhāpi īdisāya buddhasiriyāti dassetuṃ “buddhasiriyā sobhamāna”ntiādi
tika-s0104t:594_9: vuttaṃ. Sirīti cettha sarīrasobhaggādisampatti, tadeva upamāvasena dasseti “rattakambalaparikkhittamivā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:594_10: Gacchatīti jaṅgamo yathā “caṅkamo”ti. Cañcalamāno gacchanto giri, tādisassa kanakagirino
tika-s0104t:595_0: “Tasmiṃ kirā”tiādi tabbivaraṇaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ adassitattā, porāṇaṭṭhakathāyañca anāgatattā
tika-s0104t:595_1: anussavasiddhā ayaṃ kathāti dassetuṃ “kirā”ti vuttanti vadanti, tathā vā hotu aññathā
tika-s0104t:595_2: vā, attanā adiṭṭhaṃ, asutaṃ, amutañca anussavamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhapabhassaravasena
tika-s0104t:595_3: chabbaṇṇā. Samantāti samantato dasahi disāhi. Asītihatthappamāṇeti tesaṃ rasmīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:595_4: pakatiyā pavattiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ, tasmā samantato, upari ca paccekaṃ asītihatthamatte
tika-s0104t:595_5: padese pakatiyāva ghanībhūtā rasmiyo tiṭṭhantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, vinayaṭīkāyaṃ pana “tāyeva
tika-s0104t:595_6: byāmappabhā nāma. Yato chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo taḷākato mātikā viya dasasu disāsu dhāvanti,
tika-s0104t:595_7: sā yasmā byāmamattā viya khāyati, tasmā byāmappabhāti vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ, saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:595_8: pana vakkhati “puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:595_9: gaṇhāti. Pacchimakāyato. Dakkhiṇahatthato. Vāmahatthato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā
tika-s0104t:595_10: asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti. Upari kesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvaṭṭehi moragīvavaṇṇā
tika-s0104t:595_11: rasmi uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti. Heṭṭhā pādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā
tika-s0104t:595_12: rasmi uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti. Evaṃ samantā asītihatthamattaṃ
tika-s0104t:595_13: ṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā vidhāvantī”ti keci pana
tika-s0104t:595_14: aññathāpi parikappanāmattena vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ tathā aññattha anāgatattā,
tika-s0104t:595_15: ayuttattā ca. Tāsaṃ pana buddharasmīnaṃ tadā aniggūhitabhāvadassanatthaṃ “tasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:595_16: kira samaye”ti vuttaṃ. Pakkusātiabhiggamanādīsu viya hi tadā tāsaṃ niggūhane kiñci
tika-s0104t:595_17: kāraṇaṃ natthi. Ādhāvantīti abhimukhaṃ disaṃ dhāvanti. Vidhāvantīti vividhā hutvā vidisaṃ dhāvanti.
tika-s0104t:596_0: Tasmiṃ vanantare dissamānākārena tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ sobhā viññāyatīti āha “ratanāveḷā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:596_1: Ratanāveḷā nāma ratanamayavaṭaṃsakaṃ muddhaṃ avati rakkhatīti hi aveḷā, āveḷā vā,
tika-s0104t:596_2: muddhamālā. Ukkā nāma yā sajotibhūtā, tāsaṃ sataṃ, nipatanaṃ nipāto, tassa nipāto,
tika-s0104t:596_3: tena samākulaṃ tathā. Pisitabbattā piṭṭhaṃ, cīnadese jātaṃ piṭṭhaṃ cīnapiṭṭhaṃ, rattacuṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:596_4: yaṃ “sindūro”tipi vuccati, cīnapiṭṭhameva cuṇṇaṃ. Vāyuno vegena ito cito ca khittaṃ
tika-s0104t:596_5: tanti tathā. Indassa dhanu lokasaṅketavasenāti indadhanu, sūriyarasmivasena gagane
tika-s0104t:596_6: paññāyamānākāraviseso. Kuṭilaṃ aciraṭṭhāyittā virūpaṃ hutvā javati dhāvatīti vijju,
tika-s0104t:596_7: sāyeva latā taṃsadisabhāvenāti tathā, vāyuvegato valāhakaghaṭṭaneneva jātarasmi.
tika-s0104t:596_8: Tāyati avijahanavasena ākāsaṃ pāletīti tārā, gaṇasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tassa
tika-s0104t:596_9: pabhā tathā. Vipphuritaviccharitamivāti ābhāya vividhaṃ pharamānaṃ, vijjotayamānaṃ
tika-s0104t:596_10: viya ca. Vanassa antaraṃ vivaraṃ vanantaraṃ, bhagavatā pattapattavanappadesanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:597_0: Asītiyā anubyañjanehi tambanakhatādīhi anurañjitaṃ tathā. Kamalaṃ padumapuṇḍarīkāni,
tika-s0104t:597_1: avasesaṃ nīlarattasetabhedaṃ saroruhaṃ uppalaṃ, iti pañcavidhā paṅkajajāti pariggahitā
tika-s0104t:597_2: hoti. Vikasitaṃ phullitaṃ tadubhayaṃ yassa sarassa tathā. Sabbena pakārena parito
tika-s0104t:597_3: samantato phullati vikasatīti sabbapāliphullaṃ a-kārassa ā-kāraṃ, ra-kārassa ca la-kāraṃ
tika-s0104t:597_4: katvā yathā “pālibhaddo”ti, tārānaṃ marīci pabhā, tāya vikasitaṃ vijjotitaṃ tathā.
tika-s0104t:597_5: Byāmappabhāya parikkhepo parimaṇḍalo, tena vilāsinī sobhinī tathā. Mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni
tika-s0104t:597_7: Dvattiṃsacandādīnaṃ mālā kenaci ganthetvā paṭipāṭiyā ca ṭhapitāti na vattabbā “yadi
tika-s0104t:600: Dvattiṃsacandamālāya siriṃ attano siriyā abhibhavantī ivāti sambandho. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0104t:601_0: Evaṃ bhagavato tadā sobhaṃ dassetvā idāni bhikkhusaṅghassāpi sobhaṃ dassento “tañca
tika-s0104t:601_1: panā”tiādimāha. Catubbidhāya appicchatāya appicchā. Dvādasahi santosehi santuṭṭhā.
tika-s0104t:601_2: Tividhena vivekena pavivittā. Rājarājamahāmattādīhi asaṃsaṭṭhā. Duppaṭipattikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:601_3: codakā. Pāpe akusale garahino paresaṃ hitapaṭipattiyā vattāro. Paresañca vacanakkhamā.
tika-s0104t:601_5: sobhaṃ dasseti. Rattapadumānaṃ saṇḍo samūho vanaṃ, tassa majjhe gatā tathā. “Rattaṃ
tika-s0104t:601_6: padumaṃ, setaṃ puṇḍarīka”nti pattaniyamamantarena tathā vuttaṃ, pattaniyamena pana
tika-s0104t:601_7: satapattaṃ padumaṃ, ūnakasatapattaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ. Pavāḷaṃ viddumo, tena katāya vedikāya
tika-s0104t:601_8: parikkhitto viya. Migapakkhīnampīti pi-saddo, api-saddo vā sambhāvanāyaṃ, tenāha
tika-s0104t:601_9: “pageva devamanussāna”nti. Mahātherāti mahāsāvake sandhāyāha. Surañjitabhāvena īsakaṃ
tika-s0104t:601_10: kaṇhavaṇṇatāya meghavaṇṇaṃ. Ekaṃsaṃ karitvāti ekaṃsapārupanavasena vāmaṃse karitvā.
tika-s0104t:601_11: Kattarassa jiṇṇassa ālambano daṇḍo kattaradaṇḍo, bāhullavasenāyaṃ samaññā. Suvammaṃ
tika-s0104t:601_12: nāma sobhaṇuracchado, tena vammitā sannaddhāti suvammavammitā, idaṃ tesaṃ paṃsukūladhāraṇanidassanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:601_13: Yesaṃ kucchigataṃ sabbampi tiṇapalāsādi gandhajātameva hoti, te gandhahatthino nāma,
tika-s0104t:601_14: ye “hemavatā”tipi vuccanti, tesampi therānaṃ sīlādiguṇagandhatāya taṃsadisatā. Antojaṭābahijaṭāsaṅkhātāya
tika-s0104t:601_15: taṇhājaṭāya vijaṭitabhāvato vijaṭitajaṭā. Taṇhābandhanāya chinnattā chinnabandhanā.
tika-s0104t:601_17: hi ekadesena bhagavatā paṭividdhapaṭibhāgeneva cattāri saccāni bujjhanti. Pattaparivāritanti
tika-s0104t:601_18: pupphadalena parivāritaṃ. Kaṃ vuccati kamalādi, tasmiṃ sarati virājatīti kesaraṃ,
tika-s0104t:601_19: kiñjakkho. Kaṇṇe karīyatīti kaṇṇikā. Kaṇṇālaṅkāro, taṃsadisaṇṭhānatāya kaṇṇikā, bījakoso.
tika-s0104t:601_20: Channaṃ haṃsakulānaṃ seṭṭho dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā viya, hārito nāma mahābrahmā viya.
tika-s0104t:602_0: Evaṃ gacchantaṃ bhagavantaṃ, bhikkhū ca disvā attano parisaṃ olokesīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:602_1: Kājadaṇḍaketi kājasaṅkhāte bhārāvahadaṇḍake, kājasmiṃ vā bhāralaggitadaṇḍake. Khuddakaṃ
tika-s0104t:602_2: pīṭhaṃ pīṭhakaṃ. Mūle, agge ca tidhā kato daṇḍo tidaṇḍo. Morahatthako morapiñchaṃ.
tika-s0104t:602_3: Khuddakaṃ pasibbaṃ pasibbakaṃ. Kuṇḍikā kamaṇḍalu. Sā hi kaṃ udakaṃ udeti pasaveti,
tika-s0104t:602_4: rakkhatīti vā kuṇḍikā niruttinayena. Gahitaṃ omakato lujjitaṃ, vividhaṃ lujjitañca
tika-s0104t:602_5: pīṭhaka…pe… kuṇḍikādianekaparikkhārasaṅkhātaṃ bhāraṃ bharati vahatīti gahita…pe…
tika-s0104t:602_6: bhārabharitā. Itīti nidassanattho. Evanti idamattho. Evaṃ idaṃ vacanamādi yassa vacanassa
tika-s0104t:602_7: tathā, tadeva niratthakaṃ vacanaṃ yassāti evamādiniratthakavacanā. Mukhaṃ etassa
tika-s0104t:602_8: atthīti mukharā, sabbepi mukhavantā eva, ayaṃ pana pharusābhilāpamukhavatī, tasmā
tika-s0104t:602_9: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Nindāyañhi ayaṃ rapaccayo. Mukhena vā amanāpaṃ kammaṃ rāti gaṇhātīti
tika-s0104t:602_10: mukharā. Vividhā kiṇṇā vācā yassāti vikiṇṇavācā. Tassāti suppiyassa paribbājakassa.
tika-s0104t:603_0: Idānīti tassa tathārūpāya parisāya dassanakkhaṇe. Panāti arucisaṃsūcanattho, tathāpīti
tika-s0104t:603_1: attho. Lābha…pe… hāniyā ceva hetubhūtāya. Kathaṃ hānīti āha “aññatitthiyānañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:603_3: pakkhahānitāya vitthāro. Āyasmato sāriputtassa, mahāmoggallānassa ca bhagavato santike
tika-s0104t:603_4: pabbajjaṃ sandhāya “tesu pana pakkantesū”ti vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ pabbajitakāleyeva aḍḍhateyyasataṃ
tika-s0104t:603_5: paribbājakaparisā pabbaji, tato parampi tadanupabbajitā paribbājakaparisā aparimāṇāti
tika-s0104t:603_6: dasseti “sāpi tesaṃ parisā bhinnā”ti iminā. Yāya kāyaci hi paribbājakaparisāya pabbajitāya
tika-s0104t:603_7: tassa parisā bhinnāyeva nāma samānagaṇattāti tathā vuttaṃ. “Imehī”tiādinā lābhapakkhahāniṃ
tika-s0104t:603_8: nigamanavasena dasseti. Usūyasaṅkhātassa visassa uggāro uggilanaṃ usūyavisuggāro,
tika-s0104t:603_9: taṃ. Ettha ca “yasmā panesā”tiādināva “kasmā ca so ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti
tika-s0104t:603_10: codanaṃ visodheti, “sace”tiādikaṃ pana sabbampi tapparivāravacanamevāti tehipi sā
tika-s0104t:603_11: visodhitāyeva nāma. Bhagavato virodhānunayābhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ ete avaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:603_12: bhāsanti. “Mārena anvāviṭṭhā evaṃ bhāsantī”ti ca keci vadanti, tadayuttameva aṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0104t:604: 2. Yasmā atthaṅgato sūriyo, tasmā akālo dāni gantunti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:605_0: Ambalaṭṭhikāti sāmīpikavohāro yathā “varuṇanagaraṃ, godāgāmo”ti āha “tassa kirā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:605_1: Taruṇapariyāyo laṭṭhikā-saddo rukkhavisaye yathā “mahāvanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya
tika-s0104t:605_2: mūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdī”tiādīsūti dasseti” “taruṇambarukkho”ti iminā. Keci pana “ambalaṭṭhikā
tika-s0104t:605_3: nāma vuttanayena eko gāmo”ti vadanti, tesaṃ mate ambalaṭṭhikāyanti samīpatthe bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:605_4: Chāyūdakasampannanti chāyāya ceva udakena ca sampannaṃ. Mañjusāti peḷā. Paṭibhānacittavicittanti
tika-s0104t:605_5: itthipurisasaññogādinā paṭibhānacittena vicittaṃ, etena rañño agāraṃ, tadeva rājāgārakanti
tika-s0104t:605_6: dasseti. Rājāgārakaṃ nāma vessavaṇamahārājassa devāyatananti eke.
tika-s0104t:606_0: Bahuparissayoti bahupaddavo. Kehīti vuttaṃ “core’hipī”tiādi. Handāti vacanavossaggatthe
tika-s0104t:606_1: nipāto, tadānubhāvato nipparissayatthāya idāni upagantvā sve gamissāmīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:606_2: “Saddhiṃ antevāsinā brahmadattena māṇavenā” ticceva sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tañca
tika-s0104t:606_3: kho pāḷiāruḷhavaseneva, na pana tadā suppiyassa parisāya abhāvatoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:606_4: “saddhiṃ attano parisāyā”ti idha vuttaṃ. Kasmā panettha brahmadattoyeva pāḷiyamāruḷho,
tika-s0104t:606_5: na pana tadavasesā suppiyassa parisāti? Desanānadhīnabhāvena payojanābhāvato. Yathā
tika-s0104t:606_6: cetaṃ, evaṃ aññampi edisaṃ payojanābhāvato saṅgītikārakehi na saṅgītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:606_7: Keci pana “pāḷiyaṃ vutta”nti ādhāraṃ vatvā ‘tadetaṃ na sīhaḷaṭṭhakathānayadassanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:606_8: pāḷiyaṃ vuttabhāvadassanamevā’ti” vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. Pāḷiāruḷhavaseneva pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:606_9: vuttanti adhippetatthassa āpajjanato. Tasmā yathāvuttanayeneva attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0104t:606_10: “Vuttanti vā amhehipi idha vattabbanti attho. Evañhi tadā aññāyapi parisāya vijjamānabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:606_11: evaṃ vuttaṃ, pāḷiyamāruḷhavasena pana aññathāpi idha vattabbanti adhippāyo yutto”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:607_0: Idāni “tatrāpi suda”ntiādipāḷiyā sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ vāsaṃ upagato panā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:607_1: vuttaṃ. Parivāretvā nisinno hotīti sambandho. Kucchitaṃ kattabbanti kukataṃ, tassa
tika-s0104t:607_2: bhāvo kukkuccaṃ, kucchitakiriyā, ito cito ca cañcalananti attho, hatthassa kukkuccaṃ
tika-s0104t:607_3: tathā. “Sā hī”tiādinā tathābhūtatāya kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Nivāteti vātavirahitaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0104t:607_4: Yathāvuttadosābhāvena niccalā. Taṃ vibhūtinti tādisaṃ sobhaṃ. Vippalapantīti sativossaggavasena
tika-s0104t:607_5: vividhā lapanti. Nillālitajivhāti ito cito ca nikkhantajivhā. Kākacchamānāti kākānaṃ
tika-s0104t:607_6: saddasadisaṃ saddaṃ kurumānā. Gharugharupassāsinoti gharugharuiti saddaṃ janetvā
tika-s0104t:607_7: passasantā. Issāvasenāti yathāvuttehi dvīhi kāraṇehi usūyanavasena. “Sabbaṃ vattabba”nti
tika-s0104t:608_0: 3. Sammā pahonti taṃ taṃ kammanti sampahulā, bahavo, tenāha “bahukāna”nti. Sabbantimena
tika-s0104t:608_2: vuttaṃ. Tayo janāti cesa upalakkhaṇaniddeso dvinnampi sampahulattā. Tattha tattha
tika-s0104t:608_4: hi ayaṃ bhedo. Tayo janā tayo eva nāma, tato paṭṭhāya uttari catupañcajanādikā sampahulāti
tika-s0104t:608_5: attho. Tatoti cāyaṃ mariyādāvadhi. Maṇḍalamāḷoti anekatthapavattā samaññā, idha pana
tika-s0104t:608_6: īdisāya evāti niyamento āha “katthacī”tiādi. Kaṇṇikā vuccati kūṭaṃ. Haṃsavaṭṭakacchannenāti
tika-s0104t:608_8: Kūṭena yutto agāro, soyeva sālāti kūṭāgārasālā. Thambhapantiṃ parikkhipitvāti thambhamālaṃ
tika-s0104t:608_9: parivāretvā, parimaṇḍalākārena thambhapantiṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaṭṭhānasālā nāma
tika-s0104t:608_10: payirupāsanasālā. Yattha upaṭṭhānamattaṃ karonti, na ekarattadirattādivasena nisīdanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:608_11: idha pana tathā katā nisīdanasālāyevāti dasseti “idha panā”tiādinā. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:608_12: “sannipatitāna” ntveva avatvā “sannisinnāna”ntipi vuttaṃ. Mānitabboti māḷo, mīyati
tika-s0104t:608_13: pamīyatīti vā māḷo. Maṇḍalākārena paṭicchanno māḷoti maṇḍalamāḷo, anekakoṇavanto
tika-s0104t:608_16: ca samodhānaṃ sandhāya padadvayametaṃ vuttanti dasseti. Saṅkhiyā vuccati kathā sammā
tika-s0104t:608_17: khiyanato kathanato. Kathādhammoti kathāsabhāvo, upaparikkhā vidhīti keci.
tika-s0104t:609_0: “Acchariya”ntiādi tassa rūpadassananti āha “katamo pana so”tiādi. Soti kathādhammo.
tika-s0104t:609_1: “Nīyatīti nayo, attho, saddasatthaṃ anugato nayo saddanayo”ti ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-s0104t:609_2: vuttaṃ. Nīyati attho etenāti vā nayo, upāyo, saddasatthe āgato nayo atthagahaṇūpāyo
tika-s0104t:609_3: saddanayo. Tattha hi anabhiṇhavuttike acchariya-saddo icchito ruḷhivasena. Tenevāha
tika-s0104t:609_4: “andhassa pabbatārohaṇaṃ viyā”tiādi. Tassa hi tadārohaṇaṃ na niccaṃ, kadāciyeva siyā,
tika-s0104t:609_5: evamidampi. Accharāyoggaṃ acchariyaṃ niruttinayena yoggasaddassa lopato, taddhitavasena
tika-s0104t:609_6: vā ṇiyapaccayassa vicitravuttito, so pana porāṇaṭṭhakathāyameva āgatattā “aṭṭhakathānayo”ti
tika-s0104t:609_7: vutto. Pubbe abhūtanti abhūtapubbaṃ, etena na bhūtaṃ abhūtanti nibbacanaṃ, bhūta-saddassa
tika-s0104t:609_8: ca atītatthaṃ dasseti. Yāvañcidanti sandhivasena niggahitāgamoti āha “yāva ca ida”nti,
tika-s0104t:609_9: etassa ca “suppaṭividitā”ti etena sambandho. Yāva cayattakaṃ idaṃ ayaṃ nānādhimuttikatā
tika-s0104t:609_10: suppaṭividitā, taṃ “ettakamevā”ti na sakkā amhehi paṭivijjhituṃ, akkhātuñcāti sapāṭhasesattho.
tika-s0104t:610_0: “Bhagavatā”tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttattā tenāti ettha ta-saddo sakatthapaṭiniddeso,
tika-s0104t:610_1: tasmā yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato samāno supākaṭo nāma hoti, tadabhisambuddhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:610_2: saddhiṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya tassa atthabhāvena dassento “yo so”tiādimāha. Na hettha
tika-s0104t:610_3: so pubbe vutto atthi, yo attho tehi therehi ta-saddena parāmasitabbo bhaveyya. Tasmā
tika-s0104t:610_4: yathāvuttaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ sakatthaṃyevesa padhānabhāvena parāmasatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Anuttaraṃ
tika-s0104t:610_6: aggamaggañāṇaṃ. Tadubhayañhi sammā aviparītaṃ sayameva bujjhati, sammā vā pasaṭṭhā
tika-s0104t:610_7: sundaraṃ bujjhatīti sammāsambodhi. Sā pana buddhānaṃ sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko
tika-s0104t:610_8: viya rañño sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ, tasmā “anuttarā sammāsambodhī”ti vuccati. Abhisambuddhoti
tika-s0104t:610_9: abbhaññāsi paṭivijjhi, tena tādisena bhagavatāti attho. Satipi ñāṇadassanānaṃ idha
tika-s0104t:610_10: paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ visayavisesappavattiṃ dassento “tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:610_11: tesaṃ sattāna”ntiādimāha. Ettha hi paṭhamamatthaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇavasena dasseti. Āsayānusayañāṇena
tika-s0104t:611_2: vuttaṃ. Anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātena samantacakkhunā passatāti attho. Catutthaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇamaṃsacakkhuvasena.
tika-s0104t:611_3: Paññāyāti sabbaññutaññāṇena. Kuṭṭassa bhittiyā tiro paraṃ, anto vā, tadādīsu gatāni.
tika-s0104t:611_5: rattiñceva divā ca samantā yojanaṃ passantena maṃsacakkhunā. Pañcamaṃ paṭivedhadesanāñāṇavasena.
tika-s0104t:611_6: “Attahitasādhikāyā”ti ekaṃsato vuttaṃ, pariyāyato panesā parahitasādhikāpi hoti.
tika-s0104t:611_8: ariyamaggapaññāya. Vipassanāsahagato samādhi padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇametissāti samādhipadaṭṭhānā,
tika-s0104t:611_9: tāya. Desanāpaññāyāti desanākiccanipphādakena sabbaññutaññāṇena. Arīnanti kilesārīnaṃ,
tika-s0104t:611_10: pañcamārānaṃ vā, sāsanapaccatthikānaṃ vā aññatitthiyānaṃ. Tesaṃ hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi
tika-s0104t:611_12: saṅgītaṃ caṅkīsuttañcettha nidassanaṃ, etena arayo hatā anenāti niruttinayena padasiddhimāha.
tika-s0104t:611_13: Ato nāvacanassa tābyappadeso mahāvisayenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Apica arayo hanatīti antasaddena
tika-s0104t:611_14: padasiddhi, ikārassa ca akāro. Paccayādīnaṃ sampadānabhūtānaṃ, tesaṃ vā paṭiggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:611_15: paṭiggahituṃ vā arahatīti arahanti dasseti “paccayādīnañca arahattā”ti iminā. Sammāti
tika-s0104t:611_16: aviparītaṃ. Sāmañcāti sayameva, aparaneyyo hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ panettha “sabbadhammāna”nti
tika-s0104t:611_17: ayaṃ viseso labbhatīti? Sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato, visesatthinā ca visesassa
tika-s0104t:611_18: anupayojetabbato yajjevaṃ “dhammāna”nti visesovānupayojito siyā, kasmā sabbadhammānanti
tika-s0104t:611_19: ayamattho anupayojīyatīti? Ekadesassa aggahaṇato. Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa
tika-s0104t:611_20: nippadesatā viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti, esa nayo īdisesu.
tika-s0104t:612_0: Idāni ca catūhi padehi catuvesārajjavasena attanā adhippetataraṃ chaṭṭhamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:612_1: “antarāyikadhamme vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tadeva nigamanaṃ karoti “eva”ntiādinā.
tika-s0104t:612_2: Tattha antarāyakaradhammañāṇena jānatā, niyyānikadhammañāṇena passatā, āsavakkhayañāṇena
tika-s0104t:612_3: arahatā, sabbaññutaññāṇena sammāsambuddhenaāti yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Anatthacaraṇena
tika-s0104t:612_4: kilesā eva arayoti kilesārayo, tesaṃ kilesārīnaṃ. Etthāha – yassa ñāṇassa vasena
tika-s0104t:612_5: sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā bhagavā sammāsambuddho nāma jāto, kiṃ panidaṃ
tika-s0104t:612_6: ñāṇaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ bujjhanavasena pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati,
tika-s0104t:612_7: udāhu kamenāti. Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, evaṃ
tika-s0104t:612_9: ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ pekkhantassa viya paṭibhāgenāvabodho na siyā,
tika-s0104t:612_10: tathā ca sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbe dhammā
tika-s0104t:612_11: anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇavisayā hontīti āpajjati. Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:612_12: ṭhitilakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tena te
tika-s0104t:615_0: Idampi sabbadā ñāṇappavattidīpakaṃ aṅguttarāgame nāgopamasuttavacanaṃ suvuttaṃ nāma
tika-s0104t:615_1: hotī”ti vadanti, tesampi vāde vuttadosā nātivatti. Ṭhitilakkhaṇārammaṇatāya ca atītānāgatadhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:615_2: tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā, tasmā sakiññeva sabbasmiṃ visaye
tika-s0104t:615_3: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati. Atha kamena sabbasmimpi visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattati, evampi
tika-s0104t:615_4: na yujjati. Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena, disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne
tika-s0104t:615_5: ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho sambhavati apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa.
tika-s0104t:615_6: Ye pana “atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti
tika-s0104t:615_7: adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū nāma bhagavā jāto, tañca ñāṇaṃ na anumānikaṃ
tika-s0104t:615_8: nāma saṃsayābhāvato. Saṃsayānubaddhañhi ñāṇaṃ loke anumānika”nti vadanti, tesampi
tika-s0104t:615_9: taṃ na yuttameva. Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ
tika-s0104t:615_10: paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanasseva asambhavato tathā asakkuṇeyyattā
tika-s0104t:615_11: ca. Yañhi sesaṃ, tadapaccakkhameva, atha tampi paccakkhaṃ, tassa sesabhāvo eva na
tika-s0104t:615_12: siyā, apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa tathāvavatthitumeva na sakkāti? Sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:615_13: Kasmā? Avisayavicāraṇabhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “buddhānaṃ bhikkhave, buddhavisayo
tika-s0104t:615_14: acinteyyo na cintetabbo, yaṃ cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti idaṃ panettha
tika-s0104t:615_15: sanniṭṭhānaṃ – yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ, sakalamekadeso vā, tattha tattha
tika-s0104t:615_16: appaṭihatavuttitāya paccakkhato ñāṇaṃ pavattati niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato,
tika-s0104t:615_17: ñātuṃ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā,
tika-s0104t:615_18: ekanteneva sā icchitabbā, sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanapaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhā
tika-s0104t:616_0: Nanu ca etasmimpi pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ, tadā sakiṃyeva sakalavisayatāya
tika-s0104t:616_1: anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosā nātivattiyevāti? Na, tassa
tika-s0104t:616_2: visodhitattā. Visodhito hi so buddhavisayo acinteyyoti. Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya
tika-s0104t:616_3: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā, tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi
tika-s0104t:616_4: taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha
tika-s0104t:616_5: acinteyyaṃ, “yāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:616_6: Neyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ neyyaṃ. Neyyaṃ atikkamitvā ñāṇaṃ nappavattati,
tika-s0104t:616_7: ñāṇaṃ atikkamitvā neyyapatho natthi. Aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino te dhammā, yathā
tika-s0104t:616_8: dvinnaṃ samuggapaṭalānaṃ sammā phusitānaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ uparimaṃ nātivattati,
tika-s0104t:616_9: uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ nātivattati. Aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino, evameva
tika-s0104t:616_10: buddhassa bhagavato neyyañca ñāṇañca aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino…pe… te dhammā”ti
tika-s0104t:616_11: evamekajjhaṃ, visuṃ, sakiṃ, kamena vā icchānurūpaṃ pavattassa tassa ñāṇassa vasena
tika-s0104t:616_12: sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā bhagavā sammāsambuddho nāma jātoti.
tika-s0104t:617_0: Ayaṃ panettha aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo – ṭhānāṭhānādīni chabbisayāni chahi ñāṇehi jānatā,
tika-s0104t:617_1: yathākammūpage satte cutūpapātadibbacakkhuñāṇehi passatā, savāsanānamāsavānaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇena
tika-s0104t:617_2: khīṇattā arahatā, jhānādidhamme saṃkilesavodānavasena sāmaṃyeva aviparītāvabodhato
tika-s0104t:617_3: sammāsambuddhena, evaṃ dasabalañāṇavasena catūhākārehi thomitena. Apica tīsu kālesu
tika-s0104t:617_4: appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā, tiṇṇampi kammānaṃ ñāṇānuparivattito nisammakāritāya passatā,
tika-s0104t:617_5: davādīnaṃ channamabhāvasādhikāya pahānasampadāya arahatā, chandādīnaṃ channamahānihetubhūtāya
tika-s0104t:617_7: catūhākārehi thomitenāti evamādinā tesaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇadassanapahānabodhanatthehi saṅgahitānaṃ
tika-s0104t:618_1: padassa visesanataṃ dasseti. Yadipi hīnapaṇītabhedena duvidhāva adhimutti pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:618_2: vuttā, pavattiākāravasena pana anekabhedabhinnāvāti āha “nānādhimuttikatā”ti. Sā
tika-s0104t:618_3: pana adhimutti ajjhāsayadhātuyeva, tadapi tathā tathā dassanaṃ, khamanaṃ, rocanañcāti
tika-s0104t:618_4: atthaṃ viññāpeti “nānajjhāsayatā”ti iminā. Tathā hi vakkhati “nānādhimuttikatā nānajjhāsayatā
tika-s0104t:618_6: iminā sambandho. Tattha ca idanti padapūraṇamattaṃ, “nānādhimuttikatā”ti etena vā
tika-s0104t:618_7: padena samānādhikaraṇaṃ, tassattho pana pākaṭoyevāti āha “yāva ca suṭṭhu paṭividitā”ti.
tika-s0104t:619_0: “Yā ca aya”ntiādinā dhātusaṃyuttapāḷiṃ dassento tadeva saṃyuttaṃ manasi karitvā tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:619_1: avaṇṇavaṇṇabhāsanena saddhiṃ ghaṭetvā therānamayaṃ saṅkhiyadhammo udapādīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:619_2: Ato assa bhagavato dhātusaṃyuttadesanānayena tāsaṃ suppaṭividitabhāvaṃ samatthanavasena
tika-s0104t:619_4: hī”tiādivacanaṃ. Tattha yā ayaṃ nānādhimuttikatā…pe… rucitāti sambandho. Dhātusoti
tika-s0104t:619_5: ajjhāsayadhātuyā. Saṃsandantīti sambandhenti vissāsenti. Samentīti sammā, saha vā
tika-s0104t:619_7: kāle, accantasaṃyoge vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Nānādhimuttikatā-padassa nānajjhāsayatāti
tika-s0104t:619_8: atthavacanaṃ. Nānādiṭṭhi…pe… rucitāti tassa sarūpadassanaṃ. Sassatādiladdhivasena
tika-s0104t:619_10: nānārucitā. Nāḷiyāti tumbena, āḷhakena vā. Tulāyāti mānena. Nānādhimuttikatāñāṇanti
tika-s0104t:619_11: cettha sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṃ, na dasabalañāṇanti āha “sabbaññutaññāṇenā”ti.
tika-s0104t:619_12: Evaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ, abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, dasabalasuttaṭṭhakathāsu ca evamāgataṃ.
tika-s0104t:620_0: Paravādī panāha “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ natthi, sabbaññutaññāṇassevāyaṃ pabhedo”ti,
tika-s0104t:620_1: taṃ tathā na daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññameva hi dasabalañāṇaṃ, aññaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Dasabalañāṇañhi
tika-s0104t:620_2: sakakiccameva jānāti, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana tampi tato avasesampi jānāti. Dasabalañāṇesu
tika-s0104t:620_3: hi paṭhamaṃ kāraṇākāraṇameva jānāti, dutiyaṃ kammantaravipākantarameva, tatiyaṃ kammaparicchedameva,
tika-s0104t:620_5: indriyānaṃ tikkhamudubhāvameva, sattamaṃ jhānādīhi saddhiṃ tesaṃ saṃkilesādimeva,
tika-s0104t:620_6: aṭṭhamaṃ pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatimeva, navamaṃ sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhimeva, dasamaṃ
tika-s0104t:620_7: saccaparicchedameva, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca jānāti,
tika-s0104t:620_8: etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karoti. Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti, iddhi
tika-s0104t:620_9: hutvā vikubbituṃ na sakkoti, maggo hutvā kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti. Apica paravādī
tika-s0104t:620_10: evaṃ pucchitabbo “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma etaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ
tika-s0104t:620_11: avitakkaavicāraṃ, kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ, lokiyaṃ lokuttara”nti. Jānanto
tika-s0104t:620_12: paṭipāṭiyā satta ñāṇāni “savitakkasavicārānī”ti vakkhati, tato parāni dve “avitakkaavicārānī”ti
tika-s0104t:620_13: vakkhati, āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ “siyā savitakkasavicāraṃ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṃ, siyā
tika-s0104t:620_14: avitakkaavicāra”nti vakkhati, tathā paṭipāṭiyā satta kāmāvacarāni, tato paraṃ dve
tika-s0104t:620_15: rūpāvacarāni, avasāne ekaṃ “lokuttara’nti vakkhati, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana savitakkasavicārameva,
tika-s0104t:620_16: kāmāvacarameva, lokiyamevāti. Iti aññadeva dasabalañāṇaṃ, aññaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇanti,
