tika-s0104t:620_17: tasmā pañcamabalañāṇasaṅkhātena nānādhimuttikatāñāṇena ca sabbaññutaññāṇena ca viditāti
tika-s0104t:620_18: attho veditabbo. Ca-kāropi hi potthakesu dissati. Sāti yathāvuttā nānādhimuttikatā.
tika-s0104t:620_20: tassa saṅkhiyadhammassa tadabhisambandhataṃ āvi karoti. Iti ha meti ettha evaṃsaddatthe
tika-s0104t:620_21: iti-saddo, ha-kāro nipātamattaṃ, āgamo vā. Sandhivasena ikāralopo, akārādeso vāti
tika-s0104t:621_0: 4. “Viditvā”ti ettha pakatiyatthabhūtā vijānanakiriyā sāmaññena abhedavatīpi samānā
tika-s0104t:621_1: taṃtaṃkaraṇayogyatāya anekappabhedāti dassetuṃ “bhagavā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vatthūnīti
tika-s0104t:621_2: gharavatthūni. “Sabbaññutaññāṇena disvā aññāsī”ti ca vohāravacanamattametaṃ. Na hi
tika-s0104t:621_3: tena dassanato aññaṃ jānanaṃ nāma natthi. Tadidaṃ ñāṇaṃ āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhaṃ
tika-s0104t:621_4: manasikārapaṭibaddhaṃ cittuppādapaṭibaddhaṃ hutvā pavattati. Kiṃ nāma karonto bhagavā
tika-s0104t:621_5: tena ñāṇena āvajjanādipaṭibaddhena aññāsīti sotūnamatthassa suviññāpanatthaṃ parammukhā
tika-s0104t:621_6: viya codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti “kiṃ karonto aññāsī”ti iminā, pacchimayāmakiccaṃ karonto
tika-s0104t:621_7: taṃ ñāṇaṃ āvajjanādipaṭibaddhaṃ hutvā tena tathā aññāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sāmaññasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:621_8: sati visesavacanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyāti anuyogenāha “kiccañcanāmeta”ntiādi. Arahattamaggena
tika-s0104t:621_9: samugghātaṃ kataṃ tassa samuṭṭhāpakakilesasamugghāṭanena, yato “natthi abyāvaṭamano”ti
tika-s0104t:621_10: aṭṭhārasasu buddhadhammesu vuccati. Niratthako cittasamudācāro natthīti hettha attho.
tika-s0104t:621_11: Evampi vuttānuyogo tadavatthoyevāti codanamapaneti “taṃ pañcavidha”ntiādinā. Tattha
tika-s0104t:621_12: purimakiccadvayaṃ divasabhāgavasena, itarattayaṃ rattibhāgavasena gahetabbaṃ tathāyeva vakkhamānattā.
tika-s0104t:622_1: bhagavato mukhavaraṃ duggandhādidosaṃ nāma natthi, tadubhayatthameva pana mukhadhovanādīni
tika-s0104t:622_2: karotīti dasseti. Sabbopi hi buddhānaṃ kāyo bāhirabbhantarehi malehi anupakkiliṭṭho
tika-s0104t:622_3: sudhotamaṇi viya hoti. Vivittāsaneti phalasamāpattīnamanurūpe vivekānubrūhanāsane.
tika-s0104t:622_4: Vītināmetvāti phalasamāpattīhi vītināmanaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi na vivekaninnatāya, paresañca
tika-s0104t:622_6: nivāsetvā vijjulatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā meghavaṇṇaṃ sugatacīvaraṃ pārupitvā
tika-s0104t:622_7: selamayapattaṃ ādāyāti adhippāyo. Tathāyeva hi tattha tattha vutto. “Kadāci ekako”tiādi
tika-s0104t:622_8: tesaṃ tesaṃ vineyyānaṃ vinayanānukūlaṃ bhagavato upasaṅkamanadassanaṃ. Gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ
tika-s0104t:622_9: vāti ettha vā-saddo vikappanattho, tena nagarampi vikappeti. Yathāruci vattamānehi
tika-s0104t:623_0: “Seyyathida”ntiādinā pacchimapakkhaṃ vitthāreti. Seyyathidanti ca taṃ katamanti atthe
tika-s0104t:623_1: nipāto, idaṃ vā sappāṭihīrapavisanaṃ katamantipi vaṭṭati. Mudugatavātāti mudubhūtā,
tika-s0104t:623_2: mudubhāvena vā gatā vātā. Udakaphusitānīti udakabindūni. Muñcantāti osiñcantā. Reṇuṃ
tika-s0104t:623_3: vūpasametvāti rajaṃ sannisīdāpetvā upari vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti caṇḍa-vātātapa-himapātādi-haraṇena
tika-s0104t:623_4: vitānakiccanipphādakattā, tato tato himavantādīsu pupphūpagarukkhato upasaṃharitvāti
tika-s0104t:623_5: atthassa viññāyamānattā tathā na vuttaṃ. Samabhāgakaraṇamattena onamanti, unnamanti
tika-s0104t:623_6: ca, tatoyeva pādanikkhepasamaye samāva bhūmi hoti. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ sakkharakathalakaṇṭakasaṅkukalalādiapagamanassāpi
tika-s0104t:623_7: sambhavato, tañca suppatiṭṭhitapādatālakkhaṇassa nissandaphalaṃ, na iddhinimmānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:623_8: Padumapupphāni vāti ettha vā-saddo vikappanattho, tena “yadi yathāvuttanayena samā
tika-s0104t:623_9: bhūmi hoti, evaṃ sati tāni na paṭiggaṇhanti, tathā pana asatiyeva paṭiggaṇhantī”ti
tika-s0104t:623_10: bhagavato yathāruci pavattanaṃ dasseti. Sabbadāva bhagavato gamanaṃ paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇapāduddharaṇasaṅkhātānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitanti
tika-s0104t:623_11: āha “ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde”ti. Buddhānaṃ sabbadakkhiṇatāya tathā vuttanti ācariyadhammapālatthero,
tika-s0104t:623_12: ācariyasāriputtatthero ca vadati, sabbesaṃ uttamatāya evaṃ vuttanti attho. Evaṃ sati
tika-s0104t:623_13: uttamapurisānaṃ tathāpakatitāyāti āpajjati. Ṭhapitamatte nikkhamitvā dhāvantīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:623_14: Idañca yāvadeva vineyyajanavinayanatthaṃ satthu pāṭihāriyanti tesaṃ dassanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:623_16: bhagavato sarīre pītābhāya yebhuyyatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Rasa-saddo cettha udakapariyāyo,
tika-s0104t:623_17: piñjara-saddo hemavaṇṇapariyāyo, suvaṇṇajaladhārā viya suvaṇṇavaṇṇānīti attho”ti
tika-s0104t:623_18: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Pāsādakūṭāgārādīni tesu tesu gāmanigamādīsu saṃvijjamānāni
tika-s0104t:624_0: “Tathā”tiādinā sayameva dhammatāvasena tesaṃ saddakaraṇaṃ dasseti. Tadā kāyaṃ upagacchantīti
tika-s0104t:624_1: kāyūpagāni, na yattha katthaci ṭhitāni. “Antaravīthi”nti iminā bhagavato piṇḍāya
tika-s0104t:624_2: gamanānurūpavīthiṃ dasseti. Na hi bhagavā loluppacārapiṇḍacāriko viya yattha katthaci
tika-s0104t:624_3: gacchati. Ye paṭhamaṃ gatā, ye vā tadanucchavikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dātuṃ samatthā, te bhagavatopi
tika-s0104t:624_4: pattaṃ gaṇhantīti veditabbaṃ. Paṭimānentīti patissamānasā pūjenti, bhagavantaṃ vā
tika-s0104t:624_5: paṭimānāpenti paṭimānantaṃ karonti. Vohāramattañcetaṃ, bhagavato pana apaṭimānanā
tika-s0104t:624_6: nāma natthi. Cittasantānānīti atīte, etarahi ca pavattacittasantānāni. Yathā keci
tika-s0104t:624_7: arahatte patiṭṭhahanti, tathā dhammaṃ desetīti sambandho. Keci pabbajitvāti ca arahattasamāpannānaṃ
tika-s0104t:624_9: Ayañhi arahattappattānaṃ gihīnaṃ sabhāvo, yā tadaheva pabbajjā vā, kālaṃ kiriyāvāti.
tika-s0104t:624_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ āyasmatā nāgasenattherena “visamaṃ mahārāja, gihiliṅgaṃ, visame liṅge
tika-s0104t:624_11: liṅgadubbalatāya arahattaṃ patto gihī tasmiṃyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati
tika-s0104t:624_12: vā neso mahārāja, doso arahattassa, gihiliṅgasseveso doso yadidaṃ liṅgadubbalatā”ti
tika-s0104t:624_13: sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Ettha ca sappāṭihīrappavesanasambandheneva mahājanānuggahaṇaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:624_14: appāṭihīrappavesanena ca pana “te sunivatthā supārutā”tiādivacanaṃ yathārahaṃ sambandhitvā
tika-s0104t:624_15: mahājanānuggahaṇaṃ atthato vibhāvetabbaṃ hoti. Tampi hi purebhattakiccamevāti. Upaṭṭhānasālā
tika-s0104t:624_16: cettha maṇḍalamāḷo. Tattha gantvā maṇḍalamāḷeti idha pāṭho likhito. “Gandhamaṇḍalamāḷe”tipi
tika-s0104t:624_18: vuttaṃ. Gandhakuṭiṃ pavisatīti ca pavisanakiriyāsambandhatāya, tassamīpatāya ca vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:624_19: tasmā pavisituṃ gacchatīti attho daṭṭhabbo, na pana anto tiṭṭhatīti. Evañhi “atha
tika-s0104t:625_0: Atha khoti evaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisituṃ gamanakāle. Upaṭṭhāneti samīpapadese. “Pāde
tika-s0104t:625_1: pakkhāletvā pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadatī”ti ettha pāde pakkhālentova pādapīṭhe
tika-s0104t:625_2: tiṭṭhanto ovadatīti veditabbaṃ. Etadatthaṃyeva hi bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosānaṃ
tika-s0104t:625_3: āgamayamāno nisīdi. Dullabhā sampattīti satipi manussattapaṭilābhe patirūpadesavāsaindriyāvekallasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo
tika-s0104t:625_4: sampattisaṅkhātā guṇā dullabhāti attho. Potthakesu pana “dullabhā saddhāsampattī”ti
tika-s0104t:625_5: pāṭho dissati, so ayuttova. Tatthāti tasmiṃ pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā ovadanakāle, tesu vā
tika-s0104t:625_6: bhikkhūsu, rattiyā vasanaṃ ṭhānaṃ rattiṭṭhānaṃ, tathā divāṭhānaṃ. “Kecī”tiādi tabbivaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:625_7: Cātumahārājikabhavananti cātumahārājikadevaloke suññavimānāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Esa
tika-s0104t:625_8: nayo tāvatiṃsabhavanādīsupi. Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā pacchābhattaṃ tayo
tika-s0104t:625_9: bhāge katvā paṭhamabhāge sace ākaṅkhati, dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti, sace
tika-s0104t:625_10: nākaṅkhati, buddhāciṇṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, atha yathākālaparicchedaṃ tato
tika-s0104t:625_11: vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge pacchimayāmassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse viya lokaṃ voloketi veneyyānaṃ
tika-s0104t:625_12: ñāṇaparipākaṃ passituṃ, tenāha “sace ākaṅkhatī”tiādi. Sīhaseyyantiādīnamattho heṭṭhā
tika-s0104t:625_13: vuttova. Yañhi apubbaṃ padaṃ anuttānaṃ, tadeva vaṇṇayissāma. Sammā assāsitabboti
tika-s0104t:625_14: gāhāpanavasena upatthambhitabboti samassāsito. Tādiso kāyo yassāti tathā. Dhammassavanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:625_15: sannipatati. Tassā parisāya cittācāraṃ ñatvā katabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha “sampattaparisāyaanurūpena
tika-s0104t:625_16: pāṭihāriyenā”ti. Yattha dhammaṃ saha bhāsanti, sā dhammasabhā nāma. Kālayuttanti
tika-s0104t:625_17: “imissā velāya imassa evaṃ vattabba”nti taṃtaṃkālānurūpaṃ. Samayayuttanti tasseva
tika-s0104t:625_18: vevacanaṃ, aṭṭhuppattianurūpaṃ vā samayayuttaṃ. Atha vā samayayuttanti hetudāharaṇehi
tika-s0104t:625_19: yuttaṃ. Kālena sāpadesañhi bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti. Kālaṃ viditvā parisaṃ uyyojeti,
tika-s0104t:625_20: na yāva samandhakārā dhammaṃ desetīti adhippāyo. “Samayaṃ viditvā parisaṃ uyyojesī”tipi
tika-s0104t:625_21: katthaci pariyāyavacanapāṭho dissati, so pacchā pamādalikhito.
tika-s0104t:626_0: Gattānīti kāyoyeva anekāvayavattā vutto. “Utuṃ gaṇhāpetī”ti iminā utugaṇhāpanatthameva
tika-s0104t:626_1: osiñcanaṃ, na pana malavikkhālanatthanti dasseti. Na hi bhagavato kāye rajojallaṃ
tika-s0104t:626_2: upalimpatīti. Catujjātikena gandhena paribhāvitā kuṭī gandhakuṭī. Tassā pariveṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:626_3: tathā. Phalasamāpattīhi muhuttaṃ paṭisallīno. Tato tatoti attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭhānato,
tika-s0104t:626_4: upagantvā, samīpe vā ṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ, bhajanaṃ sevananti attho. Tatthāti tasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:626_5: nisīdanaṭṭhāne, purimayāme vā, tesu vā bhikkhūsu.
tika-s0104t:627_0: Pañhākathanādivasena adhippāyaṃ sampādento “dasasahassilokadhātū”ti evaṃ avatvā tassā
tika-s0104t:627_2: manussaparisābāhullato okāsaṃ alabhitvā idāni majjhimayāmeyeva okāsaṃ labhamānā,
tika-s0104t:627_3: bhagavatā vā katokāsatāya okāsaṃ labhamānāti adhippāyo. Kīdisaṃ pana pucchantīti
tika-s0104t:627_5: tadanatikkamma vā, etena yathā tathā attano paṭibhānānurūpaṃ pucchantīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:628_0: Pacchābhattakālassa tīsu bhāgesu paṭhamabhāge sīhaseyyākappanaṃ ekantaṃ na hotīti
tika-s0104t:628_1: āha “purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāya pīḷitassa sarīrassā”ti. Teneva hi pubbe “sace
tika-s0104t:628_2: ākaṅkhatī”ti tadā sīhaseyyākappanassa anibaddhatā vibhāvitā. Kilāsubhāvo kilamatho.
tika-s0104t:628_3: Sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthaṃ caṅkamena vītināmeti sīhaseyyaṃ kappetīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:628_5: buddhacakkhunā. Tena hi lokavolokanabāhullatāya taṃ “buddhacakkhū”ti vuccati, idañca
tika-s0104t:628_6: pacchimayāme bhagavato bahulaṃ āciṇṇavasena vuttaṃ. Appekadā avasiṭṭhabalañāṇehi,
tika-s0104t:629_0: “Pacchimayāmakiccaṃ karonto aññāsī”ti pubbe vuttamatthaṃ samatthento “tasmiṃ pana
tika-s0104t:629_1: divase”tiādimāha. Buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ yattha katthaci vasantānaṃ idaṃ pañcavidhaṃ
tika-s0104t:629_2: kiccaṃ avijahitameva hoti sabbakālaṃ suppatiṭṭhitasatisampajaññattā, tasmā tadahepi
tika-s0104t:629_4: tattha caṅkamanānurūpaṭṭhānaṃ. Caṅkamamāno aññāsīti yojetabbaṃ. Pubbe vutte atthadvaye
tika-s0104t:629_5: pacchimatthaññeva gahetvā “sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbhā”ti vuttaṃ. Purimattho hi pakaraṇādhigatattā suviññeyyoti.
tika-s0104t:630_0: “Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ saṅkhiyadhammaṃ viditvā yena maṇḍalamāḷo,
tika-s0104t:630_1: tenupasaṅkamī”ti ayaṃ sāvasesapāṭho, tasmā etaṃ viditvā, evaṃ cintetvā ca upasaṅkamīti
tika-s0104t:630_2: attho veditabboti dassetuṃ “ñatvā ca panassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha assa etadahosīti
tika-s0104t:630_3: assa bhagavato etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ, eso vā cetaso parivitakko ahosi, liṅgavipallāsoyaṃ
tika-s0104t:630_4: “etadagga”ntiādīsu viya. Sabbaññutaññāṇakiccaṃ na sabbathā pākaṭaṃ. Nirantaranti
tika-s0104t:630_5: anupubbārocanavasena nibbivaraṃ, yathābhāsitassa vā ārocanavasena nibbisesaṃ. Bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ.
tika-s0104t:630_6: Taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvāti taṃ yathārocitaṃ vacanaṃ imassa suttassa uppattikāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:630_7: katvā, imassa vā suttassa desanāya uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ katvātipi attho. Attha-saddo
tika-s0104t:630_8: cettha kāraṇe, tena imassa suttassa aṭṭhuppattikaṃ nikkhepaṃ dasseti. Dvāsaṭṭhiyā
tika-s0104t:630_9: ṭhānesūti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigataṭṭhānesu. Appaṭivattiyanti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā
tika-s0104t:630_10: devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ anivattiyaṃ. Sīhanādaṃ nadantoti
tika-s0104t:630_11: seṭṭhanādasaṅkhātaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadanto. Yaṃ pana lokiyā vadanti –
tika-s0104t:633_0: Taṃ yebhuyyavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sīhanādasadisaṃ vā nādaṃ nadanto. Ayamattho sīhanādasuttena
tika-s0104t:633_1: dīpetabbo. Yathā vā kesaro migarājā sahanato, hananato, ca “sīho”ti vuccati, evaṃ
tika-s0104t:633_2: tathāgatopi lokadhammānaṃ sahanato, parappavādānaṃ hananato ca “sīho”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:633_3: Tasmā sīhassa tathāgatassa nādaṃ nadantotipi attho daṭṭhabbo. Yathā hi sīho sīhabalena
tika-s0104t:633_4: samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati, evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi
tika-s0104t:633_5: tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso “ime diṭṭhiṭṭhānā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:633_6: nayena nānāvidhadesanāvilāsasampannaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sīhoti
tika-s0104t:633_7: kho bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa. Yaṃ kho bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:633_8: tathāgato parisāya dhammaṃ deseti, idamassa hoti sīhanādasmi”nti. “Ime diṭṭhiṭṭhānā”tiādikā
tika-s0104t:633_9: hi idha vakkhamānadesanāyeva sīhanādo. Tesaṃ “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”tiādinā vakkhamānanayena
tika-s0104t:633_10: paccayākārassa samodhānampi veditabbaṃ. Sineruṃ…pe… viya cāti upamādvayena brahmajāladesanāya
tika-s0104t:633_12: Ratananikūṭena viya agāraṃ arahattanikūṭena brahmajālasuttantaṃ niṭṭhapento, nikūṭenāti
tika-s0104t:633_13: ca niṭṭhānagatena accuggatakūṭenāti attho. Idañca arahattaphalapariyosānattā sabbaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0104t:633_14: tadeva sabbesaṃ uttaritaranti vuttaṃ. Purimo pana me-saddo desanāpekkhoti parinibbutassāpi
tika-s0104t:633_15: me sā desanā aparabhāge pañcavassasahassānīti attho yutto. Savanauggahaṇadhāraṇavācanādivasena
tika-s0104t:633_16: paricayaṃ karonte, tathā ca paṭipanne nibbānaṃ sampāpikā bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:634_0: Yadaggena yenāti karaṇaniddeso, tadaggena tenā tipi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etanti “yena tenā”ti
tika-s0104t:634_1: etaṃ padadvayaṃ. Tatthāti hi tasmiṃ maṇḍalamāḷeti attho. Yenāti vā bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:634_2: Tenāti pana upayogatthe. Tasmā tatthāti taṃ maṇḍalamāḷantipi vadanti. Upasaṅkamīti
tika-s0104t:634_3: ca upasaṅkamantoti attho paccuppannakālassa adhippetattā, tadupasaṅkamanassa pana
tika-s0104t:634_4: atītabhāvassa sūcanato “upasaṅkamī”ti takkālāpekkhanavasena atītapayogo vutto. Evañhi
tika-s0104t:634_5: “upasaṅkamitvā”ti vacanaṃ sūpapannaṃ hoti. Itarathā dvinnampi vacanānaṃ atītakālikattā
tika-s0104t:634_6: tathāvattabbameva na siyā. Upasaṅkamanassa ca gamanaṃ, upagamanañcāti dvidhā attho,
tika-s0104t:634_7: idha pana gamanameva. Sampattukāmatāya hi yaṃ kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃ taṃ padesātikkamanavasena
tika-s0104t:634_8: “taṃ ṭhānaṃ upasaṅkami upasaṅkamanto”ti vattabbataṃ labhati, tenāha “tattha gato”ti,
tika-s0104t:634_9: tena upagamanatthaṃ nivatteti. Yañhi ṭhānaṃ pattumicchanto gacchati, taṃ pattatāyeva
tika-s0104t:634_10: “upagamana”nti vuccati. Yamettha na saṃvaṇṇitaṃ “upasaṅkamitvā”ti padaṃ, taṃ upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:634_11: Atha vā gatoti upagato. Anupasaggopi hi saddo saupasaggo viya atthantaraṃ vadati
tika-s0104t:634_12: saupasaggopi anupasaggo viyāti. Ato “upasaṅkamitvā”ti padassa evaṃ upagato tato āsannataraṃ
tika-s0104t:634_13: bhikkhūnaṃ samīpasaṅkhātaṃ pañhaṃ vā kathetuṃ, dhammaṃ vā desetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:634_14: upagantvāti attho veditabbo. Apica yenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. Yena kāraṇena bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:634_15: so maṇḍalamāḷo upasaṅkamitabbo, tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti attho. Kāraṇaṃ pana “ime
tika-s0104t:635_0: Paññatte āsane nisīdīti ettha kenidaṃ paññattanti anuyoge sati bhikkhūhīti dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:635_1: “buddhakāle kirā”tiādimāha. Tattha buddhakāleti dharamānassa bhagavato kāle. Visesanti
tika-s0104t:635_2: yathāladdhato uttari jhānamaggaphalaṃ. Athāti saṃsayatthe nipāto, yadi passatīti
tika-s0104t:635_3: attho. Vitakkayamānaṃ naṃ bhikkhunti sambandho, tathā tato passanahetu dassetvā,
tika-s0104t:635_4: ovaditvāti ca. Anamataggeti anādimati. Ākāsaṃ uppatitvāti ākāse uggantvā. Īdisesu
tika-s0104t:635_5: hi bhummattho eva yujjatīti udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhāroti taṅkhaṇeyeva bhagavato
tika-s0104t:635_6: anucchavikāsanassa dullabhattā garukammaṃ. Phalakanti nisīdanatthāya kataṃ phalaṃ.
tika-s0104t:635_7: Kaṭṭhakanti nisīdanayogyaṃ phalakato aññaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ. Saṅkaḍḍhitvāti saṃharitvā.
tika-s0104t:635_8: Tatthāti purāṇapaṇṇesu, kevalaṃ tesu eva nisīditumananucchavikattā tathā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:635_9: tatthāti vā tesu pīṭhādīsu. Evaṃ sati saṅkaḍḍhitvā paññapentīti atthavasā vibhattiṃ
tika-s0104t:635_11: tabbisodhanatthaṃ sañcāletvā. “Amhākaṃ īdisā kathā aññatarissā desanāya kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ
tika-s0104t:635_12: yuttā, avassaṃ bhagavā āgamissatī”ti ñatvā yathānisīdanaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha
tika-s0104t:635_13: ca “idhāgato samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā tāvakālikaṃ gaṇhitvā paribhuñjatū”ti raññā ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:635_14: tena ca āgatakāle paribhuttaṃ āsanaṃ rañño nisīdanāsananti veditabbaṃ. Na hi tathā
tika-s0104t:635_15: aṭṭhapitaṃ bhikkhūhi paribhuñjituṃ, bhagavato ca paññapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā tādisaṃ
tika-s0104t:635_16: rañño nisīdanāsanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ kathitanti dassetuṃ “taṃ sandhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Adhimuttiñāṇanti
tika-s0104t:635_17: ca sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatārammaṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, balañāṇañca, vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0104t:636_1: ime saṅkhiyadhammaṃ viditvā”ti vuttattā jānantoyeva pucchīti ayamattho siddhoti āha
tika-s0104t:636_2: “jānantoyevā”ti. Asati kathāvatthumhi tadanurūpā uparūpari vattabbā visesakathā na
tika-s0104t:636_3: samūpabrūhatīti kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ pucchanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Nu-iti pucchanatthe.
tika-s0104t:636_4: Asa-saddo pavattanattheti vuttaṃ “katamāya nu…pe… bhavathā”ti. Etthāti etasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-s0104t:636_5: sandhivasena ukārassa okārādesova, na paṭhamāya pāḷiyā atthato visesoti dasseti “tassāpi
tika-s0104t:636_6: purimoyeva attho”ti iminā. Purimoyevatthoti ca “katamāya nu bhavathā”ti evaṃ vutto attho.
tika-s0104t:637_0: “Kā ca panā”ti ettha ca-saddo byatireke “yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:637_1: gato”tiādīsu viya. Byatireko ca nāma pubbe vuttatthāpekkhako visesātirekattho, so
tika-s0104t:637_2: ca taṃ pubbe yathāpucchitāya kathāya vakkhamānaṃ vippakatabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ byatirekatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:637_3: joteti. Pana-saddo vacanālaṅkāro. Tādiso pana attho saddasatthatova suviññeyyoti
tika-s0104t:637_4: katvā tadaññesameva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “antarākathāti kammaṭṭhāna…pe… kathā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:637_7: vuttaṃ. Yāya hi kathāya te bhikkhū sannisinnā, sā eva antarākathā vippakatā visesena
tika-s0104t:637_9: aññatthamāha “aññā, ekā”ti ca. Pariyāyavacanañhetaṃ padadvayaṃ. Yasmā aññatthe ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:637_11: nissakkatthe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vemajjhe vā antarāsaddo, sā pana tesaṃ vemajjhabhūtattā
tika-s0104t:637_12: aññāyeva, tehi ca asammissattā visuṃ ekāyevāti adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ “aññā, ekā”ti
tika-s0104t:637_13: ca vuttaṃ. Pakārena karaṇaṃ pakato, tato vigatā, vigataṃ vā pakataṃ yassāti vippakatā,
tika-s0104t:637_14: apariniṭṭhitā. Sikhanti pariyosānaṃ. Ayaṃ pana tadabhisambandhavasena uttari kathetukamyatāpucchā,
tika-s0104t:637_15: taṃ sandhāyāha “nāha”ntiādi. Kathābhaṅgatthanti kathāya bhañjanatthaṃ. Atthato āpannattā
tika-s0104t:637_16: sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāreti. Aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtā kathā
tika-s0104t:637_17: tiracchānakathā. Tiracchānabhūtāti ca tirokaraṇabhūtā, vibandhanabhūtāti attho. Ādi-saddena
tika-s0104t:637_19: Ayaṃ kathā evāti antogadhāvadhāraṇataṃ, aññatthāpohanaṃ vā sandhāya cetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:637_20: Athāti tassā avippakatakāleyeva. “Taṃ no”tiādinā atthato āpannamāha. Esa nayo īdisesu.
tika-s0104t:637_21: Nanu ca tehi bhikkhūhi sā kathā “iti ha me”tiādinā yathādhippāyaṃ niṭṭhāpitāyevāti?
tika-s0104t:637_22: Na niṭṭhāpitā bhagavato upasaṅkamanena upacchinnattā. Yadi hi bhagavā tasmiṃ khaṇe
tika-s0104t:637_23: na upasaṅkameyya, bhiyyopi tappaṭibaddhāyeva tathā pavatteyyuṃ, bhagavato upasaṅkamanena
tika-s0104t:637_24: pana na pavattesuṃ, tenevāha “ayaṃ no…pe… anuppatto”ti.
tika-s0104t:638_0: Idāni nidānassa, nidānavaṇṇanāya vā pariniṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dassento tassa bhagavato vacanassānukūlabhāvampi
tika-s0104t:638_1: samatthetuṃ “ettāvatā”tiādimāha. Ettāvatāti hi ettakena “evaṃ me suta”ntiādivacanakkamena
tika-s0104t:638_2: yaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitanti vā ettakena “tattha evanti nipātapada”ntiādivacanakkamena
tika-s0104t:638_3: atthavaṇṇanā samattāti vā dvidhā attho daṭṭhabbo. “Kamala…pe… salilāyā”tiādinā pana
tika-s0104t:638_4: tassa nidānassa bhagavato vacanassānukūlabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tattha kamalakuvalayujjalavimalasādhurasasalilāyāti
tika-s0104t:638_7: nimmalena silātalena racanāya vilāsena līlāya sobhitaratanasopānavantaṃ, nimmalasilātalena
tika-s0104t:638_8: vā racanavilāsena, susaṅkhatakiriyāsobhena ca sobhitaratanasopānaṃ, vilāsasobhitasaddehi
tika-s0104t:638_10: vividhena pakiṇṇāya muttāya talasadisānaṃ vālukānaṃ cuṇṇehi paṇḍaravaṇṇabhūmibhāgavantaṃ.
tika-s0104t:638_12: vedikāhi parikkhittassa ca. Uccatarena nakkhattapathaṃ ākāsaṃ phusitukāmatāya viya,
tika-s0104t:638_15: ativiya siniddhaphalake kañcanamayāhi latāhi vinaddhānaṃ maṇīnaṃ gaṇappabhāsamudāyena
tika-s0104t:639_0: Tividhasīlādidassanavasena buddhassa guṇānubhāvaṃ sammā sūcetīti buddhaguṇānubhāvasaṃsūcakaṃ,
tika-s0104t:639_1: tassa. Kālo ca deso ca desako ca vatthu ca parisā ca, tāsaṃ apadesena nidassanena paṭimaṇḍitaṃ tathā.
tika-s0104t:640_0: Kimatthaṃ panettha dhammavinayasaṅgahe kariyamāne nidānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:640_2: Kāladesadesakavatthuparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā
tika-s0104t:640_3: hoti, asammosadhammā, saddheyyā ca desakālavatthuhetunimittehi upanibandho viya vohāravinicchayo,
tika-s0104t:640_4: teneva cāyasmatā mahākassapena “brahmajālaṃ āvuso ānanda kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:640_5: desādipucchāsu katāsu tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena āyasmatā ānandattherena
tika-s0104t:641_0: Apica satthusampattipakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ. Tathāgatassa hi bhagavato pubba-racanā-numānāgama-takkābhāvato
tika-s0104t:641_2: nāma bhaveyyā”ti anumānassa, āgamantaraṃ nissāya parivitakkassa ca abhāvo sabbattha
tika-s0104t:641_4: khīṇāsavattasiddhi. Khīṇāsavatāya hi ācariyamuṭṭhiādīnamabhāvo, visuddhā ca parānuggahappavatti.
tika-s0104t:641_8: bhagavato catuvesārajjasamannāgamo, attahitaparahitapaṭipatti ca nidānavacanena pakāsitā
tika-s0104t:642_1: hi bhagavato natthi niratthikā pavatti, attahitatthā vā, tasmā paresaṃyeva hitāya
tika-s0104t:642_4: sāsanaṃ, na kabbaracanā. Tayidaṃ satthu caritaṃ kāladesadesakavatthuparisāpadesehi
tika-s0104t:642_5: saddhiṃ tattha tattha nidānavacanehi yathāsambhavaṃ pakāsīyati. Atha vā satthuno
tika-s0104t:642_8: ceva “jānatā passatā”tiādinā āsayānusayañāṇādipayogadīpanena ca vibhāvitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:642_9: idamettha nidānavacanapayojanassa mukhamattanidassanaṃ. Ko hi samattho buddhānubuddhena
tika-s0104t:642_10: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitassa nidānassa payojanāni niravasesato vibhāvitunti. Honti cettha –
tika-s0104t:647_4: katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā abbhantaranidānavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0104t:649_0: 5. Evaṃ abbhantaranidānasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni yathānikkhittassa suttassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ
tika-s0104t:649_1: karonto anupubbāvirodhinī saṃvaṇṇanā kamānatikkamanena byākuladosappahāyinī, viññūnañca
tika-s0104t:649_2: cittārādhinī, āgatabhāro ca avassaṃ āvahitabboti saṃvaṇṇakassa sampattabhārāvahanena
tika-s0104t:649_4: kātumāha “idānī”tiādi. Nikkhittassāti desitassa, “desanā nikkhepo”ti hi etaṃ atthato
tika-s0104t:649_5: bhinnampi sarūpato ekameva, desanāpi hi desetabbassa sīlādiatthassa veneyyasantānesu
tika-s0104t:649_6: nikkhipanato “nikkhepo”ti vuccati. Nanu suttameva saṃvaṇṇīyatīti āha “sā panesā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:649_7: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā saṃvaṇṇanā “ayaṃ desanā evaṃsamuṭṭhānā”ti
tika-s0104t:649_8: suttassa sammadeva nidānaparijjhānena tabbaṇṇanāya suviññeyyattā pākaṭā hoti, tasmā
tika-s0104t:649_9: tadeva sādhāraṇato paṭhamaṃ vicārayissāmāti. Yā hi sā kathā suttatthasaṃvaṇṇanāpākaṭakārinī,
tika-s0104t:649_10: sā sabbāpi saṃvaṇṇakena vattabbā. Tadatthavijānanupāyattā ca sā pariyāyena saṃvaṇṇanāyevāti.
tika-s0104t:649_11: Idha pana tasmiṃ vicārite yassā aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ nikkhittaṃ, tassā vibhāgavasena
tika-s0104t:649_13: ca vuttānaṃ suttapadesānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā vuccamānā taṃtaṃanusandhidassanasukhatāya suviññeyyāti
tika-s0104t:649_14: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha yathā anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttantāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādisāsanapaṭṭhānanayena
tika-s0104t:649_16: āha “cattāro suttanikkhepā”ti. Nanu saṃsaggabhedopi sambhavati, atha kasmā “cattāro
tika-s0104t:649_17: suttanikkhepā”ti vuttanti? Saṃsaggabhedassa sabbattha alabbhamānattā. Attajjhāsayassa,
tika-s0104t:649_18: hi aṭṭhuppattiyā ca parajjhāsayapucchāvasikehi saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati.
tika-s0104t:649_19: “Attajjhāsayo ca parajjhāsayo ca, attajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko ca, attajjhāsayo ca
tika-s0104t:649_20: parajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko ca, aṭṭhuppattiko ca parajjhāsayo ca aṭṭhuppattiko ca
tika-s0104t:649_21: pucchāvasiko ca, aṭṭhuppattiko ca parajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko cā”ti ajjhāsayapucchānusandhisabbhāvato.
tika-s0104t:649_22: Attajjhāsayaṭṭhuppattīnaṃ pana aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggo natthi, tasmā niravasesaṃ patthāranayena
tika-s0104t:650_0: Atha vā aṭṭhuppattiyā attajjhāsayenapi siyā saṃsaggabhedo, tadantogadhattā pana saṃsaggavasena
tika-s0104t:650_1: vuttānaṃ sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepeyeva sandhāya “cattāro suttanikkhepā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:650_2: Imasmiṃ pana atthavikappe yathārahaṃ ekakadukatikacatukavasena sāsanapaṭṭhānanayena
tika-s0104t:650_3: suttanikkhepā vattabbāti nayamattaṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – nikkhipanaṃ
tika-s0104t:650_4: kathanaṃ nikkhepo, suttassa nikkhepo suttanikkhepo, suttadesanāti attho. Nikkhipīyatīti
tika-s0104t:650_5: vā nikkhepo, suttameva nikkhepo suttanikkhepo. Attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo, so
tika-s0104t:650_6: assa atthi kāraṇavasenāti attajjhāsayo, attano ajjhāsayo vā etassa yathāvuttanayenāti
tika-s0104t:650_7: attajjhāsayo. Parajjhāsayepi eseva nayo. Pucchāya vaso pucchāvaso, so etassa atthi
tika-s0104t:650_8: yathāvuttanayenāti pucchāvasiko. Araṇīyato avagantabbato attho vuccati suttadesanāya
tika-s0104t:650_9: vatthu, tassa uppatti atthuppatti, sā eva aṭṭhuppatti ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā,
tika-s0104t:650_10: sā etassa atthi vuttanayenāti aṭṭhuppattiko. Apica nikkhipīyati suttametenāti nikkhepo,
tika-s0104t:650_11: attajjhāsayādisuttadesanākāraṇameva. Etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo.
tika-s0104t:650_12: Paresaṃ ajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo. Pucchīyatīti pucchā, pucchitabbo attho. Tassā pucchāya
tika-s0104t:650_13: vasena pavattaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ vacanaṃ pucchāvasikaṃ. Tadeva nikkhepasaddāpekkhāya
tika-s0104t:651_0: Ettha ca paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇaṃ nirapekkhitvā attano ajjhāsayeneva dhammatantiṭhapanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:651_1: pavattitadesanattā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ nikkhepabhāvo yutto. Teneva vakkhati “attano
tika-s0104t:651_2: ajjhāsayeneva kathetī”ti. Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ
tika-s0104t:651_3: desanānimittabhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattattā kathaṃ aṭṭhuppattike anavarodho siyā,
tika-s0104t:651_4: pucchāvasikaṭṭhuppattikānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena pavattitadesanattā kathaṃ parajjhāsaye
tika-s0104t:651_5: anavarodho siyāti na codetabbametaṃ. Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinimuttasseva
tika-s0104t:651_7: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tathā hi dhammadāyādasuttādīnaṃ āmisuppādādidesanānimittaṃ “aṭṭhuppattī”ti
tika-s0104t:651_8: vuccati. Paresaṃ pucchaṃ vinā ajjhāsayameva nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo. Pucchāvasena
tika-s0104t:652_0: Anajjhiṭṭhoti pucchādinā anajjhesito ayācito, attano ajjhāsayeneva katheti dhammatantiṭhapanatthanti
tika-s0104t:652_1: adhippāyo. Hāroti āvaḷi yathā “muttāhāro”ti, sveva hārako, sammappadhānasuttantānaṃ
tika-s0104t:652_2: hārako tathā. Anupubbena hi saṃyuttake niddiṭṭhānaṃ sammappadhānapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ
tika-s0104t:652_5: vā eso, peyyālaniddeso vā. Tesanti yathāvuttasuttānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:653_0: Paripakkāti pariṇatā. Vimuttiparipācanīyāti arahattaphalaṃ paripācentā saddhindriyādayo
tika-s0104t:653_1: dhammā. Khayeti khayanatthaṃ, khayakāraṇabhūtāya vā dhammadesanāya. Ajjhāsayanti
tika-s0104t:653_2: adhimuttiṃ. Khantinti diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiṃ. Mananti cittaṃ. Abhinīhāranti paṇidhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:653_3: Bujjhanabhāvanti bujjhanasabhāvaṃ, bujjhanākāraṃ vā. Avekkhitvāti paccavekkhitvā, apekkhitvā vā.
tika-s0104t:654: Cattāro vaṇṇāti cattāri kulāni, cattāro vā rūpādipamāṇā sattā. Mahārājānoti cattāro mahārājāno devā. Vuccanti kiṃ, pañcupādānakkhandhā kinti attho.
tika-s0104t:655_0: Kasmāti āha “aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ hī”tiādi. Vaṇṇāvaṇṇeti nimitte bhummaṃ, vaṇṇasaddena
tika-s0104t:655_1: cettha “acchariyaṃ āvuso”tiādinā bhikkhusaṅghena vuttopi vaṇṇo saṅgahito. Tampi hi
tika-s0104t:655_2: aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā “atthi bhikkhave aññe dhammā”tiādinā upari desanaṃ ārabhissati.
tika-s0104t:655_3: Tadeva vivarati “ācariyo”tiādinā. “Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”nti imissā
tika-s0104t:655_4: desanāya brahmadattena vuttaṃ vaṇṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā desitattā āha “antevāsī vaṇṇa”nti.
tika-s0104t:655_5: Idāni pāḷiyā sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “itī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Desanākusaloti “imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā
tika-s0104t:655_6: ayaṃ desanā sambhavatī”ti desanāya kusalo, etena pakaraṇānuguṇaṃ bhagavato thomanamakāsi.
tika-s0104t:655_7: Esā hi saṃvaṇṇanakānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ tattha tattha pakaraṇādhigataguṇena bhagavato
tika-s0104t:655_9: bahūsvatthesu dissati. Tathā hesa “paṇḍitovāpi tena so”tiādīsu upamāne dissati, sadisabhāveti
tika-s0104t:655_10: attho. “Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muniṃ pavedayantī”tiādīsu samuccaye. “Ke vā ime kassa vā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:655_11: saṃsaye. “Ayaṃ vā (ayañca) imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:655_12: vacanavossagge. “Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”tiādīsu padapūraṇe. “Madhuṃ vā maññati
tika-s0104t:655_13: bālo, yāva pāpaṃ na paccatī”tiādīsu sadise. “Ye hi keci bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
tika-s0104t:655_14: vā”tiādīsu vikappe. Idhāpi vikappeyeva. Mama vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vāti vividhā
tika-s0104t:655_15: visuṃ vikappanassa jotakattāti āha “vā-saddo vikappanattho”ti. Para-saddo pana attheva
tika-s0104t:655_16: aññattho “ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, pare ca me na ājāneyyu”ntiādīsu atthi
tika-s0104t:655_18: Atthi paccanīkattho “uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:655_19: idhāpi paccanīkatthoti dasseti “paṭiviruddhā sattā”ti iminā. Sāsanassa paccanīkabhūtā
tika-s0104t:655_20: paccatthikā sattāti attho. Ta-saddo pareti vuttamatthaṃ avaṇṇabhāsanakiriyāvisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0104t:656_0: Nanu tesaṃ āghāto natthi guṇamahattattā, atha kasmā evaṃ vuttanti codanālesaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0104t:656_1: tadapaneti “kiñcāpī”tiādinā. Kiñcāpi natthi, atha kho tathāpīti attho. Īdisesupīti
tika-s0104t:656_2: ettha pi-saddo sambhāvanattho, tena ratanattayanimittampi akusalacittaṃ na uppādetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:656_4: nettīti dhammanetti. Āhanatīti ābhuso ghaṭṭeti, hiṃsati vā, vibādhati, upatāpeti
tika-s0104t:656_5: cāti attho. Katthaci “etthā”ti pāṭho dissati, so pacchālikhito porāṇapāṭhānugatāya
tika-s0104t:656_6: ṭīkāya virodhattā, atthayuttiyā ca abhāvato. Yadipi domanassādayo ca āhananti, kopeyeva
tika-s0104t:656_7: panāyaṃ niruḷhoti dasseti “kopassetaṃ adhivacana”nti iminā. Avayavatthañhi dassetvā
tika-s0104t:656_8: tattha pariyāyena atthaṃ dassento evamāha. Adhivacananti ca adhikicca pavattaṃ vacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:656_9: pasiddhaṃ vā vacanaṃ, nāmanti attho. Evamitaresupi. Ettha ca sabhāvadhammato aññassa
tika-s0104t:656_10: kattuabhāvajotanatthaṃ “āhanatī”ti kattutthe āghātasaddaṃ dasseti. Āhanati etena,
tika-s0104t:656_11: āhananamattaṃ vā āghātoti karaṇabhāvatthāpi sambhavantiyeva. “Appatītā”ti etassattho
tika-s0104t:656_12: “atuṭṭhā asomanassikā”ti vutto, idaṃ pana pākaṭapariyāyena apaccayasaddassa nibbacanadassanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:656_13: tammukhena pana na pacceti tenāti appaccayoti kātabbaṃ. Abhirādhayatīti sādhayati.
tika-s0104t:656_14: Etthāti etesu tīsu padesu. Dvīhīti āghātaanabhiraddhipadehi. Ekenāti apaccayapadena.
tika-s0104t:656_15: Ettakesu gahitesu taṃsampayuttā aggahitā siyuṃ, na ca sakkā tepi aggahituṃ ekuppādādisabhāvattāti
tika-s0104t:656_16: codanaṃ visodhetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ, tesanti yathāvuttānaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhavedanākkhandhekadesānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:656_18: pavattiyā paccayasamavāyanaṃ idha “karaṇa”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana atthato uppādanameva.
tika-s0104t:656_19: Tadanuppādanañhi sandhāya pāḷiyaṃ “na karaṇīyā”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭikkhittameva yathārahaṃ
tika-s0104t:657_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ manopadose. “Tesu avaṇṇabhāsakesū”ti iminā ādhāratthe bhummaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:657_1: Nimittatthe, bhāvalakkhaṇe vā etaṃ bhummanti āha “tasmiṃ vā avaṇṇe”ti. Na hi aguṇo,
tika-s0104t:657_2: nindā vā kopadomanassānaṃ ādhāro sambhavati tabbhāsakāyattattā tesaṃ. Assathāti sattamiyā
tika-s0104t:657_4: ce, yadi bhaveyyāthā’ti ca vadanto ‘yathākkamaṃ pubbāparayogino ete saddā’ti ñāpetī”ti
tika-s0104t:657_5: vadanti. “Kupitā kopena anattamanā domanassenā”ti iminā “evaṃ paṭhamena nayenā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:657_7: eko saddo “amhāka”nti iminā samānattho “amha”nti saddo viya yathā “tasmā hi amhaṃ
tika-s0104t:657_8: daharā na mīyare”ti āha “tumhākaṃyevā”ti. Atthavasā liṅgavipariyāyoti katvā “tāya
tika-s0104t:657_9: ca anattamanatāyā”ti vuttaṃ. “Antarāyo”ti vutte samaṇadhammavisesānanti atthassa
tika-s0104t:657_10: pakaraṇato viññāyamānattā, viññāyamānatthassa ca saddassa payoge kāmacārattā “paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:657_11: antarāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “antarāyo”ti idaṃ manopadosassa akaraṇīyatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:657_12: Yasmā tumhākameva tena kopādinā paṭhamajjhānādīnamantarāyo bhaveyya, tasmā te kopādipariyāyena
tika-s0104t:657_13: vuttā āghātādayo na karaṇīyāti adhippāyo, tena “nāhaṃ sabbaññū”ti issarabhāvena tumhe
tika-s0104t:657_14: tato nivāremi, atha kho imināva kāraṇenāti dasseti. Taṃ pana kāraṇavacanaṃ yasmā
tika-s0104t:657_15: ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ hoti, tasmā “ādīnavaṃ dassento”ti heṭṭhā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:658_0: So pana manopadoso na kevalaṃ kālantarabhāvinoyeva hitasukhassa antarāyakaro, atha
tika-s0104t:658_1: kho taṅkhaṇapavattanārahassapi hitasukhassa antarāyakaroti manopadose ādīnavaṃ daḷhataraṃ
tika-s0104t:658_2: katvā dassetuṃ “api nū”tiādimāhātipi sambandho vattabbo. Paresanti ye attato aññe,
tika-s0104t:658_3: tesanti attho, na pana “pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādīsu viya paṭiviruddhasattānanti
tika-s0104t:658_4: āha “yesaṃ kesañcī”ti. Tadevatthaṃ samattheti “kupito hī”tiādinā. Pāḷiyaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitavacanajānanampi
tika-s0104t:659_0: Andhaṃtamanti andhabhāvakaraṃ tamaṃ, ativiya vā tamaṃ. Yaṃ naraṃ sahate abhibhavati,
tika-s0104t:659_1: tassa andhatamanti sambandho. Yanti vā bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ, yasmiṃ kāle sahate,
tika-s0104t:659_2: tadā andhatamaṃ hotīti attho, kāraṇaniddeso vā, yena kāraṇena sahate, tena andhatamanti.
tika-s0104t:659_3: Evaṃ sati yaṃtaṃ-saddānaṃ niccasambandhattā “yadā”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ. Kiriyāparāmasanaṃ
tika-s0104t:659_4: vā etaṃ, “kodho sahate”ti yadetaṃ kodhassa abhibhavanaṃ vuttaṃ, etaṃ andhatamanti.
tika-s0104t:659_5: Tato ca kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passatīti yojetabbaṃ. Atthaṃ dhammanti
tika-s0104t:659_6: pāḷiatthaṃ, pāḷidhammañca. Cittappakopanoti cittassa pakatibhāvavijahanena padūsako.
tika-s0104t:659_7: Antaratoti abbhantarato, cittato vā kodhavasena bhayaṃ jātaṃ. Nti tathāsabhāvaṃ kodhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:660_1: adhikāro. Avaṇṇabhāsakānamavisayattā “tatrā”ti padassa tasmiṃ avaṇṇeti atthova dassito.
tika-s0104t:660_2: Abhūtanti kattubhūtaṃ vacanaṃ, yaṃ vacanaṃ abhūtaṃ hotīti attho. Abhūtatoti pana
tika-s0104t:660_5: Tatrāti tasmiṃ vacane. Yojanāti adhippāyapayojanā. Tuṇhīti abhāsanatthe nipāto, bhāvanapuṃsako
tika-s0104t:660_6: cesa. “Itipetaṃ abhūta”nti vatvā “yaṃ tumhehī”tiādinā tadatthaṃ vivarati. Imināpīti
tika-s0104t:660_8: Eva-saddo tīsupi padesu yojetabbo, sabbaññubhāvato na asabbaññū, svākkhātattā na
tika-s0104t:660_9: durakkhāto, suppaṭipannattā na duppaṭipannoti imināpi kāraṇena nibbeṭhetabbanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:660_11: āha “tatra idañcidañca kāraṇa”nti. Tatrāti tesu sabbaññutādīsu. Idañca idañca kāraṇanti
tika-s0104t:660_13: attho. Tatridaṃ kāraṇaṃ – sabbaññū eva amhākaṃ satthā aviparītadhammadesanattā. Svākkhāto
tika-s0104t:660_14: eva dhammo ekantaniyyānikattā. Suppaṭipanno eva saṅgho saṃkilesarahitattāti. Kāraṇānukāraṇadassanampettha
tika-s0104t:660_17: yathā “tiṇehi bhattaṃ siniddhaṃ, pāsāde dhammamajjhāyatī”ti. Dutiyaṃ padanti “ataccha”nti
tika-s0104t:660_18: padaṃ. Paṭhamassa padassāti “abhūta”nti padassa. Catutthanti “na ca panetaṃ amhesu
tika-s0104t:660_19: saṃvijjatī”ti padaṃ. Tatiyassāti “natthi cetaṃ amhesū”ti padassa. Vividhamekattheyeva
tika-s0104t:660_20: pavattaṃ vacanaṃ vivacanaṃ, tadeva vevacanaṃ, vacananti vā attho saddena vacanīyattā
tika-s0104t:660_21: “bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, bhagavāti vacanamuttama”ntiādīsu viya. Nānāsabhāvato
tika-s0104t:660_22: vigataṃ vacanaṃ yassāti vevacanaṃ vuttanayena, pariyāyavacananti attho.
tika-s0104t:661_0: Etthāha – kasmā panettha pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu ekekapadavaseneva adhippeto
tika-s0104t:661_1: attho siddho, evaṃ siddhe sati kimete tena pariyāyavacanena. Tadetañhi ganthagāravādianekadosakaraṃ,
tika-s0104t:661_2: yadi ca taṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, tadeva vuttaṃ assa, na tadaññanti? Vuccate – desanākāle,
tika-s0104t:661_3: hi āyatiñca kassaci kathañci tadatthapaṭivedhanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Desanāpaṭiggāhakesu
tika-s0104t:661_4: hi yo tesaṃ pariyāyavacanānaṃ yaṃ pubbe saṅketaṃ karoti “idamimassatthassa vacana”nti,
tika-s0104t:661_5: tassa teneva tadatthapaṭivedho hoti. Apica tasmiṃ khaṇe vikkhittacittānaṃ aññavihitānaṃ
tika-s0104t:661_6: vipariyāyānaṃ aññena pariyāyena tadatthāvabodhanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:661_7: Yañhi ye na suṇanti, tapparihāyanavasena tesaṃ sabbathā paripuṇṇassa yathāvuttassa
tika-s0104t:661_8: atthassa anavabodho siyā, pariyāyavacane pana vutte tabbasena paripuṇṇamatthāvabodho
tika-s0104t:661_9: hoti. Atha vā mandabuddhīnaṃ punappunaṃ tadatthalakkhaṇena asammohanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:661_10: vuttaṃ. Mandabuddhīnañhi ekeneva padena ekatthassa sallakkhaṇena sammoho hoti, anekena
tika-s0104t:661_11: pariyāyena pana ekatthassa sallakkhaṇena tathāsammoho na hoti anekappavattinimittena
tika-s0104t:662_0: Aparo nayo – “anekepi atthā samānabyañjanā hontī”ti yā atthantaraparikappanā siyā,
tika-s0104t:662_1: tassā parivajjanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Anekesampi hi atthānaṃ
tika-s0104t:662_2: ekapadavacanīyatāvasena samānabyañjanattā yathāvuttassa padassa “ayamattho nu kho
tika-s0104t:662_3: adhippeto, udāhu ayamatthovā”ti pavattaṃ sotūnamatthantaraparikappanaṃ vevacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:664: Pariyāyena yutto tu, pariyāyo ca bhedako”ti.
tika-s0104t:665_0: Aparo nayo – anaññassāpi pariyāyavacanassa vacane anekāhi tāhi tāhi nāmapaññattīhi
tika-s0104t:665_1: tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ paññāpanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ vattabbaṃ hoti. Tathā hi pariyāyavacane
tika-s0104t:665_2: vutte “imassatthassa idamidampi nāma”nti sotūnaṃ anekadhā nāmapaññattivijānanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:665_3: Tato ca taṃtaṃpaññattikosallaṃ hoti seyyathāpi nighaṇṭusatthe paricayataṃ. Apica
tika-s0104t:665_5: Tabbacanena hi dhammadesakānaṃ tantiatthassa attano citte upanibandhanena ṭhapanena
tika-s0104t:665_6: paresaṃ sotūnamavabodhanaṃ sukhasiddhaṃ hoti. Atha vā sammāsambuddhassa attano dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsampattiyā
tika-s0104t:665_7: vibhāvanatthaṃ, veneyyānañca tattha bījavāpanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ bhagavā niddisati.
tika-s0104t:665_8: Tadasampattikassa hi tathāvacanaṃ na sambhavati. Tena ca pariyāyavacanena yathāsutena
tika-s0104t:665_10: ca puññasaṅkhātassa bījassa vapanaṃ sambhavati. Ko hi īdisāya sampattiyā viññāyamānāya
tika-s0104t:665_11: tadetaṃ nābhipattheyyāti, kiṃ vā bahunā. Yassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā sammāsambuddho
tika-s0104t:665_12: yathā sabbasmiṃ atthe appaṭihatañāṇacāro, tathā sabbasmiṃ saddavohāreti ekampi atthaṃ
tika-s0104t:665_13: anekehi pariyāyehi bodheti, natthi tattha dandhāyitattaṃ vitthāritattaṃ, nāpi dhammadesanāya
tika-s0104t:665_14: hāni, āveṇiko cāyaṃ buddhadhammo. Sabbaññutaññāṇassa hi suppaṭividitabhāvena paṭisambhidāñāṇehi
tika-s0104t:665_15: viya tenapi ñāṇena atthe, dhamme, niruttiyā ca appaṭihatavuttitāya buddhalīḷāya ekampi
tika-s0104t:665_16: atthaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi bodheti, na pana tasmiṃ saddavohāre, tathābodhane vā mandabhāvo
tika-s0104t:665_17: sammābodhanassa sādhanattā, na ca tena atthassa vitthārabhāvo ekassevatthassa desetabbassa
tika-s0104t:665_18: subbijānanakāraṇattā, nāpi tabbacanena dhammadesanāhāni tassa desanāsampattibhāvato.
tika-s0104t:665_19: Tasmā sātthakaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ, na cāpi taṃ ganthagāravādianekadosakaranti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:665_20: Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “yadi ca taṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, tadeva vuttaṃ assa, na tadañña”nti,
tika-s0104t:665_21: tampi na yuttaṃ payojanantarasambhavato. Tadeva hi avatvā tadaññassa vacanena desanākkhaṇe
tika-s0104t:665_23: tadatthādhigamo hoti, itarathā tasmiṃyeva pade punappunaṃ vutte tesaṃ tadatthānadhigatatā
tika-s0104t:676_0: Idaṃ pana nibbeṭhanaṃ īdiseyeva, na sabbattha kātabbanti dassento “idañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:676_1: Tattha avaṇṇeyevāti kāraṇapatirūpaṃ vatvā, avatvā vā dosapatiṭṭhāpanavasena nindāya
tika-s0104t:676_2: eva. Na sabbatthāti na kevalaṃ akkosanakhuṃsanavambhanādīsu sabbattha nibbeṭhanaṃ
tika-s0104t:676_3: kātabbanti attho. Tadevatthaṃ “yadi hī”tiādinā pākaṭaṃ karoti. “Sāsaṅkanīyo hotī”ti
tika-s0104t:676_5: “na sabbatthā”ti etassa vivaraṇaṃ. Jātināmagottakammasippaābādha liṅga kilesa āpatti
tika-s0104t:676_6: akkosanasaṅkhātehi dasahi akkosavatthūhi. Adhivāsanameva khanti, na diṭṭhinijjhānakkhamanādayoti adhivāsanakhanti.
tika-s0104t:677_0: 6. Evaṃ avaṇṇabhūmiyā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni vaṇṇabhūmiyāpi saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātumāha
tika-s0104t:677_2: “pañcahākārehi tādī iṭṭhāniṭṭhe tādī, cattāvīti tādī, tiṇṇāvīti tādī, muttāvīti tādī,
tika-s0104t:677_3: taṃniddesā tādī”ti niddesanayena pañcasu atthesu idha paṭhamenatthena tādī. Tatrāyaṃ niddeso –
tika-s0104t:678_0: Kathaṃ arahā iṭṭhāniṭṭhe tādī, arahā lābhepi tādī, alābhepi tādī, yasepi, ayasepi,
tika-s0104t:678_1: pasaṃsāyapi, nindāyapi, sukhepi, dukkhepi tādī, ekañce bāhaṃ gandhena limpeyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t:678_2: ekañce bāhaṃ vāsiyā taccheyyuṃ, amusmiṃ natthi rāgo, amusmiṃ natthi paṭigho, anunayapaṭighavippahīno
tika-s0104t:678_3: ugghāṭinigghāṭivītivatto, anurodhavirodhasamatikkanto, evaṃ arahā iṭṭhāniṭṭhe tādīti.
tika-s0104t:679_0: Vacanattho pana tamiva dissatīti tādī, iṭṭhamiva aniṭṭhampi passatīti attho. Tassa
tika-s0104t:679_1: lakkhaṇaṃ tādilakkhaṇaṃ, iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samapekkhanasabhāvo. Atha vā tamiva dissate
tika-s0104t:679_2: tādī, so eva sabhāvo, tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ tādilakkhaṇanti. Vaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ tādilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:679_3: dassetunti sambandho. Para-saddo aññattheti āha “ye kecī”tiādi. Ānandanti bhusaṃ
tika-s0104t:679_4: pamodanti taṃsamaṅgino sattā etenāti ānandasaddassa karaṇatthataṃ dasseti. Sobhanamano
tika-s0104t:679_5: sumano, cittaṃ, sobhanaṃ vā mano yassāti sumano, taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo. Nanu ca cittavācakabhāve
tika-s0104t:679_6: sati cetasikasukhassa bhāvatthatā yuttā, puggalavācakabhāve pana cittameva bhāvattho
tika-s0104t:679_7: siyā, na cetasikasukhaṃ, sumanasaddassa dabbanimittaṃ pati pavattattā yathā “daṇḍittaṃ
tika-s0104t:679_8: sikhitta”ntiādīti? Saccametaṃ dabbe apekkhite, idha pana tadanapekkhitvā tena dabbena
tika-s0104t:679_9: yuttaṃ mūlanimittabhūtaṃ cetasikasukhameva apekkhitvā sumanasaddo pavatto, tasmā
tika-s0104t:679_10: etthāpi cetasikasukhameva bhāvattho sambhavati, tenāha “cetasikasukhassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-s0104t:679_11: Etena hi vacanena tadaññacetasikānampi cittapaṭibaddhattā, cittakiriyattā ca yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-s0104t:679_12: somanassabhāvo āpajjatīti codanaṃ nāpajjateva ruḷhisaddattā tassa yathā “paṅkaja”nti
tika-s0104t:679_13: pariharati. Ubbilayatīti ubbilaṃ, bhindati purimāvatthāya visesaṃ āpajjatīti attho.
tika-s0104t:679_14: Tadeva ubbilāvitaṃ paccayantarāgamādivasena. Uddhaṃ palavatīti vā ubbilāvitaṃ akārānaṃ
tika-s0104t:679_15: ikāraṃ, ākārañca katvā, cittameva “cetaso”ti vuttattā. Taddhite pana siddhe taṃ abyatirittaṃ
tika-s0104t:679_16: tasmiṃ pade vacanīyassa sāmaññabhāvato, tassa vā saddassa nāmapadattā, tasmā kassāti
tika-s0104t:679_17: sambandhīvisesānuyoge “cetaso”ti vuttanti dassetuṃ “kassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-s0104t:679_18: īdisesu. Yāya uppannāya kāyacittaṃ vātapūritabhastā viya uddhumāyanākārappattaṃ hoti
tika-s0104t:679_19: tassā gehasitāya odagyapītiyā etaṃ adhivacananti sarūpaṃ dasseti “uddhaccāvahāyā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:679_20: Uddhaccāvahāyāti uddhatabhāvāvahāya. Uppilāpeti cittaṃ uppilāvitaṃ karotīti ubbilāpanā,
tika-s0104t:679_21: sā eva pīti, tassā. Khandhavasena dhammavisesattaṃ āha “idhāpī”tiādinā. Avaṇṇabhūmimapekkhāya
tika-s0104t:679_22: api-saddo “ayampi pārājiko”tiādīsu viya, idha ca kiñcāpi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ubbilāvitameva
tika-s0104t:679_23: natthi, atha kho āyatiṃ kulaputtānaṃ edisesupi ṭhānesu akusaluppattiṃ paṭisedhento
tika-s0104t:679_24: dhammanettiṃ ṭhapetīti. Dvīhi padehi saṅkhārakkhandho, ekena vedanākkhandho vuttoti
tika-s0104t:679_25: etthāpi “tesaṃ vasena sesānaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ karaṇaṃ paṭikkhittamevā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:679_26: vuttanayena sakkā viññātunti na vuttaṃ. “Pi-saddo sambhāvanattho”tiādinā vuttanayena
tika-s0104t:680_0: Tumhaṃyevassa tena antarāyoti etthāpi “antarāyo”ti idaṃ “ubbilāvitattassa akaraṇīyatākāraṇavacana”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:680_1: heṭṭhā avaṇṇapakkhe amhehi vuttanayānusārena attho daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca “ānandino
tika-s0104t:680_2: ubbilāvitā”ti dīpitaṃ pītimeva gahetvā “tena ubbilāvitattenā”ti vacanaṃ somanassarahitāya
tika-s0104t:680_3: pītiyā abhāvato tabbacaneneva “sumanā”ti dīpitaṃ somanassampi siddhamevāti katvā
tika-s0104t:680_4: vuttaṃ. Atha vā somanassassa antarāyakaratā pākaṭā, na tathā pītiyāti evaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0104t:680_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā panetanti yathāvuttaṃ atthaṃ avibhāgato manasi katvā codeti. Ācariyo
tika-s0104t:681_0: Tattha etanti ānandādīnamakaraṇīyatāvacanaṃ, nanu bhagavatā vaṇṇitanti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:681_1: Buddhoti kittayantassāti “buddho”ti vacanaṃ guṇānussaraṇavasena kathentassa sādhujanassa.
tika-s0104t:681_2: Kasiṇenāti kasiṇatāya sakalabhāvena. Jambudīpassāti cetassa avayavabhāvena sambandhīvacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:681_3: Apare pana “jambudīpassāti karaṇavacanatthe sāmivacana”ti vadanti, tesaṃ matena kasiṇajambudīpasaddānaṃ
tika-s0104t:681_4: samānādhikaraṇabhāvo daṭṭhabbo, karaṇavacanañca nissakkatthe. Pageva ekadesato panāti
tika-s0104t:682_0: “Mā soci udāyi, ānando avītarāgo kālaṃ kareyya, tena cittappasādena sattakkhattuṃ
tika-s0104t:682_1: devarajjaṃ kāreyya, sattakkhattuṃ imasmiṃyeva jambudīpe mahārajjaṃ kāreyya, apica
tika-s0104t:683_0: Saṅgahitaṃ. Nti suttantare vuttaṃ pītisomanassaṃ. Nekkhammassitanti kāmato nikkhamane
tika-s0104t:683_1: kusaladhamme nissitaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte. Gehassitanti gehavāsīnaṃ samudāciṇṇato
tika-s0104t:683_2: gehasaṅkhāte kāmaguṇe nissitaṃ. Kasmā tadevidhādhippetanti āha “idañhī”tiādi. “Āyasmato
tika-s0104t:683_3: channassa uppannasadisa”nti vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ, samatthetuṃ vā “tenevā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:683_4: vuttaṃ. Visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi bhagavati, dhamme ca pavattagehassitapematāya.
tika-s0104t:683_5: Parinibbānakāleti parinibbānāsannakāle bhagavatā paññattena tajjitoti vā sambandho.
tika-s0104t:683_6: Parinibbānakāleti vā bhagavato parinibbutakāle saṅghena tajjito nibbattetīti vā sambandho.
tika-s0104t:683_7: Brahmadaṇḍenāti “bhikkhūhi itthannāmo neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, nānusāsitabbo”ti
tika-s0104t:683_8: katena brahmadaṇḍena. Tajjitoti saṃvejito. Tasmāti yasmā gehassitapītisomanassaṃ
tika-s0104t:683_9: jhānādīnaṃ antarāyakaraṃ, tasmā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā sakkapañhasutte “somanassaṃpāhaṃ
tika-s0104t:684_0: “Ayañhī”tiādinā tadevatthaṃ kāraṇato samattheti. Rāgasahitattā hi sā antarāyakarāti.
tika-s0104t:684_1: Ettha pana “idañhi rāgasañhitaṃ pītisomanassa”nti vattabbaṃ siyā, tathāpi pītiggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:684_2: somanassampi gahitameva hoti somanassarahitāya pītiyā abhāvatoti heṭṭhā vuttanayena
tika-s0104t:684_3: pītiyeva gahitā. Apica sevitabbāsevitabbavibhāgassa sutte vacanato somanassassa pākaṭo
tika-s0104t:684_4: antarāyakarabhāvo, na tathā pītiyāti sāyeva rāgasahitatthena visesetvā vuttā. Avaṇṇabhūmiyā
tika-s0104t:684_5: saddhiṃ sambandhitvā pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “lobho cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kodhasadisovāti avaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:685_0: “Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, dhammassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, saṅghassa
tika-s0104t:685_1: vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, tatra ce tumhe assatha ānandino sumanā ubbilāvitā, api nu tumhe
tika-s0104t:685_2: paresaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthāti? No hetaṃ bhante”ti ayaṃ tatiyavāro nāma
tika-s0104t:685_3: avaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ vuttanayavasena tatiyavāraṭṭhāne nīharitabbattā, so desanākāle tena
tika-s0104t:685_4: vārena bodhetabbapuggalābhāvato desanāya anāgatopi tadatthasambhavato atthato āgatoyeva.
tika-s0104t:685_5: Yathā taṃ vitthāravasena kathāvatthuppakaraṇanti dassetuṃ “tatiyavāro panā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:685_6: vuttaṃ, etena saṃvaṇṇanākāle tathābujjhanakasattānaṃ vasena so vāro ānetvā saṃvaṇṇetabboti
tika-s0104t:685_7: dasseti. “Yatheva hī”tiādinā tadevatthasambhavaṃ vibhāveti. Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti
tika-s0104t:686_0: Paṭipajjitabbākāradassanavāreti yathāvuttaṃ tatiyavāraṃ upādāya vattabbe catutthavāre.
tika-s0104t:686_1: “Tumhākaṃ satthā”ti vacanato pabhuti yāva “imināpi kāraṇena taccha”nti vacanaṃ, tāva
tika-s0104t:686_2: yojanā. “So hi bhagavā”tiādi tabbivaraṇaṃ. Tattha itipīti imināpi kāraṇena. Vitthāro
tika-s0104t:686_3: visuddhimagge “anāpatti upasampannassa bhūtaṃ ārocetī”ti vuttepi sabhāgānameva ārocanaṃ
tika-s0104t:686_4: yuttanti āha “sabhāgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃyeva paṭijānitabba”nti. Teyeva hi tassa atthakāmā,
tika-s0104t:686_5: saddheyyavacanattañca maññanti, tato ca “sāsanassa amoghatā dīpitā hotī”ti vuttatthasamatthanaṃ
tika-s0104t:686_6: siyā. “Evañhī”tiādi kāraṇavacanaṃ. Pāpicchatā ceva parivajjitā, kattubhūtā vā sā,
tika-s0104t:686_7: hotīti sambandho. Amoghatāti niyyānikabhāvena atucchatā. Vuttanayenāti “tatra tumhehīti
tika-s0104t:686_8: tasmiṃ vaṇṇe tumhehī”tiādinā ceva “dutiyaṃ padaṃ paṭhamassa padassa, catutthañca
tika-s0104t:688_0: 7. Ko anusandhīti pucchā “nanu ettakeneva yathāvuttehi avaṇṇavaṇṇehi sambandhā desanāmatthakaṃ
tika-s0104t:688_1: pattā”ti anuyogasambhavato katā. Vaṇṇena ca avaṇṇena cāti tadubhayapadena. Atthaniddeso
tika-s0104t:688_2: viya hi saddaniddesopīti akkharacintakā. Atha vā tathābhāsanassa kāraṇattā, koṭṭhāsattā
tika-s0104t:688_3: ca “padehī”ti vuttaṃ. Avaṇṇena ca vaṇṇena cāti pana aguṇaguṇavasena, nindāpasaṃsāvasena
tika-s0104t:688_5: vuttaṃ. Taṃ vitthāretvā desanāya bodhetabbapuggalābhāvato ettakāva sā yuttarūpāti
tika-s0104t:688_6: bhagavato ajjhāsayeneva adesanābhāvena nivatto, yathā taṃ vaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ tatiyavārotipi
tika-s0104t:688_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā bodhetabbapuggalasambhavena vissajjetabbatāya adhigatabhāvato anuvattatiyeva.
tika-s0104t:688_8: Itipetaṃ bhūtanti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho taduparipi anuvattakattā, tena vakkhati
tika-s0104t:688_9: “idha panā”tiādi. Ettāvatā ayaṃ vaṇṇānusandhīti dassetvā duvidhesu pana tesu vaṇṇesu
tika-s0104t:688_10: brahmadattassa vaṇṇānusandhīti dassento “so panā”tiādimāha. Upari suññatāpakāsane
tika-s0104t:689_0: Evaṃ pucchāvissajjanāmukhena samudāyatthataṃ vatvā idāni avayavatthataṃ dasseti “tatthā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:689_1: Appameva parito samantato khaṇḍitattā parittaṃ nāmāti āha “appamattakanti parittassa
tika-s0104t:689_2: nāma”nti. Mattā vuccati pamāṇaṃ mīyate parimīyateti katvā. Samāsantakakārena appamattakaṃ
tika-s0104t:689_3: yathā “bahuputtako”ti, evaṃ oramattakepi. Eteneva “appā mattā appamattā, sā etassāti
tika-s0104t:689_4: appamattaka”ntiādinā kapaccayassa sātthakatampi dasseti atthato abhinnattā. Mattakasaddassa
tika-s0104t:689_5: anatthakabhāvato sīlameva sīlamattakaṃ. Anatthakabhāvoti ca sakatthatā purimapadattheyeva
tika-s0104t:689_6: pavattanato. Na hi saddā kevalaṃ anatthakā bhavantīti akkharacintakā. Nanu ca bhagavato
tika-s0104t:689_7: pāramitānubhāvena niratthakamekakkharampi mukhavaraṃ nārohati, sakalañca pariyattisāsanaṃ
tika-s0104t:689_8: pade pade catusaccappakāsananti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ tassa anatthakatā sambhavatīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0104t:689_9: tampi padantarābhihitassa atthassa visesanavasena tadabhihitaṃ atthaṃ vadati eva,
tika-s0104t:689_10: so pana attho vināpi tena padantareneva sakkā viññātunti anatthakamicceva vuttanti.
tika-s0104t:689_12: bhagavato desanā pavattati, vineyyā ca anādimatisaṃsāre lokiyesuyeva saddesu paribhāvitacittā,
tika-s0104t:689_13: loke ca asatipi atthantarāvabodhe vācāsiliṭṭhatādivasena saddapayogo dissati “labbhati
tika-s0104t:689_14: palabbhati, khañjati nikhañjati, āgacchati paccāgacchatī”tiādinā. Tathāparicitānañca
tika-s0104t:689_15: tathāvidheneva saddapayogena atthāvagamo sukho hotīti anatthakasaddapayogo vuttoti.
tika-s0104t:692_0: Atha vā sīlamattakanti ettha matta-saddo visesanivattiattho “avitakkavicāramattā
tika-s0104t:692_1: dhammā manomattā dhātu manodhātū”ti ca ādīsu viya. “Appamattakaṃ oramattaka”nti padadvayena
tika-s0104t:692_2: sāmaññato vuttoyeva hi attho “sīlamattaka”nti padena visesato vutto, tena ca sīlaṃ
tika-s0104t:692_3: eva sīlamattaṃ, tadeva sīlamattakanti nibbacanaṃ kātabbanti dassetuṃ “sīlameva sīlamattaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:693_0: Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo – oramattakanti ettha oranti apārabhāgo “orato bhogaṃ
tika-s0104t:693_1: oraṃ pāra”ntiādīsu viya. Atha vā heṭṭhāattho orasaddo oraṃ āgamanāya ye paccayā,
tika-s0104t:693_2: te orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanānītiādīsu viya. Sīlañhi samādhipaññāyo apekkhitvā apārabhāge,
tika-s0104t:693_3: heṭṭhābhāge ca hoti, ubhayatthāpi “ore pavattaṃ mattaṃ yassā”tiādinā viggaho. Sīlamattakanti
tika-s0104t:693_4: etthāpi mattasaddo amahatthavācako “bhesajjamattā”tiādīsu viya. Atha vā sīlepi tadekadesasseva
tika-s0104t:693_5: saṅgahaṇatthaṃ amahatthavācako ettha mattasaddo vutto. Tathā hi indriyasaṃvarapaccayasannissitasīlāni
tika-s0104t:693_6: idha desanaṃ anāruḷhāni. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā tāni pātimokkhasaṃvaraājīvapārisuddhisīlāni
tika-s0104t:693_7: viya na sabbaputhujjanesu pākaṭānīti. Mattanti cettha visesanivattiatthe napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ.
tika-s0104t:694_0: “Idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādinā saha yojanāya piṇḍatthaṃ dasseti. Yena sīlena vadeyya,
tika-s0104t:694_1: etaṃ sīlamattakaṃ nāmāti sambandho. “Vaṇṇaṃ vadāmīti ussāhaṃ katvāpī”ti idaṃ “vaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:694_2: vadamāno”ti etassa vivaraṇaṃ. Etena hi “ekapuggalo bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjatī”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:694_3: viya mānasaddassa sāmatthiyatthataṃ dasseti. “Ussāhaṃ kurumāno”ti avatvā “katvā”ti
tika-s0104t:694_5: dassanatthaṃ. “Tattha siyā”tiādinā sandhāyabhāsitamatthaṃ ajānitvā nītatthameva gahetvā
tika-s0104t:694_6: suttantaravirodhitaṃ maññamānassa kassaci īdisī codanā siyāti dasseti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:694_7: “appamattakaṃ kho paneta”ntiādivacane. Kammaṭṭhānabhāvane yuñjati sīlenāti yogī, tassa.
tika-s0104t:695_0: Alaṅkaraṇaṃ vibhūsanaṃ alaṅkāro, pasādhanakiriyā. Alaṃ karoti etenevāti vā alaṅkāro,
tika-s0104t:695_1: kuṇḍalādipasādhanaṃ. Maṇḍīyate maṇḍanaṃ, ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ. Maṇḍīyati etenāti vā maṇḍanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:695_2: mukhacuṇṇādiūnapūraṇopakaraṇaṃ. Idha pana sadisavohārena, taddhitavasena vā sīlameva
tika-s0104t:695_3: tathā vuttaṃ. Maṇḍaneti maṇḍanahetu, maṇḍanakiriyānimittaṃ gatoti attho. Atha vā
tika-s0104t:695_4: maṇḍati sīlenāti maṇḍano, maṇḍanajātiko puriso. Bahumhi cetaṃ jātyāpekkhāya ekavacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:695_5: Ubbāhanatthepi hi ekavacanamicchanti keci, tadayuttameva saddasatthe anāgatattā,
tika-s0104t:695_6: atthayuttiyā ca abhāvato. Kathañhi ekavacananiddiṭṭhato ubbāhanakaraṇaṃ yuttaṃ siyā
tika-s0104t:695_7: ekasmiṃ yevatthe ubbāhitabbassa aññassatthassa abhāvato. Tasmā vipallāsavasena bahvatthe
tika-s0104t:695_8: idaṃ ekavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, maṇḍanasīlesūti attho. Ācariyadhammapālattherenapi hi
tika-s0104t:696: Assaṃ bhavissāmīti ākaṅkheyyāti sambandho. Assāti bhaveyya. Paripūrakārīti cettha iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, tena sakalampi sīlathomanasuttaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:702_0: Gāthaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. “Pupphagandho”ti vatvā tadekadesena dassetuṃ “na candana”ntiādi
tika-s0104t:702_1: vuttaṃ. Candanaṃ tagaraṃ mallikāti hi taṃsahacaraṇato tesaṃ gandhova vutto. Pupphagandhoti
tika-s0104t:702_2: ca pupphañca tadavaseso gandho cāti attho. Tagaramallikāhi vā avasiṭṭho “pupphagandho”ti
tika-s0104t:702_3: vutto. Satañca gandhoti ettha sīlameva sadisavohārena vā taddhitavasena vā gandho.
tika-s0104t:702_4: Sīlanibandhano vā thutighoso vuttanayena “gandho”ti adhippeto. Sīlañhi kittiyā nimittaṃ.
tika-s0104t:702_5: Yathāha “sīlavato kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti. Sappuriso pavāyati pakārehi
tika-s0104t:703: Vassikīti sumanapupphaṃ, “vassika”ntipi pāṭho, tadatthova. Gandhā eva gandhajātā, gandhappakārā vā. Yvāyanti yadidaṃ, uttamo gandho vātīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:704: Sammadaññā vimuttānanti sammā aññāya jānitvā, aggamaggena vā vimuttānaṃ. Maggaṃ na vindatīti kāraṇaṃ na labhati, na jānāti vā.
tika-s0104t:705_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāyā”ti gāthāya paṭisandhipaññāya sapañño ātāpī vīriyavā pārihārikapaññāya
tika-s0104t:705_1: nipako narasaṅkhāto bhikkhu sīle patiṭṭhāya cittaṃ tappadhānena vuttaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayaṃ
tika-s0104t:705_2: bhāvayanto bhāvanāhetu tathā paññaṃ vipassanañca imaṃ antojaṭābahijaṭāsaṅkhātaṃ jaṭaṃ
tika-s0104t:706: Pathaviṃ nissāyāti pathaviṃ rasaggahaṇavasena nissāya, sīlasmiṃ pana paripūraṇavasena nissāya patiṭṭhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:707_0: Appakamahantatāya pārāpārādi viya upanidhāpaññattibhāvato aññamaññaṃ upanidhāya āhāti
tika-s0104t:707_1: vissajjetuṃ “upari guṇe upanidhāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Sīlañhīti ettha hi-saddo kāraṇattho,
tika-s0104t:707_2: tenidaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasseti “yasmā sīlaṃ kiñcāpi patiṭṭhābhāvena samādhissa bahūpakāraṃ,
tika-s0104t:707_3: pabhāvādiguṇavisese panassa upanidhāya kalampi bhāgaṃ na upeti, tathā samādhi ca
tika-s0104t:707_4: paññāyā”ti. Tenevāha “tasmā”tiādi. Na pāpuṇātīti guṇasamabhāvena na sampāpuṇāti,
tika-s0104t:707_5: na sametīti vuttaṃ hoti. Uparimanti samādhipaññaṃ. Upanidhāyāti upatthambhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0104t:707_6: Tañhi tādisāya paññattiyā upatthambhanaṃ hoti. Heṭṭhimanti sīlasamādhidvayaṃ.
tika-s0104t:708_2: cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Abhi…pe… titthiyamaddana”nti idaṃ pana tassa yamakapāṭihāriyassa
tika-s0104t:708_3: supākaṭabhāvadassanatthaṃ, aññehi bodhimūle ñātisamāgamādīsu ca katapāṭihāriyehi
tika-s0104t:708_4: visesadassanatthañca vuttaṃ. Sambodhito hi aṭṭhamepi divase devatānaṃ “buddho vā
tika-s0104t:708_5: no vā”ti uppannakaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpetvā caṅkamanto pāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-s0104t:708_6: akāsi, tato dutiyasaṃvacchare kulanagaragato kapilavatthupure nigrodhārāme ñātīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:708_7: samāgamepi tesaṃ mānamadappahānatthaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi. Tattha abhisambodhitoti
tika-s0104t:708_9: kaṇḍena nāma pasenadirañño uyyānapālena ropitattā kaṇḍambanāmakassa rukkhassa mūle.
tika-s0104t:708_10: Yamakapāṭihāriyakaraṇatthāya bhagavato citte uppanne “tadanucchavikaṃ ṭhānaṃ icchitabba”nti
tika-s0104t:708_11: ratanamaṇḍapādi sakkena devaraññā āṇattena vissakammunā katanti vadanti keci. Bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:708_12: nimmitanti apare. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anekāsu “sakkena devānamindena āṇāpitena vissakammadevaputtena
tika-s0104t:708_13: maṇḍapo kato, caṅkamo pana bhagavatā nimmito”ti vuttaṃ. Dibbasetacchatte devatāhi
tika-s0104t:708_14: dhāriyamāneti attho viññāyati aññesamasambhavato. “Dvādasayojanāya parisāyā”ti idaṃ
tika-s0104t:708_15: catūsu disāsu paccekaṃ dvādasayojanaṃ manussaparisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadā kira dasasahassilokadhātuto
tika-s0104t:708_16: cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ paripūretvā devabrahmānopi sannipatiṃsu. Yo koci evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-s0104t:708_17: kātuṃ samattho ce, so āgacchatūti codanāsadisattā vuttaṃ “attādānaparidīpana”nti.
tika-s0104t:708_18: Attādānañhi anuyogo paṭipakkhassa attassa ādānaṃ gahaṇanti katvā. Titthiyamaddananti
tika-s0104t:708_19: “pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti kuhāyanavasena pubbe uṭṭhitānaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanaṃ, tañca
tika-s0104t:708_20: tathā kātuṃ asamatthatāsampādanameva. Tadetaṃ padadvayaṃ “yamakapāṭihāriya”nti etena
tika-s0104t:708_21: sambandhitabbaṃ. Rājagahaseṭṭhino candanaghaṭikuppattito paṭṭhāya sabbameva cettha vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:709: Uparimakāyatotiādi paṭisambhidāmagge āgatanayadassanaṃ, tena vuttaṃ “itiādinayappavatta”nti, “sabbaṃ vitthāretabba”nti ca. Tatthāyaṃ pāḷiseso –
tika-s0104t:710_0: “Heṭṭhimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, uparimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati. Puratthimakāyato
tika-s0104t:710_1: aggi, pacchimakāyato udakaṃ. Pacchimakāyato aggi, puratthimakāyato udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇaakkhito
tika-s0104t:710_2: aggi, vāmaakkhito udakaṃ. Vāmaakkhito aggi, dakkhiṇaakkhito udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato
tika-s0104t:710_3: aggi, vāmakaṇṇasotato udakaṃ. Vāmakaṇṇasotato aggi, dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇanāsikāsotato
tika-s0104t:710_4: aggi, vāmanāsikāsotato udakaṃ. Vāmanāsikāsotato aggi, dakkhiṇanāsikāsotato udakaṃ.
tika-s0104t:710_5: Dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato aggi, vāmaaṃsakūṭato udakaṃ. Vāmaaṃsakūṭato aggi, dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato
tika-s0104t:710_6: udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇahatthato aggi, vāmahatthato udakaṃ. Vāmahatthato aggi, dakkhiṇahatthato
tika-s0104t:710_7: udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇapassato aggi, vāmapassato udakaṃ. Vāmapassato aggi, dakkhiṇapassato
tika-s0104t:710_8: udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇapādato aggi, vāmapādato udakaṃ. Vāmapādato aggi, dakkhiṇapādato udakaṃ.
tika-s0104t:710_9: Aṅgulaṅgulehi aggi, aṅgulantarikāhi udakaṃ. Aṅgulantarikāhi aggi, aṅgulaṅgulehi udakaṃ.
tika-s0104t:710_10: Ekekalomato aggi, ekekalomato udakaṃ. Lomakūpato lomakūpato aggikkhandho pavattati,
tika-s0104t:712_0: Channaṃ vaṇṇānanti etthāpi nīlānaṃ pītakānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjiṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānanti
tika-s0104t:712_1: ayaṃ sabbopi pāḷiseso peyyālanayena, ādi-saddena ca dassito. Ettha ca channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ
tika-s0104t:712_2: ubbāhanabhūtānaṃ yamakā yamakā vaṇṇā pavattantīti pāṭhasesena sambandho, tena vakkhati
tika-s0104t:712_3: “dutiyā dutiyā rasmiyo”tiādi. Tattha hi tāsaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ pavattanākārena saha
tika-s0104t:712_4: āvajjanaparikammādhiṭṭhānānaṃ visuṃ pavatti dassitā. Keci pana “channaṃ vaṇṇāna”nti
tika-s0104t:712_5: etassa “aggikkhandho udakadhārā”ti purimehi padehi sambandhaṃ vadanti, tadayuttameva
tika-s0104t:712_7: Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ chabbaṇṇā pavattantīti kattuvasena vā sambandho yathā “ekassa cepi
tika-s0104t:712_8: bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apasādetu”nti. Kattukammesu hi bahulā sāmivacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:713_0: Evaṃ pāḷinayena yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ aṭṭhakathānayena vivaranto paccāsattinayena
tika-s0104t:713_1: “channaṃ vaṇṇāna”nti padameva paṭhamaṃ vivarituṃ “tassā”tiādimāha. Tattha tassāti
tika-s0104t:713_2: bhagavato. “Suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo”ti idaṃ tāsaṃ pītābhānaṃ yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ, chabbaṇṇāhi
tika-s0104t:713_3: rasmīhi alaṅkaraṇakālo viyāti attho. Tāpi hi cakkavāḷagabbhato uggantvā brahmalokamāhacca
tika-s0104t:713_5: viya bodhigharaṃ ahosi ekālokaṃ. Dutiyā dutiyā rasmiyoti purimapurimato pacchā pacchā
tika-s0104t:713_6: nikkhantā rasmiyo. Kasmā sadisākāravasena “viyā”ti vacanaṃ vuttanti āha “dvinnañcā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:713_7: Dvinnañca cittānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti nāma natthi, yehi tā evaṃ siyuṃ, tathāpi iminā
tika-s0104t:713_8: kāraṇadvayena evameva khāyantīti adhippāyo. Bhavaṅgaparivāsassāti bhavaṅgavasena
tika-s0104t:713_9: parivasanassa, bhavaṅgasaṅkhātassa parivasanassa vā, bhavaṅgapatanassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:713_11: ca ekassāpi cittassa pavattiyā dve kisso rasmiyopi sambhaveyyunti anuyogamapaneti
tika-s0104t:713_12: “tassā tassā pana rasmiyā”tiādinā. Cittavāranānattā āvajjanaparikammacittāni, kasiṇanānattā
tika-s0104t:713_13: adhiṭṭhānacittavārānipi visuṃ visuṃyeva pavattanti. Āvajjanāvasāne tikkhattuṃ pavattajavanāni
tika-s0104t:714_1: pītakasiṇa”nti idaṃ lohitapītarasmīnaṃ kāraṇeyeva vutte siddhanti na vuttaṃ. Tāsameva
tika-s0104t:714_3: vivaraṇaṃ. Aggikkhandhaudakakkhandhāpi aññamaññaasammissā yāva brahmalokā uggantvā
tika-s0104t:714_4: cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ patiṃsu, taṃ divasaṃ pana satthā yo yo yasmiṃ yasmiṃ dhamme
tika-s0104t:714_5: ca pāṭihāriye ca pasanno, tassa tassa ajjhāsayavasena taṃ taṃ dhammañca kathesi,
tika-s0104t:714_6: pāṭihāriyañca dassesi, evaṃ dhamme bhāsiyamāne, pāṭihāriye ca kariyamāne mahājano
tika-s0104t:714_7: dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Tasmiñca samāgame attano manaṃ gahetvā pañhaṃ pucchituṃ samatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:714_8: adisvā nimmitaṃ buddhaṃ māpesi, tena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ satthā vissajjesi. Satthārā
tika-s0104t:714_9: pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ so vissajjesi, satthu caṅkamanakāle nimmito ṭhānādīsu aññataraṃ
tika-s0104t:714_10: kappesi, tassa caṅkamanakāle satthā ṭhānādīsu aññataraṃ kappesīti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:714_12: nimmito caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappetī”tiādinā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekekamūlakā
tika-s0104t:714_13: satthupakkhe cattāro, nimmitapakkhe cattāroti sabbe aṭṭha vārā vitthāretvā vattabbāti
tika-s0104t:714_14: dasseti. Yasmā sīlaṃ samādhissa patiṭṭhāmattameva hutvā nivattati, samādhiyeva tattha
tika-s0104t:714_15: patiṭṭhāya yathāvuttaṃ sabbaṃ pāṭihāriyakiccaṃ pavatteti, tasmā tadetaṃ samādhikiccamevāti
tika-s0104t:715_0: “Yaṃ panā”tiādinā samādhissa paññamapāpuṇatā vibhāvitā, yaṃ pana paṭivijjhi, idaṃ
tika-s0104t:715_1: paṭivijjhanaṃ paññākiccanti attho. Taṃ anukkamato dasseti “bhagavā”tiādinā. “Kappasatasahassādhikāni
tika-s0104t:715_2: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti idaṃ dīpaṅkarapādamūle katapaṭhamābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:715_3: tato pubbepi yattakena tasmiṃ bhave icchanto sāvakabodhiṃ pattuṃ sakkuṇeyya, tattakaṃ
tika-s0104t:715_4: puññasambhāraṃ samupacinīti veditabbaṃ. Tatoyeva hi “manussattaṃ liṅgasampatti, hetu
tika-s0104t:715_5: satthāradassana”ntiādinā vuttesu aṭṭhadhammesu hetusampannatā ahosi. Keci pana manopaṇidhānavacīpaṇidhānavasena
tika-s0104t:715_6: anekadhā asaṅkhyeyyaparicchedaṃ katvā pubbasambhāraṃ vadanti, tadayuttameva saṅgahāruḷhāsu
tika-s0104t:715_7: aṭṭhakathāsu tathā avuttattā. Tāsu hi yathāvuttanayena paṭhamābhinīhārato pubbe hetusampannatāyeva
tika-s0104t:715_8: dassitā. Ekūnatiṃsavassakāle nikkhamma pabbajitvāti sambandho. Cakkaratanārahapuññavantatāya
tika-s0104t:715_10: vuttaṃ. Bhavanāti rammasurammasubhasaṅkhātā niketanā. Padhānayoganti dukkaracariyāya
tika-s0104t:716_0: Uruvelāyaṃ kira senānigame kuṭumbikassa dhītā sujātā nāma dārikā vayappattā nerañjarāya
tika-s0104t:716_1: tīre nigrodhamūle patthanamakāsi “sacāhaṃ samajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ gantvā paṭhamagabbhe
tika-s0104t:716_2: puttaṃ labhissāmi, khīrapāyāsena balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti, tassā sā patthanā samijjhi.
tika-s0104t:716_3: Sā satta dhenuyo laṭṭhivane khādāpetvā tāsampi dhītaro gāviyo laddhā tatheva khādāpetvā
tika-s0104t:716_4: puna tāsampi dhītaro tathevāti sattaputtinattipanattiparamparāgatāhi dhenūhi khīraṃ
tika-s0104t:716_5: gahetvā khīrapāyāsaṃ pacitumārabhi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahābrahmā tiyojanikaṃ setacchattaṃ
tika-s0104t:716_6: upari dhāresi, sakko devarājā aggiṃ ujjālesi, sakalaloke vijjamānarasaṃ devatā pakkhipiṃsu,
tika-s0104t:716_7: pāyāsaṃ dakkhiṇāvaṭṭaṃ hutvā pacati, taṃ sā suvaṇṇapātiyā satasahassagghanikāya saheva
tika-s0104t:716_8: bodhisattassa datvā pakkāmi. Atha bodhisatto taṃ gahetvā nerañjarāya tīre suppatiṭṭhite
tika-s0104t:716_9: nāma titthe ekatālaṭṭhippamāṇe ekūnapaññāsapiṇḍe karonto paribhuñji, taṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:716_10: vuttaṃ “visākhāpuṇṇamāyaṃ uruvelagāme sujātāya dvinnaṃ pakkhittadibbojaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
tika-s0104t:716_11: paribhuñjitvā”ti. Tattha sujātāyāti āyasmato yasattherassa mātubhūtāya pacchā saraṇagamanaṭṭhāne
tika-s0104t:716_12: etadaggappattāya sujātāya nāma seṭṭhibhariyāya. Aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sāro upatthambhabalakaro
tika-s0104t:716_13: bhūtanissito eko viseso ojā nāma, sā divi bhavā pakkhittā etthāti pakkhittadibbojo,
tika-s0104t:716_14: taṃ. Pātabbo ca so asitabbo cāti pāyāso, rasaṃ katvā pivituṃ, ālopaṃ katvā ca bhuñjituṃ
tika-s0104t:716_15: yutto bhojanaviseso, madhunā sitto pāyāso madhupāyāso, taṃ.
tika-s0104t:717_0: Tato nerañjarāya tīre mahāsālavane nānāsamāpattīhi divāvihārassa katattā “sāyanhasamaye”tiādi
tika-s0104t:717_1: vuttaṃ. Vitthāro tattha tattha gahetabbo. Dakkhiṇuttarenāti divāvihārato bodhiyā
tika-s0104t:717_2: pavisanamaggaṃ sandhāyāha, ujukaṃ dakkhiṇuttaragatena devatāhi alaṅkatena maggenāti
tika-s0104t:717_4: majjhimassāpi gahitattā, tathā luttapayogassa ca dassanato. Evañhi sati ‘dakkhiṇapacchimuttaradisābhāgena
tika-s0104t:717_5: bodhimaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā tiṭṭhatī’ti jātakanidāne vuttavacanena sametī”ti. Dakkhiṇadisato
tika-s0104t:717_6: gantabbo uttaradisābhāgo dakkhiṇuttaro, tena pavisitvāti apare. Keci pana “uttarasaddo
tika-s0104t:717_7: cettha maggavācako. Yadi hi disāvācako bhaveyya, ‘dakkhiṇuttarāyā’ti vadeyyā”ti,
tika-s0104t:717_8: taṃ na “uttarena nadī sīdā, gambhīrā duratikkamā”tiādinā disāvācakassāpi enayogassa
tika-s0104t:717_9: dassanato, uttarasaddassa ca maggavācakassa anāgatattā. Apica disābhāgaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:717_10: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Disābhāgopi hi disā evāti. Atha antarāmagge sotthiyena nāma tiṇahārakabrāhmaṇena
tika-s0104t:717_11: dinnā aṭṭha kusatiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā asitañcanagirisaṅkāsaṃ sabbabodhisattānamassāsajananaṭṭhāne
tika-s0104t:717_12: samāviruḷhaṃ bodhiyā maṇḍanabhūtaṃ bodhimaṇḍamupagantvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
tika-s0104t:717_13: dakkhiṇadisābhāge aṭṭhāsi, so pana padeso paduminipatte udakabindu viya pakampittha,
tika-s0104t:717_14: tato pacchimadisābhāgaṃ, uttaradisābhāgañca gantvā tiṭṭhantepi mahāpurise tatheva
tika-s0104t:717_15: te akampiṃsu, tato “nāyaṃ sabbopi padeso mama guṇaṃ sandhāretuṃ samattho”ti puratthimadisābhāgamagamāsi,
tika-s0104t:717_16: tattha pallaṅkappamāṇaṃ niccalamahosi, tasseva ca nippariyāyena bodhimaṇḍasamaññā,
tika-s0104t:717_18: ṭhito tattha akampanappadese tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā sañcālesi, tāvadeva cuddasahattho
tika-s0104t:717_19: pallaṅko ahosi, tānipi tiṇāni vicittākārena tūlikāya lekhā gahitāni viya ahesuṃ.
tika-s0104t:717_20: So tattha tisandhipallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0104t:717_21: katvā caturaṅgikaṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nisīdi, tamatthaṃ saṅkhipitvā dassento “bodhimaṇḍaṃ
tika-s0104t:718_0: Tattha bodhi vuccati arahattamaggañāṇaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇañca, sā maṇḍati thāmagatatāya
tika-s0104t:718_1: pasīdati etthāti bodhimaṇḍo, nippariyāyena yathāvuttappadeso, pariyāyena pana idha
tika-s0104t:718_3: eva daṭṭhabbo, na yattha katthaci bodhirukkhassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne”ti, taṃ.
tika-s0104t:719_1: sāsasaddaṃ anusiṭṭhitosanesu icchanti, yaṃ tu loke “caladalo, kuñjarāsano” tipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:719_3: ca dumānaṃ rājāti dumarājā, assattho ca so dumarājā cāti assatthadumarājā taṃ. Dvinnaṃ
tika-s0104t:719_4: ūrujāṇusandhīnaṃ, ūrumūlakaṭisandhissa ca vasena tayo sandhayo, saṇṭhānavasena vā
tika-s0104t:719_5: tayo koṇā yassāti tisandhi, sveva pallaṅko ūrubaddhāsanaṃ parisamantato aṅkanaṃ āsananti
tika-s0104t:719_6: atthena ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ, dvibhāvañca katvā, tīhi vā sandhīhi lakkhito pallaṅko
tika-s0104t:719_7: tisandhipallaṅko, taṃ. Ābhujitvāti ābandhitvā, ubho pāde samañchite katvāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:719_8: hoti. Vitthāro sāmaññaphalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgamissati. Attā, mitto, majjhatto, verīti
tika-s0104t:719_10: idaṃ pana “vīriyādhiṭṭhāna”nti etenāpi yojetabbaṃ. Tampi hi –
tika-s0104t:720_0: Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, upasussatu sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ, yaṃ taṃ
tika-s0104t:720_1: purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ, na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa
tika-s0104t:722_0: Cuddasa hatthā vitthatappamāṇabhāvena yassāti cuddasahattho. Parisamantato aṅkīyate
tika-s0104t:722_1: lakkhīyate paricchedavasenāti pallaṅko ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ, tassa ca dvittaṃ katvā.
tika-s0104t:722_2: Apica “idaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti aṭṭhakathāsu vacanato pallaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanaṃ
tika-s0104t:722_3: karoti etthāti pallaṅko niggahitāgamavasena, aluttasamāsavasena vā, cuddasahattho
tika-s0104t:722_4: ca so pallaṅko ca, sveva uttamaṭṭhena patthanīyaṭṭhena ca varoti cuddasahatthapallaṅkavaro,
tika-s0104t:722_5: tattha gato pavatto nisinno tathā. Cuddasahatthatā cettha vitthāravasena gahetabbā.
tika-s0104t:722_6: Tāniyeva hi tiṇāni aparimitapuññānubhāvato cuddasahatthavitthatapallaṅkabhāvena pavattāni,
tika-s0104t:722_7: na ca tāni aṭṭhamuṭṭhippamāṇāni cuddasahatthaaccuggatāni sambhavanti. Tatoyeva ca
tika-s0104t:722_8: idha “tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā”ti vuttaṃ, dhammapadaṭṭhakathādīsu ca “tiṇāni santharitvā…pe…
tika-s0104t:722_9: puratthimābhimukho nisīditvā”ti. Aññattha ca “tiṇāsane cuddasahatthasammate”ti. Keci
tika-s0104t:722_10: pana “accuggatabhāveneva cuddasahattho”ti yathā tathā parikappanāvasena vadanti,
tika-s0104t:722_11: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ yathāvuttena kāraṇena, sādhakena ca viruddhattā. Kāmañca manorathapūraṇiyā
tika-s0104t:722_12: caturaṅguttaravaṇṇanāya “tikkhattuṃ bodhiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha cuddasahatthubbedhe
tika-s0104t:722_13: ṭhāne tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisinnakālato”ti pāṭho
tika-s0104t:722_14: dissati, tathāpi tattha ubbedhasaddo vitthāravācakoti veditabbo, yathā “tiriyaṃ soḷasubbedho,
tika-s0104t:722_15: uddhamāhu sahassadhā”ti mahāpanādajātake. Tathā hi tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “tiriyaṃ
tika-s0104t:722_16: soḷasubbedhoti vitthārato soḷasakaṇḍapātavitthāro ahosī”ti (jātaka aṭṭha. 2-302 piṭṭhe).
tika-s0104t:722_17: Aññathā hi ākāseyeva ukkhipitvā tiṇasantharaṇaṃ kataṃ, na acalapadeseti attho āpajjeyya
tika-s0104t:722_18: santharaṇakiriyādhārabhāvato tassa, so cattho anadhippeto aññattha anāgatattāti.
tika-s0104t:723_0: Rajatakkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā viyāti sambandho. Atthanti pacchimapabbataṃ. Mārabalanti
tika-s0104t:723_1: māraṃ, mārabalañca, mārassa vā sāmatthiyaṃ. Pubbenivāsanti pubbe nivutthakkhandhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:723_2: Dibbacakkhunti dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ. “Kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā jarāmaraṇamukhena
tika-s0104t:723_3: paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā. Ānāpānacatutthajjhānanti etthāpi “sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇa”nti
tika-s0104t:723_4: vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā yojetabbaṃ. Tampi hi buddhānamāciṇṇamevāti vadanti. Pādakaṃ
tika-s0104t:723_5: katvāti kāraṇaṃ, patiṭṭhānaṃ vā katvā. “Vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvāti chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena
tika-s0104t:723_10: Idha pana maggañāṇameva, visesato ca aggamaggañāṇaṃ, tasmā tasseva vipassanāgabbhabhāvo
tika-s0104t:723_11: veditabboti. Sabbabuddhaguṇeti sabbaññutādiniravasesabuddhaguṇe. Tassā pādakaṃ katvā
tika-s0104t:723_12: samādhi nivattoti vuttaṃ “idamassa paññākicca”nti. Assāti bhagavato.
tika-s0104t:724_0: “Tattha yathā hatthe”tiādinā upamāya pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ. Hattheti hatthapasate, karapuṭe
tika-s0104t:724_1: vā. Pātiyanti sarāvake. Ghaṭeti udakaharaṇaghaṭe. Dvattiṃsadoṇagaṇhanappamāṇaṃ kuṇḍaṃ
tika-s0104t:724_2: kolambo. Tato mahatarā cāṭi. Tatopi mahatī mahākumbhī. Soṇḍī kusobbho. Nadībhāgo
tika-s0104t:724_3: kandaro. Cakkavāḷapādesu samuddo cakkavāḷamahāsamuddo. Sinerupādake mahāsamuddeti
tika-s0104t:724_5: Parittaṃ hoti yathāti sambandho. Yassā pāḷiyā atthavibhāvanatthāya yā saṃvaṇṇanā
tika-s0104t:724_6: vuttā, tadeva tassā guṇabhāvena dassetuṃ “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha.
tika-s0104t:725_0: “Duve puthujjanā”tiādi puthujjanesu labbhamānavibhāgadassanatthameva vuttaṃ, na pana
tika-s0104t:725_2: idha adhippetattā. Sabbopi hi puthujjano bhagavato upariguṇe vibhāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t:725_3: tiṭṭhatu tāva puthujjano, ariyasāvakapaccekabuddhānampi avisayā eva buddhaguṇā. Tathā
tika-s0104t:725_4: hi vakkhati “sotāpanno”tiādi. Gottasambandhatāya ādiccassa sūriyadevaputtassa bandhūti
tika-s0104t:726: “Ādicco vuccati sūriyo. Sūriyo gotamo gottena, bhagavāpi gotamo gottena, bhagavā sūriyassa gottañātako gottabandhu, tasmā buddho ādiccabandhū”ti.
tika-s0104t:727_0: Saddavidū pana “buddhassādiccabandhunā”ti pāṭhamicchanti. Ādiccassa bandhunā gottena
tika-s0104t:727_1: samāno gottasaṅkhāto bandhu yassa, buddho ca so ādiccabandhu cāti katvā. Yasmā pana
tika-s0104t:727_2: khandhakathādikosallenāpi upakkilesānupakkilesānaṃ jānanahetubhūtaṃ bāhusaccaṃ hoti, yathāha –
tika-s0104t:728: “Kittāvatā nu kho bhante bahussuto hotīti? Yato kho bhikkhu khandhakusalo hoti. Dhātu…pe… āyatana…pe… paṭiccasamuppādakusalo hoti, ettāvatā kho bhikkhu bahussuto hotī”ti.
tika-s0104t:729_0: Tasmā “yassa khandhadhātuāyatanādīsū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ādi-saddena cettha yāva paṭiccasamuppādā
tika-s0104t:729_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho. Atthassa paripucchanaṃ paripucchā. Aṭṭhakathāvasena
tika-s0104t:729_3: dhammassa pariharaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sutadhātaparicitānaṃ vitakkanaṃ manasānupekkhanaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:730_0: Evaṃ pabhedaṃ dassetvā vacanatthampi dasseti “duvidho”tiādinā. Puthūnanti anekavidhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:730_1: kilesādīnaṃ. Puthujjanantogadhattāti bahūnaṃ janānaṃ abbhantare samavarodhabhāvato
tika-s0104t:730_2: puthujjanoti sambandho. Puthucāyaṃ janoti puthu eva visuṃyeva ayaṃ saṅkhyaṃ gato.
tika-s0104t:730_3: Itīti tasmā puthujjanoti sambandho. Evaṃ gāthābandhena saṅkhepato dassitamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:730_4: “so hī”tiādinā vivarati. “Nānappakārāna”nti iminā puthu-saddo idha bahvatthoti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:731_0: Ādi-saddena saṅgahitamatthaṃ, tadatthassa ca sādhakaṃ ambasecanagarusinānanayena
tika-s0104t:731_1: niddesapāḷiyā dassento “yathāhā”tiādimāha. Avihatā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyo, puthu bahukā
tika-s0104t:731_2: tā etesanti puthuavihatasakkāyadiṭṭhikā, etena avihatattā puthu sakkāyadiṭṭhiyo janenti,
tika-s0104t:731_3: puthūhi vā sakkāyadiṭṭhīhi janitāti atthaṃ dasseti. Avihatatthameva vā janasaddo
tika-s0104t:731_4: vadati, tasmā puthu sakkāyadiṭṭhiyo janenti na vihananti, janā vā avihatā puthu sakkāyadiṭṭhiyo
tika-s0104t:731_5: etesanti atthaṃ dassetītipi vaṭṭati, visesanaparanipātanañcettha daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā
tika-s0104t:731_6: “agyāhito”ti. “Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhullokikā”ti etena puthu bahavo janā satthāro
tika-s0104t:731_7: etesanti nibbacanaṃ dassitaṃ. Puthu sabbagatīhi avuṭṭhitāti ettha pana kammakilesehi
tika-s0104t:731_8: janetabbā, jāyanti vā sattā etthāti janā, gatiyo, puthu sabbā eva janā gatiyo etesanti
tika-s0104t:731_9: vacanattho. “Puthu nānābhisaṅkhāre abhisaṅkharontī”ti etena ca jāyanti etehi sattāti
tika-s0104t:731_10: janā, puññābhisaṅkhārādayo, puthu nānāvidhā janā saṅkhārā etesaṃ vijjanti, puthu
tika-s0104t:731_11: vā nānābhisaṅkhāre janenti abhisaṅkharontīti atthamāha. Tato paraṃ pana “puthu nānāoghehi
tika-s0104t:731_12: vuyhantī”tiādiatthattayaṃ janenti etehi sattāti janā, kāmoghādayo, rāgasantāpādayo,
tika-s0104t:731_13: rāgapariḷāhādayo ca, sabbepi vā kilesapariḷāhā. Puthu nānappakārā te etesaṃ vijjanti,
tika-s0104t:731_14: tehi vā janenti vuyhanti, santāpenti, pariḍahanti cāti nibbacanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:732_0: Api ca rattāti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmakarena chandarāgena rattā.
tika-s0104t:732_1: Giddhāti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhigijjhanena giddhā. Gathitāti ganthitā viya dummocanīyabhāvena
tika-s0104t:732_2: tattha paṭibaddhā. Mucchitāti kilesāvisanavasena visaññībhūtā viya anaññakiccamohaṃ
tika-s0104t:732_3: samāpannā. Ajjhosannāti anaññāsādhāraṇe viya katvā gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0104t:732_4: Laggāti gāvo kaṇṭake viya āsattā, mahāpalipe vā patanena nāsikaggapalipannapuriso
tika-s0104t:732_5: viya uddharitumasakkuṇeyyabhāvena nimuggā. Laggitāti makkaṭālepena viya makkaṭo pañcannaṃ
tika-s0104t:732_6: indriyānaṃ vasena āsaṅgitā, palibuddhāti sambaddhā, upaddutā vāti ayamattho aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:732_7: vutto. Etena jāyatīti jano, “rāgo gedho”ti evamādiko, puthu nānāvidho jano rāgādiko
tika-s0104t:732_8: etesaṃ, puthūsu vā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu janā rattā giddhā…pe… palibuddhāti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:733_0: “Āvutā”tiādipi pariyāyavacanameva. Apica “āvutāti āvaritā. Nivutāti nivāritā. Ophutāti
tika-s0104t:733_1: paliguṇṭhitā, pariyonaddhā vā. Pihitāti pidahitā. Paṭicchannāti chāditā. Paṭikujjitāti
tika-s0104t:733_2: heṭṭhāmukhajātā”ti tattheva vuttaṃ. Ettha ca janenti etehīti janā, nīvaraṇā, puthu
tika-s0104t:733_3: nānāvidhā janā nīvaraṇā etesaṃ, puthūhi vā nīvaraṇehi janā āvutā…pe… paṭikujjitāti
