tika-s0104t:733_4: nibbacanaṃ dasseti. Puthūsu nīcadhammasamācāresu jāyati, puthūnaṃ vā abbhantare jano
tika-s0104t:733_5: antogadho, puthu vā bahuko janoti atthaṃ dasseti “puthūna”ntiādinā, etena ca tatiyapādaṃ
tika-s0104t:733_6: vivarati, samattheti vā. “Puthuvā”tiādinā pana catutthapādaṃ. Puthu visaṃsaṭṭho eva
tika-s0104t:734_0: Yehi guṇavisesehi nimittabhūtehi bhagavati “tathāgato”ti ayaṃ samaññā pavattā, taṃ
tika-s0104t:734_1: dassanatthaṃ “aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekopi hi saddo anekapavattinimittamadhikicca
tika-s0104t:734_2: anekadhā atthappakāsako, bhagavato ca sabbepi nāmasaddā anekaguṇanemittikāyeva. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:737_0: Kāni pana tānīti anuyoge sati paṭhamaṃ tassarūpaṃ saṅkhepato uddisitvā “katha”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:737_1: niddisati. Tathā āgatoti ettha ākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā-saddo.
tika-s0104t:737_2: Sāmaññajotanāya visesāvaṭṭhānato, visesatthinā ca sāmaññasaddassāpi visesattheyeva
tika-s0104t:737_3: anupayujjitabbato paṭipadāgamanattho āgata saddo daṭṭhabbo, na ñāṇagamanattho tathalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:737_4: āgato”tiādīsu viya, nāpi kāyagamanādi attho “āgato kho mahāsamaṇo, māgadhānaṃ giribbaja”ntiādīsu
tika-s0104t:737_5: viya. Tattha yassa ākārassa niyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā-saddo, tadākāraṃ
tika-s0104t:737_6: karuṇāpadhānattā tassa mahākaruṇāmukhena purimabuddhānaṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya udāharaṇavasena
tika-s0104t:737_8: cettha tathā-saddassatthadassane yathā-saddena attho vibhāvito. Tadeva vitthāreti
tika-s0104t:737_9: “yathā vipassī bhagavā”tiādinā, vipassīādīnañcettha channaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ mahāpadānasuttādīsu
tika-s0104t:737_10: sampahulaniddesena supākaṭattā, āsannattā ca tesaṃ vasena taṃ paṭipadaṃ dassetīti
tika-s0104t:737_11: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Āgato yathā, tathā āgatoti sabbatra sambandho. “Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādināpi
tika-s0104t:737_13: vasena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena mahāpaṇidhānena. Sabbesañhi buddhānaṃ paṭhamapaṇidhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:737_14: imināva nīhārena samijjhati. Abhinīhāroti cettha mūlapaṇidhānassetaṃ adhivacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:738_0: Evaṃ mahābhinīhāravasena “tathāgato”ti padassa atthaṃ dassetvā idāni pāramīpūraṇavasenapi
tika-s0104t:738_1: dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādimāha. “Ettha ca suttantikānaṃ mahābodhiyānapaṭipadāya kosallajananatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:738_2: pāramīsu ayaṃ vitthārakathā”tiādinā ācariyadhammapālattherena yā pāramīsu vinicchayakathā
tika-s0104t:738_3: vuttā, kiñcāpi sā amhehi idha vuccamānā ganthavitthārakarā viya bhavissati, yasmā
tika-s0104t:738_4: panāyaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā etissaṃ pacchā pamādalekhavisodhanavasena, tadavasesatthapariyādānavasena
tika-s0104t:738_5: ca pavattā, tasmā sāpi pāramīkathā idha vattabbāyevāti tato ceva cariyāpiṭakaṭṭhakathāto
tika-s0104t:738_6: ca āharitvā yathārahaṃ gāthābandhehi samalaṅkaritvā atthamadhippāyañca visodhayamānā bhavissati. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t:740: Ko ca tāsaṃ kamo kāni, lakkhaṇādīni sabbathā.
tika-s0104t:743: Kittakena sampādanaṃ, ānisaṃso ca kiṃ phalaṃ;
tika-s0104t:749: Taṇhāmānādinā hi anupahatā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā dānādayo guṇasaṅkhātā etā kiriyā “pāramī”ti vibhāvitā.
tika-s0104t:752: Kammaṃ bhāvoti dānādi, taddhitato tidhā matā.
tika-s0104t:753: Pūreti mavati pare, paraṃ majjati mayati;
tika-s0104t:754: Munāti minoti tathā, minātīti vā paramo.
tika-s0104t:755: Pāre majjati sodheti, mavati mayatīti vā;
tika-s0104t:756: Māyeti taṃ vā munāti, minoti mināti tathā.
tika-s0104t:759_0: Dānasīlādiguṇavisesayogena hi sattuttamatāya mahābodhisatto paramo, tassa ayaṃ, bhāvo,
tika-s0104t:759_1: kammanti vā pāramī, dānādikiriyā. Atha vā parati pūretīti paramo niruttinayena, dānādiguṇānaṃ
tika-s0104t:759_2: pūrako, pālako ca bodhisatto, paramassa ayaṃ, bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramī. Apica pare
tika-s0104t:759_3: satte mavati attani bandhati guṇavisesayogena, paraṃ vā atirekaṃ majjati saṃkilesamalato,
tika-s0104t:759_4: paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ visesena mayati gacchati, paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena
tika-s0104t:759_5: ñāṇavisesena idhalokamiva munāti paricchindati, paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:759_6: attano santāne minoti pakkhipati, paraṃ vā attabhūtato dhammakāyato aññaṃ, paṭipakkhaṃ
tika-s0104t:759_7: vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti paramo, mahāsatto, “paramassa
tika-s0104t:759_8: aya”ntiādinā vuttanayena pāramī. Pāre vā nibbāne majjati sujjhati, satte ca sodheti,
tika-s0104t:759_9: tattha vā satte mavati bandhati yojeti, taṃ vā mayati gacchati, satte ca māyeti gameti,
tika-s0104t:759_10: taṃ vā yāthāvato munāti paricchindati, tattha vā satte minoti pakkhipati, tattha
tika-s0104t:759_11: vā sattānaṃ kilesāriṃ mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī, mahāsatto, “tassa aya”ntiādinā dānādikiriyāva
tika-s0104t:759_12: pāramīti. Iminā nayena pāramīnaṃ vacanattho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:760: Katividhāti saṅkhepato dasavidhā, tā pana buddhavaṃsapāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatāyeva. Yathāha “vicinanto tadādakkhiṃ, paṭhamaṃ dānapārami”ntiādi. Yathā cāha –
tika-s0104t:761_0: “Kati nu kho bhante buddhakārakā dhammāti? Dasa kho sāriputta buddhakārakā dhammā,
tika-s0104t:761_1: katame dasa? Dānaṃ kho sāriputta buddhakārako dhammo, sīlaṃ nekkhammaṃ paññā vīriyaṃ
tika-s0104t:761_2: khanti saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ mettā upekkhā buddhakārako dhammo, ime kho sāriputta dasa
tika-s0104t:761_3: buddhakārakā dhammāti. Idamavoca bhagavā, idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā –
tika-s0104t:764: Keci pana “chabbidhā”ti vadanti, taṃ etāsaṃ saṅgahavasena vuttaṃ. So pana saṅgaho parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0104t:765_0: Ko ca tāsaṃ kamoti ettha kamo nāma desanākkamo, so ca paṭhamasamādānahetuko, samādānaṃ
tika-s0104t:765_1: pavicayahetukaṃ, iti yathā ādimhi paṭhamābhinīhārakāle pavicitā, samādinnā ca, tathā
tika-s0104t:765_2: desitā. Yathāha “vicinanto tadādakkhiṃ, paṭhamaṃ dānapārami”ntiādi tenetaṃ vuccati –
tika-s0104t:768_0: Tattha hi dānaṃ sīlassa bahūpakāraṃ, sukarañcāti taṃ ādimhi vuttaṃ. Dānaṃ pana sīlapariggahitaṃ
tika-s0104t:768_1: mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlaṃ nekkhammapariggahitaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t:768_2: nekkhammaṃ paññāpariggahitaṃ…pe… paññā vīriyapariggahitā…pe… vīriyaṃ khantipariggahitaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t:768_3: khanti saccapariggahitā…pe… saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānapariggahitaṃ…pe… adhiṭṭhānaṃ mettāpariggahitaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t:768_4: mettā upekkhāpariggahitā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti mettānantaraṃ upekkhā vuttā.
tika-s0104t:768_5: Upekkhā pana karuṇāpariggahitā, karuṇā ca upekkhāpariggahitāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ
tika-s0104t:768_6: pana mahākāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu upekkhakā hontīti? Upekkhitabbayuttakesu kañci
tika-s0104t:768_7: kālaṃ upekkhakā honti, na pana sabbattha, sabbadā cāti keci. Apare pana na ca sattesu
tika-s0104t:768_8: upekkhakā, sattakatesu pana vippakāresu upekkhakā hontīti, idamevettha yuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:771: Dānaṃ ādimhi sesā tu, purimepi apekkhakā.
tika-s0104t:772_0: Pacurajanesupi hi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā, appaphalattā, sukarattā ca dānaṃ
tika-s0104t:772_1: ādimhi vuttaṃ. Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggāhakasuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato,
tika-s0104t:772_2: kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato, bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato
tika-s0104t:772_3: ca dānassānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Nekkhammena sīlasampattisiddhito, kāyavacīsucaritaṃ
tika-s0104t:772_4: vatvā manosucaritavacanato, visuddhasīlassa sukheneva jhānasamijjhanato, kammāparādhappahānena
tika-s0104t:772_6: ṭhitassa pariyuṭṭhānappahānavacanato ca sīlassānantaraṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ. Paññāya
tika-s0104t:772_8: hi paññā, paññāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca samādhi. Samathanimittaṃ vatvā upekkhānimittavacanato,
tika-s0104t:772_11: sattahitāya ārambhassa acchariyatāvacanato, upekkhānimittaṃ vatvā paggahanimittavacanato,
tika-s0104t:772_12: nisammakāritaṃ vatvā uṭṭhānavacanato ca. Nisammakārino hi uṭṭhānaṃ phalavisesamāvahatīti
tika-s0104t:773_0: Vīriyena titikkhāsiddhito. Vīriyavā hi āraddhavīriyattā sattasaṅkhārehi upanītaṃ
tika-s0104t:773_1: dukkhaṃ abhibhuyya viharati. Vīriyassa titikkhālaṅkārabhāvato. Vīriyavato hi titikkhā
tika-s0104t:773_2: sobhati. Paggahanimittaṃ vatvā samathanimittavacanato, accārambhena uddhaccadosappahānavacanato.
tika-s0104t:773_3: Dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā hi uddhaccadoso pahīyati. Vīriyavato sātaccakaraṇavacanato.
tika-s0104t:773_4: Khantibahulo hi anuddhato sātaccakārī hoti. Appamādavato parahitakiriyārambhe paccupakārataṇhābhāvavacanato.
tika-s0104t:773_5: Yāthāvato dhammanijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti. Parahitārambhe paramepi parakatadukkhasahanatāvacanato
tika-s0104t:773_6: ca vīriyassānantaraṃ khanti vuttā. Saccena khantiyā cirādhiṭṭhānato, apakārino apakārakhantiṃ
tika-s0104t:773_7: vatvā tadupakārakaraṇe avisaṃvādavacanato, khantiyā apavādavācāvikampanena bhūtavāditāya
tika-s0104t:773_9: vacanato ca khantiyānantaraṃ saccaṃ vuttaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānena saccasiddhito. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa
tika-s0104t:773_10: hi virati sijjhati. Avisaṃvāditaṃ vatvā tattha acalabhāvavacanato. Saccasandho hi
tika-s0104t:773_11: dānādīsu paṭiññānurūpaṃ niccalo pavattati. Ñāṇasaccaṃ vatvā sambhāresu pavattiniṭṭhāpanavacanato.
tika-s0104t:773_12: Yathābhūtañāṇavā hi bodhisambhāresu adhiṭṭhāti, te ca niṭṭhāpeti. Paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvato
tika-s0104t:773_13: ca saccassānantaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Mettāya parahitakaraṇasamādānādhiṭṭhānasiddhito,
tika-s0104t:773_14: adhiṭṭhānaṃ vatvā hitūpasaṃhāravacanato. Bodhisambhāre hi adhitiṭṭhamāno mettāvihārī
tika-s0104t:773_15: hoti. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa samādānāvikopanena samādānasambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassānantaraṃ
tika-s0104t:773_16: mettā vuttā. Upekkhāya mettāvisuddhito, sattesu hitūpasaṃhāraṃ vatvā tadaparādhesu
tika-s0104t:773_18: upekkhako”ti acchariyaguṇatāvacanato ca mettāyānantaraṃ upekkhā vuttāti evametāsaṃ kamo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:774: Kāni lakkhaṇādīni sabbathāti ettha pana avisesena –
tika-s0104t:776: Upakāro akampo ca, raso hitesitāpi ca.
tika-s0104t:779_0: Sabbāpi hi pāramiyo parānuggahalakkhaṇā, paresaṃ upakārakaraṇarasā, avikampanarasā
tika-s0104t:779_1: vā, hitesitāpaccupaṭṭhānā, buddhattapaccupaṭṭhānā vā, mahākaruṇāpadaṭṭhānā, karuṇūpāyakosallapadaṭṭhānā vā.
tika-s0104t:780_0: Visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā attupakaraṇapariccāgacetanā dānapāramī.
tika-s0104t:781_0: Tasmā pariccāgalakkhaṇaṃ dānaṃ, deyyadhamme lobhaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ, anāsattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:781_2: sīlaṃ, samādhānalakkhaṇaṃ, patiṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ vāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ,
tika-s0104t:781_3: anavajjarasaṃ vā, soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, hirottappapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Kāmato, bhavato ca
tika-s0104t:781_6: vā kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho viya, visayobhāsanarasā padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā
tika-s0104t:781_7: araññagatasudesako viya, samādhipadaṭṭhānā, catusaccapadaṭṭhānā vā. Ussāhalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:782_4: Hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā mettā, hitūpasaṃhārarasā, āghātavinayanarasā vā, sommabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
tika-s0104t:782_8: yato tāni pāramīsaṅkhyaṃ labhanti. Na hi sammāsambodhiyādipatthanamaññatra akaruṇūpāyakosallapariggahitāni
tika-s0104t:784: Abhinīhāro ca tāsaṃ, dayā ñāṇañca paccayo;
tika-s0104t:786_0: Abhinīhāro tāva pāramīnaṃ sabbāsampi paccayo. Yo hi ayaṃ “manussattaṃ liṅgasampattī”tiādi
tika-s0104t:786_1: aṭṭhadhammasamodhānasampādito “tiṇṇo tāreyyaṃ mutto moceyyaṃ, buddho bodheyyaṃ suddho
tika-s0104t:786_2: sodheyyaṃ, danto dameyyaṃ, santo sameyyaṃ, assattho assāseyyaṃ, parinibbuto parinibbāpeyya”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:786_3: pavatto abhinīhāro, so avisesena sabbapāramīnaṃ paccayo. Tappavattiyā hi uddhaṃ pāramīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:786_5: ca nāmesa atthato bhesamaṭṭhaṅgānaṃ samodhānena tathāpavatto cittuppādo, “aho vatāhaṃ
tika-s0104t:786_6: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjheyyaṃ, sabbasattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ nipphādeyya”ntiādipatthanāsaṅkhāto
tika-s0104t:786_7: acinteyyaṃ buddhabhūmiṃ, aparimāṇaṃ lokahitañca ārabbha pavattiyā sabbabuddhakārakadhammamūlabhūto
tika-s0104t:787_0: Tassa ca uppattiyā saheva mahāpuriso mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiṃ otiṇṇo nāma hoti, niyatabhāvasamadhigamanato,
tika-s0104t:787_1: tato ca anivattanasabhāvato “bodhisatto”ti samaññaṃ labhati, sabbabhāgena sammāsambodhiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:787_2: sammāsattamānasatā, bodhisambhāre sikkhāsamatthatā cassa santiṭṭhati. Yathāvuttābhinīhārasamijjhanena
tika-s0104t:787_3: hi mahāpurisā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamanapubbaliṅgena sayambhuñāṇena sammadeva sabbapāramiyo
tika-s0104t:787_4: vicinitvā samādāya anukkamena paripūrenti, yathā taṃ katamahābhinīhāro sumedhapaṇḍito. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:789: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā;
tika-s0104t:791_0: Vitthāro. Lakkhaṇādito panesa sammadeva sammāsambodhipaṇidhānalakkhaṇo, “aho vatāhaṃ
tika-s0104t:791_1: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjheyyaṃ, sabbasattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ nipphādeyya”ntiādipatthanāraso,
tika-s0104t:792_0: Tassa pana abhinīhārassa cattāro paccayā, cattāro hetū, cattāri ca balāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0104t:792_1: Tattha katame cattāro paccayā mahābhinīhārāya? Idha mahāpuriso passati tathāgataṃ
tika-s0104t:792_2: mahatā buddhānubhāvena acchariyabbhutaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karontaṃ, tassa taṃ nissāya taṃ
tika-s0104t:792_3: ārammaṇaṃ katvā mahābodhiyaṃ cittaṃ santiṭṭhati “mahānubhāvā vatāyaṃ dhammadhātu,
tika-s0104t:792_4: yassā suppaṭividdhattā bhagavā evaṃ acchariyabbhutadhammo, acinteyyānubhāvo cā”ti,
tika-s0104t:792_5: so tameva mahānubhāvadassanaṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto
tika-s0104t:792_6: tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti, ayaṃ paṭhamo paccayo mahābhinīhārāya.
tika-s0104t:793_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ, apica kho suṇāti “ediso
tika-s0104t:793_1: ca ediso ca bhagavā”ti, so taṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto
tika-s0104t:793_2: tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti, ayaṃ dutiyo paccayo mahābhinīhārāya.
tika-s0104t:794_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ, nāpi taṃ parato suṇāti,
tika-s0104t:794_1: apica kho tathāgatassa dhammaṃ desentassa “dasabalasamannāgato bhikkhave, tathāgato”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:794_2: buddhānubhāvapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti, so taṃ nissāya…pe… ayaṃ tatiyo paccayo mahābhinīhārāya.
tika-s0104t:795_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ, nāpi taṃ parato suṇāti,
tika-s0104t:795_1: nāpi tathāgatassa dhammaṃ suṇāti, apica kho uḷārajjhāsayo kalyāṇādhimuttiko “ahametaṃ
tika-s0104t:795_2: buddhavaṃsaṃ buddhatantiṃ buddhapaveṇiṃ buddadhammataṃ paripālessāmī”ti yāvadeva
tika-s0104t:795_3: dhammaññeva sakkaronto garuṃ karonto mānento pūjento dhammaṃ apacayamāno taṃ nissāya…pe…
tika-s0104t:796_0: Katame cattāro hetū mahābhinīhārāya? Idha mahāpuriso pakatiyā upanissayasampanno
tika-s0104t:796_1: hoti purimakesu buddhesu katādhikāro, ayaṃ paṭhamo hetu mahābhinīhārāya. Puna caparaṃ
tika-s0104t:796_2: mahāpuriso pakatiyāpi karuṇājjhāsayo hoti karuṇādhimutto sattānaṃ dukkhaṃ apanetukāmo,
tika-s0104t:796_3: apica attano kāyañca jīvitañca pariccaji, ayaṃ dutiyo hetu mahābhinīhārāya. Puna
tika-s0104t:796_4: caparaṃ mahāpuriso sakalatopi vaṭṭadukkhato sattahitāya dukkaracariyato sucirampi
tika-s0104t:796_5: kālaṃ ghaṭento vāyamanto anibbinno hoti anutrāsī, yāva icchitatthanipphatti, ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:796_6: tatiyo hetu mahābhinīhārāya. Puna caparaṃ mahāpuriso kalyāṇamittasannissito hoti,
tika-s0104t:796_7: yo ahitato naṃ nivāreti, hite patiṭṭhāpeti, ayaṃ catuttho hetu mahābhinīhārāya.
tika-s0104t:797_0: Tatrāyaṃ mahāpurisassa upanissayasampadā – ekantenevassa yathā ajjhāsayo sambodhininno
tika-s0104t:797_1: hoti sambodhipoṇo sambodhipabbhāro, tathā sattānaṃ hitacariyāya, yato anena purimabuddhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:797_2: santike sambodhiyā paṇidhānaṃ kataṃ hoti manasā, vācāya ca “ahampi ediso sammāsambuddho
tika-s0104t:797_3: hutvā sammadeva sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ nipphādeyya”nti. Evaṃ sampannūpanissayassa panassa
tika-s0104t:797_4: imāni upanissayasampattiyā liṅgāni sambhavanti, yehi samannāgatassa sāvakabodhisattehi,
tika-s0104t:797_5: paccekabodhisattehi ca mahāviseso mahantaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati indriyato, paṭipattito,
tika-s0104t:797_6: kosallato ca. Idha hi upanissayasampanno mahāpuriso yathā visadindriyo hoti visadañāṇo,
tika-s0104t:797_7: na tathā itare. Parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya. Tathā hi so yathā bahujanahitāya
tika-s0104t:797_8: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ paṭipajji, na
tika-s0104t:797_9: tathā itare, tattha ca kosallaṃ āvahati ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena, ṭhānāṭhānakusalatāya ca.
tika-s0104t:798_0: Tathā mahāpuriso pakatiyā dānajjhāsayo hoti dānābhirato, sati deyyadhamme detiyeva,
tika-s0104t:798_1: na dānato saṅkocaṃ āpajjati, satataṃ samitaṃ saṃvibhāgasīlo hoti, pamuditova deti
tika-s0104t:798_2: ādarajāto, na udāsīnacitto, mahantampi dānaṃ datvā neva dānena santuṭṭho hoti, pageva
tika-s0104t:798_3: appaṃ. Paresañca ussāhaṃ janento dāne vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ
tika-s0104t:798_4: karoti, aññe ca paresaṃ dente disvā attamano hoti, bhayaṭṭhānesu ca paresaṃ abhayaṃ
tika-s0104t:798_5: detīti evamādīni dānajjhāsayassa mahāpurisassa dānapāramiyā liṅgāni.
tika-s0104t:799_0: Tathā pāṇātipātādīhi pāpadhammehi hirīyati ottappati, sattānaṃ aviheṭhanajātiko hoti,
tika-s0104t:799_1: sorato sukhasīlo asaṭho amāyāvī ujujātiko subbaco sovacassakaraṇīyehi dhammehi samannāgato
tika-s0104t:799_2: mudujātiko athaddho anatimānī, parasantakaṃ nādiyati antamaso tiṇasalākamupādāya,
tika-s0104t:799_3: attano hatthe nikkhittaṃ iṇaṃ vā gahetvā paraṃ na visaṃvādeti, parasmiṃ vā attano
tika-s0104t:799_4: santake byāmūḷhe, vissarite vā taṃ saññāpetvā paṭipādeti yathā taṃ na parahatthagataṃ
tika-s0104t:799_5: hoti, aloluppo hoti, parapariggahitesu pāpakaṃ cittampi na uppādeti, itthibyasanādīni
tika-s0104t:799_6: dūrato parivajjeti, saccavādī saccasandho bhinnānaṃ sandhātā sahitānaṃ anuppadātā
tika-s0104t:799_7: piyavādī mihitapubbaṅgamo pubbabhāsī atthavādī dhammavādī anabhijjhālu abyāpannacitto
tika-s0104t:799_8: aviparītadassano kammassakatāñāṇena, saccānulomikañāṇena ca, kataññū katavedī vuḍḍhāpacāyī
tika-s0104t:799_9: suvisuddhājīvo dhammakāmo, paresampi dhamme samādapetā sabbena sabbaṃ akiccato satte
tika-s0104t:799_10: nivāretā kiccesu patiṭṭhapetā attanā ca tattha kicce yogaṃ āpajjitā, katvā vā pana
tika-s0104t:799_11: sayaṃ akattabbaṃ sīghaññeva tato paṭivirato hotīti evamādīni sīlajjhāsayassa mahāpurisassa
tika-s0104t:800_0: Tathā mandakileso hoti mandanīvaraṇo pavivekajjhāsayo avikkhepabahulo, na tassa pāpakā
tika-s0104t:800_1: vitakkā cittamanvāssavanti, vivekagatassa cassa appakasireneva cittaṃ samādhiyati,
tika-s0104t:800_2: amittapakkhepi tuvaṭaṃ mettacittatā santiṭṭhati, pageva itarasmiṃ, satimā ca hoti
tika-s0104t:800_3: cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi susaritā anussaritā, medhāvī ca hoti dhammojapaññāya samannāgato,
tika-s0104t:800_4: nipako ca hoti tāsu tāsu itikattabbatāsu, āraddhavīriyo ca hoti sattānaṃ hitakiriyāsu,
tika-s0104t:800_5: khantibalasamannāgato ca hoti sabbasaho, acalādhiṭṭhāno ca hoti daḷhasamādāno, ajjhupekkhako
tika-s0104t:800_6: ca hoti upekkhāṭhānīyesu dhammesūti evamādīni mahāpurisassa nekkhammajjhāsayādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:801_0: Evametehi bodhisambhāraliṅgehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa yaṃ vuttaṃ “mahābhinīhārāya
tika-s0104t:801_1: kalyāṇamittasannissayo hetū”ti, tatridaṃ saṅkhepato kalyāṇamittalakkhaṇaṃ – idha
tika-s0104t:801_2: kalyāṇamitto saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgavīriyasatisamādhipaññāsampanno.
tika-s0104t:801_3: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ kammaṃ, kammaphalañca, tena
tika-s0104t:801_4: sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitesitaṃ na pariccajati. Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:801_5: piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahiko vattā vacanakkhamo. Sutasampattiyā
tika-s0104t:801_6: sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ gambhīraṃ dhammakathaṃ kattā hoti. Cāgasampattiyā appiccho
tika-s0104t:801_7: hoti samāhito santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho. Vīriyasampattiyā āraddhavīriyo hoti
tika-s0104t:801_8: sattānaṃ hitapaṭipattiyā. Satisampattiyā upaṭṭhitassatī hoti anavajjesu dhammesu.
tika-s0104t:801_9: Samādhisampattiyā avikkhitto hoti samāhitacitto. Paññāsampattiyā aviparītaṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0104t:801_10: So satiyā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:801_11: jānitvā samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena ahitā satte nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. Tenāha –
tika-s0104t:803: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:804_0: Evaṃ guṇasamannāgataṃva kalyāṇamittaṃ upanissāya mahāpuriso attano upanissayasampattiṃ
tika-s0104t:804_1: sammadeva pariyodapeti. Suvisuddhāsayapayogova hutvā catūhi balehi samannāgato nacireneva
tika-s0104t:804_2: aṭṭhaṅge samodhānetvā mahābhinīhāraṃ karonto bodhisattabhāve patiṭṭhahati anivattidhammo
tika-s0104t:805_0: Tassimāni cattāri balāni ajjhattikabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ attasannissayā dhammagāravena
tika-s0104t:805_1: abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā, yāya mahāpuriso attādhipatilajjāsannissayo, abhinīhārasampanno
tika-s0104t:805_2: ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Bāhirabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:805_3: parasannissayā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā, yāya mahāpuriso lokādhipatiottappanasannissayo,
tika-s0104t:805_4: abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Upanissayabalaṃ
tika-s0104t:805_5: yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ upanissayasampattiyā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā, yāya mahāpuriso
tika-s0104t:805_6: tikkhindriyo, visadadhātuko, satisannissayo, abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo
tika-s0104t:805_7: pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Payogabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyā tajjā payogasampadā
tika-s0104t:805_8: sakkaccakāritā sātaccakāritā, yāya mahāpuriso visuddhapayogo, nirantarakārī, abhinīhārasampanno
tika-s0104t:805_9: ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Evamayaṃ catūhi paccayehi, catūhi
tika-s0104t:805_10: hetūhi, catūhi ca balehi sampannasamudāgamo aṭṭhaṅgasamodhānasampādito abhinīhāro
tika-s0104t:806_0: Yassa ca pavattiyā mahāpurise cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā patiṭṭhahanti, sabbaṃ
tika-s0104t:806_1: sattanikāyaṃ attano orasaputtaṃ viya piyacittena pariggaṇhāti, na cassa cittaṃ puna
tika-s0104t:806_2: saṃkilesavasena saṃkilissati, sattānaṃ hitasukhāvaho cassa ajjhāsayo, payogo ca hoti,
tika-s0104t:806_3: attano ca buddhakārakadhammā uparūpari vaḍḍhanti, paripaccanti ca, yato mahāpuriso
tika-s0104t:806_4: uḷāratarena puññābhisandena kusalābhisandena pavaḍḍhiyā [pavattiyā ] paccayena sukhassāhārena
tika-s0104t:806_5: samannāgato sattānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyo uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānaṃ, asadisaṃ puññakkhettañca
tika-s0104t:806_6: hoti. Evamanekaguṇo anekānisaṃso mahābhinīhāro pāramīnaṃ paccayoti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:807_0: Yathā ca mahābhinīhāro, evaṃ mahākaruṇā, upāyakosallañca. Tattha upāyakosallaṃ nāma
tika-s0104t:807_1: dānādīnaṃ bodhisambhārabhāvassa nimittabhūtā paññā, yāhi mahākaruṇūpāyakosallatāhi
tika-s0104t:807_4: sattānaṃ hitasukhapaṭilābhahetubhāvo ca sampajjati. Tathā hi tassa paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi,
tika-s0104t:807_5: karuṇāya buddhakammasiddhi. Paññāya sayaṃ tarati, karuṇāya pare tāreti. Paññāya paradukkhaṃ
tika-s0104t:807_6: parijānāti, karuṇāya paradukkhapaṭikāraṃ ārabhati. Paññāya dukkhaṃ nibbindati, karuṇāya
tika-s0104t:807_7: dukkhaṃ sampaṭicchati. Paññāya nibbānābhimukho hoti, karuṇāya taṃ na pāpuṇāti. Tathā
tika-s0104t:807_8: karuṇāya saṃsārābhimukho hoti, paññāya tatra nābhiramati. Paññāya sabbattha virajjati,
tika-s0104t:807_9: karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbesamanuggahāya pavatto, karuṇāya sabbepi anukampati,
tika-s0104t:807_10: paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto. Paññāya ahaṃkāramamaṃkārābhāvo, karuṇāya ālasiyadīnatābhāvo.
tika-s0104t:808_0: Tathā paññākaruṇāhi yathākkamaṃ attanāthaparanāthatā, dhīravīrabhāvo, anattantapāparantapatā,
tika-s0104t:808_3: visesena upāyabhāvato paññā karuṇā pāramīnaṃ paccayo. Idaṃ pana dvayaṃ pāramīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:809_0: Tathā ussāhaummaṅgaavatthānahitacariyā ca pāramīnaṃ paccayoti veditabbo. Yā ca buddhabhāvassa
tika-s0104t:809_1: uppattiṭṭhānatāya “buddhabhūmiyo”ti vuccanti. Tattha ussāho nāma bodhisambhārānaṃ
tika-s0104t:809_2: abbhussāhanavīriyaṃ. Ummaṅgo nāma bodhisambhāresu upāyakosallabhūtā paññā. Avatthānaṃ
tika-s0104t:809_3: nāma adhiṭṭhānaṃ, acalādhiṭṭhānatā. Hitacariyā nāma mettābhāvanā, karuṇābhāvanā ca. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:810_0: “Kati pana bhante, buddhabhūmiyoti? Catasso kho sāriputta, buddhabhūmiyo. Katamā
tika-s0104t:810_1: catasso? Ussāho ca hoti vīriyaṃ, ummaṅgo ca hoti paññābhāvanā, avatthānañca hoti
tika-s0104t:810_2: adhiṭṭhānaṃ, hitacariyā ca hoti mettābhāvanā. Imā kho sāriputta, catasso buddhabhūmiyo”ti.
tika-s0104t:812_0: “Nekkhammajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā kāmesu, gharāvāse ca dosadassāvino, pavivekajjhāsayā
tika-s0104t:812_1: ca bodhisattā saṅgaṇikāya dosadassāvino. Alobha…pe… lobhe…pe… adosa…pe… dose…pe…
tika-s0104t:813_0: Tasmā ete ca cha ajjhāsayāpi pāramīnaṃ paccayāti veditabbā. Na hi lobhādīsu ādīnavadassanena,
tika-s0104t:813_1: alobhādīnaṃ adhikabhāvena ca vinā dānādipāramiyo sambhavanti. Alobhādīnañhi adhikabhāvena
tika-s0104t:813_2: pariccāgādininnacittatā, alobhajjhāsayāditā cāti, yathā cete, evaṃ dānajjhāsayatādayopi. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:814_0: “Kati pana bhante bodhāya carantānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ajjhāsayāti? Dasa kho sāriputta,
tika-s0104t:814_1: bodhāya carantānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ajjhāsayā. Katame dasa? Dānajjhāsayā sāriputta,
tika-s0104t:814_2: bodhisattā macchere dosadassāvino. Sīla…pe… asaṃvare…pe… nekkhamma…pe… kāmesu…pe…
tika-s0104t:814_3: yathābhūtañāṇa…pe… vicikicchāya.…Pe… vīriya …pe… kosajje…pe… khanti…pe… akkhantiyaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t:814_4: sacca…pe… visaṃvādane…pe… adhiṭṭhāna…pe… anadhiṭṭhāne…pe… mettā…pe… byāpāde…pe… upekkhā…pe…
tika-s0104t:815_2: nibbattiyā paccayo. Tathā apariccāgapariccāgādīsu yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇampi
tika-s0104t:816_5: tesaṃ pariccāgoyeveko sotthibhāvoti pariccāge appamādo karaṇīyo.
tika-s0104t:817_0: Apica “yācako yācamāno attano guyhassa ācikkhanato mayhaṃ vissāsiko”ti ca “pahāya
tika-s0104t:817_1: gamanīyaṃ attano santakaṃ gahetvā paralokaṃ yāhītiupadisanato mayhaṃ upadesako”ti
tika-s0104t:817_2: ca “āditte viya agāre maraṇagginā āditte loke tato mayhaṃ santakassa apaharaṇato
tika-s0104t:817_4: kalyāṇakammasmiṃ sahāyabhāvato, sabbasampattīnaṃ aggabhūtāya paramadullabhāya buddhabhūmiyā
tika-s0104t:817_5: sampattihetubhāvato ca paramo kalyāṇamitto”ti ca paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:818_0: Tathā “uḷāre kammani anenāhaṃ sambhāvito, tasmā sā sambhāvanā avitathā kātabbā”ti
tika-s0104t:818_1: ca “ekantabheditāya jīvitassa āyācitenāpi mayā dātabbaṃ, pageva yācitenā”ti ca “uḷārajjhāsayehi
tika-s0104t:818_2: gavesitvāpi dātabbo, [dātabbato ] sayamevāgato mama puññenā”ti ca “yācakassa dānāpadesena
tika-s0104t:818_3: mayhamevāyamanuggaho”ti ca “ahaṃ viya ayaṃ sabbopi loko mayā anuggahetabbo”ti ca
tika-s0104t:818_4: “asati yācake kathaṃ mayhaṃ dānapāramī pūreyyā”ti ca “yācakānamevatthāya mayā sabbopi
tika-s0104t:818_5: pariggahetabbo”ti ca “ayācitvāpi maṃ mama santakaṃ yācakā kadā sayameva gaṇheyyu”nti
tika-s0104t:818_6: ca “kathamahaṃ yācakānaṃ piyo cassaṃ manāpo”ti ca “kathaṃ vā te mayhaṃ piyā cassu
tika-s0104t:818_7: manāpā”ti ca “kathaṃ vāhaṃ dadamāno datvāpi ca attamano assaṃ pamudito pītisomanassajāto”ti
tika-s0104t:818_8: ca “kathaṃ vā me yācakā bhaveyyuṃ, uḷāro ca dānajjhāsayo”ti ca “kathaṃ vāhamayācito
tika-s0104t:818_9: eva yācakānaṃ hadayamaññāya dadeyya”nti “sati dhane, yācake ca apariccāgo mahatī
tika-s0104t:818_10: mayhaṃ vañcanā”ti ca “kathamahaṃ attano aṅgāni, jīvitañcāpi pariccajeyya”nti ca cāganinnatā upaṭṭhapetabbā.
tika-s0104t:819_0: Apica “attho nāmāyaṃ nirapekkhaṃ dāyakamanugacchati yathā taṃ nirapekkhaṃ khepakaṃ
tika-s0104t:819_1: kiṭako”ti atthe nirapekkhatāya cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Yācamāno pana yadi piyapuggalo
tika-s0104t:819_2: hoti “piyo maṃ yācatī”ti somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Atha udāsīnapuggalo hoti “ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:819_3: maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena mitto hotī”ti somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Dadanto
tika-s0104t:819_4: hi yācakānaṃ piyo hotīti. Atha pana verīpuggalo yācati, “paccatthiko maṃ yācati,
tika-s0104t:819_5: ayaṃ maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena verīpi piyo mitto hotī”ti visesato somanassaṃ
tika-s0104t:819_6: uppādetabbaṃ. Evaṃ piyapuggale viya majjhattaverīpuggalesupi mettāpubbaṅgamaṃ karuṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:820_0: Sace panassa cirakālaṃ paribhāvitattā lobhassa deyyadhammavisayā lobhadhammā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t:820_1: tena bodhisattapaṭiññena iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “nanu tayā sappurisa sambodhāya
tika-s0104t:820_2: abhinīhāraṃ karontena sabbasattānamupakārāya ayaṃ kāyo nissaṭṭho, tappariccāgamayañca
tika-s0104t:820_3: puññaṃ, tattha nāma te bāhirepi vatthusmiṃ abhisaṅgappavatti hatthisinānasadisī hoti,
tika-s0104t:820_4: tasmā tayā na katthaci abhisaṅgo uppādetabbo. Seyyathāpi nāma mahato bhesajjarukkhassa
tika-s0104t:820_5: tiṭṭhato mūlaṃ mūlatthikā haranti, papaṭikaṃ, tacaṃ, khandhaṃ, viṭapaṃ, sākhaṃ, palāsaṃ,
tika-s0104t:820_6: pupphaṃ, phalaṃ phalatthikā haranti, na tassa rukkhassa ‘mayhaṃ santakaṃ ete harantī’ti
tika-s0104t:820_7: vitakkasamudācāro hoti, evameva sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpajjantena mayā mahādukkhe
tika-s0104t:820_8: akataññuke niccāsucimhi kāye paresaṃ upakārāya viniyujjamāne aṇumattopi micchāvitakko
tika-s0104t:820_9: na uppādetabbo. Ko vā ettha viseso ajjhattikabāhiresu mahābhūtesu ekantabhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammesu.
tika-s0104t:820_10: Kevalaṃ pana sammohavijambhitametaṃ, yadidaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti
tika-s0104t:820_11: abhiniveso, tasmā bāhiresu mahābhūtesu viya ajjhattikesupi karacaraṇanayanādīsu,
tika-s0104t:820_12: maṃsādīsu ca anapekkhena hutvā ‘taṃ tadatthikā harantū’ti nissaṭṭhacittena bhavitabba”nti.
tika-s0104t:820_13: Evaṃ paṭisañcikkhato cassa sambodhāya pahitattassa kāyajīvitesu nirapekkhassa appakasireneva
tika-s0104t:820_14: kāyavacīmanokammāni suvisuddhāni honti, so visuddhakāyavacīmanokammanto visuddhājīvo
tika-s0104t:820_15: ñāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito āyāpāyupāyakosallasamannāgamena bhiyyoso mattāya deyyadhammapariccāgena,
tika-s0104t:820_16: abhayadānasaddhammadānehi ca sabbasatte anuggaṇhituṃ samattho hoti, ayaṃ tāva dānapāramiyaṃ paccavekkhaṇānayo.
tika-s0104t:821_0: Sīlapāramiyaṃ pana evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ – “idañhi sīlaṃ nāma gaṅgodakādīhi visodhetuṃ
tika-s0104t:821_1: asakkuṇeyyassa dosamalassa vikkhālanajalaṃ, haricandanādīhi vinetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa
tika-s0104t:821_4: ] sabbakālānurūpo ca surabhigandho, khattiyamahāsālādīhi, devatāhi ca vandanīyādibhāvāvahanato
tika-s0104t:821_7: patiṭṭhānabhūmi, yaṃ yaṃ vā panicchitaṃ patthitaṃ, tassa tassa samijjhanūpāyabhāvato
tika-s0104t:821_8: cintāmaṇikapparukkhādike ca atiseti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “ijjhati bhikkhave, sīlavato
tika-s0104t:821_9: cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā”ti. Aparampi vuttaṃ “ākaṅkheyya ce bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:821_10: piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti, sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:821_11: Tathā “avippaṭisāratthāni kho ānanda kusalāni sīlānī”ti, “pañcime gahapatayo, ānisaṃsā
tika-s0104t:821_12: sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”tiādisuttānañca vasena sīlaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā. Tathā aggikkhandhopamasuttādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:822_2: atisayanato ca sīlaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ. Sīlavato hi attano sīlasampadāhetu mahantaṃ
tika-s0104t:822_3: pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati “kataṃ vata mayā kusalaṃ, kataṃ kalyāṇaṃ, kataṃ bhīruttāṇa”nti.
tika-s0104t:823_0: Tathā sīlavato attā na upavadati, na ca pare viññū, daṇḍaduggatibhayānañca sambhavoyeva
tika-s0104t:823_1: natthi, “sīlavā purisapuggalo kalyāṇadhammo”ti viññūnaṃ pāsaṃso ca hoti. Tathā sīlavato
tika-s0104t:823_2: yvāyaṃ “kataṃ vata mayā pāpaṃ, kataṃ luddaṃ, kataṃ kibbisa”nti dussīlassa vippaṭisāro
tika-s0104t:823_3: uppajjati, so na hoti. Sīlañca nāmetaṃ appamādādhiṭṭhānato, bhogabyasanādiparihāramukhena
tika-s0104t:823_4: mahato atthassa sādhanato, maṅgalabhāvato, paramaṃ sotthiṭṭhānaṃ. Nihīnajaccopi sīlavā
tika-s0104t:823_5: khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ pūjanīyo hotīti kulasampattiṃ atiseti sīlasampadā, “taṃ kiṃ
tika-s0104t:823_6: maññasi mahārāja, idha te assa dāso kammakaro”tiādi vakkhamānasāmaññasuttavacanañcettha
tika-s0104t:823_7: sādhakaṃ, corādīhi asādhāraṇato, paralokānugamanato, mahapphalabhāvato, samathādiguṇādhiṭṭhānato
tika-s0104t:823_8: ca bāhiradhanaṃ sāpateyyaṃ atiseti sīlaṃ. Paramassa cittissariyassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-s0104t:823_9: khattiyādīnamissariyaṃ atiseti sīlaṃ. Sīlanimittañhi taṃtaṃsattanikāyesu sattānamissariyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:823_10: vassasatādidīghappamāṇato ca jīvitato ekāhampi sīlavato jīvitassa visiṭṭhatāvacanato,
tika-s0104t:823_11: satipi jīvite sikkhānikkhipanassa maraṇatāvacanato ca sīlaṃ jīvitato visiṭṭhataraṃ.
tika-s0104t:823_12: Verīnampi manuññabhāvāvahanato, jarārogavipattīhi anabhibhavanīyato ca rūpasampattiṃ
tika-s0104t:823_14: sukhavisesādhiṭṭhānabhāvato atiseti sīlaṃ. Sabhāvasiniddhe santikāvacarepi bandhujane,
tika-s0104t:823_15: mittajane ca ekantahitasampādanato, paralokānugamanato ca atiseti sīlaṃ. “Na taṃ
tika-s0104t:823_16: mātā pitā kayirā”tiādi vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ. Tathā hatthiassarathapattibalakāyehi,
tika-s0104t:823_18: mahāvisayato ca ārakkhabhāvena sīlameva visiṭṭhataraṃ. Tenevāha “dhammo have rakkhati
tika-s0104t:823_20: ceva sīlasampadā pāripūriṃ gacchati, aparisuddhā ca pārisuddhiṃ.
tika-s0104t:824_0: Sace panassa dīgharattaṃ paricayena sīlapaṭipakkhadhammā dosādayo antarantarā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t:824_1: tena bodhisattapaṭiññena evaṃ paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “nanu tayā bodhāya paṇidhānaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t:824_2: sīlavekallena ca na sakkā na ca sukarā lokiyāpi sampattiyo pāpuṇituṃ, pageva lokuttarā”ti.
tika-s0104t:824_4: bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā “kikīva aṇḍa”ntiādinā vuttanayena sammadeva sīlaṃ rakkhantena
tika-s0104t:825_0: Apica tayā dhammadesanāya yānattaye sattānamavatāraṇaparipācanāni kātabbāni, sīlavekallassa
tika-s0104t:825_1: ca vacanaṃ na paccetabbaṃ hoti, asappāyāhāravicārassa viya vejjassa tikicchanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:825_2: tasmā “kathāhaṃ saddheyyo hutvā sattānamavatāraṇaparipācanāni kareyya”nti sabhāvaparisuddhasīlena
tika-s0104t:825_3: bhavitabbaṃ. Kiñca jhānādiguṇavisesayogena me sattānamupakārakaraṇasamatthatā, paññāpāramīādiparipūraṇañca
tika-s0104t:825_4: jhānādayo guṇā ca sīlapārisuddhiṃ vinā na sambhavantīti sammadeva sīlaṃ sodhetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:826_1: “mātāpi puttena vivadatī”tiādinā ca kāmesu, “seyyathāpi puriso iṇaṃ ādāya kammante
tika-s0104t:826_4: kātabbā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana dukkhakkhandhaāsivisopamasuttādi vasena veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:827_0: Tathā “paññāya vinā dānādayo dhammā na visujjhanti, yathāsakaṃ byāpārasamatthā ca
tika-s0104t:827_1: na hontī”ti paññāya guṇā manasi kātabbā. Yatheva hi jīvitena vinā sarīrayantaṃ na
tika-s0104t:827_2: sobhati, na ca attano kiriyāsu paṭipattisamatthaṃ hoti. Yathā ca cakkhādīni indriyāni
tika-s0104t:827_3: viññāṇena vinā yathāsakaṃ visayesu kiccaṃ kātuṃ nappahonti, evaṃ saddhādīni indriyāni
tika-s0104t:827_4: paññāya vinā sakakiccapaṭipattiyamasamatthānīti pariccāgādipaṭipattiyaṃ paññā padhānakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:827_5: Ummīlitapaññācakkhukā hi mahāsattā bodhisattā attano aṅgapaccaṅgānipi datvā anattukkaṃsakā,
tika-s0104t:827_6: aparavambhakā ca honti, bhesajjarukkhā viya vikapparahitā kālattayepi somanassajātā.
tika-s0104t:827_7: Paññāvasena hi upāyakosallayogato pariccāgo parahitapavattiyā dānapāramibhāvaṃ upeti.
tika-s0104t:828_0: Tathā paññāya abhāvena taṇhādisaṃkilesāviyogato sīlassa visuddhiyeva na sambhavati,
tika-s0104t:828_1: kuto sabbaññuguṇādhiṭṭhānabhāvo. Paññavā eva ca gharāvāse kāmaguṇesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ,
tika-s0104t:828_2: pabbajjāya jhānasamāpattiyaṃ nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkhento pabbajitvā
tika-s0104t:828_3: jhānasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā nibbānaninno, pare ca tattha patiṭṭhapeti.
tika-s0104t:829_0: Vīriyañca paññārahitaṃ yathicchitamatthaṃ na sādheti durārambhabhāvato. Anārambhoyeva
tika-s0104t:829_1: hi durārambhato seyyo, paññāsahitena pana vīriyena na kiñci duradhigamaṃ upāyapaṭipattito.
tika-s0104t:829_2: Tathā paññavā eva parāpakārādīnamadhivāsakajātiyo hoti, na duppañño. Paññāvirahitassa
tika-s0104t:829_3: ca parehi upanītā apakārā khantiyā paṭipakkhameva anubrūhenti. Paññavato pana te
tika-s0104t:829_4: khantisampattiyā anubrūhanavasena assā thirabhāvāya saṃvattanti. Paññavā eva tīṇipi
tika-s0104t:829_5: saccāni tesaṃ kāraṇāni paṭipakkhe ca yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā paresaṃ avisaṃvādako hoti.
tika-s0104t:829_6: Tathā paññābalena attānamupatthambhetvā dhitisampadāya sabbapāramīsu acalasamādānādhiṭṭhāno
tika-s0104t:829_7: hoti. Paññavā eva ca piyamajjhattaverivibhāgamakatvā sabbattha hitūpasaṃhārakusalo
tika-s0104t:829_8: hoti. Tathā paññāvasena lābhālābhādilokadhammasannipāte nibbikāratāya majjhatto hoti.
tika-s0104t:829_9: Evaṃ sabbāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ paññāva pārisuddhihetūti paññāguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t:830_0: Apica paññāya vinā na dassanasampatti, antarena ca diṭṭhisampadaṃ na sīlasampadā,
tika-s0104t:830_1: sīladiṭṭhisampadārahitassa ca na samādhisampadā, asamāhitena ca na sakkā attahitamattampi
tika-s0104t:830_2: sādhetuṃ, pageva ukkaṃsagataṃ parahitanti. “Nanu tayā parahitāya paṭipannena sakkaccaṃ
tika-s0104t:830_3: paññāpārisuddhiyā āyogo karaṇīyo”ti bodhisattena attā ovaditabbo. Paññānubhāvena
tika-s0104t:830_4: hi mahāsatto caturadhiṭṭhānādhiṭṭhito catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto satte
tika-s0104t:830_5: niyyānamagge avatāreti, indriyāni ca nesaṃ paripāceti. Tathā paññābalena khandhāyatanādīsu
tika-s0104t:830_6: pavicayabahulo pavattinivattiyo yāthāvato parijānanto dānādayo guṇavisese nibbedhabhāgiyabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:830_7: nayanto bodhisattasikkhāya paripūrakārī hotīti evamādinā anekākāravokāre paññāguṇe
tika-s0104t:831_0: Tathā dissamānapārānipi lokiyāni kammāni nihīnavīriyena pāpuṇitumasakkuṇeyyāni, agaṇitakhedena
tika-s0104t:831_1: pana āraddhavīriyena duradhigamaṃ nāma natthi. Nihīnavīriyo hi “saṃsāramahoghato
tika-s0104t:831_2: sabbasatte santāressāmī”ti ārabhitumeva na sakkuṇoti. Majjhimo pana ārabhitvāna antarāvosānamāpajjati.
tika-s0104t:831_3: Ukkaṭṭhavīriyo pana attasukhanirapekkho ārabhitvā pāramadhigacchatīti vīriyasampatti paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t:832_0: Apica “yassa attano eva saṃsārapaṅkato samuddharaṇatthamārambho, tassāpi vīriyassa
tika-s0104t:832_1: sithilabhāvena manorathānaṃ matthakappatti na sakkā sambhāvetuṃ, pageva sadevakassa
tika-s0104t:832_2: lokassa samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhārenā”ti ca “rāgādīnaṃ dosagaṇānaṃ mattamahānāgānamiva
tika-s0104t:832_4: tannimittānañca duggatīnaṃ sabbadā vivaṭamukhabhāvato, tattha niyojakānañca pāpamittānaṃ
tika-s0104t:832_5: sadā sannihitabhāvato, tadovādakāritāya ca vasalassa puthujjanabhāvassa sati sambhave
tika-s0104t:832_6: yuttaṃ sayameva saṃsāradukkhato nissaritu”nti ca “micchāvitakkā vīriyānubhāvena dūrī
tika-s0104t:832_7: bhavantī”ti ca “yadi pana sambodhiṃ attādhīnena vīriyena sakkā samadhigantuṃ, kimettha
tika-s0104t:832_8: dukkara”nti ca evamādinā nayena vīriyaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t:833_0: Tathā “khanti nāmāyaṃ niravasesaguṇapaṭipakkhassa kodhassa vidhamanato guṇasampādane
tika-s0104t:833_2: balasampadā, kodhaggivinayanā udakadhārā, kalyāṇakittisaddassa sañjātideso, pāpapuggalānaṃ
tika-s0104t:833_3: vacīvisavūpasamakaro mantāgado, saṃvare ṭhitānaṃ paramā dhīrapakati, gambhīrāsayatāya
tika-s0104t:833_4: sāgaro, dosamahāsāgarassa velā, apāyadvārassa pidhānakavāṭaṃ devabrahmalokānaṃ ārohaṇasopānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:833_5: sabbaguṇānamadhivāsabhūmi, uttamā kāyavacīmanovisuddhī”ti manasi kātabbaṃ. Apica
tika-s0104t:833_6: “ete sattā khantisampattiyā abhāvato idhaloke tapanti, paraloke ca tapanīyadhammānuyogato”ti
tika-s0104t:833_7: ca “yadipi parāpakāranimittaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati, tassa pana dukkhassa khettabhūto
tika-s0104t:833_8: attabhāvo, bījabhūtañca kammaṃ mayāva abhisaṅkhata”nti ca “tassa ca dukkhassa āṇaṇyakaraṇameta”nti
tika-s0104t:833_9: ca “apakārake asati kathaṃ mayhaṃ khantisampadā sambhavatī”ti ca “yadipāyaṃ etarahi
tika-s0104t:833_10: apakārako, ayaṃ nāma pubbe anena mayhaṃ upakāro kato”ti ca “apakāro eva vā khantinimittatāya
tika-s0104t:833_11: upakāro”ti ca “sabbepime sattā mayhaṃ puttasadisā, puttakatāparādhesu ca ko kujjhissatī”ti
tika-s0104t:833_12: ca “yena kodhabhūtāvesena ayaṃ mayhaṃ aparajjhati, svāyaṃ kodhabhūtāveso mayā vinetabbo”ti
tika-s0104t:833_13: ca “yena apakārena idaṃ mayhaṃ dukkhaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa ahampi nimitta”nti ca “yehi
tika-s0104t:833_14: dhammehi apakāro kato, yattha ca kato, sabbepi te tasmiṃyeva khaṇe niruddhā, kassidāni
tika-s0104t:833_15: kena kopo kātabbo”ti ca “anattatāya sabbadhammānaṃ ko kassa aparajjhatī”ti ca paccavekkhantena
tika-s0104t:834_0: Yadi panassa dīgharattaṃ paricayena parāpakāranimittako kodho cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya,
tika-s0104t:834_1: tena iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “khanti nāmesā parāpakārassa paṭipakkhapaṭipattīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:834_2: paccupakārakāraṇa”nti ca “apakāro ca mayhaṃ dukkhuppādanena dukkhupanisāya saddhāya,
tika-s0104t:834_3: sabbaloke anabhiratisaññāya ca paccayo”ti ca “indriyapakatiresā, yadidaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhavisayasamāyogo,
tika-s0104t:834_4: tattha aniṭṭhavisayasamāyogo mayhaṃ na siyāti taṃ kutettha labbhā”ti ca “kodhavasiko
tika-s0104t:834_5: satto kodhena ummatto vikkhittacitto, tattha kiṃ paccapakārenā”ti ca “sabbepime sattā
tika-s0104t:834_6: sammāsambuddhena orasaputtā viya paripālitā, tasmā na tattha mayā cittakopo kātabbo”ti
tika-s0104t:834_7: ca “aparādhake ca sati guṇe guṇavati mayā kopo na kātabbo”ti ca “asati guṇe kassacipi
tika-s0104t:834_8: guṇassābhāvato visesena karuṇāyitabbo”ti ca “kopena mayhaṃ guṇayasā nihīyantī”ti
tika-s0104t:834_9: ca “kujjhanena mayhaṃ dubbaṇṇadukkhaseyyādayo sapattakantā āgacchantī”ti ca “kodho
tika-s0104t:834_10: ca nāmāyaṃ sabbadukkhāhitakārako sabbasukhahitavināsako balavā paccatthiko”ti ca
tika-s0104t:834_11: “sati ca khantiyā na koci paccatthiko”ti ca “aparādhakena aparādhanimittaṃ yaṃ dukkhaṃ
tika-s0104t:834_12: āyatiṃ laddhabbaṃ, sati ca khantiyā mayhaṃ tadabhāvo”ti ca “cintentena, kujjhantena
tika-s0104t:834_13: ca mayā paccatthikoyeva anuvattito”ti ca “kodhe ca mayā khantiyā abhibhūte tassa
tika-s0104t:834_14: dāsabhūto paccatthiko sammadeva abhibhūto”ti ca “kodhanimittaṃ khantiguṇapariccāgo
tika-s0104t:834_15: mayhaṃ na yutto”ti ca “sati ca kodhe guṇavirodhapaccanīkadhamme kathaṃ me sīlādidhammā
tika-s0104t:834_16: pāripūriṃ gaccheyyuṃ, asati ca tesu kathāhaṃ sattānaṃ upakārabahulo paṭiññānurūpaṃ
tika-s0104t:834_17: uttamaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti ca “khantiyā ca sati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato samāhitassa
tika-s0104t:834_18: sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato dukkhato sabbe dhammā anattato nibbānaṃ asaṅkhatāmatasantapaṇītatādibhāvato
tika-s0104t:834_19: nijjhānaṃ khamanti, ‘buddhadhammā ca acinteyyāparimeyyappabhavā’ti”, tato ca “anulomikakhantiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:834_20: ṭhito ‘kevalā ime attattaniyabhāvarahitā dhammamattā yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppajjanti
tika-s0104t:834_21: vinassanti, na kutoci āgacchanti, na kuhiñci gacchanti, na ca katthaci patiṭṭhitā,
tika-s0104t:834_22: na cettha koci kassaci byāpāro’ti ahaṃkāramamaṃkārānadhiṭṭhānatā nijjhānaṃ khamati,
tika-s0104t:834_23: yena bodhisatto bodhiyā niyato anāvattidhammo hotī”ti evamādinā khantipāramiyā paccavekkhaṇā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:835_0: Tathā “saccena vinā sīlādīnamasambhavato, paṭiññānurūpapaṭipattiyā abhāvato, saccadhammātikkame
tika-s0104t:835_1: ca sabbapāpadhammānaṃ samosaraṇabhāvato, asaccasandhassa appaccayikabhāvato, āyatiñca
tika-s0104t:836_0: Tathā “dānādīsu daḷhasamādānaṃ, tappaṭipakkhasannipāte ca nesaṃ acalādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:836_1: tattha ca dhīravīrabhāvaṃ vinā na dānādisambhārā sambodhinimittā sambhavantī”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:837_0: Tathā “attahitamatte avatiṭṭhantenāpi sattesu hitacittataṃ vinā na sakkā idhalokaparalokasampattiyo
tika-s0104t:837_1: pāpuṇituṃ, pageva sabbasatte nibbānasampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmenā”ti ca “pacchā
tika-s0104t:837_3: ca “idāni āsayamattena paresaṃ hitasukhūpasaṃhāraṃ kātumasakkonto kadā payogena taṃ
tika-s0104t:837_4: sādhayissāmī”ti ca “idāni mayā hitasukhūpasaṃhārena saṃvaddhitā pacchā dhammasaṃvibhāgasahāyā
tika-s0104t:837_5: mayhaṃ bhavissantī”ti ca “etehi vinā na mayhaṃ bodhisambhārā sambhavanti, tasmā sabbabuddhaguṇavibhūtinipphattikāraṇattā
tika-s0104t:837_6: mayhaṃ ete paramaṃ puññakkhettaṃ anuttaraṃ kusalāyatanaṃ uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-s0104t:837_7: ca “savisesaṃ sabbesupi sattesu hitajjhāsayatā paccupaṭṭhapetabbā, kiñca karuṇādhiṭṭhānatopi
tika-s0104t:837_8: sabbasattesu mettā anubrūhetabbā. Vimariyādīkatena hi cetasā sattesu hitasukhūpasaṃhāraniratassa
tika-s0104t:837_9: tesaṃ ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā balavatī uppajjati daḷhamūlā, karuṇā ca sabbesaṃ
tika-s0104t:837_10: buddhakārakadhammānaṃ ādi caraṇaṃ patiṭṭhā mūlaṃ mukhaṃ pamukha”nti evamādinā mettāguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t:838_0: Tathā “upekkhāya abhāve sattehi katā vippakārā cittassa vikāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ, sati
tika-s0104t:838_1: ca cittavikāre dānādisambhārānaṃ sambhavo eva natthī”ti ca “mettāsinehena sinehite
tika-s0104t:838_2: citte upekkhāya vinā sambhārānaṃ pārisuddhi na hotī”ti ca “anupekkhako saṅkhāresu
tika-s0104t:838_3: puññasambhāraṃ, tabbipākañca sattahitatthaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ na sakkotī”ti ca upekkhāya
tika-s0104t:838_4: abhāve deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ vibhāgamakatvā pariccajituṃ na sakkotī”ti ca “upekkhārahitena
tika-s0104t:838_5: jīvitaparikkhārānaṃ, jīvitassa vā antarāyaṃ amanasikaritvā sīlavisodhanaṃ kātuṃ na
tika-s0104t:838_6: sakkā”ti ca tathā “upekkhāvasena aratiratisahasseva nekkhammabalasiddhito, upapattito
tika-s0104t:838_8: upekkhato eva titikkhānijjhānasambhavato, upekkhāvasena sattasaṅkhārānaṃ avisaṃvādanato,
tika-s0104t:838_11: upekkhānubhāvena sampajjantī”ti evamādinā nayena upekkhāpāramī paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t:839_0: Tathā saparikkhārā pañcadasa caraṇadhammā pañca ca abhiññāyo. Tattha caraṇadhammā
tika-s0104t:839_1: nāma sīlasaṃvaro, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo, satta
tika-s0104t:839_2: saddhammā, cattāri jhānāni ca. Tesu sīlādīnaṃ catunnaṃ terasapi dhutaṅgadhammā, appicchatādayo
tika-s0104t:839_5: tadadhimuttatā ca parikkhārā. Hirottappānaṃ akusalādīnavapaccavekkhaṇā, apāyādīnavapaccavekkhaṇā,
tika-s0104t:839_7: tadadhimuttatā ca. Bāhusaccassa pubbayogo, paripucchakabhāvo, saddhammābhiyogo, anavajjavijjāṭṭhānādiparicayo,
tika-s0104t:839_9: tadadhimuttatā ca. Vīriyassa apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇā, gamanavīthipaccavekkhaṇā, dhammamahattapaccavekkhaṇā,
tika-s0104t:839_11: tadadhimuttatā ca. Satiyā satisampajaññaṃ, muṭṭhassatipuggalaparivajjanā upaṭṭhitassatipuggalasevanā,
tika-s0104t:839_12: tadadhimuttatā ca. Paññāya paripucchakabhāvo, vatthuvisadakiriyā, indriyasamattapaṭipādanā,
tika-s0104t:839_14: dhammamahattapaccavekkhaṇā, tadadhimuttatā ca. Catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ sīlādicatukkaṃ,
tika-s0104t:840_0: Tattha sīlādīhi payogasuddhiyā sattānaṃ abhayadāne, āsayasuddhiyā āmisadāne, ubhayasuddhiyā
tika-s0104t:840_1: dhammadāne samatthohotītiādinā caraṇādīnaṃ dānādisambhārapaccayatā yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā.
tika-s0104t:840_2: Ativitthārabhayena pana mayaṃ na vitthārayimha. Tathā sampatticakkādayopi dānādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:844_0: Avisesena hi taṇhādīhi parāmaṭṭhabhāvo pāramīnaṃ saṃkileso. Visesena pana deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakavikappā
tika-s0104t:844_1: dānapāramiyā saṃkileso. Sattakālavikappā sīlapāramiyā. Kāmabhavatadupasamesu abhiratianabhirativikappā
tika-s0104t:844_2: nekkhammapāramiyā. “Ahaṃ mamā”ti vikappā paññāpāramiyā. Līnuddhaccavikappā vīriyapāramiyā.
tika-s0104t:844_3: Attaparavikappā khantipāramiyā. Adiṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhādivikappā saccapāramiyā. Bodhisambhāratabbipakkhesu
tika-s0104t:848_0: Anupaghātā hi taṇhā māna diṭṭhi kodhu panāha makkha palāsa issāmacchariya māyā sāṭheyya
tika-s0104t:848_1: thambha sārambha mada pamādādīhi kilesehi deyyapaṭiggāhakavikappādirahitā ca dānādipāramiyo
tika-s0104t:852_0: Avisesena hi sabbepi akusalā dhammā, sabbepi kilesā ca etāsaṃ paṭipakkhā. Visesena
tika-s0104t:852_1: pana pubbe vuttā macchariyādayoti veditabbā. Apica deyyapaṭiggāhakadānaphalesu alobhādosāmohaguṇayogato
tika-s0104t:852_4: andhīkaraṇato, ñāṇassa ca anandhīkaraṇato lobhādipaṭipakkhā paññā, alīnānuddhatañāyārambhavasena
tika-s0104t:852_5: lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ vīriyaṃ, iṭṭhāniṭṭhasuññatānaṃ khamanato lobhādipaṭipakkhā khanti,
tika-s0104t:852_6: satipi paresaṃ upakāre, apakāre ca yathābhūtappavattiyā lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ saccaṃ,
tika-s0104t:852_7: lokadhamme abhibhuyya yathāsamādinnesu sambhāresu acalanato lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:856_0: Dānapāramiyā hi tāva sukhūpakaraṇasarīrajīvitapariccāgena, bhayāpanayanena, dhammopadesena
tika-s0104t:856_1: ca bahudhā sattānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ paṭipatti. Tattha āmisadānaṃ abhayadānaṃ dhammadānanti
tika-s0104t:856_2: dātabbavatthuvasena tividhaṃ dānaṃ. Tesu bodhisattassa dātabbavatthu ajjhattikaṃ,
tika-s0104t:856_3: bāhiranti duvidhaṃ. Tattha bāhiraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālā gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ
tika-s0104t:856_4: seyyā āvasathaṃ padīpeyyanti dasavidhaṃ. Annādīnaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyādivibhāgena
tika-s0104t:856_5: anekavidhañca. Tathā rūpārammaṇaṃ yāva dhammārammaṇanti ārammaṇato chabbidhaṃ. Rūpārammaṇādīnañca
tika-s0104t:857_0: Tattha mahāpuriso bāhiraṃ vatthuṃ dento “yo yena atthiko, taṃ tasseva deti. Dento
tika-s0104t:857_1: ca tassa atthiko”ti sayameva jānanto ayācitopi deti, pageva yācito. Muttacāgo deti,
tika-s0104t:857_2: no amuttacāgo. Pariyattaṃ deti, no apariyattaṃ. Sati deyyadhamme paccupakārasannissito
tika-s0104t:857_3: na deti, asati deyyadhamme, pariyatte ca saṃvibhāgārahaṃ vibhajati. Na ca deti parūpaghātāvahaṃ
tika-s0104t:857_4: satthavisamajjādikaṃ, nāpi kīḷanakaṃ, yaṃ anatthupasaṃhitaṃ, pamādāvahañca, na ca
tika-s0104t:857_5: gilānassa yācakassa pānabhojanādiasappāyaṃ, pamāṇarahitaṃ vā deti, pamāṇayuttaṃ pana sappāyameva deti.
tika-s0104t:858_0: Tathā yācito gahaṭṭhānaṃ gahaṭṭhānucchavikaṃ deti, pabbajitānaṃ pabbajitānucchavikaṃ
tika-s0104t:858_1: deti. Mātāpitaro ñātisālohitā mittāmaccā puttadāradāsakammakarāti etesu kassaci pīḷaṃ
tika-s0104t:858_2: ajanento deti, na ca uḷāraṃ deyyadhammaṃ paṭijānitvā lūkhaṃ deti, na ca lābhasakkārasilokasannissito
tika-s0104t:858_3: deti, na ca paccupakārasannissito deti, na ca phalapāṭikaṅkhī deti aññatra sammāsambodhiyā,
tika-s0104t:858_4: na ca yācito, deyyadhammaṃ vā jigucchanto deti, na ca asaññatānaṃ yācakānaṃ akkosakaparibhāsakānampi
tika-s0104t:858_5: apaviddhā dānaṃ deti, aññadatthu pasannacitto anukampanto sakkaccameva deti, na ca
tika-s0104t:858_6: kotūhalamaṅgaliko hutvā deti, kammaphalameva pana saddahanto deti, nāpi yācake payirupāsanādīhi
tika-s0104t:858_7: saṃkilametvā deti, aparikilamento eva pana deti, na ca paresaṃ vañcanādhippāyo, bhedādhippāyo
tika-s0104t:858_8: vā dānaṃ deti, asaṃkiliṭṭhacittova deti, nāpi pharusavāco bhākuṭikamukho dānaṃ deti,
tika-s0104t:858_9: piyavādī ca pana pubbabhāsī mihitasitavacano hutvā deti, yasmiṃ ce deyyadhamme uḷāramanuññatāya
tika-s0104t:858_10: vā ciraparicayena vā gedhasabhāvatāya vā lobhadhammo adhimatto hoti, jānanto bodhisatto
tika-s0104t:858_11: taṃ khippameva paṭivinodayitvā yācake pariyesetvāpi deti, yañca deyyavatthu parittaṃ,
tika-s0104t:858_12: yācakopi paccupaṭṭhito, taṃ acintetvā api attānaṃ dhāvitvā dento yācakaṃ sammāneti
tika-s0104t:858_13: yathā taṃ akittipaṇḍito, na ca mahāpuriso attano puttadāradāsakammakaraporise yācito
tika-s0104t:858_14: te asaññāpite domanassappatte yācakānaṃ deti, sammadeva pana saññāpite somanassappatte
tika-s0104t:858_15: deti, dento ca yakkharakkhasapisācādīnaṃ vā manussānaṃ vā kurūrakammantānaṃ jānanto
tika-s0104t:858_16: na deti, tathā rajjampi tādisānaṃ na deti, ye lokassa ahitāya dukkhāya anatthāya
tika-s0104t:858_17: paṭipajjanti, ye pana dhammikā dhammena lokaṃ pālenti, tesaṃ rajjadānaṃ deti. Evaṃ
tika-s0104t:859_0: Ajjhattikadānampi dvīhākārehi veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Yathā nāma koci puriso ghāsacchādanahetu
tika-s0104t:859_1: attānaṃ parassa nissajjati, vidheyyabhāvaṃ upagacchati dāsabyaṃ, evameva mahāpuriso
tika-s0104t:859_2: sambodhihetu nirāmisacitto sattānaṃ anuttaraṃ hitasukhaṃ icchanto attano dānapāramiṃ
tika-s0104t:859_3: paripūretukāmo attānaṃ parassa nissajjati, vidheyyabhāvaṃ upagacchati yathākāmakaraṇīyataṃ,
tika-s0104t:859_4: karacaraṇanayanādiaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ tena tena atthikānaṃ akampito alīno anuppadeti, na
tika-s0104t:859_5: tattha sajjati, na saṅkocaṃ āpajjati yathā taṃ bāhiravatthusmiṃ. Tathā hi mahāpuriso
tika-s0104t:859_6: dvīhākārehi bāhiravatthuṃ pariccajati yathāsukhaṃ paribhogāya vā yācakānaṃ, tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:859_7: manorathaṃ pūrento attano vasībhāvāya vā. Tattha sabbena sabbaṃ muttacāgo evamāha
tika-s0104t:860_0: Tattha yaṃ ajjhattikavatthu diyyamānaṃ yācakassa ekanteneva hitāya saṃvattati, taṃ
tika-s0104t:860_1: deti, na itaraṃ. Na ca mahāpuriso mārassa, mārakāyikānaṃ vā devatānaṃ vihiṃsādhippāyānaṃ
tika-s0104t:860_2: attano attabhāvaṃ, aṅgapaccaṅgāni vā jānamāno deti “mā tesaṃ anattho ahosī”ti. Yathā
tika-s0104t:860_3: ca mārakāyikānaṃ, evaṃ tehi anvāviṭṭhānampi na deti, nāpi ummattakānaṃ, itaresaṃ
tika-s0104t:860_4: pana yāciyamāno samanantarameva deti tādisāya yācanāya dullabhabhāvato, tādisassa
tika-s0104t:861: Abhayadānaṃ pana rājato corato aggito udakato verīpuggalato sīhabyagghādivāḷamigato nāgayakkharakkhasapisācādito sattānaṃ bhaye paccupaṭṭhite tato parittāṇabhāvena dātabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:862_0: Dhammadānaṃ pana asaṃkiliṭṭhacittassa aviparītadhammadesanā. Opāyiko hi tassa upadeso
tika-s0104t:862_2: paripācanaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ nayo – saṅkhepato tāva dānakathā sīlakathā saggakathā kāmānaṃ
tika-s0104t:862_3: ādīnavo saṃkileso okāro ca nekkhamme ānisaṃso. Vitthārato pana sāvakabodhiyaṃ adhimuttacittānaṃ
tika-s0104t:862_4: saraṇagamanaṃ, sīlasaṃvaro, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, jāgariyānuyogo,
tika-s0104t:862_5: satta saddhammā, aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu kammakaraṇavasena samathānuyogo, rūpamukhādīsu
tika-s0104t:862_6: vipassanābhinivesesu yathārahaṃ abhinivesanamukhena vipassanānuyogo, tathā visuddhipaṭipadāya
tika-s0104t:862_7: sammattagahaṇaṃ, tisso vijjā, cha abhiññā, catasso paṭisambhidā, sāvakabodhīti etesaṃ
tika-s0104t:862_8: guṇasaṃkittanavasena yathārahaṃ tattha tattha patiṭṭhāpanā, pariyodapanā ca. Tathā
tika-s0104t:862_10: sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇādisaṃkittanamukhena tīsupi avatthābhedesu tesaṃ buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvatāvibhāvanena
tika-s0104t:862_11: yānadvaye patiṭṭhāpanā, pariyodapanā ca. Evaṃ mahāpuriso sattānaṃ dhammadānaṃ deti.
tika-s0104t:863_0: Tathā mahāpuriso āmisadānaṃ dento “imināhaṃ dānena sattānaṃ āyuvaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādisampattiñca
tika-s0104t:863_1: ramaṇīyaṃ aggaphalasampattiñca nipphādeyya”nti annaṃ deti, tathā sattānaṃ kāmakilesapipāsavūpasamāya
tika-s0104t:863_2: pānaṃ deti, tathā suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya, hirottappālaṅkārassa ca nipphattiyā vatthāni
tika-s0104t:863_3: deti, tathā iddhividhassa ceva nibbānasukhassa ca nipphattiyā yānaṃ deti, tathā sīlagandhanipphattiyā
tika-s0104t:863_4: gandhaṃ deti, tathā buddhaguṇasobhānipphattiyā mālāvilepanaṃ deti, tathā bodhimaṇḍāsananipphattiyā
tika-s0104t:863_5: āsanaṃ deti, tathāgataseyyanipphattiyā seyyaṃ deti, saraṇabhāvanipphattiyā āvasathaṃ
tika-s0104t:864_0: Byāmappabhānipphattiyā rūpadānaṃ deti, brahmassaranipphattiyā saddadānaṃ deti, sabbalokassa
tika-s0104t:864_1: piyabhāvāya rasadānaṃ deti, buddhasukhumālabhāvāya phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ deti, ajarāmaraṇabhāvāya
tika-s0104t:864_2: bhesajjadānaṃ deti, kilesadāsabyavimocanatthaṃ dāsānaṃ bhujissatādānaṃ deti, saddhammābhiratiyā
tika-s0104t:864_3: anavajjakhiḍḍāratihetudānaṃ deti, sabbepi satte ariyāya jātiyā attano puttabhāvūpanayanāya
tika-s0104t:864_4: puttadānaṃ deti, sakalassāpi lokassa patibhāvūpagamanāya dāradānaṃ deti, subhalakkhaṇasampattiyā
tika-s0104t:864_7: cakkaṅkitehi pādehi bodhimaṇḍūpasaṅkamanāya caraṇadānaṃ, caturoghanittharaṇe sattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:864_10: sabbasattānaṃ hitasukhāvaho sabbalokena ca upajīvitabbo me kāyo bhaveyyā”ti maṃsalohitādidānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:865_0: Evaṃ dadanto ca na anesanāya deti, na paropaghātena, na bhayena, na lajjāya, na dakkhiṇeyyarosanena,
tika-s0104t:865_1: na paṇīte sati lūkhaṃ, na attukkaṃsanena, na paravambhanena, na phalābhikaṅkhāya,
tika-s0104t:865_2: na yācakajigucchāya, na acittīkārena, atha kho sakkaccaṃ deti, sahatthena deti, kālena
tika-s0104t:865_3: deti, cittiṃ katvā deti, avibhāgena deti, tīsu kālesu somanassiko deti, tato eva
tika-s0104t:865_4: ca datvā na pacchānutāpī hoti, na paṭiggāhakavasena mānāvamānaṃ karoti, paṭiggāhakānaṃ
tika-s0104t:865_5: piyasamudācāro hoti vadaññū yācayogo saparivāradāyako. Annadānañhi dento “taṃ saparivāraṃ
tika-s0104t:865_6: katvā dassāmī”ti vatthādīhi saddhiṃ deti, tathā vatthadānaṃ dento “taṃ saparivāraṃ
tika-s0104t:865_7: katvā dassāmī”ti annādīhi saddhiṃ deti. Pānadānādīsupi eseva nayo, tathā rūpadānaṃ
tika-s0104t:865_8: dento itarārammaṇānipi tassa parivāraṃ katvā deti, evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-s0104t:866_0: Tattha rūpadānaṃ nāma nīlapītalohitodātādivaṇṇādīsu pupphavatthadhātūsu aññataraṃ
tika-s0104t:866_1: labhitvā rūpavasena ābhujitvā “rūpadānaṃ dassāmi, rūpadānaṃ mayha”nti cintetvā tādise
tika-s0104t:866_2: dakkhiṇeyye dānaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti, etaṃ rūpadānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t:867_0: Saddadānaṃ pana bherīsaddādivasena veditabbaṃ. Tattha saddaṃ kandamūlāni viya uppāṭetvā,
tika-s0104t:867_1: nīluppalahatthakaṃ viya ca hatthe ṭhapetvā dātuṃ na sakkoti, savatthukaṃ pana katvā
tika-s0104t:867_2: dadanto saddadānaṃ deti nāma, tasmā yadā “saddadānaṃ dassāmī”ti bherīmudiṅgādīsu
tika-s0104t:867_3: aññatarena tūriyena tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upahāraṃ karoti, kāreti ca, “saddadānaṃ dassāmi,
tika-s0104t:867_4: saddadānaṃ me”ti bherīādīni ṭhapāpeti, dhammakathikānaṃ pana saddabhesajjaṃ, telaphāṇitādīni
tika-s0104t:867_5: ca deti, dhammassavanaṃ ghoseti, sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇati, dhammakathaṃ katheti, upanisinnakathaṃ,
tika-s0104t:867_6: anumodanakathañca karoti, kāreti ca, tadā saddadānaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0104t:868_0: Tathā mūlagandhādīsu aññataraṃ rajanīyaṃ gandhavatthuṃ, pisitameva vā gandhaṃ yaṃ
tika-s0104t:868_1: kiñci labhitvā gandhavasena ābhujitvā “gandhadānaṃ dassāmi, gandhadānaṃ mayha”nti
tika-s0104t:868_2: buddharatanādīnaṃ pūjaṃ karoti, kāreti ca, gandhapūjanatthāya agarucandanādike gandhavatthuke
tika-s0104t:869_0: Tathā mūlarasādīsu yaṃ kiñci rajanīyaṃ rasavatthuṃ labhitvā rasavasena ābhujitvā
tika-s0104t:869_1: “rasadānaṃ dassāmi, rasadānaṃ mayha”nti dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ deti, rasavatthumeva vā aññaṃ
tika-s0104t:870_0: Tathā phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ mañcapīṭhādivasena, attharaṇapāvuraṇādivasena ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:870_1: Yadā hi mañcapīṭhabhisibibbohanādikaṃ, nivāsanapārupanādikaṃ vā sukhasamphassaṃ rajanīyaṃ
tika-s0104t:870_3: dassāmi, phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ mayha”nti dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ deti. Yathāvuttaṃ phoṭṭhabbavatthuṃ
tika-s0104t:871_0: Dhammadānaṃ pana dhammārammaṇassa adhippetattā ojāpānajīvitavasena veditabbaṃ. Ojādīsu
tika-s0104t:871_1: hi aññataraṃ rajanīyaṃ dhammavatthuṃ labhitvā dhammārammaṇavasena ābhujitvā “dhammadānaṃ
tika-s0104t:871_2: dassāmi, dhammadānaṃ mayha”nti sappinavanītādi ojadānaṃ deti, ambapānādiaṭṭhavidhaṃ
tika-s0104t:871_3: pānadānaṃ deti, jīvitadānanti ābhujitvā salākabhattapakkhikabhattādīni deti. Aphāsukabhāvena
tika-s0104t:871_4: abhibhūtānaṃ byādhikānaṃ vejjaṃ paṭṭhapeti, jālaṃ phālāpeti, kumīnaṃ viddhaṃsāpeti,
tika-s0104t:871_5: sakuṇapañjaraṃ viddhaṃsāpeti, bandhanena baddhānaṃ sattānaṃ bandhanamokkhaṃ kāreti,
tika-s0104t:871_6: māghātabheriṃ carāpeti, aññānipi sattānaṃ jīvitaparittāṇatthaṃ evarūpāni kammāni
tika-s0104t:871_7: karoti, kārāpeti ca, idaṃ dhammadānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t:872_0: Sabbampetaṃ yathāvuttadānasampadaṃ sakalalokahitasukhāya pariṇāmeti attano ca akuppāya
tika-s0104t:872_1: vimuttiyā aparikkhayassa chandassa aparikkhayassa vīriyassa aparikkhayassa samādhissa
tika-s0104t:872_2: aparikkhayassa paṭibhānassa aparikkhayassa jhānassa aparikkhayāya sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0104t:872_3: pariṇāmeti, imañca dānapāramiṃ paṭipajjantena mahāsattena jīvite aniccasaññā paccupaṭṭhapetabbā.
tika-s0104t:872_4: Tathā bhogesu, bahusādhāraṇatā ca nesaṃ manasi kātabbā, sattesu ca mahākaruṇā satataṃ
tika-s0104t:872_5: samitaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetabbā. Evañhi bhogehi gahetabbasāraṃ gaṇhanto ādittato viya
tika-s0104t:872_6: agārato sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ, attānañca bahi nīharanto na kiñci seseti, na katthaci
tika-s0104t:872_7: vibhāgaṃ karoti, aññadatthu nirapekkho nissajjati eva. Ayaṃ tāva dānapāramiyā paṭipattikkamo.
tika-s0104t:873_0: Sīlapāramiyā pana ayaṃ paṭipattikkamo – yasmā sabbaññusīlālaṅkārehi satte alaṅkaritukāmena
tika-s0104t:873_1: mahāpurisena ādito attano eva tāva sīlaṃ visodhetabbaṃ. Tattha catūhākārehi sīlaṃ
tika-s0104t:873_2: visujjhati ajjhāsayavisuddhito, samādānato, avītikkamanato, sati vītikkame puna pākaṭīkaraṇato
tika-s0104t:873_3: ca. Visuddhāsayatāya hi ekacco attādhipati hutvā pāpajigucchanasabhāvo ajjhattaṃ
tika-s0104t:873_4: hiridhammaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā suparisuddhasamācāro hoti, tathā parato samādāne sati
tika-s0104t:873_5: ekacco lokādhipati hutvā pāpato uttasanto ottappadhammaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā suparisuddhasamācāro
tika-s0104t:873_6: hoti, iti ubhayathāpi ete avītikkamanato sīle patiṭṭhahanti. Atha ca pana kadāci
tika-s0104t:873_7: satisammosena sīlassa khaṇḍādibhāvo siyā, tāyayeva yathāvuttāya hirottappasampattiyā
tika-s0104t:874_0: Tayidaṃ sīlaṃ vārittaṃ cārittanti duvidhaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ bodhisattassa vārittasīle paṭipattikkamo
tika-s0104t:874_1: – tena sabbasattesu tathā dayāpannacittena bhavitabbaṃ, yathā supinantenapi na āghāto
tika-s0104t:874_2: uppajjeyya, parūpakaraṇaviratatāya parasantako alagaddo viya na parāmasitabbo. Sace
tika-s0104t:874_3: pabbajito hoti, abrahmacariyatopi ārācārī hoti sattavidhamethunasaṃyogavirato, pageva
tika-s0104t:874_4: paradāragamanato. Gahaṭṭho samāno paresaṃ dāresu sadā pāpakaṃ cittampi na uppādeti.
tika-s0104t:874_5: Kathento saccaṃ hitaṃ piyaṃ parimitameva ca kālena dhammiṃ kathaṃ bhāsitā hoti. Sabbattha
tika-s0104t:874_6: anabhijjhālu, abyāpannacitto, aviparītadassano kammassakatāñāṇena ca samannāgato.
tika-s0104t:875_0: Iti caturāpāyavaṭṭadukkhānaṃ pathabhūtehi akusalakammapathehi, akusaladhammehi ca
tika-s0104t:875_1: oramitvā saggamokkhānaṃ pathabhūtesu kusalakammapathesu, kusaladhammesu ca patiṭṭhitassa
tika-s0104t:875_3: manorathā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ abhinipphajjanti, pāramiyo paripūrenti. Evaṃbhūto hi ayaṃ.
tika-s0104t:875_4: Tattha hiṃsānivattiyā sabbasattānaṃ abhayadānaṃ deti, appakasireneva mettābhāvanaṃ
tika-s0104t:875_5: sampādeti, ekādasa mettānisaṃse adhigacchati, appābādho hoti appātaṅko, dīghāyuko
tika-s0104t:875_6: sukhabahulo, lakkhaṇavisese pāpuṇāti, dosavāsanañca samucchindati. Tathā adinnādānanivattiyā
tika-s0104t:875_7: corādīhi asādhāraṇe bhoge adhigacchati, parehi anāsaṅkanīyo, piyo, manāpo, vissāsanīyo,
tika-s0104t:875_8: bhavasampattīsu alaggacitto pariccāgasīlo, lobhavāsanañca samucchindati. Abrahmacariyanivattiyā
tika-s0104t:875_9: alobho hoti santakāyacitto, sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo aparisaṅkanīyo, kalyāṇo cassa
tika-s0104t:875_10: kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, alaggacitto hoti mātugāmesu aluddhāsayo, nekkhammabahulo,
tika-s0104t:876_0: Musāvādanivattiyā sattānaṃ pamāṇabhūto hoti paccayiko theto ādeyyavacano devatānaṃ
tika-s0104t:876_2: adhigacchati, kilesavāsanañca samucchindati. Pesuññanivattiyā parūpakkamehi abhejjakāyo
tika-s0104t:876_3: hoti abhejjaparivāro, saddhamme ca abhejjanakasaddho, daḷhamitto bhavantaraparicitānampi
tika-s0104t:876_4: sattānaṃ ekantapiyo, asaṃkilesabahulo. Pharusavācānivattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo
tika-s0104t:876_5: sukhasīlo madhuravacano sambhāvanīyo, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato cassa saro nibbattati.
tika-s0104t:876_6: Samphappalāpanivattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo, garubhāvanīyo ca, ādeyyavacano
tika-s0104t:876_7: parimitālāpo, mahesakkho ca hoti mahānubhāvo, ṭhānuppattikena paṭibhānena pañhābyākaraṇakusalo,
tika-s0104t:876_8: buddhabhūmiyañca ekāya eva vācāya anekabhāsānaṃ sattānaṃ anekesaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇasamattho hoti.
tika-s0104t:877_0: Anabhijjhālutāya akicchalābhī hoti, uḷāresu ca bhogesu ruciṃ paṭilabhati, khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:877_1: sammato hoti, paccatthikehi anabhibhavanīyo, indriyavekallaṃ na pāpuṇāti, appaṭipuggalo
tika-s0104t:877_2: ca hoti. Abyāpādena piyadassano hoti sattānaṃ sambhāvanīyo, parahitābhinanditāya
tika-s0104t:877_3: ca satte appakasireneva pasādeti, alūkhasabhāvo ca hoti mettāvihārī, mahesakkho ca
tika-s0104t:877_4: hoti mahānubhāvo. Micchādassanābhāvena kalyāṇe sahāye paṭilabhati, sīsacchedaṃ pāpuṇantopi
tika-s0104t:877_5: pāpakammaṃ na karoti, kammassakatādassanato akotūhalamaṅgaliko ca hoti, saddhamme
tika-s0104t:877_6: cassa saddhā patiṭṭhitā hoti mūlajātā, saddahati ca tathāgatānaṃ bodhiṃ, samayantaresu
tika-s0104t:877_7: nābhiramati ukkāraṭṭhāne rājahaṃso viya, lakkhaṇattayavijānane kusalo hoti, ante
tika-s0104t:877_8: ca anāvaraṇañāṇalābhī, yāva ca bodhiṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye
tika-s0104t:878_0: “Iti hidaṃ sīlaṃ nāma sabbasampattīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ pabhavabhūmi,
tika-s0104t:878_1: sabbabuddhakārakadhammānaṃ ādi caraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ mukhaṃ pamukha”nti bahumānaṃ uppādetvā
tika-s0104t:878_2: kāyavacīsaṃyame, indriyadamane, ājīvapārisuddhiyaṃ, paccayaparibhoge ca satisampajaññabalena
tika-s0104t:878_3: appamatto hoti, lābhasakkārasilokaṃ ukkhittāsikapaccatthikaṃ viya sallakkhetvā “kikīva
tika-s0104t:878_4: aṇḍa”ntiādinā vuttanayena sakkaccaṃ sīlaṃ sampādetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva vārittasīle paṭipattikkamo.
tika-s0104t:879_0: Cārittasīle pana paṭipatti evaṃ veditabbā – idha bodhisatto kalyāṇamittānaṃ garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ
tika-s0104t:879_1: abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kālena kālaṃ kattā hoti, tathā
tika-s0104t:879_2: tesaṃ kālena kālaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ kattā hoti, gilānānaṃ kāyaveyyāvaṭikaṃ, vācāya pucchanañca
tika-s0104t:879_3: kattā hoti, subhāsitapadāni sutvā sādhukāraṃ kattā hoti, guṇavantānaṃ guṇe vaṇṇetā,
tika-s0104t:879_4: paresaṃ apakāre khantā, upakāre anussaritā, puññāni anumoditā, attano puññāni sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0104t:879_5: pariṇāmetā, sabbakālaṃ appamādavihārī kusalesu dhammesu, sati accaye accayato disvā
tika-s0104t:879_6: tādisānaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ āvi kattā, uttariñca sammāpaṭipattiṃ sammadeva paripūretā.
tika-s0104t:880_0: Tathā attano anurūpāsu atthūpasaṃhitāsu sattānaṃ itikattabbatāpurekkhāro analaso
tika-s0104t:880_1: sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchati. Uppannesu ca sattānaṃ byādhiādidukkhesu yathārahaṃ patikāravidhāyako,
tika-s0104t:880_3: dhammeneva niggaṇhanako yāvadeva akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpanāya, paggahārahānaṃ
tika-s0104t:880_4: dhammeneva paggaṇhanako. Yāni purimakānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ uḷāratamāni paramadukkarāni
tika-s0104t:880_5: acinteyyānubhāvāni sattānaṃ ekantahitasukhāvahāni caritāni, yehi nesaṃ bodhisambhārā
tika-s0104t:880_6: sammadeva paripākaṃ agamiṃsu, tāni sutvā anubbiggo anutrāso “tepi mahāpurisā manussā
tika-s0104t:880_7: eva, anukkamena pana sikkhāpāripūriyā bhāvitattā tādisāya uḷāratamāya ānubhāvasampattiyā
tika-s0104t:880_8: bodhisambhāresu ukkaṃsapāramippattā ahesuṃ, tasmā mayāpi sīlādisikkhāsu sammadeva
tika-s0104t:880_9: tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ, yāya paṭipattiyā ahampi anukkamena sikkhaṃ paripūretvā ekantato
tika-s0104t:880_10: padaṃ anupāpuṇissāmī”ti saddhāpurecārikaṃ vīriyaṃ avissajjanto sammadeva sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti.
tika-s0104t:881_0: Tathā paṭicchannakalyāṇo hoti vivaṭāparādho, appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho
tika-s0104t:881_1: dukkhasaho aviparītadassanajātiko anuddhato anunnaḷo acapalo amukharo avikiṇṇavāco
tika-s0104t:881_3: vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, āraddhavīriyo pahitatto kāye
tika-s0104t:881_4: ca jīvite ca nirapekkho, appamattakampi kāye, jīvite vā apekkhaṃ nādhivāseti pajahati
tika-s0104t:881_5: vinodeti, pageva adhimattaṃ. Sabbepi dussīlyahetubhūte kodhupanāhādike kilesupakkilese
tika-s0104t:881_6: pajahati vinodeti, appamattakena visesādhigamena aparituṭṭho hoti, na saṅkocaṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0104t:882_0: Yena yathāladdhā sampatti hānabhāgiyā vā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na hoti, tathā mahāpuriso
tika-s0104t:882_1: andhānaṃ pariṇāyako hoti, maggaṃ ācikkhati, badhirānaṃ hatthamuddāya saññaṃ deti,
tika-s0104t:882_2: atthamanuggāheti, tathā mūgānaṃ. Pīṭhasappikānaṃ pīṭhaṃ deti, vāheti vā. Assaddhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:882_3: saddhāpaṭilābhāya vāyamati, kusītānaṃ ussāhajananāya, muṭṭhassatīnaṃ satisamāyogāya.
tika-s0104t:882_4: Vibbhantattānaṃ samādhisampadāya, duppaññānaṃ paññādhigamāya vāyamati. Kāmacchandapariyuṭṭhitānaṃ
tika-s0104t:882_7: vāyamati. Pubbakārīnaṃ sattānaṃ kataññutaṃ nissāya pubbabhāsī piyavādī saṅgāhako
tika-s0104t:882_8: sadisena, adhikena vā paccupakāre sammānetā hoti.
tika-s0104t:883_0: Āpadāsu sahāyakiccaṃ anutiṭṭhati, tesaṃ tesañca sattānaṃ pakatiṃ, sabhāvañca parijānitvā
tika-s0104t:883_1: yehi yathā saṃvasitabbaṃ hoti, tehi tathā saṃvasati. Yesu ca yathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ
tika-s0104t:883_2: hoti, tesu tathā paṭipajjati. Tañca kho akusalato vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpanavasena,
tika-s0104t:883_3: na aññathā. Paracittānurakkhaṇā hi bodhisattānaṃ yāvadeva kusalābhivaḍḍhiyā. Tathā
tika-s0104t:883_4: hitajjhāsayenāpi paro na sāhasitabbo, na bhaṇḍitabbo, na maṅkubhāvamāpādetabbo, na
tika-s0104t:883_5: parassa kukkuccaṃ uppādetabbaṃ, na niggahaṭṭhāne codetabbo, na nīcataraṃ paṭipannassa
tika-s0104t:883_6: attā uccatare ṭhapetabbo, na ca paresu sabbena sabbaṃ asevinā bhavitabbaṃ, na atisevinā,
tika-s0104t:884_0: Yutte pana satte desakālānurūpaṃ sevati, na ca paresaṃ purato piyepi garahati, appiye
tika-s0104t:884_1: vā pasaṃsati, na adhiṭṭhāya vissāsī hoti, na dhammikaṃ upanimantanaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-s0104t:884_2: na paññattiṃ upagacchati, nādhikaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, saddhāsampanne saddhānisaṃsakathāya
tika-s0104t:884_3: sampahaṃseti, sīlasutacāgapaññāsampanne paññānisaṃsakathāya sampahaṃseti. Sace pana
tika-s0104t:884_4: bodhisatto abhiññābalappatto hoti, pamādāpanne satte abhiññābalena yathārahaṃ nirayādike
tika-s0104t:884_5: dassento saṃvejetvā assaddhādike saddhādīsu patiṭṭhāpeti, sāsane otāreti, saddhādiguṇasampanne
tika-s0104t:884_6: paripāceti. Evamassa mahāpurisassa cārittabhūto aparimāṇo puññābhisando kusalābhisando
tika-s0104t:885_0: Apica yā sā “kiṃ sīlaṃ, kenaṭṭhena sīla”ntiādinā pucchaṃ katvā “pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa,
tika-s0104t:885_1: vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā sīla”ntiādinā nayena nānappakārato
tika-s0104t:885_2: sīlassa vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttā, sā sabbāpi idha āharitvā vattabbā. Kevalañhi
tika-s0104t:885_3: tattha sāvakabodhisattavasena sīlakathā āgatā, idha mahābodhisattavasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0104t:885_4: katvā vattabbāti ayameva viseso. Yato idaṃ sīlaṃ mahāpuriso yathā na attano duggatiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:885_5: parikilesavimuttiyā, sugatiyampi na rajjasampattiyā, na cakkavattī, na deva, na sakka,
tika-s0104t:885_6: na māra, na brahmasampattiyā pariṇāmeti, tathā na attano tevijjatāya, na chaḷabhiññatāya,
tika-s0104t:885_7: na catupaṭisambhidādhigamāya, na sāvakabodhiyā, na paccekabodhiyā pariṇāmeti, atha
tika-s0104t:886_0: Tathā yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamā kāmehi ca bhavehi
tika-s0104t:886_1: ca nikkhamanavasena pavattā kusalacittuppatti nekkhammapāramī, tasmā sakalasaṃkilesanivāsanaṭṭhānatāya,
tika-s0104t:886_4: viya ca kadalī viya ca avaleyhamānaparittassādavipulānatthānubandhā”ti ca vijjulatobhāsena
tika-s0104t:886_5: gahetabbaṃ naccaṃ viya parittakālūpalabbhā, ummattakālaṅkāro viya viparītasaññāya
tika-s0104t:886_6: anubhavitabbā, karīsāvacchādanamukhaṃ viya paṭikārabhūtā, udake temitaṅguliyā nisārudakapānaṃ
tika-s0104t:886_7: viya atittikarā, chātajjhattabhojanaṃ viya sābādhā, balisāmisaṃ viya byāsanupanipātakāraṇā
tika-s0104t:886_8: (byasanasannipātakāraṇā – dī. ni. ṭī. 1.7), aggisantāpo viya kālattayepi dukkhuppattihetubhūtā,
tika-s0104t:886_9: makkaṭālepo viya bandhananimittā, ghātakāvacchādanakimālayo viya anatthacchādanā,
tika-s0104t:886_10: sapattagāmavāso viya bhayaṭṭhānabhūtā, paccatthikaposako viya kilesamārādīnaṃ āmisabhūtā,
tika-s0104t:886_11: chaṇasampattiyo viya vipariṇāmadukkhā, koṭaraggi viya antodāhakā, purāṇakūpāvalambabīraṇamadhupiṇḍaṃ
tika-s0104t:886_12: viya anekādīnavā, loṇūdakapānaṃ viya pipāsāhetubhūtā, surāmerayaṃ viya nīcajanasevitā,
tika-s0104t:886_13: appassādatāya aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā”tiādinā ca nayena ādīnavaṃ sallakkhetvā tabbipariyāyena
tika-s0104t:887_0: Yasmā pana nekkhammaṃ pabbajjāmūlakaṃ, tasmā pabbajjā tāva anuṭṭhātabbā. Pabbajjamanutiṭṭhantena
tika-s0104t:887_1: mahāsattena asati buddhuppāde kammavādīnaṃ kiriyavādīnaṃ tāpasaparibbājakānaṃ pabbajjā
tika-s0104t:887_2: anuṭṭhātabbā. Uppannesu pana sammāsambuddhesu tesaṃ sāsane eva pabbajitabbaṃ. Pabbajitvā
tika-s0104t:887_3: ca yathāvutte sīle patiṭṭhitena tassā eva sīlapāramiyā vodāpanatthaṃ dhutaguṇā samādātabbā.
tika-s0104t:887_4: Samādinnadhutadhammā hi mahāpurisā sammadeva te pariharantā appicchāsantuṭṭhasallekhapavivekaasaṃsaggavīriyārambhasubharatādiguṇasalilavikkhālitakilesamalatāya
tika-s0104t:887_6: bhāvanārāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ gantuṃ cattārīsāya ārammaṇesu yathārahaṃ upacārappanābhedaṃ
tika-s0104t:887_7: jhānaṃ upasampajja viharanti. Evañhissa sammadeva nekkhammapāramī pāripūritā hoti.
tika-s0104t:887_8: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne terasahi dhutadhammehi saddhiṃ dasa kasiṇāni dasāsubhāni dasānussatiyo
tika-s0104t:887_9: cattāro brahmavihārā cattāro āruppā ekā saññā ekaṃ vavatthānanti cattārīsa samādhibhāvanākammaṭṭhānāni,
tika-s0104t:887_10: bhāvanāvidhānañca vitthārato vattabbāni, taṃ panetaṃ sabbaṃ yasmā visuddhimagge sabbākārato
tika-s0104t:887_11: vitthāretvā vuttaṃ, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Kevalañhi tattha sāvakabodhisattassa
tika-s0104t:887_12: vasena vuttaṃ, idha mahābodhisattassa vasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā vattabbanti
tika-s0104t:887_13: ayameva viseso. Evamettha nekkhammapāramiyā paṭipattikkamo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:888_0: Tathā paññāpāramiṃ sampādetukāmena yasmā paññā āloko viya andhakārena mohena saha
tika-s0104t:888_1: na vattati, tasmā mohakāraṇāni tāva bodhisattena parivajjetabbāni. Tatthimāni mohakāraṇāni-arati
tika-s0104t:888_2: tandī vijambhitā ālasiyaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikārāmatā niddāsīlatā anicchayasīlatā ñāṇasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:888_3: akutūhalatā micchādhimāno aparipucchakatā kāyassa nasammāparihāro asamāhitacittatā
tika-s0104t:888_4: duppaññānaṃ puggalānaṃ sevanā paññavantānaṃ apayirupāsanā attaparibhavo micchāvikappo
tika-s0104t:888_5: viparītābhiniveso kāyadaḷhībahulatā asaṃvegasīlatā pañca nīvaraṇāni, saṅkhepato yevāpanadhamme
tika-s0104t:888_6: āsevato anuppannā paññā nuppajjati, uppannā parihāyati, iti imāni mohakāraṇāni, tāni
tika-s0104t:888_7: parivajjantena bāhusacce, jhānādīsu ca yogo karaṇīyo.
tika-s0104t:889_0: Tatthāyaṃ bāhusaccassa visayavibhāgo – pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo
tika-s0104t:889_1: cattāri saccāni bāvīsatindriyāni dvādasapadiko paṭiccasamuppādo, tathā satipaṭṭhānādayo
tika-s0104t:889_2: kusalādidhammappabhedā ca, yāni ca loke anavajjāni vijjāṭṭhānāni, yo ca sattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:889_3: hitasukhavidhānanayo byākaraṇaviseso. Iti evaṃ pakāraṃ sakalameva sutavisayaṃ upāyakosallapubbaṅgamāya
tika-s0104t:889_4: paññāya, satiyā, vīriyena ca sādhukaṃ uggahaṇasavanadhāraṇaparicayaparipucchāhi ogāhetvā
tika-s0104t:889_5: tattha ca paresaṃ patiṭṭhāpanena sutamayā paññā nibbattetabbā, tathā sattānaṃ itikattabbatāsu
tika-s0104t:889_6: ṭhānuppattikā paṭibhānabhūtā, āyāpāyaupāyakosallabhūtā ca paññā hitesitaṃ nissāya
tika-s0104t:889_7: tattha tattha yathārahaṃ pavattetabbā, tathā khandhādīnaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ ākāraparitakkanamukhena
tika-s0104t:889_8: ceva nijjhānaṃ khamāpentena ca cintāmayā paññā nibbattetabbā.
tika-s0104t:890_2: uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca, na ettha koci kattā vā kāretā vā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena
tika-s0104t:890_3: aniccaṃ, udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ, avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā”ti ajjhattikadhamme,
tika-s0104t:890_4: bāhirakadhamme ca nibbisesaṃ parijānanto tattha āsaṅgaṃ pajahanto, pare ca tattha
tika-s0104t:890_5: taṃ pajahāpento kevalaṃ karuṇāvaseneva yāva na buddhaguṇā hatthatalaṃ āgacchanti,
tika-s0104t:890_6: tāva yānattaye satte avatāraṇaparipācanehi patiṭṭhāpento, jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiyo,
tika-s0104t:890_7: abhiññāyo ca lokiyavasībhāvaṃ pāpento paññāya matthakaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0104t:891_0: Tattha yācimā iddhividhañāṇaṃ dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:891_3: dhammesu uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā sīlavisuddhi cittavisuddhīti
tika-s0104t:891_4: mūlabhūtāsu imāsu dvīsu visuddhīsu patiṭṭhāya diṭṭhivisuddhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi
tika-s0104t:891_6: imā pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbā lokiyalokuttarabhedā bhāvanāpaññā, tāsaṃ
tika-s0104t:891_7: sampādanavidhānaṃ yasmā “tattha ‘ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī’tiādikaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ
tika-s0104t:891_8: kātukāmena ādikammikena yoginā”tiādinā, “khandhāti pañcha khandhā rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho
tika-s0104t:891_10: – cariyā. aṭṭha. pakiṇṇakakathā) saddhiṃ visuddhimagge sabbākārato vitthāretvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:891_11: tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Kevalañhi tattha sāvakabodhisattassa vasena
tika-s0104t:891_12: paññā āgatā, idha mahābodhisattassa vasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā vattabbā.
tika-s0104t:891_14: ayameva visesoti. Evamettha paññāpāramiyā paṭipattikkamo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:892_0: Tathā yasmā sammāsambodhiyā katābhinīhārena mahāsattena pāramīparipūraṇatthaṃ sabbakālaṃ
tika-s0104t:892_1: yuttappayuttena bhavitabbaṃ ābaddhaparikaraṇena, tasmā kālena kālaṃ “ko nu kho ajja
tika-s0104t:892_2: mayā puññasambhāro, ñāṇasambhāro vā upacito, kiṃ vā mayā parahitaṃ kata”nti divase
tika-s0104t:892_3: divase paccavekkhantena sattahitatthaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo, sabbesampi sattānaṃ upakārāya
tika-s0104t:892_4: attano pariggahabhūtaṃ vatthuṃ, kāyaṃ, jīvitañca nirapekkhanacittena ossajjitabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:892_5: yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ karoti kāyena, vācāya vā, taṃ sabbaṃ sambodhiyaṃ ninnacitteneva
tika-s0104t:892_6: kātabbaṃ, bodhiyā pariṇāmetabbaṃ, uḷārehi, ittarehi ca kāmehi vinivattacitteneva
tika-s0104t:892_7: bhavitabbaṃ, sabbāsu ca itikattabbatāsu upāyakosallaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:893_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiñca sattahite āraddhavīriyena bhavitabbaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādisabbasahena avisaṃvādinā.
tika-s0104t:893_1: Sabbepi sattā anodhiso mettāya, karuṇāya ca pharitabbā. Yā kāci sattānaṃ dukkhuppatti,
tika-s0104t:893_2: sabbā sā attani pāṭikaṅkhitabbā. Sabbesañca sattānaṃ puññaṃ abbhanumoditabbaṃ, buddhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:893_3: mahantatā mahānubhāvatā abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbā, yañca kiñci kammaṃ karoti kāyena,
tika-s0104t:893_4: vācāya vā, taṃ sabbaṃ bodhicittapubbaṅgamaṃ kātabbaṃ. Iminā hi upāyena dānādīsu yuttappayuttassa
tika-s0104t:893_5: thāmavato daḷhaparakkamassa mahāsattassa bodhisattassa aparimeyyo puññasambhāro,
tika-s0104t:894_0: Apica sattānaṃ paribhogatthaṃ, paripālanatthañca attano sarīraṃ, jīvitañca pariccajitvā
tika-s0104t:894_1: khuppipāsasītuṇhavātātapādidukkhapatikāro pariyesitabbo ca uppādetabbo ca, yañca
tika-s0104t:894_2: yathāvuttadukkhapatikārajaṃ sukhaṃ attanā paṭilabhati, tathā ramaṇīyesu ārāmuyyānapāsādataḷākādīsu,
tika-s0104t:894_3: araññāyatanesu ca kāyacittasantāpābhāvena abhinibbutattā attanā sukhaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-s0104t:894_6: ca, taṃ sabbaṃ sattesu anodhiso upasaṃharati. Ayaṃ tāva nayo asamāhitabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitassa.
tika-s0104t:895_0: Samāhitabhūmiyaṃ pana patiṭṭhito attanā yathānubhūtaṃ visesādhigamanibbattaṃ pītiṃ,
tika-s0104t:895_1: passaddhiṃ, sukhaṃ, samādhiṃ, yathābhūtañāṇañca sattesu adhimuccanto upasaṃharati
tika-s0104t:895_2: pariṇāmeti, tathā mahati saṃsāradukkhe, tassa ca nimittabhūte kilesābhisaṅkhāradukkhe
tika-s0104t:895_4: dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā nirantaraṃ cirakālaṃ vedayante narake, aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0104t:895_6: jotimālākulasarīre khuppipāsavātātapādīhi ḍayhamāne, visussamāne ca vantakheḷādiāhāre,
tika-s0104t:895_7: uddhabāhu viravante nijjhāmataṇhikādike mahādukkhaṃ vedayamāne pete ca pariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ
tika-s0104t:895_9: khuppipāsādiābādhayogena balavantehi abhibhavanīyato, paresaṃ vahanato, parādhīnato
tika-s0104t:895_10: ca narake, pete, tiracchānagate ca atisayante apāyadukkhanibbisesaṃ dukkhamanubhavante
tika-s0104t:895_11: manusse ca tathā visayaparibhogavikkhittacittatāya rāgādipariḷāhena ḍayhamāne vātavegasamuṭṭhitajālāsamiddhasukkhakaṭṭhasannipāte
tika-s0104t:895_13: dī. ni. ṭī. 1.7) kāmāvacaradeve ca mahatā vāyāmena vidūramākāsaṃ vigāhitasakuntā
tika-s0104t:895_14: viya, balavatā dūre pāṇinā khittasarā viya ca “satipi cirappavattiyaṃ anaccantikatāya
tika-s0104t:895_15: pātapariyosānā anatikkantajātijarāmaraṇā evā”ti rūpāvacarārūpāvacaradeve ca passantena
tika-s0104t:895_16: mahantaṃ saṃvegaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā mettāya, karuṇāya ca anodhiso sattā pharitabbā.
tika-s0104t:895_17: Evaṃ kāyena, vācāya, manasā ca bodhisambhāre nirantaraṃ upacinantena yathā pāramiyo
tika-s0104t:895_18: paripūrenti, evaṃ sakkaccakārinā sātaccakārinā anolīnavuttinā ussāho pavattetabbo,
