tika-s0104t:896_1: buddhabhāvassa ussakkitvā sampahaṃsanayoggaṃ vīriyaṃ nāma acinteyyānubhāvameva, yaṃ
tika-s0104t:896_2: na pacurajanā sotumpi sakkuṇanti, pageva paṭipajjituṃ. Tathā hi tividhā abhinīhāracittuppatti,
tika-s0104t:896_3: catasso buddhabhūmiyo, cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, karuṇekarasatā, buddhadhammesu sacchikaraṇena
tika-s0104t:896_4: visesappaccayo, nijjhānakkhanti, sabbadhammesu nirupalepo, sabbasattesu piyaputtasaññā,
tika-s0104t:896_5: saṃsāradukkhehi aparikhedo, sabbadeyyadhammapariccāgo, tena ca niratimānatā, adhisīlādiadhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:896_6: tattha ca acañcalatā, kusalakiriyāsu pītipāmojjatā, vivekaninnacittatā, jhānānuyogo,
tika-s0104t:896_7: anavajjadhammesu atittiyatā, yathāsutassa dhammassa paresaṃ hitajjhāsayena desanāya
tika-s0104t:896_9: samāpattīsu vasībhāvo, abhiññāsu balappatti, lakkhaṇattayāvabodho, satipaṭṭhānādīsu
tika-s0104t:896_11: sabbāpi bodhisambhārapaṭipatti vīriyānubhāveneva samijjhatīti abhinīhārato yāva mahābodhi
tika-s0104t:896_12: anossajjantena sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ vīriyaṃ yathā uparūpari visesāvahaṃ hoti, evaṃ
tika-s0104t:896_13: sampādetabbaṃ. Sampajjamāne ca yathāvutte vīriye, khantisaccādhiṭṭhānādayo ca dānasīlādayo
tika-s0104t:896_14: ca sabbepi bodhisambhārā tadadhīnavuttitāya sampannā eva hontītikhantiādīsupi imināva
tika-s0104t:897_0: Iti sattānaṃ sukhūpakaraṇapariccāgena bahudhānuggahakaraṇaṃ dānena paṭipatti, sīlena
tika-s0104t:897_2: tesaṃ āmisapaṭiggahaṇadhammadānādinā anekavidhā hitacariyā, paññāya tesaṃ hitakaraṇūpāyakosallaṃ,
tika-s0104t:897_3: vīriyena tattha ussāhārambhaasaṃhīrakaraṇāni, khantiyā tadaparādhasahanaṃ, saccena
tika-s0104t:897_5: acalanaṃ, mettāya nesaṃ hitasukhānucintanaṃ, upekkhāya nesaṃ upakārāpakāresu vikārānāpattīti
tika-s0104t:897_6: evaṃ aparimāṇe satte ārabbha anukampitasabbasattassa bodhisattassa puthujjanehi asādhāraṇo
tika-s0104t:897_7: aparimāṇo puññañāṇasambhārupacayo ettha paṭipattīti veditabbaṃ. Yo cetāsaṃ paccayo
tika-s0104t:901_0: Dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti hi samatiṃsa pāramiyo. Tattha
tika-s0104t:901_2: sukkā dhammā pāramiyo, tehi avokiṇṇā sukkā dhammā upapāramiyo, akaṇhā asukkā dhammā
tika-s0104t:901_4: puṇṇā upapāramiyo, buddhabhūmiyaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇā paramatthapāramiyo. Bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:901_5: vā parahitakaraṇato pāramiyo, attahitakaraṇato upapāramiyo, buddhabhūmiyaṃ balavesārajjasamadhigamena
tika-s0104t:902_2: yathāvuttavibhāgo”ti keci. “Cittapaṇidhito yāva vacīpaṇidhi, tāva pavattā sambhārā
tika-s0104t:902_3: pāramiyo, vacīpaṇidhito yāva kāyapaṇidhi, tāva pavattā upapāramiyo, kāyapaṇidhito
tika-s0104t:902_4: pabhuti paramatthapāramiyo”ti apare. Aññe pana “parapuññānumodanavasena pavattā sambhārā
tika-s0104t:902_5: pāramiyo, paresaṃ kārāpanavasena pavattā upapāramiyo, sayaṃ karaṇavasena pavattā
tika-s0104t:902_6: paramatthapāramiyo”ti vadanti. Tathā “bhavasukhāvaho puññañāṇasambhāro pāramī, attano
tika-s0104t:902_7: nibbānasukhāvaho upapāramī, paresaṃ tadubhayasukhāvaho paramatthapāramī”ti eke.
tika-s0104t:903_0: Puttadāradhanādiupakaraṇapariccāgo pana dānapāramī, attano aṅgapariccāgo dānaupapāramī,
tika-s0104t:903_1: attano jīvitapariccāgo dānaparamatthapāramī. Tathā puttadārādikassa tividhassāpi
tika-s0104t:903_2: hetu avītikkamanavasena tisso sīlapāramiyo, tesu eva tividhesu vatthūsu ālayaṃ upacchinditvā
tika-s0104t:903_3: nikkhamanavasena tisso nekkhammapāramiyo, upakaraṇaaṅgajīvitataṇhaṃ samūhanitvā sattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:903_6: tisso khantipāramiyo, upakaraṇaaṅgajīvitahetu saccāpariccāgavasena tisso saccapāramiyo,
tika-s0104t:903_8: tisso adhiṭṭhānapāramiyo, upakaraṇādivighātakesupi sattesu mettāya avijahanavasena
tika-s0104t:903_9: tisso mettāpāramiyo, yathāvuttavatthuttayassa upakārāpakāresu sattasaṅkhāresu majjhattatāpaṭilābhavasena
tika-s0104t:903_10: tisso upekkhāpāramiyoti evamādinā etāsaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:907_0: Yathā hi esā vibhāgato tiṃsavidhāpi dānapāramiādibhāvato dasavidhā, evaṃ dānasīlakhantivīriyajhānapaññāsabhāvena
tika-s0104t:907_1: chabbidhā. Etāsu hi nekkhammapāramī sīlapāramiyā saṅgahitā tassā pabbajjābhāve. Nīvaraṇavivekabhāve
tika-s0104t:907_2: pana jhānapāramiyā, kusaladhammabhāve chahipi saṅgahitā, saccapāramī sīlapāramiyā
tika-s0104t:907_3: ekadesā eva vacīsaccaviratisaccapakkhe. Ñāṇasaccapakkhe pana paññāpāramiyā saṅgahitā,
tika-s0104t:907_4: mettāpāramī jhānapāramiyā eva, upekkhāpāramī jhānapaññāpāramīhi, adhiṭṭhānapāramī
tika-s0104t:908_0: Etesañca dānādīnaṃ channaṃ guṇānaṃ aññamaññasambandhānaṃ pañcadasa yugaḷādīni pañcadasa
tika-s0104t:908_1: yugaḷādisādhakāni honti. Seyyathidaṃ? Dānasīlayugaḷena parahitāhitānaṃ karaṇākaraṇayugaḷasiddhi,
tika-s0104t:908_11: evaṃ itarehipi tikehi, catukkādīhi ca yathāsambhavaṃ tikāni, catukkādīni ca yojetabbāni.
tika-s0104t:909_0: Evaṃ chabbidhānampi pana imāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:909_1: Sabbapāramīnaṃ samūhasaṅgahato hi cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni. Seyyathidaṃ? Saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:909_2: cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ, upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, paññādhiṭṭhānanti. Tattha adhitiṭṭhati etena,
tika-s0104t:909_3: ettha vā adhitiṭṭhati, adhiṭṭhānamattameva vā tanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ, saccañca taṃ adhiṭṭhānañca,
tika-s0104t:909_4: saccassa vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ, saccaṃ vā adhiṭṭhānametassāti saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-s0104t:909_5: Tattha avisesato tāva katābhinīhārassa anukampitasabbasattassa mahāsattassa paṭiññānurūpaṃ
tika-s0104t:909_7: sabbapāramitāguṇehi upasamanato upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tehi eva parahitesu upāyakosallato paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:910_0: Visesato pana “yācakānaṃ janānaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dassāmī”ti paṭijānanato, paṭiññaṃ
tika-s0104t:910_1: avisaṃvādetvā dānato, dānaṃ avisaṃvādetvā anumodanato, macchariyādipaṭipakkhapariccāgato,
tika-s0104t:910_3: yathākālaṃ yathāvidhānañca dānato, paññuttarato ca kusaladhammānaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:910_4: dānaṃ. Tathā saṃvarasamādānassa avītikkamanato, dussīlyapariccāgato, duccaritavūpasamanato,
tika-s0104t:910_5: paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ. Yathāpaṭiññaṃ khamanato, katāparādhavikappapariccāgato,
tika-s0104t:910_7: parahitakaraṇato, visayapariccāgato, akusalavūpasamanato, paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:910_9: paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ jhānaṃ. Yathāpaṭiññaṃ parahitūpāyakosallato,
tika-s0104t:910_10: anupāyakiriyapariccāgato, mohajapariḷāhavūpasamanato, sabbaññutāpaṭilābhato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā paññā.
tika-s0104t:911_8: saccacāgūpasamādhiṭṭhānāni ñāṇapubbaṅgamato, ñāṇānuparivattanato cāti evaṃ sabbāpi
tika-s0104t:911_9: pāramiyo saccappabhāvitā cāgaparibyañjitā upasamopabrūhitā paññāparisuddhā. Saccañhi
tika-s0104t:911_10: etāsaṃ janakahetu, cāgo paṭiggāhakahetu, upasamo paribuddhihetu paññā pārisuddhihetu.
tika-s0104t:911_11: Tathā ādimhi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccapaṭiññattā, majjhe cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ katapaṇidhānassa
tika-s0104t:911_12: parahitāya attapariccāgato, ante upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ sabbūpasamapariyosānattā. Ādimajjhapariyosānesu
tika-s0104t:911_13: paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ tasmiṃ sati sambhavato, asati asambhavato, yathāpaṭiññañca sambhavato.
tika-s0104t:912_0: Tattha mahāpurisā satataṃ attahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi saccacāgādhiṭṭhānehi
tika-s0104t:912_1: gihibhūtā āmisadānena pare anuggaṇhanti. Tathā attahitaparahitakarehi, garupiyabhāvakarehi,
tika-s0104t:912_2: upasamapaññādhiṭṭhānehi ca pabbajitabhūtā dhammadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
tika-s0104t:913_1: hi carimakabhavūpapattīti eke. Tatrāpi hi gabbhāvakkantiabhinikkhamanesu paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
tika-s0104t:913_2: sato sampajāno saccādhiṭṭhānapāripūriyā sampatijāto uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena
tika-s0104t:913_3: gantvā sabbā disā oloketvā saccānuparivattinā vacasā “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi
tika-s0104t:913_4: lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassā”ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi, upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
tika-s0104t:913_6: upasamo, cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena mahato ñātiparivaṭṭassa, hatthagatassa ca cakkavattirajjassa
tika-s0104t:914_0: Dutiye ṭhāne abhisambodhiyaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇanti keci. Tattha hi yathāpaṭiññaṃ
tika-s0104t:914_1: saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ abhisamayo. Tato hi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:914_2: paripuṇṇaṃ. Cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena sabbakilesupakkilesapariccāgo. Tato hi cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:914_3: paripuṇṇaṃ. Upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena paramūpasamasampatti. Tato hi upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:914_4: paripuṇṇaṃ. Paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena anāvaraṇañāṇapaṭilābho. Tato hi paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:915_0: Tatiye ṭhāne dhammacakkappavattane caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti aññe. Tattha hi
tika-s0104t:915_3: upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa sayaṃ upasantassa paresaṃ upasamanena upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:916_0: Catutthe ṭhāne parinibbāne caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti apare. Tatra hi parinibbutattā
tika-s0104t:917_0: Tatra mahāpurisassa visesena mettākhette abhijātiyaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa
tika-s0104t:918_0: Tatrāpi saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa saṃvāsena sīlaṃ veditabbaṃ, cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa
tika-s0104t:918_1: saṃvohārena soceyyaṃ veditabbaṃ, upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa āpadāsu thāmo veditabbo,
tika-s0104t:918_2: paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa sākacchāya paññā veditabbā. Evaṃ sīlājīvacittadiṭṭhivisuddhiyo
tika-s0104t:918_3: veditabbā. Tathā saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena dosāgatiṃ na gacchati avisaṃvādanato,
tika-s0104t:918_4: cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena chandāgatiṃ na gacchati anabhisaṅgato, upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
tika-s0104t:918_5: bhayāgatiṃ na gacchati anuparodhato, paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena mohāgatiṃ na gacchati
tika-s0104t:919_0: Tathā paṭhamena aduṭṭho adhivāseti, dutiyena aluddho paṭisevati, tatiyena abhīto
tika-s0104t:919_1: parivajjeti, catutthena asaṃmūḷho vinodeti. Paṭhamena nekkhammasukhuppatti, itarehi
tika-s0104t:919_3: satipārisuddhijaupekkhāsukhuppattiyo etehi catūhi yathākkamaṃ hontīti. Evamanekaguṇānubandhehi
tika-s0104t:919_4: catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi sabbapāramisamūhasaṅgaho veditabbo. Yathā ca catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi
tika-s0104t:919_5: sabbapāramisaṅgaho, evaṃ karuṇāpaññāhipīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbopi hi bodhisambhāro karuṇāpaññāhi
tika-s0104t:919_6: saṅgahito. Karuṇāpaññāpariggahitā hi dānādiguṇā mahābodhisambhārā bhavanti buddhattasiddhipariyosānāti.
tika-s0104t:923_0: Sakalassāpi hi puññādisambhārassa sammāsambodhiṃ uddissa anavasesasambharaṇaṃ avekallakāritāyogena,
tika-s0104t:923_1: tattha ca sakkaccakāritā ādarabahumānayogena, sātaccakāritā nirantarapayogena, cirakālādiyogo
tika-s0104t:923_2: ca antarā avosānāpajjanenāti. Taṃ panassa kālaparimāṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati. Iti
tika-s0104t:924_0: Tathā mahāsattena bodhāya paṭipajjantena sammāsambodhāya buddhānaṃ puretarameva attā
tika-s0104t:924_1: niyyātetabbo “imāhaṃ attabhāvaṃ buddhānaṃ niyyātemī”ti. Taṃ taṃ pariggahavatthuñca
tika-s0104t:924_2: paṭilābhato puretarameva dānamukhe nissajjitabbaṃ “yaṃ kiñci mayhaṃ uppajjanakaṃ
tika-s0104t:924_3: jīvitaparikkhārajātaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sati yācake dassāmi, tesaṃ pana dinnāvasesaṃ eva
tika-s0104t:925_0: Evañhissa sammadeva pariccāgāya kate cittābhisaṅkhāre yaṃ uppajjati pariggahavatthu
tika-s0104t:925_1: aviññāṇakaṃ, saviññāṇakaṃ vā, tattha ye ime pubbe dāne akataparicayo, pariggahavatthussa
tika-s0104t:925_2: parittabhāvo, uḷāramanuññatā, parikkhayacintāti cattāro dānavinibandhā. Tesu yadā
tika-s0104t:925_3: mahābodhisattassa saṃvijjamānesu deyyadhammesu, paccupaṭṭhite ca yācakajane dāne
tika-s0104t:925_4: cittaṃ na pakkhandati na kamati, tena niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “addhāhaṃ dāne pubbe
tika-s0104t:925_5: akataparicayo, tena me etarahi dātukamyatā citte na saṇṭhātī”ti. So “evaṃ me ito
tika-s0104t:925_6: paraṃ dānābhirataṃ cittaṃ bhavissati, handāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya dānaṃ dassāmi, nanu mayā
tika-s0104t:925_7: paṭikacceva pariggahavatthuṃ yācakānaṃ pariccatta”nti dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇi
tika-s0104t:925_8: vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato. Evaṃ mahāsattassa paṭhamo dānavinibandho
tika-s0104t:926_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa parittabhāve sati paccayavekalle iti paṭisañcikkhati
tika-s0104t:926_1: “ahaṃ kho pubbe adānasīlatāya etarahi evaṃ paccayavekallo jāto, tasmā idāni mayā
tika-s0104t:926_2: parittena vā hīnena vā yathāladdhena deyyadhammena attānaṃ pīḷetvāpi dānameva dātabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:926_3: yenāhaṃ āyatimpi dānapāramiṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti so itarītarena dānaṃ deti muttacāgo
tika-s0104t:926_4: payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato. Evaṃ mahāsattassa dutiyo dānavinibandho
tika-s0104t:927_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa uḷāramanuññatāya adātukamyatācitte uppajjamāne iti
tika-s0104t:927_1: paṭisañcikkhati “nanu tayā sappurisa uḷāratamā sabbaseṭṭhā sammāsambodhi abhipatthitā,
tika-s0104t:927_2: tasmā tadatthaṃ tayā uḷāramanuññe eva deyyadhamme dātuṃ yuttarūpa”nti. So uḷāraṃ,
tika-s0104t:927_3: manuññañca dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
tika-s0104t:927_4: Evaṃ mahāpurisassa tatiyo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
tika-s0104t:928_0: Tathā mahāsatto dānaṃ dento yadā deyyadhammassa parikkhayaṃ passati, so iti paṭisañcikkhati
tika-s0104t:928_1: “ayaṃ kho bhogānaṃ sabhāvo, yadidaṃ khayadhammatā vayadhammatā, apica me pubbe tādisassa
tika-s0104t:928_2: dānassa akatattā evaṃ bhogānaṃ parikkhayo dissati, handāhaṃ yathāladdhena deyyadhammena
tika-s0104t:928_3: parittena vā, vipulena vā dānameva dadeyyaṃ, yenāhaṃ āyatiṃ dānapāramiyā matthakaṃ
tika-s0104t:928_4: pāpuṇissāmī’ti. So yathāladdhena dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo
tika-s0104t:928_5: dānasaṃvibhāgarato. Evaṃ mahāsattassa catuttho dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
tika-s0104t:928_6: Evaṃ ye ye dānapāramiyā vinibandhabhūtā anatthā, tesaṃ tesaṃ yathārahaṃ paccavekkhitvā
tika-s0104t:928_7: paṭivinodanaṃ upāyo. Yathā ca dānapāramiyā, evaṃ sīlapāramiādīsupi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:929_0: Apica yaṃ mahāsattassa buddhānaṃ attasanniyyātanaṃ, taṃ sammadeva sabbapāramīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:929_1: sampādanūpāyo, buddhānañca attānaṃ niyyātetvā ṭhito mahāpuriso tattha tattha bodhisambhārapāripūriyā
tika-s0104t:929_2: ghaṭento vāyamanto sarīrassa, sukhūpakaraṇānañca upacchedakesu dussahesupi kiccesu
tika-s0104t:929_4: anatthesu tibbesu pāṇaharesu “ayaṃ mayā attabhāvo buddhānaṃ pariccatto, yaṃ vā taṃ
tika-s0104t:929_5: vā ettha hotū”ti tannimittaṃ na kampati na vedhati īsakampi aññathattaṃ na gacchati,
tika-s0104t:929_6: kusalārambhe aññadatthu acalādhiṭṭhāno ca hoti, evaṃ attasanniyyātanampi etāsaṃ sampādanūpāyo.
tika-s0104t:930_0: Apica samāsato katābhinīhārassa attani sinehassa pariyādānaṃ, (parisosanaṃ cariyā.
tika-s0104t:930_1: aṭṭha. pakiṇṇakakathā) paresu ca sinehassa parivaḍḍhanaṃ etāsaṃ sampādanūpāyo. Sammāsambodhisamadhigamāya
tika-s0104t:930_2: hi katamahāpaṇidhānassa mahāsattassa yāthāvato parijānanena sabbesu dhammesu anupalittassa
tika-s0104t:930_3: attani sineho parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati, mahākaruṇāsamāyogavasena (samāsevanena
tika-s0104t:930_4: cariyā. aṭṭha. pakiṇṇakakathā) pana piyaputte viya sabbasatte sampassamānassa tesu
tika-s0104t:930_5: mettākaruṇāsineho parivaḍḍhati, tato ca taṃ tadāvatthānurūpaṃ attaparasantānesu lobhadosamohavigamena
tika-s0104t:930_7: samānattatāsaṅkhātehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi caturadhiṭṭhānānugatehi accantaṃ janassa
tika-s0104t:930_8: saṅgahakaraṇena upari yānattaye avatāraṇaṃ, paripācanañca karoti.
tika-s0104t:931_0: Mahāsattānañhi mahākaruṇā, mahāpaññā ca dānena alaṅkatā, dānaṃ piyavacanena, piyavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:931_1: atthacariyāya, atthacariyā samānattatāya alaṅkatā, saṅgahitā ca. Tesañhi sabbepi
tika-s0104t:931_2: satte attanā nibbisese katvā bodhisambhāresu paṭipajjantānaṃ sabbattha samānasukhadukkhatāya
tika-s0104t:931_3: samānattatāsiddhi. Buddhabhūtānampi ca teheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi caturadhiṭṭhānena
tika-s0104t:931_4: paripūritābhibuddhehi janassa accantikasaṅgahakaraṇena abhivinayanaṃ sijjhati. Dānañhi
tika-s0104t:931_7: Tathāgatānañhi sabbasāvakapaccekabuddhehi samānattatā parinibbāne. Tatra hi nesaṃ
tika-s0104t:931_8: avisesato ekībhāvo. Tenevāha “natthi vimuttiyā nānatta”ti. Honti cettha –
tika-s0104t:935: Nirapekkho ca sabbattha, aho acchariyo jino.
tika-s0104t:937: Sadā sattahite yutto, aho acchariyo jino.
tika-s0104t:938: Sabbadā sabbasattānaṃ, hitāya ca sukhāya ca;
tika-s0104t:939: Uyyutto akilāsū ca, aho acchariyo jino”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:942: Tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ, vasā kālo tidhā mato.
tika-s0104t:943_0: Heṭṭhimena hi tāva paricchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni, mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca,
tika-s0104t:943_1: majjhimena aṭṭha asaṅkhyeyyāni, mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca, uparimena pana soḷasa
tika-s0104t:943_2: asaṅkhyeyyāni, mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca. Ete ca bhedā yathākkamaṃ paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena
tika-s0104t:943_3: veditabbā. Paññādhikānañhi saddhā mandā hoti, paññā tikkhā. Saddhādhikānaṃ paññā
tika-s0104t:943_4: majjhimā hoti. Vīriyādhikānaṃ paññā mandā. Paññānubhāvena ca sammāsambodhi abhigantabbāti
tika-s0104t:944_0: Apare pana “vīriyassa tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena bodhisattānaṃ ayaṃ kālavibhāgo”ti
tika-s0104t:944_1: vadanti, avisesena pana vimuttiparipācanīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena
tika-s0104t:944_2: yathāvuttakālabhedena bodhisambhārā tesaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchantīti tayopete kālabhedā
tika-s0104t:944_3: yuttātipi vadanti. Evaṃ tividhā hi bodhisattā abhinīhārakkhaṇe bhavanti eko ugghaṭitaññū,
tika-s0104t:944_4: eko vipañcitaññū, eko neyyoti. Tesu yo ugghaṭitaññū, so sammāsambuddhassa sammukhā
tika-s0104t:944_5: catuppadagāthaṃ suṇanto gāthāya tatiyapade apariyosite eva chahi abhiññāhi saha paṭisambhidāhi
tika-s0104t:944_6: arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthupanissayo hoti, sace sāvakabodhiyaṃ adhimutto siyā.
tika-s0104t:945_0: Dutiyo bhagavato sammukhā catuppadagāthaṃ suṇanto apariyosite eva gāthāya catutthapade
tika-s0104t:945_1: chahi abhiññāhi arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthupanissayo hoti, yadi sāvakabodhiyaṃ adhimutto siyā.
tika-s0104t:946: Itaro pana bhagavato sammukhā catuppadagāthaṃ sutvā pariyositāya gāthāya chahi abhiññāhi arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthupanissayo hoti.
tika-s0104t:947_0: Tayopete vinā kālabhedena katābhinīhārā, buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇā ca anukkamena
tika-s0104t:947_1: pāramiyo pūrentā yathākkamaṃ yathāvuttabhedena kālena sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇanti. Tesu
tika-s0104t:947_2: tesu pana kālabhedesu aparipuṇṇesu te te mahāsattā divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ
tika-s0104t:947_3: mahādānaṃ dentāpi tadanurūpe sīlādisabbapāramidhamme ācinantāpi pañca mahāpariccāge
tika-s0104t:947_4: pariccajantāpi ñātatthacariyaṃ lokatthacariyaṃ buddhatthacariyaṃ paramakoṭiṃ pāpentāpi
tika-s0104t:947_5: antarāva sammāsambuddhā bhavissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā? Ñāṇassa aparipaccanato,
tika-s0104t:947_6: buddhakārakadhammānañca apariniṭṭhānato. Paricchinnakālanipphāditaṃ viya hi sassaṃ
tika-s0104t:947_7: yathāvuttakālaparicchedena parinipphāditā sammāsambodhi tadantarā pana sabbussāhena
tika-s0104t:947_8: vāyamantenāpi na sakkā adhigantunti pāramipāripūri yathāvuttakālavisesena sampajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:953: Nijjhāmataṇhā khuppipāsā, na honti kālakañcikā. (kālakañcikā cariyā. aṭṭha. pakiṇṇakakathā);
tika-s0104t:954: Na honti khuddakā pāṇā, upapajjantāpi duggatiṃ;
tika-s0104t:955: Jāyamānā manussesu, jaccandhā na bhavanti te.
tika-s0104t:958: Na bhavanti pariyāpannā, bodhiyā niyatā narā;
tika-s0104t:962: Suddhāvāsesu devesu, hetu nāma na vijjati;
tika-s0104t:965_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇitā ānisaṃsā, ye ca “sato sampajāno ānanda bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā
tika-s0104t:965_1: mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”tiādinā soḷasa acchariyabbhutadhammappakārā, ye ca “sītaṃ byapagataṃ
tika-s0104t:965_2: hoti, uṇhañca vūpasamatī”tiādinā, “jāyamāne kho sāriputta, bodhisatte ayaṃ dasasahassilokadhātu
tika-s0104t:965_3: saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhatī”tiādinā ca dvattiṃsa pubbanimittappakārā, ye
tika-s0104t:965_4: vā panaññepi bodhisattānaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanaṃ, kammādīsu ca vasibhāvoti evamādayo
tika-s0104t:965_5: tattha tattha jātakabuddhavaṃsādīsu dassitappakārā ānisaṃsā, te sabbepi etāsaṃ ānisaṃsā,
tika-s0104t:966_0: Apica yasmā bodhisatto abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya sabbasattānaṃ pitusamo hoti hitesitāya,
tika-s0104t:966_1: dakkhiṇeyyako garu bhāvanīyo paramañca puññakkhettaṃ hoti guṇavisesayogena, yebhuyyena
tika-s0104t:966_2: ca manussānaṃ piyo hoti, amanussānaṃ piyo hoti, devatāhi anupālīyati, mettākaruṇāparibhāvitasantānatāya
tika-s0104t:966_3: vāḷamigādīhi ca anabhibhavanīyo hoti, yasmiṃ yasmiñca sattanikāye paccājāyati, tasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:966_4: tasmiṃ uḷārena vaṇṇena uḷārena yasena uḷārena sukhena uḷārena balena uḷārena ādhipateyyena
tika-s0104t:967_0: Appābādho hoti appātaṅko, suvisuddhā cassa saddhā hoti suvisadā, suvisuddhaṃ vīriyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:967_1: sati samādhi paññā suvisadā, mandakileso hoti mandadaratho mandapariḷāho, kilesānaṃ
tika-s0104t:967_2: mandabhāveneva subbaco hoti padakkhiṇaggāhī, khamo hoti sorato, sakhilo hoti paṭisandhārakusalo,
tika-s0104t:967_3: akodhano hoti anupanāhī, amakkhī hoti apaḷāsī, anissukī hoti amaccharī, asaṭho hoti
tika-s0104t:967_4: amāyāvī, athaddho hoti anatimānī, asāraddho hoti appamatto, parato upatāpasaho hoti
tika-s0104t:967_5: paresaṃ anupatāpī, yasmiñca gāmakhette paṭivasati, tattha sattānaṃ bhayādayo upaddavā
tika-s0104t:967_6: yebhuyyena anuppannā nuppajjanti, uppannā ca vūpasamanti, yesu ca apāyesu uppajjati,
tika-s0104t:967_7: na tattha pacurajano viya dukkhena adhimattaṃ pīḷīyati, bhiyyoso mattāya saṃvegabhayamāpajjati.
tika-s0104t:967_8: Tasmā mahāpurisassa yathārahaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave labbhamānā ete sattānaṃ pitusamatādakkhiṇeyyatādayo
tika-s0104t:968_0: Tathā āyusampadā rūpasampadā kulasampadā issariyasampadā ādeyyavacanatā mahānubhāvatāti
tika-s0104t:968_1: etepi mahāpurisassa pāramīnaṃ ānisaṃsāti veditabbā. Tattha āyusampadā nāma tassaṃ
tika-s0104t:968_2: tassaṃ upapattiyaṃ dīghāyukatā ciraṭṭhitikatā, tāya yathāraddhāni kusalasamādānāni
tika-s0104t:968_3: pariyosāpeti, bahuñca kusalaṃ upacinoti. Rūpasampadā nāma abhirūpatā dassanīyatā
tika-s0104t:968_4: pāsādikatā, tāya rūpappamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ pasādāvaho hoti sambhāvanīyo. Kulasampadā
tika-s0104t:968_6: cariyā. aṭṭha. pakiṇṇakakathā)] upasaṅkamanīyo hoti payirupāsanīyo, tena te nibbisevane
tika-s0104t:968_7: karonti. Issariyasampadā nāma mahāvibhavatā, mahesakkhatā, mahāparivāratā ca, tāhi
tika-s0104t:968_8: saṅgahitabbe catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahituṃ, niggahetabbe dhammena niggahetuñca
tika-s0104t:968_9: samattho hoti. Ādeyyavacanatā nāma saddheyyatā paccayikatā, tāya sattānaṃ pamāṇabhūto
tika-s0104t:968_10: hoti, alaṅghanīyā cassa āṇā hoti. Mahānubhāvatā nāma pabhāvamahantatā, tāya parehi
tika-s0104t:968_11: na abhibhuyyati, sayameva pana pare aññadatthu abhibhavati dhammena, samena, yathābhūtaguṇehi
tika-s0104t:968_12: ca, evametesaṃ āyusampadādayo mahāpurisassa pāramīnaṃ ānisaṃsā, sayañca aparimāṇassa
tika-s0104t:968_13: puññasambhārassa parivuddhihetubhūtā yānattaye sattānaṃ avatāraṇassa paripācanassa
tika-s0104t:972_0: Samāsato hi tāva sammāsambuddhabhāvo etāsaṃ phalaṃ. Vitthārato pana bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇa
tika-s0104t:972_3: dhammakāyasirī, yāvatā pana buddhaguṇā ye anekehipi kappehi sammāsambuddhenāpi vācāya
tika-s0104t:972_4: pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkā, idameva tāsaṃ phalaṃ. Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-s0104t:978_0: Evaṃ yathāvuttāya paṭipadāya yathāvuttavibhāgānaṃ pāramīnaṃ pūritabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-s0104t:978_1: “samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā”ti. Satipi mahāpariccāgānaṃ dānapāramibhāve pariccāgavisesabhāvadassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:978_2: visesasambhāratādassanatthaṃ, sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca tesaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ, tatoyeva
tika-s0104t:978_4: puttadārapariccāgassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, tathāyeva ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:978_5: Ācariyasāriputtattherenapi aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ, katthaci pana puttadārapariccāge visuṃ
tika-s0104t:978_6: katvā nayanapariccāgamaññatra jīvitapariccāgaṃ vā pakkhipitvā rajjapariccāgamaññatra
tika-s0104t:979_1: pubbayogo. Dānādīsuyeva sātisayapaṭipattinipphādanaṃ pubbacariyā. Yā vā cariyāpiṭakasaṅgahitā,
tika-s0104t:979_2: sā pubbacariyā. Keci pana “abhinīhāro pubbayogo. Dānādipaṭipatti vā kāyavivekavasena
tika-s0104t:979_3: ekacariyā vā pubbacariyā”ti vadanti. Dānādīnañceva appicchatādīnañca saṃsāranibbānesu
tika-s0104t:979_5: ca pavattā kathā dhammakkhānaṃ. Ñātīnamatthassa cariyā ñātatthacariyā, sāpi karuṇāyanavaseneva.
tika-s0104t:979_8: sā panatthato paññāpāramīyeva, ñāṇasambhāradassanatthaṃ pana visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Koṭinti
tika-s0104t:979_9: pariyantaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ. Tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgatoti etthāpi “dānapāramiṃ pūretvā”tiādinā sambandho.
tika-s0104t:980_0: Evaṃ pāramipūraṇavasena “tathā āgato”ti padassatthaṃ dassetvā idāni bodhipakkhiyadhammavasenapi
tika-s0104t:980_2: matthakaṃ pāpetvā dasseti maggaphalapakkhikānaññeva gahetabbattā, vipassanāsaṅgahitā
tika-s0104t:980_3: eva vā satipaṭṭhānādayo daṭṭhabbā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya gahaṇato. Bhāvetvāti uppādetvā.
tika-s0104t:980_4: Brūhetvāti vaḍḍhetvā. Ettha ca “yena abhinīhārenā”tiādinā āgamanapaṭipadāyaādiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0104t:980_7: visesoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idāni yathāvuttena atthayojanattayena siddhaṃ paṭhamakāraṇameva
tika-s0104t:980_8: gāthābandhavasena dassetuṃ “yathevā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha idhalokamhi vipassiādayo
tika-s0104t:980_9: munayo sabbaññubhāvaṃ yathāvuttena kāraṇattayena āgatā yatheva, tathā pañcahi cakkhūhi
tika-s0104t:980_10: cakkhumā ayaṃ sakyamunipi yena kāraṇena āgato, tenesa tathāgato nāma vuccatīti yojanā.
tika-s0104t:981_0: Sampatijātoti manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā muhuttajāto, na pana mātukucchito nikkhantamatto
tika-s0104t:981_1: mātukucchito nikkhantamattañhi mahāsattaṃ paṭhamaṃ brahmāno suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
tika-s0104t:981_2: tesaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno ajinappaveṇiyā, tesaṃ hatthato manussā dukūlacumbaṭakena
tika-s0104t:981_3: paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, “manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhito”ti vakkhati. “Kathañcā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:981_4: vitthāradassanaṃ. Yathāha bhagavā mahāpadānadesanāyaṃ. Setamhi chatteti dibbasetacchatte.
tika-s0104t:981_5: Anuhīramāneti dhāriyamāne. “Anudhāriyamāne”tipi idāni pāṭho. “Ettha ca chattaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0104t:981_7: hi chattena saha tadā upaṭṭhitā ahesuṃ. Chattādīniyeva ca tadā paññāyiṃsu, na chattādigāhakā”ti
tika-s0104t:981_9: sati tālavaṇṭādīnampi kakudhabhaṇḍasamaññā. Apica khaggādīni kakudhabhaṇḍāni, tadaññānipi
tika-s0104t:981_10: tālavaṇṭādīni tadā upaṭṭhitānīti adhippāyena tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:982_0: Sabbā ca disāti dasa disā. Anuviloketīti puññānubhāvena lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte
tika-s0104t:982_1: paññāyamānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ maṃsacakkhunāva oloketīti attho. Nayidaṃ sabbadisānuvilokanaṃ
tika-s0104t:982_2: sattapadavītihāruttarakālaṃ paṭhamamevānuvilokanato. Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato
tika-s0104t:982_3: muccitvā puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi. Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā
tika-s0104t:982_4: “mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto tayā uttaritaro”ti āhaṃsu. Evaṃ catasso
tika-s0104t:982_5: disā catasso anudisā heṭṭhā uparīti sabbā disāanuviloketvā sabbattha attanā sadisamadisvā
tika-s0104t:982_6: “ayaṃ uttarā disā”ti sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti ācariyadhammapālattherena ācariyasāriputtattherena
tika-s0104t:982_7: ca vuttaṃ. Mahāpadānasuttaṭṭhakathāyampi evameva vaṇṇitaṃ. Tasmā sattapadavītihārato
tika-s0104t:982_8: paṭhamaṃ sabbadisānuvilokanaṃ katvā sattapadavītihārena gantvā tadupari āsabhiṃ vācaṃ
tika-s0104t:982_9: bhāsatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idha, pana aññāsu ca aṭṭhakathāsu samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahanato
tika-s0104t:982_10: paṭṭhāya yāva āsabhīvācābhāsanaṃ tāva yathākkamaṃ eva pubbanimittabhāvaṃ vibhāvento
tika-s0104t:982_12: vadati, evampi yathā na virujjhati, tathā eva attho gahetabbo. “Sattamapadūpari ṭhatvā”ti
tika-s0104t:982_13: ca pāṭho pacchā pamādalekhavasena edisena vacanakkamena mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyamadissamānattāti.
tika-s0104t:982_14: Āsabhinti uttamaṃ, akampanikaṃ vā, nibbhayanti attho. Usabhassa idanti hi āsabhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:982_15: sūrabhāvo, tena yuttattā panāyaṃ vācā “āsabhī”ti vuccati. Aggoti sabbapaṭhamo. Jeṭṭho,
tika-s0104t:982_16: seṭṭhoti ca tasseva vevacanaṃ. Saddatthamattato pana aggoti guṇehi sabbapadhāno.
tika-s0104t:982_17: Jeṭṭhoti guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ vuddhatamo, guṇehi mahallakatamoti vuttaṃ hoti. Seṭṭhoti
tika-s0104t:982_18: guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ pasaṭṭhatamo. Lokassāti vibhattāvadhibhūte nissakkatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:982_19: Ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavoti imasmiṃ attabhāve pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ byākāsi
tika-s0104t:983_0: Idāni tathāgamanaṃ sambhāvento “tañcassā”tiādimāha. Pubbanimittabhāvena tathaṃ avitathanti
tika-s0104t:983_1: sambandho. Visesādhigamānanti guṇavisesādhigamānaṃ. Tadevatthaṃ vitthārato dasseti
tika-s0104t:983_2: “yañhī”tiādinā. Tattha yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, tena “patiṭṭhahī”ti ettha pakatiyatthaṃpatiṭṭhānakiriyaṃ
tika-s0104t:983_3: parāmasati. Idamassāti idaṃ patiṭṭhahanaṃ assa bhagavato. Paṭilābhasadde sāminiddeso
tika-s0104t:983_4: cesa, kattuniddeso vā. Pubbanimittanti tappaṭilābhasaṅkhātassa āyatiṃ uppajjamānakassa
tika-s0104t:983_5: hitassa paṭhamaṃ pavattaṃ sañjānanakāraṇaṃ. Bhagavato hi acchariyabbhutaguṇavisesādhigamane
tika-s0104t:983_6: pañca mahāsupinādayo viya etāni sañjānananimittāni pātubhavanti, yathā taṃ loke puññavantānaṃ
tika-s0104t:984_1: Satta padāni sattapadaṃ, tassa vītihāro visesena atiharaṇaṃ sattapadavītihāro, sattapadanikkhepoti
tika-s0104t:984_2: attho. So pana samagamane dvinnaṃ padānamantare muṭṭhiratanamattanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:989_0: Suttanipāte nāḷakasutte āyasmatā ānandattherena vuttaṃ nidānagāthāpadaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:989_1: “suvaṇṇadaṇḍā vītipatanti cāmarāti etthā”ti vuttaṃ. Etthāti hi etasmiṃ gāthāpadeti
tika-s0104t:989_2: attho. Mahāpadānasutte anāgatattā pana cāmarukkhepassa tathā vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:989_3: Tattha āgatānusārena hi idha pubbanimittabhāvaṃ vadati, camaro nāma migaviseso. Yassa
tika-s0104t:989_4: vālena rājakakudhabhūtaṃ vālabījaniṃ karonti, tassa ayanti cāmarī. Tassā ukkhepo
tika-s0104t:989_7: ettha pada-saddo padavaḷañjanavācako, tasmā sattamassa padavaḷañjanassa uparīti attho.
tika-s0104t:989_9: Tathā ayaṃ bhagavā…pe… pubbanimittabhāvanāti ettha “yañhī”tiādi adhikārattā, gamyamānattā
tika-s0104t:989_10: ca na vuttaṃ, etena ca abhijātiyaṃ dhammatāvasena uppajjanakavisesā sabbabodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:990_0: Porāṇāti aṭṭhakathācariyā. Gavampati usabho samehi pādehi vasūnaṃ ratanānaṃ dhāraṇato
tika-s0104t:990_1: vasundarasaṅkhātaṃ bhūmiṃ phusī yathā, tathā manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā muhuttajāto
tika-s0104t:990_2: so gotamo samehi pādehi vasundharaṃ phusīti attho. Vikkamīti agamāsi. Satta padānīti
tika-s0104t:990_4: vā karaṇattho uttarapadalopavasena daṭṭhabbo. Marūti devā yathāmariyādaṃ maraṇasabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:990_5: Samāti vilokanasamatāya samā sadisiyo. Mahāpuriso hi yathā ekaṃ disaṃ vilokesi, evaṃ
tika-s0104t:990_6: sesadisāpi, na katthaci vilokane vinibandho tassa ahosi, samāti vā viloketuṃ yuttāti
tika-s0104t:990_7: attho. Na hi tadā bodhisattassa virūpabībhacchavisamarūpāni viloketumayuttāni disāsu
tika-s0104t:990_8: upaṭṭhahanti, vissaṭṭhamañjūviññeyyādivasena aṭṭhaṅgupetaṃ giraṃ abbhudīrayi pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito
tika-s0104t:991_0: Evaṃ kāyagamanatthena gatasaddena tathāgatasaddaṃ niddisitvā idāni ñāṇagamanatthena
tika-s0104t:991_2: kāmacchandaṃ pahāyā”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Nekkhammenāti alobhapadhānena kusalacittuppādena.
tika-s0104t:991_3: Kusalā hi dhammā idha nekkhammaṃ tesaṃ sabbesampi kāmacchandapaṭipakkhattā, na pabbajjādayo
tika-s0104t:991_4: eva. “Paṭhamajjhānenā”tipi vadanti keci, tadayuttameva paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya
tika-s0104t:991_5: eva idha icchitattā. Pahāyāti pajahitvā. Gatoti uttarivisesaṃ ñāṇagamanena paṭipanno.
tika-s0104t:991_6: Pahāyāti vā pahānahetu, pahāne vā sati. Hetulakkhaṇatthesu hi ayaṃ tvā-saddo “sakko
tika-s0104t:991_7: hutvā nibbattī”tiādīsu viya. Kāmacchandādippahānahetukañca “gato”ti ettha vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:991_8: avabodhasaṅkhātaṃ, paṭipattisaṅkhātaṃ vā gamanaṃ kāmacchandādippahānena ca taṃ lakkhīyati,
tika-s0104t:991_9: esa nayo “padāletvā”tiādīsupi. Abyāpādenāti mettāya. Ālokasaññāyāti vibhūtaṃ katvā
tika-s0104t:992_0: Evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttāya paṭhamajjhānassa
tika-s0104t:992_1: pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya bhagavato ñāṇagamanavisiṭṭhaṃ tathāgatabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-s0104t:992_2: saha upāyena aṭṭhahi samāpattīhi, aṭṭhārasahi ca mahāvipassanāhi taṃ dassetuṃ “ñāṇenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:992_4: ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti, tasmā avijjāpadālanaṃ vipassanāya upāyo. Tathā
tika-s0104t:992_5: jhānasamāpattīsu abhiratinimittena pāmojjena, tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya jhānādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:992_6: samadhigamoti samāpattiyā arativinodanaṃ upāyo. Samāpattivipassanānukkamena pana
tika-s0104t:992_7: upari vakkhamānanayena niddisitabbepi nīvaraṇasabhāvāya avijjāya heṭṭhā kāmacchandādivasena
tika-s0104t:993_1: ugghāṭetvā”ti. “Rattiṃ anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojetī”ti majjhimāgamavare
tika-s0104t:993_2: mūlapaṇṇāsake vammikasutte vuttaṭṭhāne viya vitakkavicārā vūpasamā [dhūmāyanā ] adhippetāti
tika-s0104t:993_4: vūpasametvāti attho. “Vitakkavicāra”micceva adhunā pāṭho, so na porāṇo ācariyadhammapālattherena,
tika-s0104t:993_5: ācariyasāriputtattherena ca yathāvuttapāṭhasseva uddhatattā. Virājetvāti jigucchitvā,
tika-s0104t:993_6: samatikkamitvā vā. Tadubhayattho hesa “pītiyā ca virāgā”tiādīsu viya. Kāmaṃ paṭhamajjhānūpacāre
tika-s0104t:993_7: eva dukkhaṃ, catutthajjhānūpacāre eva ca sukhaṃ pahīyati, atisayappahānaṃ pana sandhāyāha
tika-s0104t:994_0: Rūpasaññāti saññāsīsena rūpāvacarajjhānāni ceva tadārammaṇāni ca vuttāni. Rūpāvacarajjhānampi
tika-s0104t:994_1: hi “rūpa”nti vuccati uttarapadalopena “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu tassa ārammaṇampi
tika-s0104t:994_2: kasiṇarūpaṃ purimapadalopena “bahiddhā rūpāni passati suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”tiādīsu tasmā
tika-s0104t:994_3: idha rūpe rūpajjhāne taṃsahagatā saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena rūpāvacarajjhānāni
tika-s0104t:994_4: vuttāni, rūpaṃ saññā assāti rūpasaññaṃ, rūpasaññāsamannāgatanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ
tika-s0104t:994_5: pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ. Paṭighasaññāti
tika-s0104t:994_6: cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ, rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena paṭihananena visayivisayasamodhānena
tika-s0104t:994_7: samuppannā dvipañcaviññāṇasahagatā saññā. Nānattasaññāti aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalasaññā,
tika-s0104t:994_8: dvādasa akusalasaññā, ekādasa kāmāvacarakusalavipākasaññā, dve akusalavipākasaññā,
tika-s0104t:994_9: ekādasa kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti etāsaṃ catucattālīsasaññānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Etā
tika-s0104t:994_10: hi yasmā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti, yasmā ca nānattā
tika-s0104t:995_0: Aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā aniccānupassanā, tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
tika-s0104t:995_1: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Niccasaññanti saṅkhatadhamme “niccā sassatā”ti
tika-s0104t:995_2: pavattamicchāsaññaṃ, saññāsīsena cettha diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa
tika-s0104t:995_3: nayo ito paresupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
tika-s0104t:995_4: Nandinti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Virāgānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu virajjanākārena pavattāya
tika-s0104t:995_5: anupassanāya. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya, “te saṅkhārā
tika-s0104t:995_6: nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ samudayavasena na uppajjantī”ti evaṃ vā anupassanā nirodhānupassanā.
tika-s0104t:995_7: Tenevāha “nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti, no samudetī”ti. Muñcitukamyatā hi ayaṃ balappattāti.
tika-s0104t:995_9: hi ayaṃ. Ādānanti niccādivasena gahaṇaṃ. Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ekattaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:995_10: ghanasaññā. Āyūhanaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Avatthāvisesāpatti vipariṇāmo. Dhuvasaññanti
tika-s0104t:995_12: saviggahataṃ. Paṇidhinti rāgādipaṇidhiṃ. Sā panatthato taṇhāvasena saṅkhāresu ninnatā.
tika-s0104t:996_1: Sārādānābhinivisenti asāre sāraggahaṇavipallāsaṃ. Issarakuttādivasena loko samuppannoti
tika-s0104t:996_2: abhiniveso sammohābhiniveso nāma. Keci pana “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna’ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:996_4: ālayābhiniveso. “Ālayaratā ālayasamuditā”ti vacanato ālayo vuccati taṇhā, sāyeva
tika-s0104t:996_5: cakkhādīsu, rūpādīsu ca abhinivesavasena pavattiyā ālayābhinivesoti keci. “Evaṃvidhā
tika-s0104t:996_6: saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantī’ti pavattañāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanā. Vaṭṭato vigatattā
tika-s0104t:996_7: vivaṭṭaṃ, nibbānaṃ, tattha ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena anupassanena pavattiyā vivaṭṭānupassanā,
tika-s0104t:996_8: gotrabhu. Saṃyogābhinivesanti saṃyujjanavasena saṅkhāresu abhinivisanaṃ. Diṭṭhekaṭṭheti
tika-s0104t:996_9: diṭṭhiyā sahajātekaṭṭhe, pahānekaṭṭhe ca. Oḷāriketi uparimaggavajjhe kilese apekkhitvā
tika-s0104t:996_10: vuttaṃ, aññathā dassanapahātabbā ca dutiyamaggavajjhehipi oḷārikāti tesampi tabbacanīyatā
tika-s0104t:996_11: siyā. Aṇusahagateti aṇubhūte. Tabbhāvavuttiko hi ettha sahagatasaddo. Idaṃ pana heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe
tika-s0104t:996_12: apekkhitvā vuttaṃ. Sabbakileseti avasiṭṭhasabbakilese. Na hi paṭhamādimaggehi pahīnā
tika-s0104t:996_13: kilesā puna pahīyanti. Sabbasaddo cettha sappadesavisayo “sabbe tasanti daṇḍassā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t:997_0: Kakkhaḷattaṃ kaṭhinabhāvo. Paggharaṇaṃ dravabhāvo. Lokiyavāyunā bhastassa viya yena
tika-s0104t:997_1: taṃtaṃkalāpassa uddhumāyanaṃ, thambhabhāvo vā, taṃ vitthambhanaṃ. Vijjamānepi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0104t:997_2: kalāpantarabhūtehi phuṭṭhabhāve taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyanto ākāsoti yesaṃ
tika-s0104t:997_3: yo paricchedo, tehi so asamphuṭṭhova, aññathā bhūtānaṃ paricchedabhāvo na siyā byāpitabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0104t:997_4: Yasmiṃ kalāpe bhūtānaṃ paricchedo, tehi tattha asamphuṭṭhabhāvo asamphuṭṭhalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:998_1: cetanāvasenetaṃ vuttaṃ “saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇa”nti. Tathā hi suttantabhājaniye
tika-s0104t:998_3: ca cetanā. Yathāha “tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhāro, kusalā cetanā”tiādi sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:998_4: ārammaṇe ṭhapanaṃ abhiniropanaṃ. Ārammaṇānamanubandhanaṃ anumajjanaṃ. Savipphārikatā
tika-s0104t:998_5: pharaṇaṃ. Adhimuccanaṃ saddahanaṃ adhimokkho. Assaddhiyeti assaddhiyahetu. Nimittatthe
tika-s0104t:998_6: cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Esa nayo kosajjādīsupi. Kāyacittapariḷāhūpasamo vūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:998_7: Līnuddhaccarahite adhicitte vattamāne paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāvaṭatāya ajjhupekkhanaṃ
tika-s0104t:999_0: Musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato pariggāhakasabhāvā
tika-s0104t:999_2: puggalaṃ pariggaṇhātīti sā pariggahalakkhaṇā. Kāyikakiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0104t:999_3: sayañca samuṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hotīti sammākammantasaṅkhātā virati samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇāti
tika-s0104t:999_4: daṭṭhabbā, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ
tika-s0104t:999_5: viya. Jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā jīvitindriyavuttiyā, ājīvasseva vā suddhi vodānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1000_0: “Saṅkhārā”ti idha cetanā adhippetā, na pana “saṅkhārā saṅkhārakkhandho”tiādīsu viya
tika-s0104t:1000_1: samapaññāsacetasikāti vuttaṃ “saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇa”nti. Avijjāpaccayā hi puññābhisaṅkhārādikāva
tika-s0104t:1000_2: cetanā. Ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvo namanaṃ. Āyatanaṃ pavattanaṃ. Saḷāyatanavasena hi cittacetasikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1000_3: pavatti. Taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇati ettha vaṭṭassa janakahetubhāvo taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1000_4: maggassa pana vakkhamānassa nibbānasampāpakattanti ayametesaṃ viseso. Ārammaṇassa
tika-s0104t:1000_5: gahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Puna uppattiyā āyūhanalakkhaṇaṃ. Sattajīvato suññatālakkhaṇaṃ. Padahanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1000_6: ussāhanaṃ. Ijjhanaṃ sampatti. Vaṭṭato nissaraṇaṃ niyyānaṃ. Aviparītabhāvo tathalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1000_7: Aññamaññānativattanaṃ ekaraso, anūnādhikabhāvova. Yuganaddhā nāma samathavipassanā
tika-s0104t:1000_9: vadanti. Cittavisuddhi nāma samādhi. Diṭṭhivisuddhi nāma paññā. Khayoti kilesakkhayo
tika-s0104t:1000_10: maggo, tasmiṃ pavattassa sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa samucchedanalakkhaṇaṃ. Kilesānamanuppādapariyosānatāya
tika-s0104t:1000_11: anuppādo, phalaṃ. Kilesavūpasamo passaddhi. Chandassāti kattukāmatāchandassa. Patiṭṭhābhāvo
tika-s0104t:1000_13: Visayādisannipātena gahetabbākāro samodhānaṃ. Yā “saṅgatī”ti vuccati “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati
tika-s0104t:1000_14: phasso”tiādīsu. Samaṃ, sammā vā odahanti sampiṇḍitā bhavanti sampayuttadhammā anenātipi
tika-s0104t:1000_15: samodhānaṃ, phasso, tabbhāvo samodhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Samosaranti sannipatanti etthāti
tika-s0104t:1000_16: samosaraṇaṃ, vedanā. Tāya hi vinā appavattamānā sampayuttadhammā vedanānubhavananimittaṃ
tika-s0104t:1000_17: samosaṭā viya hontīti evaṃ vuttaṃ, tabbhāvo samosaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Pāsādādīsu gopānasīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1000_18: kūṭaṃ viya sampayuttadhammānaṃ pāmokkhabhāvo pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ. Satiyā sabbatthakattā
tika-s0104t:1000_19: sampayuttānaṃ adhipatibhāvo ādhipateyyalakkhaṇaṃ. Tato sampayuttadhammato, tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1000_20: vā sampayuttadhammānaṃ uttari padhānaṃ tatuttari, tabbhāvo tatuttariyalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1000_21: Paññuttarā hi kusalā dhammā. Vimuttīti phalaṃ kilesehi vimuccitthāti katvā. Taṃ pana
tika-s0104t:1000_22: sīlādiguṇasārassa paramukkaṃsabhāvena sāraṃ. Tato uttari dhammassābhāvato pariyosānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1000_24: vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi pubbe vuttopi koci dhammo pariyāyantarappakāsanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1000_25: puna dassito. Tato eva ca “chandamūlakā dhammā manasikārasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā
tika-s0104t:1000_28: samānaṃ)] ca suttapadānaṃ vasena chandassa mūlalakkhaṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1000_29: dhammānaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti atthaṃ dasseti “eva”ntiādinā. Taṃ pana
tika-s0104t:1000_30: gamanaṃ idha ñāṇagamanamevāti vuttaṃ “ñāṇagatiyā”ti. Satipi gatasaddassa avabodhanatthabhāve
tika-s0104t:1000_31: ñāṇagamanattheneveso siddhoti na vutto. Ā-saddassa cettha gatasaddānuvattimattameva.
tika-s0104t:1001_0: Aviparītasabhāvattā “tathadhammā nāma cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti vuttaṃ. Aviparītasabhāvato
tika-s0104t:1001_1: tathāni. Amusāsabhāvato avitathāni. Aññākārarahitato anaññathāni. Saccasaṃyuttādīsu
tika-s0104t:1001_2: āgataṃ paripuṇṇasaccacatukkakathaṃ sandhāya “iti vitthāro”ti āha. “Tasmā”ti vatvā
tika-s0104t:1001_3: tadaparāmasitabbameva dasseti “tathānaṃ abhisambuddhattā”ti iminā. Esa nayo īdisesu.
tika-s0104t:1002_0: Evaṃ saccavasena catutthakāraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena aviparītasabhāvattā
tika-s0104t:1002_1: tathabhūtānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānaṃ vasenāpi dassento “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭhoti
tika-s0104t:1002_2: jātipaccayā sambhūtaṃ hutvā sahitassa attano paccayānurūpassa uddhaṃ uddhaṃ āgatasabhāvo,
tika-s0104t:1002_3: anupavattaṭṭhoti attho. Atha vā sambhūtaṭṭho ca samudāgataṭṭho ca sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho
tika-s0104t:1002_4: pubbapade uttarapadalopavasena. Samāhāradvandepi hi pulliṅgamicchanti neruttikā.
tika-s0104t:1002_5: Na cettha jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotīti jātipaccayasambhūtaṭṭho.
tika-s0104t:1002_6: Itthameva jātito samudāgacchatīti jāti paccayasamudāgataṭṭho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
tika-s0104t:1002_7: yā yā jāti yathā yathā paccayo hoti, tadanurūpaṃ pātubhūtasabhāvoti. Paccayapakkhe
tika-s0104t:1002_8: pana avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭhoti ettha na avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo na hoti,
tika-s0104t:1002_9: na ca avijjaṃ vinā saṅkhārā uppajjanti. Yā yā avijjā yesaṃ yesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ yathā
tika-s0104t:1002_10: yathā paccayo hoti, ayaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho paccayasabhāvoti attho. Tathānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1002_12: sandhāya “abhisambuddhattā”ti vuttaṃ, na ñāṇagamanatthaṃ. Gatibuddhiyatthā hi saddā
tika-s0104t:1002_13: aññamaññapariyāyā. Tasmā “abhisambuddhattho hettha gatasaddo”ti adhikāro, gamyamānattā vā na payutto.
tika-s0104t:1003_0: Yaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ bhagavā jānāti passatīti sambandho. Sadevake…pe…
tika-s0104t:1003_1: pajāyāti ādhāro “atthī”ti padeti puna aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsaūti taṃnivāsasattāpekkhāya,
tika-s0104t:1003_2: āpāthagamanāpekkhāya vā vuttaṃ. Tena bhagavatā vibhajjamānaṃ taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ tathameva
tika-s0104t:1003_3: hotīti yojetabbaṃ. Tathāvitathabhāve kāraṇamāha “evaṃ jānatā passatā”ti. Sabbākārato
tika-s0104t:1003_4: ñātattā passitattāti hi hetvantogadhametaṃ padadvayaṃ. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasenāti ettha
tika-s0104t:1003_6: Labbhamānakapadavasenāti “rūpāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sutaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1003_7: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ mutaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ manasā viññāta”nti vacanato diṭṭhapadañca viññātapadañca
tika-s0104t:1003_8: rūpārammaṇe labbhati. Rūpārammaṇaṃ iṭṭhaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ majjhattaṃ parittaṃ atītaṃ anāgataṃ
tika-s0104t:1003_9: paccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā diṭṭhaṃ viññātaṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ rūpadhātu vaṇṇanibhā
tika-s0104t:1003_10: sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītakanti evamādīhi anekehi nāmehi. “Iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasenā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1003_11: hi anekanāmabhāvaṃ sarūpato nidasseti. Terasahi vārehīti dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ rūpakaṇḍe
tika-s0104t:1003_12: āgate terasa niddesavāre sandhāyāha. Ekekasmiṃ vāre cettha catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vavatthāpananayānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1003_13: vasena “dvipaññāsāya nayehī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathamevāti yathāvuttena jānanena appaṭivattiyadesanatāya,
tika-s0104t:1003_14: yathāvuttena ca passanena aviparītadassitāya saccameva. Tamatthaṃ caturaṅguttare
tika-s0104t:1003_16: tena yathāvuttassatthassa daḷhīkaraṇaṃ joteti, sampiṇḍanattho vā aṭṭhānapayutto,
tika-s0104t:1003_17: na kevalaṃ mayā eva, atha kho bhagavatāpīti. Anuvicaritanti paricaritaṃ. Jānāmi abbhaññāsinti
tika-s0104t:1003_18: paccuppannātītakālesu ñāṇappavattidassanena anāgatepi ñāṇappavatti dassitāyeva nayato
tika-s0104t:1003_20: suttaṃ muta”ntiādīsu viya, pākaṭaṃ katvā ñātanti attho, iminā cetaṃ dasseti “aññe
tika-s0104t:1003_21: jānantiyeva, mayā pana pākaṭaṃ katvā vidita”nti. Bhagavatā hi imehi padehi sabbaññubhūmi
tika-s0104t:1003_22: nāma kathitā. Na upaṭṭhāsīti taṃ chadvārikamārammaṇaṃ taṇhāya vā diṭṭhiyā vā tathāgato
tika-s0104t:1003_23: attattaniyavasena na upaṭṭhāsi na upagacchati, iminā pana padena khīṇāsavabhūmi kathitā.
tika-s0104t:1003_24: Yathā rūpārammaṇādayo dhammā yaṃsabhāvā, yaṃpakārā ca, tathā te dhamme taṃsabhāve
tika-s0104t:1003_25: taṃpakāre gamati passati jānātīti tathāgatoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “tathadassīatthe”ti
tika-s0104t:1003_26: vuttaṃ. Anekatthā hi dhātusaddā. Keci pana niruttinayena, pisodarādigaṇapakkhepena
tika-s0104t:1003_27: vā dassī-saddalopaṃ, āgata-saddassa cāgamaṃ katvā “tathāgato”ti padasiddhimettha
tika-s0104t:1003_28: vaṇṇenti, tadayuttameva vijjamānapadaṃ chaḍḍetvā avijjamānapadassa gahaṇato. Vuttañca
tika-s0104t:1006: Ettha “anupassatī”ti āgatasaddatthaṃ vatvā tadidaṃ ñāṇapassanamevāti dassetuṃ “jānātī”ti, saddādhigatamatthaṃ pana vibhāvetuṃ “tathadassī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1007_0: Yaṃ rattinti yassa rattiyaṃ, accantasaṃyoge vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ rattekadesabhūtassa
tika-s0104t:1007_1: abhisambujjhanakkhaṇassa accantasaṃyogattā, sakalāpi vā esā ratti abhisambodhāya
tika-s0104t:1007_3: na parājito aññehi etthāti aparājito, sveva pallaṅkoti aparājitapallaṅko, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0104t:1007_4: Tiṇṇaṃmārānanti kilesābhisaṅkhāradevaputtamārānaṃ, idañca nippariyāyato vuttaṃ, pariyāyato
tika-s0104t:1007_5: pana heṭṭhā vuttanayena pañcannampi mārānaṃ maddanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Matthakanti sāmatthiyasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0104t:1007_7: antogadhabhedena niyametvā viseseti. Tāsu pana vīsativassaparicchinnā paṭhamabodhīti
tika-s0104t:1007_8: vinayagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ, tañca tadaṭṭhakathāyameva “bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1007_9: vīsativassantare nibaddhupaṭṭhāko nāma natthī”ti kathitattā paṭhamabodhi nāma vīsativassānīti
tika-s0104t:1007_10: gahetvā vuttaṃ. Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “pañcacattālīsāya vassesu ādito pannarasa
tika-s0104t:1007_11: vassāni paṭhamabodhī”ti vuttaṃ, evañca sati majjhe pannarasa vassāni majjhimabodhi,
tika-s0104t:1007_12: ante pannarasa vassāni pacchimabodhīti tiṇṇaṃ bodhīnaṃ samappamāṇatā siyā, tampi
tika-s0104t:1007_13: yuttaṃ. Pannarasatikena hi pañcacattālīsavassāni paripūrenti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:1007_15: vīsativassantare”ti vuttanti evampi sakkā viññātuṃ. “Yaṃ sutta”ntiādinā sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1008_0: Niddosatāya anupavajjaṃ anupavadanīyaṃ. Pakkhipitabbābhāvena anūnaṃ. Apanetabbābhāvena
tika-s0104t:1008_2: Vālaggamattampīti vāladhilomassa koṭippamāṇampi. Avakkhalitanti virādhitaṃ musā bhaṇitaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1008_3: Ekamuddikāyāti ekarājalañchanena. Ekanāḷiyāti ekāḷhakena, ekatumbena vā. Ekatulāyāti
tika-s0104t:1008_4: ekamānena. “Tathamevā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ no aññathāti byatirekato dasseti, tena yadatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1008_5: bhāsitaṃ, ekantena tadatthanipphādanato yathā bhāsitaṃ bhagavatā, tathāyevāti aviparītadesanataṃ
tika-s0104t:1008_6: dasseti. “Gadattho”ti etena tathaṃ gadati bhāsatīti tathāgato da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ,
tika-s0104t:1008_7: niruttinayena ca ākārāgamaṃ katvā, dhātusaddānugatena vā ākārenāti nibbacanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1009_0: Evaṃ “sugato”tiādīsu viya dhātusaddanipphattiparikappena niruttiṃ dassetvā bāhiratthasamāsenapi
tika-s0104t:1009_1: dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āgadananti sabbahitanipphādanato bhusaṃ kathanaṃ vacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1010_0: Tathā gatamassāti tathāgato. Yathā vācāya gataṃ pavatti, tathā kāyassa, yathā vā
tika-s0104t:1010_1: kāyassa gataṃ pavatti, tathā vācāya assa, tasmā tathāgatoti attho. Tadeva nibbacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1010_2: dassetuṃ “bhagavato”tiādimāha. Tattha hi “gato pavatto, gatā pavattā”ti ca etena
tika-s0104t:1010_3: kāyavacīkiriyānaṃ aññamaññānulomanavacanicchāya kāyassa, vācāya ca pavatti idha gata-saddena
tika-s0104t:1010_6: hotīti tathāsaddatthaṃ, “vādī kārī”ti etena pavattisarūpaṃ, “bhagavato hī”ti etena
tika-s0104t:1010_8: pavattassa, imaṃ pakāraṃ vā pattassa. Itīti vuttappakāraṃ niddisati. Yasmā panettha
tika-s0104t:1010_9: gata-saddo vācāya pavattimpi dasseti, tasmā kāmaṃ tathāvāditāya tathāgatoti ayampi
tika-s0104t:1010_10: attho siddho hoti, so pana pubbe pakārantarena dassitoti pārisesanayena tathākāritāatthameva
tika-s0104t:1015_0: Bhavaggaṃ pariyantaṃ katvāti sambandho. Yaṃ paneke vadanti “tiriyaṃ viya upari, adho
tika-s0104t:1015_1: ca santi aparimāṇā lokadhātuyo”ti, tesaṃ taṃ paṭisedhetuṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1015_3: Tuloti sadiso. Pamāṇanti minanakāraṇaṃ. Pare abhibhavati guṇena ajjhottharati adhiko
tika-s0104t:1015_4: bhavatīti abhibhū. Parehi na abhibhūto ajjhotthaṭoti anabhibhūto. Aññadatthūti ekaṃsavacane
tika-s0104t:1015_5: nipāto. Dassanavasena daso, sabbaṃ passatīti attho. Pare attano vasaṃ vattetīti vasavattī.
tika-s0104t:1016_0: “Abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato”ti ayaṃ na saddato labbhati, saddato pana evanti dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:1016_1: “tatreva”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha agadoti dibbāgado agaṃ rogaṃ dāti avakhaṇḍati, natthi
tika-s0104t:1016_2: vā gado rogo etenāti katvā, tassadisaṭṭhena idha desanāvilāsassa, puññussayassa ca
tika-s0104t:1016_3: agadatā labbhatīti āha “agado viyā”ti. Yāya dhammadhātuyā desanāvijambhanappattā,
tika-s0104t:1016_4: sā desanāvilāso. Dhammadhātaūti ca sabbaññutaññāṇameva. Tena hi dhammānamākārabhedaṃ
tika-s0104t:1016_5: ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ desanaṃ niyāmeti. Desanāvilāsoyeva desanāvilāsamayo yathā “dānamayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1016_6: sīlamaya”nti adhunā pana potthakesu bahūsupi maya-saddo na dissati. Puññussayoti
tika-s0104t:1016_7: ussanaṃ, atirekaṃ vā ñāṇādisambhārabhūtaṃ puññaṃ. “Tenā”tiādi opammasampādanaṃ. Tenāti
tika-s0104t:1016_8: ca tadubhayena desanāvilāsena ceva puññussayena ca so bhagavā abhibhavatīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1016_9: “Itī”tiādinā bāhiratthasamāsaṃ dasseti. Sabbalokābhibhavanena tatho, na aññathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1017_0: Tathāya gatoti purimasaccattayaṃ sandhāyāha, tathaṃ gatoti pana pacchimasaccaṃ. Catusaccānukkamena
tika-s0104t:1017_1: cettha gata-saddassa atthacatukkaṃ vuttaṃ. Vācakasaddasannidhāne upasagganipātānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1017_2: tadatthajotanabhāvena pavattanato gata-saddoyeva anupasaggo avagatatthaṃ, atītatthañca
tika-s0104t:1018_0: “Tatthā”tiādi tabbivaraṇaṃ. Lokanti dukkhasaccabhūtaṃ lokaṃ. Tathāya tīraṇapariññāyāti
tika-s0104t:1018_1: yojetabbaṃ. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadanti ariyamaggaṃ, na pana abhisambujjhanamattaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1018_2: Tattha kattabbakiccampi katamevāti dassetuṃ “lokasmā tathāgato visaṃyutto”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1018_3: saccacatukkepi dutiyapakkhaṃ vuttaṃ, abhisambujjhanahetuṃ vā etehi dasseti. Tatoyeva
tika-s0104t:1018_4: hi tāni abhisambuddhoti. “Yaṃ bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa
tika-s0104t:1018_5: sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1018_6: anuvicaritaṃ manasā, sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaṃ, tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti
tika-s0104t:1018_7: aṅguttarāgame catukkanipāte āgataṃ pāḷimimaṃ peyyālamukhena dasseti, tañca atthasambandhatāya
tika-s0104t:1018_8: eva, na imassatthassa sādhakatāya. Sā hi peyyālaniddiṭṭhā pāḷi tathadassitā atthassa
tika-s0104t:1018_9: sādhikāti. “Tassapi evaṃ attho veditabbo”ti iminā sādhyasādhakasaṃsandanaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t:1018_11: nidassanamattañca dasseti. Tattha idanti atibyāsarūpena vuttaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1018_12: pi-saddo, api-saddo vā sambhāvane “itthampi mukhamattameva, pageva aññathā”ti. Tathāgatabhāvadīpaneti
tika-s0104t:1018_13: tathāgatanāmadīpane. Guṇena hi bhagavā tathāgato nāma, nāmena ca bhagavati tathāgata-saddoti.
tika-s0104t:1018_14: “Asaṅkhyeyyāni nāmāni, saguṇena mahesino”tiādi hi vuttaṃ. Appamādapadaṃ viya sakalakusaladhammapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0104t:1018_16: parikappavacanametaṃ “vaṇṇeyya vā, na vā vaṇṇeyyā”ti. Vuttañca –
tika-s0104t:1023: Samatthane vā etaṃ “so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”ntiādīsu viyātipi vadanti keci.
tika-s0104t:1024_0: Ayaṃ panettha aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo – abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva sammāsambodhi,
tika-s0104t:1024_2: tathāgato abhinīhārānurūpaṃ paṭipannoti tathāgato. Atha vā mahiddhikatāya, paṭisambhidānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1024_3: ukkaṃsādhigamena anāvaraṇañāṇatāya ca katthacipi paṭighātābhāvato yathāruci, tathā
tika-s0104t:1024_4: kāyavacīcittānaṃ gatāni gamanāni pavattiyo etassāti tathāgato. Apica yasmā loke vidhayuttagatapakārasaddā
tika-s0104t:1024_5: samānatthā dissanti, tasmā yathā vidhā vipassiādayo bhagavanto nikhilasabbaññuguṇasamaṅgitāya,
tika-s0104t:1024_6: ayampi bhagavā tathā vidhoti tathāgato, yathā yuttā ca te bhagavanto vuttanayena,
tika-s0104t:1024_7: ayampi bhagavā tathā yuttoti tathāgato. Aparo nayo-yasmā saccaṃ tacchaṃ tathanti
tika-s0104t:1024_8: ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā tathena ñāṇena āgatoti tathāgatoti.
tika-s0104t:1054_0: “Katamañca taṃ bhikkhave”ti ayaṃ kassa pucchāti āha “yenā”tiādi. Evaṃ sāmaññato yathāvuttassa
tika-s0104t:1054_1: sīlamattakassa pucchābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni pucchāvisesabhāvañāpanatthaṃ mahāniddese
tika-s0104t:1054_2: āgatā sabbāva pucchā atthuddhāravasena dasseti “tattha pucchā nāmā”tiādinā. Tattha
tika-s0104t:1054_3: tatthāti “taṃ katamanti pucchatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ sāmaññato pucchāvacanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0104t:1055_0: Pakatiyāti attano dhammatāya, sayamevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Lakkhaṇanti yo koci ñātumicchito
tika-s0104t:1055_1: sabhāvo. Aññātanti dassanādivisesayuttena, itarena vā yena kenacipi ñāṇena aññātaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1055_2: Avatthāvisesāni hi ñāṇadassanatulanatīraṇāni. Adiṭṭhanti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena paccakkhamiva
tika-s0104t:1055_4: tīraṇabhūtena akatañāṇakiriyāsamāpanaṃ. Avibhūtanti ñāṇassa apākaṭabhūtaṃ. Avibhāvitanti
tika-s0104t:1055_5: ñāṇena apākaṭakataṃ. Tassāti yathāvuttalakkhaṇassa. Adiṭṭhaṃ jotīyati pakāsīyati
tika-s0104t:1055_7: Saṃsandanañhi sākacchāvasena vinicchayakaraṇaṃ. Diṭṭhaṃ saṃsandīyati etāyāti diṭṭhasaṃsandanā.
tika-s0104t:1055_9: vimati. Tatopi appataraṃ “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho”tiādinā dvidhā viya pavattaṃ dveḷhakaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1055_10: Dvidhā elati kampati cittametenāti hi dveḷhakaṃ hapaccayaṃ, sakatthavuttikapaccayañca
tika-s0104t:1055_11: katvā, tena jāto, taṃ vā jātaṃ yassāti dveḷhakajāto. Vimati chijjati etāyāti vimaticchedanā.
tika-s0104t:1055_13: vattabba”nti. Anumatiyā pucchā anumatipucchā. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave”tiādipucchāya
tika-s0104t:1055_14: hi “kā tumhākaṃ anumatī”ti anumati pucchitā hoti. Kathetukamyatāti kathetukāmatāya.
tika-s0104t:1055_15: “Aññāṇatā āpajjatī”tiādīsu viya hi ettha ya-kāralopo, karaṇatthe vā paccattavacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1055_16: kathetukamyatāya vā pucchā kathetukamyatāpucchātipi vaṭṭati. Atthato pana sabbāpi
tika-s0104t:1055_17: tathā pavattavacanaṃ, taduppādako vā cittuppādoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1056_0: Yadatthaṃ panāyaṃ niddesanayo āharito, tassa pucchāvisesabhāvassa ñāpanatthaṃ “imāsū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1056_1: Cittābhogo samannāhāro. Bhusaṃ, samantato ca saṃsappanā kaṅkhā āsappanā, parisappanā
tika-s0104t:1056_2: ca. Sabbā kaṅkhā chinnā sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānena aggamaggena samucchindanato.
tika-s0104t:1056_3: Paresaṃ anumatiyā, kathetukamyatāya ca dhammadesanāsambhavato, tathā eva tattha tattha
tika-s0104t:1056_4: diṭṭhattā ca vuttaṃ “avasesā pana dve pucchā buddhānaṃ atthī”ti. Yā panetā “sattādhiṭṭhānā
tika-s0104t:1056_5: pucchā dhammādhiṭṭhānā pucchā ekādhiṭṭhānā pucchā anekādhiṭṭhānā pucchā”tiādinā aparāpi
tika-s0104t:1056_6: anekadhā pucchāyo niddese āgatā, tā sabbāpi niddhāretvā idha avicayanaṃ “alaṃ ettāvatāva,
tika-s0104t:1056_7: atthikehi pana iminā nayena niddhāretvā vicetabbā”ti nayadānassa sijjhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1057_0: 8. Pucchā ca nāmesā vissajjanāya satiyeva yuttarūpāti codanāya “idānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1057_1: Atipātanaṃ atipāto. Ati-saddo cettha atirekattho. Sīghabhāvo eva ca atirekatā, tasmā
tika-s0104t:1057_2: saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atirekaṃ pātanaṃ, saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ
tika-s0104t:1057_3: pātananti attho, abhibhavanattho vā, atikkamma satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātananti
tika-s0104t:1057_4: vuttaṃ hoti, vohāravacanametaṃ “atipāto”ti. Atthato pana pakaraṇādivasenādhigatattā
tika-s0104t:1057_5: pāṇavadho pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. Vohāratoti paññattito. Sattoti khandhasantāno.
tika-s0104t:1058: “Yathā hi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
tika-s0104t:1059: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammutī”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:1060_0: Jīvitindriyanti rūpārūpajīvitindriyaṃ. Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya
tika-s0104t:1060_1: vinassati. Kasmā panettha “pāṇassa atipāto”ti, “pāṇoti cettha vohārato satto”ti ca
tika-s0104t:1060_2: ekavacananiddeso kato, nanu niravasesānaṃ pāṇānaṃ atipātato virati idha adhippetā.
tika-s0104t:1060_3: Tathā hi vakkhati “sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti sabbe pāṇabhūte”tiādinā bahuvacananiddesanti?
tika-s0104t:1060_4: Saccametaṃ, pāṇabhāvasāmaññena panettha ekavacananiddeso kato, tattha pana sabbasaddasannidhānena
tika-s0104t:1060_6: kato. Kiñca bhiyyo – sāmaññato saṃvarasamādānaṃ, tabbisesato saṃvarabhedoti imassa
tika-s0104t:1060_7: visesassa ñāpanatthampi ayaṃ vacanabhedo katoti veditabbo. “Pāṇassa atipāto”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1060_8: hi saṃvarabhedadassanaṃ. “Sabbe pāṇabhūte”tiādi pana saṃvarasamādānadassananti. Saddavidū
tika-s0104t:1060_9: pana “īdisesu ṭhānesu jātidabbāpekkhavasena vacanabhedamattaṃ, atthato samāna”nti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1061_0: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇeti yathāvutte dubbidhepi pāṇe. Pāṇasaññinoti pāṇasaññāsamaṅgino puggalassa.
tika-s0104t:1061_1: Yāya pana cetanāya pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetu
tika-s0104t:1061_4: kāyavacīpayogassa tannissayesu mahābhūtesu samuṭṭhāpikāti attho. Laddhupakkamāni
tika-s0104t:1061_5: hi bhūtāni purimabhūtāni viya na visadāni, tasmā samānajātiyānaṃ bhūtānaṃ kāraṇāni
tika-s0104t:1061_6: na hontīti tesuyeva upakkame kate tato parānaṃ asati antarāye uppajjamānānaṃ bhūtānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1061_7: tannissitassa ca jīvitindriyassa upacchedo hoti. “Kāyavacīdvārāna”nti etena vitaṇḍavādimataṃ
tika-s0104t:1062_0: Payogavatthumahantatādīhi mahāsāvajjatā tehi paccayehi uppajjamānāya cetanāya balavabhāvato
tika-s0104t:1062_1: veditabbā. Ekassāpi hi payogassa sahasā nipphādanavasena, kiccasādhikāya bahukkhattuṃ
tika-s0104t:1062_2: pavattajavanehi laddhāsevanāya ca sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya vasena payogassa mahantabhāvo.
tika-s0104t:1062_3: Satipi kadāci khuddake ceva mahante ca pāṇe payogassa samabhāve mahantaṃ hanantassa
tika-s0104t:1062_4: cetanā tibbatarā uppajjatīti vatthussa mahantabhāvo. Iti ubhayampetaṃ cetanāya balavabhāveneva
tika-s0104t:1062_5: hoti. Satipi ca payogavatthūnaṃ amahantabhāve hantabbassa guṇamahattenapi tattha
tika-s0104t:1062_6: pavattaupakāracetanā viya khettavisesanipphattiyā apakāracetanāpi balavatī, tibbatarā
tika-s0104t:1062_7: ca uppajjatīti tassā mahāsāvajjatā daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha “guṇavantesū”tiādi. “Kilesāna”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:1062_8: pana satipi payogavatthuguṇānaṃ amahantabhāve kilesupakkamānaṃ mudutibbatāya cetanāya
tika-s0104t:1063_0: Sambharīyanti saharīyanti etehīti sambhārā, aṅgāni. Tesu pāṇasaññitā, vadhakacittañca
tika-s0104t:1063_1: pubbabhāgiyānipi honti. Upakkamo pana vadhakacetanāsamuṭṭhāpito sahajātova. Pañcasambhāravatī
tika-s0104t:1063_2: pana pāṇātipātacetanāti sā pañcasambhāravinimuttā daṭṭhabbā. Esa nayo adinnādānādīsupi.
tika-s0104t:1064_0: Etthāha – khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hanti, ko vā haññati, yadi
tika-s0104t:1064_1: cittacetasikasantāno, evaṃ so anupatāpanachedanabhedanādivasena na vikopanasamattho,
tika-s0104t:1064_2: nāpi vikopanīyo, atha rūpasantāno, evampi so acetanatāya kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na
tika-s0104t:1064_3: tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipāto labbhati yathā matasarīre. Payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappakārādiatītesu
tika-s0104t:1064_4: vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya, anāgatesu vā paccuppannesu vā. Tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu
tika-s0104t:1064_5: sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato. Paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya
tika-s0104t:1064_6: vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano eva payogo siyā. Vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappakārādipayogahetukaṃ
tika-s0104t:1064_7: maraṇaṃ, nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo, khaṇikattā vadhādhippāyasamakālabhijjanakassa
tika-s0104t:1065_0: Vuccate – vadhakacetanāsahito saṅkhārānaṃ puñjo sattasaṅkhāto hanti, tena pavattitavadhappayoganimittāpagatusmāviññāṇajīvitindriyo
tika-s0104t:1065_2: haññati, kevalo vā cittacetasikasantāno, vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi tassa pañcavokārabhave
tika-s0104t:1065_4: tannibbattivibandhakavisadisarūpuppattiyā vihate vicchedo hotīti na pāṇātipātassa
tika-s0104t:1065_5: asambhavo, nāpi ahetuko pāṇātipāto, na ca payogo nippayojano paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu
tika-s0104t:1065_7: khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa
tika-s0104t:1065_8: ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ, na ca katturahito pāṇātipātappayogo
tika-s0104t:1065_9: nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena upakārakesu attano attano anurūpaphaluppādananiyatesu
tika-s0104t:1065_10: kāraṇesu kattuvohārasiddhito yathā “padīpo pakāseti, nisākaro candimā”ti, na ca kevalassa
tika-s0104t:1065_11: vadhādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchito santānavasena avaṭṭhitasseva
tika-s0104t:1065_12: paṭijānanato, santānavasena pavattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ attakiriyāsiddhi dissatīti
tika-s0104t:1065_13: attheva pāṇātipātena kammabaddhoti. Ayañca vicāro adinnādānādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0104t:1066_0: Sāhatthikoti sayaṃ mārentassa kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇaṃ. Āṇattikoti
tika-s0104t:1066_1: aññaṃ āṇāpentassa “evaṃ vijjhitvā vā paharitvā vā mārehī”ti āṇāpanaṃ. Nissaggiyoti
tika-s0104t:1066_2: dūre ṭhitaṃ māretukāmassa kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā usuyantapāsāṇādīnaṃ nissajjanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1066_3: Thāvaroti asañcārimena upakaraṇena māretukāmassa opātāpassenaupanikkhipanaṃ, bhesajjasaṃvidhānañca.
tika-s0104t:1066_4: Vijjāmayoti māraṇatthaṃ mantaparijappanaṃ āthabbaṇikādīnaṃ viya. Āthabbaṇikā hi āthabbaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1066_5: payojenti nagare vā ruddhe saṅgāme vā paccupaṭṭhite paṭisenāya paccatthikesu paccāmittesu
tika-s0104t:1066_6: ītiṃ uppādenti upaddavaṃ uppādenti rogaṃ uppādenti pajjarakaṃ uppādenti sūcikaṃ uppādenti
tika-s0104t:1066_7: visūcikaṃ karonti pakkhandiyaṃ karonti. Vijjādharā ca vijjaṃ parivattetvā nagare
tika-s0104t:1066_8: vā ruddhe…pe… pakkhandiyaṃ karonti. Iddhimayoti kammavipākajiddhimayo dāṭhākoṭanādīni
tika-s0104t:1066_9: viya. Piturañño kira sīhaḷanarindassa dāṭhākoṭanena cūḷasumanakuṭumbiyassa maraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1066_10: hoti. “Imasmiṃ panatthe”tiādinā ganthagāravaṃ pariharitvā tassa anūnabhāvampi karoti
tika-s0104t:1066_11: “atthikehī”tiādinā. Idha avuttopi hi esa attho atidisanena vutto viya anūno paripuṇṇoti.
tika-s0104t:1067_0: Dussīlassa bhāvo dussīlyaṃ, yathāvuttā cetanā. “Pahāyā”ti ettha tvā-saddo pubbakāleti
tika-s0104t:1067_1: āha “pahīnakālato paṭṭhāyā”ti, hetuatthataṃ vā sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Etena hi pahānahetukā
tika-s0104t:1067_2: idhādhippetā samucchedanikā viratīti dasseti. Kammakkhayañāṇena hi pāṇātipātadussīlyassa
tika-s0104t:1067_3: pahīnattā bhagavā accantameva tato paṭiviratoti vuccati samucchedavasena pahānaviratīnamadhippetattā.
tika-s0104t:1067_4: Kiñcāpi “pahāya paṭivirato”ti padehi vuttānaṃ pahānaviramaṇānaṃ purimapacchimakālatā
tika-s0104t:1067_5: natthi, maggadhammānaṃ pana sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ, paccayabhūtānaṃ sammāvācādīnañca paccayuppannabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1067_7: purimapacchimabhāvena viya hoti. Paccayo hi purimataraṃ paccayasattiyā ṭhito, tato
tika-s0104t:1067_8: paraṃ paccayuppannaṃ paccayasattiṃ paṭicca pavattati, tasmā gahaṇappavattiākāravasena
tika-s0104t:1067_10: tappaccayuppannāsu ca viratīsu viramaṇakiriyāya aparakālavohāro sambhavati. Tasmā
tika-s0104t:1067_11: “sammādiṭṭhiādīhi pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya sammāvācādīhi pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”ti pāḷiyaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1068_0: Ayaṃ panettha aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo – pahānaṃ samucchedavasena viratipaṭippassaddhivasena
tika-s0104t:1068_1: yojetabbā, tasmā maggena pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya phalena pāṇātipātā paṭiviratoti attho.
tika-s0104t:1068_2: Apica pāṇo atipātīyati etenāti pāṇātipāto, pāṇaghātahetubhūto dhammasamūho. Ko paneso?
tika-s0104t:1068_3: Ahirikānottappadosamohavihiṃsādayo kilesā. Te hi bhagavā ariyamaggena pahāya samugghāṭetvā
tika-s0104t:1068_4: pāṇātipātadussīlyato accantameva paṭivirato kilesesu pahīnesu tannimittakammassa
tika-s0104t:1068_5: anuppajjanato, tasmā maggena pāṇātipātaṃ yathāvuttakilesaṃ pahāya teneva pāṇātipātā
tika-s0104t:1068_6: dussīlyacetanā paṭiviratoti attho. Esa nayo “adinnādānaṃ pahāyā”tiādīsupi.
tika-s0104t:1069_0: Orato viratoti pariyāyavacanametaṃ, pati-visaddānaṃ vā paccekaṃ yojetabbato tathā
tika-s0104t:1069_1: vuttaṃ. Oratoti hi avarato abhimukhaṃ rato, tena ujukaṃ viramaṇavasena sātisayataṃ
tika-s0104t:1069_2: dasseti. Paṭiratassa cetaṃ atthavacanaṃ. Viratoti visesena rato, tena saha vāsanāya
tika-s0104t:1069_3: viramaṇabhāvaṃ, ubhayena pana samucchedaviratibhāvaṃ vibhāveti. Eva-saddo pana tassā
tika-s0104t:1069_4: viratiyā kālādivasena apariyantataṃ dassetuṃ vutto. So ubhayattha yojetabbo. Yathā
tika-s0104t:1069_5: hi aññe samādinnaviratikāpi anavaṭṭhitacittatāya lābhajīvitādihetu samādānaṃ bhinnanti,
tika-s0104t:1069_6: na evaṃ bhagavā, sabbaso pahīnapāṇātipātattā panesa accantavirato evāti. “Natthi
tika-s0104t:1069_7: tassā”tiādinā eva-saddena dassitaṃ yathāvuttamatthaṃ nivattetabbatthavasena samattheti.
tika-s0104t:1069_8: Tattha vītikkamissāmīti uppajjanakā dhammāti saha pāṭhasesena sambandho. Te pana
tika-s0104t:1069_9: anavajjadhammehi vokiṇṇā antarantarā uppajjanakā dubbalā sāvajjā dhammā, yasmā ca
tika-s0104t:1069_10: “kāyavacīpayogaṃ upalabhitvā imassa kilesā uppannā”ti viññunā sakkā ñātuṃ, tasmā
tika-s0104t:1069_11: te imināva pariyāyena “cakkhusotaviññeyyā”ti vuttā, na pana cakkhusotaviññāṇārammaṇattā.
tika-s0104t:1069_12: Ato sasambhārakathāya cakkhusotehi, tannissitaviññāṇehi vā kāyikavācasikapayogamupalabhitvā
tika-s0104t:1069_13: manoviññāṇena viññeyyāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Kāyikāti kāyena katā pāṇātipātādinipphādakā
tika-s0104t:1069_14: balavanto akusalā. “Kāḷakā” tipi ṭīkāyaṃ uddhatapāṭho, kaṇhapakkhikā balavanto akusalāti
tika-s0104t:1069_15: attho. “Imināvā”tiādinā nayadānaṃ karoti, tañca kho “adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā
tika-s0104t:1070_0: Pāpe sametīti samaṇo, gotamasamaññā, tena gottenasambandho gotamoti atthaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:1070_1: “samaṇoti bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gottavasena laddhavohāroti sambandho. Brahmadattena
tika-s0104t:1070_2: bhāsitavaṇṇānusandhiyā imissā desanāya pavattanato, tena ca bhikkhusaṅghavaṇṇassāpi
tika-s0104t:1070_3: bhāsitattā bhikkhusaṅghavaṇṇopi vuttanayena desitabbo, so na desito. Kiṃ so pāṇātipātā
tika-s0104t:1070_4: paṭiviratabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghassa na vijjatīti anuyogamapanento “na kevalañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1070_5: Evaṃ sati kasmā na desitoti punānuyogaṃ pariharati “desanā panā”tiādinā. Evanti evameva.
tika-s0104t:1071_0: Etthāyamadhippāyo –“atthi bhikkhave, aññe ca dhammā”tiādinā anaññasādhāraṇe buddhaguṇe
tika-s0104t:1071_1: ārabbha upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhetukāmo bhagavā ādito paṭṭhāya “tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno
tika-s0104t:1071_2: vadeyyā”tiādinā buddhaguṇavaseneva desanaṃ ārabhi, na bhikkhusaṅghaguṇavasenāpi.
tika-s0104t:1071_3: Esā hi bhagavato desanāya pakati, yadidaṃ ekaraseneva desanaṃ dassetuṃ labbhamānassāpi
tika-s0104t:1071_4: kassaci aggahaṇaṃ. Tathā hi rūpakaṇḍe dukādīsu, tanniddesesu ca hadayavatthu na gahitaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1071_5: Itaravatthūhi asamānagatikattā desanābhedo hotīti. Yathā hi cakkhuviññāṇādīni ekantato
tika-s0104t:1071_6: cakkhādinissayāni, na evaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ ekantena hadayavatthunissayaṃ āruppe tadabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1071_7: nissayanissitavasena ca vatthudukādidesanā pavattā “atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa
tika-s0104t:1071_8: vatthu, atthi rūpaṃ na cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā. Yampi manoviññāṇaṃ ekantato
tika-s0104t:1071_9: hadayavatthunissayaṃ, tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā dukādīsu
tika-s0104t:1071_10: vuccamānesupi na tadanurūpā ārammaṇadukādayo sambhavanti. Na hi “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa
tika-s0104t:1071_11: ārammaṇaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa”nti sakkā vattuṃ tadanārammaṇarūpassābhāvatoti
tika-s0104t:1071_12: vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyuṃ, tasmā na ekarasā desanā bhaveyyāti na vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1071_13: tathā nikkhepakaṇḍe cittuppādavibhāgena visuṃ avuccamānattā avitakkaavicārapadavissajjane
tika-s0104t:1071_14: “vicāro cā”ti vattuṃ na sakkāti āvitakkavicāramattapadavissajane labbhamānopi vitakko
tika-s0104t:1071_15: na uddhato. Aññathā hi “vitakko cā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, evamevidhāpi bhikkhusaṅghaguṇo
tika-s0104t:1071_16: na desitoti. Kāmaṃ saddato evaṃ na desito, atthato pana brahmadattena bhāsitavaṇṇassa
tika-s0104t:1071_17: anusandhidassanavasena imissā desanāya āraddhattā dīpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “atthaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1072_0: Tatthāyaṃ dīpanā – “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato samaṇassa gotamassa
tika-s0104t:1072_1: sāvakasaṅgho nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho”ti vitthāretabbaṃ. Nanu dhammassāpi vaṇṇo brahmadattena
tika-s0104t:1072_2: bhāsitoti? Saccaṃ bhāsito, so pana sammāsambuddhapabhavattā, ariyasaṅghādhārattā
tika-s0104t:1072_3: ca dhammassa dhammānubhāvasiddhattā ca tesaṃ, tadubhayavaṇṇadīpaneneva dīpitoti visuṃ
tika-s0104t:1072_4: na uddhato. Saddhammānubhāveneva hi bhagavā, bhikkhusaṅgho ca pāṇātipātādippahānasamattho
tika-s0104t:1072_7: vā. Nikkhitto daṇḍo yenāti nikkhittadaṇḍo. Tathā nikkhittasattho. Majjhimassa purisassa
tika-s0104t:1072_8: catuhatthappamāṇo cettha daṇḍo. Tadavaseso muggarakhaggādayo satthaṃ, tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1072_9: “ettha cā”tiādi. Viheṭhanabhāvatoti vihiṃ sanabhāvato, etena sasati hiṃsati anenāti
tika-s0104t:1072_11: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kataro jiṇṇo, tassa, tenavā ālambito daṇḍo kattaradaṇḍo. Dantasodhanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1072_12: kātuṃ yoggaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ, na pana dantasodhanakaṭṭhaṃ. “Dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ
tika-s0104t:1072_13: vā”tipi pāṭho, dantakaṭṭhacchedanakavāsinti attho. Khuddakaṃ nakhacchedanādikiccanipphādakaṃ
tika-s0104t:1072_15: dīpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttatā tassāpi ekadesena dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1073_0: Lajjā-saddo hiriatthoti āha “pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāyā”ti. Dhammagarutāya hi buddhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1073_1: dhammassa ca attādhīnattā attādhipatibhūtā lajjāva vuttā, na lokādhipatibhūtaṃ ottappaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1073_2: Apica “lajjī”ti ettha vuttalajjāya ottappampi vuttameva, tasmā lajjāti hiriottappānamadhivacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1073_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi pāpajigucchanaṃ pāputtāsanarahitaṃ, pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ nāma
tika-s0104t:1073_4: atthīti. “Dayaṃ mettacittataṃ āpanno”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu dayā-saddo “dayāpanno”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1073_5: karuṇāyapi vattatīti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana dayāsaddo anurakkhaṇatthaṃ antonītaṃ
tika-s0104t:1073_6: katvā pavattamāno mettāya, karuṇāya ca pavattatīti idha mettāya pavattamāno vutto
tika-s0104t:1073_7: karuṇāya, vakkhamānattā. Midati sinehatīti mettā, sā etassa atthīti mettaṃ, mettaṃ
tika-s0104t:1073_8: cittaṃ etassāti mettacitto, mettāya sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ etassāti vā, tassa bhāvo mettacittatā
tika-s0104t:1073_9: mettā eva mūlabhūtena tannimittena puggalasmiṃ buddhiyā, saddassa ca pavattanato.
tika-s0104t:1074_0: “Pāṇabhūteti pāṇajāte”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sati pāṇo bhūto yesanti pāṇabhūtāti nibbacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1074_1: kattabbaṃ. Atha vā jīvitindriyasamaṅgitāya pāṇasaṅkhāte taṃtaṃkammānurūpaṃ pavattanato
tika-s0104t:1074_2: bhūtanāmake satteti attho. Anukampakoti karuṇāyanako. Yasmā pana mettā karuṇāya visesapaccayo
tika-s0104t:1074_3: hoti, tasmā purimapadatthabhūtā mettā eva paccayabhāvena “tāya eva dayāpannatāyā”ti
tika-s0104t:1074_4: vuttā. Iminā hi padena karuṇāya gahitāya yehi dhammehi pāṇātipātā paṭivirati sampajjati,
tika-s0104t:1074_5: tehi lajjāmettākaruṇāhi samaṅgibhāvo yathākkamaṃ padattayena dassito. Paradukkhāpanayanakāmatāpi
tika-s0104t:1074_6: hi hitānukampanamevāti avassaṃ ayamattho sampaṭicchitabboti. Imāya pāḷiyā, saṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0104t:1074_7: ca tassā viratiyā sattavasena apariyantataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1075_0: Viharatīti ettha vi-saddo vicchindanatthe, hara-saddo nayanatthe, nayanañca nāmetaṃ
tika-s0104t:1075_1: idha pavattanaṃ, yāpanaṃ, pālanaṃ vāti āha “iriyati yapeti yāpeti pāletī”ti. Yapeti
tika-s0104t:1075_2: yāpetīti cettha pariyāyavacanaṃ. Tasmā yathāvuttappakāro hutvā ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe
tika-s0104t:1075_3: uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā harati pavatteti, attabhāvaṃ vā
tika-s0104t:1075_4: yāpeti pāletīti attho veditabbo. Iti vā hīti ettha hi-saddo vacanasiliṭṭhatāmatte
tika-s0104t:1075_5: kassacipi tena jotitatthassa abhāvato. Tenāha “evaṃ vā bhikkhave”ti. Visuṃ kappanameva
tika-s0104t:1075_6: attho vikappatthoti so anekabhinnesuyeva atthesu labbhati, anekabhedā ca atthā uparivakkhamānā
tika-s0104t:1075_7: evāti vuttaṃ “upari adinnā…pe… apekkhitvā”ti. “Eva”ntiādi ganthagāravapariharaṇaṃ, nayadānaṃ vā.
tika-s0104t:1076_0: Idāni sampiṇḍanatthaṃ dassento “ayaṃ panetthā”tiādimāha. Tattha na hanatīti na hiṃsati.
tika-s0104t:1076_1: Na ghātetīti na vadhati. Tatthāti pāṇātipāte. Samanuññoti santuṭṭho. Aho vata reti
tika-s0104t:1076_2: bhonto ekaṃsato acchariyāti attho. Ācārasīlamattakanti sādhujanācāramattakaṃ, matta-saddo
tika-s0104t:1076_3: cettha visesanivattiattho, tena indriyasaṃvarādiguṇehipi lokiyaputhujjano tathāgatassa
tika-s0104t:1076_4: vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ na sakkotīti dasseti. Tathā hi indriyasaṃvarapaccayaparibhogasīlāni
tika-s0104t:1076_5: idha na vibhattāni. Eva-saddo padapūraṇamattaṃ, matta-saddena vā yathāvuttatthassāvadhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1076_6: karoti, eva-saddena ācārasīlameva vattuṃ sakkotīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Evamīdisesu. “Iti
tika-s0104t:1076_7: vā hi bhikkhave puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyyā”ti vacanasāmatthiyeneva
tika-s0104t:1076_8: taduttari guṇaṃ vattuṃ na sakkhissati. “Taṃ vo upari vakkhāmī”ti ca atthassāpajjanato
tika-s0104t:1076_10: puggalavivecanena pana “puthujjano”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti dassitaṃ. “Ito para”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:1076_11: ganthagāravaṃ pariharati. Pubbe vuttaṃ padaṃ pubbapadaṃ,na pubbapadaṃ tathā, na pubbaṃ
tika-s0104t:1077_0: Saddantarayogena dhātūnamatthavisesavācakattā “ādāna”nti etassa gahaṇanti attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0104t:1077_1: tenāha “haraṇa”ntiādi. Parassāti attasantakato parabhūtassa santakassa, yo vā attato
tika-s0104t:1077_2: añño, so puggalo paro nāma, tassa idaṃ parantipi yujjati, “parasaṃharaṇa”ntipi pāṭho,
tika-s0104t:1077_3: saṃ-saddo cettha dhanattho,parasantakaharaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Theno vuccati coro,
tika-s0104t:1077_4: tassa bhāvo theyyaṃ, corakammaṃ. Corikāti corassa kiriyā. Tadatthaṃ vivarati “tatthā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1077_5: Tatthāti “ādinnādāna”nti pade. Parapariggahitameva ettha adinnaṃ, na pana dantapoṇasikkhāpade
tika-s0104t:1077_6: viya appaṭiggahitakaṃ attasantakanti adhippāyo. “Yattha paro”tiādi ubhayattha sambandho
tika-s0104t:1077_7: āvuttiyādinayena. Tasmā “taṃ parapariggahitaṃ nāma, tasmiṃ parapariggahite”ti ca
tika-s0104t:1077_8: yojetabbaṃ. Yathākāmaṃ karotīti yathākāmakārī, tassa bhāvo yathākāmakaritā, taṃ.
tika-s0104t:1077_9: Tathārucikaraṇaṃ āpajjantoti attho. Sasantakattā adaṇḍāraho dhanadaṇḍarājadaṇḍavasena.
tika-s0104t:1077_10: Anupavajjo ca codanāsāraṇādivasena. Taṃ parapariggahitaṃ ādiyati etenāti tadādāyako,
tika-s0104t:1077_11: sveva upakkamo, taṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā. Theyyā eva cetanā
tika-s0104t:1077_13: Kasmā? Vatthuhīnatāyāti gamyamānattā na vuttaṃ, hīne, hīnaguṇānaṃ santake ca cetanā
tika-s0104t:1077_14: dubbalā, paṇīte, paṇītaguṇānaṃ santake ca balavatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayena tehi kāraṇehi
tika-s0104t:1077_15: appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā veditabbā. Ācariyā pana hīnapaṇītato khuddakamahante visuṃ
tika-s0104t:1077_16: gahetvā “idhāpi khuddake parasantake appasāvajjaṃ, mahante mahāsāvajjaṃ. Kasmā? Payogamahantatāya.
tika-s0104t:1077_17: Vatthuguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānamupakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjaṃ, tibbatāya
tika-s0104t:1078_0: Sāhatthikādayoti ettha parasantakassa sahatthā gahaṇaṃ sāhatthiko. Aññe āṇāpetvā
tika-s0104t:1078_1: gahaṇaṃ āṇattiko. Antosuṅkaghāte ṭhitena bahisuṅkaghātaṃ pātetvā gahaṇaṃ nissaggiyo.
tika-s0104t:1078_2: “Asukaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi, tadā avaharā”ti atthasādhakāvahāranipphādakena, āṇāpanena
tika-s0104t:1078_3: vā, yadā kadāci parasantakavināsakena sappitelakumbhiādīsu dukūlasāṭakacammakhaṇḍādipakkhipanādinā
tika-s0104t:1078_4: vā gahaṇaṃ thāvaro. Mantaparijappanena gahaṇaṃ vijjāmayo. Vinā mantena, kāyavacīpayogehi
tika-s0104t:1078_5: tādisaiddhiyogena parasantakassa ākaḍḍhanaṃ iddhimayo. Kāyavacīpayogesu hi santesuyeva
tika-s0104t:1078_6: iddhimayo avaharaṇapayogo hoti, no asantesu. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “anāpatti bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1078_7: iddhimassa iddhivisaye”ti, te ca kho payogā yathānurūpaṃ pavattāti sambandho. Tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1078_8: pana payogānaṃ sabbesaṃ sabbattha avahāresu asambhavato “yathānurūpa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1079_0: Sandhicchedādīni katvā adissamānena vā, kūṭamānakūṭakahāpaṇādīhi vañcanena vā, avaharaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1079_1: theyyāvahāro. Pasayha balasā abhibhuyya santajjetvā, bhayaṃ dassetvā vā avaharaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1079_2: pasayhāvahāro. Parabhaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādetvā avaharaṇaṃ paṭicchannāvahāro. Bhaṇḍokāsaparikappavasena
tika-s0104t:1079_3: parikappetvā avaharaṇaṃ parikappāvahāro. Kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā avaharaṇaṃ kusāvahāro.
tika-s0104t:1079_4: Iti-saddena cettha ādiatthena, nidassananayena vā avasesā cattāro pañcakāpi gahitāti
tika-s0104t:1079_5: veditabbaṃ. Pañcannañhi pañcakānaṃ samodhānabhūtā pañcavīsati avahārā sabbepi adinnādānameva,
tika-s0104t:1079_6: aviññattiyā vā ariyāya viññattiyā vā dinnamevāti attho. “Dinnādāyī”ti idaṃ payogato
tika-s0104t:1080_0: Athenenāti ettha -saddo na-saddassa kāriyo, a-saddo vā eko nipāto na-saddatthoti
tika-s0104t:1080_2: saddhiṃ samāsadassanametaṃ. Pakaraṇādhigate pana atthe viveciyamāne idha athenatoyeva
tika-s0104t:1080_4: tena hetālaṅkāravacanametanti dasseti. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvo. Bhagavato
tika-s0104t:1080_5: pana so ruḷhiyā yathā taṃ nicchandarāgesu sattavohāro. Adati vā saṃsāradukkhanti
tika-s0104t:1080_6: attā, tenāha “attabhāvenā”ti. Padattayepi itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacananti ñāpetuṃ
tika-s0104t:1080_7: “athenaṃ…pe… katvā”ti vuttaṃ. Athenena attanā athenattā hutvā sucibhūtena attanā
tika-s0104t:1081_0: Sesanti “pahāya paṭivirato”ti evamādikaṃ. Tañhi pubbe vuttanayaṃ. Kiñcāpi nayidha
tika-s0104t:1081_1: sikkhāpadavohārena virati vuttā, ito aññesu pana suttapadesesu, vinayābhidhammesu
tika-s0104t:1081_2: ca pavattavohārena viratiyo, cetanā ca adhisīlasikkhānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvato, tesamaññatarakoṭṭhāsabhāvato
tika-s0104t:1081_4: na vuttaṃ, adhikāravasena, pana atthato ca vuttamevāti veditabbaṃ. Yathā hi lajjādayo
tika-s0104t:1081_5: pāṇātipātappahānassa visesapaccayo, evaṃ adinnādānappahānassāpīti. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
