tika-s0104t:1081_6: Atha vā sucibhūtenāti hirottappādisamannāgamanaṃ, ahirikādīnañca pahānaṃ vuttamevāti
tika-s0104t:1082_0: Brahma-saddo idha seṭṭhavācako, abrahmānaṃ nihīnānaṃ, abrahmaṃ vā nihīnaṃ cariyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1082_1: vutti abrahmacariyaṃ, methunadhammo. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ācāranti methunaviratiṃ. Na
tika-s0104t:1082_2: ācaratīti anācārī, [ārācārī ] tadācāravirahitoti attho, tenāha “abrahmacariyato dūracārī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1082_3: Dūro methunasaṅkhāto ācāro, so virahena yassatthīti dūracārī, methunadhammato vā
tika-s0104t:1082_4: dūro hutvā tabbiratiṃ ācaratīti dūracārītipi vaṭṭati. Mithunānaṃ rāgapariyuṭṭhānena
tika-s0104t:1082_5: sadisānaṃ ubhinnaṃ ayaṃ methunoti atthaṃ dasseti “rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasenā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1082_6: Asataṃ dhammo ācāroti asaddhammo, tasmā. Abhedavohārena gāmasaddeneva gāmavāsino
tika-s0104t:1082_7: gahitāti vuttaṃ “gāmavāsīna”nti, gāme vasataṃ dhammotipi yujjati. “Dūracārī”ti cettha
tika-s0104t:1082_8: vacanato, pāḷiyaṃ vā “methunā” tveva avatvā “gāmadhammā”tipi vuttattā
tika-s0104t:1083_0: “Idha brāhmaṇa, ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na heva
tika-s0104t:1083_1: kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, apica kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1083_2: sādiyati, so taṃ assādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṃ āpajjati, idampi kho brāhmaṇa
tika-s0104t:1083_3: brahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampi, ayaṃ vuccati brāhmaṇa aparisuddhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1083_4: brahmacariyaṃ carati saṃyutto methunena saṃyogena, na parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena
tika-s0104t:1083_5: sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
tika-s0104t:1084_0: Puna caparaṃ…pe… napi mātugāmassa ucchādanaparimandananhāpanasambāhanaṃ sādiyati,
tika-s0104t:1084_1: apica kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati…pe… napi mātugāmena
tika-s0104t:1084_2: saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati, apica kho mātugāmassa cakkhunā cakkhuṃ
tika-s0104t:1084_3: upanijjhāyati pekkhati…pe… napi mātugāmassa cakkhunā cakkhuṃ upanijjhāyati pekkhati,
tika-s0104t:1084_4: apica kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃ vā tiropākāraṃ vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā
tika-s0104t:1084_5: vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā…pe… napi mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃ vā tiropākāraṃ
tika-s0104t:1084_6: vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā, apica kho yānissa tāni pubbe
tika-s0104t:1084_7: mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni, tāni anussarati…pe… napi yānissa tāni pubbe
tika-s0104t:1084_8: mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni, tāni anussarati, apica kho passati gahapatiṃ
tika-s0104t:1084_9: vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgibhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t:1084_10: napi passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgibhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1084_11: paricārayamānaṃ, apica kho aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati “imināhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1084_12: sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1084_13: So taṃ assādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṃ āpajjati. Idampi kho brāhmaṇa brahmacariyassa
tika-s0104t:1084_14: khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampi. Ayaṃ vuccati brāhmaṇa, aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1084_15: carati saṃyutto methunena saṃyogena, na parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi
tika-s0104t:1084_16: paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti –
tika-s0104t:1085_0: Aṅguttarāgame sattakanipāte jāṇusoṇisutte āgatā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogāpi paṭivirati
tika-s0104t:1085_1: dassitāti daṭṭhabbā. Idhāpi asaddhammasevanādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā maggenamaggapaṭipattisamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-s0104t:1085_2: cetanā abrahmacariyaṃ. Pañcasikkhāpadakkame micchācāre pana agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā
tika-s0104t:1086_0: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitādayo dasa, dhanakkītādayo
tika-s0104t:1086_1: dasāti vīsati itthiyo. Itthīsu pana dasannaṃ dhanakkītādīnaṃ, sārakkhasaparidaṇḍānañca
tika-s0104t:1086_2: vasena dvādasannaṃ aññe purisā. Ye paneke vadanti “cattāro kāmesu micchācārā akālo,
tika-s0104t:1086_3: adeso, anaṅgo, adhammo cā”ti, te vippaṭipattimattaṃ pati parikappetvā vadanti. Na
tika-s0104t:1086_4: hi sāgamanīyaṭṭhāne pavattā vippaṭipatti micchācāro nāma sambhavati. Sā panesā duvidhāpi
tika-s0104t:1086_5: vippaṭipatti guṇavirahite appasāvajjā, guṇasampanne mahāsāvajjā. Guṇarahitepi ca
tika-s0104t:1086_6: abhibhavitvā vippaṭipatti mahāsāvajjā, ubhinnaṃ samānacchandabhāve appasāvajjā, samānacchandabhāvepi
tika-s0104t:1086_7: kilesānaṃ, upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjā, tibbatāya mahāsāvajjāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1087_0: Tassa pana abrahmacariyassa dve sambhārā sevetukāmatācittaṃ, maggenamaggapaṭipattīti.
tika-s0104t:1087_1: Micchācārassa pana cattāro sambhārā agamanīyavatthu, tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ, sevanāpayogo,
tika-s0104t:1087_4: abhibhuyyamānassa micchācāro na hotīti vadanti keci. Sevanacitte sati payogābhāvo
tika-s0104t:1087_5: na pamāṇaṃ itthiyā sevanapayogassa yebhuyyena abhāvato, purisasseva yebhuyyena sevanapayogo
tika-s0104t:1087_6: hotīti itthiyā puretaraṃ sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā nisinnāya [nipannāya ] micchācāro
tika-s0104t:1087_7: na siyāti āpajjati. Tasmā purisassa vasena ukkaṃsato “cattāro sambhārā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1087_8: Aññathā hi itthiyā purisakiccakaraṇakāle purisassāpi sevanāpayogābhāvato micchācāro
tika-s0104t:1088_0: Idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ – attano ruciyā pavattitassa sevanāpayogeneva sevanacittatāsiddhito
tika-s0104t:1088_3: maggenamaggapaṭipattiadhivāsananti tayo, anavasesaggahaṇena pana vuttanayena cattāroti,
tika-s0104t:1088_4: tampi keciyeva vadanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbanti abhidhammānuṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Eko payogo sāhatthikova.
tika-s0104t:1089_0: 9. Musāti tatiyanto, dutiyanto vā nipāto micchāpariyāyo, kiriyāpadhānoti āha “visaṃvādanapurekkhārassā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1089_1: Pure karaṇaṃ purekkhāro, visaṃvādanassa purekkhāro yassāti tathā, tassa kammapathappattameva
tika-s0104t:1089_2: dassetuṃ “atthabhañjanako”ti vuttaṃ, parassa hitavināsakoti attho. Musāvādo pana
tika-s0104t:1089_3: sasantakassa adātukāmatāya, hasādhippāyena ca bhavati. Vacasā katā vāyāmappadhānā
tika-s0104t:1089_4: kiriyā vacīpayogo. Tathā kāyena katā kāyapayogo. Visaṃvādanādhippāyo pubbabhāgakkhaṇe,
tika-s0104t:1089_5: taṅkhaṇe ca. Vuttañhi “pubbevassa hoti ‘musā bhaṇissa’nti, bhaṇantassa hoti ‘musā
tika-s0104t:1089_6: bhaṇāmī’ti” etadeva hi dvayaṃ aṅgabhūtaṃ. Itaraṃ “bhaṇitassa hoti ‘musā mayā bhaṇita’nti”
tika-s0104t:1089_7: vuttaṃ pana hotu vā, mā vā, akāraṇametaṃ. Assāti visaṃvādakassa. “Cetanā”ti etena
tika-s0104t:1089_8: sambandho. Visaṃ vādeti etenāti visaṃvādanaṃ, tadeva kāyavacīpayogo, taṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti
tika-s0104t:1089_9: tathā, iminā musāsaṅkhātena kāyavacīpayogena, musāsaṅkhātaṃ vā kāyavacīpayogaṃ vadati
tika-s0104t:1089_10: viññāpeti, samuṭṭhāpeti vā etenāti musāvādoti atthamāha. “Vādo”ti vutte visaṃvādanacittaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1089_11: tajjo vāyāmo, parassa tadatthavijānananti lakkhaṇattayaṃ vibhāvitameva hoti.
tika-s0104t:1090_0: “Atathaṃ vatthu”nti lakkhaṇaṃ pana avibhāvitameva musā-saddassa payogasaṅkhātakiriyāvācakattā.
tika-s0104t:1090_1: Tasmā idha naye lakkhaṇassa abyāpitatāya, musā-saddassa ca visaṃvāditabbatthavācakatāsambhavato
tika-s0104t:1090_2: paripuṇṇaṃ katvā musāvādalakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “aparo nayo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Lakkhaṇatoti
tika-s0104t:1090_3: sabhāvato. Tathāti tena tathākārena. Kāyavacīviññattiyo samuṭṭhāpetīti viññattisamuṭṭhāpikā.
tika-s0104t:1090_4: Imasmiṃ pana naye musā vatthu vadīyati vuccati etenāti musāvādoti nibbacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1090_6: Yassa atthaṃ bhañjati, tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjo, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjoti
tika-s0104t:1090_7: adinnādāne viya guṇavasenāpi yojetabbaṃ. Kilesānaṃ mudutibbatāvasenāpi appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā labbhatiyeva.
tika-s0104t:1091_1: santakaṃ adātukāmatāyāti, hi hasādhippāyenāti ca musāvādasāmaññato vuttaṃ. Ubhayatthāpi
tika-s0104t:1091_2: ca visaṃvādanapurekkhāreneva musāvādo, na pana vacanamattena. Tattha pana cetanā
tika-s0104t:1091_3: balavatī na hotīti appasāvajjatā vuttā. Nadī maññeti nadī viya. Appatāya ūnassa atthassa
tika-s0104t:1091_4: pūraṇavasena pavattā kathā pūraṇakathā, bahutarabhāvena vuttakathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1092_0: Tenākārena jāto tajjo, tassa visaṃvādanassa anurūpoti attho. Vāyāmoti vāyāmasīsena
tika-s0104t:1092_1: payogamāha. Vīriyappadhānā hi kāyikavācasikakiriyā idha adhippetā, na vāyāmamattaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1092_2: Visaṃvādanādhippāyena payoge katepi aparena tasmiṃ atthe aviññāte visaṃvādanassa
tika-s0104t:1092_3: asijjhanato parassa tadatthavijānanampi ekasambhārabhāvena vuttaṃ. Keci pana “abhūtavacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1092_4: visaṃvādanacittaṃ, parassa tadatthavijānana”nti tayo sambhāre vadanti. Kāyikova sāhatthikoti
tika-s0104t:1092_5: koci maññeyyāti taṃ nivāraṇatthaṃ “so kāyena vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro
tika-s0104t:1092_6: tamatthaṃ jānātīti taṅkhaṇe vā dandhatāya vicāretvā pacchā vā jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1092_8: cetanāya pavattakkhaṇe eva. Musāvādakammunā bajjhatīti visaṃvādanacetanāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0104t:1092_9: musāvādakammunā sambandhīyati, allīyatīti vā attho. Sacepi dandhatāya vicāretvā pacchā
tika-s0104t:1092_10: cirenāpi paro tadatthaṃ jānāti, sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya nibbattattā taṅkhaṇeyeva bajjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1093_0: “Eko payogo sāhatthikovā”ti idaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayena vuttanti idha saṅgahaṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0104t:1093_1: saṅgahakārassa attano matibhedaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “yathā…pe…
tika-s0104t:1093_2: tathā”ti etena sāhatthiko viya āṇattikādayopi gahetabbā, aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthi
tika-s0104t:1093_3: parassa visaṃvādanabhāvena tassadisattāti dasseti, “idamassa…pe… āṇāpentopī”ti āṇattikassa
tika-s0104t:1093_5: thāvarassa. Yasmā visaṃvādetīti sabbattha sambandho. Paṇṇaṃ likhitvāti tālādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1093_6: paṇṇaṃ akkharena likhitvā, paṇṇanti vā bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “tirokuṭṭādīsū”ti
tika-s0104t:1093_7: [kuḍḍādīsu ] paṇṇe akkharaṃ lekhaniyā likhitvāti attho. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbāti attanomatiyā
tika-s0104t:1093_8: sabbadubbalattā anattukkaṃsanena vuttaṃ. Kiñhettha vicāretabbakāraṇaṃ atthi sayameva vicāritattā.
tika-s0104t:1094: Saccanti vacīsaccaṃ, saccena saccanti purimena vacīsaccena pacchimaṃ vacīsaccaṃ. Paccayavasena dhātupadantalopaṃ sandhāya “sandahatī”ti vuttaṃ. Saddavidū pana –
tika-s0104t:1097_0: Dhā-saddameva ghaṭanatthe paṭhanti. Tasmā pariyāyavasena “sandahatī”ti vuttantipi
tika-s0104t:1097_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tadadhippāyaṃ dasseti “na antarantarā”tiādinā. “Yo hī”tiādi tabbivaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1097_2: Antaritattāti antarā paricchinnattā. Na tādisoti na evaṃvadanasabhāvo. Jīvitahetupi,
tika-s0104t:1098_0: “Saccato thetato”tiādīsu viya theta-saddo thirapariyāyo, thirabhāvo ca saccavāditādhikārattā
tika-s0104t:1098_1: kathāvasena veditabboti āha “thirakathoti attho”ti. Thitassa bhāvoti hi theto, thirabhāvo,
tika-s0104t:1098_2: tena yuttattā puggalo idha theto nāma. Haliddīti suvaṇṇavaṇṇakandanipphattako gacchaviseso.
tika-s0104t:1098_3: Thuso nāma dhaññattaco, dhaññapalāso ca. Kumbhaṇḍanti mahāphalo sūpasampādako latāviseso.
tika-s0104t:1098_4: Indakhīlo nāma gambhīranemo esikāthambho. Yathā haliddirāgādayo anavaṭṭhitasabhāvatāya
tika-s0104t:1098_5: na ṭhitā, evaṃ na ṭhitā kathā etassāti naṭhitakatho [nathirakatho ] yathā pāsāṇalekhādayo
tika-s0104t:1098_6: avaṭṭhitasabhāvatāya ṭhitā, evaṃ ṭhitā kathā etassāti ṭhitakathoti [thirakatho ]
tika-s0104t:1098_7: haliddirāgādayo yathā kathāya upamāyo honti, evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Kathāya hi etā upamāyoti.
tika-s0104t:1099_0: Pattisaṅkhātā saddhā ayati pavattati etthāti paccayikoti āha “pattiyāyitabbako”ti.
tika-s0104t:1099_1: Pattiyā ayitabbā pavattetabbāti pattiyāyitabbā ya-kārāgamena, vācā. Sā etassāti pattiyāyitabbako,
tika-s0104t:1099_2: tenāha “saddhāyitabbako”ti. Tadevatthaṃ byatirekena, anvayena ca dassetuṃ “ekacco
tika-s0104t:1099_3: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vattabbataṃ āpajjati visaṃvādanato. Itarapakkhe ca avisaṃvādanatoti
tika-s0104t:1099_4: adhippāyo. “Loka”nti etena “lokassā”ti ettha kammatthe chaṭṭhīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1100_0: Satipi paccekaṃ pāṭhakkame aññāsu abhidhammaṭṭhakathā dīsu saṃvaṇṇanākkamena tiṇṇampi
tika-s0104t:1100_1: padānaṃ ekatthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “yāya vācāyā”tiādimāha, yāya vācāya karotīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1100_2: Parassāti yaṃ bhindituṃ taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tassa. Ca-saddo aṭṭhānapayutto, so dvandagabbhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1100_3: jotetuṃ kammadvaye payujjitabbo. Suññabhāvanti piyavirahitatāya rittabhāvaṃ. Sāti
tika-s0104t:1100_4: yathāvuttā saddasabhāvā vācā, etena piyañca suññañca piyasuññaṃ, taṃ karoti etāyāti
tika-s0104t:1100_5: pisuṇā niruttinayenāti vacanatthaṃ dasseti, pisatīti vā pisuṇā, samagge satte avayavabhūte
tika-s0104t:1101_0: Pharusanti sinehābhāvena lūkhaṃ. Sayampi pharusāti domanassasamuṭṭhitattā sabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1101_1: sayampi kakkasā. Pharusasabhāvato neva kaṇṇasukhā. Atthavipannatāya na hadayaṅgamā.
tika-s0104t:1101_2: Ettha pana paṭhamanaye pharusaṃ karotīti vacanatthena vā phalūpacārena vā vācāya
tika-s0104t:1101_3: pharusasaddappavatti veditabbā. Dutiyanaye mammacchedavasena pavattiyā ekantaniṭṭhuratāya
tika-s0104t:1101_4: ruḷhisaddavasena sabhāvena, kāraṇūpacārena vā vācāya pharusasaddappavatti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0104t:1102_0: Yenāti palāpasaṅkhātena niratthakavacanena. Samphanti “sa”nti vuttaṃ sukhaṃ, hitañca
tika-s0104t:1102_1: phalati paharati vināsetīti atthena “sampha”nti laddhanāmaṃ attano, paresañca anupakārakaṃ
tika-s0104t:1102_2: yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ, tenāha “niratthaka”nti, iminā samphaṃ palapati etenāti samphappalāpoti
tika-s0104t:1103_1: pana cetanāya pavattiparikappanāya hetuṃ vibhāveti. Tattha “pahāyā”tiādivacanasannidhānato
tika-s0104t:1103_2: tassāyeva ca pahātabbatā yuttito adhippetāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1104_0: Tatthāti tāsu pisuṇavācādīsu. Saṃkiliṭṭhacittassāti lobhena, dosena vā vibādhitacittassa,
tika-s0104t:1104_1: upatāpitacittassa vā, dūsitacittassāti vuttaṃ hoti, “cetanā”ti etena sambandho. Yena
tika-s0104t:1104_2: saha paresaṃ bhedāya vadati, tassa attano piyakamyatāyāti attho. Cetanā pisuṇavācā
tika-s0104t:1104_3: nāma pisuṇaṃ vadanti etāyāti katvā. Samāsavisaye hi mukhyavasena attho gahetabbo,
tika-s0104t:1104_4: byāsavisaye upacāravasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yassa yato bhedaṃ karoti, tesu abhinnesu
tika-s0104t:1104_5: appasāvajjaṃ, bhinnesu mahāsāvajjaṃ. Tathā kilesānaṃ mudutibbatāvisesesupi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1105_0: Yassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati, so bhijjatu vā, mā vā, tassa tadatthaviññāpanameva pamāṇanti
tika-s0104t:1105_2: cattāro. Kammapathappatti pana bhinne eva. Imesanti aniyamatāya parammukhāpavattānampi
tika-s0104t:1105_3: attano buddhiyaṃ parivattamāne sandhāya vuttanti dassetuṃ “yesa”ntiādimāha. Itoti
tika-s0104t:1105_4: idha padese, vuttānaṃ yesaṃ santike sutanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1106_1: ettha kammaṃ, tena pāḷiyaṃ “bhinnāna”nti etassa kammabhāvaṃ dasseti. Sandhānakaraṇañca
tika-s0104t:1106_2: nāma tesamanurūpakaraṇamevāti vuttaṃ “anukattā”ti. Anuppadātāti anubalappadātā, anuvattanavasena
tika-s0104t:1106_3: vā padātā. Kassa pana anubalappadānaṃ, anuvattanañcāti? “Sahitāna”nti vuttattā sandhānassāti
tika-s0104t:1106_4: viññāyatīti āha “sandhānānuppadātā”ti. Yasmā pana anubalavasena, anuvattanavasena
tika-s0104t:1106_5: ca sandhānassa padānaṃ ādānaṃ, rakkhaṇaṃ vā daḷhīkaraṇaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “daḷhīkammaṃ
tika-s0104t:1106_6: kattā”ti. Āramanti etthāti ārāmo. Ramitabbaṭṭhānaṃ samaggoti hi tadadhiṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1106_8: viruddhattā. Yasmā pana ākārena vināpi ayamattho labbhati, tasmā “ayamevettha attho”ti
tika-s0104t:1106_9: vuttaṃ samaggesūti samaggabhūtesu janakāyesu, tenāha “te pahāyā”tiādi. Tappakatiyatthopi
tika-s0104t:1106_10: kattuatthovāti dasseti “nandatī”ti iminā. Tappakatiyatthena hi “disvāpi sutvāpī”ti
tika-s0104t:1106_11: vacanaṃ supapannaṃ hoti. Samagge karoti etāyāti samaggakaraṇī. Sāyeva vācā, taṃ bhāsitāti
tika-s0104t:1106_12: atthamāha “yā vācā”tiādinā. Tāya vācāya samaggakaraṇaṃ nāma. “Sukhā saṅghassa sāmaggī,
tika-s0104t:1107_0: Mammānīti duṭṭhārūni, tassadisatāya pana idha akkosavatthūni “mammānī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0104t:1107_1: Yathā hi duṭṭhārūsu yena kenaci vatthunā ghaṭitesu cittaṃ adhimattaṃ dukkhappattaṃ
tika-s0104t:1107_2: hoti, tathā tesu dasasujātiādīsu akkosavatthūsu pharusavācāya phusitamattesūti. Tathā
tika-s0104t:1107_3: hi vuttaṃ “mammāni viya mammāni, yesu pharusavācāya chupitamattesu duṭṭhārūsu viya
tika-s0104t:1107_4: ghaṭṭitesu cittaṃ adhimattaṃ dukkhappattaṃ hoti, kāni pana tāni? Jātiādīni akkosavatthūnī”ti
tika-s0104t:1107_5: “yassa sarīrappadesassa satthādipaṭihanena bhusaṃ rujjanaṃ, so mammaṃ nāma. Idha
tika-s0104t:1107_6: pana yassa cittassa pharusavācāvasena domanassasaṅkhātaṃ bhusaṃ rujjanaṃ, taṃ mammaṃ
tika-s0104t:1107_7: viyāti mamma”nti apare. Tāni mammāni chijjanti bhijjanti yenāti mammacchedako, sveva
tika-s0104t:1107_8: kāyavacīpayogo, tāni samuṭṭhāpetīti tathā. Ekantapharusacetanā pharusā vācā pharusaṃ
tika-s0104t:1107_9: vadanti etāyāti katvā. “Pharusacetanā” icceva avatvā “ekantapharusacetanā”ti vacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1107_10: duṭṭhacittatāya eva pharusacetanā adhippetā, na pana savanapharusatāmattenāti ñāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1107_11: Tassāti ekantapharusacetanāya eva. Āvibhāvatthanti pharusavācābhāvassa pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1107_12: Tassāti vā ekantapharusacetanāya eva, pharusavācābhāvassāti attho. Tathevāti mātuvuttākāreneva,
tika-s0104t:1107_13: uṭṭhāsi anubandhitunti attho. Saccakiriyanti yaṃ “caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū”ti
tika-s0104t:1107_14: vacanaṃ mukhena kathesi, taṃ mātucitte natthi, tasmā “taṃ mā hotu, yaṃ pana uppalapattampi
tika-s0104t:1107_15: mayhaṃ upari na patatū”ti kāraṇaṃ cittena cintesi, tadeva mātucitte atthi, tasmā
tika-s0104t:1107_16: “tameva hotū”ti saccakaraṇaṃ, kattabbasaccaṃ vā. Tatthevāti uṭṭhānaṭṭhāneyeva. Baddhā
tika-s0104t:1107_17: viyāti yottādinā paribandhi viya. Evaṃ mammacchedakoti ettha savanapharusatāmattena
tika-s0104t:1108_0: Payogoti vacīpayogo. Cittasaṇhatāyāti ekantapharusacetanāya abhāvamāha. Tatoyeva
tika-s0104t:1108_1: hi pharusavācā na hoti kammapathappattā, kammabhāvaṃ pana na sakkā vāretunti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1108_2: “Mātāpitaro hī”tiādināpi tadevatthaṃ samattheti. Evaṃ byatirekavasena cetanāpharusatāya
tika-s0104t:1108_3: pharusavācābhāvaṃ sādhetvā idāni tameva anvayavasena sādhetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1108_4: Apharusā vācā na hoti pharusā vācā hotiyevāti attho sāti pharusavācā. Yanti puggalaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1109_0: Etthāpi kammapathabhāvaṃ appattā appasāvajjā, itarā mahāsāvajjā. Tathā kilesānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1109_1: mudutibbatābhedepi yojetabbaṃ. Keci pana “yaṃ uddissa pharusavācā payujjati, tassa
tika-s0104t:1109_2: sammukhāyeva sīsaṃ etī”ti vadanti, eke pana “parammukhāpi pharusavācā hotiyevā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1109_3: Tatthāyamadhippāyo yutto siyā, sammukhā payoge agāravādīnaṃ balavabhāvato siyā cetanā
tika-s0104t:1109_4: balavatī, parassa ca tadatthavijānanaṃ, na tathā parammukhā. Yathā pana akkosite
tika-s0104t:1109_5: mate āḷahane katā khamanā upavādantarāyaṃ nivatteti, evaṃ parammukhā payuttāpi pharusavācā
tika-s0104t:1109_6: hotiyevāti sakkā ñātunti, tasmā ubhayatthāpi pharusavācā sambhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1109_7: Tathā hi parassa tadatthavijānanamaññatra tayova tassā sambhārā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttāti.
tika-s0104t:1109_8: Kupitacittanti akkosanādhippāyeneva vuttaṃ, na pana maraṇādhippāyena. Maraṇādhippāyena
tika-s0104t:1109_9: hi sati cittakope atthasiddhiyā, tadabhāve ca yathārahaṃ pāṇātipātabyāpādāva honti.
tika-s0104t:1110: Elaṃ vuccati doso ilati cittaṃ, puggalo vā kampati etenāti katvā. Etthāti –
tika-s0104t:1113_0: Imissā udānagāthāya. Sīlañhettha niddosatāya “nela”nti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha citto gahapati
tika-s0104t:1113_1: āyasmatā kāmabhūtherena puṭṭho saṃyuttāgamavare saḷāyatanavagge “nelaṅga”nti kho
tika-s0104t:1113_2: bhante sīlānametaṃ adhivacana”nti vācā nāma saddasabhāvā taṃtadatthanibandhanāti
tika-s0104t:1113_3: sādurasasadisattā madhurameva byañjanaṃ, attho ca tabbhāvatoti atthameva sandhāya
tika-s0104t:1113_4: byañjanamadhuratāya, atthamadhuratāyā”ti ca vuttaṃ. Visesanaparanipātopi hi loke
tika-s0104t:1113_5: dissati “agyāhito”tiādīsu. Apica avayavāpekkhane sati “madhuraṃ byañjanaṃ yassā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1113_6: vattabbo. Sukhāti sukhakaraṇī, sukhahetūti vuttaṃ hoti. Kaṇṇasūlanti kaṇṇasaṅkuṃ.
tika-s0104t:1113_7: Kaṇṇasaddena cettha sotaviññāṇapaṭibaddhatadanuvattakā viññāṇavīthiyo gahitā. Vohārakathā
tika-s0104t:1113_8: hesā suttantadesanā, tassā vaṇṇanā ca, tathā ceva vuttaṃ “sakalasarīre kopaṃ, pema”nti
tika-s0104t:1113_9: ca. Na hi hadayavatthunissito kopo, pemo ca sakalasarīre vattati. Esa nayo īdisesu.
tika-s0104t:1113_10: Sukhena cittaṃ pavisati yathāvuttakāraṇadvayenāti attho, aluttasamāso cesa yathā
tika-s0104t:1113_12: porī, tādisā nārī viyāti vācāpi porīti atthamāha “pure”tiādinā. Sukumārāti sutaruṇā.
tika-s0104t:1113_13: Upameyyapakkhe pana apharusatāya mudukabhāvo eva sukumāratā. Purassāti ettha pura-saddo
tika-s0104t:1113_15: Esāti taṃsambandhīniddesā vācā. Evarūpī kathāti atthattayena pakāsitā kathā. Kantāti
tika-s0104t:1113_16: kāmitā tuṭṭhā yathā “pakkanto”ti, māna-saddassa vā antabyappadeso, kāmiyamānāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1113_17: Yathā “anāpatti asamanubhāsantassā”ti manaṃ appeti vaḍḍhetīti manāpā, tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1113_18: “cittavuḍḍhikarā”ti. Tathākārinīti attho. Ato bahuno janassāti idha sambandhe sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1114_0: Kāmaṃ tehi vattumicchito attho sambhavati, so pana aphalattā bhāsitatthapariyāyena
tika-s0104t:1114_1: atthoyeva nāma na hotīti āha “anatthaviññāpikā”ti. Apica payojanatthābhāvato anatthā,
tika-s0104t:1114_2: vācā, taṃ viññāpikātipi vaṭṭati. Akusalacetanā samphappalāpo samphaṃ palapanti etāyāti
tika-s0104t:1114_3: katvā. Āsevanaṃ bhāvanaṃ bahulīkaraṇaṃ. Yaṃ janaṃ gāhāpayituṃ pavattito, tena aggahite
tika-s0104t:1114_4: appasāvajjo, gahite mahāsāvajjo. Kilesānaṃ mudutibbatāvasenāpi appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā
tika-s0104t:1114_5: yojetabbā. Bhāratanāmakānaṃ dvebhātukarājūnaṃ yuddhakathā, dasagiriyakkhena sītāya
tika-s0104t:1114_6: nāma deviyā āharaṇakathā, rāmaraññā paccāharaṇakathā, yathā taṃ adhunā bāhirakehi
tika-s0104t:1114_7: paricayitā sakkaṭabhāsāya gaṇṭhitā rāmapurāṇabhāratapurāṇādikathāti, evamādikā niratthakakathā
tika-s0104t:1115_2: hi vutte kathaṃ pāṇātipātappahānaṃ hotīti apekkhāsambhavato “pāṇātipātā paṭivirato
tika-s0104t:1115_3: hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Sā pana virati kathanti āha “nihitadaṇḍo nihita sattho”ti. Tañca
tika-s0104t:1115_4: daṇḍasatthanidhānaṃ kathanti vuttaṃ “lajjī”tiādi. Evaṃ uttaruttaraṃ purimassa purimassa
tika-s0104t:1115_5: upāyasandassanaṃ. Tathā adinnādānādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “kālavādītiādi
tika-s0104t:1115_6: samphappalāpā paṭiviratassa paṭipattisandassana”nti. Atthasaṃhitāpi hi vācā ayuttakālapayogena
tika-s0104t:1115_7: atthāvahā na siyāti anatthaviññāpanabhāvaṃ anulometi, tasmā samphappalāpaṃ pajahantena
tika-s0104t:1115_8: akālavāditā parivajjetabbāti dassetuṃ “kālavādī”ti vuttaṃ. Kāle vadantenāpi ubhayattha
tika-s0104t:1115_9: asādhanato abhūtaṃ parivajjetabbanti āha “bhūtavādī”ti. Bhūtañca vadantena yaṃ idhalokaparalokahitasampādanakaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1115_10: tadeva vattabbanti vuttaṃ “atthavādī”ti. Atthaṃ vadantenāpi na lokiyadhammanissitameva
tika-s0104t:1115_11: vattabbaṃ, atha kho lokuttaradhammanissitampīti āha “dhammavādī”ti. Yathā ca attho
tika-s0104t:1116_0: Pātimokkhasaṃvaro, satiñāṇakhantivīriyasaṃvaroti hi pañcannaṃ saṃvaravinayānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1116_2: vasena vuccamāno attho nibbānādhigamahetubhāvato lokuttaradhammasannissito hoti.
tika-s0104t:1116_3: Evaṃ guṇavisesayutto ca attho vuccamāno desanākosalle sati sobhati, kiccakaro ca
tika-s0104t:1116_4: hoti, nāññathāti dassetuṃ “nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tameva desanākosallaṃ
tika-s0104t:1116_5: vibhāvetuṃ “kālenā”tiādimāha. Ajjhāsayaṭṭhuppattīnaṃ, pucchāya ca vasena otiṇṇe desanāvisaye
tika-s0104t:1116_8: desanāya pare yathājjhāsayaṃ paramatthasiddhiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpento “desanākusalo”ti vuccatīti
tika-s0104t:1117_0: Vattabbayuttakālanti vattabbavacanassa anurūpakālaṃ, tattha vā payujjitabbakālaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1117_1: Sabhāvavaseneva bhūtatāti āha “sabhāvamevā”ti. Atthaṃ vadatīti atthavādī. Atthavadanañca
tika-s0104t:1118_0: Nidheti sannidhānaṃ karoti etthāti nidhānaṃ. Ṭhapanokāso. “Ṭhānavatī”ti vutte tasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:1118_1: ṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ yuttātipi attho sambhavatīti āha “hadaye”tiādi. Nidhānavatīpi vācā
tika-s0104t:1118_2: kālayuttāva atthāvahā, tasmā “kālenā”ti idaṃ “nidhānavatiṃ” vācaṃ bhāsitā”ti etassāpekkhavacananti
tika-s0104t:1118_4: icchitattho anenāti apadeso, upamā, hetudāharaṇādikāraṇaṃ vā, tena saha vattatīti
tika-s0104t:1118_5: sāpadesā, vācā, tenāha “saupamaṃ sakāraṇanti attho”ti. Paricchedaṃ dassetvāti yāvatā
tika-s0104t:1118_6: pariyosānaṃ sambhavati, tāvatā mariyādaṃ dassetvā, tena vuttaṃ “yathā…pe… bhāsatī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1118_7: Sikhamappattā hi kathā atthāvahā nāma na hoti. Atthasaṃhitanti ettha attha-saddo
tika-s0104t:1118_8: bhāsitatthapariyāyoti vuttaṃ “anekehipī”tiādi. Bhāsitattho ca nāma saddānusārena
tika-s0104t:1118_9: adhigato sabbopi pakatyatthapaccayatthabhāvatthādiko, tatoyeva bhagavato vacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1118_11: pariyādātumasakkuṇeyyaṃ atthamāvahatīti. Evaṃ atthasāmaññato saṃvaṇṇetvā icchitatthavisesatopi
tika-s0104t:1118_12: saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “yaṃ vā”tiādimāha. Atthavādinā vattumicchitatthoyeva hi idha gahito.
tika-s0104t:1118_13: Nanu sabbesampi vacanaṃ attanā icchitatthasahitaṃyeva, kimettha vattabbaṃ atthīti
tika-s0104t:1118_14: antolīnacodanaṃ parisodheti “na añña”ntiādinā. Aññamatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhipitvā ananusandhivasena
tika-s0104t:1118_15: pacchā aññamatthaṃ na bhāsati. Yathānikkhittānusandhivaseneva pariyosāpetvā kathetīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1119_0: 10. Evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā sattamūlasikkhāpadāni vibhajitvā satipi abhijjhādippahānassa
tika-s0104t:1119_2: saṅgahituṃ taṃ pariharitvā pacurajanapākaṭaṃ ācārasīlameva vibhajanto bhagavā “bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā”tiādimāhāti
tika-s0104t:1119_3: pāḷiyaṃ sambandho vattabbo. Tattha vijāyanti viruhanti etehīti bījāni. Paccayantarasamavāye
tika-s0104t:1119_5: Bhavanti, ahuvunti cāti bhūtā, jāyanti vaḍḍhanti jātā, vaḍḍhitā cāti attho. Vaḍḍhamānakānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1119_6: vaḍḍhitvā, ṭhitānañca rukkhagacchādīnaṃ yathākkamamadhivacanaṃ. Viruḷhamūlā hi nīlabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1119_7: āpajjantā taruṇarukkhagacchā jāyanti vaḍḍhantīti vuccanti. Vaḍḍhitvā ṭhitā mahantā
tika-s0104t:1119_8: rukkhagacchā jātā vaḍḍhitāti. Gāmoti samūho, so ca suddhaṭṭhakadhammarāsi, bījānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1119_9: bhūtānañca tathāladdhasamaññānaṃ aṭṭhadhammānaṃ gāmo, teyeva vā gāmoti tathā. Avayavavinimuttassa
tika-s0104t:1119_10: hi samudāyassa abhāvato duvidhenāpi atthena teyeva tiṇarukkhalatādayo gayhanti.
tika-s0104t:1120_0: Apica bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā haritabhāvamāpannā rukkhagacchādayo devatā pariggayhanti,
tika-s0104t:1120_1: tasmā bhūtānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānatāya gāmoti bhūtagāmotipi vadanti, te sarūpato dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:1120_2: “mūlabīja”ntiādimāha. Mūlameva bījaṃ mūlabījaṃ. Sesesupi ayaṃ nayo. Phaḷubījanti
tika-s0104t:1120_4: sāraphale niruḷho bīja-saddo tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito
tika-s0104t:1120_5: nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-saddena visesetvā “bījabīja”nti vuttaṃ yathā “rūpaṃrūpaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1120_6: dukkhadukkha”nti ca. Nīlatiṇarukkhādikassāti allatiṇassa ceva allarukkhādikassa ca.
tika-s0104t:1120_7: Ādi-saddena osadhigacchalatādayo veditabbā. Samārambho idha vikopanaṃ, tañca chedanādiyevāti
tika-s0104t:1120_8: vuttaṃ “chedanabhedanapacanādibhāvenā”ti. Nanu ca rukkhādayo cittarahitatāya na jīvā,
tika-s0104t:1120_9: cittarahitatā ca paripphandanābhāvato, chinne viruhanato, visadisajātikabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1120_10: catuyoniapariyāpannato ca veditabbā. Vuḍḍhi pana pavāḷasilālavaṇādīnampi vijjatīti
tika-s0104t:1120_11: na tesaṃ jīvatābhāve kāraṇaṃ. Visayaggahaṇañca nesaṃ parikappanāmattaṃ supanaṃ viya
tika-s0104t:1120_12: ciñcādīnaṃ, tathā kaṭukambilāsādinā dohaḷādayo. Tattha kasmā bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā
tika-s0104t:1120_13: paṭivirati icchitāti? Samaṇasāruppato, tannissitasattānukampanato ca. Tenevāha āḷavakānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1121_0: Ekaṃ bhattaṃ ekabhattaṃ, tamassa atthi ekasmiṃ divase ekavārameva bhuñjanatoti ekabhattiko.
tika-s0104t:1121_1: Tayidaṃ ekabhattaṃ kadā bhuñjitabbanti sandhāya vuttaṃ “pātarāsabhatta”ntiādi, dvīsu
tika-s0104t:1121_2: bhattesu pātarāsabhattaṃ sandhāyāhāti adhippāyo. Pāto asitabbanti pātarāsaṃ. Sāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1121_3: asitabbanti sāyamāsaṃ, tadeva bhattaṃ tathā. Eka-saddo cettha majjhanhikakālaparicchedabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1122_0: Rattiyā bhojanaṃ uttarapadalopato rattisaddena vuttaṃ, taddhitavasena vā tathāyevādhippāyasambhavato,
tika-s0104t:1122_1: tenāha “rattiyā”tiādi. Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā ayaṃ buddhādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1122_2: ariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma, tadañño vikālo. Tattha dutiyapadena
tika-s0104t:1122_3: rattibhojanassa paṭikkhittattā aparanhova idha vikāloti pārisesanayena tatiyapadassa
tika-s0104t:1122_4: atthaṃ dīpetuṃ “atikkante majjhanhike”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhāvasādhano cettha bhojana-saddo
tika-s0104t:1122_5: ajjhoharaṇatthavācakoti dīpeti “yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojana”nti iminā. Kassa pana
tika-s0104t:1122_7: niruḷhattā “yāvakālikassā”ti viññāyati. Ayaṃ panettha aṭṭhakathāvaseso ācariyānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1122_8: nayo – bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena bhojanaṃ, yāgubhattādi sabbaṃ yāvakālikavatthu. Yathā ca
tika-s0104t:1122_9: “rattūparato”ti ettha rattibhojanaṃ rattisaddena vuccati, evamettha bhojanajjhoharaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1122_10: bhojanasaddena. Vikāle bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ, tato vikālabhojanā. Vikāle yāvakālikavatthussa
tika-s0104t:1122_11: ajjhoharaṇāti atthoti. Īdisā guṇavibhūti na buddhakāleyevāti āha “anomānadītīre”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1122_12: Ayaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ anusandhikkamo – ekasmiṃ divase ekavārameva bhuñjanato “ekabhattiko”ti
tika-s0104t:1122_13: vutte rattibhojanopi siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ “rattūparato”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sati sāyanhabhojīpi
tika-s0104t:1123_0: Saṅkhepato “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”ntiādi nayappavattaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ sachandarāgappavattito
tika-s0104t:1123_1: naccādīnaṃ dassanaṃ nānulometīti āha “sāsanassa ananulomattā”ti. Visucati sāsanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1123_2: vijjhati ananulomikabhāvenāti visūkaṃ, paṭiviruddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatra upamaṃ
tika-s0104t:1123_3: dasseti “paṭāṇībhūta”nti iminā, paṭāṇīsaṅkhātaṃ kīlaṃ viya bhūtanti attho. “Visūka”nti
tika-s0104t:1123_4: etassa paṭāṇībhūtanti atthamāhātipi vadanti. Attanā payojiyamānaṃ, parehi payojāpiyamānañca
tika-s0104t:1123_5: naccaṃ naccabhāvasāmaññato pāḷiyaṃ ekeneva naccasaddena sāmaññaniddesanayena gahitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1123_6: ekasesanayena vā. Tathā gītavāditasaddehi gāyanagāyāpanavādanavādāpanānīti āha “naccananaccāpanādivasenā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1123_7: Suddhahetutājotanavasena hi dvādhippāyikā ete saddā. Naccañca gītañca vāditañca visūkadassanañca
tika-s0104t:1123_8: naccagītavāditavisūkadassanaṃ, samāhāravasenettha ekattaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yathāpāṭhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1123_12: cettha savanampi saṅgahitaṃ virūpekasesanayena, yathāsakaṃ vā visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya
tika-s0104t:1123_14: vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭijānāti aññatra atinipātamattā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1124_0: “Visūkabhūtā dassanā cā”ti etena avisūkabhūtassa pana gītassa savanaṃ kadāci vaṭṭatīti
tika-s0104t:1124_1: dasseti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ paramatthajotikāya khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāya “dhammūpasaṃhitampi
tika-s0104t:1124_2: cettha gītaṃ na vaṭṭati, gītūpasaṃhito pana dhammo vaṭṭatī”ti katthaci pana na-kāravipariyāyena
tika-s0104t:1124_3: pāṭho dissati. Ubhayatthāpi ca gīto ce dhammānulomatthapaṭisaṃyuttopi na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t:1124_4: dhammo ce gītasaddapaṭisaṃyuttopi vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo veditabbo. “Na bhikkhave, gītassarena
tika-s0104t:1124_5: dhammo gāyitabbo, yo gāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi desanāya eva paṭikkhepo, na
tika-s0104t:1124_6: savanāya. Imassa ca sikkhāpadassa visuṃ paññāpanato viññāyati “gītassarena desitopi
tika-s0104t:1124_7: dhammo na gīto”ti. Yañca sakkapañhasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbasaddaṃ niddharantena
tika-s0104t:1124_8: “yaṃ pana atthanissitaṃ dhammanissitaṃ kumbhadāsigītampi suṇantassa pasādo vā uppajjati,
tika-s0104t:1124_9: nibbidā vā saṇṭhāti, evarūpo saddo sevitabbo”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ asamādānasikkhāpadassa
tika-s0104t:1124_10: sevitabbatāmattapariyāyena vuttaṃ. Samādānasikkhāpadassa hi evarūpaṃ suṇantassa sikkhāpadasaṃvaraṃ
tika-s0104t:1124_11: bhijjati gītasaddabhāvatoti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi vinayaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “gītanti
tika-s0104t:1124_12: naṭādīnaṃ vā gītaṃ hotu, ariyānaṃ parinibbānakāle ratanattayaguṇūpasaṃhitaṃ sādhukīḷanagītaṃ
tika-s0104t:1124_13: vā, asaṃyatabhikkhūnaṃ dhammabhāṇakagītaṃ vā, antamaso dantagītampi, yaṃ “gāyissāmā”ti
tika-s0104t:1124_14: pubbabhāge okūjitaṃ karonti, sabbametaṃ gītaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1125_0: Kiñcāpi mālā-saddo loke baddhapupphavācako, sāsane pana ruḷhiyā abaddhapupphesupi
tika-s0104t:1125_1: vaṭṭati, tasmā yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ baddhamabaddhaṃ vā, taṃ sabbaṃ “mālā” tveva daṭṭhabbanti
tika-s0104t:1125_2: āha “yaṃ kiñci puppha”nti. “Yaṃ kiñci gandha”nti cettha vāsacuṇṇadhūpādikaṃ vilepanato
tika-s0104t:1125_3: aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ. Vuttatthaṃ viya hi vuccamānatthamantarenāpi saddo atthavisesavācako.
tika-s0104t:1125_4: Chavirāgakaraṇanti vilepanena chaviyā rañjanatthaṃ pisitvā paṭiyattaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhacuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1125_5: Piḷandhanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ. Ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ maṇḍanaṃ. Gandhavasena, chavirāgavasena ca
tika-s0104t:1125_6: sādiyanaṃ vibhūsanaṃ. Tadevatthaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena dīpeti “tattha piḷandhanto”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1125_7: Tathā ceva majjhimaṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ, paramatthajotikāyaṃ pana khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1125_8: “mālādīsu dhāraṇādīni yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yojetabbānī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi yojentena
tika-s0104t:1125_9: yathāvuttanayeneva yojetabbāni. Kiṃ panetaṃ kāraṇanti āha “yāyā”tiādi. Yāya dussīlyacetanāya
tika-s0104t:1125_10: karoti, sā idha kāraṇaṃ. “Tato paṭivirato”ti hi ubhayattha sambandhitabbaṃ, eteneva
tika-s0104t:1125_11: “mālā…pe… vibhūsanānaṃ ṭhānaṃ, mālā…pe… vibhūsanāneva vā ṭhāna”nti samāsampi dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1125_12: Tadākārappavatto cetanādidhammoyeva hi dhāraṇādikiriyā. Tattha ca cetanāsampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1125_13: kāraṇaṃ sahajātādopakārakato, padhānato ca. “Cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya
tika-s0104t:1125_14: manasā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Dhāraṇādibhūtā eva ca cetanā ṭhānanti. Ṭhāna-saddo paccekaṃ
tika-s0104t:1126_0: Uccāti uccasaddena akārantena samānatthaṃ ākārantaṃ ekaṃ saddantaraṃ accuggatavācakanti
tika-s0104t:1126_1: āha “pamāṇātikkanta”nti. Seti etthāti sayanaṃ, mañcādi. Samaṇasārupparahitattā, gahaṭṭhehi
tika-s0104t:1126_3: “akappiyattharaṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Nisīdanaṃ panettha sayaneneva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1126_4: Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārakiriyāpi paṭikkhittāva hoti, tasmā “uccāsayanamahāsayanā”
tika-s0104t:1126_5: icceva vuttaṃ. Atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi virati dassitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1126_6: Atha vā “uccāsayanamahāsayanā”ti esa niddeso ekasesanayena yathā “nāmarūpapaccayā
tika-s0104t:1126_7: saḷāyatana”nti etasmimpi vikappe āsanapubbakattā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0104t:1127_0: Jātameva rūpamassa na vippakāranti jātarūpaṃ, satthuvaṇṇaṃ. Rañjīyati setavaṇṇatāya,
tika-s0104t:1127_1: rañjanti vā ettha sattāti rajataṃ yathā “nesaṃ padakkanta”nti. “Cattāro vīhayo guñjā,
tika-s0104t:1127_2: dve guñjā māsako bhave”ti vuttalakkhaṇena vīsatimāsako nīlakahāpaṇo vā dudradāmakādiko
tika-s0104t:1127_3: vā taṃtaṃdesavohārānurūpaṃ kato kahāpaṇo. Lohādīhi kato lohamāsakādiko. Ye vohāraṃ
tika-s0104t:1127_4: gacchantīti pariyādānavacanaṃ. Vohāranti ca kayavikkayavasena sabbohāraṃ. Aññehi
tika-s0104t:1127_5: gāhāpane, upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti āha “na uggaṇhāpeti
tika-s0104t:1127_6: na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatī”ti. Atha vā tividhaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyena vācāya manasā.
tika-s0104t:1127_7: Tattha kāyena paṭiggahaṇaṃ uggahaṇaṃ. Vācāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ uggahāpanaṃ. Manasā paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1127_8: sādiyanaṃ. Tividhampetaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā gahetvā
tika-s0104t:1127_9: paṭiggahaṇāti vuttanti āha “neva naṃ uggaṇhātī”tiādi. Esa nayo āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇātiādīsupi.
tika-s0104t:1128: Nīvārādiupadhaññassa sāliyādimūladhaññantogadhattā “sattavidhassāpī”ti vuttaṃ. Saṭṭhidinaparipāko sukadhaññaviseso sāli nāma salīyate sīlāghateti katvā. Dabbaguṇapakāse pana –
tika-s0104t:1130: Sālayo hemantā tatra, saṭṭhikā gimhajā api;
tika-s0104t:1132_0: Vuttaṃ. Vahati, brūheti vā sattānaṃ jīvitanti vīhi, sassaṃ. Yuvitabbo missitabboti
tika-s0104t:1132_1: yavo. So hi atilūkhatāya aññena missetvā paribhuñjīyati. Gudhati parivedhati palibuddhatīti
tika-s0104t:1132_2: godhūmo, yaṃ “milakkhabhojana”ntipi vadanti. Sobhanattā kamanīyabhāvaṃ gacchatīti
tika-s0104t:1132_3: kaṅgu, atisukhumadhaññaviseso. Varīyati atilūkhatāya nivārīyati, khuddāpaṭivinayanato
tika-s0104t:1132_4: vā bhajīyatīti varako. Koraṃ rudhiraṃ dūsatīti kudrūsako, vaṇṇasaṅkamanena yo “govaḍḍhano”tipi
tika-s0104t:1132_5: vuccati. Tāni sattapi sappabhedā nidhāne posane sādhuttena “dhaññānī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0104t:1132_6: “Na kevalañcā”tiādinā sampaṭicchanaṃ, parāmasanañca idha paṭiggahaṇasaddena vuttanti
tika-s0104t:1132_7: dasseti. Evamīdisesu. “Anujānāmi bhikkhave, vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ
tika-s0104t:1132_8: susukāvasaṃ sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasa”nti vuttattā idaṃ pañcavidhampi bhesajjaṃ odissa
tika-s0104t:1132_9: anuññātaṃ nāma. Tassa pana “kāle paṭiggahita”nti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-s0104t:1132_10: āha “aññatra odissa anuññātā”ti. Maṃsa-saddena macchānampi maṃsaṃ gahitaṃ evāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:1132_12: asutaṃ, aparisaṅkitanti vā payogassa dassanato virūpekasesanayo dassito anenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1136_0: Vadanti. Idha pana purisantaragatāgatavasena itthikumārikābhedoti āha “itthīti purisantaragatā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1136_1: Dāsidāsavasenevāti dāsidāsavohāravaseneva. Evaṃ vutteti tādisena kappiyavacanena
tika-s0104t:1136_2: vutte. Vinayaṭṭhakathāsu āgatavinicchayaṃ sandhāya “vinayavasenā”ti vuttaṃ. So kuṭikārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanādīsu gahetabbo.
tika-s0104t:1137_0: Bījaṃ khipanti ettha, khittaṃ vā bījaṃ tāyatīti khettaṃ, kedāroti āha “yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1137_1: ruhatī”ti. Aparaṇṇassa pubbe pavattamannaṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ na-kārassa ṇa-kāraṃ katvā, sāliādi.
tika-s0104t:1137_2: Vasanti patiṭṭhahanti aparaṇṇāni etthāti vatthūti atthaṃ dasseti “vatthu nāmā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1137_3: Pubbaṇṇassa aparaṃ pavattamannaṃ aparaṇṇaṃ vuttanayena. Evaṃ aṭṭhakathānayānurūpaṃ
tika-s0104t:1137_4: atthaṃ dassetvā idāni “khettaṃ nāma yattha pubbaṇṇaṃ vā aparaṇṇaṃ vā jāyatī”ti vuttavinayapāḷinayānurūpampi
tika-s0104t:1137_5: atthaṃ dassento “yattha vā”tiādimāha. Tadatthāyāti khettatthāya. Akatabhūmibhāgoti
tika-s0104t:1138_0: Dūtassa idaṃ, dūtena vā kātumarahatīti dūteyyaṃ. Paṇṇanti lekhasāsanaṃ. Sāsananti
tika-s0104t:1138_1: mukhasāsanaṃ. Gharā gharanti aññasmā gharā aññaṃ gharaṃ. Khuddakagamananti dūteyyagamanato
tika-s0104t:1138_2: appataragamanaṃ, anaddhānagamanaṃ rassagamananti attho. Tadubhayesaṃ anuyuñjanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1139_0: Kayanaṃ kayo, paramparā gahetvā attano dhanassa dānaṃ. Kī-saddañhi dabbavinimaye
tika-s0104t:1139_1: paṭhanti vikkayanaṃ vikkayo, paṭhamameva attano dhanassa paresaṃ dānanti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1139_2: Sāratthadīpaniyādīsu pana “kaya”nti parabhaṇḍassa gahaṇaṃ. Vikkayanti attano bhaṇḍassa
tika-s0104t:1139_3: dāna”nti vuttaṃ. Tadeva “kayitañca hoti parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ karontena,
tika-s0104t:1139_4: vikkītañca attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ karontenā”ti vinayaṭṭhakathāvacanena sameti.
tika-s0104t:1139_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Tulā nāma yāya tulīyati pamīyati, tāya kūṭaṃ “tulākūṭa”nti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1139_7: Taṃ pana karonto tulāya rūpaaṅgagahaṇākārapaṭicchannasaṇṭhānavasena karotīti catubbidhatā
tika-s0104t:1139_8: vuttā. Attanā gahetabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ pacchābhāge, paresaṃ dātabbaṃ pubbabhāge katvā minentīti
tika-s0104t:1139_9: āha “gaṇhanto pacchābhāge”tiādi. Akkamati nippīḷati, pubbabhāge akkamatīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1139_10: Mūle rajjunti tulāya mūle yojitaṃ rajjuṃ. Tathā agge. Tanti ayacuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1140_0: Kanati dibbatīti kaṃso, suvaṇṇarajatādimayā bhojanapānapattā. Idha pana sovaṇṇamaye
tika-s0104t:1140_1: pānapatteti āha “suvaṇṇapātī”ti. Tāya vañcananti nikativasena vañcanaṃ. “Patirūpakaṃ
tika-s0104t:1140_2: dassetvā parasantakagahaṇañhi nikati, paṭibhānakaraṇavasena pana upāyakusalatāya
tika-s0104t:1140_3: vañcana”nti nikativañcanaṃ bhedato kaṇhajātakaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttaṃ, idha pana tadubhayampi
tika-s0104t:1140_5: Samagghataranti tāsaṃ pātīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ samakaṃ agghavisesaṃ. Pāsāṇeti bhūtābhūtabhāvasañjānanake
tika-s0104t:1141: Hadayanti nāḷiādiminanabhājanānaṃ abbhantaraṃ, tasmiṃ bhedo chiddakaraṇaṃ hadayabhedo. Tilādīnaṃ nāḷiādīhi minanakāle ussāpitā sikhāyeva sikhā, tassā bhedo hāpanaṃ sikhābhedo.
tika-s0104t:1142_0: Rajjuyā bhedo visamakaraṇaṃ rajjubhedo. Tānīti sappitelādīni. Antobhājaneti paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0104t:1142_1: nikkhittabhājane. Ussāpetvāti uggamāpetvā, uddhaṃ rāsiṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Chindantoti apanento.
tika-s0104t:1143_0: Kattabbakammato uddhaṃ koṭanaṃ paṭihananaṃ ukkoṭanaṃ. Abhūtakārīnaṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1143_1: na pana puna kammāya ukkoṭanamattanti āha “assāmike…pe… ggahaṇa”nti. Upāyehīti kāraṇapatirūpakehi.
tika-s0104t:1143_2: Tatrāti tasmiṃ vañcane. “Vatthu”nti avatvā “ekaṃ vatthu”nti vadanto aññānipi atthi
tika-s0104t:1143_3: bahūnīti dasseti. Aññānipi hi sasavatthuādīni tattha tattha vuttāni. Miganti mahantaṃ
tika-s0104t:1143_4: migaṃ. Tena hīti migaggahaṇe uyyojanaṃ, yena vā kāraṇena “migaṃ me dehī”ti āha, tena
tika-s0104t:1143_5: kāraṇenāti attho. Hi-saddo nipātamattaṃ. Yogavasenāti vijjājappanādipayogavasena.
tika-s0104t:1143_6: Māyāvasenāti mantajappanaṃ vinā abhūtassāpi bhūtākārasaññāpanāya cakkhumohanamāyāya
tika-s0104t:1143_7: vasena. Yāya hi amaṇiādayopi maṇiādiākārena dissanti. Pāmaṅgo nāma kulācārayutto
tika-s0104t:1143_8: ābharaṇaviseso, yaṃ loke “yaññopavitta”nti vadanti. Vakkalittherāpadānepi vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:1146_1: attho. Hemayaññopavittaṅganti suvaṇṇapāmaṅgalaggitagattanti attho”ti savanaṃ saṭhanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1146_3: tulyādhikaraṇataṃ dasseti. “Tasmā”tiādi laddhaguṇadassanaṃ. Ye pana catunnampi padānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1146_4: bhinnādhikaraṇataṃ vadanti, tesaṃ vādamāha “kecī”tiādinā. Tattha “kecī”ti sārasamāsakārakā
tika-s0104t:1146_5: ācariyā, uttaravihāravāsino ca, tesaṃ taṃ na yuttaṃ vañcanena saṅgahitasseva puna
tika-s0104t:1147_0: Māraṇanti muṭṭhipahārakasātāḷanādīhi hiṃsanaṃ viheṭhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na tu pāṇātipātaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1147_1: Viheṭhanatthepi hi vadha-saddo dissati “attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyyā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1147_2: māraṇa-saddopi idha viheṭhaneyeva vattatīti daṭṭhabbo. Keci pana “pubbe pāṇātipātaṃ
tika-s0104t:1147_3: pahāyā’tiādīsu sayaṃkāro, idha paraṃkāro”ti vadanti, taṃ na sakkā tathā vattuṃ “kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-s0104t:1147_4: cetanā, cha payogā”ti ca vuttattā. Yathā hi appaṭiggāhabhāvasāmaññepi sati pabbajitehi
tika-s0104t:1147_6: vuttā. Yathā ca parasantakassa haraṇabhāvato adinnādānabhāvasāmaññepi sati tulākūṭādayo
tika-s0104t:1147_7: adinnādānavisesabhāvasandassanatthaṃ vibhāgena vuttā, na evaṃ pāṇātipātapariyāyassa
tika-s0104t:1147_8: vadhassa puna gahaṇe payojanaṃ atthi tathāvibhajitabbassābhāvato, tasmā yathāvuttoyevattho sundarataroti.
tika-s0104t:1148_0: Viparāmosoti visesena samantato bhusaṃ mosāpanaṃ muyhanakaraṇaṃ, thenanaṃ vā. Theyyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1148_1: corikā mosoti hi pariyāyo. So kāraṇavasena duvidhoti āha “himaviparāmoso”tiādi. Musantīti
tika-s0104t:1148_2: corenti, mosenti vā muyhanaṃ karonti, mosetvā tesaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1148_3: Yanti ca tassā kiriyāya parāmasanaṃ. Maggappaṭipannaṃ jananti parapakkhepi adhikāro.
tika-s0104t:1148_4: Ālopanaṃ vilumpanaṃ ālopo. Sahasā karaṇaṃ sahasākāro. Sahasā pavattitā sāhasikā, sāva kiriyā tathā.
tika-s0104t:1149_1: pāṭhena. Antarabhedaṃ aggahetvā pāḷiyaṃ yathārutamāgatavaseneva chabbīsatisikkhāpadasaṅgahametaṃ
tika-s0104t:1149_2: sīlaṃ yebhuyyena sikkhāpadānamavibhattattā cūḷasīlaṃ nāmāti attho. Desanāvasena hi
tika-s0104t:1149_3: idha cūḷamajjhimādibhāvo veditabbo, na dhammavasena. Tathā hi idhasaṅkhittena uddiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1149_4: sikkhāpadānaṃ avibhattānaṃ vibhajanavasena majjhimasīladesanā pavattā, tenevāha “majjhimasīlaṃ
tika-s0104t:1151_1: nayo – yathāti opammatthe nipāto. Vāti vikappanatthe, tena imamatthaṃ vikappeti “ussāhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1151_2: katvā mama vaṇṇaṃ vadamānopi puthujjano pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1151_3: parānuddesikanayena vā sabbathāpi ācārasīlamattameva vadeyya, na taduttariṃ. “Yathāpaneke
tika-s0104t:1151_4: bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇabhāvaṃ paṭijānamānā, parehi ca tathā sambhāviyamānā tadanurūpapaṭipattiṃ
tika-s0104t:1151_5: ajānanato, asamatthanato ca na abhisambhuṇanti, na evamayaṃ. Ayaṃ pana samaṇo gotamo
tika-s0104t:1151_6: sabbathāpi samaṇasāruppapaṭipattiṃ pūresiyevā”ti evaṃ aññuddesikanayena vā sabbathāpi
tika-s0104t:1151_7: ācārasīlamattameva vadeyya, na taduttarinti. Panāti vacanālaṅkāre vikappanattheneva
tika-s0104t:1151_8: upanyāsādiatthassa sijjhanato. Eketi aññe. “Ekacce”tipi vadanti. Bhontoti sādhūnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1151_9: piyasamudāhāro. Sādhavo hi pare “bhonto”ti vā “devānaṃ piyā”ti vā “āyasmanto”ti vā
tika-s0104t:1151_10: samālapanti. Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti yaṃ kiñci pabbajjaṃ upagatatāya samaṇā. Jātimattena ca brāhmaṇāti.
tika-s0104t:1152_0: Saddhā nāma idha catubbidhesu ṭhānesūti āha “kammañcā”tiādi. Kammakammaphalasambandheneva
tika-s0104t:1152_1: idhalokaparalokasaddahanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “ettha kammaṃ vipaccati, kammaphalañca anubhavitabba”nti.
tika-s0104t:1152_2: Tadatthaṃ byatirekato ñāpeti “ayaṃ me”tiādinā. Paṭikarissatīti paccupakāraṃ karissati.
tika-s0104t:1152_3: Tadeva samatthetuṃ “evaṃdinnāni hī”tiādimāha. Desanāsīsamattaṃ padhānaṃ katvā nidassanato.
tika-s0104t:1152_4: Tena catubbidhampi paccayaṃ nidassetīti vuttaṃ “atthato panā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1153_0: “Seyyathida”nti ayaṃ saddo “so katamo”ti atthe eko nipāto, nipātasamudāyo vā, tena
tika-s0104t:1153_2: vibhajjitabbaṭṭhāne padhānabhūto viya paṭiniddisīyati. Añño hi saddakkamo añño atthakkamoti
tika-s0104t:1153_3: āha “katamo so bījagāmabhūtagāmo”ti. Tasmiñhi vibhatte tabbisayasamārambhopi vibhattova
tika-s0104t:1153_4: hoti. Imamatthañhi dassetuṃ “yassa samārambhaṃ anuyuttā viharantī”ti vuttaṃ. Teneva
tika-s0104t:1153_5: ca pāḷiyaṃ “mūlabīja”ntiādinā so niddiṭṭhoti. Mūlameva bījaṃ mūlabījaṃ, mūlaṃ bījaṃ
tika-s0104t:1153_6: etassātipi mūlabījanti idha dvidhā attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ato na codetabbametaṃ
tika-s0104t:1153_7: “kasmā panettha bījagāmabhūtagāmaṃ pucchitvā bījagāmo eva vibhatto”ti. Tattha hi
tika-s0104t:1153_8: paṭhamena atthena bījagāmo niddiṭṭho, dutiyena bhūtagāmo, duvidhopesa sāmaññaniddesena
tika-s0104t:1153_9: vā mūlabījañca mūlabījañca mūlabījanti ekasesanayena vā niddiṭṭhoti veditabbo, teneva
tika-s0104t:1153_10: vakkhati “sabbañheta”ntiādiṃ. Atīva visati bhesajjapayogesūti ativisaṃ, ativisā vā,
tika-s0104t:1153_11: yā “mahosadha”ntipi vuccati kacchakoti kāḷakacchako, yaṃ “pilakkho”tipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1153_12: Kapitthanoti ambilaṅkuraphalo setarukkho. So hi kampati calatīti kapithano thanapaccayena,
tika-s0104t:1153_13: kapīti vā makkaṭo, tassa thanasadisaṃ phalaṃ yassāti kapitthano. “Kapitthanoti pippalirukkho”ti
tika-s0104t:1153_14: hi visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Phaḷubījaṃ nāma pabbabījaṃ. Ajjakanti setapaṇṇāsaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1153_15: Phaṇijjakanti samīraṇaṃ. Hiriveranti vāraṃ. Paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā
tika-s0104t:1153_16: visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bījasaddoti dasseti “viruhanasamatthamevā”ti
tika-s0104t:1153_17: iminā. Itarañhi abījasaṅkhyaṃ gataṃ, tañca kho rukkhato viyojitameva. Aviyojitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1153_18: pana tathā vā hotu, aññathā vā “bhūtagāmo”tveva vuccati yathāvuttena dutiyaṭṭhena.
tika-s0104t:1153_19: Vinayā nurūpato tesaṃ visesaṃ dasseti “tatthā”tiādinā. Yamettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0104t:1154_0: 12. Sannidhānaṃ sannidhi, tāya karīyateti sannidhikāro, annapānādi. Evaṃ kāra-saddassa
tika-s0104t:1154_1: kammatthataṃ sandhāya “sannidhikāraparibhoga”nti vuttaṃ. Ayamaparo nayo – yathā “ācayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1154_2: gāmino”ti vattabbe anunāsikalopena “ācayagāmino”ti niddeso kato, evamidhāpi “sannidhikāraṃ
tika-s0104t:1154_4: katvā paribhoganti attho. Vinayavasenāti vinayāgatācāravasena. Vinayāgatācāro hi
tika-s0104t:1154_5: uttaralopena “vinayo”ti vutto, kāyavācānaṃ vā vinayanaṃ vinayo. Suttantanayapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0104t:1154_6: visuṃ gahitattā vinayācāroyeva idha labbhati. Sammā kilese likhatīti sallekhoti ca
tika-s0104t:1154_7: vinayācārassa visuṃ gahitattā suttantanayapaṭipatti eva. Paṭiggahitanti kāyena vā
tika-s0104t:1154_8: kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggahitaṃ. Aparajjūti aparasmiṃ divase. Datvāti parivattanavasena
tika-s0104t:1154_9: datvā. Ṭhapāpetvāti ca attano santakakaraṇena ṭhapāpetvā. Tesampi santakaṃ vissāsaggāhādivasena
tika-s0104t:1154_10: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Suttantanayavasena sallekho eva na hoti.
tika-s0104t:1155_0: Yāni ca tesaṃ anulomānīti ettha sānulomadhaññarasaṃ, madhukapuppharasaṃ, pakkaḍākarasañca
tika-s0104t:1155_1: ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbepi phalapupphapattarasā anulomapānānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, yathāparicchedakālaṃ
tika-s0104t:1156_0: Sannidhīyateti sannidhi, vatthameva. Pariyāyati kappīyatīti pariyāyo, kappiyavācānusārena
tika-s0104t:1156_1: paṭipatti, tassa kathāti pariyāyakathā. Tabbiparīto nippariyāyo, kappiyampi anupaggamma
tika-s0104t:1156_2: santuṭṭhivasena paṭipatti, pariyāya-saddo vā kāraṇe, tasmā kappiyakāraṇavasena vuttā
tika-s0104t:1156_3: kathā pariyāyakathā. Tadapi avatvā santuṭṭhivasena vuttā nippariyāyo. “Sace”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1156_4: aññassa dānākāradassanaṃ. Pāḷiyā uddisanaṃ uddeso. Atthassa pucchā paripucchanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1156_5: “Adātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti iminā adāne sallekhakopanaṃ dasseti. Appahonteti kātuṃ appahonake
tika-s0104t:1156_6: sati. Paccāsāyāti cīvarapaṭilābhāsāya. Anuññātakāleti anatthate kathine eko pacchimakattikamāso,
tika-s0104t:1156_7: atthate kathine pacchimakattikamāsena saha hemantikā cattāro māsā, piṭṭhisamaye yo
tika-s0104t:1156_8: koci eko māsoti evaṃ tatiyakathinasikkhāpadādīsu anuññātasamaye. Suttanti cīvarasibbanasuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1156_9: Vinayakammaṃ katvāti mūlacīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā paccāsācīvarameva
tika-s0104t:1156_10: mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ, taṃ puna māsaparihāraṃ labhati, etena upāyena yāva
tika-s0104t:1156_11: icchati, tāva aññamaññaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ labbhatīti vuttanayena, vikappanāvasena
tika-s0104t:1156_12: vā vinayakammaṃ katvā. Kasmā na vaṭṭatīti āha “sannidhi ca hoti sallekhañca kopetī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1157_0: Upari maṇḍapasadisaṃ padaracchannaṃ, sabbapaliguṇṭhimaṃ vā chādetvā kataṃ vayhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1157_1: Ubhosu passesu suvaṇṇarajatādimayā gopānasiyo datvā garuḷapakkhakanayena katā sandamānitā.
tika-s0104t:1157_2: Phalakādinā kataṃ pīṭhakayānaṃ sivikā. Antolikāsaṅkhātā paṭapoṭalikā pāṭaṅkī. “Ekabhikkhussa
tika-s0104t:1157_3: hī”tiādi tadatthassa samatthanaṃ. Araññatthāyāti araññagamanatthāya. Dhotapādakatthāyāti
tika-s0104t:1157_5: saṅghāṭā tathā, yugaḷabhūtā upāhanāti attho. Aññassa dātabbāti ettha vuttanayena dānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1158: Mañcoti nidassanamattaṃ. Sabbepi hi pīṭhabhisādayo nisīdanasayanayoggā gahetabbā tesupi tathāpaṭipajjitabbato.
tika-s0104t:1159_0: Ābādhapaccayā eva attanā paribhuñjitabbā gandhā vaṭṭantīti dasseti “kaṇḍukacchuchavidosādiābādhe
tika-s0104t:1159_1: satī”ti iminā. “Lakkhaṇe hi sati hetutthopi katthaci sambhavatī”ti heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
tika-s0104t:1159_2: Tattha kaṇḍūti khajju. Kacchūti vitacchikā. Chavidosoti kilāsādi. Āharāpetvāti ñātipavāritato
tika-s0104t:1159_3: bhikkhācāravattena vā na yena kenaci vā ākārena harāpetvā. Bhesajjapaccayehi gilānassa
tika-s0104t:1159_4: viññattipi vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi bhikkhave, gandhaṃ gahetvā kavāṭe pañcaṅgulikaṃ dātuṃ,
tika-s0104t:1159_5: pupphaṃ gahetvā vihāre ekamantaṃ nikkhipitu”nti vacanato “dvāre”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gharadhūpanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1159_6: vihāravāsanā, cetiyagharavāsanā vā. Ādi-saddena cetiyapaṭimāpūjādīni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t:1160_0: Kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisaṃ, yaṃ kiñci upabhogārahaṃ vatthu, tasmā yathāvuttānampi
tika-s0104t:1160_1: pasaṅgaṃ nivāretuṃ “vuttāvasesaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti āha, pārisesanayato gahitattā vuttāvasesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1160_2: daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo. Kiṃ panetanti vuttaṃ “seyyathida”ntiādi. Tathārūpe kāleti
tika-s0104t:1160_3: gāmaṃ pavisituṃ dukkarādikāle. Vallūroti sukkhamaṃsaṃ. Bhājana-saddo sappitelaguḷasaddehi
tika-s0104t:1160_4: yojetabbo tadavinābhāvittā. Kālassevāti pageva. Udakakaddameti udake ca kaddame ca.
tika-s0104t:1160_5: Nimitte cetaṃ bhummaṃ, bhāvalakkhaṇe vā. Acchathāti nisīdatha. Bhuñjantassevāti bhuñjato
tika-s0104t:1160_6: eva bhikkhuno, sampadānavacanaṃ, anādaratthe vā sāmivacanaṃ. Kiriyantarāvacchedanayogena
tika-s0104t:1160_7: hettha anādaratā. Gīvāyāmakanti bhāvanapuṃsakavacanaṃ, gīvaṃ āyametvā āyataṃ katvāti
tika-s0104t:1160_8: attho, yathā vā bhutte atibhuttatāya gīvā āyamitabbā hoti, tathātipi vaṭṭati. Catumāsampīti
tika-s0104t:1160_9: vassānassa cattāro māsepi. Kuṭumbaṃ vuccati dhanaṃ, tadassatthīti kuṭumbiko, muṇḍo
tika-s0104t:1160_10: ca so kuṭumbiko cāti muṇḍakuṭumbiko, tassa jīvikaṃ tathā, taṃ katvā jīvatīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1161_2: vuttaṃ. “Ekā taṇḍulanāḷī”ti vuttattā pana tassā catubhāgo ekapatthoti vadanti. Vuttañca –
tika-s0104t:1162: “Kuḍuvo pasato eko, pattho te caturo siyuṃ;
tika-s0104t:1163: Āḷhako caturo patthā, doṇaṃ vā caturāḷhaka”nti.
tika-s0104t:1164_0: Kasmāti vuttaṃ “te hī”tiādi. Āharāpetvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, pageva yathāladdhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1164_1: “Aphāsukakāle”tiādinā suddhacittena ṭhapitassa paribhogo sallekhaṃ na kopetīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1164_2: Sammutikuṭikādayo catasso, avāsāgārabhūtena vā uposathāgārādinā saha pañcakuṭiyo
tika-s0104t:1164_3: sandhāya “kappiyakuṭiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sannidhi nāma natthi tattha antovutthaantopakkassa
tika-s0104t:1164_4: anuññātattā. “Tathāgatassā”tiādinā adhikārānurūpaṃ atthaṃ payojeti. Pilotikakhaṇḍanti jiṇṇacoḷakhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1165_0: 13. “Gīvaṃ pasāretvā”ti etena sayameva āpāthagamane doso natthīti dasseti. Ettakampīti
tika-s0104t:1165_2: Yassa pana padassa vitthārakathaṃ vinā na sakkā attho viññātuṃ, tattha vitthārakathāpi
tika-s0104t:1166_0: Kutūhalavasena pekkhitabbato pekkhaṃ, naṭasatthavidhinā payogo. Naṭasamūhena pana
tika-s0104t:1166_1: janasamūhe kattabbavasena “naṭasammajja”nti vuttaṃ. Janānaṃ sammadde samūhe katanti
tika-s0104t:1166_3: tesaṃ mate attho. Bhāratanāmakānaṃ dvebhātukarājūnaṃ, rāmarañño ca yujjhanādikaṃ
tika-s0104t:1166_4: tappasutehi ācikkhitabbato akkhānaṃ. Gantumpi na vaṭṭati, pageva taṃ sotuṃ. Pāṇinā
tika-s0104t:1166_5: tāḷitabbaṃ saraṃ pāṇissaranti āha “kaṃsatāḷa”nti, lohamayo tūriyajātiviseso kaṃso,
tika-s0104t:1166_6: lohamayapatto vā, tassa tāḷanasaddanti attho. Pāṇīnaṃ tāḷanasaranti atthaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:1166_7: pāṇitāḷantipi vadanti. Ghanasaṅkhātānaṃ tūriyavisesānaṃ tāḷanaṃ ghanatāḷaṃ nāma,
tika-s0104t:1166_8: daṇḍamayasammatāḷaṃ silātalākatāḷaṃ vā. Mantenāti bhūtāvisanamantena. Eketi sārasamāsācariyā,
tika-s0104t:1166_9: uttaravihāravāsino ca, yathā cettha, evamito paresupi “eke”ti āgataṭṭhānesu. Te kira
tika-s0104t:1166_11: kenaci caturassaambaṇaṃ katvā catūsu passesu dhammena onaddhitvā vāditabhaṇḍassa
tika-s0104t:1166_13: tasseva nāmaṃ. Tathā kumbhasaṇṭhānatāya kumbho, ghaṭoyeva vā, tassa dhunananti khuddakabhāṇakā.
tika-s0104t:1166_14: Abbhokkiraṇaṃ raṅgabalikaraṇaṃ. Te hi naccaṭṭhāne devatānaṃ balikaraṇaṃ nāma katvā
tika-s0104t:1166_16: sobhanakaraṇato sobhanakaraṃ nāma. “Sobhanagharaka”nti sārasamāse vuttaṃ. Caṇḍāya
tika-s0104t:1166_17: alanti caṇḍālaṃ, ayoguḷakīḷā. Caṇḍālā nāma hīnajātikā sunakhamaṃsabhojino, tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1166_18: idanti caṇḍālaṃ. Sāṇe udakena temetvā aññamaññaṃ ākoṭanakīḷā sāṇadhovanakīḷā. Vaṃsena
tika-s0104t:1166_19: kataṃ kīḷanaṃ vaṃsanti āha “veḷuṃ ussāpetvā kīḷana”nti.
tika-s0104t:1167_0: Nikhaṇitvāti bhūmiyaṃ nikhātaṃ katvā. Nakkhattakāleti nakkhattayogachaṇakāle. Tamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1167_2: aṭṭhidhovane. Indajālenāti aṭṭhidhovanamantaṃ parijappetvā yathā pare aṭṭhīniyeva
tika-s0104t:1167_3: passanti, na maṃsādīni, evaṃ maṃsādīnamantaradhāpanamāyāya. Indassa jālamiva hi paṭicchādituṃ
tika-s0104t:1167_4: samatthanato “indajāla”nti māyā vuccati indacāpādayo viya. Aṭṭhidhovananti aṭṭhidhovanakīḷā.
tika-s0104t:1168_0: Hatthiādīhi saddhiṃ yujjhitunti hatthiādīsu abhiruhitvā aññehi saddhiṃ yujjhanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1168_1: hatthiādīhi ca saddhiṃ sayameva yujjhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, hatthiādīhi saddhiṃ aññehi
tika-s0104t:1168_2: yujjhituṃ, sayaṃ vā yujjhitunti hi attho. Teti hatthiādayo. Aññamaññaṃ mathenti vilothentīti
tika-s0104t:1168_3: mallā, bāhuyuddhakārakā, tesaṃ yuddhaṃ. Sampahāroti saṅgāmo. Balassa senāya aggaṃ
tika-s0104t:1168_4: gaṇanakoṭṭhāsaṃ karonti etthāti balaggaṃ, “ettakā hatthī, ettakā assā”tiādinā balagaṇanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1168_5: Senaṃ viyūhanti ettha vibhajitvā ṭhapenti, senāya vā ettha byūhanaṃ vinyāsoti senābyūho,
tika-s0104t:1168_6: “ito hatthī hontu, ito assā hontū”tiādinā yuddhatthaṃ caturaṅgabalāya senāya desavisesesu
tika-s0104t:1168_7: vicāraṇaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ pana bhedato sakaṭabyūhādivasena. Ādi-saddena cakkapadumabyūhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1168_8: daṇḍabhogamaṇḍalāsaṃhatabyūhānañca gahaṇaṃ, “tayo hatthī pacchimaṃ hatthānīkaṃ, tayo
tika-s0104t:1168_9: assā pacchimaṃ assānīkaṃ, tayo rathā pacchimaṃ rathānīkaṃ, cattāro purisā sarahatthā
tika-s0104t:1168_10: pattī pacchimaṃ pattānīka”nti kaṇḍaviddhasikkhāpadassa padabhājanaṃ sandhāya “tayo…pe…ādinā
tika-s0104t:1168_11: nayena vuttassā”ti āha. Tañca kho “dvādasapuriso hatthī, tipuriso asso, catupuriso
tika-s0104t:1168_12: ratho, cattāro purisā sarahatthā pattī”ti vuttalakkhaṇato hatthiādigaṇanenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1168_13: etena ca “cha hatthiniyo, eko ca hatthī idameka”nti cammakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttamanīkaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0104t:1169_0: 14. Kāraṇaṃ nāma phalassa ṭhānanti vuttaṃ “pamādo…pe… ṭhāna”nti. Padānīti sārīādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1169_1: patiṭṭhānāni. Aṭṭhāpadanti saññāya dīghatā. “Aṭṭhapada”ntipi paṭhanti. Dasapadaṃ
tika-s0104t:1169_2: nāma dvīhi pantīti vīsatiyā padehi kīḷanajūtaṃ. Aṭṭhapadadasapadesūti aṭṭhapadadasapadaphalakesu.
tika-s0104t:1169_3: Ākāseyeva kīḷananti “ayaṃ sārī asukapadaṃ mayā nītā, ayaṃ asukapada”nti kevalaṃ mukheneva
tika-s0104t:1169_4: vadantānaṃ ākāseyeva jūtassa kīḷanaṃ. Nānāpathamaṇḍalanti anekavihitasārīmaggaparivaṭṭaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1169_5: Pariharitabbanti sāriyo pariharituṃ yuttakaṃ. Ito cito ca saranti parivattantīti
tika-s0104t:1169_6: sāriyo, yena kenaci katāni akkhabījāni. Tatthāti tāsu sārīsu, tasmiṃ vā apanayanupanayane.
tika-s0104t:1169_7: Jūtakhaliketi jūtamaṇḍale. “Jūtaphalake”tipi adhunā pāṭho. Pāsakaṃ vuccati chasu
tika-s0104t:1169_8: passesu ekekaṃ yāva chakkaṃ dassetvā katakīḷanakaṃ, taṃ vaḍḍhetvā yathāladdhaṃ ekakādivasena
tika-s0104t:1169_9: sāriyo apanento, upanento ca kīḷanti, pasati aṭṭhapadādīsu bādhati, phusati cāti
tika-s0104t:1169_10: hi pāsako, catubbīsatividho akkho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:1173_0: Tena kīḷanamidha pāsakakīḷanaṃ. Ghaṭanaṃ paharaṇaṃ, tena kīḷā ghaṭikāti āha “dīghadaṇḍakenā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1173_1: Ghaṭena kumbhena kīḷā ghaṭikāti eke. Mañjiṭṭhikāya vāti mañjiṭṭhisaṅkhātassa yojanavallirukkhassa
tika-s0104t:1173_2: sāraṃ gahetvā pakkakasāvaṃ sandhāya vadati. Sitthodakena vāti [piṭṭhodakena vā (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)]
tika-s0104t:1173_3: ca pakkamadhusitthodakaṃ. Salākahatthanti tālahīrādīnaṃ kalāpassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1173_4: Bahūsu salākāsu visesarahitaṃ ekaṃ salākaṃ gahetvā tāsu pakkhipitvā puna taññeva
tika-s0104t:1173_5: uddharantā salākahatthena kīḷantīti keci. Guḷakīḷāti guḷaphalakīḷā, yena kenaci vā
tika-s0104t:1173_6: kataguḷakīḷā. Paṇṇena vaṃsākārena katā nāḷikā paṇṇanāḷikā, tenevāha “taṃdhamantā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1173_7: Khuddake ka-paccayoti dasseti “khuddakanaṅgala”nti iminā. Hatthapādānaṃ mokkhena
tika-s0104t:1173_8: mocanena cayati parivattati etāyāti mokkhacikā, tenāha “ākāse vā”tiādi. Paribbhamanattāyeva
tika-s0104t:1174_0: Paṇṇena katā nāḷi paṇṇanāḷi, iminā pattāḷhakapadadvayassa yathākkamaṃ pariyāyaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1174_1: Tena katā pana kīḷā pattāḷhakāti vuttaṃ “tāyā”tiādi. Khuddako ratho rathako ka-saddassa
tika-s0104t:1174_2: khuddakatthavacanato. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Ākāse vā yaṃ ñāpeti, tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1174_3: vā yathā vā tathā vā akkharaṃ likhitvā “evamida”nti jānanena kīḷā akkharikā, pucchantassa
tika-s0104t:1174_4: mukhāgataṃ akkharaṃ gahetvā naṭṭhamuttilābhādijānanakīḷātipi vadanti. Vajja-saddo
tika-s0104t:1174_5: aparādhatthoti āha “yathāvajjaṃ nāmā”tiādi. Vāditānurūpaṃ naccanaṃ, gāyanaṃ vā yathāvajjantipi
tika-s0104t:1174_6: vadanti. “Evaṃ kate jayo bhavissati, evaṃ kate parājayo”ti jayaparājayaṃ purakkhatvā
tika-s0104t:1174_8: ca vaṃsādīhi kattabbā kiccasiddhi, asiddhi cāti jayaparājayāvaho payogo vutto, yathāvajjanti
tika-s0104t:1174_9: ca kāṇādīhi sadisākāradassanehi jayaparājayavasena jūtakīḷikabhāvena vuttaṃ. Sabbepi
tika-s0104t:1174_10: hete jotenti pakāsenti etehi tappayogikā jayaparājayavasena, javanti ca gacchanti
tika-s0104t:1174_11: jayaparājayaṃ etehīti vā atthena jūtasaddavacanīyataṃ nātivattanti.
tika-s0104t:1175_1: atikkantāsanaṃ. Kammavasena payojanato “anuyuttā viharantīti padaṃ apekkhitvā”ti
tika-s0104t:1175_2: vuttaṃ. Vāḷarūpānīti āharimāni sīhabyagghādivāḷarūpāni. Vuttañhi bhikkhunivibhaṅge
tika-s0104t:1175_3: “pallaṅko nāma āharimehi vāḷehi kato”ti “akappiyarūpākulo akappiyamañco pallaṅko”ti
tika-s0104t:1175_4: sārasamāse vuttaṃ. Dīghalomako mahākojavoti caturaṅgulādhikalomo kāḷavaṇṇo mahākojavo.
tika-s0104t:1175_5: Kuvuccati pathavī, tassaṃ javati sobhanavitthaṭavasenāti kojavo. “Caturaṅgulādhikāni
tika-s0104t:1175_6: kira tassa lomānī”ti vacanato caturaṅgulato heṭṭhā vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Uddalomī ekantalomīti
tika-s0104t:1175_7: visesadassanametaṃ, tasmā yadi tāsu na pavisati, vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ. Vānavicittanti
tika-s0104t:1175_8: bhitticchadādiākārena vānena sibbanena vicitraṃ. Uṇṇāmayattharaṇanti migalomapakatamattharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1175_11: lohitattharaṇo”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Āmalakapattākārāhi pupphapantīhi yebhuyyato
tika-s0104t:1176_0: Tiṇṇaṃ tūlānanti rukkhatūlalatātūlapoṭakītūlasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tūlānaṃ. Uditaṃ dvīsu
tika-s0104t:1176_1: lomaṃ dasā yassāti uddalomī i-kārassa akāraṃ, ta-kārassa lopaṃ, dvibhāvañca katvā.
tika-s0104t:1176_2: Ekasmiṃ ante lomaṃ dasā yassāti ekantalomī. Ubhayattha kecīti sārasamāsācariyā, uttaravihāravāsino
tika-s0104t:1176_3: ca. Tesaṃ vāde pana uditamekato uggataṃ lomamayaṃ pupphaṃ yassāti uddalomī vuttanayena.
tika-s0104t:1176_4: Ubhato antato ekaṃ sadisaṃ lomamayaṃ pupphaṃ yassāti ekantalomīti vacanattho. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1176_5: pana “uddalomīti ekato uggatalomaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. ‘Uddhalomī’tipi pāṭho. Ekantalomīti
tika-s0104t:1176_6: ubhato uggatalomaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇa”nti vuttaṃ, nāmamattamesa viseso. Atthato pana
tika-s0104t:1177_0: Koseyyañca kaṭṭissañca kaṭṭissāni virūpekasesavasena. Tehi pakatamattharaṇaṃ kaṭṭissaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1177_2: suvaṇṇamayasuttāni pavesetvā vītamattharaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Suvaṇṇasuttaṃ kira “kaṭṭissaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1177_4: vuttaṃ. Kaṭṭissaṃ nāma vākavisesotipi vadanti. Ratanaparisibbitanti ratanehi saṃsibbitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1177_5: suvaṇṇalittanti keci. Suddhakoseyyanti ratanaparisibbanarahitaṃ. Vinayeti vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1177_6: vinayapariyāyaṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ. Idha hi suttantikapariyāye “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ
tika-s0104t:1177_7: sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vinayapariyāyaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:1177_8: patvā garuke ṭhātabbattā suddhakoseyyameva vaṭṭati, netarānīti vinicchayo veditabbo,
tika-s0104t:1177_9: suttantikapariyāye pana ratanaparisibbanarahitāpi tūlikā na vaṭṭati, itarāni vaṭṭanti,
tika-s0104t:1177_10: sacepi tāni ratanaparisibbitāni, bhūmattharaṇavasena yathānurūpaṃ mañcapīṭhādīsu
tika-s0104t:1177_11: ca upanetuṃ vaṭṭantīti. Suttantadesanāya gahaṭṭhānampi vasena vuttattā tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1177_12: “ṭhapetvā…pe… na vaṭṭantīti vutta”nti apare. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyanti katthaci pāṭho,
tika-s0104t:1177_13: porāṇadīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyanti attho. Naccayogganti naccituṃ pahonakaṃ. Karonti
tika-s0104t:1177_14: ettha naccanti kuttakaṃ, taṃ pana uddalomīekantalomīvisesameva. Vuttañca –
tika-s0104t:1180_0: Hatthino piṭṭhiyaṃ attharaṃ hatthattharaṃ. Evaṃ sesapadesupi. Ajinacammehīti ajinamigacammehi,
tika-s0104t:1180_1: tāni kira cammāni sukhumatarāni, tasmā dupaṭṭatipaṭṭāni katvā sibbanti. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1180_2: “ajinappaveṇī”ti, uparūpari ṭhapetvā sibbanavasena hi santatibhūtā “paveṇī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1180_3: Kadalīmigoti mañjārākāramigo, tassa dhammena kataṃ pavarapaccattharaṇaṃ tathā. “Taṃ
tika-s0104t:1180_4: kirā”tiādi tadākāradassanaṃ, tasmā suddhameva kadalīmigacammaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1180_5: Uttaraṃ uparibhāgaṃ chādetīti uttaracchado, vitānaṃ. Tampi lohitameva idhādhippetanti
tika-s0104t:1180_6: āha “rattavitānenā”ti. “Yaṃ vattati, taṃ sauttaraccheda”nti ettha seso, saṃsibbitabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1180_7: saddhiṃ vattatīti attho. Rattavitānesu ca kāsāvaṃ vaṭṭati, kusumbhādirattameva na
tika-s0104t:1180_8: vaṭṭati, tañca kho sabbarattameva. Yaṃ pana nānāvaṇṇaṃ vānacittaṃ vā lepacittaṃ vā,
tika-s0104t:1180_9: taṃ vaṭṭati. Paccattharaṇasseva padhānattā tappaṭibaddhaṃ setavitānampi na vaṭṭatīti
tika-s0104t:1180_10: vuttaṃ. Ubhatoti ubhayattha mañcassa sīsabhāge, pādabhāge cāti attho. Etthāpi sauttaracchade
tika-s0104t:1180_11: viya vinicchayo. Padumavaṇṇaṃ vāti nātirattaṃ sandhāyāha. Vicitraṃ vāti pana sabbathā
tika-s0104t:1180_12: kappiyattā vuttaṃ, na pana ubhato upadhānesu akappiyattā. Na hi lohitaka-saddo citte
tika-s0104t:1180_13: vaṭṭati. Paṭalikaggahaṇeneva cittakassāpi attharaṇassa saṅgahetabbappasaṅgato. Sace
tika-s0104t:1180_14: pamāṇayuttanti vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekato samatthetuṃ āha “mahāupadhānaṃ pana paṭikkhitta”nti.
tika-s0104t:1180_15: Mahāupadhānanti ca pamāṇātikkantaṃ upadhānaṃ. Sīsappamāṇameva hi tassa pamāṇaṃ. Vuttañca
tika-s0104t:1180_16: “anujānāmi bhikkhave, sīsappamāṇaṃ bibbohanaṃ kātu”nti sīsappamāṇañca nāma yassa
tika-s0104t:1180_17: vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ miniyamānaṃ vidatthi ceva caturaṅgulañca
tika-s0104t:1180_18: hoti. Bibbohanassa majjhaṭṭhānaṃ tiriyato muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti, dīghato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1180_19: vā dviratanaṃ vā. Taṃ pana akappiyattāyeva paṭikkhittaṃ, na tu uccāsayanamahāsayanapariyāpannattā.
tika-s0104t:1180_20: Dvepīti sīsūpadhānaṃ, pādūpadhānañca. Paccattharaṇaṃ datvāti paccattharaṇaṃ katvā
tika-s0104t:1180_21: attharitvāti attho, idañca gilānameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1180_22: “agilānassāpi sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti dvayameva vaṭṭati. Gilānassa bibbohanāni
tika-s0104t:1180_23: santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ katvā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanayenevāti vinaye
tika-s0104t:1180_24: bhagavatā vuttanayeneva. Kathaṃ pana vuttanti āha “vuttañheta”ntiādi. Yathā aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ
tika-s0104t:1180_25: hoti, evaṃ āsandiyā pādacchindanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pallaṅkassa pana āharimāni vāḷarūpāni
tika-s0104t:1180_26: āharitvā puna appaṭibaddhatākāraṇampi bhedanameva. Vijaṭetvāti jaṭaṃ nibbedhetvā.
tika-s0104t:1180_27: Bibbohanaṃ kātunti tāni vijaṭitatūlāni anto pakkhipitvā bibbohanaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0104t:1181_1: nikkhantattāti ca kāraṇaṃ dasseti, tenevāyamattho sijjhati “anekadivasāni antosayanahetu
tika-s0104t:1181_2: esa gandho”ti. Ucchādenti ubbaṭṭenti. Saṇṭhānasampādanatthanti susaṇṭhānatāsampādanatthaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1182_0: Tesaṃyeva dārakānanti puññavantānameva dārakānaṃ. Tesameva hi pakaraṇānurūpatāya
tika-s0104t:1182_1: gahaṇaṃ. Mahāmallānanti mahataṃ bāhuyuddhakārakānaṃ. Ādāso nāma maṇḍanakapakatikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1182_2: manussānaṃ attano mukhachāyāpassanatthaṃ kaṃsalohādīhi kato bhaṇḍaviseso. Tādisaṃ
tika-s0104t:1182_3: sandhāya “yaṃ kiñci…pe… na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Alaṅkārañjanameva na bhesajjañjanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1182_4: Maṇḍanānuyogassa hi adhippetattā tamidhānadhippetaṃ. Loke mālā-saddo baddhamālāyameva
tika-s0104t:1182_5: “mālā mālyaṃ pupphadāme”ti vacanato. Sāsane pana suddhapupphesupi niruḷhoti āha “abaddhamālā
tika-s0104t:1182_6: vā”ti. Kāḷapīḷakādīnanti kāḷavaṇṇapīḷakādīnaṃ. Mattikakakkanti osadhehi abhisaṅkhataṃ
tika-s0104t:1182_7: yogamattikācuṇṇaṃ. Dentīti vilepenti. Caliteti vikārāpajjanavasena calanaṃ patte,
tika-s0104t:1182_8: kupiteti attho. Tenāti sāsapakakkena. Doseti kāḷapīḷakādīnaṃ hetubhūte lohitadose.
tika-s0104t:1182_9: Khāditeti apanayanavasena khādite. Sannisinneti tādise duṭṭhalohite parikkhīṇe. Mukhacuṇṇakenāti
tika-s0104t:1182_11: mukhacuṇṇaṃ, mukhavilepanañca na vaṭṭati. Atthānukkamasambhavato hi ayaṃ padadvayassa
tika-s0104t:1182_12: vaṇṇanā. Mukhacuṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ mukhavilepananti vā padadvayassa tulyādhikaraṇavasena atthavibhāvanā.
tika-s0104t:1183_0: Hatthabandhanti hatthe bandhitabbamābharaṇaṃ, taṃ pana saṅkhakapālādayoti āha “hatthe”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1183_1: Saṅkho eva kapālaṃ tathā. “Apare”tiādinā yathākkamaṃ “sikhābandha”ntiādi padānamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1183_2: saṃvaṇṇeti. Tattha sikhanti cūḷaṃ. Cīrakaṃ nāma yena cūḷāya thirakaraṇatthaṃ, sobhanatthañca
tika-s0104t:1183_3: vijjhati. Muttāya, muttā eva vā latā muttālatā, muttāvaḷi. Daṇḍo nāma catuhatthoti
tika-s0104t:1183_4: vuttaṃ “catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ vā”ti. Alaṅkatadaṇḍakanti pana tato omakaṃ rathayaṭṭhiādikaṃ
tika-s0104t:1183_5: sandhāyāha. Bhesajjanāḷikanti bhesajjatumbaṃ. Pattādiolambanaṃ vāmaṃseyeva aciṇṇanti
tika-s0104t:1183_6: vuttaṃ “vāmapasse olaggita”nti. Kaṇṇikā nāma kūṭaṃ, tāya ca ratanena ca parikkhitto
tika-s0104t:1183_7: koso yassa tathā. Pañcavaṇṇasuttasibbitanti nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhavasena pañcavaṇṇehi
tika-s0104t:1183_8: suttehi sibbitaṃ tividhampi chattaṃ. Ratanamattāyāmaṃ caturaṅgulavitthatanti tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1183_9: paricayaniyāmena vā nalāṭe bandhituṃ pahonakappamāṇena vā vuttaṃ. “Kesantaparicchedaṃ
tika-s0104t:1183_10: dassetvā”ti etena tadanajjhottharaṇavasena bandhanākāraṃ dasseti. Meghamukheti abbhantare.
tika-s0104t:1183_11: “Maṇi”nti idaṃ siromaṇiṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “cūḷāmaṇi”nti, cūḷāyaṃ maṇinti attho.
tika-s0104t:1183_12: Camarassa ayaṃ cāmaro, sveva vālo, tena katā bījanī cāmaravālabījanī. Aññāsaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:1184_0: 17. Duggatito, saṃsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṃ, saggamaggo, mokkhamaggo ca.
tika-s0104t:1184_1: Taṃ niyyānamarahati, tasmiṃ vā niyyāne niyuttā, taṃ vā niyyānaṃ phalabhūtaṃ etissāti
tika-s0104t:1184_2: niyyānikā, vacīduccaritakilesato niyyātīti vā niyyānikā ī-kārassa rassattaṃ, ya-kārassa
tika-s0104t:1184_3: ca ka-kāraṃ katvā. Anīya-saddo hi bahulā katvatthābhidhāyako. Cetanāya saddhiṃ samphappalāpavirati
tika-s0104t:1184_4: idha adhippetā. Tappaṭipakkhato aniyyānikā, samphappalāpo, tassā bhāvo aniyyānikattaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1184_5: tasmā aniyyānikattā. Tiracchānabhūtāti tirokaraṇabhūtā vibandhanabhūtā. Sopi nāmāti
tika-s0104t:1184_6: ettha nāma-saddo garahāyaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānabhāveti aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttattā catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāve.
tika-s0104t:1184_7: Kāmassādavasenāti kāmasaṅkhātaassādavasena. Saha atthenāti sātthakaṃ, hitapaṭisaṃyuttanti
tika-s0104t:1184_8: attho. Upāhanāti yānakathāsambandhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Suṭṭhu nivesitabboti suniviṭṭho.
tika-s0104t:1184_9: Tathā dunniviṭṭho. Gāma-saddena gāmavāsī janopi gahitoti āha “asukagāmavāsino”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1185_0: Sūrakathāti ettha sūra-saddo vīravācakoti dasseti “sūro ahosī”ti iminā. Visikhā nāma
tika-s0104t:1185_1: maggasanniveso, idha pana visikhāgahaṇena tannivāsinopi gahitā “sabbo gāmo āgato”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1186_0: Kumbhassa ṭhānaṃ nāma udakaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “udakaṭṭhānakathā”ti. Udakatitthakathātipi
tika-s0104t:1186_1: vuccati tattheva samavarodhato. Apica kumbhassa karaṇaṭṭhānaṃ kumbhaṭṭhānaṃ. Tadapadesena
tika-s0104t:1186_2: pana kumbhadāsiyo vuttāti dasseti “kumbhadāsikathā vā”ti iminā. Pubbe petā kālaṅkatāti
tika-s0104t:1186_3: pubbapetā. “Peto pareto kālaṅkato”ti hi pariyāyavacanaṃ. Heṭṭhā vuttanayamatidisituṃ
tika-s0104t:1187_0: Purimapacchimakathāhi vimuttāti idhāgatāhi purimāhi, pacchimāhi ca kathāhi vimuttā.
tika-s0104t:1187_1: Nānāsabhāvāti atta-saddassa sabhāvapariyāyabhāvamāha. Asukena nāmāti pajāpatinā brahmunā,
tika-s0104t:1187_2: issarena vā. Uppattiṭhitisambhārādivasena lokaṃ akkhāyati etāyāti lokakkhāyikā, sā
tika-s0104t:1187_3: pana lokāyatasamaññe vitaṇḍasatthe nissitā sallāpakathāti dasseti “lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā”ti
tika-s0104t:1187_4: iminā. Lokā bālajanā āyatanti ettha ussahanti vādassādenāti lokāyataṃ, loko vā hitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1187_5: na yatati na īhati tenāti lokāyataṃ. Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi
tika-s0104t:1187_6: na uppādenti. Aññamaññaviruddhaṃ, saggamokkhaviruddhaṃ vā kathaṃ tanonti etthāti
tika-s0104t:1187_7: vitaṇḍo, viruddhena vā vādadaṇḍena tāḷenti ettha vādinoti vitaṇḍo, sabbattha niruttinayena padasiddhi.
tika-s0104t:1188_0: Sāgaradevena khatoti ettha sāgararañño puttehi khatotipi vadanti. Vijjati pavedanahetubhūtā
tika-s0104t:1188_1: muddhā yassāti samuddo dha-kārassa da-kāraṃ katvā, saha-saddo cettha vijjamānatthavācako
tika-s0104t:1188_2: “salomakosapakkhako”tiādīsu viya. Bhavoti vuddhi bhavati vaḍḍhatīti katvā. Vibhavoti
tika-s0104t:1188_3: hāni tabbirahato. Dvandato pubbe suyyamāno itisaddo paccekaṃ yojetabboti āha “iti
tika-s0104t:1188_4: bhavo iti abhavo”ti. Yaṃ vā taṃ vāti yaṃ kiñci, atha taṃ aniyamanti attho. Abhūtañhi
tika-s0104t:1188_5: aniyamatthaṃ saha vikappena yaṃtaṃ-saddehi dīpenti ācariyā. Apica bhavoti sassato.
tika-s0104t:1188_6: Abhavoti ucchedo. Bhavoti vā kāmasukhaṃ. Abhavoti attakilamatho.
tika-s0104t:1189_0: Iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā nāma
tika-s0104t:1189_1: honti. Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā iti-saddena
tika-s0104t:1189_2: saṅgahetvā battiṃsa tiracchānakathāti vuccanti. Pāḷiyañhi “iti vā”ti ettha iti-saddo
tika-s0104t:1189_3: pakārattho, vā-saddo vikappanattho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “evaṃpakāraṃ, ito aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ
tika-s0104t:1189_4: niratthakakathaṃ anuyuttā viharantī”ti, ādiattho vā iti-saddo iti vā iti evarūpā
tika-s0104t:1189_5: “naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu viya, iti evamādiṃ aññampi tādisaṃ
tika-s0104t:1190_0: 18. Viruddhassa gahaṇaṃ viggaho, so yesanti viggāhikā, tesaṃ tathā, viruddhaṃ vā
tika-s0104t:1190_1: gaṇhāti etāyāti viggāhikā, sāyeva kathā tathā. Sārambhakathāti upārambhakathā. Sahitanti
tika-s0104t:1190_2: pubbāparāviruddhaṃ. Tatoyeva siliṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ pana atthakāraṇayuttatāyāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:1190_3: “atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttanti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Nti vacanaṃ. Parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ sapattagato
tika-s0104t:1190_4: asamattho yodho viya na kiñci jānāsi, kintu sayameva parājesīti adhippāyo. Vādo dosoti
tika-s0104t:1190_5: pariyāyavacanaṃ. Tathā cara vicarāti. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ācariyakule.
tika-s0104t:1191_0: 19. Dūtassa kammaṃ dūteyyaṃ, tassa kathā tathā, tassaṃ. Idha, amutrāti upayogatthe
tika-s0104t:1191_1: bhummavacanaṃ, tenāha “asukaṃ nāma ṭhāna”nti. Vitthārato vinicchayo vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1191_2: vuttoti saṅkhepato idha dassetuṃ “saṅkhepato panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gihisāsananti yathāvuttaviparītaṃ
tika-s0104t:1192_1: Vimhāpayantīti “ayamacchariyapuriso”ti attani paresaṃ vimhayaṃ sampahaṃsanaṃ acchariyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1192_2: uppādenti. Vipubbañhi mhi-saddaṃ sampahaṃsane vadanti saddavidū. Sampahaṃsanākāro
tika-s0104t:1192_3: ca acchariyaṃ. Lapantīti attānaṃ vā dāyakaṃ vā ukkhipitvā yathā so kiñci dadāti,
tika-s0104t:1192_4: evaṃ ukkācetvā ukkhipanavasena dīpetvā kathenti. Nimittaṃ sīlametesanti nemittikāti
tika-s0104t:1192_5: taddhitavasena tassīlattho yathā “paṃsukūliko”ti apica nimittena vadanti, nimittaṃ
tika-s0104t:1192_6: vā karontīti nemittikā. Nimittanti ca paresaṃ paccayadānasaññuppādakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ
tika-s0104t:1192_7: vuccati. Nippeso nippisanaṃ cuṇṇaṃ viya karaṇaṃ. Nippisantīti vā nippesā, nippesāyeva
tika-s0104t:1192_8: nippesikā, nippisanaṃ vā nippeso, taṃ karontītipi nippesikā. Nippeso ca nāma bhaṭapuriso
tika-s0104t:1192_10: ito lābhena amutra lābhaṃ. Nijigīsanti magganti pariyesantīti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Kuhakādayo
tika-s0104t:1192_11: saddā kuhānādīni nimittaṃ katvā taṃsamaṅgipuggalesu pavattāti āha “kuhanā…pe… adhivacana”nti.
tika-s0104t:1195_0: 21. Aṅgāni ārabbha pavattattā aṅgasahacaritaṃ satthaṃ “aṅga”nti vuttaṃ uttarapadalopena
tika-s0104t:1195_1: vā. Nimittanti etthāpi eseva nayo, tenāha “hatthapādādīsū”tiādi. Keci pana “aṅganti
tika-s0104t:1195_2: aṅgavikāraṃ paresaṃ aṅgavikāradassanenāpi lābhālābhādivijānana”nti vadanti. Nimittasatthanti
tika-s0104t:1195_3: nimittena sañjānanappakāradīpakaṃ satthaṃ, taṃ vatthunā vibhāvetuṃ “paṇḍurājā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1195_4: Paṇḍurājāti ca “dakkhiṇārāmādhipati” icceva vuttaṃ. Sīhaḷadīpe dakkhiṇārāmanāmakassa
tika-s0104t:1195_5: saṅghārāmassa kārakoti vadanti. “Dakkhiṇamadhurādhipatī”ti ca katthaci likhitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1195_6: dakkhiṇamadhuranagarassa adhipatīti attho. Muttāyoti muttikā. Muṭṭhiyāti hatthamuddāya.
tika-s0104t:1195_7: Gharagolikāyāti sarabunā. So “muttā”ti saññānimittenāha, saṅkhyānimittena pana “tisso”ti.
tika-s0104t:1196_0: “Mahantāna”nti etena appakaṃ nimittameva, mahantaṃ pana uppādoti nimittuppādānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1196_1: visesaṃ dasseti. Uppatitanti uppatanaṃ. Subhāsubhaphalaṃ pakāsento uppajjati gacchatīti
tika-s0104t:1196_2: uppādo, uppātopi, subhāsubhasūcikā bhūtavikati. So hi dhūmo viya aggissa kammaphalassa
tika-s0104t:1196_3: pakāsanamattameva karoti, na tu tamuppādetīti. Idanti idaṃ nāma phalaṃ. Evanti iminā
tika-s0104t:1196_4: nāma ākārena. Ādisantīti niddisanti. Pubbaṇhasamayeti kālavasena. Idaṃ nāmāti vatthuvasena
tika-s0104t:1196_5: vadati. Yo vasabhaṃ, kuñjaraṃ, pāsādaṃ, pabbataṃ vā āruḷhamattānaṃ supine passati,
tika-s0104t:1196_6: tassa “idaṃ nāma phala”ntiādinā hi vatthukittanaṃ hoti. Supinakanti supinasatthaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1196_8: “lakkhaṇa”nti ayametesaṃ viseso, tenāha “iminā lakkhaṇenā”tiādi. Lakkhaṇanti hi aṅgapaccaṅgesu
tika-s0104t:1196_9: dissamānākāravisesaṃ sattisirivacchagadāpāsādādikamadhippetaṃ taṃ taṃ phalaṃ lakkhīyati
tika-s0104t:1196_10: anenāti katvā, satthaṃ pana tappakāsanato lakkhaṇaṃ. Āhateti purāṇe. Anāhateti nave.
tika-s0104t:1196_11: Ahateti pana pāṭhe vuttavipariyāyena attho. Ito paṭṭhāyāti devarakkhasamanussādibhedena
tika-s0104t:1196_12: yathāphalaṃ parikappitena vividhavatthabhāge ito vā etto vā sañchinne idaṃ nāma bhogādiphalaṃ
tika-s0104t:1196_13: hoti. Evarūpena dārunāti palāsasiriphalādidārunā, tathā dabbiyā. Yadi dabbihomādīnipi
tika-s0104t:1196_14: aggihomāneva, atha kasmā visuṃ vuttānīti āha “evarūpāyā”tiādi. Dabbihomādīni homopakaraṇādivisesehi
tika-s0104t:1196_15: phalavisesadassanavasena vuttāni, aggihomaṃ pana vuttāvasesasādhanavasena vuttanti
tika-s0104t:1197_0: Kuṇḍakoti taṇḍulakhaṇḍaṃ, tilassa idanti telaṃ, samāsataddhitapadāni pasiddhesu sāmaññabhūtānīti
tika-s0104t:1197_4: disvāti aṅgulibhūtaṃ, aṅguliyā vā jātaṃ aṭṭhiṃ passitvā, aṅgulicchavimattaṃ apassitvā
tika-s0104t:1197_5: tadaṭṭhivipassanavaseneva byākarontīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Aṅgalaṭṭhinti sarīra”nti pana
tika-s0104t:1197_6: ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ viruhanabhāvena laṭṭhisadisattā
tika-s0104t:1197_7: sarīrameva aṅgalaṭṭhīti viññāyati. Kulaputtoti jātikulaputto, ācārakulaputto ca.
tika-s0104t:1197_8: Disvāpīti ettha api-saddo adisvāpīti sampiṇḍanattho. Abbhino satthaṃ abbheyyaṃ. Māsurakkhena
tika-s0104t:1197_9: kato gantho māsurakkho. Rājūhi paribhūttaṃ satthaṃ rājasatthaṃ. Sabbānipetāni khattavijjāpakaraṇāni.
tika-s0104t:1197_11: Sivā-saddameva rassaṃ katvā evamahāti sandhāya “siṅgālarutavijjā”ti vadanti, siṅgālānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1197_14: sārasamāse. Sappāvhāyanavijjāti sappāgamanavijjā. Visavantameva vāti visavamānameva
tika-s0104t:1197_15: vā. Bhāvaniddesassa hi māna-saddassa antabyappadeso. Yāya karonti, sā visavijjāti
tika-s0104t:1197_16: yojanā. “Visatantrameva vā”tipi pāṭho. Evaṃ sati sarūpadassanaṃ hoti, visavicāraṇaganthoyevāti
tika-s0104t:1197_17: attho. Tantranti hi ganthassa parasamaññā. Sapakkhakaapakkhakadvipadacatuppadānanti
