tika-s0104t:1197_19: Rutaṃ vassitaṃ. Gataṃ gamanaṃ, etena “sakuṇavijjā”ti idha migasaddassa lopaṃ, nidassanamattaṃ
tika-s0104t:1197_20: vā dasseti. Sakuṇañāṇanti sakuṇavasena subhāsubhaphalassa jānanaṃ. Nanu sakuṇavijjāya
tika-s0104t:1197_21: eva vāyasavijjāpaviṭṭhāti āha “taṃ visuññeva sattha”nti. Taṃtaṃpakāsakasatthānurūpavasena
tika-s0104t:1197_22: hi idha tassa tassa vacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1198_0: Paripakkagatabhāvo attabhāvassa, jīvitakālassa ca vasena gahetabboti dasseti “idānī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1198_1: Ādiṭṭhañānanti ādisitabbassa ñāṇaṃ. Sararakkhaṇanti sarato attānaṃ, attato vā sarassa
tika-s0104t:1198_3: dasseti, ekasesaniddeso vā esa catuppadesveva miga-saddassa niruḷhattā. Sabbesampi
tika-s0104t:1198_4: sakuṇacatuppadānaṃ rutajānanasatthassa migacakkasamaññā, yathā taṃ subhāsubhajānanappakāre
tika-s0104t:1199_1: Pārisesanayena avasesaṃ āvudhaṃ. “Yamhi kule”tiādinā imasmiṃ ṭhāne tathājānanahetu
tika-s0104t:1199_2: eva sesaṃ lakkhaṇanti dasseti. Ayaṃ visesoti “lakkhaṇa”nti heṭṭhā vuttā lakkhaṇato
tika-s0104t:1199_3: viseso. Tadatthāvikaraṇatthaṃ “idañcettha vatthū”ti vuttaṃ aggiṃ dhamamānanti aggiṃ
tika-s0104t:1199_4: mukhavātena jālentaṃ. Makkhesīti vināseti. Piḷandhanakaṇṇikāyāti kaṇṇālaṅkārassa.
tika-s0104t:1199_5: Gehakaṇṇikāyāti gehakūṭassa, etena ekasesanayaṃ, sāmaññaniddesaṃ vā upetaṃ. Kacchapalakkhaṇanti
tika-s0104t:1200_1: Vippavutthānanti vippavasitānaṃ sadesato nikkhantānaṃ. Upasaṅkamanaṃ upayānaṃ. Apayānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1200_2: paṭikkamanaṃ. Dutiyapadepīti “bāhirānaṃ raññaṃ…pe… bhavissatī”ti vutte dutiyavākyepi.
tika-s0104t:1200_3: “Abbhantarānaṃ raññaṃ jayo”tiādīhi dvīhi vākyehi vuttā jayaparājayā pākaṭāyeva.
tika-s0104t:1201: 24. Rāhūti rāhu nāma asurissaro asurarājā. Tathā hi mahāsamayasutte asuranikāye vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:1204_0: Tassa candimasūriyānaṃ gahaṇaṃ saṃyuttanikāye candimasuttasūriyasuttehi dīpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1204_1: Iti-saddo cettha ādiattho “candaggāhādayo”ti vuttattā, tena sūriyaggāhanakkhattaggāhā
tika-s0104t:1204_2: saṅgayhanti. Tasmā candimasūriyānamiva nakkhattānampi rāhunā gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1204_3: Tato eva hi “api cā”tiādinā nakkhattagāhe dutiyanayo vutto. Aṅgārakādigāhasamāyogopīti
tika-s0104t:1204_5: api nakkhattagāhoyeva saha payogena gahaṇato. Sahapayogopi hi vedasamayena gahaṇanti
tika-s0104t:1204_6: vuccati. Ukkānaṃ patananti ukkobhāsānaṃ patanaṃ. Vātasaṅghātesu hi vegena aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0104t:1204_7: saṅghaṭṭentesu dīpikobhāso viya obhāso uppajjitvā ākāsato patati, tatrāyaṃ ukkāpātavohāro.
tika-s0104t:1206: Porisī ca pamāṇena, ukkā nānāvidhā matā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1207_0: Disākālusiyanti disāsu khobhanaṃ, taṃ sarūpato dasseti “aggisikhadhūmasikhādīhi ākulabhāvo
tika-s0104t:1207_1: viyā”ti iminā, aggisikhadhūmasikhādīnaṃ bahudhā pātubhāvo eva disādāho nāmāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1207_2: hoti. Tadeva “dhūmaketū”ti lokiyā vadanti. Vuttañca jotisatthe –
tika-s0104t:1209: Sukkhavalāhakagajjananti vuṭṭhimantarena vāyuvegacalitassa valāhakassa nadanaṃ. Yaṃ lokiyā “nighāto”ti vadanti. Vuttañca jotisatthe –
tika-s0104t:1214_0: Hi vuttaṃ. Atthaṅgamanampi tato sattamarāsippamāṇavasena veditabbaṃ. Abbhā dhūmo
tika-s0104t:1214_1: rajo rāhūti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi avisuddhatā. Tabbinimuttatā vodānaṃ. Vuttañca “cattārome
tika-s0104t:1214_2: bhikkhave, candimasūriyānaṃ upakkilesā, yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā
tika-s0104t:1214_3: na tapanti na bhāsanti na virocanti. Katame cattāro? Abbhā bhikkhave, candimasūriyānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1214_4: upakkilesā, yena…pe… dhūmo…pe… rajo…pe… rāhu bhikkhave…pe… ime kho…pe… na virocantī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1215_0: 25. Devassāti meghassa. Dhārānuppavecchanaṃ vassanaṃ. Avaggāhoti dhārāya avaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1215_2: taṃ pana aṅgulisaṅkocanena gaṇanāyevāti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ. Ācariyasāriputtattherena
tika-s0104t:1215_3: pana “hatthamuddā nāma aṅgulipabbesu saññaṃ ṭhapetvā gaṇanā”ti dassitā. Gaṇanā vuccati
tika-s0104t:1215_4: acchiddakagaṇanā parisesañāyena, sā pana pādasikamilakkhakādayo viya “ekaṃ dve”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1215_5: navantavidhinā nirantaragaṇanāti veditabbā. Samūhanaṃ saṅkalanaṃ visuṃ uppādanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1215_7: sammā uppādananti attho. Ādi-saddena vokalanabhāgahārādike saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha vokalanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1215_8: visuṃ samūhakaraṇaṃ, vomissananti attho. Bhāgakaraṇaṃ bhāgo. Bhuñjanaṃ vibhajanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1215_9: hāro. Sāti yathāvuttā piṇḍagaṇanā disvāti ettha diṭṭhamattena gaṇetvāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0104t:1216_0: Paṭibhānakavīti ettha aṅguttarāgame vuttānanti seso, kavīnaṃ kabyakaraṇanti sambandho,
tika-s0104t:1216_1: etena kavīhi kataṃ, kavīnaṃ vā idaṃ kāveyyanti atthaṃ dasseti. “Attano cintāvasenā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1216_2: tesaṃ sabhāvadassanaṃ. Tathā hi vatthuṃ, anusandhiñca sayameva cirena cintetvā karaṇavasena
tika-s0104t:1216_3: cintākavi veditabbo. Kiñci sutvā sutena asutaṃ anusandhetvā karaṇavasena sutakavi,
tika-s0104t:1216_4: kiñci atthaṃ upadhāretvā tassa saṅkhipanavitthāraṇādivasena atthakavi, yaṃ kiñci
tika-s0104t:1216_5: parena kataṃ kabbaṃ vā nāṭakaṃ vā disvā taṃsadisameva aññaṃ attano ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena
tika-s0104t:1216_6: karaṇavasena paṭibhānakavīti. Nti tamatthaṃ. Tappaṭibhāganti tena diṭṭhena sadisaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1216_7: “Kattabba”nti ettha visesanaṃ, “karissāmī”ti ettha vā bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ. Ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānavasenāti
tika-s0104t:1217_0: 26. Pariggahabhāvena dārikāya gaṇhanaṃ āvāhanaṃ. Tathā dānaṃ vivāhanaṃ. Idha pana
tika-s0104t:1217_1: tathākaraṇassa uttarapadalopena niddeso, hetugabbhavasena vā, tenāha “imassa dārakassā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1217_2: Itīti evaṃhontesu, evaṃbhāvato vā. Uṭṭhānanti khettādito uppannamāyaṃ. Iṇanti dhanavaḍḍhanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1217_3: parassa dinnaṃ pariyudañcanaṃ. Pubbe paricchinnakāle asampattepi uddharitamiṇaṃ uṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1217_4: yathāparicchinnakāle pana sampatte iṇanti keci, tadayuttameva iṇagahaṇeneva sijjhanato.
tika-s0104t:1217_5: Paresaṃ dinnaṃ iṇaṃ vā dhananti sambandho. Thāvaranti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ. Desantare diguṇatiguṇādigahaṇavasena
tika-s0104t:1217_6: bhaṇḍappayojanaṃ payogo. Tattha vā aññattha vā yathākālaparicchedaṃ vaḍḍhigahaṇavasena
tika-s0104t:1217_7: payojanaṃ uddhāro. “Bhaṇḍamūlarahitānaṃ vāṇijaṃ katvā ettakena udayena saha mūlaṃ
tika-s0104t:1217_8: dethā’ti dhanadānaṃ payogo, tāvakālikadānaṃ uddhāro”tipi vadanti. Ajja payojitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1217_9: diguṇaṃ catuguṇaṃ hotīti yadi ajja payojitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, evaṃ aparajja diguṇaṃ, ajja
tika-s0104t:1217_10: catuguṇaṃ hotīti attho. Subhassa, subhena vā gamanaṃ pavattanaṃ subhago, tassa karaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1217_11: subhagakaraṇaṃ, taṃ pana piyamanāpassa, sassirīkassa vā karaṇamevāti āha “piyamanāpakaraṇa”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:1217_13: vilopassa. Tathā paripakkabhāvena aṭṭhitassa. Pariyāyavacanametaṃ padacatukkaṃ. Bhesajjadānanti
tika-s0104t:1217_14: gabbhasaṇṭhāpanabhesajjassa dānaṃ. Tīhi kāraṇehīti ettha vātena, pāṇakehi vā gabbhe
tika-s0104t:1217_15: vinassante na purimakammunā okāso kato, tappaccayā eva kammaṃ vipaccati, sayameva
tika-s0104t:1217_16: pana kammunā okāse kate na ekantena vātā, pāṇakā vā apekkhitabbāti kammassa visuṃ
tika-s0104t:1217_17: kāraṇabhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vātena pāṇakehi vā gabbho
tika-s0104t:1217_18: vinassanto kammaṃ vinā na vinassatīti adhippāyena tamaññātra dvīhi kāraṇehīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1217_19: Nibbāpanīyanti upasamakaraṃ. Paṭikammanti yathā te na khādanti, tathā paṭikaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1218_0: Bandhakaraṇanti yathā jiṃ cāletuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ anāloḷitakaraṇaṃ. Parivattanatthanti
tika-s0104t:1218_1: āvudhādinā saha ukkhittahatthānaṃ aññattha parivattanatthaṃ, attanā gopitaṭṭhāne
tika-s0104t:1218_2: akhipetvā parattha khipanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Khipatīti ca aññattha khipatīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1218_3: Vinicchayaṭṭhāneti aḍḍavinicchayaṭṭhāne. Icchitatthassa devatāya kaṇṇe kathanavasena
tika-s0104t:1218_4: jappanaṃ kaṇṇajappananti ca vadanti. Devataṃ otāretvāti ettha mantajappanena devatāya
tika-s0104t:1218_5: otāraṇaṃ. Jīvikatthāyāti yathā pāricariyaṃ katvā jīvitavutti hoti, tathā jīvitavuttikaraṇatthāya.
tika-s0104t:1218_6: Ādiccapāricariyāti karamālāhi pūjaṃ katvā sakaladivasaṃ ādiccābhimukhāvaṭṭhānena
tika-s0104t:1218_8: ī-kārato a-kāralopena sandhiniddeso, tenāha “siriyā avhāyana”nti. “Sirenā”ti pana
tika-s0104t:1218_9: ṭhānavasena avhāyanākāraṃ dasseti. Ye tu a-kārato a-kārassa lopaṃ katvā “siravhāyana”nti
tika-s0104t:1218_10: paṭhanti, tesaṃ pāṭhe ayamattho “mantaṃ jappetvā sirasā icchitassa atthassa avhāyana”nti.
tika-s0104t:1219_0: 27. Devaṭṭhānanti devāyatanaṃ. Upahāranti pūjaṃ. Samiddhikāleti āyācitassa atthassa
tika-s0104t:1219_1: siddhakāle. Santipaṭissavakammanti devatāyācanāya yā santi paṭikattabbā, tassā paṭissavakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1219_2: Santīti cettha mantajappanena pūjākaraṇaṃ, tāya santiyā āyācanappayogoti attho. Tasminti
tika-s0104t:1219_3: yaṃ “sace me idaṃ nāma samijjhissatī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ paṭissavaphalabhūte yathābhipatthitakammasmiṃ.
tika-s0104t:1219_4: Tassāti yo “paṇidhī”ti ca vutto, tassa paṭissavassa. Yathāpaṭissavañhi upahāre kate
tika-s0104t:1219_5: paṇidhiāyācanā katā niyyātitā hotīti. Gahitamantassāti uggahitamantassa. Payogakaraṇanti
tika-s0104t:1219_6: upacārakammakaraṇaṃ. Itīti kāraṇatthe nipāto, tena vassavossa-saddānaṃ purisapaṇḍakesu
tika-s0104t:1219_7: pavattiṃ kāraṇabhāvena dasseti, paṇḍakato visesena asati bhavatīti vasso. Purisaliṅgato
tika-s0104t:1219_8: virahena avaasati hīḷito hutvā bhavatīti vosso. Viseso rāgassavo yassāti vasso. Vigato
tika-s0104t:1219_9: rāgassavo yassāti vossoti niruttinayena padasiddhītipi vadanti. Vassakaraṇaṃ tadanurūpabhesajjena.
tika-s0104t:1219_10: Vossakaraṇaṃ pana uddhatabījatādināpi, teneva jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vossavarāti uddhatabījā
tika-s0104t:1219_11: orodhapālakā”ti vuttaṃ. Acchandikabhāvamattanti itthiyā akāmabhāvamattaṃ. Liṅganti purisanimittaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1220_0: Vatthubalikammakaraṇanti gharavatthusmiṃ balikammassa karaṇaṃ, taṃ pana upaddavapaṭibāhanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1220_1: vaḍḍhanatthañca karonti, mantajappanena attano, aññesañca mukhasuddhikaraṇaṃ. Tesanti
tika-s0104t:1220_2: aññesaṃ. Yoganti bhesajjapayogaṃ. Vamananti pacchindanaṃ. Uddhaṃvirecananti vamanabhedameva
tika-s0104t:1220_3: “uddhaṃ dosānaṃ nīharaṇa”nti vuttattā. Virecananti pakativirecanameva. Adhovirecananti
tika-s0104t:1220_5: vamanaṃ uggiraṇameva, uddhaṃvirecanaṃ dosanīharaṇaṃ. Tathā virecanaṃ virekova, adhovirecanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1220_6: dosanīharaṇanti ayametesaṃ viseso pākaṭo hoti. Dosānanti ca pittādidosānanti attho.
tika-s0104t:1220_8: Vaṇaharaṇatthanti arupanayanatthaṃ. Akkhitappanatelanti akkhīsu usumassa nīharaṇatelaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1220_9: Yena akkhimhi añjite uṇhaṃ usumaṃ nikkhamati. Yaṃ nāsikāya gaṇhīyati, taṃ natthu.
tika-s0104t:1220_10: Paṭalānīti akkhipaṭalāni. Nīharaṇasamatthanti apanayanasamatthaṃ. Khārañjananti khārakamañjanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1220_11: Sītameva saccaṃ niruttinayena, tassa kāraṇaṃ añjanaṃ saccañjananti āha “sītalabhesajjañjana”nti.
tika-s0104t:1220_13: vejjakammanti hi sālākiyaṃ. Idaṃ pana vuttāvasesassa akkhirogapaṭikammassa saṅgahaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1220_14: vuttaṃ “tappanādayopi hi sālākiyānevā”ti. Paṭividdhassa salākassa nikkhamanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1220_15: vejjakammaṃ salākavejjakammanti keci, taṃ pana sallakattiyapadeneva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1221_0: Sallassa paṭividdhassa kattanaṃ ubbāhanaṃ sallakattaṃ, tadatthāya vejjakammaṃ sallakattavejjakammaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1221_1: Kumāraṃ bharatīti kumārabhato, tassa bhāvo komārabhaccaṃ, kumāro eva vā komāro, bhatanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1221_2: bhaccaṃ, tassa bhaccaṃ tathā, tadabhinipphādakaṃ vejjakammanti attho. Mūlāni padhānāni
tika-s0104t:1221_3: rogūpasamane samatthāni bhesajjāni mūlabhesajjāni, mūlānaṃ vā byādhīnaṃ bhesajjāni
tika-s0104t:1221_4: tathā. Mūlānubandhavasena hi duvidho byādhi. Tatra mūlabyādhimhi tikicchite yebhuyyena
tika-s0104t:1221_5: itaraṃ vūpasamati, tenāha “kāyatikicchataṃ dassetī”tiādi. Tattha kāyatikicchatanti
tika-s0104t:1221_6: mūlabhāvato sarīrabhūtehi bhesajjehi, sarīrabhūtānaṃ vā rogānaṃ tikicchakabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1221_7: Khārādīnīti khārodakādīni. Tadanurūpe vaṇeti vūpasamitassa mūlabyādhino anucchavike
tika-s0104t:1221_8: arumhi. Tesanti mūlabhesajjānaṃ. Apanayanaṃ apaharaṇaṃ, tehi atikicchananti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1221_10: pārisesavasena vuttaṃ, tasmā tadavasesāya tantiyā idha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, sabbāni
tika-s0104t:1221_11: cetāni ājīvahetukāniyeva idhādhippetāni “micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappentī”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0104t:1221_12: Yaṃ pana tattha tattha pāḷiyaṃ “iti vā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha itī-ti pakāratthe nipāto,
tika-s0104t:1221_13: vā-ti vikappanatthe. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – iminā pakārena, ito aññena vāti. Tena yāni
tika-s0104t:1224_1: Tattha vuttavaṇṇassāti sahatthe chaṭṭhivacanaṃ, sāmiatthe vā anusandhi-saddassa bhāvakammavasena
tika-s0104t:1224_2: kiriyādesanāsu pavattanato. Bhikkhusaṅghena vuttavaṇṇassāti “yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1224_3: vuttavaṇṇassa. Tatra pāḷiyaṃ ayaṃ sambandho – na bhikkhave, ettakā eva buddhaguṇā
tika-s0104t:1224_4: ye tumhākaṃ pākaṭā, apākaṭā pana “atthi bhikkhave, aññe dhammā”ti vitthāro. “Ime
tika-s0104t:1224_5: diṭṭhiṭṭhānā evaṃ gahitā”tiādinā sassatādidiṭṭhiṭṭhānānaṃ yathāgahitākārassa suññabhāvappakāsanato,
tika-s0104t:1224_6: “tañca pajānanaṃ na parāmasatī”ti sīlādīnañca aparāmasanīyabhāvadīpanena niccasārādivirahappakāsanato,
tika-s0104t:1224_7: yāsu vedanāsu avītarāgatāya bāhirānaṃ etāni diṭṭhivibandhakāni sambhavanti, tāsaṃ
tika-s0104t:1224_9: attattaniyatāvirahadīpanato, anupādāparinibbānadīpanato ca ayaṃ desanā suññatāvibhāvanappadhānāti
tika-s0104t:1225_0: Pariyattīti vinayādibhedabhinnā manasā vavatthāpitā tanti. Desanāti tassā tantiyā
tika-s0104t:1225_1: manasā vavatthāpitāya vibhāvanā, yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpabhūtā vā paññāpanā, anulomādivasena
tika-s0104t:1225_2: vā kathananti pariyattidesanānaṃ viseso pubbeyeva vavatthāpitoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0104t:1225_3: “desanāya, pariyattiya”nti ca vuttaṃ. Evamādīsūti ettha ādi-saddena saccasabhāvasamādhipaññāpakatipuññāpattiñeyyādayo
tika-s0104t:1225_4: saṅgayhanti. Tathā hi ayaṃ dhamma-saddo “catunnaṃ bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ ananubodhā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1225_5: sacce pavattati, “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā”tiādīsu sabhāve, “evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto
tika-s0104t:1225_6: ahesu”ntiādīsu samādhimhi, “saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socati”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1225_7: paññāyaṃ, “jātidhammānaṃ bhikkhave, sattānaṃ evaṃ icchā uppajjatī”tiādīsu pakatiyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1225_8: “dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahātī”tiādīsu puññe, “cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādīsu āpattiyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1225_9: “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1225_10: ñeyye pavattati. Dhammā hontīti sattajīvato suññā dhammamattā hontīti attho. Kimatthiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1226_1: viyāti sambandho. Aññatra tathāgatāti ṭhapetvā tathāgataṃ. “Duddasā”ti padeneva tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1226_2: dhammānaṃ dukkhogāhatā pakāsitāti “alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā” icceva vuttaṃ. Labhitabbāti
tika-s0104t:1226_3: labbhanīyā, sā eva labbhaneyyā, labhīyate vā labbhanaṃ, tamarahatīti labbhaneyyā,
tika-s0104t:1226_4: na labbhaneyyā alabbhaneyyā, patiṭṭhahanti etthāti patiṭṭhā, patiṭṭhahanaṃ vā patiṭṭhā,
tika-s0104t:1226_5: alabbhaneyyā patiṭṭhā etthāti alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace koci
tika-s0104t:1226_6: attano pamāṇaṃ ajānanto ñāṇena te dhamme ogāhituṃ ussāhaṃ kareyya, tassa taṃ ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1226_8: ete īdisā vā”ti te passituṃ na sakkāti vuttaṃ “gambhīrattā eva duddasā”ti. Ye pana
tika-s0104t:1226_9: daṭṭhumeva na sakkā, tesaṃ ogāhitvā anu anu bujjhane kathā eva natthīti āha “duddasattā
tika-s0104t:1226_12: Tabbhāvato santāti attho. Santārammaṇāni maggaphalanibbānāni anupasantasabhāvānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1227_0: Atha vā kasiṇugghāṭimākāsatabbisayaviññāṇānaṃ anantabhāvo viya susamūhatavikkhepatāya
tika-s0104t:1227_1: niccasamāhitassa manasikārassa vasena tadārammaṇadhammānaṃ santabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1227_2: Avirajjhitvā nimittapaṭivedho viya issāsānaṃ avirajjhitvā dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho
tika-s0104t:1227_4: attho. Sohiccaṃ titti tappananti hi pariyāyo. Atittikaraṇaṭṭhenāti patthetvā sādurasakaraṇaṭṭhenātipi
tika-s0104t:1227_5: atthaṃ vadanti. Paṭivedhappattānaṃ tesu ca buddhānameva sabbākārena visayabhāvūpagamanato
tika-s0104t:1227_6: na takkabuddhiyā gocarāti āha “uttamañāṇavisayattā”tiādi. Nipuṇāti ñeyyesu tikkhappavattiyā
tika-s0104t:1227_7: chekā. Yasmā pana so chekabhāvo ārammaṇe appaṭihatavuttitāya, sukhumañeyyaggahaṇasamatthatāya
tika-s0104t:1227_8: ca supākaṭo hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “saṇhasukhumasabhāvattā”ti. Paṇḍitehiyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1228_0: Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathānayato aparo nayo – vinayapaṇṇattiādigambhīraneyyavibhāvanato gambhīrā.
tika-s0104t:1228_1: Kadāciyeva asaṅkhyeyye mahākappe atikkamitvāpi dullabhadassanatāya duddasā. Dassanañcettha
tika-s0104t:1228_2: paññācakkhuvaseneva veditabbaṃ. Dhammanvayasaṅkhātassa anubodhassa kassacideva sambhavato
tika-s0104t:1228_3: duranubodhā. Santasabhāvato, veneyyānañca sabbaguṇasampadānaṃ pariyosānattā santā.
tika-s0104t:1228_4: Attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ nītatāya paṇītā. Samadhigatasaccalakkhaṇatāya atakkehi
tika-s0104t:1228_5: puggalehi, atakkena vā ñāṇena avacaritabbato atakkāvacarā. Nipuṇaṃ, nipuṇe vā atthe
tika-s0104t:1228_6: saccapaccayākārādivasena vibhāvanato nipuṇā. Loke aggapaṇḍitena sammāsambuddhena
tika-s0104t:1229_1: tathāgato”tiādinā attano sabbaññutādiguṇe pakāsesi, tenevāha “sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā
tika-s0104t:1229_2: pavedetī”ti. Sayaṃ-saddena, niddhāritāvadhāraṇena vā nivattetabbamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:1229_3: “anaññaneyyo hutvā”ti vuttaṃ, aññehi abodhito hutvāti attho. Abhiññāti ya-kāralopo
tika-s0104t:1229_4: “aññāṇatā āpajjatī”tiādīsu viyāti dasseti “abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇenā”ti iminā. Apica
tika-s0104t:1229_5: “sayaṃ abhiññā”ti padassa anaññaneyyo hutvāti atthavacanaṃ, “sacchikatvā”ti padassa
tika-s0104t:1229_6: pana sayameva…pe… katvāti. Sayaṃ-saddā hi sacchikatvāti etthāpi sambajjhitabbo. Abhivisiṭṭhena
tika-s0104t:1229_7: ñāṇenāti ca tassa hetuvacanaṃ, karaṇavacanaṃ vā.
tika-s0104t:1230_0: Tattha kiñcāpi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ phalanibbānāni viya sacchikātabbasabhāvaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0104t:1230_1: āsavakkhayañāṇe pana adhigate adhigatameva hoti, tasmā tassa paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sacchikiriyāti
tika-s0104t:1230_2: āha “abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ katvā”ti. Hetuatthe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, aggamaggañāṇasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0104t:1230_4: adhippete karaṇatthe karaṇavacanampi yujjateva. Pavedanañcettha aññāvisayānaṃ saccādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1230_6: Guṇadhammehīti guṇasaṅkhātehi dhammehi. Yathābhūtameva yathābhuccaṃ sakatthe ṇyapaccayavasena.
tika-s0104t:1231_0: Vadamānāti ettha sattiattho mānasaddo yathā “ekapuggalo bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno
tika-s0104t:1231_1: uppajjatī”ti, tasmā vattuṃ ussāhaṃ karontoti attho. Evaṃbhūtā hi vattukāmā nāma honti,
tika-s0104t:1231_2: tenāha “tathāgatassā”tiādi. Sāvasesaṃ vadantāpi viparītavadantā viya sammā vadantīti
tika-s0104t:1231_3: na vattabbāti yathā sammā vadanti, tathā dassetuṃ “ahāpetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena hi
tika-s0104t:1231_4: anavasesavadanameva sammā vadananti dasseti. “Vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyu”nti iminā ca “vadeyyu”nti
tika-s0104t:1231_5: etassa samatthanatthabhāvamāha yathā “so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti ye evaṃ bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:1231_6: thomitā, te dhammā katameti yojanā. “Atthi bhikkhave, aññeva dhammā”tiādipāḷiyā “sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti
tika-s0104t:1231_7: vuttavacanassa virodhibhāvaṃ codento “yadi eva”ntiādimāha. Tattha yadi evanti evaṃ
tika-s0104t:1231_8: “sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti vuttavacanaṃ yadi siyāti attho. Bahuvacananiddesoti “atthi bhikkhave”tiādīni
tika-s0104t:1231_9: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atthi-saddopi hi idha bahuvacanoyeva “atthi khīrā, atthi gāvo”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1231_10: viya nipātabhāvasseva icchitattā. Yadipi tadidaṃ ñāṇaṃ ekameva sabhāvato, tathāpi
tika-s0104t:1231_12: rammaṇato”ti iminā. Puthucittasamāyogatoti puthūhi cittehi sampayogato. Puthūni ārammaṇāni
tika-s0104t:1231_13: etassāti puthuārammaṇaṃ, tabbhāvato sabbārammaṇattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1232_0: Apica puthu ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇametassāti puthuārammaṇārammaṇanti etasmiṃ atthe “oṭṭhamukho,
tika-s0104t:1232_1: kāmāvacara”ntiādīsu viya ekassa ārammaṇasaddassa lopaṃ katvā “puthuārammaṇato”ti
tika-s0104t:1232_2: vuttaṃ, tenassa puthuñāṇakiccasādhakattaṃ dasseti. Tathā hetaṃ ñāṇaṃ tīsu kālesu
tika-s0104t:1232_6: ñāṇānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ kiccaṃ sādheti, tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtānaṃ anekesampi dhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1232_8: paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ sādhakabhāvena dasseti. Tatthāti atītadhamme. Ekavāravasena
tika-s0104t:1232_9: puthuārammaṇabhāvaṃ nivattetvā anekavāravasena kamappavattiyā taṃ dassetuṃ “punappunaṃ
tika-s0104t:1232_10: uppattivasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Kamenāpi hi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ visayesu pavattati, na tathā
tika-s0104t:1232_11: sakiṃyeva. Yathā bāhirakā vadanti “sakiṃyeva sabbaññū sabbaṃ jānāti, na kamenā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1233_0: Yadi evaṃ acinteyyāparimeyyappabhedassa ñeyyassa paricchedavatā ekena ñāṇena niravasesato
tika-s0104t:1233_1: kathaṃ paṭivedhoti, ko vā evamāha “paricchedavantaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti. Aparicchedañhi
tika-s0104t:1233_2: taṃ ñāṇaṃ ñeyyamiva. Vuttañhetaṃ “yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1233_3: tāvatakaṃ ñāṇa”nti evampi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena, disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne
tika-s0104t:1233_4: ñeyye kamena gayhamāne anavasesapaṭivedho na sambhavatiyevāti? Nayidamevaṃ. Yañhi
tika-s0104t:1233_5: kiñci bhagavatā ñātumicchitaṃ sakalamekadeso vā, tattha appaṭihatacāritāya paccakkhato
tika-s0104t:1233_6: ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Vikkhepābhāvato ca bhagavā sabbakālaṃ samāhitoti ñātumicchitassa
tika-s0104t:1233_7: paccakkhabhāvo na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Vuttañhi “ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhaṃ buddhassa bhagavato
tika-s0104t:1233_8: ñāṇa”ntiādi, nanu cettha dūrato cittapaṭaṃ passantānaṃ viya, “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
tika-s0104t:1233_9: vipassantānaṃ viya ca anekadhammāvabodhakāle anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti
tika-s0104t:1233_11: acinteyyo”ti, idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ – sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa
tika-s0104t:1233_12: ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇassa paṭilābhena bhagavā santānena sabbadhammapaṭivedhasamattho
tika-s0104t:1233_13: ahosi sabbaneyyāvaraṇassa pahānato, tasmā sabbaññū, na sakiṃyeva sabbadhammāvabodhato
tika-s0104t:1233_14: yathāsantānena sabbassa indhanassa dahanasamatthatāya pāvako “sabbabhū”ti vuccatīti.
tika-s0104t:1234_0: Kāmañcāyamattho pubbe vitthāritoyeva, pakārantarena pana sotujanānuggahakāmatāya,
tika-s0104t:1234_1: imissā ca porāṇasaṃvaṇṇanāvisodhanavasena pavattattā puna vibhāvitoti na cettha punaruttidoso
tika-s0104t:1234_2: pariyesitabbo, evamīdisesu. Ettha ca kiñcāpi bhagavato dasabalādiñāṇānipi anaññasādhāraṇāni,
tika-s0104t:1234_3: sabbadesavisayattā pana tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ na tehi buddhaguṇā ahāpetvā gahitā nāma honti.
tika-s0104t:1234_4: Sabbaññutaññāṇassa pana nippadesavisayattā tasmiṃ gahite sabbepi buddhaguṇā gahitā
tika-s0104t:1234_5: eva nāma honti, tasmā pāḷiatthānusārena tadeva ñāṇaṃ gahitanti veditabbaṃ. Pāḷiyampi
tika-s0104t:1234_6: hi “yehi tathāgatassa yathābhuccaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamānā vadeyyu”nti tameva pakāsitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1234_7: tamantarena aññassa nippadesavisayassa abhāvato, nippadesavisayeneva ca yathābhuccaṃ
tika-s0104t:1235_0: Aññevāti ettha eva-saddo sanniṭṭhāpanatthoti dassetuṃ “aññevāti idaṃ panettha vavatthāpanavacana”nti
tika-s0104t:1235_1: vuttaṃ, vavatthāpanavacananti ca sanniṭṭhāpanavacananti attho, sanniṭṭhāpanañca avadhāraṇameva.
tika-s0104t:1235_2: Kathanti āha “aññevā”tiādi. “Na pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādayo”ti iminā avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1235_3: dasseti. Ayañca eva-saddo aniyatadesatāya ca-saddo viya yattha vutto, tato aññatthāpi
tika-s0104t:1235_4: vacanicchāvasena upatiṭṭhatīti āha “gambhīrāvā”tiādi. Iti-saddena ca ādiatthena duddasāva
tika-s0104t:1235_5: na sudasā, duranubodhāva na suranubodhā, santāva na darathā, paṇītāva na hīnā, atakkāvacarāva
tika-s0104t:1235_6: na takkāvacarā, nipuṇāva na lūkhā, paṇḍitavedanīyāva na bālavedanīyāti nivattitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1235_7: dasseti. Sabbapadehīti yāva “paṇḍitavedanīyā”ti idaṃ padaṃ, tāva sabbapadehi.
tika-s0104t:1236_0: Evaṃ nivattetabbataṃ yuttiyā daḷhīkaronto “sāvakapāramiñāṇa”ntiādimāha. Tattha sāvakapāramiñāṇanti
tika-s0104t:1236_2: ñāṇaṃ, tathā paccekabuddhānaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ. Tatoti sāvakapāramiñāṇato. Tatthāti
tika-s0104t:1236_4: pi-saddena vā ko pana vādo sāvakapāramiñāṇatoti sambhāveti. Tatthāpīti paccekabodhiñāṇepi.
tika-s0104t:1236_5: Ito panāti sabbaññutaññāṇato pana, tasmā ettha sabbaññutaññāṇe vavatthānaṃ labbhatīti
tika-s0104t:1236_6: adhippāyo. Gambhīresu visesā, gambhīrānaṃ vā visesena gambhīrā. Ayañca gambhīro ayañca
tika-s0104t:1236_7: gambhīro ime imesaṃ visesena gambhīrāti vā gambhīratarā. Tarasaddenevettha byavacchedanaṃ siddhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1237_0: Etthāyaṃ yojanā – kiñcāpi sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ sekkhañāṇaṃ puthujjanañāṇañca
tika-s0104t:1237_1: upādāya gambhīraṃ, paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ pana upādāya na tathā gambhīranti “gambhīramevā”ti
tika-s0104t:1237_2: na sakkā byavacchijjituṃ, tathā paccekabodhiñāṇampi yathāvuttaṃ ñāṇamupādāya gambhīraṃ,
tika-s0104t:1237_3: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana upādāya na evaṃ gambhīranti “gambhīramevā”ti na sakkā byavacchijjituṃ,
tika-s0104t:1237_4: tasmā tattha vavatthānaṃ na labbhati. Sabbaññutaññāṇadhammā pana sāvakapāramiñāṇādīnamiva
tika-s0104t:1237_5: kiñci upādāya gambhīrābhāvābhāvato “gambhīrā evā”ti vavatthānaṃ labbhatīti. Yathā
tika-s0104t:1237_6: cettha vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ, evaṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ duddasaṃ. “Paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1237_7: pana tato duddasataranti tattha vavatthānaṃ natthī”tiādinā vavatthānasambhavo netabbo,
tika-s0104t:1238_0: Pucchāvissajjanantipi pāṭho, tassā pucchāya vissajjananti attho. Etanti yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1238_1: vissajjanavacanaṃ. Evanti iminā diṭṭhīnaṃ vibhajanākārena. Etthāyamadhippāyo – bhavatu
tika-s0104t:1238_3: “atthi bhikkhave, aññeva dhammā”tiādinā bahuvacanena uddiṭṭhaṃ, tassa pana vissajjanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1238_5: sanissayānaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ vibhajananayena kasmā āraddhanti? Tattha yathā saccapaccayākārādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1238_6: vibhajanaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasseva visayo, evaṃ niravasesadiṭṭhigatavibhajanampīti
tika-s0104t:1238_7: dassetuṃ “buddhānañhī”tiādi āraddhaṃ, tattha ṭhānānīti kāraṇāni. Gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ
tika-s0104t:1238_8: hotīti desetabbassa atthassa anekavidhatāya, dubbiññeyyatāya ca nānānayehi pavattamānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1238_9: desanāgajjitaṃ mahantaṃ vipulaṃ, bahuppabhedañca hoti. Ñāṇaṃ anupavisatīti tato eva
tika-s0104t:1238_10: ca desanāñāṇaṃ desetabbadhamme vibhāgaso kurumānaṃ anupavisati, te anupavisitvā ṭhitaṃ viya hotīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1239_0: Buddhañāṇassa mahantabhāvo paññāyatīti evaṃvidhassa nāma dhammassa desakaṃ, paṭivedhakañcāti
tika-s0104t:1239_1: buddhānaṃ desanāñāṇassa, paṭivedhañāṇassa ca uḷārabhāvo pākaṭo hoti. Desanā gambhīrā
tika-s0104t:1239_2: hotīti sabhāvena gambhīrānaṃ tesaṃ catubbidhānampi desanā desetabbavasena gambhīrāva
tika-s0104t:1239_3: hoti, sā pana buddhānaṃ desanā sabbattha, sabbadā ca yānattayamukhenevāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1239_4: “tilakkhaṇāhatā suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttā”ti, tīhi lakkhaṇehi āhatā, attattaniyato suññabhāvapaṭisaññuttā
tika-s0104t:1239_5: cāti attho. Ettha ca kiñcāpi “sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0104t:1239_6: ñāṇānuparivattī”ti vacanato sabbāpi bhagavato desanā ñāṇarahitā nāma natthi, samasamaparakkamanavasena
tika-s0104t:1239_7: sīhasamānavuttitāya ca sabbattha samānussāhappavatti, desetabbadhammavasena pana
tika-s0104t:1239_8: desanā visesato ñāṇena anupaviṭṭhā, gambhīratarā ca hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1240_0: Kathaṃ pana vinayapaṇṇattiṃ patvā desanā tilakkhaṇāhatā, suññatāpaṭisaññuttā ca hoti,
tika-s0104t:1240_1: nanu tattha vinayapaṇṇattimattamevāti? Na tattha vinayapaṇṇattimattameva. Tatthāpi
tika-s0104t:1240_2: hi sannisinnaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ pavattamānā desanā saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādivibhāvinī
tika-s0104t:1240_3: sabbadhammānaṃ attattaniyatā, suññabhāvappakāsinī ca hoti, tenevāha “anekapariyāyena
tika-s0104t:1240_4: dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā”tiādi. Vinayapaññattinti vinayassa paññāpanaṃ. Ñña-kārassa pana
tika-s0104t:1240_5: ṇṇa-kāre kate vinayapaṇṇattintipi pāṭho. Bhūmantaranti dhammānaṃ avatthāvisesañca
tika-s0104t:1240_6: ṭhānavisesañca. Bhavanti dhammā etthāti bhūmīti hi avatthāviseso, ṭhānañca vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1240_8: “vaccho, dammo, balībaddo”ti ādayo viya. Ṭhānaviseso kāmāvacarādibhedo. Paccayākāra-saddassa
tika-s0104t:1240_9: attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Samayantaranti diṭṭhivisesaṃ, nānāvihitā diṭṭhiyoti attho,
tika-s0104t:1240_10: aññasamayaṃ vā, bāhirakasamayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Vinayapaññattiṃ patvā mahantaṃ gajjitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1240_11: hotītiādinā sambandho. Tasmāti yasmā gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ…pe… paṭisaṃyuttā, tasmā. Chejjagāminīti atekicchagāminī.
tika-s0104t:1241_0: Evaṃ otiṇṇe vatthusminti yathāvuttanayena lahukagarukādivasena tadanurūpe vatthumhi
tika-s0104t:1241_1: otarante. Yaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma atthi, tatthāti sambandho. Thāmoti ñāṇasāmatthiyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1241_2: Balanti akampanasaṅkhāto vīrabhāvo. Thāmo balanti vā sāmatthiyavacanameva paccavekkhaṇādesanāñāṇavasena
tika-s0104t:1241_4: vuccamānapadamapekkhitvā pulliṅgena niddisati, eso sikkhāpadapaññāpanasaṅkhāto visayo
tika-s0104t:1241_5: aññesaṃ avisayoti attho. Itīti tathāvisayāvisayabhāvassa hetubhāvena paṭiniddesavacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1241_6: nidassanattho vā iti-saddo, tena “idaṃ lahukaṃ, idaṃ garuka”ntiādinayaṃ niddisati.
tika-s0104t:1242_0: Yadipi kāyānupassanādivasena satipaṭṭhānādayo suttantapiṭake vibhattā, tathāpi suttantabhājanīyādivasena
tika-s0104t:1242_1: abhidhammeyeva te visesato vibhattāti āha “ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā…pe… abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
tika-s0104t:1242_2: vibhajitvā”ti. Tattha satta phassāti sattaviññāṇadhātusampayogavasena vuttaṃ. Tathā
tika-s0104t:1242_3: “satta vedanā”tiādipi. Lokuttarā dhammā nāmāti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho
tika-s0104t:1242_4: vā, tena vuttāvasesaṃ abhidhamme āgataṃ dhammānaṃ vibhajitabbākāraṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānāni
tika-s0104t:1242_6: hi idaṃ visesanaṃ. Ettha ca paccayanayaṃ aggahetvā dhammavaseneva samantapaṭṭhānassa
tika-s0104t:1249_0: Evaṃ dhammavasena catuvīsatibhedesu tikapaṭṭhānādīsu ekekaṃ paccayanayena anulomādivasena
tika-s0104t:1249_1: catubbidhaṃ hotīti channavutisamantapaṭṭhānāni. Tattha pana dhammānulome tikapaṭṭhāne
tika-s0104t:1249_2: kusalattike paṭiccavāre paccayānulome hetumūlake hetupaccayavasena ekūnapaññāsa pucchānayā
tika-s0104t:1249_3: satta vissajjananayātiādinā dassiyamānā anantabhedā nayāti āha “anantanaya”nti.
tika-s0104t:1250_0: Navahākārehīti uppādādīhi navahi paccayākārehi. Taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “uppādo hutvā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1250_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha uppajjati etasmā phalanti uppādo, phaluppattiyā kāraṇabhāvo. Sati
tika-s0104t:1250_2: ca avijjāya saṅkhārā uppajjanti, nāsati. Tasmā avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo hutvā paccayo
tika-s0104t:1250_3: hoti, tathā pavattati dharati etasmiṃ phalanti pavattaṃ. Nimīyati phalametasminti
tika-s0104t:1250_4: nimittaṃ. (Nidadāti phalaṃ attano paccayuppannaṃ etenāti nidānaṃ.) (Etthantare aṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0104t:1250_5: na sameti) āyūhati phalaṃ attano paccayuppannuppattiyā ghaṭeti etenāti āyūhanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1250_6: Saṃyujjati phalaṃ attano paccayuppannena etasminti saṃyogo. Yattha sayaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0104t:1250_7: taṃ palibuddhati phalametenāti palibodho. Paccayantarasamavāye sati phalamudayati
tika-s0104t:1250_8: etenāti samudayo. Hinoti kāraṇabhāvaṃ gacchatīti hetu. Avijjāya hi sati saṅkhārā
tika-s0104t:1250_9: pavattanti, dharanti ca, te avijjāya sati attano phalaṃ (nidadanti) bhavādīsu khipanti,
tika-s0104t:1250_10: āyūhanti attano phaluppattiyā ghaṭenti, attano phalena saṃyujjanti, yasmiṃ santāne
tika-s0104t:1250_11: sayaṃ uppannā taṃ palibuddhanti, paccayantarasamavāye udayanti uppajjanti, hinoti
tika-s0104t:1250_12: ca saṅkhārānaṃ kāraṇabhāvaṃ gacchati, tasmā avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ pavattaṃ hutvā…pe…
tika-s0104t:1250_13: paccayo hutvā paccayo hoti. Evaṃ avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ kāraṇabhāvūpagamanavisesā uppādādayo
tika-s0104t:1251_0: Tamatthaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiyā sādhentena “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tiṭṭhati
tika-s0104t:1251_1: etenāti ṭhiti, paccayo, uppādo eva ṭhiti uppādaṭṭhiti. Evaṃ sesesupi. Yasmā pana
tika-s0104t:1251_2: “āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti vuttattā āsavāva avijjāya paccayo, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1251_3: “ubhopete dhammā “paccayasamuppannā”ti, avijjā ca saṅkhārā ca ubhopete dhammā paccayato
tika-s0104t:1251_4: eva samuppannā, na vinā paccayenāti attho. Paccayapariggahe paññāti saṅkhārānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1251_5: avijjāya ca uppādādike paccayākāre paricchinditvā gahaṇavasena pavattā paññā. Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti
tika-s0104t:1251_7: “Dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā”ti vacanato hi dvādasa paccayā eva paṭiccasamuppādo. Ayañca
tika-s0104t:1251_8: nayo na paccuppanne eva, atha kho atītānāgatesupi, na ca avijjāya eva saṅkhāresu,
tika-s0104t:1251_9: atha kho saṅkhārādīnaṃ viññāṇādīsupi labbhatīti paripuṇṇaṃ katvā paccayākārassa vibhattabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1251_10: dassetuṃ “atītampi addhāna”ntiādi pāḷimāhari. Paṭṭhāne pana dassitā hetādipaccayāevettha
tika-s0104t:1251_11: uppādādipaccayākārehi gahitāti tepi yathāsambhavaṃ nīharitvā yojetabbā. Ativitthārabhayena
tika-s0104t:1251_12: pana na yojayimha, atthikehi ca visuddhimaggādito gahetabbā.
tika-s0104t:1252_0: Tassa tassa dhammassāti saṅkhārādipaccayuppannadhammassa. Tathā tathā paccayabhāvenāti
tika-s0104t:1252_1: uppādādihetādipaccayasattiyā. Kammakilesavipākavasena tīṇi vaṭṭāni yassāti tivaṭṭaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1252_2: Atītapaccuppannānāgatavasena tayo addhā kālā etassāti tiyaddhaṃ. Hetuphalaphalahetuhetuphalavasena
tika-s0104t:1252_3: tayo sandhayo etassāti tisandhi. Saṅkhippanti ettha avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo cāti
tika-s0104t:1252_4: saṅkhepā, hetu, vipāko ca. Atha vā hetu vipākoti saṅkhippantīti saṅkhepā. Avijjādayo,
tika-s0104t:1252_5: viññāṇādayo ca koṭṭhāsapariyāyo vā saṅkhepasaddo. Atītahetusaṅkhepādivasena cattāro
tika-s0104t:1252_6: saṅkhepā yassāti catusaṅkhepaṃ. Sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅkhepe ākirīyanti
tika-s0104t:1252_7: avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ākārā, atītahetuādīnaṃ pakārā. Te saṅkhepe
tika-s0104t:1252_8: pañca pañca katvā vīsati ākārā etassāti vīsatākāraṃ.
tika-s0104t:1253_1: abhinivesahetuno vasena cattārova honti, na tato uddhaṃ, adho vāti sassatavādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1253_2: parimāṇaparicchedassa anaññavisayataṃ dassetuṃ “cattāro janā”tiādimāha. Esa nayo
tika-s0104t:1253_3: itaresupi. Tattha cattāro janāti cattāro janasamūhāti attho gahetabbo tesu ekekassāpi
tika-s0104t:1253_4: anekappabhedato. Teti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatavādino. Idaṃ nissāyāti idappaccayatāya sammā
tika-s0104t:1253_5: aggahaṇaṃ. Tatthāpi ca hetuphalabhāvena sambandhānaṃ dhammānaṃ santatighanassa abheditattā
tika-s0104t:1253_6: paramatthato vijjamānampi bhedanibandhanaṃ nānattanayaṃ anupadhāretvā gahitaṃ ekattaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1253_7: nissāya. Idaṃ gaṇhantīti idaṃ sassataggahaṇaṃ abhinivissa voharanti, iminā nayena
tika-s0104t:1253_9: vibhajitvā, “tayidaṃ bhikkhave tathāgato pajānātī”tiādinā vā vidhamitvā. Nijjaṭanti
tika-s0104t:1253_10: anonaddhaṃ. Nigumbanti anāvuṭaṃ. Apica veḷuādīnaṃ heṭṭhupariyasaṃsibbanaṭṭhena jaṭā.
tika-s0104t:1253_11: Kusādīnaṃ ovaraṇaṭṭhena gumbo. Tassadisatāya diṭṭhigatānaṃ byākulā pākaṭatā “jaṭā,
tika-s0104t:1253_12: gumbo”ti ca vuccati, diṭṭhijaṭāvijaṭanena, diṭṭhigumbavivaraṇena ca nijjaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1254: “Tasmā”tiādinā buddhaguṇe ārabbha desanāya samuṭṭhitattā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ uddisitvā desanākusalo bhagavā samayantaraṃ viggahaṇavasena sabbaññutaññāṇameva vissajjetīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1255_0: 29. Atthi pariyāyo santi-saddo, so ca saṃvijjantipariyāyo, saṃvijjamānatā ca ñāṇena
tika-s0104t:1255_2: padena tesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vijjamānatāya avicchinnataṃ, tato ca nesaṃ micchāgāhato
tika-s0104t:1255_3: sithilakaraṇavivecanehi attano desanāya kiccakāritaṃ, avitathatañca dīpeti dhammarājā.
tika-s0104t:1255_4: Atthīti ca santipadena samānattho puthuvacanavisayo eko nipāto “atthi imasmiṃ kāye
tika-s0104t:1255_5: kesā”tiādīsu viya. Ālapanavacananti buddhālapanavacanaṃ. Bhagavāyeva hi “bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1255_6: bhikkhavo”ti ca ālapati, na sāvakā. Sāvakā pana “āvuso, āyasmā”tiādisambandhaneneva.
tika-s0104t:1255_7: “Eke”ti vutte ekacceti attho eva saṅkhyāvācakassa eka-saddassa niyatekavacanattā,
tika-s0104t:1255_9: vā hontu, aññathā vā, sammutimatteneva idhādhippetāti dasseti “lokenā”tiādinā. Sassatādivasena
tika-s0104t:1255_10: pubbantaṃ kappentīti pubbantakappikā. Yasmā pana tesaṃ pubbantaṃ purimasiddhehi taṇhādiṭṭhikappehi
tika-s0104t:1255_11: kappetvā āsevanabalavatāya, vicitravuttitāya ca vikappetvā aparabhāgasiddhehi abhinivesabhūtehi
tika-s0104t:1255_12: taṇhādiṭṭhigāhehi gaṇhanti abhinivisanti parāmasanti, tasmā vuttaṃ “pubbantaṃ kappetvā
tika-s0104t:1255_13: vikappetvā gaṇhantī”ti. Purimabhāgapacchimabhāgasiddhānaṃ vā taṇhāupādānānaṃ vasena
tika-s0104t:1255_14: yathākkamaṃ kappanagahaṇāni veditabbāni. Taṇhāpaccayā hi upādānaṃ sambhavati. Pahutapasaṃsānindātisayasaṃsagganiccayogādivisayesu
tika-s0104t:1255_15: idha niccayogavasena vijjamānattho sambhavatīti vuttaṃ “pubbanta kappo vā”tiādi vuttañca –
tika-s0104t:1258_0: Koṭṭhāsesūti ettha koṭṭhāsādīsūti attho veditabbo ādi-saddalopena, nidassananayena
tika-s0104t:1258_1: ca vuttattā. Padapūraṇasamīpaummaggādīsupi hi anta-saddo dissati. Tathā hi “iṅgha
tika-s0104t:1258_2: tāva suttante vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṃ vā pariyāpuṇassu, suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1258_4: eko anto, atthīti kho kaccāna ayameko anto”tiādīsu ca ummaggeti.
tika-s0104t:1259_0: Antapūroti mahāantaantaguṇehi pūro. “Sā haritantaṃ vā panthantaṃ vā”ti majjhimanikāye
tika-s0104t:1259_1: mahāhatthipadopamasuttantapāḷi. Tattha sāti tejodhātu. Haritantanti haritatiṇarukkhamariyādaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1259_2: Panthantanti maggamariyādaṃ. Āgamma anāhārā nibbāyatīti seso. “Antamidaṃ bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1259_3: jīvikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolya”nti piṇḍiyālopasuttantapāḷi. Tattha piṇḍaṃ ulati gavesatīti
tika-s0104t:1259_4: piṇḍolo, piṇḍācāriko, tassa bhāvo piṇḍolyaṃ, piṇḍacaraṇena jīvikatāti attho. Esevāti
tika-s0104t:1259_5: sabbapaccayasaṅkhayabhūto nibbānadhammo eva, tenāha “sabba…pe… vuccatī”ti. Etena
tika-s0104t:1259_6: sabbapaccayasaṅkhayanato asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ saṅkhatabhūtassa vaṭṭadukkhassa parabhāgaṃ
tika-s0104t:1259_7: pariyosānabhūtaṃ, tasmā ettha parabhāgova attho yuttoti dasseti. Sakkāyoti sakkāyagāho.
tika-s0104t:1260_0: Kappoti leso. Kappakatenāti tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataradubbaṇṇakatena. Ādi-saddena
tika-s0104t:1260_2: vattatīti dasseti. Tathā hesa “cattārimāni bhikkhave, kappassa asaṅkhyeyyānī”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1260_4: kāmo rāgo kāmo saṅkapparāgo kāmo”tiādīsu kilesakāme, “takko vitakko saṅkappo”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1260_5: vitakke, “yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”tiādīsu kāle, “iccāyasmā kappo”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1260_6: paññattiyaṃ, “satthukappena vata kira bho sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”tiādīsu sadisabhāveti.
tika-s0104t:1261_0: Taṇhādiṭṭhīsu pavattiṃ mahāniddesapāḷiyā sādhento “vuttampi ceta”ntiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0104t:1261_1: uddānatoti saṅkhepato. “Tasmā”tiādi yathāvuttāya atthavaṇṇanāya guṇavacanaṃ. Taṇhādiṭṭhivasenāti
tika-s0104t:1261_2: upanissayasahajātabhūtāya abhinandanasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya ceva sassatādiākārena abhinivisantassa
tika-s0104t:1261_3: micchāgāhassa ca vasena. Pubbe nivutthadhammavisayāya kappanāya idha adhippetattā
tika-s0104t:1261_4: atītakālavācakoyeva pubba-saddo, na pana “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”tiādīsu viya padhānādivācako,
tika-s0104t:1261_5: rūpādikhandhavinimuttassa kappanavatthuno abhāvā anta-saddo ca koṭṭhāsavācako, na
tika-s0104t:1261_6: pana abbhantarādivācakoti dassetuṃ “atītaṃ khandhakoṭṭhāsa”nti vuttaṃ. Kappetvāti
tika-s0104t:1261_7: ca tasmiṃ pubbante taṇhāyanābhinivesanānaṃ samatthanaṃ pariniṭṭhāpanamāha. Ṭhitāti
tika-s0104t:1261_8: tassā laddhiyā avijahanaṃ, pubbantameva anugatā diṭṭhi tesamatthīti yojanā. Atthitā,
tika-s0104t:1261_9: anugatatā ca nāma punappunaṃ pavattiyāti dasseti “punappunaṃ uppajjanavasenā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1261_10: “Te eva”ntiādinā “pubbantaṃ ārabbhā”tiādipāḷiyā atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇeti. Tattha ārabbhāti
tika-s0104t:1261_11: ālambitvā. Visayo hi tassā diṭṭhiyā pubbanto. Visayabhāvato hesa tassā āgamanaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1261_12: ārammaṇapaccayo cāti vuttaṃ “āgamma paṭiccā”ti. Tadetaṃ aññesaṃ patiṭṭhāpanadassananti
tika-s0104t:1262_1: Dāsādīsu hi sirivaḍḍhakādisaddā viya vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattiyā tathā
tika-s0104t:1262_2: paṇṇattiyeva adhivacanaṃ, sā ca vohārassa pathoti. Atha vā adhi-saddo uparibhāge,
tika-s0104t:1262_3: vuccatīti vacanaṃ. Adhi uparibhāge vacanaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Upādāniyabhūtānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1262_5: attho daṭṭhabbo. Paññattimattañhetaṃ vuccati, yadidaṃ “attā, loko”ti ca, na rūpavedanādayo
tika-s0104t:1262_6: viya paramatthoti. Adhimutti-saddo cettha adhivacana-saddena samānattho “niruttipatho”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1262_7: viya uttisaddassa vacanapariyāyattā. “Bhūtaṃ attha”ntiādinā pana bhūtasabhāvato atirekaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1262_8: Tamatidhāvitvā vā muccantīti adhimuttiyo, tāsaṃ pathāni taddīpakattāti atthaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0104t:1262_9: adhikaṃ vā sassatādikaṃ muccantīti adhimuttiyo. Adhikañhi sassatādiṃ, pakatiādiṃ,
tika-s0104t:1262_10: dabbādiṃ, jīvādiṃ, kāyādiñca abhūtaṃ atthaṃ sabhāvadhammesu ajjhāropetvā diṭṭhiyo pavattanti.
tika-s0104t:1263_1: dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo”tiādinā abhibhavitvāpi vadanti. Abhivadanakiriyāya ajjāpi avicchedabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1263_2: vattamānavacanaṃ katanti ayamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā. Kathetukamyatāya hetubhūtāya pucchitvāti
tika-s0104t:1263_3: sambandho. Micchā passatīti diṭṭhi, diṭṭhi eva diṭṭhigataṃ “muttagataṃ, saṅkhāragata”ntiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1263_4: viya gata-saddassa tabbhāvavuttito, gantabbābhāvato vā diṭṭhiyā gatamattanti diṭṭhigataṃ.
tika-s0104t:1263_5: Diṭṭhiyā gahaṇamattameva, natthaññaṃ avagantabbanti attho, diṭṭhipakāro vā diṭṭhigataṃ.
tika-s0104t:1263_6: Lokiyā hi vidhayuttagatapakārasadde samānatthe icchanti. Ekasmiṃyeva khandhe “attā”ti
tika-s0104t:1263_7: ca “loko”ti ca gahaṇavisesaṃ upādāya paññāpanaṃ hotīti āha “rūpādīsu aññataraṃ attāti
tika-s0104t:1263_8: ca lokoti ca gahetvā”ti. Amaraṃ niccaṃ dhuvanti sassatavevacanāni, maraṇābhāvena
tika-s0104t:1263_9: vā amaraṃ. Uppādābhāvena sabbadāpi atthitāya niccaṃ. Thiraṭṭhena vikārābhāvena dhuvaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1263_11: Tattha “rūpaṃ gahetvā”ti pāṭhasesena sambandho. Ayaṃ panattho – “rūpaṃ attato samanupassati.
tika-s0104t:1263_12: Vedanaṃ, saññaṃ, saṅkhāre, viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imissā pañcavidhāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0104t:1263_13: vasena vutto, “rūpavantaṃ attāna”ntiādikāya pana pañcadasavidhāyapi tadavasesāya
tika-s0104t:1263_14: sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vasena cattāro khandhe “attā”ti gahetvā tadañño “loko”ti paññapentīti
tika-s0104t:1263_15: ayampi attho labbhateva. Tathā ekaṃ khandhaṃ “attā”ti gahetvā añño attano upabhogabhūto
tika-s0104t:1263_16: “loko”ti ca. Sasantatipatite khandhe “attā”ti gahetvā tadañño parasantatipatito “loko”ti
tika-s0104t:1263_17: ca paññapetīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Etthāha – “sassato vādo etesa”nti kasmā
tika-s0104t:1263_18: heṭṭhā vuttaṃ, nanu tesaṃ attā ca loko ca sassatoti adhippeto, na vādoti? Saccametaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1263_19: sassatasahacaritatāya pana vādopi sassatoti vutto yathā “kuntā pacarantī”ti, sassato
tika-s0104t:1263_20: iti vādo etesanti vā tattha iti-saddalopo daṭṭhabbo. Sassataṃ vadanti “idameva saccaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1263_21: moghamañña”nti abhinivissa voharantīti sassatavādā tipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t:1264_0: 31. Ātāpanabhāvenāti vibādhanassa bhāvena, vibādhanaṭṭhena vā. Pahānañcettha vibādhanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1264_1: Padahanavasenāti samādahanavasena. Samādahanaṃ pana kosajjapakkhe patitumadatvā cittassa
tika-s0104t:1264_2: ussāhanaṃ. Yathā samādhi visesabhāgiyataṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃ vīriyassa bahulīkaraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1264_3: anuyogo. Iti padattayena vīriyameva vuttanti āha “evaṃ tippabhedaṃ vīriya”nti. Yathākkamañhiha
tika-s0104t:1264_4: tīhi padehi upacārappanācittaparidamanavīriyāni dasseti. Na pamajjati etenāti appamādo,
tika-s0104t:1264_5: satiyā avippavāso. So pana satipaṭṭhānā cattāro khandhā eva. Sammā upāyena manasi
tika-s0104t:1264_6: karoti kammaṭṭhānametenāti sammāmanasikāro, so pana ñāṇameva, na ārammaṇavīthijavanapaṭipādakā,
tika-s0104t:1264_7: tenāha “atthato ñāṇa”nti. Pathamanasikāroti kāraṇamanasikāro. Tadevatthaṃ samattheti
tika-s0104t:1264_9: manasikāre. “Imasmiṃ ṭhāne”ti iminā saddantarasampayogādinā viya pakaraṇavasenāpi
tika-s0104t:1264_10: saddo visesavisayoti dīpeti. Vīriyañcāti yathāvuttehi tīhi padehi vuttaṃ tippabhedaṃ
tika-s0104t:1264_11: vīriyañca. Etthāti “ātappa…pe… manasikāramanvāyā”ti imasmiṃ pāṭhe, sīlavisuddhiyā
tika-s0104t:1264_12: saddhiṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ adhigamanapaṭipadā idha vattabbā, sā pana visuddhimagge
tika-s0104t:1264_13: vitthārato vuttāti āha “saṅkhepattho”ti. Tathājātikanti tathāsabhāvaṃ, etena cuddasavidhehi
tika-s0104t:1264_16: samādhi. Yathā-saddo “yenā”ti atthe nipātoti āha “yena samādhinā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1265_1: So diṭṭhigatiko evaṃ vadatīti vattamānavacanaṃ, tathāvadanassa avicchedabhāvena sabbakālikatādassanatthanti
tika-s0104t:1265_2: veditabbaṃ. Aniyamite hi kālavisese vippakatakālavacananti. Vanati yācati puttanti
tika-s0104t:1265_3: vañjhā jha-paccayaṃ, na-kārassa ca niggahitaṃ katvā, vadhati puttaṃ, phalaṃ vā hanatītipi
tika-s0104t:1265_4: vañjhā sapaccayaghya-kārassa jha-kāraṃ, niggahitāgamañca katvā. Sā viya kassaci phalassa
tika-s0104t:1265_5: ajanenāti vañjho, tenāha “vañjhapasū”tiādi. Evaṃ padatthavatā iminā kīdisaṃ sāmatthiyatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1265_6: dassetīti antolīnacodanaṃ pariharituṃ “etenā”tiādimāha. Jhānalābhissa visesena jhānadhammā
tika-s0104t:1265_7: āpāthamāgacchanti, tammukhena pana sesadhammāpīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “jhānādīna”nti
tika-s0104t:1265_9: kiñci janentī”ti paṭikkhipati. Kasmāti ce? Sati hi janakabhāve rūpādidhammānaṃ viya,
tika-s0104t:1265_10: sukhādidhammānaṃ viya ca paccayāyattavuttitāya uppādavantatā viññāyati, uppāde ca
tika-s0104t:1265_11: sati avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti anavakāsāva niccatā siyā, tasmā taṃ paṭikkhipatīti.
tika-s0104t:1266_0: Ṭhitoti niccalaṃ patiṭṭhito, kūṭaṭṭha-saddoyeva vā loke accantaṃ nicce niruḷho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1266_1: Tiṭṭhatīti ṭhāyī, esikā ca sā ṭhāyī cāti esikaṭṭhāyī, visesanaparanipāto cesa, tasmā
tika-s0104t:1266_2: gambhīranemo niccalaṭṭhitiko indakhīlo viyāti attho, tenāha “yathā”tiādi. “Kūṭaṭṭho”ti
tika-s0104t:1266_3: iminā cettha aniccatābhāvamāha. “Esikaṭṭhāyī ṭhito”ti iminā pana yathā esikā vātappahārādīhi
tika-s0104t:1266_4: na calati, evaṃ na kenaci vikāramāpajjatīti vikārābhāvaṃ, vikāropi atthato vināsoyevāti
tika-s0104t:1267_0: Evamaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ dassetvā idāni kecivādaṃ dassetuṃ “keci panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Muñjatoti
tika-s0104t:1267_1: [muñje (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)] muñjatiṇato. Īsikāti kaḷīro. Yadidaṃ attasaṅkhātaṃ dhammajātaṃ
tika-s0104t:1267_2: jāyatīti vuccati, taṃ sattirūpavasena pubbe vijjamānameva byattirūpavasena nikkhamati,
tika-s0104t:1267_3: abhibyattiṃ gacchatīti attho. “Vijjamānamevā”ti hi etena kāraṇe phalassa atthibhāvadassanena
tika-s0104t:1267_4: byattirūpavasena abhibyattivādaṃ dasseti. Sāligabbhe saṃvijjamānaṃ sālisīsaṃ viya
tika-s0104t:1267_5: hi sattirūpaṃ, tadabhinikkhantaṃ viya byattirūpanti. Kathaṃ pana sattirūpavasena
tika-s0104t:1267_6: vijjamānoyeva pubbe anabhibyatto byattirūpavasena abhibyattiṃ gacchatīti? Yathā andhakārena
tika-s0104t:1267_7: paṭicchanno ghaṭo ālokena abhibyattiṃ gacchati, evamayampīti.
tika-s0104t:1268_0: Idamettha vicāretabbaṃ – kiṃ karonto āloko ghaṭaṃ pakāsetīti vuccati, yadi ghaṭavisayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1268_1: buddhiṃ karonto pakāseti, anuppannāya eva buddhiyā uppattidīpanato abhibyattivādo
tika-s0104t:1268_2: hāyati. Atha ghaṭavisayāya buddhiyā āvaraṇabhūtaṃ andhakāraṃ vidhamanto pakāseti,
tika-s0104t:1268_3: evampi abhibyattivādo hāyateva. Sati hi ghaṭavisayāya buddhiyā kathaṃ andhakāro tassā
tika-s0104t:1268_4: āvaraṇaṃ hotīti. Yathā ca ghaṭassa abhibyatti na yujjati, evaṃ diṭṭhigatikaparikappitassa
tika-s0104t:1268_5: attanopi abhibyatti na yujjatiyeva. Tatthāpi hi yadi indriyavisayādisannipātena anuppannā
tika-s0104t:1268_6: eva buddhi uppannā, uppattivacaneneva abhibyattivādo hāyati abhibyattimattamatikkamma
tika-s0104t:1268_7: anuppannāya eva buddhiyā uppattidīpanato. Tathā sassatavādopi teneva kāraṇena. Atha
tika-s0104t:1268_8: buddhippavattiyā āvaraṇabhūtassa andhakāraṭṭhāniyassa mohassa vidhamanena buddhi
tika-s0104t:1268_9: uppannā. Evampi sati atthavisayāya buddhiyā kathaṃ moho tassā āvaraṇaṃ hotīti, hāyateva
tika-s0104t:1268_10: abhibyattivādo, kiñca bhiyyo – bhedasabbhāvatopi abhibyattivādo hāyati. Na hi abhibyañjanakānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1268_11: candimasūriyamaṇipadīpādīnaṃ bhedena abhibyañjitabbānaṃ ghaṭādīnaṃ bhedo hoti, hoti
tika-s0104t:1268_12: ca visayabhedena buddhibhedo yathāvisayaṃ buddhiyā sambhavatoti bhiyyopi abhibyatti
tika-s0104t:1268_13: na yujjatiyeva, na cettha vijjamānatābhibyattivasena vuttikappanā yuttā vijjamānatābhibyattikiriyāsaṅkhātāya
tika-s0104t:1268_14: vuttiyā vuttimato ca anaññathānujānanato. Anaññāyeva hi tathā vuttisaṅkhātā kiriyā
tika-s0104t:1268_15: tabbantavatthuto, yathā phassādīhi phusanādibhāvo, tasmā vuttimato anaññāya eva vijjamānatābhibyattisaṅkhātāya
tika-s0104t:1268_16: vuttiyā parikappito kesañci abhibyattivādo na yutto evāti. Ye pana “īsikaṭṭhāyī ṭhito”ti
tika-s0104t:1268_17: paṭhitvā yathāvuttamatthamicchanti, te tadidaṃ kāraṇabhāvena gahetvā “te ca sattā
tika-s0104t:1268_18: sandhāvanti saṃsaranti cavanti upapajjantī”ti padehi atthasambandhampi karonti, na
tika-s0104t:1268_19: aṭṭhakathāyamiva asambandhanti dassento “yasmā cā”tiādimāha. Te ca sattā sandhāvantīti
tika-s0104t:1268_20: ettha ye idha manussabhāvena avaṭṭhitā, teyeva devabhāvādiupagamanena ito aññattha
tika-s0104t:1268_21: gacchantīti attho. Aññathā katassa kammassa vināso, akatassa ca abbhāgamo āpajjeyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1269_0: Aparāparanti aparasmā bhavā aparaṃ bhavaṃ, aparamaparaṃ vā, punappunanti attho. “Cavantī”ti
tika-s0104t:1269_1: padamulliṅgetvā “evaṃ saṅkhyaṃ gacchantī”ti atthaṃ vivarati, attano tathāgahitassa
tika-s0104t:1269_2: niccasabhāvattā na cutūpapattiyo. Sabbabyāpitāya nāpi sandhāvanasaṃsaraṇāni, dhammānaṃyeva
tika-s0104t:1269_3: pana pavattivisesena evaṃ saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti evaṃ voharīyantīti adhippāyo. Etena
tika-s0104t:1269_4: “avaṭṭhitasabhāvassa attano, dhammino ca dhammamattaṃ uppajjati ceva vinassati cā”ti
tika-s0104t:1269_5: imaṃ vipariṇāmavādaṃ dasseti. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ imissaṃ sassatavādavicāraṇāyameva
tika-s0104t:1269_6: “evaṃgatikā”ti padatthavibhāvane vakkhāma. Idāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ asambandhamattaṃ
tika-s0104t:1269_7: dassetuṃ “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sandhāvantītiādinā vacanena attano vādaṃ
tika-s0104t:1269_8: bhindati vināseti sandhāvanādivacanasiddhāya aniccatāya pubbe attanā paṭiññātassa
tika-s0104t:1269_10: Na nibaddhanti na thiraṃ. “Sandhāvantī”tiādivacanaṃ, sassatavādañca sandhāya “sundarampi
tika-s0104t:1269_11: asundarampi hotiyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbadā saranti pavattantīti sassatiyo ra-kārassa
tika-s0104t:1269_12: sa-kāraṃ, dvibhāvañca katvā, pathavīsinerucandimasūriyā, sassatīhi samaṃ sadisaṃ
tika-s0104t:1269_13: tathā, bhāvanapuṃsakavacanañcetaṃ. “Attā ca loko cā”ti hi kattuadhikāro. Sassatisamanti
tika-s0104t:1269_14: vā liṅgabyattayena kattuniddeso. Sassatisamo attā ca loko ca atthi evāti attho, iti-saddo
tika-s0104t:1269_15: cettha padapūraṇamattaṃ. Eva-saddassa hi e-kāre pare iti-sadde i-kārassa va-kāramicchanti
tika-s0104t:1269_16: saddavidū. Sassatisamanti sassataṃ thāvaraṃ niccakālantipi attho, sassatisama-saddassa
tika-s0104t:1270_0: Hetuṃ dassentoti yesaṃ “sassato”ti attānañca lokañca paññapeti, tesaṃ hetuṃ dassento
tika-s0104t:1270_1: ayaṃ diṭṭhigatiko āhāti sambandho. Na hi attano diṭṭhiyā paccakkhakatamatthaṃ attanoyeva
tika-s0104t:1270_2: sādheti, attano pana paccakkhakatena atthena attano appaccakkhabhūtampi atthaṃ sādheti,
tika-s0104t:1270_3: attanā ca yathānicchitaṃ atthaṃ parepi viññāpeti, na anicchitaṃ, idaṃ pana hetudassanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1270_4: etesu anekesu jātisatasahassesu ekovāyaṃ me attā ca loko ca anussaraṇasambhavato.
tika-s0104t:1270_5: Yo hi yamatthaṃ anubhavati, so eva taṃ anussarati, na añño. Na hi aññena anubhūtamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1270_6: añño anussarituṃ sakkoti yathā taṃ buddharakkhitena anubhūtaṃ dhammarakkhito. Yathā
tika-s0104t:1270_7: cetāsu, evaṃ ito purimatarāsupi jātīsu, tasmā “sassato me attā ca loko ca, yathā
tika-s0104t:1270_8: ca me, evaṃ aññesampi sattānaṃ sassato attā ca loko cā”ti sassatavasena diṭṭhigahaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1270_9: pakkhandanto diṭṭhigatiko parepi tattha patiṭṭhapeti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anekavihitāni
tika-s0104t:1270_10: adhimuttipathāni abhivadanti, so evamāhā”ti vacanato parānugāhāpanavasena idha hetudassanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1270_11: adhippetanti viññāyati. Etanti attano ca lokassa ca sassatabhāvaṃ. “Na kevala”ntiādi
tika-s0104t:1270_12: atthato āpannadassanaṃ. Ṭhāna-saddo kāraṇe, tañca kho idha pubbenivāsānussatiyevāti
tika-s0104t:1270_13: āha “ida”ntiādi. Kāraṇañca nāmetaṃ tividhaṃ sampāpakaṃ nibbattakaṃ ñāpakanti. Tattha
tika-s0104t:1270_14: ariyamaggo nibbānassa sampāpakakāraṇaṃ, bījaṃ aṅkurassa nibbattakakāraṇaṃ, paccayuppannatādayo
tika-s0104t:1270_15: aniccatādīnaṃ ñāpakakāraṇaṃ, idhāpi ñāpakakāraṇameva adhippetaṃ. Ñāpako hi attho
tika-s0104t:1270_16: ñāpetabbatthavisayassa ñāṇassa hetubhāvato kāraṇaṃ. Tadāyattavuttitāya taṃ ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1270_17: tiṭṭhati etthāti ṭhānaṃ, vasati taṃ ñāṇamettha tiṭṭhatīti “vatthū”ti ca vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1270_18: Tathā hi bhagavatā vatthu-saddena uddisitvāpi ṭhāna-saddena niddiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0104t:1271_0: 32-33. Dutiyatatiyavārānaṃ paṭhamavārato viseso natthi ṭhapetvā kālabhedanti āha
tika-s0104t:1271_1: “upari vāradvayepi eseva nayo”ti. Tadetaṃ kālabhedaṃ yathāpāḷiṃ dassetuṃ “kevalañhī”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1271_2: vuttaṃ. Itarena dutiyatatiyavārā yāva dasasaṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappā, yāva cattālīsasaṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappā
tika-s0104t:1271_3: ca anussaraṇavasena vuttāti adhippāyo. Yadevaṃ kasmā sassatavādo catudhā vibhatto,
tika-s0104t:1271_4: nanu tidhā kālabhedamakatvā adhiccasamuppattikavādo viya duvidheneva vibhajitabbo
tika-s0104t:1271_5: siyāti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “mandapañño hī”tiādimāha. Mandapaññādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇalābhīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1271_6: vasena tidhā kālabhedaṃ katvā takkanena saha catudhā vibhattoti adhippāyo. Nanu ca
tika-s0104t:1271_7: anussavādivasena takkikānaṃ viya mandapaññādīnampi visesalābhīnaṃ hīnādivasena anekabhedasambhavato
tika-s0104t:1271_8: bahudhā bhedo siyā, atha kasmā sabbepi visesalābhino tayo eva rāsī katvā vuttāti?
tika-s0104t:1271_9: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena dassetukāmattā. Tīsu hi rāsīsu ye hīnamajjhimapaññā, te vuttaparicchedato
tika-s0104t:1271_10: ūnakameva anussaranti. Ye pana ukkaṭṭhapaññā, te vuttaparicchedaṃ atikkamitvā nānussarantīti
tika-s0104t:1271_12: tayo eva rāsī katvā vuttāti. Na tato uddhanti yathāvuttakālattayato, cattārīsasaṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappato
tika-s0104t:1271_13: vā uddhaṃ nānussarati, kasmā? Dubbalapaññattā. Tesañhi nāmarūpaparicchedavirahato
tika-s0104t:1272_0: 34. Tappakatiyattopi kattutthoyevāti āha “takkayatī”ti. Tappakatiyattattā eva hi
tika-s0104t:1272_1: dutiyanayopi upapanno hoti. Tattha takkayatīti ūhayati, sassatādiākārena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:1272_2: ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropayatīti attho. Takkoti ākoṭanalakkhaṇo, vinicchayalakkhaṇo
tika-s0104t:1272_3: vā diṭṭhiṭṭhānabhūto vitakko. Tena tena pariyāyena takkanaṃ sandhāya “takketvā vitakketvā”ti
tika-s0104t:1272_4: vuttaṃ vīmaṃsāya samannāgatoti atthavacanamattaṃ. Nibbacanaṃ pana takkipade viya
tika-s0104t:1272_5: dvidhā vattabbaṃ. Vīmaṃsā nāma vicāraṇā, sā ca duvidhā paññā ceva paññāpatirūpikā
tika-s0104t:1272_6: ca. Idha pana paññāpatirūpikāva, sā catthato lobhasahagatacittuppādo, micchābhinivesasaṅkhāto
tika-s0104t:1272_7: vā ayonisomanasikāro. Pubbabhāge vā micchādassanabhūtaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ, tadetamatthattayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1272_9: yojetabbaṃ. Samantato, punappunaṃ vā āhananaṃ pariyāhataṃ, taṃ pana vitakkassa ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1272_10: ūhanameva, bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ padanti dasseti “tena tena pariyāyena takketvā”ti
tika-s0104t:1272_11: iminā. Pariyāyenāti ca kāraṇenāti attho. Vuttappakārāyāti tidhā vuttappabhedāya.
tika-s0104t:1272_12: Anuvicaritanti anupavattitaṃ, vīmaṃsānugatena vā vicārena anumajjitaṃ. Tadanugatadhammakiccampi
tika-s0104t:1272_13: hi padhānadhamme āropetvā tathā vuccati. Paṭibhāti dissatīti paṭibhānaṃ, yathāsamāhitākāravisesavibhāvako
tika-s0104t:1272_14: diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādo, tato jātanti paṭibhānaṃ, tathā paññāyanaṃ, sayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1272_15: attano paṭibhānaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ, tenevāha “attano paṭibhānamattasañjāta”nti. Matta-saddena
tika-s0104t:1272_16: cettha visesādhigamādayo nivatteti. Anāmaṭṭhakālavacane vattamānavaseneva atthaniddeso
tika-s0104t:1273_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “takkī hoti vīmaṃsī”ti sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesena vā vuttaṃ takkībhedaṃ
tika-s0104t:1273_1: vibhajanto “tattha catubbidho”tiādimāha. Parehi puna savanaṃ anussuti, sā yassāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1273_2: anussutiko. Purimaṃ anubhūtapubbaṃ jātiṃ saratīti jātissaro. Labbhateti lābho, yaṃ
tika-s0104t:1273_3: kiñci attanā paṭiladdhaṃ rūpādi, sukhādi ca, na pana jhānādiviseso, tenevāha pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1273_6: visesādhigamādayo nivattetī”ti so etassāti lābhī. Suddhena purimehi asammissena,
tika-s0104t:1273_7: suddhaṃ vā takkanaṃ suddhatakko, so yassāyaṃ suddhatakkiko. Tena hīti uyyojanatthe
tika-s0104t:1273_8: nipāto, tena tathā vessantararaññova bhagavati samāneti diṭṭhiggāhaṃ uyyojeti. Lābhitāyāti
tika-s0104t:1273_9: rūpādisukhādilābhībhāvato. “Anāgatepi evaṃ bhavissatī”ti idaṃ lābhītakkino evampi
tika-s0104t:1273_10: sambhavatīti sambhavadassanavasena idhādhippetaṃ takkanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anāgataṃsatakkaneneva
tika-s0104t:1273_11: hi sassataggāhī bhavati. “Atītepi evaṃ ahosī”ti idaṃ pana anāgataṃsatakkanassa upanissayanidassanamattaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1273_12: So hi “yathā me idāni attā sukhī hoti, evaṃ atītepīti paṭhamaṃ atītaṃsānutakkanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1273_13: upanissāya anāgatepi evaṃ bhavissatī”ti takkayanto diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. “Evaṃ sati idaṃ
tika-s0104t:1273_14: hotī”ti iminā aniccesu bhāvesu añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedetīti doso āpajjati, tathā
tika-s0104t:1273_15: ca sati katassa vināso akatassa ca ajjhāgamo siyā. Niccesu pana bhāvesu añño karoti,
tika-s0104t:1273_16: añño paṭisaṃvedetīti doso nāpajjati. Evañca sati katassa avināso, akatassa ca anajjhāgamo
tika-s0104t:1274_0: Takkamattenevāti suddhatakkaneneva. Matta-saddena hi āgamādīnaṃ, anussavādīnañca
tika-s0104t:1274_1: abhāvaṃ dasseti. “Nanu ca visesalābhinopi sassatavādino visesādhigamahetu anekesu
tika-s0104t:1274_2: jātisatasahassesu, dasasu saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭesu, cattālīsāya ca saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭesu yathānubhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1274_3: attano santānaṃ, tappaṭibaddhañca dhammajātaṃ “attā, loko”ti ca anussaritvā tato
tika-s0104t:1274_4: purimatarāsupi jātīsu tathābhūtassa atthitānuvitakkanamukhena anāgatepi evaṃ bhavissatīti
tika-s0104t:1274_5: attano bhavissamānānutakkanaṃ, sabbesampi sattānaṃ tathābhāvānutakkanañca katvā sassatābhinivesino
tika-s0104t:1274_6: jātā, evañca sati sabbopi sassatavādī anussutikajātissaralābhītakkikā viya attano
tika-s0104t:1274_7: upaladdhavatthunimittena takkanena pavattavādattā takkīpakkheyeva tiṭṭheyya, tathā
tika-s0104t:1274_8: ca sati visesabhedarahitattā ekovāyaṃ sassatavādo vavatthito bhaveyya, avassañca
tika-s0104t:1274_9: vuttappakāraṃ takkanamicchitabbaṃ, aññathā visesalābhī sassatavādī ekaccasassatikapakkhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1274_10: adhiccasamuppannikapakkhaṃ vā bhajeyyāti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Visesalābhīnañhi
tika-s0104t:1274_12: Tathā hi “anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarāmi. Imināmahaṃ etaṃ jānāmī”ti anussaraṇameva
tika-s0104t:1274_13: padhānakāraṇabhāvena dassitaṃ. Yaṃ pana tassa “imināmahaṃ etaṃ jānāmī”ti pavattaṃ
tika-s0104t:1274_14: takkanaṃ, na taṃ idha padhānaṃ anussaraṇaṃ paṭicca tassa apadhānabhāvato, padhānakāraṇena
tika-s0104t:1274_15: ca asādhāraṇena niddeso sāsane, lokepi ca niruḷho yathā “cakkhuviññāṇaṃ yavaṅkuro”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1275_0: Evaṃ panāyaṃ desanā padhānakāraṇavibhāvinī, tasmā satipi anussavādivasena, takkikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1275_1: hīnādivasena ca mandapaññādīnaṃ visesalābhīnaṃ bahudhā bhede aññatarabhedasaṅgahavasena
tika-s0104t:1275_2: bhagavatā cattāriṭṭhānāni vibhajitvā vavatthitā sassatavādānaṃ catubbidhatā. Na hi,
tika-s0104t:1275_3: idha sāvasesaṃ dhammaṃ deseti dhammarājāti. Yadevaṃ anussutikādīsupi anussavādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1275_4: padhānabhāvo āpajjatīti? Na tesaṃ aññāya sacchikiriyāya abhāvena takkapadhānattā,
tika-s0104t:1275_5: “padhānakāraṇena ca asādhāraṇena niddeso sāsane, lokepi ca niruḷho”ti vuttovāyamatthoti.
tika-s0104t:1275_6: Atha vā visesādhigamanimittarahitassa takkanassa sassataggāhe visuṃ kāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1275_7: visesādhigamo visuṃ sassataggāhakāraṇabhāvena vattabbo, so ca mandamajjhimatikkhapaññāvasena
tika-s0104t:1275_8: tividhoti tidhā vibhajitvā, sabbatakkino ca takkībhāvasāmaññato ekajjhaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0104t:1276_0: 35. “Aññatarenā”ti etassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “ekenā”ti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhānapayuttassa pana
tika-s0104t:1276_1: vā-saddassa aniyamatthataṃ sandhāyāha “dvīhi vā tīhi vā”ti, tena catūsu vatthūsu
tika-s0104t:1276_2: yathārahamekaccaṃ ekaccassa paññāpane sahakārīkāraṇanti dasseti. “Bahiddhā”ti bāhyatthavācako
tika-s0104t:1276_3: kattuniddiṭṭho nipātoti dassetuṃ “bahī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Etthāha – kiṃ panetāni vatthūni
tika-s0104t:1276_4: attano abhinivesassa hetu, udāhu paresaṃ patiṭṭhāpanassāti. Kiñcettha, yadi tāva
tika-s0104t:1276_5: attano abhinivesassa hetu, atha kasmā anussaraṇatakkanāniyeva gahitāni, na saññāvipallāsādayo.
tika-s0104t:1276_7: diṭṭhiyā pavattanaṭṭhena diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni. Atha pana paresaṃ patiṭṭhāpanassa hetu,
tika-s0104t:1276_8: anussaraṇahetubhūto adhigamo viya, takkanapariyeṭṭhibhūtā yutti viya ca āgamopi vatthubhāvena
tika-s0104t:1276_9: vattabbo, ubhayathāpi ca yathāvuttassa avasesakāraṇassa sambhavato “natthi ito bahiddhā”ti
tika-s0104t:1276_10: vacanaṃ na yujjatevāti? No na yujjati, kasmā? Abhinivesapakkhe tāva ayaṃ diṭṭhigatiko
tika-s0104t:1276_12: khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvassa anavabodhato dhammayuttiṃ atidhāvanto ekattanayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1276_13: micchā gahetvā yathāvuttānussaraṇatakkanehi khandhesu “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti
tika-s0104t:1276_14: abhinivesaṃ upanesi, iti āsannakāraṇattā, padhānakāraṇattā ca taggahaṇeneva ca itaresampi
tika-s0104t:1276_15: gahitattā anussaraṇatakkanāniyeva idha gahitāni. Patiṭṭhāpanapakkhe pana āgamopi
tika-s0104t:1276_16: yuttiyameva ṭhito visesena nirāgamānaṃ bāhirakānaṃ takkaggāhibhāvato, tasmā anussaraṇatakkanāniyeva
tika-s0104t:1277_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – duvidhaṃ paramatthadhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ, sāmaññalakkhaṇañca.
tika-s0104t:1277_2: Āgamo ca sutamayāya paññāya sādhanato anumānañāṇameva āvahati, sutānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1277_3: ākāraparivitakkanena nijjhānakkhantiyaṃ ṭhito cintāmayapaññaṃ nibbattetvā anukkamena
tika-s0104t:1277_4: bhāvanāya paccakkhañāṇaṃ adhigacchatīti evaṃ āgamopi takkanavisayaṃ nātikkamati,
tika-s0104t:1277_5: tasmā cesa takkaggahaṇena gahitovāti veditabbo. So aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anussutitakkaggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:1277_6: vibhāvito, evaṃ anussaraṇatakkanehi asaṅgahitassa avasiṭṭhassa kāraṇassa asambhavato
tika-s0104t:1277_7: yuttamevidaṃ “natthi ito bahiddhā”ti vacananti veditabbaṃ. “Anekavihitāni adhimuttipadāni
tika-s0104t:1277_8: abhivadantī”ti, “sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti ca vacanato pana patiṭṭhāpanavatthūniyeva
tika-s0104t:1277_9: idha desitāni taṃdesanāya eva abhinivesassāpi sijjhanato. Anekabhedesu hi desitesu
tika-s0104t:1277_10: yasmiṃ desite tadaññepi desitā siddhā honti, tameva desetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhinivesapatiṭṭhāpanesu
tika-s0104t:1277_11: ca abhinivese desitepi patiṭṭhāpanaṃ na sijjhati abhinivesassa patiṭṭhāpane aniyamato.
tika-s0104t:1277_12: Abhinivesinopi hi keci patiṭṭhāpenti, keci na patiṭṭhāpenti. Patiṭṭhāpane pana desite
tika-s0104t:1277_13: abhinivesopi sijjhati patiṭṭhāpanassa abhinivese niyamato. Yo hi yattha pare patiṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0104t:1278_0: 36. Tayidanti ettha ta-saddena “sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti etassa parāmasananti
tika-s0104t:1278_1: āha “taṃ idaṃ catubbidhampi diṭṭhigata”nti. Tatoti tasmā pakārato jānanattā. Paramavajjatāya
tika-s0104t:1278_2: anekavihitānaṃ anatthānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato diṭṭhiyo eva ṭhānā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā. Yathāha
tika-s0104t:1278_4: diṭṭhiṭṭhānā”ti vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhīnaṃ kāraṇampi diṭṭhiṭṭhānameva diṭṭhīnaṃ uppādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena.
tika-s0104t:1278_5: “Yathāhā”tiādi paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā sādhanaṃ. Tattha khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇaṭṭhena.
tika-s0104t:1278_6: Vuttañhi “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādi, avijjāpi upanissayādibhāvena. Yathāha
tika-s0104t:1278_7: “assutavā bhikkhave, puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido”tiādi phassopi
tika-s0104t:1278_8: phusitvā gahaṇūpāyaṭṭhena. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tadapi phassapaccayā phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentī”ti
tika-s0104t:1278_9: saññāpi ākāramattaggahaṇaṭṭhena. Vuttañhetaṃ “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”ti pathaviṃ
tika-s0104t:1278_10: pathavito saññatvā”ti ca ādi. Vitakkopi ākāraparivitakkanaṭṭhena. Tena vuttaṃ “takkañca
tika-s0104t:1278_11: diṭṭhīsu pakappayitvā, saccaṃ musāti dvayadhammamāhū”ti, “takkī hoti vīmaṃsī”ti ca
tika-s0104t:1278_12: ādi. Ayoniso manasikāropi akusalānaṃ sādhāraṇakāraṇaṭṭhena. Tenāha “tassa evaṃ ayoniso
tika-s0104t:1278_13: manasi karoto channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati. Atthi me attā’ti vā assa
tika-s0104t:1278_14: saccato thetato diṭṭhiuppajjatī”tiādi pāpamittopi diṭṭhānugati āpajjanaṭṭhena. Vuttampi
tika-s0104t:1278_15: ca “bāhiraṃ bhikkhave, aṅganti karitvā nāññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupasssāmi, yaṃ evaṃ
tika-s0104t:1278_16: mahato anatthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave, pāpamittatā”tiādi paratoghosopi
tika-s0104t:1278_17: durakkhātadhammassavanaṭṭhena. Tathā ceva vuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave, paccayā micchādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0104t:1278_18: uppādāya. Katame dve? Parato ca ghoso, ayoniso ca manasikāro”tiādi parehi sutā, desitā
tika-s0104t:1279_0: “Khandhā hetū”tiādipāḷi tadatthavibhāvinī. Tattha janakaṭṭhena hetu, upatthambhakaṭṭhena
tika-s0104t:1279_1: paccayo. Upādāyāti upādiyitvā, paṭiccāti attho. “Uppādāyā”tipi pāṭho, uppajjanāyāti
tika-s0104t:1279_2: attho. Samuṭṭhāti etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ, khandhādayo eva. Idha pana samuṭṭhānabhāvoyeva
tika-s0104t:1279_3: samuṭṭhāna-saddena vutto bhāvalopattā, bhāvappadhānattā ca. Ādinnā sakasantāne. Pavattitā
tika-s0104t:1279_5: “idameva dassanaṃ saccaṃ, aññaṃ pana moghaṃ tucchaṃ musā”ti abhinivesassa pariyosānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1279_6: matthakaṃ pāpitāti attho. Ārammaṇavasenāti aṭṭhasu diṭṭhiṭṭhānesu khandhe sandhāyāha.
tika-s0104t:1279_8: Yadipi sarūpatthavasena vevacanaṃ, saṅketatthavasena pana evaṃ vattabboti dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:1279_9: “evaṃvidhaparalokā”ti vuttaṃ. Yena kenaci hi visesaneneva vevacanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t:1279_10: Paraloko ca kammavasena abhimukho sampareti gacchati pavattati etthāti abhisamparāyoti
tika-s0104t:1279_11: vuccati. “Iti kho ānanda, kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parentī”tiādīsu viya
tika-s0104t:1279_12: hi curādigaṇavasena para-saddaṃ gatiyamicchanti saddavidū, ayamettha aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo.
tika-s0104t:1280_1: attho. Gati-saddo cettha “yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavantī”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1280_2: viya niṭṭhānattho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ime diṭṭhisaṅkhātā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā evaṃ paramatthato
tika-s0104t:1280_3: asantaṃ attānaṃ, sassatabhāvañca tasmiṃ ajjhāropetvā gahitā, parāmaṭṭhā ca samānā
tika-s0104t:1280_4: bālalapanāyeva hutvā yāva paṇḍitā na samanuyuñjanti, tāva gacchanti, pātubhavanti
tika-s0104t:1280_5: ca, paṇḍitehi samanuyuñjiyamānā pana anavaṭṭhitavatthukā avimaddakkhamā sūriyuggamane
tika-s0104t:1280_6: ussāvabindū viya, khajjopanakā viya ca bhijjanti, vinassanti cāti.
tika-s0104t:1281_0: Tatthāyaṃ anuyuñjane saṅkhepakathā – yadi hi parehi kappito attā loko vā sassato
tika-s0104t:1281_1: siyā, tassa nibbikāratāya purimarūpāvijahanato kassaci visesādhānassa kātumasakkuṇeyyatāya
tika-s0104t:1281_2: ahitato nivattanatthaṃ, hite ca paṭipajjanatthaṃ upadeso eva sassatavādino nippayojano
tika-s0104t:1281_3: siyā, kathaṃ vā tena so upadeso pavattīyati vikārābhāvato. Evañca sati parikappitassa
tika-s0104t:1281_4: attano ajaṭākāsassa viya dānādikiriyā, hiṃsādikiriyā ca na sambhavati, tathā sukhassa,
tika-s0104t:1281_5: dukkhassa ca anubhavananibandho eva sassatavādino na yujjati kammabaddhābhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1281_6: Jātiādīnañca asambhavato vimokkho na bhaveyya, atha pana dhammamattaṃ tassa uppajjati
tika-s0104t:1281_7: ceva vinassati ca, yassa vasenāyaṃ kiriyādivohāroti vadeyya, evampi purimarūpāvijahanena
tika-s0104t:1281_8: avaṭṭhitassa attano dhammamattanti na sakkā sambhāvetuṃ, te vā panassa dhammā avatthābhūtā,
tika-s0104t:1281_9: tasmā tassa uppannā aññe vā siyuṃ anaññe vā, yadi aññe, na tāhi avatthāhi tassa uppannāhipi
tika-s0104t:1281_10: koci viseso atthi, yāhi karoti paṭisaṃvedeti cavati uppajjati cāti icchitaṃ, evañca
tika-s0104t:1281_11: dhammakappanāpi niratthakā siyā, tasmā tadavattho eva yathāvuttadoso, athānaññe,
tika-s0104t:1281_12: uppādavināsavantīhi avatthāhi anaññassa attano tāsaṃ viya uppādavināsasabbhāvato
tika-s0104t:1281_13: kuto bhaveyya niccatāvakāso, tāsampi vā attano viya niccatāpavatti, tasmā bandhavimokkhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1281_14: asambhavo evāti na yujjatiyeva sassatavādo, na cettha koci vādī dhammānaṃ sassatabhāve
tika-s0104t:1281_15: parisuddaṃ yuttiṃ vattuṃ samattho bhaveyya, yuttirahitañca vacanaṃ na paṇḍitānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1281_16: cittaṃ ārādheti, tenāvocumha “yāva paṇḍitā na samanuyuñjanti, tāva gacchanti, pātubhavanti cā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1282_0: Sakāraṇaṃ sagatikanti ettha saha-saddo vijjamānattho “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1282_1: viya, na pana samavāyattho ca-saddena “tayidaṃ bhikkhave, tathāgato pajānātī”ti vuttassa
tika-s0104t:1282_2: diṭṭhigatassa samuccinitattā, “tañca tathāgato pajānātī”ti iminā ca kāraṇagatīnameva
tika-s0104t:1282_3: pajānanabhāvena vuttattā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tayidaṃ bhikkhave, kāraṇavantaṃ gativantaṃ
tika-s0104t:1282_4: diṭṭhigataṃ tathāgato pajānāti, na kevalañca tadeva, atha kho tassa kāraṇagatisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0104t:1282_5: tañca sabbanti. “Tato…pe… pajānātī”ti vuttavākyassa atthaṃ vuttanayena saṃvaṇṇeti
tika-s0104t:1282_7: “sabbaññutaññāṇañcā”ti, tasmiṃ vā vutte tadadhiṭṭhānato āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ, tadavinābhāvato
tika-s0104t:1282_8: vā sabbampi dasabalādiñāṇaṃ gahitamevātipi tadeva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1283_1: api-saddena vā “tañcā”ti vutta ca-saddassa sambhāvanatthabhāvaṃ dasseti, tena tato
tika-s0104t:1283_2: diṭṭigatato uttaritaraṃ sārabhūtaṃ sīlādiguṇavisesampi tathāgato nābhinivisati, ko
tika-s0104t:1283_3: pana vādo vaṭṭāmiseti sambhāveti. “Aha”nti diṭṭimānavasena parāmasanākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1283_4: Pajānāmīti ettha iti-saddena pakāratthena, nidassanatthena vā. “Mama”nti taṇhāvasena
tika-s0104t:1283_6: Dhammasabhāvamatikkamitvā “ahaṃ mama”nti parato abhūtato āmasanaṃ parāmāso, taṇhādayo
tika-s0104t:1283_7: eva. Na hi taṃ atthi, yaṃ khandhesu “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahetabbaṃ siyā, aparāmasato
tika-s0104t:1283_8: aparāmasantassa assa tathāgatassa nibbuti viditāti sambandho. “Aparāmasato”ti cedaṃ
tika-s0104t:1283_10: padamapekkhitvā kattari sāmivacanaṃ. Aparāmasato parāmāsarahitapaṭipattihetu assa
tika-s0104t:1283_11: tathāgatassa kattubhūtassa nibbuti asaṅkhatadhātu viditā, adhigatāti vā attho. “Aparāmasato”ti
tika-s0104t:1284_0: “Aparāmāsapaccayā”ti paccattaññeva pavedanāya kāraṇadassanaṃ. Assāti kattāraṃ vatvāpi
tika-s0104t:1284_1: paccattaññevāti visesadassanatthaṃ puna kattuvacananti āha “sayameva attanāyevā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1284_2: Sayaṃ, attanāti vā bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ. Nipātapadañhetaṃ. “Aparāmasato”ti vacanato parāmāsānameva
tika-s0104t:1284_3: nibbuti idha desitā, taṃdesanāya eva tadaññesampi nibbutiyā sijjhanatoti dasseti
tika-s0104t:1284_4: “tesaṃ parāmāsakilesāna”nti iminā, parāmāsasaṅkhātānaṃ kilesānanti attho. Apica kāmaṃ
tika-s0104t:1284_5: “aparāmasato”ti vacanato parāmāsānameva nibbuti idha desitāti viññāyati, taṃdesanāya
tika-s0104t:1284_6: pana tadavasesānampi kilesānaṃ nibbuti desitā nāma bhavati pahānekaṭṭhatādibhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1284_7: tasmā tesampi nibbuti niddhāretvā dassetabbāti vuttaṃ “tesaṃ parāmāsakilesāna”nti,
tika-s0104t:1284_8: taṇhādiṭṭhimānasaṅkhātānaṃ parāmāsānaṃ, tadaññesañca kilesānanti attho. Gobalībaddanayo
tika-s0104t:1284_9: hesa. Nibbutīti ca nibbāyanabhūtā asaṅkhatadhātu, tañca bhagavā bodhimūleyeva patto,
tika-s0104t:1285_0: Yathāpaṭipannenāti yena paṭipannena. Tappaṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ “tāsaṃyeva…pe… ādimāhā”ti
tika-s0104t:1285_1: anusandhidassanaṃ. Kasmā pana vedanānaññeva kammaṭṭhānamācikkhatīti āha “yāsū”tiādi,
tika-s0104t:1285_2: iminā desanāvilāsaṃ dasseti. Desanāvilāsappatto hi bhagavā desanākusalo khandhāyatanādivasena
tika-s0104t:1285_3: anekavidhāsu catusaccadesanāsu sambhavantīsupi diṭṭhigatikā vedanāsu micchāpaṭipattiyā
tika-s0104t:1285_4: diṭṭhigahanaṃ pakkhandāti dassanatthaṃ tathāpakkhandanamūlabhūtā vedanāyeva pariññābhūmibhāvena
tika-s0104t:1285_5: uddharatīti. Idhāti imasmiṃ vāde. Evaṃ etthātipi. Kammaṭṭhānanti catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1285_6: Ettha hi vedanāgahaṇena gahitā pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ. Vedanānaṃ samudayaggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:1285_8: “yathābhūtaṃ viditvā”ti etena maggasaccanti evaṃ cattāri saccāni veditabbāni. “Yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1285_9: viditvā”ti idaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇatthapadanti tadatthaṃ vibhajja dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1285_10: vuttaṃ. Visesato hi “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”tiādilakkhaṇānaṃ vasena samudayādīsu
tika-s0104t:1285_11: attho yathārahaṃ vibhajja dassetabbo. Avisesato pana vedanāya samudayādīni vipassanāpaññāya
tika-s0104t:1285_13: attho. Paccayasamudayaṭṭhenāti “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti
tika-s0104t:1285_14: vuttalakkhaṇena avijjādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ uppādena ceva maggena asamugghāṭena ca. Yāva
tika-s0104t:1285_15: hi maggena na samugghāṭīyati, tāva paccayoti vuccati. Nibbattilakkhaṇanti uppādalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1285_16: jātinti attho. Pañcannaṃ lakkhaṇānanti ettha ca catunnampi paccayānaṃ uppādalakkhaṇameva
tika-s0104t:1285_17: aggahetvā paccayalakkhaṇampi gahetabbaṃ samudayaṃ paṭicca tesaṃ yathārahaṃ upakārakattā.
tika-s0104t:1285_18: Tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ “maggena asamugghāṭena cā”ti. Paccayanirodhaṭṭhenāti “imasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:1285_19: niruddhe idaṃ niruddhaṃ hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti vuttalakkhaṇena avijjādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1285_20: paccayānaṃ nirodhena ceva maggena samugghāṭena ca. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇanti nirodhalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1285_21: bhaṅganti attho. Vayanti nirodhaṃ. Yanti yasmā paccayabhāvasaṅkhātahetuto. Vedanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1285_22: paṭiccāti purimuppannaṃ ārammaṇādipaccayabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ labhitvā. Sukhaṃ somanassanti
tika-s0104t:1285_23: sukhañceva somanassañca. Ayanti purimavedanāya yathārahaṃ pacchimuppannānaṃ sukhasomanassānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1286_0: Aparo nayo – yanti sukhaṃ, somanassañca. Ayanti ca napuṃsakaliṅgena niddiṭṭhaṃ sukhasomanassameva
tika-s0104t:1286_1: assādapadamapekkhitvā pulliṅgena niddisīyati, imasmiṃ pana vikappe sukhasomanassānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1286_2: uppādoyeva tehi uppādavantehi niddiṭṭho, sattiyā, sattimato ca abhinnattā. Na hi
tika-s0104t:1286_3: sukhasomanassamantarena tesaṃ uppādo labbhati. Iti purimavedanaṃ paṭicca sukhasomanassuppādopi
tika-s0104t:1286_4: purimavedanāya assādo nāma assādīyateti katvā. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – purimamuppannaṃ
tika-s0104t:1286_5: vedanaṃ ārabbha somanassuppattiyaṃ yo purimavedanāya paccayabhāvasaṅkhāto assādetabbākāro,
tika-s0104t:1286_6: somanassassa vā uppādasaṅkhāto tadassādanākāro, ayaṃ purimavedanāya assādoti. Kathaṃ
tika-s0104t:1286_7: pana vedanaṃ ārabbha sukhaṃ uppajjati, nanu phoṭṭhabbārammaṇanti? Cetasikasukhasseva
tika-s0104t:1286_8: ārabbha pavattiyamadhippetattā nāyaṃ doso. Ārabbha pavattiyañhi visesanameva somanassaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1286_9: somanassaṃ sukhanti yathā “rukkho sīsapā”ti aññapaccayavasena uppattiyaṃ pana kāyikasukhampi
tika-s0104t:1287_0: “Yā vedanā aniccā”tiādinā sattimatā satti nidassitā. Tatrāyamattho – yā vedanā hutvā
tika-s0104t:1287_1: abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā, jarāya, maraṇena cāti dvidhā
tika-s0104t:1287_2: vipariṇāmetabbaṭṭhena vipariṇāmadhammā. Tassā evaṃbhūtāya ayaṃ aniccadukkhavipariṇāmabhāvo
tika-s0104t:1287_3: vedanāya sabbāyapiādīnavoti. Ādīnaṃ paramakāruññaṃ vāti pavattati etasmāti hi ādīnavo.
tika-s0104t:1287_4: Apicaādīnaṃ ativiya kapaṇaṃ pavattanaṭṭhena kapaṇamanusso ādīnavo, ayampi evaṃsabhāvoti
tika-s0104t:1287_5: tathā vuccati. Sattimatā hi satti abhinnā tadavinābhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1288_0: Ettha ca “aniccā”ti iminā saṅkhāradukkhatāvasena upekkhāvedanāya, sabbāsu vā vedanāsuādīnavamāha,
tika-s0104t:1288_2: sukhavedanāya. Avisesena vā tīṇipi padāni tissannampi vedanānaṃ vasena yojetabbāni.
tika-s0104t:1288_4: vacanato yaṃ chandarāgappahānanti yojetabbaṃ. Pariyāyavacanamevidaṃ padadvayaṃ. Yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1288_5: viditvāti maggassa vuttattā magganibbānavasena vā yathākkamaṃ yojanāpi vaṭṭati. Vedanāyāti
tika-s0104t:1288_6: nissakkavacanaṃ. Nissaraṇanti nekkhammaṃ. Yāva hi vedanāpaṭibaddhaṃ chandarāgaṃ nappajahati,
tika-s0104t:1288_7: tāvāyaṃ puriso vedanāya allīnoyeva hoti. Yadā pana taṃ chandarāgaṃ pajahati, tadāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1288_8: puriso vedanāya nissaṭo visaṃyutto hoti, tasmā chandarāgappahānaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1288_9: vuttaṃ. Tabbacanena pana vedanāsahajātanissayārammaṇabhūtā rūpārūpadhammā gahitā
tika-s0104t:1288_10: eva hontītipi pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi nissaraṇavacanaṃ siddhameva. Vedanāsīsena
tika-s0104t:1288_11: hi desanā āgatā, tattha pana kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Lakkhaṇahāravasenāpi ayamattho
tika-s0104t:1290: Vuttā bhavanti sabbo, so hāro lakkhaṇo nāmā”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:1291_0: Kāmupādānamūlakattā sesupādānānaṃ pahīne ca kāmupādāne upādānasesābhāvato “vigatachandarāgatāya
tika-s0104t:1291_1: anupādāno”ti vuttaṃ, etena “anupādāvimutto”ti etassatthaṃ saṅkhepena dasseti. Idaṃ
tika-s0104t:1291_2: vuttaṃ hoti – vigatachandarāgatāya anupādāno, anupādānattā ca anupādāvimuttoti. Tamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1291_3: vitthāretuṃ, samatthetuṃ vā “yasmi”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmiṃ upādāneti sesupādānamūlabhūte
tika-s0104t:1291_4: kāmupādāne. Tassāti kāmupādānassa. Anupādiyitvāti chandarāgavasena anādiyitvā, etena
tika-s0104t:1291_5: “anupādāvimutto”ti padassa ya-kāralopena samāsabhāvaṃ, byāsabhāvaṃ vā dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1292_1: vuttapajānanameva ca ima-saddena niddiṭṭhanti dassetuṃ “ye te”tiādimāha. Ye te sabbaññutaññāṇadhamme…pe…
tika-s0104t:1292_2: apucchiṃ, yehi sabbaññutaññāṇadhammehi…pe… vadeyyuṃ, tañca…pe… pajānātīti evaṃ niddiṭṭhā
tika-s0104t:1292_3: ime sabbaññutaññāṇadhammā gambhīrā…pe… paṇḍitavedanīyā cāti veditabbāti yojanā. “Eva”ntiādi
tika-s0104t:1292_4: piṇḍatthadassanaṃ. Tattha kiñcāpi “anupādāvimutto bhikkhave, tathāgato”ti iminā aggamaggaphaluppattiṃ
tika-s0104t:1292_5: dasseti, “vedanānaṃ, samudayañcā”tiādinā ca catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Tathāpi yassā
tika-s0104t:1292_6: dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā imaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ sakāraṇaṃ sagatikaṃ pabhedato vibhajituṃ
tika-s0104t:1292_7: samattho hoti, tassā padaṭṭhānena ceva saddhiṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya uppattibhūmiyā
tika-s0104t:1292_8: ca tadeva pākaṭataraṃ kattukāmo dhammarājā evaṃ dassetīti vuttaṃ “tadeva niyyātita”nti,
tika-s0104t:1295_1: vuttaṃ. Sattesu, saṅkhāresu ca ekaccaṃ sassatametassāti ekaccasassato, vādo, so etesanti
tika-s0104t:1295_2: ekaccasassatikā taddhitavasena, samāsavasena pana ekaccasassato vādo etesanti ekaccasassatavādā.
tika-s0104t:1295_3: Esa nayo ekaccaasassatikapadepi. Nanu ca “ekaccasassatikā”ti vutte tadaññesaṃ ekaccaasassatikabhāvasanniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1295_4: siddhamevāti? Saccaṃ atthato, saddato pana asiddhameva tasmā saddato pākaṭataraṃ
tika-s0104t:1295_5: katvā dassetuṃ tathā vuttaṃ. Na hi idha sāvasesaṃ katvā dhammaṃ deseti dhammassāmī.
tika-s0104t:1295_6: “Issaro nicco, aññe sattā aniccā”ti evaṃpavattavādā sattekaccasassatikā seyyathāpi
tika-s0104t:1295_7: issaravādā. Tathā “nicco brahmā, aññe aniccā”ti evaṃpavattavādāpi. “Paramāṇavo niccā,
tika-s0104t:1295_9: evaṃpavattavādā saṅkhārekaccasassatikā seyyathāpi kāṇādā. Tathā “cakkhādayo aniccā,
tika-s0104t:1295_10: viññāṇaṃ nicca”nti (nyāyadassane, visesikadassane ca passitabbaṃ) evaṃpavattavādāpi.
