tika-s0104t:1295_11: Idhāti “ekaccasassatikā”ti imasmiṃ pade, imissā vā desanāya. Gahitāti vuttā, desitabbabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1295_12: vā desanāñāṇena samādinnā tathā ceva desitattā. Tathā hi idha purimakā tayo vādā
tika-s0104t:1295_13: sattavasena, catuttho saṅkhāravasena desito. “Saṅkhārekaccasassatikā”ti idaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:1295_14: tehi sassatabhāvena gayhamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ yāthāvasabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ, na
tika-s0104t:1295_15: pana ekaccasassatikamatadassanavasena. Tassa hi sassatābhimataṃ asaṅkhatamevāti laddhi.
tika-s0104t:1295_16: Tenevāha pāḷiyaṃ “cittanti vā…pe… ṭhassatī”ti. Na hi yassa sabhāvassa paccayehi abhisaṅkhatabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1295_17: paṭijānāti, tasseva niccadhuvādibhāvo anummattakena sakkā paṭijānituṃ, etena ca “uppādavayadhuvatāyuttā
tika-s0104t:1295_18: sabhāvā siyā niccā, siyā aniccā, siyā na vattabbā”tiādinā pavattasattabhaṅgavādassa
tika-s0104t:1296_0: Tatrāyaṃ ayuttatāvibhāvanā – yadi hi “yena sabhāvena yo dhammo atthīti vuccati, teneva
tika-s0104t:1296_1: sabhāvena so dhammo natthī”ti vucceyya, siyā anekantavādo. Atha aññena, na siyā anekantavādo.
tika-s0104t:1296_2: Na cettha desantarādisambandhabhāvo yutto vattuṃ tassa sabbalokasiddhattā, vivādābhāvato
tika-s0104t:1296_3: ca. Ye pana vadanti “yathā suvaṇṇaghaṭena makuṭe kate ghaṭabhāvo nassati, makuṭabhāvo
tika-s0104t:1296_4: uppajjati, suvaṇṇabhāvo tiṭṭhatiyeva, evaṃ sabbasabhāvānaṃ koci dhammo nassati, koci
tika-s0104t:1296_5: dhammo uppajjati, sabhāvo eva tiṭṭhatī”ti. Te vattabbā “kiṃ taṃ suvaṇṇaṃ, yaṃ ghaṭe,
tika-s0104t:1296_6: makuṭe ca avaṭṭhitaṃ, yadi rūpādi, so saddo viya anicco. Atha rūpādisamūho sammutimattaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1296_7: na tassa atthitā vā natthitā vā niccatā vā labbhatī”ti, tasmā anekantavādo na siyā.
tika-s0104t:1296_8: Dhammānañca dhammino aññathānaññathā ca pavattiyaṃ doso vuttoyeva sassatavādavicāraṇāyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1296_9: Tasmā so tattha vuttanayena veditabbo. Apica na niccāniccanavattabbarūpo attā, loko
tika-s0104t:1296_10: ca paramatthato vijjamānatāparijānanato yathā niccādīnaṃ aññataraṃ rūpaṃ, yathā vā
tika-s0104t:1296_11: dīpādayo. Na hi rūpādīnaṃ udayabbayasabhāvānaṃ niccāniccanavattabbasabhāvatā sakkā
tika-s0104t:1296_12: viññātuṃ, jīvassa ca niccādīsu aññataraṃ rūpaṃ siyāti, evaṃ sattabhaṅgo viya sesabhaṅgānampi
tika-s0104t:1297_0: Nanu ca “ekacce dhammā sassatā, ekacce asassatā”ti etasmiṃ vāde cakkhādīnaṃ asassatabhāvasanniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1297_1: yathāsabhāvāvabodho eva, atha evaṃvādīnaṃ kathaṃ micchādassanaṃ siyāti, ko vā evamāha
tika-s0104t:1297_3: dhammānaṃ sassatabhāvasanniṭṭhānaṃ idha micchādassananti gahetabbaṃ, tena pana ekavāde
tika-s0104t:1297_4: pavattamānena cakkhādīnaṃ asassatabhāvāvabodho vidūsito saṃsaṭṭhabhāvato visasaṃsaṭṭho
tika-s0104t:1297_5: viya sappipiṇḍo, tato ca tassa sakiccakaraṇāsamatthatāya sammādassanapakkhe ṭhapetabbataṃ
tika-s0104t:1297_6: nārahatīti. Asassatabhāvena nicchitāpi vā cakkhuādayo samāropitajīvasabhāvā eva diṭṭhigatikehi
tika-s0104t:1297_7: gayhantīti tadavabodhassa micchādassanabhāvo na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Tenevāha pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1297_8: “cakkhuṃ itipi…pe… kāyo itipi ayaṃ attā”tiādi. Evañca katvā asaṅkhatāya, saṅkhatāya
tika-s0104t:1297_9: ca dhātuyā vasena yathākkamaṃ “ekacce dhammā sassatā, ekacce asassatā”ti evaṃpavatto
tika-s0104t:1297_10: vibhajjavādopi ekaccasassatavādoyeva bhaveyyāti evampakārā codanā anavakāsā hoti
tika-s0104t:1298_0: Etthāha – purimasmimpisassatavāde asassatānaṃ dhammānaṃ “sassatā”ti gahaṇaṃ visesato
tika-s0104t:1298_1: micchādassanaṃ bhavati. Sassatānaṃ pana “sassatā”ti gāho na micchādassanaṃ yathāsabhāvaggāhabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1298_2: Evañca sati imassa vādassa vādantaratā na vattabbā, idha viya purimepi ekaccesveva
tika-s0104t:1298_3: dhammesu sassataggāhasambhavatoti, vattabbāyeva asassatesveva “kecideva dhammā sassatā,
tika-s0104t:1298_4: keci asassatā”ti parikappanāvasena gahetabbadhammesu vibhāgappavattiyā imassa vādassa
tika-s0104t:1298_5: dassitattā. Nanu ca ekadesassa samudāyantogadhattā ayaṃ sappadesasassataggāho purimasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:1298_6: nippadesasassataggāhe samodhānaṃ gaccheyyātī? Tathāpi na sakkā vattuṃ vādī tabbisayavisesavasena
tika-s0104t:1298_7: vādadvayassa pavattattā. Aññe eva hi diṭṭhigatikā “sabbe dhammā sassatā”ti abhiniviṭṭhā,
tika-s0104t:1298_8: aññe “ekacceva sassatā, ekacce asassatā”ti. Saṅkhārānaṃ anavasesapariyādānaṃ, ekadesapariggaho
tika-s0104t:1298_9: ca vādadvayassa paribyattoyeva. Kiñca bhiyyo – anekavidhasamussaye, ekavidhasamussaye
tika-s0104t:1298_10: ca khandhapabandhena abhinivesabhāvato tathā na sakkā vattuṃ. Catubbidhopi hi sassatavādī
tika-s0104t:1298_12: jāto abhiññāṇena, anussavādīhi ca rūpakāyabhedagahaṇato. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “tato cuto
tika-s0104t:1298_13: amutra udapādi”nti, “cavanti upapajjantī”ti ca ādi. Visesalābhī pana ekaccasassatiko
tika-s0104t:1298_16: “taṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, tato paraṃ nānussaratī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Takkīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1298_17: pana ubhinnampi sassatekaccasassatavādīnaṃ sassatābhinivesaviseso rūpārūpadhammavisayatāya supākaṭoyevāti.
tika-s0104t:1299_1: puna saṃvaṭṭanato, addhā-saddassa ca kālapariyāyattā evaṃ vuttanti āha “dīghassā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1299_2: Atikkamma ayanaṃ pavattanaṃ accayo. Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ, upasaggavasena ca atthavisesavācakattā
tika-s0104t:1299_3: saṃ-saddena yutto vaṭṭa-saddo vināsavācīti vuttaṃ “vinassatī”ti, vatu-saddo vā gatiyameva.
tika-s0104t:1299_4: Saṅkhayatthajotakena pana saṃ-saddena yuttattā tadatthasambandhanena vināsattho labbhatīti
tika-s0104t:1299_5: dasseti “vinassatī”ti iminā. Saṅkhayavasena vattatīti hi saddato attho, ta-kārassa
tika-s0104t:1299_6: cettha ṭa-kārādeso. Vipattikaramahāmeghasamuppattitto hi paṭṭhāya yāva aṇusahagatopi
tika-s0104t:1299_7: saṅkhāro na hoti, tāva loko saṃvaṭṭatīti vuccati. Pāḷiyaṃ lokoti pathavīādibhājanaloko
tika-s0104t:1299_8: adhippeto tadavasesassa bāhullato, tadeva sandhāya “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttanti dasseti
tika-s0104t:1299_10: idhādhippetaṃ, tenevāha pāḷiyaṃ “ābhassarasaṃvattanikā hontī”ti. Kasmā tadeva vuttanti
tika-s0104t:1299_11: ce? Tasseva bahulaṃ pavattanato. Ayañhi vāraniyamo –
tika-s0104t:1301: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā”ti. (abhidhammatthavibhāvanīṭīkāya pañcamaparicchedavaṇṇanāyampi);
tika-s0104t:1302_0: Āruppesu vāti ettha vikappanatthena vā-saddena saṃvaṭṭamānalokadhātūhi aññalokadhātūsu
tika-s0104t:1302_1: vāti vikappeti. Na hi sabbe apāyasattā tadā rūpārūpabhavesu uppajjantīti sakkā viññātuṃ
tika-s0104t:1302_3: vinā tadā tesaṃ tatrūpapattiyā anupapattito. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhikopi hi saṃvaṭṭhamāne
tika-s0104t:1302_4: kappe nirayato na muccati, piṭṭhicakkavāḷeyeva nibbattatīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1302_5: Satipi sabbasattānaṃ puññāpuññābhisaṅkhāramanasā nibbattabhāve bāhirapaccayehi vinā
tika-s0104t:1302_6: manasāva nibbattattā rūpāvacarasattā eva “manomayā”ti vuccanti, na pana bāhirapaccayapaṭiyattā
tika-s0104t:1302_7: tadaññeti dassetuṃ “manena nibbattattā manomayā”ti āha. Yadevaṃ kāmāvacarasattānampi
tika-s0104t:1302_8: opapātikānaṃ manomayabhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, adhicittabhūtena atisayamanasā
tika-s0104t:1302_10: vuttaṃ. Evampi arūpāvacarasattānaṃ manomayabhāvo āpajjatīti? Na tattha bāhirapaccayehi
tika-s0104t:1302_11: nibbattetabbatāsaṅkāya abhāvena manasā eva nibbattāti avadhāraṇāsambhavato. Niruḷhovāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1302_12: loke manomayavohāro rūpāvacarasattesu. Tathā hi annamayo pānamayo manomayo ānandamayo
tika-s0104t:1302_13: viññāṇamayoti pañcadhā attānaṃ vedavādino parikappenti. Ucchedavādepi vakkhati “dibbo
tika-s0104t:1302_14: rūpī manomayo”ti, te pana jhānānubhāvato pītibhakkhā sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarāti
tika-s0104t:1302_15: āha “pīti tesa”ntiādi, tesaṃ attanova pabhā atthīti attho. Sobhanā vā ṭhāyī sabhā
tika-s0104t:1302_16: etesanti subhaṭṭhāyinotipi yujjati. Ukkaṃsenāti ābhassare sandhāya vuttaṃ. Parittābhāppamāṇābhā
tika-s0104t:1302_17: pana dve, cattāro ca kappe tiṭṭhanti. Aṭṭha kappeti catunnamasaṅkhyeyyakappānaṃ samudāyabhūte aṭṭha mahākappe.
tika-s0104t:1303_0: 40. Vināsavācīyeva vaṭṭa-saddo paṭisedhajotakena upasaggena yuttattā saṇṭhāhanatthañāpakoti
tika-s0104t:1303_1: āha “saṇṭhātī”ti, anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ nibbattati, vaḍḍhatīti vā attho. Sampattimahāmeghasamuppattito
tika-s0104t:1303_3: pātubhāvo, tāva loko vivaṭṭatīti vuccati. Pakatiyāti sabhāvena, tassa “suñña”nti
tika-s0104t:1303_4: iminā sambandho. Tathāsuññatāya kāraṇamāha “nibbattasattānaṃ natthitāyā”ti. Purimataraṃ
tika-s0104t:1303_5: aññesaṃ sattānamanuppannattāti bhāvo, tena yathā ekaccāni vimānāni tattha nibbattasattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1304_0: Aparo nayo – sakakammassa paṭhamaṃ karaṇaṃ pakati, tāya nibbattasattānanti sambandho,
tika-s0104t:1304_1: tena yathā etassa attano kammabalena paṭhamaṃ nibbatti, na evaṃ aññesaṃ tassa purimataraṃ,
tika-s0104t:1304_2: samānakāle vā nibbatti atthi, tathā nibbattasattānaṃ natthitāya suññamidanti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1304_3: Brahmapārisajjabrahmapurohitamahābrahmāno idha brahmakāyikā, tesaṃ nivāsatāya bhūmipi
tika-s0104t:1304_5: bhūmīti attho. Kattā sayaṃ kārako. Kāretā paresaṃ āṇāpako. Visuddhimagge pubbenivāsañāṇakathāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1304_6: vuttanayena, etena nibbattakkamaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānabhāve ca kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1304_7: Kammaṃ upanissayabhāvena paccayo etissāti kammapaccayā. Atha vā tattha nibbattasattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1304_8: vipaccanakakammassa sahakārīkārakabhāvato kammassa paccayāti kammapaccayā. Utu samuṭṭhānametissāti
tika-s0104t:1304_10: vuttanayena vā kammassa sahāyabhūto paccayoti kammapaccayo, so eva utu tathā, sova
tika-s0104t:1304_12: ratanabhūtā bhūmi, na kevalaṃ bhūmiyeva, atha kho tapparivārāpīti āha “pakatī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1304_14: vuttāya brahmakāyikabhūmiyā. Sāmaññavisesavasena cetaṃ ādhāradvayaṃ. Kathaṃ paṇītāya
tika-s0104t:1304_15: dutiyajjhānabhūmiyā ṭhitānaṃ hīnāya paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyā upapatti hotīti āha “atha
tika-s0104t:1304_16: sattāna”ntiādi, nikantivasena paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvetvāti vuttaṃ hoti, pakatiyā sabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1304_17: nikanti taṇhā uppajjatīti sambandho. Vasitaṭṭhāneti vutthapubbaṭṭhāne. Tato otarantīti
tika-s0104t:1304_18: upapattivasena dutiyajjhānabhūmito paṭhamajjhānabhūmiṃ apasakkanti, gacchantīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1304_19: Appāyuketi yaṃ uḷārapuññakammaṃ kataṃ, tassa upajjanārahavipākapabandhato appaparimāṇāyuke.
tika-s0104t:1304_20: Tassa devalokassāti tasmiṃ devaloke, nissayavasena vā sambandhaniddeso. Āyuppamāṇenevāti
tika-s0104t:1304_21: paramāyuppamāṇeneva. Parittanti appakaṃ. Antarāva cavantīti rājakoṭṭhāgāre pakkhittataṇḍulanāḷi
tika-s0104t:1304_22: viya puññakkhayā hutvā sakakammappamāṇena tassa devalokassa paramāyuantarā eva cavanti.
tika-s0104t:1305_0: Kiṃ panetaṃ paramāyu nāma, kathaṃ vā taṃ paricchinnappamāṇanti? Vuccate – yo tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1305_1: tesaṃ sattānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavavisese vipākappabandhassa ṭhitikālaniyamo purimasiddhabhavapatthanūpanissayavasena
tika-s0104t:1305_4: ca, so āyuhetukattā kāraṇūpacārena āyu, ukkaṃsaparicchedavasena paramāyūti ca vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1305_5: Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhāyīnampi hi attanā sahajātānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhapanākāravuttitāya
tika-s0104t:1305_6: pavattakāni rūpārūpajīvitindriyāni na kevalaṃ nesaṃ khaṇaṭṭhitiyā eva kāraṇabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1305_7: anupālakāni, atha kho yāva bhaṅgupacchedā [bhavaṅgupacchedā ] anupabandhassa avicchedahetubhāvenāpi.
tika-s0104t:1305_8: Tasmā cesa āyuhetukoyeva, taṃ pana devānaṃ, nerayikānañca yebhuyyena niyataparicchedaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1305_12: vasena cirācirakālatāya aniyataparicchedaṃ, tassa ca yathā purimasiddhabhavapatthanāvasena
tika-s0104t:1305_14: ādito gahaṇasiddhiyā, evaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu nibbattasattānaṃ yebhuyyena samappamāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1305_15: ṭhitikālaṃ dassanānussavehi labhitvā taṃ paramataṃ ajjhosāya pavattitabhavapatthanāvasena
tika-s0104t:1306_0: Yasmā pana kammaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu yathā taṃtaṃupapattinissitavaṇṇādinibbattane
tika-s0104t:1306_1: samatthaṃ, evaṃ niyatāyuparicchedāsu upapattīsu paricchedātikkamena vipākanibbattane
tika-s0104t:1306_2: samatthaṃ na hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “āyuppamāṇeneva cavantī”ti. Yasmā pana upatthambhakapaccayasahāyehi
tika-s0104t:1306_3: anupālakapaccayehi upādinnakakkhandhānaṃ pavattetabbākāro atthato paramāyukassa hoti
tika-s0104t:1306_4: yathāvuttaparicchedānatikkamanato, tasmā satipi kammāvasese ṭhānaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-s0104t:1306_5: tena vuttaṃ “attano puññabalena ṭhātuṃ na sakkontī”ti. “Āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā
tika-s0104t:1306_6: vā ābhassarakāyā cavitvā”ti vacanato panettha kāmāvacaradevānaṃ viya brahmakāyikānampi
tika-s0104t:1306_7: yebhuyyeneva niyatāyuparicchedabhāvo veditabbo. Tathā hi devalokato devaputtā āyukkhayena
tika-s0104t:1306_8: puññakkhayena āhārakkhayena kopenāti catūhi kāraṇehi cavantīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1306_9: Kappaṃ vā upaḍḍhakappaṃ vāti ettha asaṅkhyeyyakappo adhippeto, so ca tathārūpo kāloyeva,
tika-s0104t:1306_10: vā-saddo pana kappassa tatiyabhāgaṃ vā tato ūnamadhikaṃ vāti vikappanattho.
tika-s0104t:1307_0: 41. Anabhiratīti ekakavihārena anabhiramaṇasaṅkhātā aññehi samāgamicchāyeva. Tattha
tika-s0104t:1307_2: Evamanvayamatthaṃ dassetvā nanu ukkaṇṭhitāpi siyāti codanāsodhanavasena byatirekaṃ
tika-s0104t:1307_3: dasseti “yā panā”tiādinā. Piyavatthuvirahena, piyavatthualābhena vā cittavigghāto
tika-s0104t:1307_4: ukkaṇṭhitā, sā panatthato domanassacittuppādova, tenāha “paṭighasampayuttā”ti. Sā
tika-s0104t:1307_5: brahmaloke natthi jhānānubhāvapahīnattā. Taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātā cittassa purimāvatthāya
tika-s0104t:1307_6: ubbijjanā phandanā eva idha paritassanā. Sā hi dīgharattaṃ jhānaratiyā ṭhitassa yathāvuttānabhiratinimittaṃ
tika-s0104t:1307_7: uppannā “ahaṃ mama”nti gahaṇassa ca kāraṇabhūtā. Tena vakkhati “taṇhātassa nāpi diṭṭhitassanāpi
tika-s0104t:1307_8: vaṭṭatī”ti nanu vuttaṃ atthuddhāre imaṃyeva pāḷiṃ nīharitvā “aho vata aññepi sattā
tika-s0104t:1307_9: itthattaṃ āgaccheyyunti ayaṃ taṇhātassanā nāmā”ti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana diṭṭhitassanāya
tika-s0104t:1307_10: visuṃ udāharaṇaṃ dassentena taṇhātassanameva tato niddhāretvā vuttaṃ, na pana ettha
tika-s0104t:1307_11: diṭṭhitassanāya alabbhamānattāti na doso. Idāni samānasaddavacanīyānaṃ atthānamuddharaṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1307_12: katvā idhādhippetaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “sā panesā”tiādimāha. Paṭighasaṅkhāto cittutrāso eva
tika-s0104t:1307_13: tāsatassanā. Evamaññatthāpi yathārahaṃ. “Jātiṃ paṭiccā”tiādi vibhaṅgapāḷi, tatrāyamatthakathā
tika-s0104t:1307_14: – jātiṃ paṭicca bhayanti jātipaccayā uppannabhayaṃ. Bhayānakanti ākāraniddeso. Chambhitattanti
tika-s0104t:1307_15: bhayavasena gattakampo, visesato hadayamaṃsacalanaṃ. Lomahaṃsoti lomānaṃ haṃsanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1307_16: bhittiyaṃ nāgadantānamiva uddhaggabhāvo, iminā padadvayena kiccato bhayaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0104t:1307_17: puna cetaso utrāsoti sabhāvato dassitanti. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana “bhayānakanti bheravārammaṇanimittaṃ
tika-s0104t:1307_18: balavabhayaṃ, tena sarīrassa thaddhabhāvo chambhitatta”nti vuttaṃ, aneneva bhayanti
tika-s0104t:1307_19: ettha khuddakabhayaṃ dassitaṃ, iti ettha payoge ayaṃ tassanāti evaṃ sabbattha attho.
tika-s0104t:1307_20: Paritassitavipphanditamevāti ettha “diṭṭhisaṅkhātena ceva taṇhāsaṅkhātena ca paritassitena
tika-s0104t:1307_21: vipphanditameva calitameva kampitamevā”ti aṭṭhakathāyamatthaṃ vakkhati. Tena viññāyati
tika-s0104t:1307_23: tattha tepīti dīghāyukā devāpi. Bhayanti bhaṅgānupassanāpariciṇṇante sabbasaṅkhārato
tika-s0104t:1307_24: bhāyanavasena uppannaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ. Saṃveganti sahottappañāṇaṃ, ottappameva vā. Santāsanti
tika-s0104t:1308_0: Sahabyatanti sahāyabhāvamiccheva saddato attho sahabya-saddassa sahāyatthe pavattanato.
tika-s0104t:1308_1: So hi saha byāyati pavattati, dosaṃ vā paṭicchādetīti sahabyoti vuccati, tassa bhāvo
tika-s0104t:1308_2: sahabyatā. Sahāyabhāvo pana sahabhāvoyeva nāmāti adhippāyato atthaṃ dassetuṃ “sahabhāva”nti
tika-s0104t:1308_3: vuttaṃ. Sasādhanasamavāyattho vā saha-saddo adhikiccapade adhisaddo viya, tasmā saha
tika-s0104t:1308_4: ekato vattamānassa bhāvo sahabyaṃ yathā “dāsabya”nti tadeva sahabyatā, sakatthavuttivasena
tika-s0104t:1308_5: imamevatthaṃ sandhāyāha “sahabhāva”nti. Apica saha vāti pavattatīti sahavo, tassa
tika-s0104t:1308_6: bhāvo sahabyaṃ yathā “vīrassa bhāvo vīriya”nti, tadeva sahabyatāti evaṃ vimānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1308_7: vuttaṃ, tasmā tadatthaṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1309_0: 42. Ime satte abhibhavitvāti seso. Abhibhavanā cettha pāpasabhāvena jeṭṭhabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1309_1: “te satte abhibhavitvā ṭhito”ti attano maññanāyevāti vuttaṃ “jeṭṭhakohamasmī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1309_2: Aññadatthūti dassane antarāyābhāvavacanena, dasoti ettha dassaneyyavisesapariggahābhāvena
tika-s0104t:1309_3: ca anāvaraṇadassāvitaṃ paṭijānātīti āha “sabbaṃ passāmīti attho”ti. Dassaneyyavisesassa
tika-s0104t:1309_4: hi padesabhūtassa aggahaṇe sati gahetabbassa nippadesatā viññāyati yathā “dikkhito
tika-s0104t:1309_5: na dadātī”ti, deyyadhammavisesassa cettha padesabhūtassa aggahaṇato pabbajito sabbampi
tika-s0104t:1309_6: na dadātīti gahetabbassa deyyadhammassa nippadesatā viññāyati. Evamīdisesu. Vase
tika-s0104t:1309_7: vattemīti vasavattī. Ahaṃ-saddayogato hi sabbattha amhayogena vacanattho. Sattabhājanabhūtassa
tika-s0104t:1309_8: lokassa nimmātā cāti sambandho. “Pathavī”tiādi cettha bhājanalokavasena adhippāyakathanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1309_9: Sajitāti racitā, vibhajitā vā, tenāha “tvaṃ khattiyo nāmā”tiādi. Ciṇṇavasitāyāti
tika-s0104t:1309_12: Paṭhamairiyāpatheti yena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāti, tasmiṃ iriyāpathe. Iti atītavasena,
tika-s0104t:1309_13: bhūta-saddassa vattamānavasena ca bhabya-saddassa attho dassito. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana bhabya-saddattho
tika-s0104t:1309_14: anāgatavasenāpi vutto. Ahesunti hi bhūtā. Bhavanti, bhavissanti cāti bhabyā tabbānīyā
tika-s0104t:1310_0: “Issaro kattā nimmātā”ti vatvāpi puna “mayā ime sattā nimmitā”ti vacanaṃ kimatthiyanti
tika-s0104t:1310_2: paṭiññākaraṇatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Nanu cesa brahmā anavaṭṭhitadassanattā puthujjanassa
tika-s0104t:1310_4: sattanimmānena vipallaṭṭho “mayā ime sattā nimmitā”tiādinā issarakuttadassanaṃ pakkhandamāno
tika-s0104t:1310_5: abhinivisanavasena patiṭṭhito, na pana patiṭṭhāpanavasena. Atha kasmā kāraṇavasena
tika-s0104t:1310_6: sādhetukāmo paṭiññaṃ karotīti vuttanti? Na cevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesampi hi “evaṃ hotī”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1310_7: pacchā uppajjantānampi tathāabhinivesassa vakkhamānattā paresaṃ patiṭṭhāpanakkameneva
tika-s0104t:1310_8: tassa so abhiniveso jāto, na tu abhinivisanamattena, tasmā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1310_9: Tenevāha “taṃ kissa hetū”tiādi. Pāḷiyaṃ manaso paṇidhīti manaso patthanā, tathā cittuppattimattamevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1311_0: Itthabhāvanti idappakārabhāvaṃ. Yasmā pana so pakāro brahmattabhāvoyevidhādhippeto,
tika-s0104t:1311_1: tasmā “brahmabhāva”nti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ pakāro itthaṃ, tassa bhāvo itthattanti hi nibbacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1311_2: Kevalanti kammassakatāñāṇena asammissaṃ suddhaṃ. Maññanāmattenevāti diṭṭhimaññanāmatteneva,
tika-s0104t:1311_3: na adhimānavasena. Vaṅkachiddena vaṅkaāṇī viya onamitvā vaṅkaladdhikena vaṅkaladdhikā
tika-s0104t:1311_4: onamitvā tasseva brahmuno pādamūlaṃ gacchanti, taṃpakkhakā bhavantīti attho. Nanu
tika-s0104t:1311_5: ca devānaṃ upapattisamanantaraṃ “imāya nāma gatiyā cavitvā iminā nāma kammunā idhūpapannā”ti
tika-s0104t:1311_6: paccavekkhaṇā hoti, atha kasmā tesaṃ evaṃ maññanā siyāti? Purimajātīsu kammassakatāñāṇe
tika-s0104t:1311_7: sammadeva niviṭṭhajjhāsayānameva tathāpaccavekkhaṇāya pavattito. Tādisānameva hi
tika-s0104t:1311_8: tathāpaccavekkhaṇā sambhavati, sā ca kho yebhuyyavasena, ime pana purimāsupi jātīsu
tika-s0104t:1311_9: issarakuttadiṭṭhivasena nibaddhābhinivesā evameva maññamānā ahesunti. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1312_0: 43. Īsati abhibhavatīti īso, mahanto īso maheso, suppatiṭṭhitamahesatāya parehi “maheso”
tika-s0104t:1312_1: iti akkhāyatīti mahesakkho, mahesakkhānaṃ atisayena mahesakkhoti mahesakkhataroti
tika-s0104t:1312_2: vacanattho. So pana mahesakkhatarabhāvo ādhipateyyaparivārasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya
tika-s0104t:1313_0: 44. Kiṃ panetaṃ kāraṇanti anuyogenāha “so tato”tiādi, tena “itthattaṃ āgacchatī”ti
tika-s0104t:1313_1: vuttaṃ idhāgamanameva kāraṇanti dasseti. Idheva āgacchatīti imasmiṃ manussaloke eva
tika-s0104t:1313_2: paṭisandhivasena āgacchati. Etanti “ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ bhikkhave, vijjatī”ti vacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1313_3: Pāḷiyaṃ yaṃ aññataro sattoti ettha yanti nipātamattaṃ, kāraṇatthe vā esa nipāto,
tika-s0104t:1313_4: hetumhi vā paccattaniddeso, yena ṭhānenāti attho, kiriyāparāmasanaṃ vā etaṃ. “Itthattaṃ
tika-s0104t:1313_5: āgacchatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ itthattassa āgamanasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ, tadetaṃ vijjatīti
tika-s0104t:1313_6: attho. Esa na so pabbajati, cetosamādhiṃ phusati, pubbenivāsaṃ anussatīti etesupi
tika-s0104t:1313_7: padesu. “Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ bhikkhave, vijjati, yaṃ aññataro satto”ti hi imāni padāni
tika-s0104t:1313_8: “pabbajatī”tiādīhipi padehi paccekaṃ yojetabbāni. Na gacchatīti agāraṃ, gehaṃ, agārassa
tika-s0104t:1313_9: hitaṃ āgāriyaṃ, kasigorakkhādikammaṃ, tamettha natthīti anāgāriyaṃ, pabbajjā, tenāha
tika-s0104t:1313_11: Paranti pacchā, atisayaṃ vā, aññaṃ pubbenivāsantipi attho. “Na saratī”ti vutteyeva
tika-s0104t:1313_13: apassanahetu, passituṃ asakkonto hutvātipi vaṭṭati. Māna-saddo viya hi anta-saddo
tika-s0104t:1313_14: idha sāmatthiyattho. Sadābhāvatoti sabbadā vijjamānattā. Jarāvasenāpīti ettha pi-saddena
tika-s0104t:1314_0: 45. Khiḍḍāpadosinoti kattuvasena padasiddhi, khiḍḍāpadosikāti pana sakatthavuttivasena,
tika-s0104t:1314_2: vā vattabbe i-kārāgamavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Padussanaṃ vā padoso, khiḍḍāya padoso khiḍḍāpadoso,
tika-s0104t:1314_3: so etesanti khiḍḍāpadosikā. “Padūsikātipi pāḷiṃ likhantī”ti aññanikāyikānaṃ pamādalekhataṃ
tika-s0104t:1314_4: dasseti. Mahāvihāravāsīnikāyikānañhi vācanāmaggavasena ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā pavattā. Apica
tika-s0104t:1314_5: tena potthakāruḷhakāle pamādalekhaṃ dasseti. Tampi hi padatthasodhanāya aṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0104t:1314_6: sodhitaniyāmeneva gahetabbaṃ, tenāha “sā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthī”ti. Velaṃ atikkantaṃ
tika-s0104t:1314_7: ativelaṃ, taṃ. Bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ, tenāha “aticira”nti, āhārūpabhogakālaṃ atikkamitvāti
tika-s0104t:1314_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Ratidhamma-saddo hassakhiḍḍā-saddehi paccekaṃ yojetabbo “hassakhiḍḍāsu
tika-s0104t:1314_9: ratidhammo ramaṇasabhāvo”ti. Hasanaṃ hasso, keḷihasso. Kheḍanaṃ kīḷanaṃ khiḍḍā, kāyikavācasikakīḷā.
tika-s0104t:1314_10: Anuyogavasena taṃsamāpannāti dassento āha “hassaratidhammañcevā”tiādi. Kīḷā yesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1314_11: te keḷino, tesaṃ hasso tathā. Kīḷāhassapayogena uppajjanakasukhañcettha keḷihassasukhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1315_0: “Te kirā”tiādi vitthāradassanaṃ. Kira-saddo hettha vitthārajotakoyeva, na tu anussavanāruciyādijotako
tika-s0104t:1315_1: tathāyeva pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāsu ca vuttattā. Sirivibhavenāti sarīrasobhaggādisiriyā,
tika-s0104t:1315_2: parivārādisampattiyā ca. Nakkhattanti chaṇaṃ. Yebhuyyena hi nakkhattayogena katattā
tika-s0104t:1315_3: tathāyogo vā hotu, mā vā, nakkhattamicceva vuccati. Āhāranti ettha ko devānamāhāro,
tika-s0104t:1315_4: kā ca tesamāhāravelāti? Sabbesampi kāmāvacaradevānaṃ sudhāhāro. Dvādasapāpadhammavigghātena
tika-s0104t:1315_5: hi sukhassa dhāraṇato devānaṃ bhojanaṃ “sudhā”ti vuccati. Sā pana setā saṅkhūpamā
tika-s0104t:1315_6: atulyadassanā suci sugandhā piyarūpā. Yaṃ sandhāya sudhābhojanajātake vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:1324_0: Sā ca heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamā hoti, taṃ yathāsakaṃ
tika-s0104t:1324_1: parimitadivasavasena divase divase bhuñjanti. Keci pana vadanti “biḷārapadappamāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1324_2: sudhāhāraṃ te bhuñjanti, so jivhāya ṭhapitamatto yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati,
tika-s0104t:1324_3: yathāsakaṃ gaṇitadivasavasena satta divase yāpanasamattho hotī”ti. Kecivāde panettha
tika-s0104t:1324_4: biḷārapada-saddo suvaṇṇasaṅkhātassa saṅkhyāvisesassa vācako. Pamāṇato pana udumbaraphalappamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1324_5: yaṃ pāṇitalaṃ kabaḷaggahantipi vuccati. Vuttañhi madhukose –
tika-s0104t:1327_0: “Nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpī”ti idaṃ parikappanāvasena vuttaṃ, na pana evaṃ niyamavasena
tika-s0104t:1327_2: uḷāragarusiniddhasudhāhārajīraṇato ca. Karajakāyassa mandabhāvo pana sukhumālabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1327_3: Teneva hi bhagavā indasālaguhāyaṃ pakatipathaviyaṃ patiātuṃ asakkontaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1327_4: “oḷārikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhehī”ti avoca. Manussānaṃ pana kammajatejassa mandabhāvo, karajakāyassa
tika-s0104t:1327_5: balavabhāvo ca vuttaviparītena veditabbo. Karajakāyoti ettha ko vuccati sarīraṃ,
tika-s0104t:1327_6: tattha pavatto. Rajo karajo, kiṃ taṃ? Sukkasoṇitaṃ. Tañhi “rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu
tika-s0104t:1327_7: vuccatī”ti evaṃ vuttarāgarajaphalattā sarīravācakena ka-saddena visesetvā kāraṇavohārena
tika-s0104t:1327_8: “karajo”ti vuccati. Tena sukkasoṇitasaṅkhātena karajena sambhūto kāyo karajakāyoti
tika-s0104t:1327_9: ācariyā. Tathā hi kāyo mātāpettikasambhavoti vutto. Mahāassapūrasuttantaṭīkāyaṃ pana
tika-s0104t:1327_10: “karīyati gabbhāsaye khipīyatīti karo, sambhavo, karato jātoti karajo, mātāpettikasambhavoti
tika-s0104t:1327_11: attho. Mātuādīnaṃ saṇṭhāpanavasena karato hatthato jātoti karajoti apare. Ubhayathāpi
tika-s0104t:1327_12: karajakāyanti catusantatirūpamāhā”ti vuttaṃ. Karoti putte nibbattetīti karo, sukkasoṇitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1327_13: tena jāto karajotipi vadanti. Tathā asambhūtopi ca devādīnaṃ kāyo tabbohārena “karajakāyo”ti
tika-s0104t:1327_14: vuccati yathā “pūtikāyo, jarasiṅgālo”ti. Tesanti manussānaṃ. Acchayāgu nāma pasannā
tika-s0104t:1327_15: akasaṭā yāgu. Vatthunti karajakāyaṃ. Ekaṃ āhāravelanti ekadivasamattaṃ, kesañci matena pana sattāhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1328_0: Evaṃ anvayato byatirekato ca dassetvā upamāvasenapi tamāvikaronto “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1328_1: Tattapāsāṇeti accuṇhapāsāṇe. Rattasetapadumato avasiṭṭhaṃ uppalaṃ. Akathāyanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1328_2: Avisesenāti “devāna”nti avisesena, devānaṃ kammajatejo balavā hoti, karajaṃ mandanti
tika-s0104t:1328_3: vā kammajatejakarajakāyānaṃ balavamandatāsaṅkhāta kāraṇasāmaññena. Tadetañhi kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1328_4: sabbesampi devānaṃ samānameva, tasmā sabbepi devā gahetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kabaḷīkārabhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1328_5: sudhāhāraṃ upanissāya jīvantīti kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvino. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino.
tika-s0104t:1328_6: “Khiḍḍāpadussanamatteneva hete khiḍḍāpadosikāti vuttā”ti ayaṃ pāṭho “teyeva cavantīti
tika-s0104t:1328_7: veditabbā”ti etassānantare paṭhitabbo tadanusandhikattā. Ayañhetthānusandhi – yadi
tika-s0104t:1328_8: sabbepi evaṃ karontā kāmāvacaradevā caveyyuṃ, atha kasmā “khiḍḍāpadosikā”ti nāmavisesena
tika-s0104t:1328_9: bhagavatā vuttāti? Vicāraṇāya evamāhāti, etena imamatthaṃ dasseti “sabbepi devā evaṃ
tika-s0104t:1328_10: cavantāpi khiḍḍāya padussanasabhāvamattaṃ pati nāmavisesena tathā vuttā”ti. Yadeke
tika-s0104t:1328_12: ca tassa avijjamānattā. Atthikehi pana tassa kecivādasamavarodhanaṃ ante itisaddo yojetabboti.
tika-s0104t:1329_0: 47-48. Manopadosinoti kattuvasena padasiddhi, manopadosikāti ca sakatthavuttivasena,
tika-s0104t:1329_1: atthamattaṃ pana dassetuṃ “manenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Manopadosakā”ti vā vattabbe i-kārāgamavasena
tika-s0104t:1329_2: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Manenāti issāpakatattā paduṭṭhena manasā. Aparo nayo – usūyanavasena
tika-s0104t:1329_3: manasā padoso manopadoso, vināsabhūto so etesamatthīti manopadosikāti. “Te aññamaññamhi
tika-s0104t:1329_4: paduṭṭhacittā kilantakāyā kilantacittā te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vacanato “ete
tika-s0104t:1329_5: cātumahārājikā”ti āha. Manena padussanamatteneva hete manopadosikāti vuttā. “Tesu
tika-s0104t:1329_6: kirā”tiādi vitthāro. Rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjatīti upalakkhaṇamattaṃ aññehi aññatthāpi
tika-s0104t:1329_7: paṭipajjanasambhavato. Etanti attano sampattiṃ. Uddhumāto viyāti pītiyā karaṇabhūtāya
tika-s0104t:1329_8: unnato viya. Bhijjamāno viyāti tāya bhijjanto viya, pītiyā vā kattubhūtāya bhañjito
tika-s0104t:1329_9: viya. Kuddhā nāma suvijānanā honti, tasmā kuddhabhāvamassa ñatvāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1330_0: Akuddho rakkhatīti kuddhassa so kodho itarasmiṃ akujjhante anupādāno ceva ekavāramattaṃ
tika-s0104t:1330_1: uppattiyā anāsevano ca hutvā cāvetuṃ na sakkoti, udakantaṃ patvā aggi viya nibbāyati,
tika-s0104t:1330_2: tasmā akuddho itaraṃ cavanato rakkhati. Ubhosu pana kuddhesu bhiyyo bhiyyo aññamaññamhi
tika-s0104t:1330_3: parivaḍḍhanavasena tikhiṇasamudācāro nissayadahanaraso kodho uppajjamāno hadayavatthuṃ
tika-s0104t:1330_4: nidahanto accantasukhumālakarajakāyaṃ vināseti, tato sakalopi attabhāvo antaradhāyati,
tika-s0104t:1330_5: tamatthaṃ dassetumāha “ubhosu panā”tiādi. Tathā cāha pāḷiyaṃ “te aññamaññamhi paduṭṭhacittā
tika-s0104t:1330_6: kilantakāyā kilantacittā te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti. Ekassa kodho itarassa paccayo
tika-s0104t:1330_7: hoti, tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo hotīti ettha kodhassa bhiyyo bhiyyo parivaḍḍhanāya
tika-s0104t:1330_8: eva paccayabhāvo veditabbo, na cavanāya nissayadahanarasena attanoyeva kodhena hadayavatthuṃ
tika-s0104t:1330_9: nidahantena accantasukhumālassa karajakāyassa cavanato. Kandantānaṃyeva orodhānanti
tika-s0104t:1330_10: anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ. Ayamettha dhammatāti ayaṃ tesaṃ karajakāyamandatāya, tathāuppajjanakassa
tika-s0104t:1330_11: ca kodhassa balavatāya ṭhānaso cavanabhāvo etesu devesu rūpārūpadhammānaṃ dhammaniyāmo sabhāvoti attho.
tika-s0104t:1331_1: ante ca adassanūpagamanato vināsaṃ passati oḷārikattā rūpadhammabhedassa. Paccayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1331_2: datvāti anantarapaccayādivasena paccayasattiṃ datvā, paccayo hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:1331_3: tasmā na passatīti sambandho, balavatarampi samānaṃ iminā kāraṇena na passatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1331_4: Balavataranti ca cittassa lahutarabhedaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tathā hi ekasmiṃ rūpe dharanteyeva
tika-s0104t:1331_5: soḷasa cittāni bhijjanti. Cittassa bhedaṃ na passatīti ettha khaṇe khaṇe bhijjantampi
tika-s0104t:1331_6: cittaṃ parassa anantarapaccayabhāveneva bhijjati, tasmā purimacittassa abhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā
tika-s0104t:1331_7: viya pacchimacittassa uppattito bhāvapakkho balavataro pākaṭova hoti, na abhāvapakkhoti
tika-s0104t:1331_8: idaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “cittaṃ panā”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayañcattho alābhacakkanidassanena
tika-s0104t:1331_9: dīpetabbo. Yasmā pana takkīvādī nānattanayassa duravadhānatāya, ekattanayassa ca
tika-s0104t:1331_10: micchāgahitattā “yadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sabbadāpi evarūpena pavattati, ayaṃ me attā nicco”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1331_11: abhinivesaṃ janesi, tasmā tamatthaṃ “so taṃ apassanto”tiādinā saha upamāya vibhāveti.
tika-s0104t:1333_0: 53. Antānantasahacarito vādo antānanto yathā “kuntā pacarantī”ti, antānantasannissayo
tika-s0104t:1333_1: vā yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti, so etesanti antānantikāti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “antānantavādā”ti
tika-s0104t:1333_2: vuttaṃ. Vuttanayena antānantasahacarito, tannissayo vā, antānantesu vā pavatto vādo
tika-s0104t:1333_3: etesanti antānantavādā. Idāni “antavā ayaṃ loko”tiādinā vakkhamānapāṭhānurūpaṃ atthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1333_4: vibhajanto “antaṃ vā”tiādimāha. Amati gacchati bhāvo osānametthāti hi anto, mariyādā,
tika-s0104t:1333_5: tappaṭisedhanena ananto. Anto ca ananto ca antānanto ca nevantanānanto ca antānanto
tika-s0104t:1333_6: tveva vutto sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesenavā “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t:1333_8: catudhā attho viññāyati. Kassa panāyaṃ antānantoti? Lokīyati saṃsāranissaraṇatthikehi
tika-s0104t:1333_9: diṭṭhigatikehi avapassīyati, lokiyanti vā ettha tehi puññāpuññāni, tabbipāko cāti
tika-s0104t:1333_10: “loko”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatassa attano. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ “antānantaṃ lokassa paññapentī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1333_11: Ko paneso attāti? Jhānavisayabhūtaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ. Ayañhi diṭṭhigatiko paṭibhāganimittaṃ
tika-s0104t:1333_12: cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ, apariyantaṃ vā vaḍḍhanavasena, tadanussavādivasena ca tattha
tika-s0104t:1333_13: lokasaññī viharati, tathā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhati “taṃ ‘loko’ti gahetvā”ti keci
tika-s0104t:1333_14: pana vadanti “jhānaṃ, taṃsampayuttadhammā ca idha attā, lokoti ca gahitā”ti, taṃ
tika-s0104t:1334_0: Etthāha – yuttaṃ tāva purimānaṃ tiṇṇampi vādīnaṃ antānantikattaṃ antañca anantañca
tika-s0104t:1334_1: antānantañca ārabbha pavattavādattā, pacchimassa pana takkikassa tadubhayapaṭisedhanavasena
tika-s0104t:1334_3: eva. Antānantapaṭisedhanavādopi hi so antānantavisayoyeva tamārabbha pavattattā.
tika-s0104t:1334_4: Etadatthameva hi sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “antaṃ vā antantaṃ vā antānantaṃ vā nevantānānantaṃ
tika-s0104t:1334_5: vā ārabbha pavattavādā”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā yathā tatiyavāde desapabhedavasena ekasseva
tika-s0104t:1334_6: lokassa antavatā, anantavatā ca sambhavati, evamettha takkīvādepi kālapabhedavasena
tika-s0104t:1334_7: ekasseva tadubhayasambhavato aññamaññapaṭisedhena tadubhayaññeva vuccati, dvinnampi
tika-s0104t:1334_8: ca paṭisedhānaṃ pariyudāsatā. Kathaṃ? Antavantapaṭisedhena hi anantavā vuccati, anantavantapaṭisedhena
tika-s0104t:1334_9: ca antavā. Dvipaṭisedho hi pakatiyatthañāpako. Iti paṭisedhanavasena antānantasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0104t:1334_10: ubhayassa vuttattā yuttoyeva tabbisayassa pacchimassāpi antānantikabhāvoti. Yadevaṃ
tika-s0104t:1334_11: so antānantikavādabhāvato tatiyavādasamavarodheyeva siyāti? Na, kālapabhedassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0104t:1334_12: Desapabhedavasena hi antānantiko tatiyavādī viya pacchimopi takkiko kālapabhedavasena
tika-s0104t:1334_13: antānantiko hoti. Kathaṃ? Yasmā ayaṃ lokasaññito attā ananto kadā ci sakkhidiṭṭhoti
tika-s0104t:1334_14: adhigatavisesehi mahesīhi anusuyyati, tasmā nevantavā. Yasmā panāyaṃ antavā kadāci,
tika-s0104t:1334_15: sakkhidiṭṭhoti tehiyeva anusuyyati, tasmā nānantavāti. Ayaṃ takkiko avaḍḍhitabhāvapubbakattā
tika-s0104t:1334_16: paṭibhāganimittānaṃ vaḍḍhitabhāvassa ubhayathā labbhamānassa parikappitassa attano
tika-s0104t:1334_18: avaḍḍhitakālavasena pana “nānantavā”ti, na pana antatānantatānaṃ accantamabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1334_19: yathā taṃ “nevasaññānāsaññā”ti. Yathā cānussutikatakkino, evaṃ jātissaratakkiādīnampi
tika-s0104t:1335_0: Keci pana yadi panāyaṃ attā antavā, evaṃ sati dūradese upapajjanānussaraṇādikiccanibbatti
tika-s0104t:1335_1: na siyā. Atha anantavā, evañca idha ṭhitasseva devalokanirayādīsu sukhadukkhānubhavanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1335_2: siyā. Sace pana antavā ceva anantavā ca, evampi tadubhayadosasamāyogo siyā. Tasmā
tika-s0104t:1335_3: “antavā, anantavā”ti ca abyākaraṇīyo attāti evaṃ takkanavasena catutthavādappavattiṃ
tika-s0104t:1335_4: vaṇṇenti. Yadi panesa vuttanayena antānantiko bhaveyya, atha kasmā “ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā
tika-s0104t:1335_5: evamāhaṃsu ‘antavā ayaṃ loko parivaṭumo’ti, tesaṃ musā”tiādinā tassa purimavādattayapaṭikkhepo
tika-s0104t:1335_6: vuttoti? Purimavādattayassa tena yathādhippetappakāravilakkhaṇabhāvato. Teneva hi
tika-s0104t:1335_7: kāraṇena tathā paṭikkhepo vutto, na pana tassa antānantikattābhāvena, na ca pariyantarahitadiṭṭhivācāhi
tika-s0104t:1335_8: paṭikkhepena, avassañcetaṃ evameva ñātabbaṃ. Aññathā hesa amarāvikkhepapakkhaññeva
tika-s0104t:1335_9: bhajeyya catutthavādo. Na hi antatāanantatātadubhayavinimutto attano pakāro atthi,
tika-s0104t:1335_10: takkīvādī ca yuttimaggakoyeva. Kālabhedavasena ca ekasmimpi loke tadubhayaṃ no na
tika-s0104t:1335_11: yujjatīti. Bhavatu tāva pacchimavādīdvayassa antānantikabhāvo yutto antānantānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1335_12: vasena ubhayavisayattā tesaṃ vādassa. Kathaṃ pana purimavādīdvayassa paccekaṃ antānantikabhāvo
tika-s0104t:1335_13: yutto siyā ekekavisayattā tesaṃ vādassāti? Vuccate – samudāye pavattamāna-saddassa
tika-s0104t:1335_14: avayavepi upacāravuttito. Samuditesu hi antānantavādīsu pavattamāno antānanti ka-saddo
tika-s0104t:1335_15: tattha niruḷhatāya tadavayavesupi paccekaṃ antānantikavādīsu pavattati yathā “arūpajjhānesu
tika-s0104t:1335_16: paccekaṃ aṭṭhavimokkhapariyāyo”, yathā ca “loke sattāsayo”ti. Atha vā abhinivesato
tika-s0104t:1335_17: purimakāle pavattavitakkavasena ayaṃ tattha vohāro kato. Tesañhi diṭṭhigatikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1335_18: tathārūpacetosamādhisamadhigamato pubbakāle “antavā nu kho ayaṃ loko, udāhu anantavā”ti
tika-s0104t:1335_19: ubhayākārāvalambino vitakkassa vasena niruḷho antānantikabhāvo pacchā visesalābhena
tika-s0104t:1335_20: tesu antānantavādesu ekasseva vādassa saṅgahe uppannepi purimasiddharuḷhiyā vohārīyati
tika-s0104t:1335_21: yathā “sabbe sattā maraṇadhammā”tiādīsu arahati sattapariyāyo, yathā ca bhavantaragatepi maṇḍūkādivohāroti.
tika-s0104t:1336_2: Uddhamadho avaḍḍhetvā tiriyaṃ vaḍḍhetvāti etthāpi “cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā”ti adhikāravasena
tika-s0104t:1336_4: atthato ca sassatavāde vuttanayena. Diṭṭhapubbānusārenāti dassanabhūtena viññāṇena
tika-s0104t:1336_5: upaladdhapubbassa antavantādino anussaraṇena, evañca katvā anussutitakkīsuddhatakkīnampi
tika-s0104t:1336_6: idha saṅgaho siddho hoti. Atha vā diṭṭhaggahaṇeneva “naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1336_7: viya sutādīnampi gahitabhāvo veditabbo. “Antavā”tiādinā icchitassa attano sabbadābhāvaparāmasanavaseneva
tika-s0104t:1336_8: imesaṃ vādānaṃ pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi vakkhati “satteva
tika-s0104t:1338_0: 61. Na maratīti “evamevā”ti sanniṭṭhānābhāvena na upacchijjati, anekantikāyeva hotīti
tika-s0104t:1338_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Pariyantarahitāti osānavigatā, aniṭṭhaṅgatāti attho. Vividhoti “evampi
tika-s0104t:1338_2: me no”tiādinā nānappakāro. Khepoti sakavādena paravādānaṃ khipanaṃ. Ko paneso amarāvikkhepoti?
tika-s0104t:1338_3: Tathāpavatto diṭṭhippadhāno tādisāya vācāya samuṭṭhāpako cittuppādoyeva. Amarāya
tika-s0104t:1338_4: diṭṭhiyā, vācāya ca vikkhipanti, vividhamapanentīti vā amarāvikkhepino, teyeva “amarāvikkhepikā”tipi
tika-s0104t:1338_5: yujjati. “Macchajāti” cceva avatvā “ekā”ti vadanto macchajātiviseso esoti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1338_6: Ito cito ca sandhāvati ekasmiṃ sabhāve anavaṭṭhānato. Yathā gāhaṃ na upagacchati,
tika-s0104t:1338_7: tathā sandhāvanato, etena amarāya vikkhepo tathā, so viyāti amarāvikkhepoti atthamāha
tika-s0104t:1338_9: attho ācariyasāriputtattherenāpi sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vutto. Amarā viya vikkhepo amarāvikkhepoti
tika-s0104t:1338_10: keci. Atha vā amarā viya vikkhipantīti amarāvikkhepino, teyeva amarāvikkhepikā.
tika-s0104t:1339_0: 62. Vikkhepavādino uttarimanussadhamme, abyākatadhamme ca (akusaladhammepi dī. ni.
tika-s0104t:1339_1: ṭī. 1.62) sabhāvabhedavasena paṭivijjhituṃ ñāṇaṃ natthīti kusalākusalapadānaṃ kusalākusalakammapathavaseneva
tika-s0104t:1339_2: attho vutto. Vighāto vihesā kāyikadukkhaṃ “vippaṭisāruppattiyā”ti domanassassa hetubhāvena
tika-s0104t:1339_3: vacanato, tenāha “dukkhaṃ bhaveyyā”ti. Musāvādeti nimitte bhummavacanaṃ, nissakkatthe
tika-s0104t:1339_4: vā. Musāvādahetu, musāvādato vā ottappena ceva hiriyā cāti attho. Kīdisaṃ amarāvikkhepamāpajjatīti
tika-s0104t:1339_6: Yathāvutte hi nayadvaye paṭhamanayavasenāyamattho dassito, dutiyanayavasena pana
tika-s0104t:1340_0: “Evantipi me no”ti yaṃ tayā puṭṭhaṃ, taṃ evantipi me laddhi no hotīti attho. Evaṃ
tika-s0104t:1340_1: sabbattha yathārahaṃ. Aniyamitavikkhepoti sassatādīsu ekasmimpi pakāre aṭṭhatvā vikkhepakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1340_2: paravādinā yasmiṃ kismiñci pakāre pucchite tassa paṭikkhepavikkhepoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1340_3: Atha vā apariyantavikkhepadassanaṃyeva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kataṃ “evantipi me noti aniyamitavikkhepo”tiādinā,
tika-s0104t:1340_4: “idaṃ kusalanti vā akusalanti vā puṭṭho”tiādinā ca. “Evantipi me no”tiādinā hi aniyametvā,
tika-s0104t:1340_5: niyametvā ca sassatekaccasassatucchedatakkīvādānaṃ paṭisedhanena taṃ taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipateva
tika-s0104t:1340_7: na kismiñci pakkhe avatiṭṭhatīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sayaṃ pana idaṃ…pe… na byākarotī”ti
tika-s0104t:1340_8: āha. Idāni kusalādīnaṃ abyākaraṇena tadeva anavaṭṭhānaṃ vibhāveti “idaṃ kusalanti
tika-s0104t:1340_9: puṭṭho”tiādinā. Tenevāha “ekasmimpi pakkhe na tiṭṭhatī”ti. Kiṃ no noti te laddhīti
tika-s0104t:1340_10: neva na hotīti tava laddhi hoti kinti attho. No notipi me noti neva na hotītipi me laddhi no hoti.
tika-s0104t:1341_0: 63. Attano paṇḍitabhāvavisayānaññeva rāgādīnaṃ vasena yojanaṃ kātuṃ “ajānantopī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1341_1: Sahasāti anupadhāretvā vegena. “Bhadramukhāti paṇḍitānaṃ samudāciṇṇamālapanaṃ, sundaramukhāti
tika-s0104t:1341_2: attho. Tatthāti tasmiṃ byākaraṇe, nimitte cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Chandarāgapadānaṃ samānatthabhāvepi
tika-s0104t:1341_3: vikappanajotakena vā-saddena yogyattā gobalībaddādinayena bhinnatthatāva yuttāti
tika-s0104t:1341_4: āha “chando dubbalarāgo, rāgo balavarāgo”ti. Dosapaṭighesupi eseva nayo. Ettakampi
tika-s0104t:1341_5: nāmāti ettha api-saddo sampiṇḍane vattati, nāma-saddo garahāyaṃ. Na kevalaṃ ito uttaritarameva,
tika-s0104t:1341_6: atha kho ettakampi na jānāmi nāma, pageva taduttarijānaneti attho. Parehi katasakkārasamānavisayānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1341_7: pana rāgādīnaṃ vasena ayaṃ yojanā – kusalākusalaṃ yathābhūtaṃ apajānantopi yesamahaṃ
tika-s0104t:1341_8: samavāyena kusalameva “kusala”nti, akusalameva “akusala”nti ca byākareyyaṃ, tesu
tika-s0104t:1341_9: tathā byākaraṇahetu “aho vata re paṇḍito”ti sakkārasammānaṃ karontesu mama chando
tika-s0104t:1341_10: vā rāgo vā assāti. Dosapaṭighesupi vuttavipariyāyena yojetabbaṃ. “Taṃ mamassa upādānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1341_11: so mamassa vighāto”ti idaṃ abhidhammanayena yathālābhavacanaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbanti
tika-s0104t:1341_12: āha “chandarāgadvaya”ntiādi. Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo eva hi “upādāna”nti abhidhamme vuttā idāni
tika-s0104t:1341_13: suttantanayena avisesayojanaṃ dasseti “ubhayampi vā”tiādinā. Suttante hi dosopi “upādāna”nti
tika-s0104t:1341_15: vuttaṃ, na saddato catunnampi saddānamatthadvayavācakattā. Daḷhaggahaṇanti amuñcanaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1341_16: Paṭighopi hi ārammaṇaṃ na muñcati upanāhādivasena pavattanato, lobhasseva upādānabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1341_17: pākaṭattā dosassāpi upādānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ. Vihananaṃ vihiṃsanaṃ vibādhanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1341_18: Rāgopi hi pariḷāhavasena sāraddhavuttitāya nissayaṃ vihanati. “Rāgo hī”tiādinā rāgadosānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1342_0: 64. Paḍati sabhāvadhamme jānāti, yathāsabhāvaṃ vā gacchatīti paṇḍā, sā yesaṃ te paṇḍitāti
tika-s0104t:1342_1: atthaṃ dasseti “paṇḍiccenā”tiādinā. Paṇḍitassa bhāvo paṇḍiccaṃ, paññā. Yena hi dhammena
tika-s0104t:1342_2: pavattinimittabhūtena yutto “paṇḍito”ti vuccati, soyeva dhammo paṇḍiccaṃ. Tena sutacintāmayapaññā
tika-s0104t:1342_3: vuttā tāsameva visayabhāvato. Samāpattilābhino hi bhāvanāmayapaññā. “Nipuṇā”ti iminā
tika-s0104t:1342_4: pana kammanibbattaṃ paṭisandhipaññāsaṅkhātaṃ sābhāvikañāṇaṃ vuttanti āha “saṇhasukhumabuddhino”ti.
tika-s0104t:1342_5: Atthantaranti atthanānattaṃ, atthameva vā. “Viññātaparappavādā”ti etena kata-saddassa
tika-s0104t:1342_8: Ubhinnamantarā pana samuccayadvayena sāmaññaniddesaṃ, ekasesaṃ vāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vālavedhīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1342_9: rūpaṃ sabhāvo viya rūpametesanti vālavedhirūpāti āha “vālavedhidhanuggahasadisā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1342_10: Satadhā bhinnassa vālaggassa aṃsukoṭivedhakadhanuggahasadisāti attho. Tādisoyeva
tika-s0104t:1342_11: hi “vālavedhī”ti adhippeto. Maññe-saddo upamājotakoti vuttaṃ “bhindantā viyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1342_12: Paññāgatenāti paññāpabhedena, paññāya eva vā. Samanuyuñjanā laddhiyā pucchā. Samanugāhanā
tika-s0104t:1342_13: taṃkāraṇassāti dasseti “kiṃ kusala”ntiādinā. Samanubhāsanāpi ovādavasena samanuyuñjanāyevāti
tika-s0104t:1342_14: āha “samanuyuñjeyyu”nti. “Na sampāyeyya”nti ettha da-kārassa ya-kārādesataṃ, eyya-saddassa
tika-s0104t:1343_0: 65-66. Mandā atikkhā paññā yassāti mandapañño, tenāha “apaññassevetaṃ nāma”nti. “Mohamūho”ti
tika-s0104t:1343_1: vattabbe ha-kāralopena “momūho”ti vuttaṃ, tañca atisayatthadīpakaṃ pariyāyadvayassa
tika-s0104t:1343_2: atirekatthabhāvatoti yathā “padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ “atisammūḷho”ti. Siddhe hi sati
tika-s0104t:1343_3: punārambho niyamāya vā hoti, atthantaraviññāpanāya vā. Yathā pubbe kammunā āgato,
tika-s0104t:1343_4: tathā idhāpīti tathāgato, satto. Ettha ca kāmaṃ purimānampi tiṇṇaṃ kusalādidhammasabhāvānavabodhato
tika-s0104t:1343_5: attheva mandabhāvo, tesaṃ pana attano kusalādidhammānavabodhassa avabodhanato viseso
tika-s0104t:1343_6: atthīti. Pacchimoyeva tadabhāvato mandamomūhabhāvena vutto. Nanu ca pacchimassāpi
tika-s0104t:1343_7: attano dhammānavabodhassa avabodho atthiyeva “atthi paro loko’ti iti ce me assa,
tika-s0104t:1343_8: ‘atthi paro loko’ti iti te naṃ byākareyyaṃ, evantipi me no”tiādivacanatoti? Kiñcāpi
tika-s0104t:1343_9: atthi, na pana tassa purimānaṃ viya apariññātadhammabyākaraṇanimittamusāvādādibhāyanajigucchanākāro
tika-s0104t:1343_10: atthi, atha kho mahāmūḷhoyevāti tathāvesa vutto. Atha vā “evantipi me no”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1343_11: pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇatthaṃ “atthi paro loko”ti iti ce maṃ pucchasīti pucchāṭhapanameva
tika-s0104t:1343_12: tena dassīyati, na attano dhammānavabodhāvabodhoti ayameva visesena “mando momūho”ti
tika-s0104t:1343_13: vutto. Teneva hi tathāvādīnaṃ sañcayaṃ belaṭṭhaputtaṃ ārabbha “ayañca imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1343_14: sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha “atthi paro loko”ti sassatadassanavasena,
tika-s0104t:1343_15: sammādiṭṭhivasena vā pucchā. Yadi hi diṭṭhigatiko sassatadassanavasena puccheyya,
tika-s0104t:1343_16: yadi ca sammādiṭṭhiko sammādassanavasenāti dvidhāpi attho vaṭṭati. “Natthi paro loko”ti
tika-s0104t:1343_17: natthikadassanavasena, sammādiṭṭhivasena vā, “atthi ca natthi ca paro loko”ti ucchedadassanavasena,
tika-s0104t:1343_18: sammādiṭṭhivasena vā, “nevatthi na natthi paro loko”ti vuttapakārattayapaṭikkhepe
tika-s0104t:1343_19: sati pakārantarassa asambhavato atthitānatthitāhi na vattabbākāro paro lokoti vikkhepaññeva
tika-s0104t:1343_20: purakkhārena, sammādiṭṭhivasena vā pucchā. Sesacatukkattayepi vuttanayānusārena attho
tika-s0104t:1343_21: veditabbo. Puññasaṅkhārattiko viya hi kāyasaṅkhārattikena purimacatukkasaṅgahito
tika-s0104t:1343_23: dī. ni. ṭī. 1.65, 66) saṅgahito. Ettha hi tatiyacatukkena puññādikammasaphalatāya,
tika-s0104t:1343_24: sesacatukkattayena ca sattaparāmāsatāya codanānayo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1344_0: Amarāvikkhepiko pana sassatādīnaṃ attano aruccanatāya sabbattha “evantipi me no”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1344_1: vikkhepaññeva karoti. Tattha “evantipi me no”tiādi tattha tattha pucchitākārapaṭisedhanavasena
tika-s0104t:1344_2: vikkhepākāradassanaṃ. Kasmā pana vikkhepavādino paṭikkhepova sabbattha vutto. Nanu
tika-s0104t:1344_4: siyāti? Na, tatthāpi tassa sammūḷhattā, paṭikkhepavaseneva ca vikkhepavādassa pavattanato.
tika-s0104t:1344_5: Tathā hi sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto raññā ajātasattunā sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho
tika-s0104t:1345_0: Etthāha – nanu cāyaṃ sabbopi amarāvikkhepiko kusalādayo dhamme, paralokatthitādīni
tika-s0104t:1345_1: ca yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhamāno tattha tattha pañhaṃ puṭṭho pucchāya vikkhepanamattaṃ
tika-s0104t:1345_2: āpajjati, atha tassa kathaṃ diṭṭhigatikabhāvo siyā. Na hi avattukāmassa viya pucchitatthamajānantassa
tika-s0104t:1345_3: vikkhepakaraṇamattena diṭṭhigatikatā yuttāti? Vuccate – na heva kho pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇamattena
tika-s0104t:1345_4: tassa diṭṭhigatikatā, atha kho micchābhinivesavasena. Sassatābhinivesavasena hi micchābhiniviṭṭhoyeva
tika-s0104t:1345_5: puggalo mandabuddhitāya kusalādidhamme, paralokatthitādīni ca yāthāvato appaṭibujjhamāno
tika-s0104t:1345_6: attanā aviññātassa atthassa paraṃ viññāpetumasakkuṇeyyatāya musāvādabhayena ca vikkhepamāpajjatīti.
tika-s0104t:1345_7: Tathā hi vakkhati “yāsaṃ satteva ucchedadiṭṭhiyo, sesā sassatadiṭṭhiyo”ti atha vā
tika-s0104t:1345_8: puññapāpānaṃ, tabbipākānañca anavabodhena, asaddahanena ca tabbisayāya pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇameva
tika-s0104t:1345_9: sundaranti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā abhinivisantassa uppannā visuṃyevesā ekā diṭṭhi
tika-s0104t:1345_10: sattabhaṅgadiṭṭhi viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “pariyantarahitā diṭṭhigatikassa
tika-s0104t:1345_11: diṭṭhi ceva vācā” cāti. Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “imepi cattāro pubbe pavattadhammānusāreneva
tika-s0104t:1345_12: diṭṭhiyā gahitattā pubbantakappikesu paviṭṭhā”ti, tadetassa amarāvikkhepavādassa
tika-s0104t:1345_13: sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgahavaseneva vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ panassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgahoti? Ucchedavasena
tika-s0104t:1345_14: anabhinivesanato. Natthi hi koci dhammānaṃ yathābhūtavedī vivādabahulattā lokassa.
tika-s0104t:1345_15: “Evameva”nti pana saddantarena dhammanijjhānanā anādikālikā loke, tasmā sassatalesassa
tika-s0104t:1345_16: ettha labbhanato sassatadiṭṭhiyā etassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1347_0: 67. Adhicca yadicchakaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ kassaci buddhipubbaṃ vinā samuppannoti
tika-s0104t:1347_2: tadākārasannissayeneva pavattito, tadākārasahacaritato ca yathā “mañcā ghosanti,
tika-s0104t:1347_3: kuntā pacarantī”ti, adhiccasamuppannadassanaṃ vā antapadalopena adhiccasamuppannaṃ
tika-s0104t:1347_4: yathā “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti, imamatthaṃ sandhāya “adhiccasamuppanno”tiādi vuttaṃ. Akāraṇasamuppannanti
tika-s0104t:1348_0: 68-73. Asaññasattāti ettha etaṃ asaññāvacananti attho. Desanāsīsanti desanāya jeṭṭhakaṃ
tika-s0104t:1348_1: padhānabhāvena gahitattā, tena saññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā bhagavatā ayaṃ desanā katā, na
tika-s0104t:1348_2: pana tattha aññesaṃ arūpadhammānampi atthitāyāti dasseti, tenevāha “acittuppādā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1348_3: Bhagavā hi yathā lokuttaradhammaṃ desento samādhiṃ, paññaṃ vā dhuraṃ katvā deseti,
tika-s0104t:1348_4: evaṃ lokiyadhammaṃ desento cittaṃ, saññaṃ vā. Tattha “yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1348_5: bhāveti, pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā
tika-s0104t:1348_6: parikkhīṇā hontī”ti, tathā “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:1348_7: kiṃ citto tvaṃ bhikkhu manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, santi bhikkhave, sattā nānattakāyā
tika-s0104t:1348_8: nānattasaññino, nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti ca evamādīni suttāni etassatthassa sādhakāni.
tika-s0104t:1348_9: Titthaṃ vuccati micchāladdhi tattheva bāhullena paribbhamanato taranti bālā etthāti
tika-s0104t:1348_10: katvā, tadeva anappakānamanatthānaṃ titthiyānañca sañjātidesaṭṭhena, nivāsaṭṭhena
tika-s0104t:1348_11: vā āyatananti titthāyatanaṃ, tasmiṃ, aññatitthiyasamayeti attho. Titthiyā hi upapattivisese
tika-s0104t:1348_12: vimuttisaññino, saññāvirāgāvirāgesu ādīnavānisaṃsadassāvino ca hutvā asaññasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0104t:1348_13: nibbattetvā akkhaṇabhūmiyaṃ upapajjanti, na sāsanikā, tena vuttaṃ “ekacco titthāyatane
tika-s0104t:1348_14: pabbajitvā”ti. Vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvāti catutthe bhūtakasiṇe paṭhamādīni tīṇi
tika-s0104t:1348_15: jhānāni nibbattetvā tatiyajjhāne ciṇṇavasī hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya catutthajjhānādhigamāya
tika-s0104t:1349_0: Kasmā panettha vāyokasiṇeyeva parikammaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate – yatheva hi rūpapaṭibhāgabhūtesu
tika-s0104t:1349_2: evaṃ aparibyattaviggahatāya arūpapaṭibhāgabhūte kasiṇavisese arūpavibhāvanena arūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāto
tika-s0104t:1349_3: rūpasamāpattiviseso adhigamīyati, tasmā ettha “saññā rogo saññā gaṇḍo”tiādinā, “dhi
tika-s0104t:1349_4: cittaṃ, dhibbate taṃ citta”ntiādinā ca nayena arūpapavattiyā ādīnavadassanena, tadabhāve
tika-s0104t:1349_6: pana saddhiṃ upacārena arūpasamāpattiyo visesena paṭhamāruppajjhānaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “paricchinnākāsakasiṇepī”ti
tika-s0104t:1349_7: vattabbaṃ. Tassāpi hi arūpapaṭibhāgatā labbhatīti? Vattabbamevetaṃ kesañci, avacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1349_8: pana pubbācariyehi aggahitabhāvena. Yathā hi rūpavirāgabhāvanā virajjanīyadhammabhāvamatte
tika-s0104t:1349_9: parinibbindā (virajjanīyadhamma bhāvamattena parinipphannā dī. ni. ṭī. 1.6-73) virajjanīyadhammapaṭibhāgabhūte
tika-s0104t:1349_10: ca visayavisese pātubhavati, evaṃ arūpavirāgabhāvanāpīti vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-s0104t:1349_11: Titthiyeheva pana tassā samāpattiyā paṭipajjitabbatāya, tesañca visayapadesanimittasseva
tika-s0104t:1349_12: tassa jhānassa paṭipattito taṃ kāraṇaṃ passantehi pubbācariyehi catuttheyeva bhūtakasiṇe
tika-s0104t:1349_13: arūpavirāgabhāvanāparikammaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo – vaṇṇakasiṇesu viya
tika-s0104t:1349_15: pavattito, evañca katvā visuddhimagge pathavīkasiṇassa ādāsacandamaṇḍalūpamāvacanañca
tika-s0104t:1349_16: samatthitaṃ hoti. Catutthe pana bhūtakasiṇe bhūtapaṭicchāyā eva jhānassa gocarabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1349_17: gacchatīti tasseva arūpapaṭibhāgatā yuttā, tasmā vāyokasiṇeyeva parikammaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1350_0: Kathaṃ passatīti āha “citte satī”tiādi. Santoti nibbuto, diṭṭhadhammanibbānametanti
tika-s0104t:1350_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Kālaṃ katvāti maraṇaṃ katvā, yo vā manussaloke jīvanakālo upatthambhakapaccayehi
tika-s0104t:1350_2: karīyati, taṃ karitvātipi attho. Asaññasattesu nibbattatīti asaññasattasaṅkhāte sattanikāye
tika-s0104t:1350_3: rūpapaṭisandhivaseneva upapajjati, aññesu vā cakkavāḷesu tassā bhūmiyā atthitāya
tika-s0104t:1350_4: anekavidhabhāvaṃ sandhāya puthuvacananiddesotipi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idhevāti pañcavokārabhaveyeva.
tika-s0104t:1350_5: Tatthāti asaññībhave. Yadi rūpakkhandhamattameva asaññībhave pātubhavati, kathaṃ
tika-s0104t:1350_6: arūpasannissayena vinā tattha rūpaṃ pavattati, nanu siyā arūpasannissitāyeva rūpakkhandhassa
tika-s0104t:1350_7: uppatti idheva pañcavokārabhave tathā uppattiyā adassanatoti? Nāyamanuyogo aññatthāpi
tika-s0104t:1350_8: appaviṭṭho, kathaṃ pana rūpasannissayena vinā arūpadhātuyā arūpaṃ pavattatīti. Idampi
tika-s0104t:1350_9: hi tena samānajātiyameva. Kasmā? Idheva adassanato, kathañca kabaḷīkārāhārena vinā
tika-s0104t:1350_10: rūpadhātuyā rūpaṃ pavattatīti. Idampi ca taṃsabhāvameva, kiṃ kāraṇā? Idha adassanatoyeva.
tika-s0104t:1350_11: Iti aññatthāpi tathā pavattidassanato, kimetena aññanidassanena idheva anuyogena.
tika-s0104t:1350_12: Apica yathā yassa cittasantānassa nibbattikāraṇaṃ rūpe avigatataṇhaṃ, tassa saha
tika-s0104t:1350_13: rūpena sambhavato rūpaṃ nissāya pavatti rūpasāpekkhatāya kāraṇassa. Yassa pana nibbattikāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1350_14: rūpe vigatataṇhaṃ, tassa vinā rūpena pavatti rūpanirapekkhatāya kāraṇassa, evaṃ yassa
tika-s0104t:1350_15: rūpappabandhassa nibbattikāraṇaṃ arūpe vigatataṇhaṃ, tassa vinā arūpena pavatti arūpanirapekkhatāya
tika-s0104t:1350_16: kāraṇassa, evaṃ bhāvanābalābhāvato pañcavokārabhave rūpārūpasambhavo viya, bhāvanābalena
tika-s0104t:1350_17: catuvokārabhave arūpasseva sambhavo viya ca. Asaññībhavepi bhāvanābalena rūpasseva
tika-s0104t:1351_0: Kathaṃ pana tattha kevalo rūpappabandho paccuppannapaccayarahito cirakālaṃ pavattatīti
tika-s0104t:1351_1: paccetabbaṃ, kittakaṃ vā kālaṃ pavattatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1351_2: Tena na kevalaṃ idha ceva aññattha ca vutto āgamoyeva etadatthañāpane, atha kho ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1351_3: panettha yuttīti dasseti. Jiyāvegukkhittoti dhanujiyāya vegena khipito. Jhānavego
tika-s0104t:1351_4: nāma jhānānubhāvo phaladāne samatthatā. Tattakameva kālanti ukkaṃsato pañca mahākappasatāni.
tika-s0104t:1351_5: Tiṭṭhantīti yathānibbattairiyāpathameva cittakammarūpakasadisā hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Jhānavegeti
tika-s0104t:1351_7: paccayanirodhena nirujjhati na pavattati. Idhāti kāmāvacarabhaveti attho aññattha
tika-s0104t:1351_8: tesamanuppattito. Paṭisandhisaññāti paṭisandhicittuppādoyeva saññāsīsena vutto. Kathaṃ
tika-s0104t:1351_9: pana anekakappasatamatikkamena ciraniruddhato viññāṇato idha viññāṇamuppajjati. Na
tika-s0104t:1351_10: hi niruddhe cakkhupasāde cakkhuviññāṇamuppajjamānaṃ diṭṭhanti? Nayidamekantato daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1351_11: Niruddhampi hi cittaṃ samānajātikassa antarā anuppajjanato samanantarapaccayamattaṃ
tika-s0104t:1351_12: hotiyeva, na bījaṃ. Bījaṃ pana kammameva, tasmā kammato bījabhūtato ārammaṇādīhi
tika-s0104t:1351_13: paccayehi asaññībhavato cutānaṃ kāmadhātuyā upapattiviññāṇaṃ hotiyeva, tenāha “idha
tika-s0104t:1351_14: paṭisandhisaññā uppajjatī”ti. Ettha ca yathā nāma utuniyāmena pupphaggahaṇe niyatakālānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1351_15: rukkhānaṃ vidāraṇasaṅkhāte vekhe dinne vekhabalena aniyamatā hoti pupphaggahaṇassa,
tika-s0104t:1351_16: evameva pañcavokārabhave avippayogena vattamānesu rūpārūpadhammesu rūpārūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāte
tika-s0104t:1351_17: vekhe dinne tassa samāpattivekhabalassa anurūpato arūpabhave, asaññabhave ca yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0104t:1351_18: rūparahitā, arūparahitā ca khandhānaṃ pavatti hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1352_0: Kasmā panettha puna saññuppādā ca pana “te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti saññuppādo
tika-s0104t:1352_1: tesaṃ cavanassa kāraṇabhāvena vutto, “saññuppādā”ti vacanaṃ vā kimatthadassananti
tika-s0104t:1352_2: codanāya “yasmā panā”tiādimāha. Idha paṭisandhisaññuppādena tesaṃ cavanassa paññāyanato
tika-s0104t:1352_3: ñāpakahetubhāvena vutto, “saññuppādā”ti vacanaṃ vā tesaṃ cavanassa paññāyanabhāvadassananti
tika-s0104t:1352_4: adhippāyo. “Saññuppādā”ti hi etassa saññuppādena hetubhūtena cavanti, saññuppādā
tika-s0104t:1352_5: vā uppādasaññā te devāti sambandho. Santabhāvāyāti nibbānāya. Nanu cettha jātisatasahassadasasaṃvaṭṭādīnamatthake,
tika-s0104t:1352_6: tadabbhantare vā pavattāya asaññūpapattiyā vasena lābhīadhiccasamuppannikavādopi
tika-s0104t:1352_7: lābhīsassatavādo viya anekabhedo sambhavatīti? Saccameva, anantarattā pana āsannāya
tika-s0104t:1352_8: asaññūpapattiyā vasena lābhīadhiccasamuppannikavādo nayadassanavasena ekova dassitoti
tika-s0104t:1352_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgahato adhiccasamuppannikavādassa sassatavāde
tika-s0104t:1352_10: āgato sabbopi desanānayo yathāsambhavaṃ adhiccasamuppannikavādepi gahetabboti imassa
tika-s0104t:1352_11: visesassa dassanatthaṃ bhagavatā lābhīadhiccasamuppannikavādo avibhajitvā dassito,
tika-s0104t:1352_13: sassatucchedavaseneva duvidhattā, tesu ca ucchedappasaṅgābhāvato. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1352_14: āsaya-saddassa atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ “sassatucchedadiṭṭhi cā”ti, tathā ca vakkhati
tika-s0104t:1353_0: Nanu ca adhiccasamuppannikavādassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho na yutto “ahañhi pubbe nāhosi”ntiādivasena
tika-s0104t:1353_1: pavattanato apubbasattapātubhāvagāhakattā. Sassatadiṭṭhi pana attano, lokassa ca
tika-s0104t:1353_2: sadābhāvagāhinī “atthitveva sassatisama”nti pavattanatoti? No na yutto anāgatakoṭiadassanena
tika-s0104t:1353_3: sassataggāhasamavarodhattā. Yadipi hi ayaṃ vādo “somhi etarahi ahutvā santatāya pariṇato”ti
tika-s0104t:1353_4: attano, lokassa ca atītakoṭiparāmasanavasena pavatto, tathāpi vattamānakālato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0104t:1353_5: na tesaṃ katthaci anāgate pariyantaṃ passati, visesena ca paccuppannānāgatakālesu
tika-s0104t:1353_7: yadevaṃ siyā imassa ca vādassa, sassatavādādīnañca pubbantakappikesu saṅgaho na yuttoyeva
tika-s0104t:1353_8: anāgatakālaparāmasanavasena pavattattāti? Yutto eva samudāgamassa atītakoṭṭhāsikattā.
tika-s0104t:1353_9: Tathā hi nesaṃ samudāgamo atītaṃsapubbenivāsañāṇehi, tappatirūpakānussavādipabhāvitehi
tika-s0104t:1353_10: ca takkanehi saṅgahitoti, tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ. Atha vā sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacārena
tika-s0104t:1353_11: dhammassāminā niravasesato agatiṃ, gatiñca yathābhūtaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā
tika-s0104t:1353_12: paveditā etā diṭṭhiyo, tasmā yāvatikā diṭṭhiyo bhagavatā desitā, yathā ca desitā,
tika-s0104t:1353_13: tāvatikā tathā ceva sanniṭṭhānato sampaṭicchitabbā, na cettha yuttivicāraṇā kātabbā
tika-s0104t:1353_14: buddhavisayattā. Acinteyyo hi buddhānaṃ buddhavisayo, tathā ca vakkhati “tattha na
tika-s0104t:1356_2: kappetvā”tiādīsu vuttanayena “aparantaṃ kappetvā”tiādīsupi attho veditabbo. Visesamattameva cettha vakkhāma.
tika-s0104t:1358_0: 75. Āghātanā uddhanti uddhamāghātanaṃ, maraṇato uddhaṃ pavatto attāti attho. “Uddhamāghātana”nti
tika-s0104t:1358_1: pavatto vādo uddhamāghātano sahacaraṇavasena, taddhitavasena ca, antalopaniddeso
tika-s0104t:1358_2: vā esa. So etesanti uddhamāghātanikā. Evaṃ saddato nipphannaṃ atthato eva dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:1358_3: “uddhamāghātanā attānaṃ vadantī”ti vuttaṃ, āghātanā uddhaṃ uparibhūtaṃ attabhāvanti
tika-s0104t:1358_4: attho. Te hi diṭṭhigatikā “uddhaṃ maraṇato attā nibbikāro”ti vadanti. “So etesa”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:1358_5: assatthiyatthaṃ dasseti yathā “buddhamassa atthīti buddho”ti. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāto aparo
tika-s0104t:1358_6: nayo – saññīti pavatto vādo saññī sahacaraṇādinayena, saññī vādo etesanti saññīvādā
tika-s0104t:1358_7: samāsavasena. Saññīvādo eva vādo etesanti hi attho.
tika-s0104t:1359_0: 76-77. Rūpī attāti ettha kasiṇarūpaṃ “attā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu rūpavinimuttena
tika-s0104t:1359_1: attanā bhavitabbaṃ “rūpamassa atthī”ti vutte saññāya viya rūpassāpi attaniyattā.
tika-s0104t:1359_2: Na hi “saññī attā”ti ettha saññā eva attā, atha kho “saññā assa atthī”ti atthena
tika-s0104t:1359_3: attaniyāva, tathā ca vuttaṃ “tattha pavattasaññañcassa ‘saññā’ti gahetvā”ti? Na kho
tika-s0104t:1359_4: panetamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “rūpamassa atthīti rūpī”ti, atha kho “ruppanasīlo rūpī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1359_6: Sā hi “natthī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ parittavipulatādivisesasabbhāvato. Yadevaṃ siyā
tika-s0104t:1359_7: “ruppanasīlo rūpī”ti, atha imassa vādassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho na yujjati ruppanasīlassa
tika-s0104t:1359_8: bhedasabbhāvatoti? Yujjateva kāyabhedato uddhaṃ parikappitassa attano nibbikāratāya
tika-s0104t:1359_9: tena adhippetattā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti. Atha vā “rūpamassa atthīti
tika-s0104t:1359_10: rūpī”ti vuttepi na koci doso kappanāsiddhena bhedena abhedassāpi niddesadassanato
tika-s0104t:1360_0: Apica avayavavasena avayavino tathāniddesanidassanato yathā “kāye kāyānupassī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1360_1: ruppanaṃ vā rūpaṃ, rūpasabhāvo, tadassa atthīti rūpī, attā “rūpino dhammā”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1360_2: viya, evañca katvā attano rūpasabhāvattā “rūpī attā”ti vacanaṃ ñāyāgatamevāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1360_3: “kasiṇarūpaṃ attā”ti. “Gahetvā”ti etena cetassa sambandho. Tatthāti kasiṇarūpe. Assāti
tika-s0104t:1360_4: parikappitassa attano, ājīvakādayo takkamattena paññapenti viyāti attho. Ājīvakā
tika-s0104t:1360_5: hi takkikāyeva, na lābhino. Niyatavāditāya hi kammaphalapaṭikkhepato natthi tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1360_6: jhānasamāpattilābho. Tathā hikaṇhābhijātiādīsu kāḷakādirūpaṃ “attā”ti ekacce ājīvakā
tika-s0104t:1360_7: paṭijānanti. Purimanayena cettha lābhīnaṃ dasseti, pacchimanayena pana takkikaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1360_8: Evamīdisesu. Roga-saddo bhaṅgapariyāyo bhaṅgassāpi rujjanabhāvato, evañca katvā aroga-saddassa
tika-s0104t:1360_9: niccapariyāyatā upapannā hoti, tenāha “nicco”ti. Roga-saddo vā byādhipariyāyo. Arogoti
tika-s0104t:1360_10: pana rogarahitatāsīsena nibbikāratāya niccataṃ diṭṭhigatiko paṭijānātīti dassetuṃ
tika-s0104t:1360_12: yathārahamarūpasamāpattinimittaṃ nāma. Nimbapaṇṇe tapparimāṇo tittakaraso viya sarīrapparimāṇo
tika-s0104t:1360_13: arūpī attā sarīre tiṭṭhatīti takkamatteneva nigaṇṭhā “arūpī attā saññī”ti paññapentīti
tika-s0104t:1361_0: Tatiyā panāti “rūpī ca arūpī ca attā”ti laddhi. Missakagāhavasenāti rūpārūpasamāpattīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1361_1: yathāvuttāni nimittāni ekajjhaṃ katvā ekova “attā”ti, tattha pavattasaññañcassa “saññā”ti
tika-s0104t:1361_2: gahaṇavasena. Ayañhi diṭṭhigatiko rūpārūpasamāpattilābhī tāsaṃ nimittaṃ rūpabhāvena,
tika-s0104t:1361_3: arūpabhāvena ca “attā”ti gahetvā “rūpī ca arūpī cā”ti abhinivesaṃ janesi athetavādino
tika-s0104t:1361_4: viya, takkamatteneva vā rūpārūpadhammānaṃ missakagahaṇavasena “rūpī ca arūpī ca attā”ti
tika-s0104t:1361_5: abhinivissa aṭṭhāsi. Catutthāti “neva arūpī ca nārūpī ca attā”ti laddhi. Takkagāhenevāti
tika-s0104t:1361_7: khambhakucchi [thambhakuṭṭa ] hatthapādādisaṅghāto viya neva rūpī, rūpasabhāvānativattanato
tika-s0104t:1362_0: Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo – nevarūpī nārūpīti ettha hi antānantikacatutthavāde
tika-s0104t:1362_1: viya aññamaññapaṭikkhepavasena attho veditabbo. Satipi ca tatiyavādena imassa samānatthabhāve
tika-s0104t:1362_2: tattha desakālabhedavasena viya idha kālavatthubhedavasena tatiyacatutthavādānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1362_3: viseso daṭṭhabbo. Kālabhedavasena hi idha tatiyavādassa pavatti rūpārūpanimittānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1362_4: sahaanupaṭṭhānato. Catutthavādassa pana vatthubhedavasena pavatti rūpārūpadhammasamūhabhāvatoti.
tika-s0104t:1362_5: Dutiyacatukkaṃ antānantikavāde vuttanayena veditabbaṃ sabbathā saddatthato samānatthattā.
tika-s0104t:1362_6: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, tampi “amati gacchati bhāvo osānametthā”tiādinā amhehi vuttameva,
tika-s0104t:1362_7: kevalaṃ pana tattha pubbantakappanāvasena pavatto, idha aparantakappanāvasenāti ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1362_8: viseso pākaṭoyeva. Kāmañca nānattasaññī attāti ayampi vādo samāpannakavasena labbhati.
tika-s0104t:1362_9: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino diṭṭhigatikassa vasena saññābhedasambhavato. Tathāpi samāpattiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1362_10: ekarūpeneva saññāya upaṭṭhānato lābhīvasena ekattasaññitā sātisayaṃ yuttāti āha “samāpannakavasena
tika-s0104t:1362_11: ekattasaññī”ti. Ekasamāpattilābhino eva vā vasena attho veditabbo. Satipi ca samāpattibhedato
tika-s0104t:1362_12: saññābhedasambhave bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇeyeva saññānānattassa oḷārikassa sambhavato
tika-s0104t:1362_15: visayadassanaṃ. Visayavasena hi saññāya parittatā, iminā ca satipi saññāvinimuttadhamme
tika-s0104t:1362_16: “saññāyeva attā”ti vadatīti dasseti. Esa nayo vipulakasiṇavasenāti etthāpi. Evañca
tika-s0104t:1362_17: katvā antānantikavāde ceva idha ca antānantacatukke paṭhamadutiyavādesu saddatthamattato
tika-s0104t:1362_18: samānesupi sabhāvato tehi dvīhi vādehi imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vādānaṃ viseso siddho hoti,
tika-s0104t:1362_19: aññathā vuttappakāresu vādesu satipi pubbantāparantakappanabhedamattena kehici visese
tika-s0104t:1363_0: Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo – “aṅguṭṭhappamāṇo attā, aṇumatto attā”tiādiladdhivasena
tika-s0104t:1363_1: paritto ca so saññī cāti parittasaññī kāpilakāṇādapabhutayo [kapilakaṇādādayo ] viya.
tika-s0104t:1363_2: Attano sabbagatabhāvapaṭijānanavasena appamāṇo ca so saññī cāti appamāṇasaññīti.
tika-s0104t:1364_1: dissamānāpi sattānaṃ sukhādisamaṅgitā dibbacakkhunāva diṭṭhā nāmāti āha “dibbena
tika-s0104t:1364_3: vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhigatikavisayāsu hi pañcavokārajhānabhūmīsu vehapphalabhūmiṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-s0104t:1364_4: avasesā yathārahaṃ catukkanaye tikajjhānassa, pañcakanaye ca catukkajjhānassa vipākaṭṭhānattā
tika-s0104t:1364_5: tikacatukkajjhānabhūmiyo nāma. Suddhāvāsā pana tesamavisayā. Nibbattamānanti uppajjamānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1364_7: disvā”ti paccuppannavacanaṃ anupapannameva siyā. Anāgatavisayā hi ete vādāti? Upapannameva
tika-s0104t:1364_9: Tenevāha “nibbattamānaṃ disvā ‘ekantasukhī’ti gaṇhātī”ti. Ettha ca tassaṃ tassaṃ
tika-s0104t:1364_11: tadanurūpāyeva bhūmi vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddantarābhisambandhavasena viya hi atthapakaraṇādivasenapi
tika-s0104t:1364_12: atthaviseso labbhati. “Ekantasukhī”tiādīsu ca ekantabhāvo bahulaṃ pavattimattaṃ pati
tika-s0104t:1364_13: payutto. Tathāpavattimattadassanena tesaṃ evaṃ gahaṇato. Atha vā hatthidassakaandhā
tika-s0104t:1364_14: viya diṭṭhigatikā yaṃ yadeva passanti, taṃ tadeva abhinivissa voharanti. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0104t:1364_15: bhagavatā udāne “aññatitthiyā bhikkhave, paribbājakā andhā acakkhukā”tiādi, tasmā
tika-s0104t:1364_16: alamettha yuttimagganāti. “Dibbena cakkhunā disvā”ti vuttamatthaṃ samatthetuṃ “visesato hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1366_0: 78-83. Atha na koci viseso atthīti codanaṃ sodheti “kevalañhī”tiādinā. “Asaññī”ti
tika-s0104t:1366_1: ca “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti ca gaṇhantānaṃ tā diṭṭhiyoti sambandho. Kāraṇanti visesakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1366_2: diṭṭhisamudāgamakāraṇaṃ vā. Satipi kiñci kāraṇapariyesanasambhave diṭṭhigatikavādānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1366_3: anādariyabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “na ekantena kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Kasmāti āha
tika-s0104t:1366_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – asaññīvāde asaññībhave nibbattasattavasena pavatto paṭhamavādo,
tika-s0104t:1366_6: “saññaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti ettha vuttanayena saññaṃyeva “attā”ti gahetvā tassa
tika-s0104t:1366_7: kiñcanabhāvena ṭhitāya aññāya saññāya abhāvato “asaññī”ti pavatto dutiyavādo, tathā
tika-s0104t:1366_8: saññāya saha rūpadhamme, sabbe eva vā rūpārūpadhamme “attā”ti gahetvā pavatto tatiyavādo,
tika-s0104t:1367_0: Dutiyacatukkepi kasiṇarūpassa asañjānanasabhāvatāya asaññīti katvā antānantikavāde
tika-s0104t:1367_1: vuttanayena cattāro vikappā pavattā. Nevasaññīnāsaññīvāde pana nevasaññīnāsaññībhave
tika-s0104t:1367_2: nibbattasattasseva cutipaṭisandhīsu, sabbattha vā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthāya
tika-s0104t:1367_3: sukhumāya saññāya atthibhāvapaṭijānanavasena paṭhamavādo, asaññīvāde vuttanayena
tika-s0104t:1367_4: sukhumāya saññāya vasena, sañjānanasabhāvatāpaṭijānanavasena ca dutiyavādādayo pavattāti.
tika-s0104t:1367_5: Evaṃ kenaci pakārena satipi kāraṇapariyesanasambhave diṭṭhigatikavādānaṃ pariyesanakkhamābhāvato
tika-s0104t:1367_6: ādaraṃ katvā mahussāhena tesaṃ kāraṇaṃ na pariyesitabbanti. Etesaṃ pana saññīasaññīnevasaññīnāsaññīvādānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1369_0: 84. Avijjamānassa vināsāsambhavato atthibhāvahetuko ucchedoti dassetuṃ vijjamānavācakena
tika-s0104t:1369_2: cesa diṭṭhigatikavādavisayo sattoyeva idha adhippetoti dassanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “sattassā”ti
tika-s0104t:1369_3: vuttaṃ, tena imamatthaṃ dasseti – yathā hetuphalabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1369_4: satipi ekasantānapariyāpannānaṃ bhinnasantatipatitehi visese hetuphalabhūtānaṃ paramatthato
tika-s0104t:1369_5: bhinnasabhāvattā bhinnasantānapatitānaṃ viya accantaṃ bhedasanniṭṭhānena nānattanayassa
tika-s0104t:1369_6: micchāgahaṇaṃ ucchedābhinivesassa kāraṇaṃ, evaṃ hetuphalabhūtānaṃ vijjamānepi sabhāvabhede
tika-s0104t:1369_8: hi pavattamānesu khandhesu ghanavinibbhogābhāvena tesaṃ idha sattagāho, sattassa
tika-s0104t:1369_9: ca atthibhāvagāhahetuko ucchedavādo, anupubbanirodhavasena pana nirantaravināso idha
tika-s0104t:1369_10: “ucchedo”ti adhippeto yāvāyaṃ attā ucchijjamāno bhavati, tāvāyaṃ vijjatiyevāti gahaṇatoti
tika-s0104t:1369_11: āha “upaccheda”nti. U-saddo hi upa-saddapariyāyo, so ca upasaṅkamanattho, upasaṅkamanañcettha
tika-s0104t:1369_12: anupubbamuppajjitvā aparāparaṃ nirodhavasena nirantaratā. Apica punānuppajjamānavasena
tika-s0104t:1369_13: nirudayavināsoyeva ucchedo nāma yathāvuttanayena gahaṇatoti āha “upaccheda”nti. U-saddo,
tika-s0104t:1369_14: hi upa-saddo ca ettha uparibhāgattho. Niruddhato parabhāgo ca idha uparibhāgoti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1370_0: Nirantaravasena, nirudayavasena vā visesena nāso vināso, so pana maṃsacakkhupaññācakkhūnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1370_1: dassanapathātikkamanato adassanamevāti āha “adassana”nti. Adassane hi nāsa-saddo
tika-s0104t:1370_2: loke niruḷho “dve cāpare vaṇṇavikāranāsā”tiādīsu (kāsikā 6-3-109 suttaṃ passitabbaṃ)
tika-s0104t:1370_3: viya. Bhāvavigamanti sabhāvāpagamaṃ. Yathādhammaṃ bhavanaṃ bhāvoti hi atthena idha
tika-s0104t:1370_4: bhāva-saddo sabhāvavācako. Yo pana nirantaraṃ nirudayavināsavasena ucchijjati, so
tika-s0104t:1370_6: yathāpāṭhaṃ samudāgamaṃ nidassanamattena dasseti, tena vakkhati “tathā ca aññathā
tika-s0104t:1370_7: ca vikappetvāvā”ti. Tatthāti “sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapentī”ti
tika-s0104t:1370_8: vacane. Lābhīti dibbacakkhuñāṇalābhī. Tadavasesalābhī ceva sabbaso alābhī ca idha
tika-s0104t:1371_0: Cutinti sekkhaputhujjanānampi cutimeva. Esa nayo cutimattamevāti etthāpi. Upapattiṃ
tika-s0104t:1371_1: apassantoti daṭṭhuṃ samatthepi sati anolokanavasena apassanto. Na upapātanti pubbayogābhāvena,
tika-s0104t:1371_2: parikammākaraṇena vā upapattiṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkoti, evañca katvā nayadvaye viseso
tika-s0104t:1371_3: pākaṭo hoti. Ko paralokaṃ jānāti, na jānātiyevāti natthikavādavasena ucchedaṃ gaṇhātīti
tika-s0104t:1371_4: saha pāṭhasesena sambandho, natthikavādavasena mahāmūḷhabhāveneva “ito añño paraloko
tika-s0104t:1371_5: atthī”ti anavabodhanato imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhātīti adhippāyo. “Ettakoyeva visayo, yvāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1371_6: indriyagocaro”ti attano dhītuyā hatthaggaṇhanakarājā viya kāmasukhābhirattatāyapi
tika-s0104t:1371_7: gaṇhātīti āha “kāmasukhagiddhatāya vā”ti. Vaṇṭato patitapaṇṇānaṃ vaṇṭena apaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1371_8: sandhāya “na puna viruhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Evameva sattāti yathā paṇḍupalāso bandhanā
tika-s0104t:1371_9: pavutto puna na paṭisandhīyati, evameva sabbepi sattā appaṭisandhikā maraṇapariyosānā
tika-s0104t:1371_10: aponobbhavikā appaṭisandhikamaraṇameva nigacchantīti attho. Udakapubbuḷakūpamā hi
tika-s0104t:1371_11: sattā puna anuppajjamānatoti tassa laddhi. Tathāti “lābhī anussaranto”tiādinā [arahato
tika-s0104t:1371_13: tato aññenapi pakārena. Lābhinopi cutito uddhaṃ upapātassa adassanamattaṃ pati takkaneneva
tika-s0104t:1371_14: imā diṭṭhiyo uppajjantīti vuttaṃ “vikappetvāvā”ti. Tathā ca vikappetvāva uppannā
tika-s0104t:1371_15: aññathā ca vikappetvāva uppannāti hi sambandho. Tattha “dve janā”tiādinā ucchedaggāhakappabhedadassanena
tika-s0104t:1371_16: imamatthaṃ dasseti. Yathā amarāvikkhepikavādā ekantaalābhīvaseneva desitā, yathā
tika-s0104t:1371_17: ca uddhamāghātanikasaññīvāde catutthacatukke saññīvādā ekantalābhīvaseneva desitā,
tika-s0104t:1371_18: nayime. Ime pana sassatekaccasassatavādādayo viya lābhīalābhīvaseneva desitāti. Yadevaṃ
tika-s0104t:1371_19: kasmā sassatavādādīsu viya lābhīvasena, takkīvasena ca paccekaṃ desanamakatvā sassatavādādidesanāhi
tika-s0104t:1371_20: aññathā idha desanā katāti? Vuccate – desanāvilāsappattito. Desanāvilāsappattā hi
tika-s0104t:1371_21: buddhā bhagavanto, te veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vividhenākārena dhammaṃ desenti, na
tika-s0104t:1371_22: aññathā. Yadi hi idhāpi ca tathādesanāya nibandhanabhūto veneyyajjhāsayo bhaveyya,
tika-s0104t:1371_23: tathārūpameva bhagavā vadeyya, kathaṃ? “Idha bhikkhave, ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
tika-s0104t:1371_24: vā ātappamanvāya…pe… yathā samāhite citte sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti,
tika-s0104t:1371_25: so dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena arahato cuticittaṃ passati, puthūnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1371_26: vā parasattānaṃ, na heva kho taduddhaṃ upapattiṃ. So evamāha ‘yato kho bho ayaṃ attā
tika-s0104t:1371_27: rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpettikasambhavo kāyassa bhado ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti
tika-s0104t:1371_28: paraṃ maraṇā’tiādinā” visesalābhino, takkino ca visuṃ katvā. Yasmā pana tathādesanāya
tika-s0104t:1371_29: nibandhanabhūto veneyyajjhāsayo na idha bhavati, tasmā desanāvilāsena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
tika-s0104t:1372_0: Atha vā sassatekaccasassatavādādīsu viya na idha takkīvādato visesalābhīvādo bhinnākāro,
tika-s0104t:1372_1: atha kho samānappakāratāya samānākāroyevāti imassa visesassa pakāsanatthaṃ ayamucchedavādo
tika-s0104t:1372_2: bhagavatā purimavādehi visiṭṭhākārabhāvena desito. Sambhavati hi idha takkinopi anussavādivasena
tika-s0104t:1372_3: adhigamavato viya abhiniveso. Apica na imā diṭṭhiyo bhagavatā anāgate evaṃbhāvīvasena
tika-s0104t:1372_4: desitā, nāpi evamete bhaveyyunti parikappanāvasena, atha kho yathā yathā diṭṭhigatikehi
tika-s0104t:1372_5: “idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti maññitā, tathā tathāyeva ime diṭṭhigatā yathābhuccaṃ
tika-s0104t:1372_6: sabbaññutaññāṇena paricchinditvā pakāsitā, yehi gambhīrādippakārā aputhujjanagocarā
tika-s0104t:1372_7: buddhadhammā pakāsanti, yesañca parikittanena tathāgatā sammadeva thomitā honti.
tika-s0104t:1373_0: Aparo nayo – yathā ucchedavādīhi diṭṭhigatikehi uttaruttarabhavadassīhi aparabhavadassīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1373_1: tesaṃ vādapaṭisedhavasena sakasakavādā patiṭṭhāpitā, tathāyevāyaṃ desanā katāti purimadesanāhi
tika-s0104t:1373_2: imissā desanāya pavattibhedo na codetabbo, evañca katvā arūpabhavabhedavasena ucchedavādo
tika-s0104t:1373_3: catudhā vibhajitvā viya kāmarūpabhavabhedavasenāpi anekadhā vibhajitvāyeva vattabbo,
tika-s0104t:1373_4: evaṃ sati bhagavatā vuttasattakato bahutarabhedo ucchedavādo āpajjatīti, atha vā
tika-s0104t:1373_5: paccekaṃ kāmarūpabhavabhedavasena viya arūpabhavavasenāpi na vibhajitvā vattabbo,
tika-s0104t:1373_6: evampi sati bhagavatā vuttasattakato appatarabhedova ucchedavādo āpajjatīti ca evaṃpakārāpi
tika-s0104t:1373_7: codanā anavakāsā eva hoti. Diṭṭhigatikānañhi yathābhimataṃ desanā pavattāti.
tika-s0104t:1374_0: 85. Mātāpitūnaṃ etanti taṃsambandhanato etaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ santakanti attho. Sukkasoṇitanti
tika-s0104t:1374_1: pitu sukkaṃ, mātu soṇitañca, ubhinnaṃ vā sukkasaṅkhātaṃ soṇitaṃ. Mātāpettiketi nimitte
tika-s0104t:1374_2: cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Itīti imehi tīhi padehi. “Rūpakāyavasenā”ti avatvā “rūpakāyasīsenā”ti
tika-s0104t:1374_3: vadanto arūpampi tesaṃ “attā”ti gahaṇaṃ ñāpeti. Iminā pakārena itthanti āha “evameke”ti.
tika-s0104t:1374_4: Evaṃ-saddo hettha idamattho, iminā pakārenāti attho. Eketi ekacce, aññe vā.
tika-s0104t:1375: 86. Manussānaṃ pubbe gahitattā, aññesañca asambhavato “kāmāvacaro”ti ettha chakāmāvacaradevapariyāpannoti attho. Kabaḷīkāro cettha yathāvuttasudhāhāro.
tika-s0104t:1376_0: 87. Jhānamanena nibbattoti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Mahāvayavo
tika-s0104t:1376_1: aṅgo, tattha visuṃ pavatto paccaṅgo, sabbehi aṅgapaccaṅgehi yutto tathā. Tesanti
tika-s0104t:1376_2: cakkhusotindriyānaṃ. Itaresanti ghānajivhākāyindriyānaṃ. Tesampi indriyānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1376_3: purisavesavaseneva veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “samānepi tattha ubhayaliṅgābhāve
tika-s0104t:1377_1: – yuttaṃ tāva purimesu tīsu vādesu “kāyassa bhedā”ti vattuṃ pañcavokārabhavapariyāpannaṃ
tika-s0104t:1377_2: attabhāvamārabbha pavattattā tesaṃ vādānaṃ, catuvokārabhavapariyāpannaṃ pana attabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1377_3: nissāya pavattesu catutthādīsu catūsu vādesu kasmā “kāyassa bhedā”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi
tika-s0104t:1377_4: arūpīnaṃ kāyo vijjati. Yo bhedoti vucceyyāti? Saccametaṃ, rūpattabhāve pana pavattavohāreneva
tika-s0104t:1377_5: diṭṭhigatiko arūpattabhāvepi kāyavohāraṃ āropetvā evamāha. Lokasmiñhi dissati aññatthabhūtopi
tika-s0104t:1377_6: vohāro tadaññatthasamāropito yathā taṃ “sasavisāṇaṃ, khaṃ puppha”nti. Yathā ca diṭṭhigatikā
tika-s0104t:1377_7: diṭṭhiyo paññapenti, tathāyeva bhagavāpi desetīti. Apica nāmakāyabhāvato phassādidhammasamūhabhūte
tika-s0104t:1377_8: arūpattabhāve kāyaniddeso daṭṭhabbo. Samūhaṭṭhenapi hi “kāyo”ti vuccati “hatthikāyo
tika-s0104t:1377_10: dutiyādivādānaṃ aparantakappikabhāvo yutto hotu anāgataddhavisayattā tesaṃ vādānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1377_12: aparantakappikabhāvo yujjeyya paccuppannaddhavisayattā tassa vādassa. Dutiyavādādīnañhi
tika-s0104t:1377_14: yujjati aparantakappikatā, tathā ceva vuttaṃ “no ca kho bho ayaṃ attā ettāvatā sammā
tika-s0104t:1377_15: samucchinno hotī”tiādi yaṃ pana tattha vuttaṃ “atthi kho bho añño attā”ti, taṃ manussattabhāvādiheṭṭhimattabhāvavisesāpekkhāya
tika-s0104t:1377_16: vuttaṃ, na sabbathā aññabhāvato. Paṭhamavādassa pana anāgate taduttaribhavūpapannassa
tika-s0104t:1377_17: attano samucchedabodhanābhāvato, “atthi kho bho añño attā”ti ettha aññabhāvena aggahaṇato
tika-s0104t:1377_18: ca na yujjateva aparantakappikatāti? No na yujjati idhalokapariyāpannattepi paṭhamavādavisayassa
tika-s0104t:1377_19: anāgatakālikasseva tena adhippetattā. Paṭhamavādināpi hi idhalokapariyāpannassa attano
tika-s0104t:1377_20: paraṃ maraṇā ucchedo anāgatakālavaseneva adhippeto, tasmā cassa aparantakappikatāya na koci virodhoti.
tika-s0104t:1379_0: 93. Ñāṇena daṭṭhabboti diṭṭho, diṭṭho ca so sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammo cāti diṭṭhadhammo,
tika-s0104t:1379_1: dassanabhūtena ñāṇena upaladdhasabhāvoti attho. So pana akkhānamindriyānaṃ abhimukhībhūto
tika-s0104t:1379_2: visayoyevāti vuttaṃ “paccakkhadhammo vuccatī”ti. Tattha yo anindriyavisayo, sopi
tika-s0104t:1379_3: supākaṭabhāvena indriyavisayo viya hotīti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tenevāha
tika-s0104t:1379_4: “tattha tattha paṭiladdhattabhāvassetaṃ adhivacana”nti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave yathākammaṃ
tika-s0104t:1379_5: paṭilabhitabbattabhāvassa vācakaṃ padaṃ, nāmanti vā attho. Nibbānañcettha dukkhavūpasamanameva,
tika-s0104t:1379_6: na aggaphalaṃ, na ca asaṅkhatadhātu tesamavisayattāti āha “dukkhavūpasamana”nti.
tika-s0104t:1379_7: Diṭṭhadhammanibbāne pavatto vādo etesanti diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādātipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t:1380_0: 94. Kāmanīyattā kāmā ca te anekāvayavānaṃ samūhabhāvato sattānañca bandhanato guṇā
tika-s0104t:1380_1: cāti kāmaguṇāti atthaṃ sandhāyāha “manāpiyarūpādīhī”tiādi. Yāva phoṭṭhabbārammaṇañcettha
tika-s0104t:1380_2: ādi-saddena saṅgaṇhāti. Suṭṭhu appitoti sammā ṭhapito. Ṭhapanā cettha allīyanāti
tika-s0104t:1380_3: āha “allīno”ti. Parito tattha tattha kāmaguṇesu yathāsakaṃ indriyāni cāreti gocaraṃ
tika-s0104t:1380_4: gaṇhāpetīti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “tesū”tiādi vuttaṃ, tenāha “ito cito ca upanetī”ti. Pari-saddavisiṭṭho
tika-s0104t:1380_5: vā idha cara-saddo kīḷāyanti vuttaṃ “palaḷatī”tiādi [laḷati (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)]. Palaḷatīti
tika-s0104t:1380_6: hi pakārena laḷati, vilāsaṃ karotīti attho. “Ettha cā”tiādinā uttamakāmaguṇikānameva
tika-s0104t:1381_0: 95. Aññathābhāvāti kāraṇe nissakkavacanaṃ. Vuttanayenāti suttapadesu desitanayena,
tika-s0104t:1381_2: cetaso abbhantaraṃ nijjhāyanaṃ socanaṃ antonijjhāyanaṃ, tadeva lakkhaṇametassāti
tika-s0104t:1381_3: antonijjhāyanalakkhaṇo. Tasmiṃ soke samuṭṭhānahetubhūte nissitaṃ tannissitaṃ. Bhusaṃ
tika-s0104t:1381_4: vilapanaṃ lālappanaṃ, tannissitameva lālappanaṃ, tadeva lakkhaṇamassāti tannissitalālappanalakkhaṇo.
