tika-s0104t:1381_5: Pasādasaṅkhāte kāye nissitassa dukkhasahagatakāyaviññāṇassa paṭipīḷanaṃ kāyapaṭipīḷanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1381_6: sasambhārakathanaṃ vā etaṃ yathā “dhanunā vijjhatī”ti tadupanissayassa vā aniṭṭharūpassa
tika-s0104t:1381_7: pacchā pavattanato “rūpakāyassa paṭipīḷana”ntipi vaṭṭati. Paṭighasampayuttassa manaso
tika-s0104t:1381_8: vihesanaṃ manovighātaṃ. Tadeva lakkhaṇamassāti sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Ñātibyasanādinā
tika-s0104t:1381_9: phuṭṭhassa paridevanāyapi asakkuṇantassa antogatasokasamuṭṭhito bhuso āyāso upāyāso.
tika-s0104t:1381_10: So pana cetaso appasannākāro evāti āha “visādalakkhaṇo”ti. Sādanaṃ pasādanaṃ sādo,
tika-s0104t:1381_11: pasannatā. Anupasaggopi hi saddo saupasaggo viya yathāvuttassa atthassa bodhako yathā
tika-s0104t:1381_12: “gotrabhū”ti. Evaṃ sabbattha. Tato vigamanaṃ visādo, appasannabhāvo.
tika-s0104t:1382_0: 96. Vitakkanaṃ vitakkitaṃ, taṃ panatthato vitakkova, tathā vicāritanti etthāpi, tena
tika-s0104t:1382_1: vuttaṃ “abhiniropanavasena pavatto vitakko”tiādi. Etenāti vitakkavicāre parāmasitvā
tika-s0104t:1382_2: karaṇaniddeso, hetuniddeso vā. Tenetamatthaṃ dīpeti “khobhakarasabhāvattā vitakkavicārānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1382_3: taṃsahitampi jhānaṃ tehi sauppīḷanaṃ viya hotī”ti, tenāha “sakaṇṭakaṃ [bhakaṇḍakaṃ
tika-s0104t:1382_4: (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)] viya khāyatī”ti. Oḷārikabhāvo hi vitakkavicārasaṅkhātena kaṇṭakena
tika-s0104t:1382_5: saha pavattakathā. Kaṇṭakasahitabhāvo ca sauppīḷanatā eva, loke hi sakaṇṭakaṃ pharusakaṃ oḷārikanti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1383_0: 97. Pītigataṃ pītiyeva “diṭṭhigata”ntiādīsu viya gata-saddassa tabbhāvavuttito. Ayañhi
tika-s0104t:1383_1: saṃvaṇṇakānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ anatthakapadaṃ, tulyādhikaraṇapadañca ṭhapetvā atthavaṇṇanā.
tika-s0104t:1383_2: Tathā hi tattha tattha dissati. “Yopanāti yo yādiso, nibbānadhātūti nibbāyanamatta”nti
tika-s0104t:1383_3: ca ādi. Yāya nimittabhūtāya ubbilāvanapītiyā uppannāya cittaṃ ubbilāvitaṃ nāma, sāyeva
tika-s0104t:1383_4: ubbilāvitattaṃ bhāvavācakassa nimitte pavattanato. Iti pītiyā uppannāya eva cittassa
tika-s0104t:1383_5: ubbilāvanato tassa ubbilāvitabhāvo pītiyā kato nāmāti āha “ubbilabhāvakaraṇa”nti.
tika-s0104t:1384_0: 98. Ābhujanaṃ manasikaraṇaṃ ābhogo. Sammā anukkamena, punappunaṃ vā ārammaṇassa āhāro
tika-s0104t:1384_1: samannāhāro. Ayaṃ pana ṭīkāyaṃ vuttanayo – cittassa ābhuggabhāvo ārammaṇe abhinatabhāvo
tika-s0104t:1384_2: ābhogo. Sukhena hi cittaṃ ārammaṇe abhinataṃ hoti, na dukkhena viya apanataṃ, nāpi
tika-s0104t:1384_3: adukkhamasukhena viya anabhinataṃ, anapanatañcāti. Ettha ca “manuññabhojanādīsu khuppipāsādiabhibhūtassa
tika-s0104t:1384_4: viya kāmehi viveciyamānassa upādārammaṇapatthanāvisesato abhivaḍḍhati, manuññabhojanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1384_5: bhuttāvino viya pana uḷārakāmarasassa yāvadatthaṃ nicitassa sahitassa bhuttakāmatāya
tika-s0104t:1384_6: kāmesu pātabyatā na hoti, visayānabhigiddhanato visayehi dummociyehi jalūkā viya
tika-s0104t:1384_7: sayameva muccatī”ti ca ayoniso ummujjitvā kāmaguṇasantappitatāya saṃsāradukkhavūpasamaṃ
tika-s0104t:1384_8: byākāsi paṭhamavādī. Kāmādīnaṃ ādīnavadassitāya, paṭhamādijhānasukhassa santabhāvadassitāya
tika-s0104t:1384_9: ca paṭhamādijhānasukhatittiyā saṃsāradukkhupacchedaṃ byākaṃsu dutiyādivādino. Idhāpi
tika-s0104t:1384_10: ucchedavādeva vuttappakāro vicāro yathāsambhavaṃ ānetvā vattabbo. Ayaṃ panettha viseso
tika-s0104t:1384_11: – ekasmimpi attabhāve pañca vādā labbhanti. Paṭhamavāde yadi kāmaguṇasamappito attā,
tika-s0104t:1384_12: evaṃ so diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto. Dutiyādivādesu yadi paṭhamavādasaṅgahito soyeva
tika-s0104t:1384_13: attā paṭhamajjhānādisamaṅgī, evaṃ sati diṭṭhadhammanibbānappattoti. Teneva hi ucchedavāde
tika-s0104t:1384_14: viya idha pāḷiyaṃ “añño attā”ti aññaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ. Kathaṃ pana accantanibbānapaññāpakassa
tika-s0104t:1384_15: attano diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādassa sassatadiṭṭhiyā saṅgaho, na ucchedadiṭṭhiyāti?
tika-s0104t:1384_17: avaṭṭhānadīpanato. Tesañhi tathāpaṭiladdhena kammabandhavimokkhena suddho hutvā diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto
tika-s0104t:1384_18: attā sakarūpeneva avaṭṭhāsīti laddhi. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “ettāvatā kho bho ayaṃ attā
tika-s0104t:1384_19: paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ patto hotī”ti sassatabhāvañāpakacchāyāya eva tesaṃ vādadassanaṃ katanti.
tika-s0104t:1385_0: “Ettāvatā”tiādinā pāḷiyatthasampiṇḍanaṃ. Tattha yāsanti yathāvuttānaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1385_1: Tassa imā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo kathitāti niyamanaṃ, niyatānapekkhavacanaṃ vā etaṃ “yaṃ
tika-s0104t:1385_2: sandhāya vutta”nti āgataṭṭhāne viya. Sesāti pañcapaññāsa diṭṭhiyo. Tāsu antānantikavādādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1385_3: sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgahabhāvo tattha tattha pakāsitoyeva. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ, pubbantāparantā
tika-s0104t:1385_4: eva diṭṭhābhinivesassa visayabhāvena dassitā, na pana tadubhayamekajjhanti? Asambhavo
tika-s0104t:1385_5: evettha kāraṇaṃ. Na hi pubbantāparantesu viya tadubhayavinimutte majjhante diṭṭhikappanā
tika-s0104t:1385_6: sambhavati tadubhayantaramattena ittarakālattā. Atha pana paccuppannattabhāvo tadubhayavemajjhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1385_7: evaṃ sati diṭṭhikappanākkhamo tassa ubhayasabhāvo pubbantāparantesuyeva antogadhoti
tika-s0104t:1385_8: kathaṃ tadubhayamekajjhaṃ adassitaṃ siyā. Atha vā pubbantāparantavantatāya “pubbantāparanto”ti
tika-s0104t:1385_9: majjhanto vuccati, sopi “pubbantakappikā ca aparantakappikā ca pubbantāparantakappikā
tika-s0104t:1385_10: cā”ti upari vadantena bhagavatā pubbantāparantehi visuṃ katvā vuttoyevāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1385_11: Aṭṭhakathāyampi “sabbepi te pubbantāparantakappike”ti etena sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesena
tika-s0104t:1385_12: vā saṅgahitoti veditabbaṃ. Aññathā hi saṅkaḍḍhitvā vuttavacanassa niravasesasaṅkaḍḍhanābhāvato
tika-s0104t:1385_13: anatthakatā āpajjeyyāti. Ke pana te pubbantāparantakappikāti? Ye antānantikā hutvā
tika-s0104t:1386_0: 100-104. “Idānī”tiādinā appanāvacanadvayassa visesaṃ dasseti. Tattha ekajjhanti rāsikaraṇatthe
tika-s0104t:1386_1: nipāto. Ekadhā karotīti ekajjhantipi neruttikā, bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ. Iti-saddo idamattho,
tika-s0104t:1386_2: iminā pakārena pucchitvā vissajjesīti attho. Ajjhāsayanti sassatucchedavasena diṭṭhijjhāsayaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1386_3: Tadubhayavasena hi sattānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhe duvidho ajjhāsayo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:1389_0: Tañca bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ aparimāṇe eva ñeyyavisese
tika-s0104t:1389_2: pabhedehi saṅgaṇhanavasena sabbaññutaññāṇena paricchinditvā dassento pamāṇabhūtāya
tika-s0104t:1389_3: tulāya dhārayamāno viya hotīti āha “tulāya tulayanto viyā”ti. Tathā hi vakkhati “antojālīkatā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1389_4: “sinerupādato vālukaṃ uddharanto viyā”ti pana etena sabbaññutaññāṇato aññassa ñāṇassa
tika-s0104t:1390_0: Ettha ca “sabbe te imeheva dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi, etesaṃ vā aññatarena, natthi ito
tika-s0104t:1390_1: bahiddhā”ti vacanato, pubbantakappikādittayavinimuttassa ca kassaci diṭṭhigatikassa
tika-s0104t:1390_2: abhāvato yāni tāni sāmaññaphalādisuttantaresu vuttappakārāni akiriyāhetukanatthikavādādīni,
tika-s0104t:1390_4: bahiddhāpi dissamānāni, tesaṃ ettheva saṅgahato antogadhatā veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Akiriyavādo
tika-s0104t:1390_5: tāva “vañjho kūṭaṭṭho”tiādinā kiriyābhāvadīpanato sassatavāde antogadho, tathā “sattime
tika-s0104t:1390_6: kāyā”tiādi nayappavatto pakudhavādo, “natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1390_7: nayappavatto ahetukavādo ca adhiccasamuppannavāde. “Natthi paro loko”tiādi nayappavatto
tika-s0104t:1390_8: natthikavādo ucchedavāde. Tathā hi tattha “kāyassa bhedā ucchijjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1391_0: Yadipi pāḷiyaṃ nāṭaputtavādabhāvena cātuyāmasaṃvaro āgato, tathāpi sattavatātikkamena
tika-s0104t:1391_1: vikkhepavāditāya nāṭaputtavādopi sañcayavādo viya amarāvikkhepavādesu antogadho.
tika-s0104t:1391_2: “Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīraṃ, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra”nti evaṃpakārā vādā pana “rūpī attā
tika-s0104t:1391_3: hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā”tiādivādesu saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. “Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā,
tika-s0104t:1391_4: atthi sattā opapātikā”ti evaṃpakārā sassatavāde. “Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā,
tika-s0104t:1391_5: natthi sattā opapātikā”ti evaṃpakārā ucchedavāde. “Hoti ca na hoti ca tathāgato paraṃ
tika-s0104t:1391_6: maraṇā, atthi ca natthi ca sattā opapātikā”ti evaṃpakārā ekaccasassatavāde. “Neva
tika-s0104t:1391_7: hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, nevatthi na natthi sattā opapātikā”ti evaṃpakārā
tika-s0104t:1391_9: sabhāvaniyatiyadicchāvādā ca adhiccasamuppannavāde saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Iminā nayena
tika-s0104t:1391_10: suttantaresu, bahiddhā ca aññatitthiyasamaye dissamānānaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ imāsuyeva
tika-s0104t:1391_11: dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīsu antogadhatā veditabbā. Te pana tattha tatthāgatanayena vuccamānā
tika-s0104t:1391_12: ganthavitthārakarā, atitthe ca pakkhandanamiva hotīti na vitthārayimha. Idha pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1391_13: atthavicāraṇāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuttānatthapakāsanameva hi amhākaṃ bhāroti.
tika-s0104t:1392_2: anusandhanaṃ anusandhi, sambandhamattaṃ, yaṃ desanāya kāraṇaṭṭhena “samuṭṭhāna”ntipi
tika-s0104t:1392_3: vuccati. Pucchādayo hi desanāya bāhirakāraṇaṃ tadanurūpena desanāpavattanato. Taṃsambandhopi
tika-s0104t:1392_4: tannissitattā kāraṇameva. Abbhantarakāraṇaṃ pana mahākaruṇādesanāñāṇādayo. Ayamattho
tika-s0104t:1392_5: upari āvi bhavissati. Pucchāya kato anusandhi pucchānusandhi, pucchaṃ anusandhiṃ
tika-s0104t:1392_6: katvā desitattā suttassa sambandho pucchāya kato nāma hoti. Pucchāsaṅkhāto anusandhi
tika-s0104t:1392_7: pucchānusandhītipi yujjati. Pucchānissitena hi anusandhinā tannissayabhūtā pucchāpi
tika-s0104t:1392_8: gahitāti. Atha vā anusandhahatīti anusandhi, pucchāsaṅkhāto anusandhi etassāti pucchānusandhi,
tika-s0104t:1392_9: taṃtaṃsuttapadeso. Pucchāya vā anusandhīyatīti pucchānusandhi, pucchaṃ vacanasambandhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1392_10: katvā desito taṃsamuṭṭhāniko taṃtaṃsuttapadesova. Ajjhāsayānusandhimhipi eseva nayo.
tika-s0104t:1392_11: Anusandhīyatīti anusandhi, yo yo anusandhi, anusandhino anurūpaṃ vā yathānusandhi.
tika-s0104t:1393_0: Pucchāya, ajjhāsayena ca ananusandhiko ādimhi desitadhammassa anurūpadhammavasena
tika-s0104t:1393_1: vā tappaṭipakkhadhammavasena vā pavatto uparisuttapadeso. Tathā hi so “yena pana
tika-s0104t:1393_2: dhammena…pe… kakacūpamā āgatā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto, yathāpāḷimayaṃ vibhāgoti
tika-s0104t:1393_3: dasseti “tatthā”tiādinā. Tattha “evaṃ vutte nando gopālako bhagavantaṃ etadavocā”ti
tika-s0104t:1393_4: paṭhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ sutte tathā abhāvato. “Evaṃ vutte nandagopālakasutte bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0104t:1393_5: etadavocā”ti pana paṭhitabbaṃ tasmiṃ sutte “aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavocā”ti
tika-s0104t:1393_6: atthassa upapattito. Idañhi saṃyuttāgamavare saḷāyatanavagge saṅgītasuttaṃ. Gaṅgāya
tika-s0104t:1393_7: vuyhamānaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ upamaṃ katvā saddhāpabbajite kulaputte desite nando gopālako
tika-s0104t:1393_8: “ahamimaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūressāmī”ti bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, upasampadañca gahetvā
tika-s0104t:1393_9: tathāpaṭipajjamāno nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto. Tasmā “nandagopālakasutta”nti paññāyittha.
tika-s0104t:1393_10: “Kiṃ nu kho bhante”tiādīni pana aññataroyeva bhikkhu avoca. Vuttañhi tattha “evaṃ
tika-s0104t:1393_11: vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘kiṃ nu kho bhante, orimaṃ tīra’ntiādi”.
tika-s0104t:1394_0: Tatrāyamattho – evaṃ vutteti “sace kho bhikkhave, dārukkhandho na orimaṃ tīraṃ upagacchatī”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1394_1: gaṅgāya vuyhamānaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ upamaṃ katvā saddhāpabbajite kulaputte desite. Bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0104t:1394_2: etadavocāti anusandhikusalatāya “kiṃ nu kho bhante”tiādivacanamavoca. Tathāgato hi
tika-s0104t:1394_3: “imissaṃ parisati nisinno anusandhi kusalo atthi, so maṃ pañhaṃ pucchissatī”ti ettakeneva
tika-s0104t:1394_4: desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Orimaṃ tīranti orimabhūtaṃ tīraṃ. Tathā pārimaṃ tīranti. Majjhe
tika-s0104t:1394_5: saṃsīdoti vemajjhe saṃsīdanaṃ nimmujjanaṃ. Thale ussādoti jalamajjhe uṭṭhite thalasmiṃ
tika-s0104t:1394_6: ussārito āruḷho. Manussaggāhoti manussānaṃ sambandhībhūtānaṃ, manussehi vā gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1394_7: Tathā amanussaggāhoti āvaṭṭaggāhoti udakāvaṭṭena gahaṇaṃ. Antopūtīti vakkahadayādīsu
tika-s0104t:1395_0: “Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno”tiādi majjhimāgamavare uparipaṇṇāsake mahāpuṇṇamasuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1395_1: tatrāyamattho – iti kirāti ettha kira-saddo aruciyaṃ, tena bhagavato yathādesitāya
tika-s0104t:1395_2: attasuññatāya attano aruciyabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Bhoti dhammālapanaṃ, ambho sabhāvadhammāti
tika-s0104t:1395_3: attho. Yadi rūpaṃ anattā…pe… viññāṇaṃ anattā. Evaṃ satīti sapāṭhasesayojanā. Anattakatānīti
tika-s0104t:1395_4: attanā na katāni, anattabhūtehi vā khandhehi katāni. Kamattānaṃ phusissantīti kīdisamattabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1395_5: phusissanti. Asati attani khandhānañca khaṇikattā tāni kammāni kaṃ nāma attānaṃ attano
tika-s0104t:1395_6: phalena phusissanti, ko kammaphalaṃ paṭisaṃvedissatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa bhikkhuno
tika-s0104t:1395_7: cetoparivitakkaṃ attano cetasā ceto – pariyañāṇasampayuttena sabbaññutaññāṇasampayuttena
tika-s0104t:1396_0: Avidvāti sutādivirahena ariyadhammassa akovidatāya apaṇḍito. Vidvāti hi paṇḍitādhivacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1396_1: vidati jānātīti katvā. Avijjāgatoti avijjāya upagato, ariyadhamme avinītatāya appahīnāvijjoti
tika-s0104t:1396_2: attho. Taṇhādhipateyyena cetasāti “yadi ahaṃ nāma koci natthi, evaṃ sati mayā katassa
tika-s0104t:1396_3: kammassa phalaṃ ko paṭisaṃvedeti, sati pana tasmiṃ siyā kammaphalūpabhogo”ti taṇhādhipatito
tika-s0104t:1396_4: āgatena attavādupādānasahagatena cetasā. Atidhāvitabbanti atikkamitvā dhāvitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1396_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – khaṇikattepi saṅkhārānaṃ yasmiṃ santāne kammaṃ kataṃ, tattheva
tika-s0104t:1396_6: phalūpapattito dhammapuñjamattasseva siddhe kammaphalasambandhe ekattanayaṃ micchā
tika-s0104t:1396_7: gahetvā ekena kārakavedakabhūtena bhavitabbaṃ, aññathā kammakammaphalānamasambandho
tika-s0104t:1396_8: siyāti attattaniyasuññatāpakāsanaṃ satthusāsanaṃ atikkamitabbaṃ maññeyyāti. Idāni
tika-s0104t:1397_0: Upari desanāti desanāsamuṭṭhānadhammadīpikāya heṭṭhimadesanāya upari pavattitā desanā.
tika-s0104t:1397_3: Tadavasesaṃ pana sabbampi paṭipakkhadhammappakāsanavasena. Majjhimāgamavare mūlapaṇṇāsakeyeva
tika-s0104t:1397_4: cetāni suttāni. Kilesenāti “lobho cittassa upakkileso”tiādinā kilesavasena. Bhaṇḍanenāti
tika-s0104t:1397_5: vivādena. Akkhantiyāti kopena. Kakacūpamāti kharapantiupamā. Imasmimpīti pi-saddo
tika-s0104t:1397_6: apekkhāyaṃ “ayampi pārājiko”tiādīsu viya, sampiṇḍane vā, tena yathā vatthasuttādīsu
tika-s0104t:1397_7: paṭipakkhadhammappakāsanavasena yathānusandhi, evaṃ imasmimpi brahmajāleti apekkhanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1397_8: sampiṇḍanaṃ vā karoti. Tathā hi niccasārādipaññāpakānaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ vasena uṭṭhitāyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1397_9: desanā niccasārādisuññatāpakāsanena niṭṭhāpitāti. “Tenā”tiādinā yathāvuttasaṃvaṇṇanāya guṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1399_2: Taṇhādiṭṭhiparāmāsoyeva tesaṃ, na tu tathāgatānamiva yathābhūtaṃ jānanapassanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1399_3: Taṇhādiṭṭhivipphandanamevetaṃ micchādassanavedayitaṃ, na tu sotāpannassa sammādassanavedayitamiva
tika-s0104t:1399_4: niccalanti ca hi imāya desanāya mariyādavibhāgaṃ dasseti. Tena vakkhati “yena diṭṭhiassādena…pe…
tika-s0104t:1399_5: taṃ vedayita”nti, “diṭṭhisaṅkhātena ceva…pe… dassetī”ti ca. “Tadapī”ti vuttattā yena
tika-s0104t:1399_6: somanassajātā paññapentīti attho labbhatīti dassetuṃ “yenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sāmatthiyato
tika-s0104t:1399_7: hi avagatatthassevettha ta-saddena parāmasanaṃ. Diṭṭhiassādenāti diṭṭhiyā paccayabhūtena
tika-s0104t:1399_8: assādena. “Diṭṭhisukhenā”tiādi tasseva vevacanaṃ. Ajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1399_9: bhavantānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ tadapi vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ vedayitanti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1400_0: “Yathābhūtadhammānaṃ sabhāva”nti ca avisesena vuttaṃ. Na hi saṅkhatadhammasabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1400_1: ajānanamattena micchā abhinivisanti. Sāmaññajotanā ca visese avatiṭṭhati. Tasmāyamettha
tika-s0104t:1400_2: visesayojanā kātabbā – “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti idaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃgahitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1400_3: evaṃparāmaṭṭhaṃ evaṃgatikaṃ hoti evaṃabhisamparāyanti yathābhūtamajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1400_4: atha vā yasmiṃ vedayite avītataṇhatāya evaṃdiṭṭhigataṃ upādīyati, taṃ vedayitaṃ samudayaatthaṅgamādito
tika-s0104t:1400_5: yathābhūtamajānantānaṃ apassantānanti. Evaṃ visesayojanāya hi yathā anāvaraṇañāṇasamantacakkhūhi
tika-s0104t:1400_6: tathāgatānaṃ yathābhūtamettha jānanaṃ, passanañca hoti, na evaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1400_7: atha kho tesaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiparāmāsoyevāti imamatthaṃ imāya desanāya dassetīti pākaṭaṃ
tika-s0104t:1400_8: hoti. Evampi cāyaṃ desanā mariyādavibhāgadassanatthaṃ jātā.
tika-s0104t:1401_0: Vedayitanti “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti diṭṭhipaññāpanavasena pavattaṃ diṭṭhissādasukhapariyāyena
tika-s0104t:1401_1: vuttaṃ, tadapi anubhavanaṃ. Taṇhāgatānanti taṇhāya upagatānaṃ, pavattānaṃ vā tadeva
tika-s0104t:1401_2: vuttinayena vivarati “kevalaṃ…pe… vedayita”nti. Tañca kho panetanti ca yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1401_3: vedayitameva paccāmasati, tenetaṃ dīpeti – “tadapi vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ vedayitamevā”ti
tika-s0104t:1401_4: vacchinditvā “tadapi vedayitaṃ paritassitavipphanditamevā”ti puna sambandho kātabboti.
tika-s0104t:1401_5: Tadapi tāva na sampāpuṇātīti heṭṭhimaparicchedena mariyādavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “na sotāpannassa
tika-s0104t:1401_6: dassanamiva niccala”nti vuttaṃ. Dassananti ca sammādassanasukhaṃ, maggaphalasukhanti
tika-s0104t:1401_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Kuto cāyamattho labbhatīti eva-saddasāmatthiyato. “Paritassitavipphanditamevā”ti
tika-s0104t:1401_8: hi vuttena maggaphalasukhaṃ viya avipphanditaṃ hutvā ekarūpe avatiṭṭhati, atha kho
tika-s0104t:1401_9: taṃ vaṭṭāmisabhūtaṃ diṭṭhitaṇhāsallānuviddhatāya sauppīḷattā vipphanditamevāti attho
tika-s0104t:1401_10: āpanno hoti, tenevāha “paritassitenā”tiādi. Ayamettha aṭṭhakathāmuttako sasambandhanayo.
tika-s0104t:1402_0: Evaṃ visesakāraṇato dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni vibhajitvā idāni avisesakāraṇato tāni
tika-s0104t:1402_1: dassetuṃ “tatra bhikkhave”tiādikā desanā āraddhā. Sabbesañhi diṭṭhigatānaṃ vedanā,
tika-s0104t:1402_2: avijjā, taṇhā ca avisiṭṭhakāraṇaṃ. Tattha tadapīti “sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti
tika-s0104t:1402_3: ettha yadetaṃ “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti paññāpanahetubhūtaṃ sukhādibhedaṃ tividhampi
tika-s0104t:1402_4: vedayitaṃ, tadapi yathākkamaṃ dukkhasallāniccato, avisesena samudayatthaṅgamassādādīnavanissaraṇato
tika-s0104t:1402_5: vā yathābhūtamajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ hoti, tato eva ca sukhādipatthanāsambhavato,
tika-s0104t:1402_6: taṇhāya ca upagatattā taṇhāgatānaṃ taṇhāparitassitena diṭṭhivipphanditameva diṭṭhicalanameva.
tika-s0104t:1402_7: “Asati attani ko vedanaṃ anubhavatī”ti kāyavacīdvāresu diṭṭhiyā copanappattimattameva,
tika-s0104t:1402_8: na pana diṭṭhiyā paññapetabbo koci dhammo sassato atthīti adhippāyoti. Ekaccasassatādīsupi esa nayo.
tika-s0104t:1404_0: 118. Paramparapaccayadassanatthanti yaṃ diṭṭhiyā mūlakāraṇaṃ, tassāpi kāraṇaṃ, puna
tika-s0104t:1404_1: tassapi kāraṇanti evaṃ paccayaparamparadassanatthaṃ. Yena hi taṇhāparitassitena etāni
tika-s0104t:1404_2: diṭṭhigatāni pavattanti, tassa vedayitaṃ paccayo, vedayitassāpi phasso paccayoti
tika-s0104t:1404_3: evaṃ paccayaparamparavibhāvinī ayaṃ desanā. Kimatthiyaṃ pana paccayaparamparadassananti
tika-s0104t:1404_4: ce? Atthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ. Tena hi yathā diṭṭhisaṅkhāto paññāpanadhammo, tappaccayadhammā
tika-s0104t:1404_5: ca yathāsakaṃ paccayavaseneva uppajjanti, na paccayehi vinā, evaṃ paññapetabbadhammāpi
tika-s0104t:1404_6: rūpavedanādayo, na ettha koci sassato attā vā loko vāti evamatthantaraṃ viññāpitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1404_7: hoti. Taṇhādiṭṭhipariphanditaṃ tadapi vedayitaṃ diṭṭhikāraṇabhūtāya taṇhāya paccayabhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1405_0: 131. Tassa paccayassāti tassa phassasaṅkhātassa paccayassa. Diṭṭhivedayite diṭṭhiyā
tika-s0104t:1405_1: paccayabhūte vedayite, phassapadhānehi attano paccayehi nipphādetabbe. Sādhetabbe
tika-s0104t:1405_2: cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Balavabhāvadassanatthanti balavakāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tathā hi
tika-s0104t:1405_3: vināpi cakkhādivatthūhi, sampayuttadhammehi ca kehici vedanā uppajjati, na pana kadācipi
tika-s0104t:1405_4: phassena vinā, tasmā phasso vedanāya balavakāraṇaṃ. Na kevalaṃ vedanāya eva, atha
tika-s0104t:1405_5: kho sesasampayuttadhammānampi. Sannihitopi hi visayo sace cittuppādo phusanākāravirahito
tika-s0104t:1405_6: hoti, na tassa ārammaṇapaccayo bhavatīti phasso sabbesampi sampayuttadhammānaṃ visesapaccayo.
tika-s0104t:1405_7: Tathā hi bhagavatā dhammasaṅgaṇīpakaraṇe cittuppādaṃ vibhajantena “phasso hotī”ti
tika-s0104t:1405_8: phassasseva paṭhamamuddharaṇaṃ kataṃ, vedanāya pana sātisayamadhiṭṭhānapaccayo eva.
tika-s0104t:1405_10: vā-saddassa payogaṃ pati kāmacārattā, lopattā, sesattāpi ca esa na payutto. Evamīdisesu. Hoti cettha –
tika-s0104t:1407: Kāraṇehi catūhipi, na katthaci ravo yutto”ti.
tika-s0104t:1408: “Yathā hī”tiādinā phassassa balavakāraṇatādassanena tadatthaṃ samattheti. Tattha patatoti patantassa. Thūṇāti upatthambhakadārussetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1410_0: 144. Kiñcāpi imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāḷiyaṃ vedayitamanāgataṃ, heṭṭhā pana tīsupi vāresu adhikatattā,
tika-s0104t:1410_1: upari ca “phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentī”ti vakkhamānattā vedayitamevettha padhānanti
tika-s0104t:1410_2: āha “sabbadiṭṭhivedayitāni sampiṇḍetī”ti. “Yepi te”ti tattha tattha āgatassa ca pi-saddassa
tika-s0104t:1410_3: atthaṃ sandhāya “sampiṇḍetī”ti vuttaṃ. Ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sassatavādā…pe… sabbepi
tika-s0104t:1410_4: te chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentīti hi vedayitakiriyāvasena taṃtaṃdiṭṭhigatikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1410_5: sampiṇḍitattā vedayitasampiṇḍanameva jātaṃ. Sabbampi hi vākyaṃ kiriyāpadhānanti.
tika-s0104t:1410_6: Upari phasse pakkhipanatthāyāti “chahi phassāyatanehī”ti vutte upari phasse pakkhipanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1410_8: phussa paṭisaṃvedentī”ti iminā hi chahi ajjhattikāyatanehi chaḷārammaṇapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1410_9: ekantato chaphassahetukamevāti dassitaṃ hoti, tena vuttaṃ “sabbe te”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1411_0: Kambojoti evaṃnāmakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ. Tathā dakkhiṇāpatho. “Sañjātiṭṭhāne”ti iminā sañjāyanti
tika-s0104t:1411_1: etthāti adhikaraṇattho sañjāti-saddoti dasseti. Evaṃ samosaraṇa-saddo. Āyatana-saddopi
tika-s0104t:1411_2: tadubhayatthe. Āyataneti samosaraṇabhūte catumahāpathe. Nanti mahānigrodharukkhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1411_3: Idañhi aṅguttarāgame pañcanipāte saddhānisaṃsasuttapadaṃ. Tattha ca seyyathāpi bhikkhave
tika-s0104t:1411_4: subhūmiyaṃ catumahāpathe mahānigrodho samantā pakkhīnaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hotī”ti tanniddeso
tika-s0104t:1411_5: vutto. Sati satiāyataneti satisaṅkhāte kāraṇe vijjamāne, tatra tatreva sakkhitabbataṃ
tika-s0104t:1411_6: pāpuṇātīti attho. Āyatanti ettha phalāni tadāyattavuttitāya pavattanti, āyabhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1411_7: vā attano phalaṃ tanoti pavattetīti āyatanaṃ, kāraṇaṃ. Sammantīti upasammanti assāsaṃ
tika-s0104t:1411_8: janenti. Āyatana-saddo aññesu viya na ettha atthantarāvabodhakoti āha “paṇṇattimatte”ti,
tika-s0104t:1411_9: tathā tathā paññattimatteti attho. Rukkhagacchasamūhe paṇṇattimatte hi araññavohāro,
tika-s0104t:1411_10: araññameva ca araññāyatananti. Atthattayepīti ettha pi-saddena ākaranivāsādhiṭṭhānatthe
tika-s0104t:1411_12: nivāse, “kammāyatanaṃ sippāyatana”ntiādīsu adhiṭṭhāne pavattati, nissayeti attho.
tika-s0104t:1412_0: Āyatanti ettha ākaronti, nivasanti, adhiṭṭhahantīti yathākkamaṃ vacanattho. Cakkhādīsu
tika-s0104t:1412_1: ca phassādayo ākiṇṇā, tāni ca nesaṃ vāso, adhiṭṭhānañca nissayapaccayabhāvato. Tasmā
tika-s0104t:1412_2: tadetampi atthattayamidha yujjatiyeva. Kathaṃ yujjatīti āha “cakkhādīsu hī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1412_3: Phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti ime phassapañcamakā dhammā upalakkhaṇavasena
tika-s0104t:1412_4: vuttā aññesampi taṃsampayuttadhammānaṃ āyatanabhāvato, padhānavasena vā. Tathā hi
tika-s0104t:1412_5: cittuppādaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā teyeva “phasso hoti, vedanā, saññā, cetanā, cittaṃ
tika-s0104t:1412_6: hotī”ti paṭhamaṃ vibhattā. Sañjāyanti tannissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva uppattito.
tika-s0104t:1412_7: Samosaranti tattha tattha vatthudvārārammaṇabhāvena samosaraṇato. Tāni ca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1412_8: tesamabhāve abhāvato. Ayaṃ pana yathāvutto sañjātidesādiattho ruḷhivaseneva tattha
tika-s0104t:1412_9: tattha niruḷhatāya eva pavattattāti ācariyaānandattherena vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ pana padatthavivaraṇamukhena
tika-s0104t:1412_10: pavatto attho – āyatanato, āyānaṃ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatanaṃ. Cakkhādīsu
tika-s0104t:1412_11: hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti
tika-s0104t:1412_12: uṭṭhahanti ghaṭenti vāyamanti, āyabhūte ca dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārenti, āyatañca
tika-s0104t:1412_13: saṃsāradukkhaṃ nayanti pavattentīti. Iti iminā nayenāti ettha ādiatthena iti saddena
tika-s0104t:1413_1: Tesaṃ samāgamanabhāvena gahetabbato “phasso saṅgatī”ti vutto. Tathā hi so “sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti
tika-s0104t:1413_2: vuccati. Iminā nayena āropetvāti sambandho. Tena imamatthaṃ dasseti – yathā “cakkhuṃpaṭicca…pe…
tika-s0104t:1413_3: phasso”ti etasmiṃ sutte vijjamānesupi saññādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vedanāya padhānakāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1413_4: phassasīsena desanā katā, evamidhāpi “phassapaccayā vedanā”tiādinā phassaṃ ādiṃ katvā
tika-s0104t:1413_6: phussā”ti ca phassasīsena desanā katāti. Phassāyatanādīnīti ādi-saddena “phussa phussā”ti vacanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t:1414_0: “Kiñcāpī”tiādinā saddamattato codanālesaṃ dassetvā “tathāpī”tiādinā atthato taṃ pariharati.
tika-s0104t:1414_1: Na āyatanāni phusanti rūpānamanārammaṇabhāvato. Phasso arūpadhammo visamāno ekadesena
tika-s0104t:1414_2: ārammaṇaṃ analliyamānopi phusanākārena pavatto phusanto viya hotīti āha “phassova
tika-s0104t:1414_3: taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusatī”ti. Teneva so “phusanalakkhaṇo, saṅghaṭṭanaraso”ti ca vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1414_4: “Chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussā”ti aphusanakiccānipi nissitavohārena phusanakiccāni
tika-s0104t:1414_5: katvā dassanameva phasse upanikkhipanaṃ nāma yathā “mañcā ghosantī”ti. Upanikkhipitvāti
tika-s0104t:1414_6: hi phusanakiccāropanavasena phassasmiṃ pavesetvāti attho. Phassagatikāni katvā phassupacāraṃ
tika-s0104t:1414_7: āropetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upacāro nāma vohāramattaṃ, na tena atthasiddhi ataṃsabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1414_8: Atthasijjhanako pana taṃsabhāvoyeva attho gahetabboti dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādimāha. Yathāhu –
tika-s0104t:1417: Attano paccayabhūtānaṃ channaṃ phassānaṃ vasena cakkhusamphassajā yāva manosamphassajāti saṅkhepato chabbidhaṃ sandhāya “chaphassāyatanasambhavā vedanā”ti vuttaṃ. Vitthārato pana –
tika-s0104t:1419: Tidhā nissitato dvīhi, tidhā kālena vaḍḍhitā”ti. –
tika-s0104t:1420_0: Aṭṭhasatapariyāye vuttanayena aṭṭhasatappabhedā. Mahāvihāravāsino cettha yathā viññāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1420_1: nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ, evaṃ phassaṃ, vedanañca paccayapaccayuppannampi sasantatipariyāpannaṃ
tika-s0104t:1420_2: dīpento vipākameva icchanti, aññe pana yathā tathā vā paccayabhāvo sati na sakkā
tika-s0104t:1420_3: vajjetunti sabbameva icchanti. Sāti yathāvuttappabhedā vedanā. Rūpataṇhādibhedāyāti
tika-s0104t:1420_4: “seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto”ti pitunāmavasena viya ārammaṇanāmavasena vuttāya rūpataṇhā
tika-s0104t:1420_5: yāva dhammataṇhāti saṅkhepato chabbidhāya. Vitthārato pana –
tika-s0104t:1423_0: Evaṃ vuttaaṭṭhasatappabhedāya. Upanissayakoṭiyāti upanissayasīsena. Kasmā panettha
tika-s0104t:1423_1: upanissayapaccayova uddhaṭo, nanu sukhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā ca taṇhāya ārammaṇamattaārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayapakatūpanissayavasena
tika-s0104t:1423_2: catudhā paccayo, dukkhā ca ārammaṇamattapakatūpanissayavasena dvidhāti? Saccametaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1423_3: upanissaye eva pana taṃ sabbampi antogadhanti evamuddhaṭo. Yuttaṃ tāva ārammaṇūpanissayassa
tika-s0104t:1423_4: upanissayasāmaññato upanissaye antogadhatā, kathaṃ pana ārammaṇamattaārammaṇādhipatīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1423_5: tattha antogadhabhāvo siyāti? Tesampi ārammaṇasāmaññato ārammaṇūpanissayena saṅgahitattā
tika-s0104t:1423_6: ārammaṇūpanissayavasamodhānabhūteva upanissaye eva antogadhatā hoti. Etadatthameva
tika-s0104t:1423_7: hi sandhāya “upanissayenā”ti avatvā “upanissayakoṭiyā”ti vuttaṃ. Siddhe hi satyārambho
tika-s0104t:1423_8: niyamāya vā hoti atthantaraviññāpanāya vāti. Evamīdisesu.
tika-s0104t:1424_0: Catubbidhassāti kāmupādānaṃ yāva attavādupādānanti catubbidhassa. Nanu ca taṇhāva
tika-s0104t:1424_1: kāmupādānaṃ, kathaṃ sāyeva tassa paccayo siyāti? Saccaṃ, purimataṇhāya pana upanissayapaccayena
tika-s0104t:1424_2: pacchimataṇhāya daḷhabhāvato purimāyeva taṇhā pacchimāya paccayo bhavati. Taṇhādaḷhattameva
tika-s0104t:1424_3: hi “kāmupādānaṃ upāyāso upakaṭṭhā”tiādīsu viya upa-saddassa daḷhatthe pavattanato.
tika-s0104t:1424_4: Apica dubbalā taṇhā taṇhāyeva, balavatī taṇhā kāmupādānaṃ. Atha vā apattavisayapatthanā
tika-s0104t:1424_5: taṇhā tamasi corānaṃ hatthapasāraṇaṃ viya, sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ kāmupādānaṃ corānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1424_7: kāmupādānaṃ. Pariyesanadukkhamūlaṃ taṇhā, ārakkhadukkhamūlaṃ kāmupādānaṃ. Ayampi
tika-s0104t:1424_8: tesaṃ viseso kecivādavasena ācariyadhammapālattherena dassito purimanayasseva visuddhimagge
tika-s0104t:1425_0: Asahajātassa upādānassa upanissayakoṭiyā, sahajātassa pana sahajātakoṭiyāti yathālābhamattho
tika-s0104t:1425_3: tidhā, taṃ sabbampi vuttanayena upanissayeneva saṅgahetvā “upanissayakoṭiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1425_4: Yasmā ca taṇhāya rūpādīni assādetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjati, tasmā taṇhā kāmupādānassa
tika-s0104t:1425_5: upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo. Tathā rūpādibhede sammūḷho “natthi dinna”ntiādinā micchādassanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1425_6: saṃsārato muccitukāmo asuddhimagge suddhimaggaparāmasanaṃ, khandhesu attattaniyagāhabhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1425_7: sakkāyadassanañca gaṇhāti. Tasmā itaresampi tiṇṇaṃ taṇhā upanissayakoṭiyā paccayoti
tika-s0104t:1425_9: sattadhā sahajātānaṃ paccayo. Tampi sabbaṃ sahajātapaccayeneva saṅgahetvā “sahajātakoṭiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1426_0: Bhavassāti kammabhavassa ceva upapattibhavassa ca. Tattha cetanādisaṅkhātaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-s0104t:1426_1: bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo. Kāmabhavādinavavidho upapattibhavo. Tesu upapattibhavassa
tika-s0104t:1426_2: catubbidhampi upādānaṃ upapattibhavahetubhūtassa kammabhavassa kāraṇabhāvato, tassa
tika-s0104t:1426_3: ca sahāyabhāvūpagamanato pakatūpanissayavasena paccayo. Kammārammaṇakaraṇakāle pana
tika-s0104t:1426_4: kammasahajātamupādānaṃ upapattibhavassa ārammaṇavasena paccayo. Kammabhavassa pana
tika-s0104t:1426_6: ceva hetumaggavasena ca anekadhā paccayo. Asahajātassa pana anantarassa asahajātamupādānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1426_8: pakatūpanissayavasena, sammasanādikālesu ārammaṇādivasena ca paccayo. Tattha anantarādike
tika-s0104t:1426_9: upanissayapaccaye, sahajātādike ca sahajātapaccaye pakkhipitvā tathāti vuttaṃ, rūpūpahārattho
tika-s0104t:1426_10: vā hesa anukaḍḍhanattho vā. Tena hi upanissayakoṭiyā ceva sahajātakoṭiyā cāti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1427_0: Bhavo jātiyāti ettha bhavoti kammabhavo adhippeto. So hi jātiyā paccayo, na upapattibhavo.
tika-s0104t:1427_1: Jātiyeva hi upapattibhavoti, sā ca paṭhamābhinibbattakhandhā. Tena vuttaṃ “jātīti
tika-s0104t:1427_2: panettha savikārā pañcakkhandhā daṭṭhabbā”ti, tenāyaṃ codanā nivattitā “nanu jātipi
tika-s0104t:1427_3: bhavoyeva, kathaṃ so jātiyā paccayo”ti, kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “kammabhavo jātiyā
tika-s0104t:1427_5: Yathāha bhagavā “kammaṃ satte vibhajati yadidaṃ hīnapaṇītatāyā”ti savikārāti nibbattivikārena
tika-s0104t:1427_6: savikārā, na aññehi, te ca atthato upapattibhavoyeva, so eva ca tassa kāraṇaṃ bhavitumayutto
tika-s0104t:1427_7: taṇhāya kāmupādānassa paccayabhāve viya purimapacchimādivisesānamasambhavato, tasmā
tika-s0104t:1427_8: kammabhavoyeva upapattibhavasaṅkhātāya jātiyā kammapaccayena ceva pakatūpanissayapaccayena
tika-s0104t:1427_9: ca paccayoti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kammapaccayaṃ upanissayeneva saṅgahetvā upanissayakoṭiyā
tika-s0104t:1427_10: paccayo”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana jātiyā sati jarāmaraṇaṃ, jarāmaraṇādinā phuṭṭhassa
tika-s0104t:1427_11: ca bālassa sokādayo sambhavanti, nāsati, tasmā jātijarāmaraṇādīnaṃ upanissayavasena
tika-s0104t:1427_12: paccayoti āha “jāti…pe… paccayo”ti vitthārato atthavinicchayassa akatattā, sahajātūpanissayasīseneva
tika-s0104t:1427_13: paccayavicāraṇāya ca, dassitattā, aṅgādividhānassa ca anāmaṭṭhattā “ayamettha saṅkhepo”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1427_14: vuttaṃ. Mahāvisayattā paṭiccasamuppādavicāraṇāya niravasesā ayaṃ kuto laddhabbāti
tika-s0104t:1427_16: ekadeseneva kathitāti dasseti. Tattha idhāti imasmiṃ brahmajāle. Assāti paṭiccasamuppādassa.
tika-s0104t:1427_18: “Mattamevā”ti hi avadhāraṇatthe pariyāyavacanaṃ “appaṃ vassasataṃ āyu, idānetarahi
tika-s0104t:1427_19: vijjatī”tiādīsu viya aññamaññatthāvabodhanavasena sapayojanattā, matta-saddo vā pamāṇe,
tika-s0104t:1427_20: payojanasaṅkhātaṃ pamāṇameva, na taduttarīti attho. “Matta-saddo avadhāraṇe eva-saddo
tika-s0104t:1427_21: sanniṭṭhāne”tipi vadanti. Evaṃ sabbattha. Hoti cettha –
tika-s0104t:1430_0: Ekadesenevidha pāḷiyaṃ kathitattā paṭiccasamuppādassa tathā kathane saddhiṃ udāharaṇena
tika-s0104t:1430_1: kāraṇaṃ dassento “bhagavā hī”tiādimāha. Tena imamadhippāyaṃ dasseti “vaṭṭakathaṃ
tika-s0104t:1430_2: kathento bhagavā avijjā-taṇhā-diṭṭhīnamaññatarasīsena kathesi, tesu idha diṭṭhisīseneva
tika-s0104t:1430_3: kathento vedanāya diṭṭhiyā balavakāraṇattā vedanāmūlakaṃ ekadesameva paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
tika-s0104t:1430_4: kathesī”ti. Etāni ca suttāni aṅguttaranikāye dasanipāte tattha purimakoṭi na paññāyatīti
tika-s0104t:1430_5: asukassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa, cakkavattino vā kāle avijjā uppannā, na tato pubbeti
tika-s0104t:1430_6: evaṃ avijjāya purimo ādimariyādo appaṭihatassa mama sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi na paññāyati
tika-s0104t:1430_7: tatā mariyādassa avijjamānattāti attho. Evañcetanti iminā mariyādābhāvena ayaṃ avijjā
tika-s0104t:1430_8: kāmaṃ vuccati. Atha ca panāti evaṃ kālaniyamena mariyādābhāvena vuccamānāpi. Idappaccayāti
tika-s0104t:1430_9: imasmā pañcanīvaraṇasaṅkhātapaccayā avijjā sambhavatīti evaṃ dhammaniyāmena avijjāya
tika-s0104t:1430_10: koṭi paññāyatīti attho. “Ko cāhāro avijjāya, ‘pañca nīvaraṇā’ tissa vacanīya”nti
tika-s0104t:1430_11: hi tattheva vuttaṃ, ṭīkāyaṃ pana “āsavapaccayā”ti āha, taṃ udāharaṇasuttena na sameti.
tika-s0104t:1430_12: Ayaṃ paccayo idappaccayo ma-kārassa da-kārādesavasena. Saddavidū pana “īdisassa payogassa
tika-s0104t:1430_13: dissanato ida-saddoyeva pakatī”ti vadanti, ayuttamevetaṃ vaṇṇavikārādivasena nānāpayogassa
tika-s0104t:1430_14: dissamānattā. Yathā hi vaṇṇavikārena “amū”ti vuttepi “asū”ti dissati, “imesū”ti vuttepi
tika-s0104t:1430_15: “esū”ti, evamidhāpi vaṇṇavikāro ca vākye viya samāsepi labbhateva yathā “jānipati
tika-s0104t:1430_16: tudampatī”ti. Kimettha vattabbaṃ, pabhinnapaṭisambhidena āyasmatā mahākaccāyanattherena
tika-s0104t:1431_0: Bhavataṇhāyāti bhavasaññojanabhūtāya taṇhāya. Idappaccayāti imasmā avijjāpaccayā.
tika-s0104t:1431_1: “Ko cāhāro bhavataṇhāya, ‘avijjā’ tissa vacanīya”nti hi vuttaṃ. Bhavadiṭṭhiyāti sassatadiṭṭhiyā.
tika-s0104t:1431_2: Idappaccayāti idha pana vedanāpaccayātveva attho. Nanu diṭṭhiyo eva kathetabbā, kimatthiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1431_3: pana paṭiccasamuppādakathananti anuyogenāha “tenā”tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – anulomena
tika-s0104t:1431_4: paṭiccasamuppādakathā nāma vaṭṭakathā, taṃ kathaneneva bhagavā ete diṭṭhigatikā yāvidaṃ
tika-s0104t:1431_5: micchādassanaṃ na paṭinissajjanti, tāva iminā paccayaparamparena vaṭṭeyeva nimujjantīti
tika-s0104t:1431_6: dassesīti. Ito bhavādito. Ettha bhavādīsu. Esa nayo sesapadadvayepi. Iminā apariyantaṃ
tika-s0104t:1433_3: puggalādhiṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Vivaṭṭanti vaṭṭato vigataṃ. “Yehī”tiādinā diṭṭhigatikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1433_4: micchādassanassa kāraṇabhūtāya vedanāya paccayabhūtaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva phassāyatanamidha
tika-s0104t:1433_5: gahitaṃ desanākusalena bhagavatāti dasseti. Vedanākammaṭṭhāneti “vedanānaṃ samudaya”ntiādikaṃ
tika-s0104t:1433_6: imaṃ pāḷiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kiñcimattameva visesoti āha “yathā panā”tiādi. Nti “phassasamudayā,
tika-s0104t:1433_7: phassanirodhā”ti vuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ. “Āhārasamudayā”tiādīsu kabaḷīkāro āhāro veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1433_8: So hi “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti paṭṭhāne vacanato
tika-s0104t:1433_10: vedanādikkhandhattayameva nāmaṃ. Nanu ca “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti vacanato
tika-s0104t:1433_11: sabbesu chasu phassāyatanesu “nāmarūpasamudayā nāmarūpanirodhā” icceva vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1433_12: atha kasmā cakkhāyatanādīsu “āhārasamudayā āhāranirodhā”ti vuttanti? Saccametaṃ avisesena,
tika-s0104t:1433_13: idha pana evampi cakkhādīsu sambhavatīti visesato dassetuṃ tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1434_0: Uttaritarajānaneneva diṭṭhigatassa jānanampi siddhanti katvā pāḷiyamanāgatepi “diṭṭhiñca
tika-s0104t:1434_1: jānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Sīlasamādhipaññāyo lokiyalokuttaramissakā, vimutti pana ida heṭṭhimā
tika-s0104t:1434_2: phalasamāpattiyo “yāva arahattā”ti aggaphalassa visuṃ vacanato. Paccakkhānumānena
tika-s0104t:1434_3: cettha pajānanā, tenevāha “bahussuto ganthadharo bhikkhu jānātī”tiādi, yathālābhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1434_4: vā yojetabbaṃ. Desanā panāti ettha pana-saddo aruciyattho, tenimaṃ dīpeti – yadipi
tika-s0104t:1434_5: anāgāmiādayo yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti, tathāpi arahato ukkaṃsagativijānanavasena desanā
tika-s0104t:1434_6: arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhāpitāti. Suvaṇṇageho viya ratanamayakaṇṇikāya desanā arahattakaṇṇikāya
tika-s0104t:1434_7: niṭṭhāpitāti attho. Ettha ca “yato kho…pe… pajānātī”ti etena dhammassa niyyānikabhāvena
tika-s0104t:1434_8: saddhiṃ saṅghassa suppaṭipattiṃ dasseti, teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ko evaṃ jānātīti?
tika-s0104t:1434_9: Khīṇāsavo jānāti, yāva āraddhavipassako jānātī”ti paripuṇṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅgho
tika-s0104t:1434_10: dassito, tena yadetaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ “bhikkhusaṅghavasenāpi dīpetu”nti, taṃ yathārutavaseneva
tika-s0104t:1435_0: 146. “Desanājālavimutto diṭṭigatiko nāma natthī”ti dassanaṃ desanāya kevalaparipuṇṇataṃ
tika-s0104t:1435_1: ñāpetunti veditabbaṃ. Anto jālassāti antojālaṃ, dabbapavesanavasena antojāle akatāpi
tika-s0104t:1435_2: tannissitavādappavesanavasena katāti antojālīkatā, anto jālassa tiṭṭhantīti vā antojālā,
tika-s0104t:1435_3: dabbavasena anantojālāpi tannissitavādavasena antojālā katāti antojālīkatā. Abhūtatabbhāve
tika-s0104t:1435_4: karāsabhūyoge vikāravācakato īpaccayo, antasarassa vā īkārādesoti saddavidū yathā
tika-s0104t:1435_5: “dhavalīkāro, kabaḷīkāro”ti, imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “imassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nissitā avasitāva
tika-s0104t:1435_6: hutvā ummujjamānā ummujjantīti attho. Māna-saddo cettha bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho
tika-s0104t:1435_7: appahīnena ummujjanabhāvena puna ummujjanabhāvassa lakkhitattā, tathā “osīdantā”tiādīsupi
tika-s0104t:1435_8: anta-saddo. Ummujjaneneva avuttassāpi nimujjanassa gahaṇanti dasseti “osīdantā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1435_9: Tattha apāyūpapattivasena adho osīdanaṃ, sampattibhavavasena uddhamuggamanaṃ. Tathā
tika-s0104t:1435_11: ca yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Pariyāpannāti antogadhā. Tabbhāvo ca tadābaddhenāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:1436_0: Idāni upamāsaṃsandanamāha “kevaṭṭo viyā”tiādinā. Ke udake vaṭṭati paricaratīti kevaṭṭo,
tika-s0104t:1436_1: macchabandho. Kāmaṃ kevaṭṭantevāsīpi pāḷiyaṃ vutto, so pana tadanugatikovāti tathā
tika-s0104t:1436_2: vuttaṃ. Dasasahassilokadhātūti jātikkhettaṃ sandhāyāha tattheva paṭivedhasambhavato,
tika-s0104t:1436_3: aññesañca taggahaṇeneva gahitattā. Aññatthāpi hi diṭṭhigatikā ettha pariyāpannā antojālīkatāva.
tika-s0104t:1437_1: Attano…pe… dassentoti desanākusalatāya yathāvuttesu diṭṭhigatikānaṃ ummujjananimujjanaṭṭhānabhūtesu
tika-s0104t:1437_2: katthacipi bhavādīsu attano anavarodhabhāvaṃ dassento. Nayantīti satte icchitaṭṭhānamāvahanti,
tika-s0104t:1437_3: taṃ pana tathāākaḍḍhanavasenāti āha “gīvāyā”tiādi. “Nettisadisatāyā”ti iminā sadisavohāraṃ,
tika-s0104t:1437_4: upamātaddhitaṃ vā dasseti. “Sā hī”tiādi sadisatāvibhāvanā. Gīvāyāti ettha mahājanānanti
tika-s0104t:1437_5: sambandhīniddeso netīti etthāpi kammabhāvena sambajjhitabbo nī-saddassa dvikammikattā,
tika-s0104t:1437_6: ākhyātapayoge ca bahulaṃ sāmivacanassa kattukammatthajotakattā. Assāti anena bhagavatā,
tika-s0104t:1437_7: sā bhavanetti ucchinnāti sambandho. Puna appaṭisandhikabhāvāti sāmatthiyatthamāha.
tika-s0104t:1437_8: Jīvitapariyādāne vutteyeva hi puna appaṭisandhikabhāvo vutto nāma tasseva adassanassa
tika-s0104t:1437_9: padhānakāraṇattā. “Na dakkhantī”ti ettha anāgatavacanavasena padasiddhi “yatra hi
tika-s0104t:1437_10: nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissatī”tiādīsu viyāti dasseti
tika-s0104t:1437_11: “na dakkhissantī”ti iminā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotīti āha “apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gamissantī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1437_12: Apaṇṇattikabhāvanti ca dharamānakapaṇṇattiyā eva apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ, atītapaṇṇattiyā
tika-s0104t:1437_13: pana tathāgatapaṇṇatti yāva sāsanantaradhānā, tato uddhampi aññabuddhuppādesu pavattati
tika-s0104t:1437_14: eva yathā adhunā vipassiādīnaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “vohāramattameva bhavissatī”ti
tika-s0104t:1438_0: Kāyoti attabhāvo, yo rūpārūpadhammasamūho. Evañhissa ambarukkhasadisatā, tadavayavānañca
tika-s0104t:1438_3: ekā, aṭṭhārasapakkaparimāṇā ekāti tividhā pakkambaphalapiṇḍī viya. Piṇḍo etassāti
tika-s0104t:1438_4: piṇḍī, thavako. Tadanvayānīti vaṇṭānugatāni, tenāha “taṃyeva vaṇṭaṃ anugatānī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1439_0: Maṇḍūkakaṇṭakavisasamphassanti visavantassa bhekavisesassa kaṇṭakena, tadaññena ca
tika-s0104t:1439_1: visena samphassaṃ, maṇḍūkakaṇṭake vijjamānassa visassa samphassaṃ vā. Sakaṇṭako jalacārī
tika-s0104t:1439_2: satto idha maṇḍūko nāma, yo “pāsāṇakacchapo”ti voharanti, tassa naṅguṭṭhe aggakoṭiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1439_3: ṭhito kaṇṭakotipi vadanti. Ekaṃ visamacchakaṇṭakantipi eke. Kirāti anussavanatthe
tika-s0104t:1439_4: nipāto. Ettha ca vaṇṭacchede vaṇṭūpanibandhānaṃ ambapakkānaṃ ambarukkhato vicchedo
tika-s0104t:1439_5: viya bhavanetticchede tadupanibandhānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ santānato vicchedoti ettāvatāva
tika-s0104t:1439_6: pāḷiyamāgataṃ opammaṃ, tadavasesaṃ pana atthato laddhamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1440_0: 148. Buddhabalanti buddhānaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ. Kathitasuttassa nāmāti ettha nāma-saddo sambhāvane
tika-s0104t:1440_1: nipāto, tena “evampi nāma kathitasuttassā”ti vuttanayena suttassa guṇaṃ sambhāveti.
tika-s0104t:1440_2: Handāti vossaggatthe. Tena hi adhunāva gaṇhāpessāmi. Na papañcaṃ karissāmīti vossaggaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t:1441_0: Dhammapariyāyeti dhammadesanāsaṅkhātāya pāḷiyā. Idhatthoti diṭṭhadhammahitaṃ. Paratthoti
tika-s0104t:1441_1: samparāyahitaṃ, tadubhayattho vā. Bhāsitatthopi yujjati “dhammajāla”nti ettha tantidhammassa
tika-s0104t:1441_2: gahitattā. Ihāti idha sāsane. Nanti nipātamattaṃ “na naṃ suto samaṇo gotamo”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1441_3: viya. Nti dhammāti pāḷidhammā. Sabbena sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhanato atthasaṅkhātaṃ jālametthāti
tika-s0104t:1441_4: atthajālaṃ. Tathā dhammajālaṃ brahmajālaṃ diṭṭhijālanti etthāpi. Saṅgāmaṃ vijināti
tika-s0104t:1441_5: etenāti saṅgāmavijayo, saṅgāmo cettha pañcahi mārehi samāgamanaṃ abhiyujjhananti
tika-s0104t:1441_6: āha “devaputtamārampī”tiādi. Atthasampattiyā hi atthajālaṃ. Byañjanasampattiyā, sīlādianavajjadhammaniddesato
tika-s0104t:1441_7: ca dhammajālaṃ. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtānaṃ maggaphalanibbānānaṃ vibhattattā brahmajālaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1441_8: Diṭṭivivecanamukhena suññatāpakāsanena sammādiṭṭhiyā vibhattattā diṭṭhijālaṃ. Titthiyavādanimmaddanupāyattā
tika-s0104t:1442_1: Apica nidānāvasānatoti nidānapariyosāne vuttattā nidānāvasānabhūtato “mamaṃ vā bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1442_2: pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādi vacanato. Ābhividhiavadhivacanañhetaṃ. Idañca “avocā”ti
tika-s0104t:1442_3: kiriyāsambandhanena vuttaṃ. “Nidānena ādikalyāṇa”nti vacanato pana nidānampi nigamanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1442_4: viya suttapariyāpannameva. Alabbha…pe… gambhīranti sabbaññutaññāṇassa visesanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1443: 149. Yathā anattamanā attano anatthacaratāya paramanā verimanā nāma honti, yathāha dhammarājā dhammapade, udāne ca –
tika-s0104t:1444: “Diso disaṃ yaṃ taṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ;
tika-s0104t:1445: Micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo naṃ tato kare”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:1446: Na evamime anattamanā, ime pana attano atthacaratāya attamanā nāma hontīti āha “sakamanā”ti. Sakamanatā ca pītiyā gahitacittattāti dasseti “buddhagatāyā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1447_0: Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – attamanāti samattamanā, imāya desanāya paripuṇṇamanasaṅkappāti
tika-s0104t:1447_1: attho. Desanāvilāso desanāya vijambhanaṃ, tañca desanākiccanipphādakaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇameva.
tika-s0104t:1447_2: Karavīkassa rutamiva mañjumadhurassaro yassāti karavīkarutamañjū, tena. Amatābhisekasadisenāti
tika-s0104t:1447_4: amataṃ nāma. Tenābhisekasadisena. Brahmuno saro viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato saro yassātibrahmassaro,
tika-s0104t:1447_5: tena. Abhinandatīti taṇhāyati, tenāha “taṇhāyampi āgato”ti. Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1448: Tathā abhinandantīti sampaṭicchantīti atthamāha “sampaṭicchanepī”ti. Abhinanditvāti vuttoyevattho “anumoditvā”ti iminā pakāsitoti sandhāya “anumodanepī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1449_0: Imamevatthaṃ gāthābandhavasena dassetuṃ “subhāsita”ntiādimāha. Tattha saddato subhāsitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1449_1: atthato sulapitaṃ. Sīlappakāsanena vā subhāsitaṃ, suññatāpakāsanena sulapitaṃ. Diṭṭhivibhajanena
tika-s0104t:1449_2: vā subhāsitaṃ, tannibbedhakasabbaññutaññāṇavibhajanena sulapitaṃ. Evaṃ avaṇṇavaṇṇanisedhanādīhipi
tika-s0104t:1449_3: idha dassitappakārehi yojetabbaṃ. Tādinoti iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samapekkhanādīhi pañcahi
tika-s0104t:1449_4: kāraṇehi tādibhūtassa. Imassa padassa vitthāro “iṭṭhāniṭṭhe tādī, cattāvīti tādī,
tika-s0104t:1449_5: vantāvīti tādī”tiādinā mahāniddese vutto, so upari aṭṭhakathāyampi āvibhavissati.
tika-s0104t:1449_6: Kiñcāpi “katamañca taṃ bhikkhave”tiādinā tattha tattha pavattāya kathetukamyatāpucchāya
tika-s0104t:1449_7: vissajjanavasena vuttattā idaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ nāma bhavati. Byākaraṇameva hi
tika-s0104t:1449_8: veyyākaraṇaṃ, tathāpi pucchāvissajjanāvasena pavattaṃ suttaṃ sagāthakaṃ ce, geyyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1449_9: nāma bhavati. Niggāthakaṃ, ce aṅgantaraheturahitañca, veyyākaraṇaṃ nāma. Iti pucchāvissajjanāvasena
tika-s0104t:1449_10: pavattassāpi geyyasādhāraṇato, aṅgantaraheturahitassa ca niggāthakabhāvasseva anaññasādhāraṇato
tika-s0104t:1450_0: Kasmāti codanaṃ sodheti “bhaññamāneti hi vutta”nti iminā. Ubhayasambandhapadañhetaṃ
tika-s0104t:1450_1: heṭṭhā, upari ca sambajjhanato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “bhaññamāne”ti vattamānakālavasena
tika-s0104t:1450_2: vuttattā na kevalaṃ suttapariyosāneyeva, atha kho dvāsaṭṭhiyā ṭhānesu akampitthāti
tika-s0104t:1450_3: veditabbāti. Yadevaṃ sakalepi imasmiṃ sutte bhaññamāne akampitthāti atthoyeva sambhavati,
tika-s0104t:1450_4: na pana tassa tassa diṭṭhigatassa pariyosāne pariyosāneti atthoti? Nāyamanuyogo katthacipi
tika-s0104t:1450_5: na pavisati sambhavamatteneva anuyuñjanato, ayaṃ pana attho na sambhavamatteneva
tika-s0104t:1450_6: vutto, atha kho desanākāle kampanākāreneva ācariyaparamparābhatena. Teneva hi ākārenāyamattho
tika-s0104t:1450_7: saṅgītimāruḷho, tathāruḷhanayeneva ca saṅgahakārena vuttoti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1450_8: itarathā atakkāvacarassa imassatthassa takkapariyāhatakathanaṃ anupapannaṃ siyāti.
tika-s0104t:1451: Aparesupīti ettha pi-saddena pāramipavicayanaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Vuttañhi buddhavaṃse –
tika-s0104t:1454_0: Tathā sāsanapatiṭṭhānantaradhānādayopi. Tattha sāsanapatiṭṭhāne tāva bhagavato veḷuvanapaṭiggahaṇe,
tika-s0104t:1454_2: evamādīsu sāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇānīti pītivasaṃ gatā naccantā viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī
tika-s0104t:1454_3: kampittha. Sāsanantaradhāne pana “aho īdisassa saddhammassa antaradhāna”nti domanassappattā
tika-s0104t:1454_4: viya yathā taṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhāne. Vuttañhetamapadāne –
tika-s0104t:1456: Sāgaro ca sasokova, vinadī karuṇaṃ gira”nti. ;
tika-s0104t:1457_1: puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitassa sāṇamayapaṃsukūlassa tumbamatte
tika-s0104t:1457_2: pāṇe vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṃse ṭhatvā gahaṇe. Paṃsukūladhovaneti tasseva paṃsukūlassa
tika-s0104t:1457_3: dhovane. Kāḷakārāmasuttaṃ aṅguttarāgame catukkanipāte. Gotamakasuttampi tattheva
tika-s0104t:1458: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
tika-s0104t:1460_2: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇe yathā acchariyavegābhihatāti yuttaṃ viya dissati, taṃ pana kadāci
tika-s0104t:1460_4: anekakkhattuṃ kampitattā akālakampanaṃ nāma bhavati. Sakkhinidassane kathetabbassa
tika-s0104t:1460_5: atthassānurūpato sakkhi viya bhavatīti vuttaṃ “sakkhibhāvenā”ti yathā taṃ māravijayakāle.
tika-s0104t:1460_6: Sādhukāradānenāti pakaraṇānurūpavasena vuttaṃ yathā taṃ dhammacakkappavattanasaṅgītikālādīsu.
tika-s0104t:1461_1: dassitā. Tattha jotivaneti nandavane. Tañhi sāsanassa ñāṇālokasaṅkhātāya jotiyā pātubhūtaṭṭhānattā
tika-s0104t:1461_2: jotivananti vuccatīti vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammanti anamataggasuttādidhammaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1462_0: Evanti bhagavatā desitakālādīsu pathavīkampanamatidisati. Anekasoti anekadhā. Sayambhunā
tika-s0104t:1462_1: desitassa brahmajālassa yassa suttaseṭṭhassāti yojanā. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Yonisoti
tika-s0104t:1468_0: Ayañhi pakaraṇanayena pāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanā – pakaraṇanayoti ca tambapaṇṇibhāsāya vaṇṇanānayo.
tika-s0104t:1468_2: vuttaṃ. Yasmā panāyaṃ desanāya samuṭṭhānapayojanabhājanesu, piṇḍatthesu ca paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0104t:1468_3: niddhāritesu sukarā, hoti suviññeyyā ca, tasmā –
tika-s0104t:1471_0: Tattha samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma desanānidānaṃ, taṃ sādhāraṇamasādhāraṇanti duvidhaṃ, tathā
tika-s0104t:1471_1: sādhāraṇampi ajjhattikabāhirato. Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ ajjhattikasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhagavato
tika-s0104t:1471_2: mahākaruṇā. Tāya hi samussāhitassa lokanāthassa veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ
tika-s0104t:1471_3: udapādi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1471_4: Ettha ca tividhāvatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva saddhammadesanāhatthadānehi
tika-s0104t:1471_5: saṃsāramahoghato sattasantāraṇatthaṃ taduppattito. Yathā ca mahākaruṇā, evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇadasabalañāṇādayopi
tika-s0104t:1471_6: desanāya sādhāraṇamajjhattikasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Sabbañhi ñeyyadhammaṃ tesaṃ desetabbākāraṃ,
tika-s0104t:1471_7: sattānaṃ āsayānusayādikañca yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
tika-s0104t:1471_8: vicitranayadesanaṃ pavattesi. Bāhiraṃ pana sādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ dasasahassimahābrahmaparivārassa
tika-s0104t:1471_10: appossukkataṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi.
tika-s0104t:1472_0: Asādhāraṇampi ajjhattikabāhirato duvidhameva. Tattha ajjhattikaṃ yāya mahākaruṇāya,
tika-s0104t:1472_1: yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ, tadubhayameva. Sāmaññāvatthāya hi sādhāraṇampi
tika-s0104t:1472_2: samānaṃ mahākaruṇādivisesāvatthāya asādhāraṇaṃ bhavati, bāhiraṃ pana asādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1472_3: vaṇṇāvaṇṇabhaṇananti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Apica nindāpasaṃsāsu sattānaṃ veneyyāghātānandādibhāvamanāpatti.
tika-s0104t:1472_4: Tattha ca anādīnavadassanaṃ bāhiramasādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānameva, tathā nindāpasaṃsāsu
tika-s0104t:1472_5: paṭipajjanakkamassa, pasaṃsāvisayassa ca khuddakādivasena anekavidhassa sīlassa,
tika-s0104t:1472_6: sabbaññutaññāṇassa ca sassatādidiṭṭhiṭṭhāne, taduttari ca appaṭihatacāratāya, tathāgatassa
tika-s0104t:1472_7: ca katthacipi bhavādīsu apariyāpannatāya sattānamanavabodhopi bāhiramasādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1473_0: Payojanampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ anupādāparinibbānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1473_1: vimuttirasattā sabbāyapi bhagavato desanāya, tenevāha “etadatthā kathā, etadatthā
tika-s0104t:1473_2: mantanā”tiādi asādhāraṇaṃ pana bāhirasamuṭṭhānato vipariyāyena veditabbaṃ. Nindāpasaṃsāsu
tika-s0104t:1473_4: imaṃ desanaṃ payojeti. Phalañhi taduppādakasattiyā kāraṇaṃ payojeti nāma phale satiyeva
tika-s0104t:1473_5: tāya sattiyā kāraṇabhāvappattito. Atha vā yathāvuttaṃ phalaṃ imāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0104t:1473_6: payojetīti ācariyasāriputtattherena vuttaṃ. Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ phalaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0104t:1473_7: ākaṅkhitabbattā desanāya desakaṃ payojeti nāma. Apica kuhanalapanādinānāvidhamicchājīvaviddhaṃsanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1473_9: catusaccakammaṭṭhānaniddeso, sabbadiṭṭhigatānaṃ anavasesapariyādānaṃ, attano anupādāparinibbānadīpanañca payojanameva.
tika-s0104t:1474_2: abuddhaguṇavisesañāṇā veneyyā, te imissā desanāya bhājanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1475_0: Piṇḍattho pana idha labbhamānapadehi, samudāyena ca suttapadena yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgahito
tika-s0104t:1475_1: attho. Āghātādīnaṃ akaraṇīyatāvacanena hi dassitaṃ paṭiññānurūpaṃ samaṇasaññāya niyojanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1475_3: paṭisaṅkhānabhāvanābalasiddhi, pariyuṭṭhānānusayappahānaṃ, ubhayahitapaṭipatti, lokadhammehi anupalepo ca –
tika-s0104t:1476_0: Pāṇātipātādīhi paṭivirativacanena dassitā sīlavisuddhi, tāya ca hirottappasampatti,
tika-s0104t:1476_4: parisāsu visāradatā, appamādavihāro, parehi duppadhaṃsiyatā, avippaṭisārādisamaṅgitā ca –
tika-s0104t:1477_1: kappānamasaṅkhyeyyenāpi dullabhapātubhāvatā, sukhumenapi ñāṇena paccakkhato paṭivijjhitumasakkuṇeyyatā,
tika-s0104t:1479_0: “Ajānataṃ apassata”nti padehi dassitā avijjāsiddhi, tathā “taṇhāgatānaṃ paritassitavipphandita”nti
tika-s0104t:1479_1: padehi taṇhāsiddhi, tadubhayena ca nīvaraṇasaññojanadvayasiddhi, anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭānupacchedo,
tika-s0104t:1480_1: tena ca dhammānaṃ niccatāpaṭisedho, aniccatāpatiṭṭhāpanaṃ, paramatthato kārakādipaṭikkhepo,
tika-s0104t:1481_1: sikkhattayanipphatti, nibbānadhātudvayavibhāgo, caturadhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇaṃ, bhavayoniādīsu apariyāpannatā ca –
tika-s0104t:1482_0: Sakalena pana suttapadena dassito iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu bhagavato tādibhāvo, tattha ca paresaṃ
tika-s0104t:1485_0: Idāni nettiyā, peṭakopadese ca vuttanayavasena hārādīnaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ. Tattha “attā,
tika-s0104t:1485_1: loko”ti ca diṭṭhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhāvena, vedanāphassāyatanādimukhena ca gahitesu pañcasu
tika-s0104t:1485_2: upādānakkhandhesu taṇhāvajjitā pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ. Taṇhā samudayasaccaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1485_3: Taṃ pana “paritassanāgahaṇena taṇhāgatāna”nti, “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”ti ca padehi
tika-s0104t:1485_4: samudayaggahaṇenañca pāḷiyaṃ sarūpena gahitameva. Ayaṃ tāva suttantanayo.
tika-s0104t:1486_2: sokādiggahaṇena, diṭṭhiggahaṇena, tattha tattha samudayaggahaṇena cāti saṅkhepato
tika-s0104t:1486_4: Tadubhayesamappavatti nirodhasaccaṃ. Tassa pana tattha tattha vedanānaṃ atthaṅgamanissaraṇapariyāyehi
tika-s0104t:1486_5: paccattaṃ nibbutivacanena, anupādāvimuttivacanena ca pāḷiyaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1486_6: Nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccaṃ. Tassapi tattha tattha vedanānaṃ samudayādīni
tika-s0104t:1487_0: Tattha samudayena assādo, dukkhena ādīnavo, magganirodhehi nissaraṇanti evaṃ catusaccavasena,
tika-s0104t:1487_1: yāni pāḷiyaṃ sarūpeneva āgatāni assādādīnavanissaraṇāni, tesañca vasena idha assādādayo
tika-s0104t:1487_2: veditabbā. Veneyyānaṃ tādibhāvāpattiādi phalaṃ. Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-s0104t:1487_3: vuttaṃ payojanaṃ. Tadeva phalanti vuttovāyamattho. Tadatthañhi idaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:1487_4: desitaṃ. Āghātādīnamakaraṇīyatā, āghātādiphalassa ca anaññasantānabhāvitā nindāpasaṃsāsu
tika-s0104t:1487_5: yathāsabhāvaṃ paṭijānananibbeṭhanānīti evaṃ taṃtaṃpayojanādhigamahetu upāyo. Āghātādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1487_6: karaṇapaṭisedhanādiapadesena atthakāmehi tato cittaṃ sādhukaṃ rakkhitabbanti ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1491_0: Kappanābhāvepi vohāravasena, anuvādavasena ca “mama”nti vuttaṃ. Niyamābhāvato vikappanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1491_1: vāggahaṇaṃ. Taṃguṇasamaṅgitāya, abhimukhīkaraṇāya ca “bhikkhave”ti āmantanaṃ. Aññabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1491_2: paṭiviruddhabhāvato ca “pare”ti vuttaṃ, vaṇṇapaṭipakkhato, avaṇṇanīyato ca “avaṇṇa”nti,
tika-s0104t:1491_4: ca “dhammassā”ti, diṭṭhisīlehi saṃhatabhāvato, kilesānaṃ saṅghātakaraṇato ca “saṅghassā”ti,
tika-s0104t:1491_5: vuttapaṭiniddesato, vacanupanyāsato ca “tatrā”ti, sammukhībhāvato, puthubhāvato ca
tika-s0104t:1491_6: “tumhehī”ti, cittassa hananato, ārammaṇābhighātato ca “āghāto”ti, ārammaṇe saṅkocavuttiyā
tika-s0104t:1491_7: anabhimukhatāya, atuṭṭhākāratāya ca “appaccayo”ti, ārammaṇacintanato, nissayato ca
tika-s0104t:1491_8: “cetaso”ti, atthassa asādhanato, anu anu anatthasādhanato ca “anabhiraddhī”ti, kāraṇānarahattā, satthusāsane
tika-s0104t:1492: Ṭhitehi kātumasakkuṇeyyattā ca “na karaṇīyā”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ adhippetatthe pavattatānidassanena, atthaso ca –
tika-s0104t:1493_0: Mamanti sāminiddiṭṭhaṃ sabbanāmapadaṃ. Vāti vikappananiddiṭṭhaṃ nipātapadaṃ. Bhikkhaveti
tika-s0104t:1493_1: ālapananiddiṭṭhaṃ nāmapadaṃ. Pareti kattuniddiṭṭhaṃ nāmapadaṃ. Avaṇṇanti kammaniddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1493_2: nāmapadaṃ. Bhāseyyunti kiriyāniddiṭṭhaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ. Dhammassa, saṅghassāti ca sāminiddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1493_3: nāmapadaṃ. Tatrāti ādhāraniddiṭṭhaṃ sabbanāmapadaṃ. Tumhehīti kattuniddiṭṭhaṃ sabbanāmapadaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1493_4: Na-iti paṭisedhaniddiṭṭhaṃ nipātapadaṃ. Āghāto, appaccayo, anabhiraddhīti ca kammaniddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1493_5: nāmapadaṃ. Cetasoti sāminiddiṭṭhaṃ nāmapadaṃ. Karaṇīyāti kiriyāniddiṭṭhaṃ nāmapadanti.
tika-s0104t:1493_6: Evaṃ tassa tassa padassa visesatānidassanena, byañjanaso ca vicayanaṃ padavicayo.
tika-s0104t:1493_7: Ativitthārabhayena pana sakkāyeva aṭṭhakathaṃ, tassā ca līnatthavibhāvanaṃ anugantvā
tika-s0104t:1494_0: “Tatra ce tumhe assatha kupitā vā anattamanā vā, api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1494_1: dubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthā”ti ayaṃ anumatipucchā. Sattādhiṭṭhānā, anekādhiṭṭhānā, paramatthavisayā,
tika-s0104t:1494_2: paccuppannavisayāti evaṃ sabbattha yathāsambhavaṃ pucchāvicayanaṃ pucchāvicayo. “No
tika-s0104t:1494_3: hetaṃ bhante”ti idaṃ vissajjanaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ, niravasesaṃ, sauttaraṃ, lokiyanti
tika-s0104t:1494_4: evaṃ sabbassāpi vissajjanassa yathārahaṃ vicayanaṃ vissajjanāvicayo.
tika-s0104t:1495_0: “Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ…pe… na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā”ti
tika-s0104t:1495_1: imāya paṭhamadesanāya “mamaṃ vā…pe… tumhaṃyevassa tena antarāyo”ti ayaṃ dutiyadesanā
tika-s0104t:1495_2: saṃsandati. Kasmā? Paṭhamāya manopadosaṃ nivāretvā dutiyāya tatthādīnavassa dassitattā.
tika-s0104t:1495_3: Tathā imāya dutiyadesanāya “mamaṃ vā…pe… api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1495_4: ājāneyyāthā”ti ayaṃ tatiyadesanā saṃsandati. Kasmā? Dutiyāya tatthādīnavaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0104t:1495_5: tatiyāya vacanatthasallakkhaṇamattepi asamatthabhāvassa dassitattā. Tathā imāya tatiyadesanāya
tika-s0104t:1495_6: “mamaṃ vā…pe… na ca panetaṃ amhesu saṃvijjatī”ti ayaṃ catutthadesanā saṃsandati.
tika-s0104t:1495_7: Kasmā? Tatiyāya manopadosaṃ sabbathā nivāretvā catutthāya avaṇṇaṭṭhāne paṭipajjitabbākārassa
tika-s0104t:1495_8: dassitattāti iminā nayena pubbena aparaṃ saṃsanditvā vicayanaṃ pubbāparavicayo. Assādavicayādayo
tika-s0104t:1496_0: “Api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthā”ti imāya pucchāya “no hetaṃ
tika-s0104t:1496_1: bhante”ti ayaṃ vissajjanā sameti. Kupito hi neva buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1496_2: na mātāpitūnaṃ na paccatthikānaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānāti. “Katamañca
tika-s0104t:1496_3: taṃ bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ…pe… tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyyā”ti imāya pucchāya
tika-s0104t:1496_4: “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”tiādikā ayaṃ vissajjanā sameti. Bhagavā
tika-s0104t:1496_5: hi anuttarena pāṇātipātaviramaṇādiguṇena samannāgato, tañca kho samādhiṃ, paññañca
tika-s0104t:1496_6: upanidhāya appamattakaṃ oramattakaṃ sīlamattakaṃ. “Katame ca te bhikkhave, dhammā
tika-s0104t:1496_7: gambhīrā duddasā”tiādikāya pucchāya “santi bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā pubbantakappikā”tiādikā
tika-s0104t:1496_8: vissajjanā sameti. Sabbaññutaññāṇaguṇā hi aññatra tathāgatā aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhattā
tika-s0104t:1496_9: gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā santā paṇītā atakkāvacarā nipuṇā paṇḍitavedanīyāti iminā
tika-s0104t:1496_10: nayena vissajjanāya pucchānurūpatāvicayanameva idha saṅgahagāthāya abhāvato anugītivicayoti.
tika-s0104t:1496_11: Ayaṃ padapañhādiekādasadhammavicayanalakkhaṇo vicayahāro nāma. Vuttañca “yaṃ pucchitañca
tika-s0104t:1498_0: Mamanti sāminiddeso yujjati sabhāvaniruttiyā tathāpayogadissanato, avaṇṇassa ca tadapekkhattā.
tika-s0104t:1498_1: Vāti vikappanatthaniddeso yujjati nepātikānamanekatthattā, ettha ca niyamābhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1498_2: Bhikkhaveti āmantananiddeso yujjati tadattheyeva etassa payogassa dissanato, desakassa
tika-s0104t:1499_0: Sabbena sabbaṃ āghātādīnamakaraṇaṃ tādibhāvāya saṃvattatīti yujjati iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu
tika-s0104t:1499_1: samappavattisabbhāvato. Yasmiṃ santāne āghātādayo uppannā, tannimittakā antarāyā
tika-s0104t:1499_2: tasseva sampattivibandhāya saṃvattantīti yujjati kammānaṃ santānantaresu asaṅkamanato.
tika-s0104t:1499_4: saṃvattantīti yujjati kodhalobhānaṃ andhatamasabhāvato. Pāṇātipātādidussīlyato veramaṇī
tika-s0104t:1499_5: sabbasattānaṃ pāmojjapāsaṃsāya saṃvattatīti yujjati sīlasampattiyā mahato kittisaddassa
tika-s0104t:1499_6: abbhuggatattā. Gambhīratādivisesayuttena guṇena tathāgatassa vaṇṇanā ekadesabhūtāpi
tika-s0104t:1499_9: asamugghāṭitattā. Vedanādīnaṃ anavabodhena vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vaḍḍhatīti yujjati
tika-s0104t:1499_10: assādānupassanāsabbhāvato, sati ca vedayitabhāve (vedayitarāge tattha attattaniyagāho,
tika-s0104t:1499_11: sassatādigāho ca viparipphandatīti yujjati kāraṇassa sannihitattā. Taṇhāpaccayā hi
tika-s0104t:1499_12: upādānaṃ sambhavati. Sassatādivāde paññapentānaṃ, tadanucchavikañca vedanaṃ vedayantānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1499_13: phasso hetūti yujjati visayindriyaviññāṇasaṅgatiyā vinā tadabhāvato. Chaphassāyatananimittaṃ
tika-s0104t:1499_14: vaṭṭassa anupacchedoti yujjati tattha avijjātaṇhānaṃ appahīnattā. Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1499_15: samudayatthaṅgamādipajānanā sabbadiṭṭhigatikasaññaṃ aticca tiṭṭhatīti yujjati catusaccapaṭivedhabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1499_16: Imāhiyeva dvāsaṭṭhiyā sabbadiṭṭhigatānaṃ antojālīkatabhāvoti yujjati akiriyavādādīnaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1499_17: issaravādādīnañca tadantogadhattā, tathā ceva heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitaṃ. Ucchinnabhavanettiko
tika-s0104t:1499_18: tathāgatassa kāyoti yujjati bhagavato abhinīhārasampattiyā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu
tika-s0104t:1499_19: ṭhatvā sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ bhāvitattā. Kāyassa bhedā parinibbutaṃ
tika-s0104t:1499_20: na dakkhantīti yujjati anupādisesanibbānappattiyaṃ rūpādīsu kassacipi anavasesatoti
tika-s0104t:1499_21: iminā nayena atthato ca sutte byañjanatthānaṃ yuttitāvibhāvanalakkhaṇo yuttihāro
tika-s0104t:1501_1: sampattīnaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tathā āghātādayo nirayādidukkhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Āghātādīnamakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1501_3: padaṭṭhānaṃ, ariyo sīlakkhandho ariyassa samādhikkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Ariyo samādhikkhandho
tika-s0104t:1501_4: ariyassa paññākkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Gambhīratādivisesayuttaṃ bhagavato paṭivedhappakārañāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1501_5: desanāñāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Desanāñāṇaṃ veneyyānaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1501_6: Sabbāyapi diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhupādānabhāvato sā yathārahaṃ navavidhassapi bhavassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1501_7: Bhavo jātiyā. Jāti jarāmaraṇassa, sokādīnañca padaṭṭhānaṃ. Vedanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1501_8: samudayatthaṅgamādipaṭivedhanā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ anubodhapaṭivedho hoti. Tattha
tika-s0104t:1501_9: anubodho paṭivedhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Paṭivedho catubbidhassa sāmaññaphalassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1501_10: “Ajānataṃ apassata”nti avijjāgahaṇaṃ. Tattha avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārā
tika-s0104t:1501_11: viññāṇassa. Yāva vedanā taṇhāya padaṭṭhānanti netvā tesaṃ “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1501_13: taṇhā upādānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ettha sassatādipaññāpanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1501_16: vedanāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Cha phassāyatanāni phassassa, sakalassa ca vaṭṭadukkhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1501_17: Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samudayādipajānanaṃ nibbidāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, nibbidā
tika-s0104t:1501_18: virāgassātiādinā yāva anupādāparinibbānaṃ netabbaṃ. Bhagavato bhavanettisamucchedo
tika-s0104t:1501_19: sabbaññutāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, tathā anupādāparinibbānassa cāti. Ayaṃ sutte āgatadhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1501_21: padaṭṭhānahāro nāma. Vuttañhi “dhammaṃ deseti jino, tassa ca dhammassa yaṃ padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:1503_2: saṅgaho lobhacittuppādapariyāpannatāya ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā āghātaggahaṇena avasiṭṭhaganthanīvaraṇānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1503_5: saṅgaho sikkhālakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. Diṭṭhiggahaṇena avasiṭṭhaupādānānaṃ saṅgaho
tika-s0104t:1503_8: sammasanupagānaṃ sabbesampi āyatanānaṃ, dhātūnañca saṅgaho āyatanalakkhaṇena, dhātulakkhaṇena
tika-s0104t:1503_9: ca ekalakkhaṇattā. “Ajānataṃ apassata”nti ettha avijjāggahaṇena hetuāsavoghayoganīvaraṇādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1503_11: ettha taṇhāggahaṇenapi. “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ettha phassaggahaṇena saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1503_12: saṅgaho vipallāsahetubhāvena, khandhalakkhaṇena ca ekalakkhaṇattā. Chaphassāyatanaggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:1503_14: ca ekalakkhaṇattā. Bhavanettiggahaṇena avijjādīnaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ saṅgaho vaṭṭahetubhāvena
tika-s0104t:1503_15: ekalakkhaṇattāti. Ayaṃ sutte anāgatepi dhamme ekalakkhaṇatādinā āgate viya niddhāraṇalakkhaṇo
tika-s0104t:1503_16: lakkhaṇahāro nāma. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “vuttamhi ekadhamme, ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1505_0: Mamanti aneruttapadaṃ, tathā vāti ca. Bhikkhanasīlā bhikkhū. Parentiviruddhabhāvamupagacchantīti
tika-s0104t:1505_1: parā, aññatthe panetaṃ aneruttapadanti evamādinā neruttaṃ, taṃ pana “eva”ntiādinidānapadānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1505_3: ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha. Ye te nindāpasaṃsāhi sammākampitacetasā micchājīvato
tika-s0104t:1505_5: veneyyā, te kathaṃ nu kho yathāvuttadosavinimuttā sammāpaṭipattiyā ubhayahitaparā
tika-s0104t:1505_6: bhaveyyunti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo. Evamadhippetā puggalā, desanābhājanaṭṭhāne
tika-s0104t:1506_1: Tattha “mama”nti etassa “avaṇṇa”nti iminā sambandhotiādinā padassa padantarena sambandho
tika-s0104t:1506_2: padasandhi. “Mama”nti vuttassa bhagavato “avaṇṇa”nti vuttena parehi upavaditena aguṇenasambandhotiādinā
tika-s0104t:1506_3: padatthassa padatthantarena sambandho padatthasandhi. “Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave, pare avaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1506_5: “Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādidesanā brahmadattena māṇavena vuttavaṇṇānusandhivasena
tika-s0104t:1506_6: pavattā. “Atthi bhikkhave, aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā”tiādidesanā
tika-s0104t:1506_7: bhikkhūhi vuttavaṇṇānusandhivasena pavattāti evaṃ nānānusandhikassa suttassa taṃtadanusandhīhi,
tika-s0104t:1506_8: ekānusandhikassa ca pubbāparabhāgehi sambandho niddesasandhi. Nikkhepasandhi pana
tika-s0104t:1506_10: eva vicāritā, amhehi ca pubbe saṃvaṇṇitā. Ekissā desanāya desanāntarehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1506_11: desanāsandhi, sā panevaṃ veditabbā – “mamaṃ vā bhikkhave…pe… na cetaso anabhiraddhi
tika-s0104t:1506_12: karaṇīyā”ti ayaṃ desanā “ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni
tika-s0104t:1506_13: okanteyyuṃ, tatrapi yo mano padūseñña, na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti imāya desanāya
tika-s0104t:1506_14: saddhiṃ saṃsandati. “Tumhaṃyevassa tena anantarāyo”ti ayaṃ “kammassakā māṇava sattā
tika-s0104t:1506_15: kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammapaṭisaraṇā kammaṃ satte vibhajati, yadidaṃ
tika-s0104t:1506_16: hīnapaṇītatāyā”ti imāya, “api nu tumhe…pe… ājāneyyāthā”ti ayaṃ –
tika-s0104t:1507: “Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati;
tika-s0104t:1508: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ kodho sahate nara”nti. ; –
tika-s0104t:1509_0: Imāya, “mamaṃ vā bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṃ…pe… na cetaso ubbilāvitattaṃ karaṇīya”nti
tika-s0104t:1509_1: ayaṃ “dhammāpi vo bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā”ti, “kullūpamaṃ vo bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1509_2: dhammaṃ desessāmi nittharaṇatthāya, no gahaṇatthāyā”ti ca imāya, “tatra ce tumhe…pe…
tika-s0104t:1510: “Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
tika-s0104t:1511: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate nara”nti. ca –
tika-s0104t:1515_0: Imāya, “appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ sīlamattaka”nti ayaṃ “vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0104t:1515_1: jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, ayampi kho brāhmaṇa yañño purimehi yaññehi appaṭṭhataro
tika-s0104t:1515_2: ca appasamārambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahānisaṃsataro cā”ti imāya paṭhamajjhānassa
tika-s0104t:1516_0: “Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā”tiādidesanā “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sīlavā ariyasīlena samannāgato”tiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t:1516_1: “aññeva dhammā gambhīrā”tiādidesanā “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso
tika-s0104t:1516_2: duranubodho”tiādidesanāya, gambhīratādivisesayuttadhammapaṭivedhena hi ñāṇassa gambhīrādibhāvo viññāyati.
tika-s0104t:1517_1: eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā pubbantakappikā…pe… abhivadanti sassato attā ca loko ca, idameva
tika-s0104t:1517_2: saccaṃ, moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadanti, asassato, sassato ca asassato ca, nevasassato
tika-s0104t:1517_3: ca nāsassato ca, antavā, anantavā, antavā ca anantavā ca, nevantavā ca nānantavā
tika-s0104t:1517_4: ca attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṃ, moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādidesanāya.
tika-s0104t:1518_0: Tathā “santi bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā aparantakappikā”tiādidesanā “santi bhikkhave
tika-s0104t:1518_1: …pe… abhivadanti saññī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā. Ittheke abhivadanti asaññī,
tika-s0104t:1518_2: saññī ca asaññī ca, nevasaññī ca nāsaññī ca attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā. Ittheke
tika-s0104t:1518_3: abhivadanti sato vā pana sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapenti, diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1518_5: “tadidaṃ saṅkhataṃ oḷārikaṃ, atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodho, atthetanti iti viditvā
tika-s0104t:1518_6: tassa nissaraṇadassāvī tathāgato tadupātivatto”tiādidesanāya, “tadapi tesaṃ…pe… vipphanditamevā”ti
tika-s0104t:1518_7: ayaṃ “idaṃ tesaṃ vata aññatreva saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra
tika-s0104t:1518_8: ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā paccattaṃyeva ñāṇaṃ bhavissati parisuddhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1518_9: pariyodāta’nti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Paccattaṃ kho pana bhikkhave, ñāṇe asati parisuddhe
tika-s0104t:1518_10: pariyodāte yadapi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā tattha ñāṇabhāvamattameva pariyodāpenti,
tika-s0104t:1518_12: phassapaccayā”ti ayaṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1518_13: saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”nti,
tika-s0104t:1518_14: “chandamūlakā ime āvuso dhammā manasikārasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā vedanāsamosaraṇā”ti
tika-s0104t:1518_15: (pariyesitabbaṃ) ca ādidesanāya, “yato kho bhikkhave, bhikkhu channaṃ phassāyatanāna”ntiādidesanā
tika-s0104t:1518_16: “yato kho bhikkhave, bhikkhu neva vedanaṃ attato samanupassati, na saññaṃ, na saṅkhāre,
tika-s0104t:1518_17: na viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, so evaṃ asamanupassanto na kiñci loke upādiyati,
tika-s0104t:1518_18: anupādiyaṃ na paritassati, aparitassaṃ paccattaṃyeva parinibbāyatī”tiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t:1518_19: “sabbete imeheva dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi antojālīkatā”tiādidesanā “ye hi keci bhikkhave…pe…
tika-s0104t:1518_20: abhivadanti, sabbete imāneva pañca kāyāni abhivadanti etesaṃ vā aññatara”ntiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t:1523: Ādidesanāya saddhiṃ saṃsandatīti. Ayaṃ neruttamadhippāyadesanānidānapubbāparānusandhīnaṃ catunnaṃ vibhāvanalakkhaṇo catubyūhahāro nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ “neruttamadhippāyo”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1525_1: saṅgaho, tathā soraccena sīlassa. Saddhādiggahaṇena ca saddhindriyādisakalabodhipakkhiyadhammā
tika-s0104t:1525_2: āvattanti. Sīlaggahaṇena avippaṭisārādayo sabbepi sīlānisaṃsadhammā āvattanti. Pāṇātipātādīhi
tika-s0104t:1525_3: paṭivirativacanena appamādavihāro, tena sakalaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ āvattati. Gambhīratādivisesayuttadhammaggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:1525_5: anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ mahābodhīti vuccati, tena dasabalādayo sabbe buddhaguṇā āvattanti.
tika-s0104t:1525_6: Sassatādidiṭṭhiggahaṇena taṇhāvijjānaṃ saṅgaho, tāhi anamataggaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ āvattati.
tika-s0104t:1525_7: Vedanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samudayādipaṭivedhanena bhagavato pariññāttayavisuddhi, tāya
tika-s0104t:1525_8: paññāpāramimukhena sabbāpi pāramiyo āvattanti. “Ajānataṃ apassata”nti ettha avijjāggahaṇena
tika-s0104t:1525_9: ayonisomanasikārapariggaho, tena ca nava ayonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā āvattanti.
tika-s0104t:1525_10: “Taṇhāgatānaṃ paritassitavipphandita”nti ettha taṇhāggahaṇena nava taṇhāmūlakā dhammā
tika-s0104t:1525_12: tena aniccatādilakkhaṇattayaṃ āvattati. Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānanena
tika-s0104t:1525_13: vimuttisampadāniddeso, tena sattapi visuddhiyo āvattanti. “Ucchinnabhavanettiko tathāgatassa
tika-s0104t:1525_14: kāyo”ti taṇhāpahānaṃ vuttaṃ, tena bhagavato sakalasaṃkilesappahānaṃ āvattatīti ayaṃ
tika-s0104t:1525_16: nāma. Yathāha “ekamhi padaṭṭhāne, pariyesati sesakaṃ padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:1527_0: Āghātānandādayo akusalā dhammā, tesaṃ ayonisomanasikārādi padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yehi pana
tika-s0104t:1527_1: dhammehi āghātānandādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ appavatti, te abyāpādādayo kusalā dhammā, tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1527_2: yonisomanasikārādi padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tesu āghātādayokāmāvacarāva, abyāpādādayo catubhūmakā,
tika-s0104t:1527_3: tathā pāṇātipātādīhi paṭivirati kusalā vā abyākatā vā, tassā hirottappādayo dhammā
tika-s0104t:1527_4: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha kusalā siyā kāmāvacarā, siyā lokuttarā. Abyākatā lokuttarāva.
tika-s0104t:1527_5: “Atthi bhikkhave, aññeva dhammā gambhīrā”ti vuttadhammā siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā.
tika-s0104t:1527_6: Tattha kusalānaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā padaṭṭhānaṃ. Abyākatānaṃ maggadhammā, vipassanā,
tika-s0104t:1527_7: āvajjanā vā padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tesu kusalā lokuttarāva, abyākatā siyā kāmāvacarā, siyā
tika-s0104t:1527_8: lokuttarā, sabbāpi diṭṭhiyo akusalāva kāmāvacarāva, tāsaṃ avisesena micchābhinivese
tika-s0104t:1527_9: ayonisomanasikāro padaṭṭhānaṃ. Visesato pana santatighanavinibbhogābhāvato ekattanayassa
tika-s0104t:1527_11: sambandhabhāvassa aggahaṇato nānattanayassa micchāgāho tajjāsamannāhārasahito ucchedadiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0104t:1528_0: “Vedanāna”nti ettha vedanā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā, siyā kāmāvacarā,
tika-s0104t:1528_1: siyā rūpāvacarā, siyā arūpāvacarā, tāsaṃ phasso padaṭṭhānaṃ. Vedanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1528_2: vedanānaṃ samudayādipaṭivedhanaṃ maggañāṇaṃ, anupādāvimutti ca phalañāṇaṃ, tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1528_3: “aññeva dhammā gambhīrā”ti ettha vuttanayena dhammādivibhāgo netabbo. “Ajānataṃ apassata”ntiādīsu
tika-s0104t:1528_4: avijjātaṇhā akusalā kāmāvacarā, tāsu avijjāya āsavā, ayonisomanasikāro eva vā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1528_5: Taṇhāya saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādadassanaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti
tika-s0104t:1528_6: ettha phassassa vedanāya viya dhammādivibhāgo veditabbo. Iminā nayena phassāyatanādīnampi
tika-s0104t:1528_7: yathārahaṃ dhammādivibhāgo netabboti ayaṃ saṃkilesadhamme, vodānadhamme ca sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato,
tika-s0104t:1528_8: padaṭṭhānato, bhūmito ca vibhajanalakkhaṇo vibhattihāro nāma. Yathāha “dhammañca
tika-s0104t:1530_1: Āghātādayo pana pavattiyamānā dubbaṇṇataṃ, dukkhaseyyaṃ, bhogahāniṃ, akittiṃ, parehi
tika-s0104t:1530_4: paramparamāvahati. Gambhīratādivisesayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ vijjābhiññādiguṇavisesamāvahati
tika-s0104t:1530_5: sabbaññeyyassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhato. Tathā gambhīratādivisesarahitaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:1530_6: ñeyyesu sādhāraṇabhāvato yathāvuttaguṇavisesaṃ nāvahati. Sabbāpi cetā diṭṭhiyo yathārahaṃ
tika-s0104t:1530_8: Sammādiṭṭhi pana saparikkhārā majjhimapaṭipadābhūtā sakkāyatīramatikkamma pāraṃ gacchati
tika-s0104t:1530_12: yathābhūtāvabodho pana tattha nibbedhaṃ, virāgañca āvahati. Micchābhinivese ayonisomanasikārasahitā
tika-s0104t:1530_13: taṇhā anekavihitaṃ diṭṭhijālaṃ pasāreti. Yathāvuttataṇhāsamucchedo paṭhamamaggo taṃ
tika-s0104t:1530_14: diṭṭhijālaṃ saṅkoceti. Sassatavādādipaññāpanassa phasso paccayo asati phasse tadabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1530_16: anivattiyeva yāthāvato phassāyatanādipariññā sabbadiṭṭhidassanāni ativattati, tesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1530_17: pana tathā apariññā diṭṭhidassanaṃ nātivattati. Bhavanettisamucchedo āyatiṃ attabhāvassa
tika-s0104t:1530_18: anibbattiyā saṃvattati, asamucchinnāya bhavanettiyā anāgate bhavappabandho parivattatiyevāti
tika-s0104t:1530_19: ayaṃ sutte niddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhato parivattanalakkhaṇo parivattanahāro
tika-s0104t:1530_20: nāma. Kimāha “kusalākusale dhamme, niddiṭṭhe bhāvite pahīne cā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1532_0: “Mamaṃ mama me”ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘Vā yadi cā”ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. “Bhikkhave samaṇā
tika-s0104t:1532_1: tapassino”ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. “Pare aññe paṭiviruddhā”ti…pe… naṃ. “Avaṇṇaṃ akittiṃ
tika-s0104t:1532_2: ninda”nti…pe… naṃ. “Bhāseyyuṃ bhaṇeyyuṃ katheyyu”nti…pe… naṃ. “Dhammassa vinayassa
tika-s0104t:1532_3: satthusāsanassā”ti…pe… naṃ. “Saṅghassa samūhassa gaṇassā”ti…pe… naṃ. “Tatra tattha
tika-s0104t:1532_4: tesū”ti…pe… naṃ. “Tumhehi vo bhavantehī”ti…pe… naṃ. “Āghāto doso byāpādo”ti…pe… naṃ
tika-s0104t:1532_6: naṃ. “Anabhiraddhi byāpatti manopadoso”ti…pe… naṃ. “Na no a mā”ti…pe… naṃ. “Karaṇīyā
tika-s0104t:1532_7: uppādetabbā pavattetabbā”ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbapadesu vevacanaṃ vattabbanti
tika-s0104t:1532_8: ayaṃ tassa tassa atthassa taṃtaṃpariyāyasaddayojanālakkhaṇo vevacanahāro nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0104t:1534_0: Āghāto vatthuvasena dasavidhena, ekūnavīsatividhena vā paññatto. Apaccayo upavicāravasena
tika-s0104t:1534_1: chadhā paññatto. Ānando pītiādivasena vevacanena navadhā paññatto. Pīti sāmaññato
tika-s0104t:1534_2: pana khuddikādivasena pañcadhā paññatto. Somanassaṃ upavicāravasena chadhā, sīlaṃ
tika-s0104t:1534_4: catudhā, dvādasadhā vā, visayabhedato anekadhā ca, diṭṭhisassatādivasena dvāsaṭṭhiyā
tika-s0104t:1534_5: bhedehi, tadantogadhavibhāgena anekadhā ca, vedanā chadhā, aṭṭhasatadhā, anekadhā
tika-s0104t:1534_6: ca, tassā samudayo pañcadhā, tathā atthaṅgamopi, assādo duvidhena, ādīnavo tividhena,
tika-s0104t:1534_7: nissaraṇaṃ ekadhā, catudhā ca, anupādāvimutti duvidhena, “ajānataṃ apassata”nti vuttā
tika-s0104t:1534_8: avijjā visayabhedena catudhā, aṭṭhadhā ca, “taṇhāgatāna”ntiādinā vuttā taṇhā chadhā,
tika-s0104t:1534_9: aṭṭhasatadhā, anekadhā ca, phasso nissayavasena chadhā, upādānaṃ catudhā, bhavo dvidhā,
tika-s0104t:1534_10: anekadhā ca, jāti vevacanavasena chadhā, tathā jarā sattadhā, maraṇaṃ aṭṭhadhā, navadhā
tika-s0104t:1534_11: ca, soko pañcadhā, paridevo chadhā, dukkhaṃ catudhā, tathā domanassaṃ, upāyāso catudhā
tika-s0104t:1535_1: samudayassa pahānapaññatti, nirodhassa sacchikiriyāpaññatti, maggassa bhāvanāpaññatti.
tika-s0104t:1535_5: ca paññattibhedo vibhajjitabboti ayaṃ ekekassa dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi paññapetabbākāravibhāvanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0104t:1535_6: paññattihāro nāma, tena vuttaṃ “ekaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ, paṇṇattīhi vividhāhi desetī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1537_1: vedanākkhandhasaṅgahoti idaṃ khandhamukhena otaraṇaṃ. Tathā āghātādiggahaṇena dhammāyatanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1537_2: dhammadhātu, dukkhasaccaṃ, samudayasaccaṃ vā gahitanti idaṃ āyatanamukhena, dhātumukhena,
tika-s0104t:1537_3: saccamukhena ca otaraṇaṃ. Tathā āghātādīnaṃ sahajātā avijjā hetusahajātaaññamaññanissasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi
tika-s0104t:1537_5: paccayo. Ananantarā pana upanissayavaseneva paccayo. Taṇhāupādānādi phassādīnampi
tika-s0104t:1537_6: tesaṃ sahajātānaṃ, asahajātānañca yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvo vattabbo. Koci panettha
tika-s0104t:1537_7: adhipativasena, koci kammavasena, koci āhāravasena, koci indriyavasena, koci jhānavasena
tika-s0104t:1537_8: koci maggavasenāpi paccayoti ayampi viseso veditabboti idaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamukhena
tika-s0104t:1537_9: otaraṇaṃ. Imināva nayena ānandādīnampi khandhādimukhena otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1538_0: Tathā sīlaṃ pāṇātipātādīhi viraticetanā, abyāpādādicetasikadhammā ca, pāṇātipātādayo
tika-s0104t:1538_2: saṅgahato purimanayeneva khandhādimukhena otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ. Esa nayo ñāṇadiṭṭhivedanāavijjātaṇhādiggahaṇesupi.
tika-s0104t:1538_4: vibhāvetabbaṃ, tathā “vedanānaṃ…pe… anupādāvimutto”ti etena bhagavato sīlādayo pañcadhammakkhandhā,
tika-s0104t:1538_5: satipaṭṭhānādayo ca bodhipakkhiyadhammā pakāsitā hontīti taṃmukhenapi otaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1538_7: otaraṇaṃ, tathā evaṃdhammatāya paṭiccasamuppādamukhena otaraṇaṃ. Aniccassa dukkhānattabhāvato
tika-s0104t:1538_8: appaṇihitamukhena, suññatāmukhena otaraṇaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādādimukhehi
tika-s0104t:1538_9: suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo otaraṇahāro nāma. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “yo ca paṭiccuppādo,
tika-s0104t:1540_0: “Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave, pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”nti ārambho. “Dhammassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ
tika-s0104t:1540_1: saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”nti padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi. “Tatra tumhehi na
tika-s0104t:1540_2: āghāto, na appaccayo, na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā”ti padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi
