tika-s0104t:1540_3: ca. Dutiyanayādīsupi eseva nayo, tathā “appamattakaṃ kho paneta”ntiādi ārambho. “Katama”ntiādi
tika-s0104t:1540_4: pucchā. “Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā”tiādi padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi. No ca pucchāsuddhi.
tika-s0104t:1540_5: “Idaṃ kho”tiādi pucchāsuddhi ceva padasuddhi ca, ārambhasuddhi.
tika-s0104t:1541_0: Tathā “atthi bhikkhave”tiādi ārambho. “Katame ca te”tiādi pucchā. “Santi bhikkhave”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1541_1: ārambho. “Kimāgammā”tiādi ārambhapucchā. “Yathā samāhite”tiādi padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi,
tika-s0104t:1541_2: no ca pucchāsuddhi. “Ime kho”tiādi padasuddhi ceva pucchāsuddhi ca ārambhasuddhi
tika-s0104t:1541_3: ca. Iminā nayena sabbattha ārambhādayo veditabbā. Ayaṃ padārambhānaṃ sodhitāsodhitabhāvavicāraṇalakkhaṇo
tika-s0104t:1541_4: sodhanahāro nāma, vuttampi ca “vissajjitamhi pañhe, gāthāyaṃ pucchitāyamārabbhā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1543_0: “Avaṇṇa”nti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tamavikappetvā visesavacanaṃ “mamaṃ vā”ti. Dhammassa
tika-s0104t:1543_1: vā saṅghassa vāti pakkhepi esa nayo. Tathā “sīla”nti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tamavikappetvā
tika-s0104t:1543_3: tamavikappetvā visesavacanaṃ “tayidaṃ bhikkhave, tathāgato pajānātī”tiādi, tathā
tika-s0104t:1543_5: Iminā nayena sabbattha yathādesitameva sāmaññavisesā niddhāretabbā. Ayaṃ suttāgatānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1543_7: nāma, yathāha “ekattatāya dhammā, yepi ca vemattatāya niddiṭṭhā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1545_0: Āghātādīnaṃ “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādīni ekūnavīsati āghātavatthūni hetu. Ānandādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1545_1: ārammaṇābhisineho hetu. Sīlassa hiriottappaṃ, appicchatādayo ca hetu. “Gambhīrā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1545_2: vuttadhammassa sabbāpi pāramiyo hetu. Visesena paññāpāramī. Diṭṭhīnaṃ asappurisūpanissayo,
tika-s0104t:1545_3: asaddhammassavanaṃ micchābhinivesena ayonisomanasikāro ca avisesena hetu. Visesena
tika-s0104t:1545_4: pana sassatavādādīnaṃ atītajātianussaraṇādi hetu. Vedanānaṃ avijjā, taṇhā, kammādiphasso
tika-s0104t:1545_5: ca hetu. Anupādāvimuttiyā ariyamaggo hetu. Aññāṇassa ayonisomanasikāro hetu. Taṇhāya
tika-s0104t:1545_6: saṃyojaniyesu assādānupassanā hetu. Phassassa saḷāyatanāni hetu. Saḷāyatanassa nāmarūpaṃ
tika-s0104t:1545_7: hetu. Bhavanettisamucchedassa visuddhibhāvanā hetūti ayaṃ parikkhārasaṅkhāte hetupaccaye
tika-s0104t:1545_8: niddhāretvā saṃvaṇṇanālakkhaṇo parikkhārahāro nāma, tena vuttaṃ “ye dhammā yaṃ dhammaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1547_0: Āghātādīnamakaraṇīyatāvacanena khantisampadā dassitā hoti. “Appamattakaṃ kho paneta”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t:1547_2: nibbuti viditā”ti, “vedanānaṃ…pe… yathābhūtaṃ viditvā anupādāvimutto”ti ca etehi
tika-s0104t:1547_3: samādhisampadāya saddhiṃ vijjāvimuttivasībhāvasampadā dassitā. Tattha khantisampadā
tika-s0104t:1547_4: paṭisaṅkhānabalasiddhito soraccasampadāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, soraccasampadā pana atthato
tika-s0104t:1547_5: sīlameva, sīlaṃ samādhisampadāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Samādhi ñāṇasampadāya padaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0104t:1548: Pāṇātipātādīhi paṭivirativacanaṃ sīlassa pariyāyavibhāgadassanaṃ. Sassatavādādivibhāgadassanaṃ pana diṭṭhiyā pariyāyavacananti ayaṃ vevacanasamāropanā.
tika-s0104t:1550_2: samāropanahāro nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ “ye dhammā yaṃ mūlā, ye cekatthā pakāsitā muninā”tiādi,
tika-s0104t:1554_0: Āghātādīnamakaraṇavacanena taṇhāvijjāsaṅkoco dassito. Sati hi attattaniyavatthūsu
tika-s0104t:1554_1: sinehe, sammohe ca “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā āghāto jāyati, nāsati. Tathā “pāṇātipātā
tika-s0104t:1554_2: paṭivirato”tiādivacanehi “paccattaññeva nibbuti viditā, anupādāvimutto, channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t:1554_3: yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādivacanehi ca taṇhāvijjānaṃ accantappahānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1554_4: Tāsaṃ pana pubbantakappikādipadehi, “ajānataṃ apassata”ntiādipadehi ca sarūpatopi
tika-s0104t:1554_5: dassitānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ rūpadhammā, arūpadhammā ca adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Yathākkamaṃ samatho
tika-s0104t:1554_6: ca vipassanā ca paṭipakkho, tesaṃ pana cetovimutti, paññāvimutti ca phalaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0104t:1554_7: taṇhā samudayasaccaṃ, taṇhāvijjā vā, tadadhiṭṭhānabhūtā rūpārūpadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1554_8: tesamappavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā samathavipassanā maggasaccanti evaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1555_3: aviparītamanasikārādivasena ca sabbopi kusalapakkho netabbo. Tathā samathapakkhiyānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1555_4: saddhindriyādīnaṃ, vipassanāpakkhiyānañca aniccasaññādīnaṃ vasenāti ayaṃ taṇhāvijjāhi
tika-s0104t:1555_5: saṃkilesapakkhaṃ suttatthaṃ samathavipassanāhi ca vodānapakkhaṃ catusaccayojanamukhena
tika-s0104t:1555_6: nayanalakkhaṇassa nandiyāvaṭṭanayassa bhūmi. Vuttañhi “taṇhañca avijjampi ca, samathena
tika-s0104t:1557_1: Ānandādīnamakaraṇavacanena pana alobhasiddhi, tathā abrahmacariyato paṭivirativacanenāpi.
tika-s0104t:1557_2: Adinnādānādīhi pana paṭivirativacanena tadubhayasiddhi. “Tayidaṃ bhikkhave, tathāgato
tika-s0104t:1557_3: pajānātī”tiādinā amohasiddhi. Iti tīhi akusalamūlehi gahitehi tappaṭipakkhato āghātādīnamakaraṇavacanena
tika-s0104t:1557_4: ca tīṇi kusalamūlāni siddhāniyeva honti. Tattha tīhi akusalamūlehi tividhaduccaritasaṃkilesamalavisamākusalasaññāvitakkapañcādivasena
tika-s0104t:1557_5: sabbopi akusalapakkho vitthāretabbo. Tathā tīhi kusalamūlehi tividhasucaritavodānasamakusalasaññāvitakkapaññāsaddhammasamādhi-
tika-s0104t:1558_0: Ettha cāyaṃ saccayojanā – lobho samudayasaccaṃ, sabbāni vā kusalākusalamūlāni, tehi
tika-s0104t:1558_1: pana nibbattā tesamadhiṭṭhānagocarabhūtā upādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ, tesamappavatti
tika-s0104t:1558_2: nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā vimokkhādikā maggasaccanti. Ayaṃ akusalamūlehi saṃkilesapakkhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1558_3: kusalamūlehi ca vodānapakkhaṃ catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇassa tipukkhalanayassa
tika-s0104t:1562_1: Vīriyena hi kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakke vinodeti, vīriyasādhanañca ājīvapārisuddhisīlanti.
tika-s0104t:1562_2: Pāṇātipātādīhi paṭivirativacanena satisiddhi. Satiyā hi sāvajjānavajjo diṭṭho hoti.
tika-s0104t:1562_3: Tattha ca ādīnavānisaṃse sallakkhetvā sāvajjaṃ pahāya anavajjaṃ samādāya vattati.
tika-s0104t:1562_4: Tathā hi sā “niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti vuccati. “Tayidaṃ bhikkhave, tathāgato pajānātī”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1562_5: samādhipaññāsiddhi. Paññavā hi yathābhūtāvabodho samāhito ca yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti.
tika-s0104t:1563_0: Tathā “nicco dhuvo”tiādinā anicce “nicca”nti vipallāso, “arogo paraṃ maraṇā, ekantasukhī
tika-s0104t:1563_1: attā, diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto”ti ca evamādīhi asukhe “sukha”nti vipallāso. “Pañcahi
tika-s0104t:1563_2: kāmaguṇehi samappito”tiādinā asubhe “subha”nti vipallāso. Sabbeheva diṭṭhippakāsanapadehi
tika-s0104t:1563_3: anattani “attā”ti vipallāsoti evamettha cattāro vipallāsā siddhā honti, tesaṃ paṭipakkhato
tika-s0104t:1563_4: cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni siddhāneva. Tattha catūhi yathāvuttehi indriyehi cattāro puggalā
tika-s0104t:1563_5: niddisitabbā. Kathaṃ duvidho hi taṇhācarito mudindriyo tikkhindriyoti, tathā diṭṭhicaritopi.
tika-s0104t:1563_6: Tesu paṭhamo asubhe “subha”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ
tika-s0104t:1563_7: sallakkhetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Dutiyo asukhe “sukha”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko
tika-s0104t:1563_9: taṃ vipallāsaṃ vidhamati. Tatiyo anicce “nicca”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko samādhibalena
tika-s0104t:1563_10: samāhitabhāvato saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paṭivijjhati. Catuttho santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanavicittattā
tika-s0104t:1563_12: taṃ micchābhinivesaṃ viddhaṃseti. Catūhi cettha vipallāsehi caturāsavoghayogaganthaagatitaṇhuppādupādānasattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiapariññādivasena
tika-s0104t:1563_13: sabbopi akusalapakkho netabbo. Tathā catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi catubbidhajhānavihārādhiṭṭhānasukhabhāgiyadhammaappamaññāsammappadhānaiddhipādādivasena
tika-s0104t:1564_0: Ettha cāyaṃ saccayojanā – subhasaññāsukhasaññāhi, catūhipi vā vipallāsehi samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1564_2: nirodhapajānanā satipaṭṭhānādikā maggasaccanti. Ayaṃ vipallāsehi saṃkilesapakkhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1564_4: bhūmi, yathāha “yo neti vipallāsehi, kilese indriyehi saddhamme”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1566_0: Iti tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohāranayadvayampi siddhameva hoti. Tathā hi atthanayattayadisābhūtadhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1566_1: samālocanameva disālocananayo. Tesaṃ samānayanameva aṅkusanayo. Tasmā yathāvuttanayena
tika-s0104t:1566_3: tena vuttaṃ “veyyākaraṇesu hi ye, kusalākusalā”tiādi. Ayaṃ pañcanayayojanā.
tika-s0104t:1569_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ soḷasavidhe sāsanapaṭṭhāne saṃkilesavāsanāsekkhabhāgiyaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhādisaṃkilesānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1569_2: vā yathāvuttatthānaṃ sekkhasīlakkhandhādikassa ca vibhattattā. Aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana
tika-s0104t:1569_5: bhavo ca lokiyalokuttarādīnamatthānaṃ idha vibhattattāti. Ayaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānayojanā.
tika-s0104t:1571_4: katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthavibhāvanā.
